translation.en: Why don't they want to accept the people of Uganda do not trust them to do the job?
translation.lug: Lwaki tebaagala kukkiriza nti bannayuganda tebabeesiga kukola mulimu ogwo?

translation.en: Only three National Resistance Movement officials Rebecca Kadaga, Ofwono Opondo and Fred Ruhindi attended the workshop.
translation.lug: Abakulu mu National Resistance Movement basatu bokka Rebecca Kadaaga, Ofwono Opondo ne Fred Ruhindi be beetaba mu musomo.

translation.en: Basajja could represent Uganda in boxing contest.
translation.lug: Basajja yandikiikiridde Uganda mu mpaka z'ebikonde.

translation.en: The hides and skins businessman showed fellow delegates to the party meeting at Namboole that he is also endowed with kick boxing skills.
translation.lug: Omusuubuzi w'amaliba n'ebirenge yalagako banne ku nkiiko z'akabaga e Namboole nti naye yali alina obukugu mu bikonde.

translation.en: He descended on a New Vision photo journalist, Arthur Kintu and punished him with disciplinary punches.
translation.lug: Yayogedde ku kifaananyi kya munnamawulire mu New Vision, Arthur Kintu n'amuyigiriza empisa.

translation.en: The journalist who was at Namboole to cover the NRM conference was punched for taking pictures of Basajjabalaba on September 6.
translation.lug: Munnamawulire eyali e Namboole okukwata olukiiko lwa NRM yakubwa ebikonde olw'okukuba Basajjabalaba ebifaananyi mu Gwomwenda 6.

translation.en: The Kabaka was blocked from accessing any of the counties in his kingdom.
translation.lug: Kabaka yagaanibwa okugenda mu ssaza lyonna mu bwakabaka bwe.

translation.en: As any of the twenty three men who were arrested a year ago in connection with the Buganda riots of September 2009 will tell you.
translation.lug: Nga omu yenna ku basajja abiri mu abasatu abaakwatibwa omwaka gumu emabega ku byekuusa ku butabanguko mu Buganda nga 2009 Ogwomwenda bajja kukugamba.

translation.en: That is what happened to the twenty three men who were charged with terrorism over the torching of Nateete Police post.
translation.lug: Ekyo kye kyatuuka ku basajja abiri mu abasatu abaavunaanibwa ogw'obutujju olw'okulumba poliisi y'e Nateete.

translation.en: Justice Benjamin Kabiito advised the men who saw their second application for bail frustrated, to wait in Luzira for their trial to commence.
translation.lug: Omulamuzi Benjamin Kabiito yawa abasajja amagezi abataali bamativu n'okugaanibwa kw'okusaba kwabwe okwokubiri okugaanibwa nti balinde okuwulira omusango gwabwe kutandike e Luzira.

translation.en: The High Court in Kampala has ordered the maverick Minister of Trade and Industry, Kahinda Otafiire, to file his defence.
translation.lug: Kkooti enkulu mu Kampala eragidde Minisita w'ebyobusuubuzi n'amakolero, Kahinda Otafiire, okussaamu okwewozaako kwe.

translation.en: Moses Mapesa, who was suspended by Boysier Mubballe early last month for alleged insubordination dragged the Minister to court.
translation.lug: Moses Mapesa, eyagobwa Boysier Mubbale ku ntandikwa y'omwezi oguyise ku bigambibwa nti yagyemera ebiragiro  yatwala Minisita mu kkooti.

translation.en: Ignatius Koomu, displays results he collected during the NRM primaries at Uganda Journalists Association office in Kampala on September 13.
translation.lug: Ignatius Koomu, alaga bye yakungaanya ebyava mu kamyufu ka NRM ku woofiisi z'ekibiina kya bannamawulire mu Kampala nga 13 Ogwomwenda.

translation.en: A vendor reaps big from end of the Ramadhan month by selling snacks near praying Muslims on Idi Day at Katwe Mosque.
translation.lug: Omutembeeyi afuna nnyo ku nkomekerero y'omwezi gw'ekisiibo ky'Abasiraamu ng'atunda obumpwankimpwanki okuliraana Abasiraamu we basaalira ku lunaku lwa Idi ku muzikiti gw'e Katwe.

translation.en: Justice Yorokamu Bamwine directed that the Minister who failed to appear in court on September 13 must file his defence by September 22.
translation.lug: Omulamuzi Yorokamu Bamwine yalagira nti minista eyalemererwa okulabikako mu kkooti nga 13, Ogwomwenda nti alina okussaamu okwewozaako kwe nga 22 Ogwomwenda.

translation.en: Kirunda is too broke to pay Katuntu.
translation.lug: Kirunda mwavu nnyo era tasobola kusasula Katuntu.

translation.en: Apparently, Kirunda Kivejinja is too broke to pay Abdul Katuntu, who he owes fourty million shillings arising out of an election petition.
translation.lug: Mu kiseera kino, Kirunda Kivejinja mwavu nnyo era tasobola kusasula Abdul Katuntu amubanja obukadde bwa siringi ana obwava ku kujulira mu kalulu.

translation.en: Kivejinja lost the petition and appealed in the Court of Appeal where he also lost, increasing the costs to fourty million shillings.
translation.lug: Kivejinja yawangulwa mu kujulira ne yeekubira enduulu mu kkooti ejulirwamu gye yawangulirwa ne kyongera omuwendo okutuuka ku bukadde ana.

translation.en: However, since the March 16, 2007 court ruling, Kirunda has never paid costs of the suit and has since asked for more time to be able to pay.
translation.lug: Newankubadde, okuva ku nsala ya kkooti eya nga 12, Ogwokusatu, 2007, Kirunda tasasulanga ssente zaamulagirwa wabula yasaba okwongezebwa obudde okusobola okusasula.

translation.en: Kirunda's lawyer Muzamir Kibeedi told the Registrar of the Court of Appeal, Deo Nizeyimana, on September 13 that his client was willing to pay.
translation.lug: Munnamateeka wa Kirunda Mazamir Kibeedi yagamba omuwandiisi wa kkooti ejulirwamu, Deo Nizeyimana, nga 13 Ogwomwenda nti omuntu we mwetegefu okusasula.

translation.en: Nizeyimana agreed with the lawyer and gave the minister more time to pay.
translation.lug: Nizeyimana yakkiriziganya ne munnamateeka n'awa minisita obudde obulala.

translation.en: This does not only appear in the Ugandan press but also in international media.
translation.lug: Kino tekyeyolekera mu mawulire ga Uganda gokka wabula ne mu mawulire g'ensi yonna.

translation.en: In the United States of America elections, President Obama was portrayed as a family man.
translation.lug: Mu kulonda kwa United States of America, Pulezidenti Obama yannyonyolwa ng'omusajja owa famire.

translation.en: Today in Uganda's media it is common to read about women being hit, raped or killed by their male counterparts.
translation.lug: Mu mawulire ga Uganda aga leero, kyeyoleka nnyo okusoma ku bakazi abakubibwa, abasobezebwako n'okuttibwa abaami baabwe.

translation.en: Fred Bamwine has been a resident district commissioner in Kampala for the last seven years.
translation.lug: Fred Bamwine abadde mubaka wa pulezidenti mu Kampala okumala emyaka musanvu emabega.

translation.en: Lubwama's salary has enabled him to send his children to school and buy himself a bicycle.
translation.lug: Omusaala gwa Lubwama gumusobozesezza okutwala abaana be ku ssomero n'okwegulira eggaali.

translation.en: Platics are recycled it into raw material for plastic companies in Uganda and in countries such as China and Malawi.
translation.lug: Pulasitiika biddamu okusaanuusibwa n'akolebwamu ebintu ebikozesebwa mu makolero mu Uganda n'ensi nga China ne Malawi.

translation.en: The 2009/10 budget vowed to punish the manufacture, use and importation of plastic bags.
translation.lug: Embalirira ya 2009/10 yeewera okubonereza bannamakolero, abakozesa n'okugula pulasitiika okuva wabweru w'eggwanga.

translation.en: Statements like the Lords Resistance Army soldiers should come out and get better medical treatment from government should be made.
translation.lug: Sitatimenti ng'abasirikale ba Lords Resistance Army balina okuvaayo ne bafuna obujjanjabi obulungi okuva mu gavumenti zirina okukolebwa.

translation.en: It will not be free and fair unless the current Electoral Commission is dissolved and reconstituted.
translation.lug: Tekajja kuba ka mazima na bwenkanya okuggyako ng'akakiiko k'ebyokulonda akaliwo kayiiriddwa ne kalondebwa buto.

translation.en: Otunnu made bitter attacks on President Museveni's government for neglecting the health sector.
translation.lug: Otunnu yakola obulumbaganyi obukambwe ku gavumenti ya Pulezidenti Museveni olw'obutafa ku byabulamu.

translation.en: Uganda People's Congress did not participate in the electoral process under the current Electoral Commission.
translation.lug: Uganda People's Congress teyeetaba mu kulonda wansi w'akakiiko k'ebyokulonda akaliko.

translation.en: Yona Kanyomoozi is taking a different direction from the party's position.
translation.lug: Yona Kanyomoozi akola bintu birala ebyawukana kw'ebyo ebisalibwawo ekibiina kye.

translation.en: He stopped the Uganda People's Congress from participating in the Constituent Assembly.
translation.lug: Yagaana Uganda People's Congress okwetaba mu lukiiko ttabamiruka.

translation.en: Kanyomoozi told the Independent about Obote's big mistake of pulling out of the Inter Party Cooperation.
translation.lug: Kanyomoozi yategeezezza Independent ku nsobi ya Obote ey'okuva mu mukago ogutaba ebibiina byobufuzi.

translation.en: The Uganda People's Congress stood to avoid the elections in two thousand eleven.
translation.lug: Uganda People's Congress yasalawo okwewala akalulu mu nkumi bbiri mu kkumi na gumu.

translation.en: Sospater Akwenyu had earlier indicated he would stand but last week he said he had pulled out of the race.
translation.lug: Sospater Akwenyu yasooka n'alaga nti yanti ajja kwesimbawo naye wiiki ewedde yagamba nti avudde mu lwokaano.

translation.en: The choice was for Ugandans to choose between dishonest rigged elections or to participate in the struggle for freedom.
translation.lug: Okusalawo kwali kwa Bannauganda okulondako wakati w'okulonda okutali kwa mazima oba okwetaba mu kulwanirira eddembe

translation.en: In one thousand nine hundred eighty nine, Kanyomoozi issued an order stopping UPC from participating in the Museveni government.
translation.lug: Mu lukumi mu lwenda mu kinaana mu mwenda, Kanyomoozi yayisa ekiragiro ekikomya UPC okwetaba mu gavumenti ya Museveni.

translation.en: Otunnu faces riot as Uganda People's Congress officials disobey to the call to avoid the two thousand eleven elections.
translation.lug: Otunnu asanga okwegugunga nga abakungu ba Uganda People's Congress bagaana okuva mu kaluluka nkumi bbiri mu kkumi na gumu.

translation.en: Kanyomoozi and Akena rejected the posts of Special Presidential Envoy and National Vice Chairman in the UPC President's Office.
translation.lug: Kanyomoozi ne Akena baagaanye ebifo by'omuwabuze wa Pulezidenti n'omumyuka wa ssentebe wa mu woofiisi ya Pulezidenti wa UPC.

translation.en: His arguments suggest the Uganda People's Congress president is only acting under influence.
translation.lug: Mu kwogera kwe alaga nti Pulezidenti wa Uganda People's Congress akola ng'aliko gw'akolera.

translation.en: The Democratic Party is Uganda's oldest political party but currently it has only ten members of parliament.
translation.lug: Democratic Party kye kibiina ky'ebyobufuzi ekisinga obukulu mu Uganda naye mu kiseera kino kirina bammemba ba paalamenti kkumi bokka.

translation.en: The youths are the biggest segment of Uganda's voting population.
translation.lug: Abavubuka kye kitundu ekisinga obunene mu balonzi ba Uganda.

translation.en: Democratic Party held its Kampala delegates conference to choose the party's flag bearers in the district.
translation.lug: Democratic Party yategeka olukiiko ttabamiruka mu Kampala okulonda abagikwatira bendera mu disitulikiti.

translation.en: "SSUUBI", referred to the pressure group that was created to campaign Buganda votes for the Interparty Cooperation in two thousand eleven.
translation.lug: "SSUUBI", etwalibwa ng'omugendo eyatondebwawo okunoonya obululu mu Buganda okuva mu mukago ogutaba ebibiina by'ebyobufuzi mu nkumi bbiri mu kkumi na gumu.

translation.en: The party is not happy with the pressure group for joining with Inter Party Cooperation, which Democratic Party refused to join.
translation.lug: Ekibiina si kisanyufu n'omugendo okwegatta ku mukago ogutaba ebibiina by'ebyobufuzi, ng'ate Democratic Party yakigaana.

translation.en: Most leaders in the district were from Democratic Party.
translation.lug: Abakulembeze abasinga baali bava mu Democratic Party.

translation.en: He defeated Democratic Party's official candidate, former deputy Mayor Hasib Takuba Kabuye.
translation.lug: Yawangula omukungu wa Democratic Party, eyali omumyuka wa mmeeya, Hasib Takuba Kabuye.

translation.en: He is understood to have won more due to his association with Kizza Besigye.
translation.lug: Amanyikiddwa mu kuwangula ennyo olw'enkolagana ye ne Kizza Besigye.

translation.en: Kawempe Division is led by Nasser Takuba Kibirige.
translation.lug: Ebbendobendo ly'e Kawempe likulemberwa, Nasser Takuba Kibirige.

translation.en: Erias Lukwago left Norbert Mao's party.
translation.lug: Erias Lukwago yava mu ekibiina kya Norbert Mao.

translation.en: Lukwago did not participate and the party flag went to Eddie Yawe, who is known more for his music than politics.
translation.lug: Lukwago teyeetabaamu era bendera y'ekibiina n'eweebwa Eddie Yawe, amanyikiddwa ennyo olw'ennyimba ze okusinga ebyobufuzi.

translation.en: He is unsure which seat he will stand for, following the takeover of Kampala city by the central government.
translation.lug: Takakasa kifo ki ky'ajja okwesimbako, oluvannyuma lw'ekibuga Kampala okutwalibwa gavumenti eya wakati.

translation.en: In the two thousand eleven general elections, the ruling party will be competing against the opposition.
translation.lug: Mu kulonda kwa bonna okwa nkumi bbiri mu kkumi na gumu, ekibiina ekiri mu buyinza kijja kuba kivuganya n'abooludda oluvuganya.

translation.en: It indicates that National Resistance Movement cannot organise free and fair elections.
translation.lug: Kiraga nti National Resistance Movement tesobola kutegeka kalulu ka mazima na bwenkanya.

translation.en: The opposition accuse the Electoral Commission of being in favour of the ruling National Resistance Movement.
translation.lug: Oludda oluvuganya gavumenti luvumirira eky'akakiiko k'ebyokulonda okutiitiibwa National Resistance Movement eri mu buyinza.

translation.en: It's the attempt to impose outside solutions on Africa’s internal problems that has confused our continent.
translation.lug: Okugezaako okukozesa enkola ez'ensi z'ebweru okugonjoola ebizibu by'omu Afirika kye kiviiriddeko obutabanguko ku ssemazinga waffe.

translation.en: In the case of Somalia, the biggest threat to the evolution of an effective state has been the United States.
translation.lug: Ekisinze okulemesa eggwanga lya Somalia okutereera ye Amerika

translation.en: United States involvement in Somalia began with the 1991 intervention that was largely a humanitarian gesture.
translation.lug: Amerika lwe yasooka okuyingira mu nsonga za Somalia mu 1991 okusingira ddala yalina kigendererwa kya kuyamba bantu baali bakoseddwa.

translation.en: However, when America shifted its mandate from humanitarian intervention to peace enforcement, it got entangled in a war with Mohammed Aideed.
translation.lug: Naye Amerika bwe yava ku kigendererwa ekyo n'eyingira mu nsonga ez'okuzzaawo emirembe, yatandika okulwanagana ne Mohammed Aideed.

translation.en: This led to the death of eighteen Americans in the famous “black hawk down” battle in Mogadishu that caused a United States withdrawal.
translation.lug: Ekyo kyaviirako Abamerika kkumi na munaana okufiira mu lutalo olwali e Mogadishu, ekyawaliriza Amerika okubiggyamu enta.

translation.en: Had America allowed Aideed to militarily capture the whole country of Somalia, Somalia would have emerged more stable and effective.
translation.lug: Singa Amerika yaleka Aideed okuwamba ensi ya Somalia yonna, Somalia teyandibaddemu butabanguko bungi era yanditebenkedde.

translation.en: The American position was reinforced by the international humanitarian groups and their ill-informed and misguided African chorus singers.
translation.lug: Endowooza n'ebiruubirirwa bya Amerika byeyongera okutumbulwa ebibiina ebirwanirira eddembe ly'obuntu n'abayimbi abaali batamanyi byonna bizingirwamu era abaali babuzaabuziddwa.

translation.en: They looked at that country’s problem from a purely humanitarian perspective and missed the vital importance of effective military control of Somalia.
translation.lug: Baalowooza nnyo ku ddembe ly'obuntu ne babuusa amaaso obukulu bw'okuba n'eggye erikuuma eddembe mu Somalia.

translation.en: I harbour a fundamental disagreement with democracy and human rights groups in Africa.
translation.lug: Nze ku lwange, sikkiriza nti enkola ya demokulasiya awamu n'ebibiina ebirwanirira eddembe ly'obuntu biyamba Afirika.

translation.en: Democracy exists in stable and effective states, not in anarchy.
translation.lug: Demokulase ayamba nsi ezatebenkera edda, so si ezo ezikyalimu obusambatukko.

translation.en: What Somalia needs is a military strongman with  organisational ability to gather resources , bribe and persuade other military and civilian groups together.
translation.lug: Somalia kye yeetaaga ye munnamagye ow'amaanyi alina obusobozi obw'okukumaakuma abantu n'okusendasenda amagye amalala.

translation.en: In the mid 2000s, the Islamic Courts Union grew and spread rapidly, establishing order over large parts of the country.
translation.lug: Mu makkati g'emyaka gya 2000, ekibiina ky'eby'obufuzi ekiyitibwa Islamic Courts Union kyakula era ne kibuna mu bitundu bingi ebya Somalia, ne kireetawo obutembenkevu mu bitundu bingi eby'eggwanga eryo.

translation.en: However, post 11th September America was scared of anything Islamic and thus saw the Islamic Courts Union as an enemy.
translation.lug: Naye oluvannyuma lw'ebyo ebyaliwo nga Ssebutemba 11, Amerika yatandika okwekengera ennyo ekintu kyonna ekyalimu Abayisiraamu, bwe kityo ekibiina ekyo yali ekitwala ng'omulabe.

translation.en: It financed Ethiopia to dislodge them from power.
translation.lug: Yassa ssente mu Esiyopiya esobole okuggyako ekibiina ekyo obuyinza.

translation.en: From the ashes of their defeat emerged the Al-Shabaab with largely terrorist intentions rather than a desire to build a strong state.
translation.lug: Okugwa kw'ekibiina ekyo kwaviirako ekibiina kya Al-Shabaab okutandikibwawo ng'okusingira ddala kyettanira bikolwa bya bwannalukalala mu kifo ky'okuzimba eggwanga eritebenkedde.

translation.en: America should have worked with Islamic Courts Union to create a stable state in Somalia.
translation.lug: Amerika yandibadde ekolera wamu n'ekibiina kya Islamic Courts Union okuleetawo obutebenkevu mu Somalia.

translation.en: United States of America was unwilling to send in troops to hold the peace because it was not politically sellable.
translation.lug: Amerika teyali nneetegefu kusindika magye kukuuma mirembe kubanga bannabyabufuzi mu ggwanga eryo baali tebagyagala.

translation.en: It subcontracted that role to Uganda and Burundi.
translation.lug: Bw'etyo yasalawo okukozesa Uganda ne Burundi.

translation.en: Museveni, seeing an opportunity to be central to United States of America's geo-strategic interests in the region offered to send in troops.
translation.lug: Museveni, bwe yakiraba nti yandibadde wa kumwanjo nnyo mu kutuukirizibwa kw'ebigendererwa bya Amerika mu Somalia, yakkiriza okusindika amagye.

translation.en: I am reluctant to believe that Museveni was driven by a desire for peace in Somalia.
translation.lug: Sikiwa nti ekigendererwa kya Museveni ekikulu kwali kuleetawo mirembe mu Somalia.

translation.en: Museveni convinced me that such ill advised foreign military interventions despite being well intentioned, tend to create more problems than they solve.
translation.lug: Museveni yankakasa nti amagye ag'ebweru bwe geeyingiza mu nsonga z'amawanga amalala, ne bwe gaba tegalina bigendererwa bikyamu, emirundi mingi gongera bwongezi kwonoona mbeera.

translation.en: In 2002, Museveni shared a speech he delivered in Zimbabwe on Uganda and Rwanda’s role in the removal of Mobutu of Zaire.
translation.lug: Mu 2002, Museveni yagabanako n'abalala ku ebyo bye yayogerera mu lukungaana olwali e Zimbabwe olwali lukwata ku ngeri Uganda ne Rwanda gye zaayambako mu kuggya Mobutu owa Zaire mu buyinza.

translation.en: Somalia failing to become an effective state  and the rise of Al-Shabaab, are a byproduct of international intervention in domestic politics.
translation.lug: Eggwanga lya Somalia okulemererwa okutebenkera n'okutandikibwawo kw'ekibiina kya Al-Shabaab, kivudde ku mawanga ag'ebweru okweyingiza mu by'obufuzi by'eggwanga eryo.

translation.en: It is also difficult to see the strategic gains for Uganda in this intervention.
translation.lug: Kizibu okulaba Uganda weefunira mu kuyingira mu nsonga ezo.

translation.en: However, it is strategically important for Museveni.
translation.lug: Naye ku luuyi olulala, ekyo ye Museveni akifunamu.

translation.en: Ugandan troops presence in Somalia helps improve his standing in Washington DC, a factor that is vital for his domestic politics.
translation.lug: Amagye ga Uganda okubeera mu Somalia kimuwaako ekifaananyi ekirungi mu Amerika, era ekyo kimuyamba nnyo mu kunyweza eby'obufuzi mu Uganda.

translation.en: In fact, when he came to power, United States President Barack Obama showed a cold attitude to Museveni,
translation.lug: Mu butuufu, Obama bwe yali yaakafuuka pulezidenti wa Amerika, yakiraga nti yali tamatira Museveni.

translation.en: Now, with Ugandans paying with blood for American geo-strategic interests in this region, Museveni is indispensable to Obama’s plans for this region.
translation.lug: Naye kati olw'okuba omusaayi gwa bannayuganda guyiise okusobola okutuukiriza ebigendererwa bya Amerika mu kitundu kino, kati Obama atwala Museveni ng'omuntu ow'omugaso ennyo mu kutambuza enteekateeka z'alina ezikwata ku kitundu kino.

translation.en: Because the gains from Somalia are personal to Museveni rather than national to Uganda,
translation.lug: Olw'okuba ekintu kino Museveni y'asinga okukifunamu so si Uganda,

translation.en: I harbour a fundamental disagreement with democracy and human rights groups in Africa.
translation.lug: kindeetera okulowooza nti enkola ya demokulasiya awamu n'ebibiina ebirwanirira eddembe ly'obuntu tebiyamba Afirika.

translation.en: Yet we are continuously told that only a democratic order built around a consensus would bring a stable peace in Somalia.
translation.lug: Wadde kiri kityo, beeyongera okutugamba nti enkola ya demokulasiya, ey'okugoberera abangi kye basazeewo, y'ejja okuleetawo emirembe egy'enkalakkalira mu Somalia.

translation.en: Why we should pull out of Somalia.
translation.lug: Lwaki tulina okuva mu Somalia.

translation.en: Aronda Nyakairima, received a threat assessment from the Chieftaincy of Military Intelligence detailing a serious threat from Allied Democratic Forces terrorists.
translation.lug: Aronda Nyakairima, yafuna alipoota okuva mu kitongole ky'amagye eky'eby'okwerinda ng'eraga nti waaliwo obulumbaganyi obwali buyinza okukolebwa abayeekera ba ADF.

translation.en: Nyakairima sent a flash radio message of the threat to all units of the Uganda Peoples' Defence Forces.
translation.lug: Nyakairima yategeeza ebitongole byonna eby'eggye lya UPDF ku nsonga eyo.

translation.en: The next day Chieftaincy of Military Intelligence reinforced its defences at its head offices at Kitante Courts.
translation.lug: Ku lunaku olwaddako ekitongole kya ekikesi kyanyweza eby'okwerinda ku kitebe kyakyo ekikulu e Kitante.

translation.en: At all security installations around Kampala and greater Kampala, increased security measures were put in place.
translation.lug: Ate era eby'okwerinda byanywezebwa mu Kampala ne mu bitundu ebiriraanyeewo.

translation.en: At the same time, information had been given to the police to communicate to the public about an impending attack.
translation.lug: Ate era n'ekitongole kya poliisi kyali kitegeezeddwa kisobole okulabula abantu ku bulumbaganyi obwali bujja.

translation.en: At some seminars and conferences, police claim to have informed listeners to be careful.
translation.lug: Ekitongole kya poliisi kigamba nti waliwo enkuŋŋaana ezimu mwe kyayitira okulabula abantu.

translation.en: Warning signs were already well apparent by the time a group of 24 former Allied Democartic Forces combatants were met on October 8, 2008.
translation.lug: Nga Okitobba 8, 2008, gavumenti we yasisinkanira abantu 24 abaali baava mu ggye lya ADF, kyali kimaze okweyoleka nti waaliwo obuzibu obwali bujja.

translation.en: The former combatants, who had renounced violence to get amnesty and were retained by Joint Anti-Terrorist Task Force as informers.
translation.lug: Abantu abo abaali baleseeyo obuyeekera basobole okusonyiyibwa baakuumibwa ekitongole ekirwanyisa ebikolwa eby'obutujju nga kyagala babeeko bye bakitegeeza.

translation.en: The meeting was a pre-emptive security measure to divert the Allied Democratic Forces.
translation.lug: Olukuŋŋaana olwo lwali lwa kuwugula aba ADF.

translation.en: 9th October of that year, the Tripartite-Plus, Common Market for Eastern and Southern Africa and Southern African Development Community heads of state summit in Kampala.
translation.lug: Nga Okitobba 9 omwaka ogwo, olukuŋŋaana olwetabwamu abakulembeze b'amawanga ag'enjawulo lwatuula mu Kampala.

translation.en: During the meeting, the Allied Democratic Forces were asked to submit a document of their grievances.
translation.lug: Mu lukuŋŋaana olwo aba ADF baasabibwa okuwaayo ekiwandiiko okuli okwemulugunya kwabwe.

translation.en: It was later submitted signed by one Hussein Maiga and the abovementioned Benz Tushabe.
translation.lug: Oluvannyuma baawaayo ekiwandiiko ekyo nga kiteekeddwako omukono gwa Hussein Maiga ne Benz Tushabe.

translation.en: According to contents of the meeting, the ex-Allied Democratic Forces combatants referred to in the document as “reporters”  repeated their complaint.
translation.lug: Okusinziira ku byali mu lukuŋŋaana olwo, abo abaali baava mu ggye lya ADF, aboogerwako nga “balipoota” mu kiwandiiko ekyo baddamu okwogera okwemulugunya kwabwe.

translation.en: They argued that the resettlement money they had received from the government was insufficient and that they felt forgotten.
translation.lug: Baagamba nti ssente gavumenti ze yabawa okubayamba okudda mu bulamu obwa bulijjo zaali tezimala era nti baali bawulira ng'abeerabirwa.

translation.en: In the document, Allied Democratic Forces reporters complained that most of their combatants who got amnesty are youths.
translation.lug: Mu kiwandiiko ekyo aboogezi b'eggye lya ADF beemulugunya nti bangi ku bajjaasi baabwe abaaweebwa ekisonyiwo baali bavubuka.

translation.en: The document noted that dealing with these youths requires care as they are targets of continued recruitment efforts by Allied Democratic Forces.
translation.lug: Ekiwandiiko kyagamba nti gavumenti esaanidde okwegendereza engeri gy'ekwatamu abavubuka abo kubanga kyangu abavubuka abo okusendebwasendebwa okuddamu okwegatta ku ggye lya ADF.

translation.en: Government should come up with a program to engage these Muslim youths in active economic activities to avoid idleness and redundancy.
translation.lug: Gavumenti esaanidde okuteekawo programu eyamba abavubuka bano Abayisiramu okubaako emirimu gye bakola baleme kufuuka bakireereesi.

translation.en: Security sources say Allied Democratic Forces reporters had been trying to meet president Museveni to present him their grievances.
translation.lug: Ensonda ez'eby'okwerinda zigamba nti aboogezi ba ADF baali bagezezzaako enfunda n'enfunda okusisinkana pulezidenti Museveni bamubuulire okwemulugunya kwabwe.

translation.en: State House sources say they had not secured such audience by 7th November.
translation.lug: Ensonda okuva mu maka g'obwa pulezidenti zigamba nti Noovemba 7 we lwatuukira enteekateeka z'ensisinkano eyo zaali tezinnakakasibwa.

translation.en: The last time Allied Democartic Forces had a meeting with the president was on February 03, 2004 .
translation.lug: Aba ADF baali baasemba okusisinkana pulezidenti nga Febwali 3, 2004 .

translation.en: At the time, the president directed that jailed Allied Democartic Forces leaders Maneno Majaliwa and Sserwanga Bukenya be released.
translation.lug: Ku olwo, pulezidenti yalagira nti abakulembeze ba ADF, Maneno Majaliwa ne Sserwanga Bukenya, abaali mu kkomera bateebwe.

translation.en: Because many of them work with and inside Uganda’s security organizations.
translation.lug: Olw'okuba bangi ku bo bakolera wamu n'ebitongole bya Uganda eby'eby'okwerinda era babirimu.

translation.en: In an August 2008 internal assessment by Joint Anti-Terrorist Task Force.
translation.lug: Lipoota eya Agusito 2008 eyafulumizibwa ekitongole ekirwanyisa obutujju.

translation.en: In the same internal assessment, Joint Anti-Terrorist Task Force reported that Allied Democratic Forces intentions were elimination of their defected comrades.
translation.lug: Mu alipoota eyo ekitongole ekirwanyisa obutujju kyagamba nti aba ADF baali baagala kusaanyaawo abo abaali baabulidde eggye lyabwe.

translation.en: The document had names of Allied Democratic Forces operatives on the run.
translation.lug: Alipoota eyo yalimu amannya g'abantu ADF be baali banoonya.

translation.en: At the time, Joint Anti-Terrorist Task Force had planned to arrest terrorists now using women to spy on targets.
translation.lug: Mu kiseera ekyo, ekitongole ekirwanyisa obutujju kyali kisazeewo okukozesa abakazi nga bambega kisobole okukwata abatujju.

translation.en: Among the operations Joint Anti-Terrorist Task Force had carried out was the arrest of one Seka Adam Nsubuga Mukalazi,
translation.lug: Mu kimu ku bikwekweto ekitongole ekirwanyisa obutujju bye kyakola mwe kyakwatira Seka Adam Nsubuga Mukalazi,

translation.en: On August 8, 2008, they arrested Joseph Ouma and one Waskile in Busia for being connected to a suspicious number.
translation.lug: Nga Agusito 8, 2008, baakwatira Joseph Ouma ne Waskile e Busia olw'okuba baali bakolagana n'abantu abaali bateeberezebwa okuba abatujju.

translation.en: On August 10, 2008, Bukomeko Muhammed and Magelo Shaffik were also arrested by tracking team.
translation.lug: Nga Agusito 10, 2008, Bukomeko Muhammed ne Magelo Shaffik nabo baabalinnya kagere ne bakwatibwa.

translation.en: As a result of these operations, many Allied Democratic Forces combatants began to surrender to government.
translation.lug: Ebikwekweto ebyo byaviirako bangi ku bajaasi ba ADF okwewaayo mu mikono gya gavumenti.

translation.en: Because Allied Democratic Forces was built around their religious faith.
translation.lug: Olw'okuba eggye lya ADF lyazimbibwa ku musingi gwa ddiini.

translation.en: The Allied Democratic Forces reporters inside Joint Anti-Terrorrist Taskforce and the Uganda Peoples Defence Forces became open to re-joining the terrorists as double agents.
translation.lug: Abantu abaali baava mu ADF ne bayingizibwa mu kitongole ekirwanyisa obutujju ne mu UPDF baali beetegefu n'okuba nga mu kiseera kye kimu bakolagana ne ADF.

translation.en: Moreover, by the time of the bomb blasts on 7th November, there had been reports of massive recruitment by Alied Democratic Forces.
translation.lug: Mu butuufu, bbomu we zaabwatuukira nga Noovemba 7, waaliwo ebyali biyitiŋŋana nti abantu bangi baali beegasse ku ADF.

translation.en: The reports also indicated that Allied Democratic Forces was transporting most of its recruits to Democratic Republic of Congo.
translation.lug: Lipoota zaali ziraga nti abantu abasinga abaali bayingizibwa mu ggye lya ADF baali batwalibwa mu Democratic Republic of Congo.

translation.en: There were intelligence reports that Allied Democratic Forces was recruiting largely from Eastern Uganda.
translation.lug: Ekitongole ekikessi kyali kigamba nti abantu abasinga ADF yali ebaggya mu buvanjuba bwa Uganda.

translation.en: New security information shows that there were suicide bombings at both Kabalagala and Lugogo.
translation.lug: Lipoota z'eby'okwerinda empya ziraga nti waaliwo bbomu ezaali zibwatukidde e Kabalagala n'e Lugogo.

translation.en: According to police, the existence of a sliced head is often a sign of suicide bombing.
translation.lug: Okusinziira ku poliisi, bw'olaba omutwe gw'omuntu nga gukutuse ne gugwa wali emirundi mingi kaba kabonero akalaga nti abatujju babalusizza bbomu.

translation.en: Secondly, police sources say the sliced head at Lugogo was of a Somali while the one in Kabalagala was of a Ugandan.
translation.lug: Eky'okubiri, polisi egamba nti omutwe ogwali gubetentuse e Lugogo gwali gwa Musomaali ate ogwali e Kabalagala gwali gwa Munnayuganda.

translation.en: According to security sources, this is the first “evidence” of the coordination and alliance between Allied Democratic Forces and Al Shabaab.
translation.lug: Okusinziira ku nsonda z'eby'okwerinda, obwo bwe bukakafu obwasooka okulaga nti aba ADF n'aba Al Shabaab baali bakolera wamu.

translation.en: Last week, Kenya arrested a Ugandan suspected to be linked with the terrorism bombings in Kampala.
translation.lug: Wiiki eyaggwa, gavumenti ya Kenya yakwata Munnayuganda agambibwa okwenyigira mu kutega bbomu ezaabwatukira mu Kampala.

translation.en: Ugandan security suspects he is an Allied Democratic Forces person.
translation.lug: Ab'eby'okwerinda mu Uganda bateebereza nti Munnayuganda oyo y'omu ku bayeekera ba ADF.

translation.en: According to security sources since Allied Democratic Forces does not have a prior record in suicide bombing.
translation.lug: Okusinziira ku nsonda ez'eby'okwerinda, tewali kiraga nti emabega aba ADF baali beenyigira mu bikolwa eby'obutujju eby'okutega bbomu mu bantu.

translation.en: The link between the two terrorist organisations is further strengthened by the theory that Allied Democratic Forces knows Kampala very well.
translation.lug: Kyeyongera okukakasibwa nti aba Al Shabaab baali bakolagana n'aba ADF okuva bwe kiteeberezebwa nti aba ADF bamanyi bulungi Kampala.

translation.en: As mentioned earlier, Allied Democratic Forces has internal sources within Uganda’s intelligence services especially Joint Anti-Terrorist Task Force
translation.lug: Nga bwe kiragiddwa waggulu, ADF erina abantu baayo mu bitongole bya Uganda eby'eby'okwerinda nnaddala mu kitongole ekirwanyisa obutujju

translation.en: For Al Shabaab to succeed in its operations, it needed the Allied Democratic Forces infrastructure.
translation.lug: Aba Al Shabaab okusobola okukola obulumbaganyi bwabwe, baba beetaaga okukozesa ebintu bya ADF.

translation.en: As Yoweri Museveni did in Uganda in 1986.
translation.lug: Nga Yoweri Museveni bwe yakola mu Uganda mu 1986.

translation.en: Using financial incentives to stop Somalia from becoming an auxiliary to Al-Qaeda.
translation.lug: Okukozesa ssente okulemesa Somaliya okuwagira  Al-Qaeda.

translation.en: I think we should pull out our troops; not because we are afraid of Al-Shabaab, but because we are not doing Somalis any good.
translation.lug: Ndowooza tulina okuggyayo amagye gaffe; si lwa kuba nti  tutya aba Al-Shabaab, naye lwa kuba tekiyamba Basomaali.

translation.en: The terrorrists were working in conjunction with the Somali-based, al-Shabaab militant group.
translation.lug: Abatujju baali bakolaganira wamu n'aba Al-Shabaab abasinziira mu Somalia.

translation.en: President Yoweri Museveni, all cabinet ministers, intelligence organisations and police recieved the radio message.
translation.lug: Pulezidenti Yoweri Museveni, baminisita bonna abali ku kabineeti, n'ebitongole ebikessi awamu ne poliisi baafuna obubaka.

translation.en: The Uganda Peoples' Defence Forces head offices in both Bombo and Mbuya were reinforced with barricades.
translation.lug: Eby'okwerinda byeyongera okunywezebwa ku bitebe bya UPDF e Bombo n'e Mbuya.

translation.en: at the headquarters of the Joint Anti-Terrorist Task Force in Kololo, summit view.
translation.lug: ku kitebbe ekikulu eky'ekitongole ekirwanyisa obutujju ekisangibwa e Kololo.

translation.en: to help spy on their comrades they were led at the meeting by their former chief of staff, Benz Tushabe Munyangondo.
translation.lug: okusobola okuketta bannaabwe, ku lukuŋŋaana baagenda bakulembeddwamu eyali mukama waabwe akulira abakozi, Benz Tushabe Munyangondo.

translation.en: Saying that the government of Uganda and Joint Anti-Terrorist Task Force had used and dumped them.
translation.lug: Okugamba nti gavumenti ya Uganda n'ekitongole ekirwanyisa obutujju byali bibakozesezza oluvannyuma ne bibakasuka eri.

translation.en: The American invasion of Iraq and Afghanistan and the events taking place in Somalia.
translation.lug: Amerika okulumba Iraq ne Afghanistan n'ebyo ebigenda mu maaso mu Somalia.

translation.en: The meeting was organised by then chief of staff, Maj. Gen. Joshua Masaba and attended by then minister of state for security, Betty Akech.
translation.lug: Olukuŋŋaana olwo lwategekebwa Maj. Gen. Joshua Masaba mu kiseera ekyo eyali akulira abakozi era lwaliko minisita w'eggwanga ku nsonga z'eby'okwerinda, Betty Akech.

translation.en: For them to work as a team by conducting mass mobilisation campaigns to convince other Allied Democratic Forces combatants to renounce rebellion.
translation.lug: Okukolera awamu okukubiriza n'abalala mu ADF okulekayo obuyeekera.

translation.en: Allied Democartic Forces terrorists had accumulated a lot of information on the location of security organisations, especially Joint Anti Terrorist Task Force.
translation.lug: Aba ADF baali bamanyi bingi ku wa ebitongole by'okwerinda we bisangibwa, naddala ekyo ekirwanyisa obutujju.

translation.en: It was stated that the intentions of arrested Allied Democratic Forces operatives were among others elimination of security staff.
translation.lug: Kyagambibwa nti ekimu ku biruubirirwa by'abakessi ba ADF abaakwatibwa kwali kutta ab'eby'okwerinda.

translation.en: Allied Democratic Forces Infiltrated intelligence.
translation.lug: Aba ADF baayingira mu kitongole ekikessi.

translation.en: Yudaya Nansubuga and Mubiru Muhammad, all siblings of Ali Mubiru for their connection with Allied Democratic Forces activities on July 25, 2008.
translation.lug: Yudaya Nansubuga ne  Mubiru Muhammad, bonna nga baganda ba Ali Mubiru [baakwatibwa??] olw'okwenyigira mu bikolwa bya ADF nga Jjulaayi 25, 2008.

translation.en: The government’s main advantage over them was its ability to provide them with monetary incentives.
translation.lug: Gavumenti we yali ebasingira kwe kuba nti yali esobola okubawa ssente.

translation.en: Leaking internal state intelligence within security agencies to Allied Democartic Forces and provide misleading intelligence to security organisations.
translation.lug: Okubuulira aba ADF ebyama by'ebitongole eby'eby'okwerinda n'okuwa ebitongole by'eby'okwerinda obubaka obutali butuufu.

translation.en: This was through Kenya, Tanzania and Rwanda before crossing to Goma
translation.lug: Baayitira mu Kenya, Tanzania ne Rwanda nga tebannasomoka kutuuka Goma

translation.en: Especially in Busoga where there are many Muslim living in poverty.
translation.lug: Nnaddala mu Busoga awali abasiraamu bangi abaavu.

translation.en: This must be a new tactic introduced through its work with Al Shabaab
translation.lug: Kano kakodyo kapya ke baafuna oluvannyuma lw'okukolagana ne Al Shabaab

translation.en: Al Shabaab, not so much.
translation.lug: Al Shabaab, si nnyo.

translation.en: Gen. Aronda informed Museveni 7 days to the attacks.
translation.lug: Gen. Aronda yategeeza Museveni ng'ebula ennaku 7 obulumbaganyi bukolebwe.

translation.en: Security officers comb the scene of the bomb blast at Kyadondo Rugby Club Lugogo and exterminate urban terrorist squads and those in the countryside.
translation.lug: Ab'eby'okwerinda beekebejja awaabwatukira bbomu e Kyadondo Rugby Club e Lugogo era baamalawo obubiina bw'abatujju mu kibuga be mu bitundu ebirala.

translation.en: The Joint Anti-Terrorist Task Force team was led by a  Major
translation.lug: Ab'ekitongole ekirwanyisa obutujju baakulemberwa Meja

translation.en: At the Lugogo scene, security found a Koran next to the severed head of the suicide bomber.
translation.lug: E Lugogo bbomu we yabwatukira ab'eby'okwerinda baasanga Koran okumpi n'omutwe gw'omutujju ogwali gubetenteddwa bbomu.

translation.en: Again, the Independent is withholding the numbers in order not to jeopardise police investigations.
translation.lug: Omuwendo tegwatuukiriziddwa okwewala okutaataaganya okunoonyereza kwa poliisi.

translation.en: From these leads, police suspects that the bombs were assembled in Kampala, largely but not entirely.
translation.lug: Okusinziira ku kunoonyereza, poliisi eteebereza nti okusingira ddala bbomu ezo zaapangibwa mu Kampala.

translation.en: On July twelveth, security organisations deactivated a bomb at Makindye house.
translation.lug: Nga Jjulaayi 12, ab'eby'okwerinda baategulula bbomu ku nnyumba emu e Makindye.

translation.en: It is not yet clear as to why the bomb did not go off on July eleventh.
translation.lug: Tekinnamanyibwa bulungi lwaki bbomu eyo teyabwatuka nga Jjulaayi 11.

translation.en: However, security retrieved a Nokia one thousand two hundred eight series from the suicide jacket on which the explosive device was attached.
translation.lug: Naye ab'eby'okwerinda baggya essimu y'ekikya kya Nokia lukumi bibiri mu munaana mu jaketi y'omutujju eyaliko akuuma akatulisa bbomu.

translation.en: The simcard inside the phone was first inserted into the handset on July eighth.
translation.lug: Kaadi y'esimu eyalimu yasooka okuteekebwa mu ssimu eyo nga Jjulaayi 8.

translation.en: Police sources told the Independent that the handset retrieved from the suicide jacket had previously used Somali telephone numbers.
translation.lug: Ensonda mu poliisi zaategeeza Independent nti essimu eyaggibwa mu jaketi y'omutujju emabega yalimu layini za Somalia.

translation.en: This therefore was not the first time Somalia was featuring in intelligence with connections to the Allied Democratic Forces.
translation.lug: Guno si gwe mulundi ogwali gusoose Somalia okulabikira mu kunoonyereza kw'eby'ab'okwerinda ng'ekwataganyizibwa ne ADF.

translation.en: The ex-rebels in their two thousand eight document had clearly informed authorities of this possibe link.
translation.lug: Mu kiwandiiko kye baawandiika mu 2008, abayeekera abaali baabulidde ADF baategeeza ab'obuyinza ku kakwate ako.

translation.en: The Somali numbers on the phone showed maximum integration between Al-Shabaab and Allied Democratic Forces.
translation.lug: Nnamba za Somalia ezaali ku ssimu eyo zaalagala nti waaliwo okukwatagana kwa maanyi wakati wa Al-Shabaab ne ADF.

translation.en: However, the mobile handset used a Kenyan number between June twenty fourth and twenty eighth.
translation.lug: Naye wakati wa Jjuuni 24 ne Jjuuni 28 essimu eyo yalimu layini ya Kenya.

translation.en: This further creates the link to some terrorists working in Kenya with a general indication of their regional reach.
translation.lug: Ekyo kiraga nti abatujju abamu bakolera mu Kenya era kiraga nti bakolera mu bitundu ebiwerako.

translation.en: The bombings took place amidst increasing Allied Democratic Forces attacks in the Democratic Republic of Congo.
translation.lug: Mu kiseera bbomu ezo we zaabwatukira, aba ADF baali beeyongedde okukola obulumbaganyi mu bitundu bya Democratic Republic of Congo.

translation.en: The terrorists are now international working through Somalia, Kenya, Democratic Republic of Congo and Uganda.
translation.lug: Abatujju kati bakolera mu mawanga agawerako, omuli Somalia, Kenya, Democratic Republic of Congo, ne Uganda.

translation.en: Safaricom and Mobile Telephone Network numbers were involved in the bombing according to the Independent.
translation.lug: Okusinziira ku Independent, empuliziganya eyaliwo nga bbomu tezinnabwatuka zaalimu layini za Safaricom n'eza MTN.

translation.en: The Independent decided not to publish them on the advice of security officials as it would jeopardise Police investigations.
translation.lug: Aba Independent baasalawo obutafulumya nnamba za ssimu ezo olw'okuba ab'eby'okwerinda baakiraga nti kyanditaataaganyizza okunoonyereza kwa poliisi.

translation.en: General Aronda Nyakairima, Brigadier James Mugira and Major General Kale Kayihura spearheaded the investigations.
translation.lug: Genero Aronda Nyakairima, Brigediya James Mugira ne Meja Genero Kale Kayihura be baawoma omutwe mu kunoonyereza.

translation.en: On July seventh, Uganda sent a team to Nairobi to work with Kenyan security on how to handle the arrested terror suspects.
translation.lug: Nga Jjulaayi 7, Uganda yasindika ababaka e Nairobi okukolera awamu n'ekitongole kya Kenya eky'eby'okwerinda basalewo eky'okukola abo abaali bakwatiddwa nga bateeberezebwa okuba abatujju.

translation.en: On June thirtieth, the Joint Anti-terrorism Task force under Criminal Millitary Intelligence killed Twaha Mohammed Kakande.
translation.lug: Nga Jjuuni 30, ekitongole ekirwanyisa obutujju nga kikolera wansi wa CMI kyatta Twaha Mohammed Kakande.

translation.en: The Joint Anti-terrorism Task force arrested the Allied Democratic Forces collaborators in Mayuge district on July eighth.
translation.lug: Nga Jjulaayi 8, ekitongole ekirwanyisa obutujju kyakwata abo abaali bakolagana ne ADF mu disitulikiti y'e Mayuge.

translation.en: Inspite of the security operations, security forces were unable to stop the terror attacks in Uganda on July eleventh.
translation.lug: Wadde ng'ab'eby'okwerinda baakola ebikwekweto bingi, tebaasobola kutangira batujju kubwatula bbomu mu Uganda nga Jjulaayi 11.

translation.en: According to the chief of Criminal Millitary Intelligence Brigadier James Mugira, it is not easy to fight a symmetric warfare.
translation.lug: Okusinziira ku akulira ekitongole kya CMI Brigediya James Mugira, tekiba kyangu kulwana lutalo na mulabe alina amaanyi kumpi ge gamu n'agago era ng'akozesa obukodyo bwe bumu n'obubwo.

translation.en: Ugandan security is limited in resources.
translation.lug: Ab'eby'okwerinda mu Uganda tebalina bikozesebwa bimala.

translation.en: Mugira told the independent that fighting terrorisms requires the maximum cooperation of citizens.
translation.lug: Mugira yagamba olupapula lwa Independent nti okusobola okulwanyisa obutujju gavumenti yeetaaga obuyambi bw'abantu ba bulijjo.

translation.en: Mugira dismissed corruption claims by asserting that the Joint Anti-terrorism Task force is well funded.
translation.lug: Mugira yakisambajja nti waliwo obulyi bw'enguzi bwe yagamba nti ekitongole ekirwanyisa obutujju kiweebwa ssente ezikimala.

translation.en: Mugira explained that people use the excuse of fighting to make money.
translation.lug: Mugira yannyonnyola nti abantu beekwasa ensonga ey'okulwana okusobola okukola ssente.

translation.en: The security forces made an assessment on the eleventh of July to ascertain what gave the terrorists an advantage.
translation.lug: Ab'eby'okwerinda beeyongera okwekenneenya ebyaliwo nga Jjulaayi 11, okulaba ensonga lwaki abatujju baasobola okukola obulumbaganyi obwo.

translation.en: The Joint Intelligence Committee failed to share intelligence information.
translation.lug: Ekitongole kya Joint Intelligence Committee kyalemwa okubunyisa obubaka obwetaagisa mu by'okwerinda.

translation.en: The External Security Organisation was informed by the United States of America and South Africa but did not inform the Internal Security Organistion.
translation.lug: Amerika ne South Africa baategeeza ekitongole kya ESO ku bulumbaganyi obwali bujja, naye ESO n'etetegeeza ISO.

translation.en: The Joint Anti-terrorism Task force had information about the location and telephone numbers of terrorists.
translation.lug: Ekitongole ekirwanyisa obutujju kyali kimanyi wa abatujju we baali ne nnamba zaabwe ez'essimu.

translation.en: The Rapid Response Unit of the Police  ascertained information on the plans of terrorists to bomb Kampala but lacked intelligence on their location.
translation.lug: Ekitongole kya poliisi ekya Rapid Response Unit kyakakasa nti abatujju baalina enteekateeka okukuba bbomu mu Kampala naye nga tekimanyi wa we bali.

translation.en: The Joint Anti-terrorism Taskforce and the Rapid Response Unit did not share information to deter the terrorists plans.
translation.lug: Tewaaliwo mpuliziganya wakati w'ekitongole ekiranyisa obutujju n'ekya Rapid Response Unit okusobola okulemesa enteekateeka z'abatujju ezo.

translation.en: Allied Democratic Forces cells in Kampala were cracked down as Uganda was preparing for the Commonwealth Heads of Government Meeting.
translation.lug: Obubinja bwa ADF mu Kampala baabufeffetta kubanga Uganda yali yeetegekera olukungaana lw'amawanga agali mu mukago gwa Bulaaya.

translation.en: The Joint Anti-terrorism Task force spear headed security organisations in infiltrating terrorists cells with a purpose of arresting and detaining.
translation.lug: Ekitongole ekirwanyisa obutujju kye kyakulemberamu ebitongole by'eby'okwerinda mu kuketta obubinja bw'abatujju okubakwata n'okubaako we babakuumira.

translation.en: The backbone of the terrorists was broken in two thousand seven.
translation.lug: Abatujju baabamala amaanyi mu 2007.

translation.en: The operations under Leopold Kyanda, the chief of Criminal Millitary Intelligence involved abuses and corruption.
translation.lug: Ebikwekweto ebyaduumirwa Leopold Kyanda, eyali akulira ekitongole kya CMI byazingiramu okutulugunya n'obulyake.

translation.en: Kyanda borrowed money at high interests rates to fund operations according to security sources.
translation.lug: Okusinziira ku nsonda z'eby'okwerinda, Kyanda yeewola ssente eziriko amagoba amangi asobole okufuna ssente ez'okukozesa mu bikwekweto.

translation.en: Kyanda left the Joint Anti-terrorism Task force broke and heavily indebted.
translation.lug: Kyanda yaleka ekitongole ekirwanyisa obutujju nga kyavu era nga kirina amabanja mangi.

translation.en: James Mugira replaced Kyanda and aimed first at improving the image of the Joint Anti-terrorism Task force.
translation.lug: James Mugira ye yadda mu bigere bya Kyanda era ekiruubirirwa kye yasooka okuba nakyo kyali kya kutereeza linnya lya kitongole ekirwanyisa obutujju.

translation.en: Mugira told his officials that the Joint Anti-terrorism Task force should respect the law.
translation.lug: Mugira yagamba bakungu banne nti ekitongole ekirwanyisa obutujju kirina okugondera amateeka.

translation.en: Security sources felt that although there was an improvement in security compared to the days of Kyanda, it was costly..
translation.lug: Ensonda z'eby'okwerinda zaagamba nti wadde ng'eby'okwerinda byatereeramu bw'obigeraageranya n'omulembe gwa Kyanda, ebintu tebyali byangu.

translation.en: Mugira explained that the Joint Anti-terrorism Task force exaggerated the threat of the Allied Democratic Forces to make money.
translation.lug: Mugira yagamba nti ekitongole ekirwanyisa obutujju kyali kisavuwaza obulabe ADF bwe yali esobola okutuusa ku ggwanga olw'okwagala okukola ssente.

translation.en: There were reports in March two thousand ten that the Allied Democratic Forces were going to train with Al-shabaab in Somalia.
translation.lug: Mu Maaki wa 2010, waaliwo ebyali biyitingana nti aba ADF baali bagenda kutendekera wamu n'aba Al-shabaab e Somalia.

translation.en: Security sources told the Independent that operatives lacked money to transport food.
translation.lug: Ensonda z'eby'okwerinda zaategeeza Independent nti abatujju tebaalina ssente kutambuza mmere.

translation.en: By eleventh July, the Allied Democratic Forces had already built cells outside the intelligence.
translation.lug: Jjulaayi 11 we lwatuukira, aba ADF baali baamala dda okutandikawo obubinja wabweru w'ekitongole ekikessi.

translation.en: Allied Democratic Forces receive money through forex bureaus and bus companies for their operations.
translation.lug: Aba ADF baafuna ssente okuyitira mu bibanda bya ssente ne kampuni za bbaasi okusobola okuddukanya emirimu gyabwe.

translation.en: The Allied Democratic Forces replaced its traditional operatives that are prone to Intelligence organisations.
translation.lug: Era ADF yakyusaamu enkola zaayo ezaali zisobola okulondoolwa ebitongole ebikessi.

translation.en: Salaaf Mosques were used as centres of recruitment and indoctrination.
translation.lug: Aba ADF baakozesa emizikiti egimu ng'ebifo mwe baayingiriza abantu mu ggye lyabwe n'okubateekamu endowooza yaabwe.

translation.en: Security assessments showed that the Allied Democratic Forces operatives resorted to using foreign telephone numbers to evade security.
translation.lug: Ab'eby'okwerinda baalaga nti aba ADF baasalawo okukozesa nnamba z'ebweru okwewala ab'eby'okwerinda okubagwamu.

translation.en: The Ethiopian Village Restaurant was left in ruins after a bomb blast killed fifteen people in Kabalagala.
translation.lug: Wooteri ya Ethiopian Village Restaurant e Kabalagala yonna yasensebuka oluvannyuma lwa bbomu okubwatukiramu n'etta abantu 15.

translation.en: The New vision carried out a headline "you could die during the World Cup".
translation.lug: Olupapula lwa New Vision lwafulumirako omutwe ogugamba nti "Osobola Okufa ng'Olaba Omupiira gw'Ekikopo ky'Ensi Yonna".

translation.en: The call from New vision was clear considering the high rates of Human Immune Virus and Acquired Immune Deficiency Syndrome, crime and road accidents in South Africa.
translation.lug: Okulabula okuva mu New Vision kwali kutegeerekeka bulungi, naddala bw'olowooza ku muwendo omunene ogw'abantu abalwala mukenenya, ebikolwa eby'obumenyi bw'amateeka, n'obubenje ebiri mu South Africa.

translation.en: It was unfortunate that the message also applied to the people who converged in Kampala to watch the finals.
translation.lug: Kya nnaku nti obubaka obwo bwali bukwata ne ku bantu abaali bakungaanye okulaba fayinolo z'omupiira ku olwo.

translation.en: More than seventy six people were reportedly dead and hundreds were seriously injured.
translation.lug: Kigambibwa nti abantu abasukka mu 76 baafa era bangi ne bagendera ku bisago eby'amaanyi.

translation.en: It emerged that the terrorist attack was coordinated by Al-shabaab millitants in Somalia.
translation.lug: Kyazuulwa nti obulumbaganyi bwa bannalukalala obwo bwategekebwa aba Al-shabaab mu Somalia.

translation.en: The bombs targeted Ethiopians and expatriates excluding football fans.
translation.lug: Bbomu ezo abatujju baazitega kutta nzaalwa za Esiyopiya n'abakungu abamu so si bawagizi ba mupiira.

translation.en: Al-shabaab took responsibility for the bombings in Kampala.
translation.lug: Aba Al-shabaab baagamba nti be baali bavunaanyizibwa ku bbomu ezaabwatukira mu Kampala.

translation.en: Commander Sheik Yusuf Issa told the Associated Press that Uganda was one of the Al-shabaab enemies afew hours after the attack.
translation.lug: Nga wayise essaawa ntono oluvannyuma lwa bbomu ezo okubwatuka, Omuduumizi Sheik Yusuf Issa yagamba Associated Press nti Uganda y'emu ku balabe ba Al-shabaab.

translation.en: Whatever makes Uganda cry, makes Al-shabaab happy.
translation.lug: Ekikaabya Uganda, kisanyusa Al-shabaab.

translation.en: If there was a link between these terror attacks, then it showed that Al-shabaab had extended their operations far beyond Somalia.
translation.lug: Bwe kiba nti waaliwo akakwate wakati w'obulumbaganyi obwo, kiba kiraga nti aba Al-shabaab baali bagaziyizza obulumbaganyi bwabwe okusukka ensalo za Somalia.

translation.en: It will confirm that their leaders established threats to extend operations to Kampala and other countries with peace keeping missions to Somalia.
translation.lug: Kyali kiraga nti abakulembeze ba Al-shabaab baali bamalirivu okukola obulumbaganyi ku Kampala ne ku mawanga amalala agaali gasindise amagye mu Somalia okuzzaawo emirembe.

translation.en: The Uganda People's Defence Forces tightened peace keeping operations in Somalia.
translation.lug: Eggye lya UPDF lyayongera amaanyi mu bikwekweto eby'okukuuma emirembe mu Somalia.

translation.en: Countries which had promised to send troops are likely to be discouraged by the attacks and therefore unlikely to be part of the African Union Mission to Somalia.
translation.lug: Ekyo kyali kisobola okumalamu amaanyi ensi ezaali zisuubizza okusindika amagye ne ziteegatta ku mukago gwa African Union Mission to Somalia.

translation.en: Somali terrorists are linked to high profile attacks in East Africa that is, the Nineteen Ninety Eight bombings of the United States of America Embassy in Dar-es-salaam and Nairobi where over Two Hundred people died.
translation.lug: Abatujju Abasomaali bagambibwa okuba nga be baali emabega w'obulumbaganyi obw'amaanyi obwakolebwa mu mawanga agali mu Buvanjuba bwa Afirika , omwali okukuba bbomu ekitebe kya Amerika mu Dar-es-salaam ne mu  Nairobi mu 1998 abantu abasukka mu 200 ne bafa.

translation.en: These attacks were also linked to Al-qaeda, the top most terror organisation in the world.
translation.lug: Kigambibwa nti n'aba Al-qaeda, nga kino kye kibiina ky'abatujju ekisinga okuba eky'obulabe mu nsi, baalina omukono mu bulumbaganyi obwo.

translation.en: Al-shabaab attacks have had an impact on the security architecture in East Africa and Africa at large.
translation.lug: Obulumbaganyi bwa Al-shabaab bwaleetawo enkyukakyuka mu by'okwerinda mu Buvanjuba bwa Afirika ne mu Afirika okutwalira awamu.

translation.en: Ethiopian troops drove them out of Somalia in support of the United Nations backed interim government.
translation.lug: Eggye lya Esiyopiya ly'abagoba mu Somalia nga liwagira gavumenti ey'ekiseera eyali ewagirwa ekibiina ky'Amawanga Amagatte.

translation.en: The group refused to engage in the peace process which brought elements of the Islamic Courts.
translation.lug: Aba Al-Shabaab baagaana okwenyigira mu nteseganya ez'okuleetawo emirembe ezaaleeta ababaka okuva mu Islamic Courts.

translation.en: Sharif Ahmed, a former leader of the Islamic Courts was sworn in as the President of Somalia.
translation.lug: Sharif Ahmed, eyaliko omukulembeze wa Islamic Courts yalayizibwa okuba Pulezidenti wa Somalia.

translation.en: Islamic Courts vowed to topple him for betraying the country.
translation.lug: Aba Islamic Courts beerayirira okumaamulako gavumenti ye olw'okuba yali aliddemu ensi olukwe.

translation.en: Al-shabaab is headed by Mohammed Abdi Godane.
translation.lug: Al-shabaab ekulemberwa Mohammed Abdi Godane.

translation.en: Al-shabaab has always waged war against Somalia's fragile Transitional Governments forces since two thousand six.
translation.lug: Okuva mu 2006, aba Al-shabaab babaddenga balwanyisa amagye ga gavumenti ez'ekiseera ennafu.

translation.en: Some Al-shabaab fighters were trained by the Taliban in Afghanistan.
translation.lug: Abamu ku balwanyi ba Al-shabaab baatendekebwa Batalibaani mu Afghanistan.

translation.en: The United States of America's Federal Bureau of Investigations had concerns over the terror group expanding its network.
translation.lug: Ekitongole kya Amerika ekikessi kyafuna obweraliikirivu olw'ekibiina ky'abatujju ekyo okusaasaana.

translation.en: No one knows how Al-shabaab solicits funds however, Eritrea and some Arab nations have been accused of funding Al-shabaab though Asmara has continously denied the allegations.
translation.lug: Kyokka tewali amanyi ngeri aba Al-shabaab gye bafunamu ssente, Eritrea n'amawanga g'Abawalabu agamu gateeberezebwa okuba nga ge gawa aba  Al-shabaab ssente wadde ng'ekyo Eritrea emaze ebbanga ng'ekyegaana.

translation.en: This was around Namasuba towards the end of June.
translation.lug: Ekyo kyali awo ng'e Namasuba ku nkomerero ya Jjuuni.

translation.en: This follows after similar incidents happened at Kyadondo Rugby Club in Lugogo and Ethiopian Restaurant in Kabalagala.
translation.lug: Kino kyaliwo oluvannyuma lw'embeera efaananako ng'eyo okubaawo e Kyadondo Rugby Club e Lugogo ne ku Ethiopian Restaurant e Kabalagala.

translation.en: This was after midnight at Mukwano Shopping Centre in down town Kampala according to the Police.
translation.lug: Okusinziira ku poliisi, ekyo kyaliwo oluvannyuma lw'essaawa mukaaga ez'ekiro ku kizimbe kya Mukwano mu Kampala.

translation.en: This happened two weeks earlier which brought clarity to the security that it was to create diversion for the plans in Kampala.
translation.lug: Kino kyaliwo wiiki bbiri emabega ekyalaga ab'eby'okwerinda nti kyali kigendereddwa kubawugula baleme kugwa mu nkwe ezaali zirukiddwa mu Kampala.

translation.en: Kakande was the overall Commander of Allied Democratic Forces rebels at Mwalika camp in Democratic Republic of Congo.
translation.lug: Kakande ye yali omuduumizi ow'oku ntikko ow'abayeekera ba ADFmu nkambi y'e Mwalika mu Democratic Republic of Congo.

translation.en: Allied Democratic Forces operatives have access to forged identifications, travel documents and Local Council recoomendation letters.
translation.lug: Aba ADF baali basobola okufuna ebiwandiiko ebijingirire, ebiwandiiko ebibakkiriza okutambula, n'amabaluwa okuva mu bassentebbe b'ebyalo.

translation.en: The independent's Edward Tujunirwe commented on the events between twenty third July  and twenty nineth, two thousand ten.
translation.lug: Mu lupapula lwa Independent, Edward Tujunirwe yayogera ku byaliwo wakati wa Jjulaayi 23 ne Jjulaayi 29, 2010.

translation.en: South Africa hosted the World Cup.
translation.lug: South Africa yategeka empaka z'Ekikopo ky'Ensi Yonna.

translation.en: Three bombs went off at Kyadondo Rugby Club and the Ethiopian Village Restaurant in Kabalagala, Kampala.
translation.lug: Bbomu ssatu zaabwatukira e Kyadondo Rugby Club ne ku Ethiopian Village Restaurant mu Kabalagala, e Kampala.

translation.en: Uganda is the leading African Union Peace keeping Mission in war-torn Somalia.
translation.lug: Uganda y'ewomye omutwe mu kaweefube ow'okukuuma emirembe mu Somalia.

translation.en: There were also  the Two thousand Two attacks in Mombasa, Kenya in which fifteen people were killed.
translation.lug: Era waaliwo obulumbaganyi obwakolebwa e Mumbasa mu Kenya mu 2002, era abantu 15 battibwa.

translation.en: Al-shabaab was a millitary wing of Union of Islamic Courts which was driven out by the Ethiopian Armed Forces from central and southern Somalia.
translation.lug: Aba Al-shabaab baali mu magye ga Islamic Courts naye amagye ga Esiyopiya ne gabagoba mu bitundu by'omu massekkati ne mu bukiikaddyo bwa Somalia.

translation.en: The group has recruited western nationals to fight in Somalia with an influx of foreign fighters fuelling the war,
translation.lug: Aba Al-Shabaab bayingizza mu ggye lyabwe abantu okuva mu bitundu by'ebugwanjuba okulwana mu Somalia era n'abalwanyi okuva mu mawanga amalala bongedde okukuma omuliro mu lutalo olwo,

translation.en: Allied Democratic Forces intentions include , operatives on the run.
translation.lug: Mu biruubirirwa bya ADF mwe muli n'okuyigga abantu baabwe abaabaddukako.

translation.en: The situation has been generally calm without terrorist incidents reported in and around Kampala.
translation.lug: Okutwalira awamu kati embeera ekkakkanye, kubanga tewali bikolwa bya butujju bibaddewo mu Kampala n'emiriraano.

translation.en: Allied Democratic Forces remains active and nurses intentions of rebuilding its urban terror operations.
translation.lug: Aba ADF bakyaliwo era baagala okuddamu okusimba emirandira gyabwe mu bibuga.

translation.en: Allied Democratic Forces has five intentions.
translation.lug: Aba ADF balina ebiruubirirwa bitaano.

translation.en: Analysis of information was obtained from the recent arrested Allied Democratic Forces operatives.
translation.lug: Waliwo ebintu ebikulu ebyategeerwa oluvannyuma lw'okubuuza ebibuuzo aba ADF abaali bakwatiddwa gye bivuddeko awo.

translation.en: Allied Democratic Forces operatives are on the run.
translation.lug: Aba ADF kati badduka.

translation.en: They include;the Kironde Moses squad whose operational zone is Kampala city in areas of Kitintale and Luzira.
translation.lug: Muno mwe muli ekibinja ekiduumirwa Kironde Moses ekikolera emirimu gyakyo mu bitundu bya Kampala, e Kitintale n'e Luzira.

translation.en: The Lukwebe Abdul-Salam squad operates in Kampala and the surrounding areas.
translation.lug: Ekibinja ekiduumirwa Lukwebe Abdul-Salam, ekikolera mu Kampala n'ebitundu ebiriraanyeewo.

translation.en: Abdul Hakim alias Sam Kalyango squad which operates in Busia, Kampala and Kyotera but suspected to have shifted to Kenya.
translation.lug: Ekibinja ekiduumirwa  Abdul Hakim alias Sam Kalyango ekikolera mu Busia, Kampala, ne Kyotera naye kisuubirwa okuba nti kyasengukira Kenya.

translation.en: They are 7 operations carried out by Joint Anti-terrorist Task Force.
translation.lug: Waaliwo ebikwekweto 7 ebyakolebwa ekitongole ekirwanyisa obutujju.

translation.en: In the fight against terror, Joint Anti-terrorist Task Force has carried out several operations.
translation.lug: Okusobola okulwanyisa obutujju, ekitongole ekirwanyisa obutujju kyakola ebikwekweto musanvu.

translation.en: Ouma Joseph and Wasike were arrested in Busia by the tracking team for connection with a suspicious telephone number.
translation.lug: Ouma Joseph ne Wasike baakwatibwa e Busia olw'okukolagana n'omuntu alina layini y'essimu eteeberezebwa okuba ey'omutujju.

translation.en: On 10 August, 2008, Bukomeko Muhammed and Magelo Shaffik were arrested by the tracking team.
translation.lug: Nga Agusito 10, 2008, Bukomeko Muhammed ne  Magelo Shaffik baalinnyibwa kakere ne bakwatibwa.

translation.en: The leader of Allied Democratic Forces, Jamil Mukulu has continuously supported, directed and coordinated Allied Democratic Forces operations.
translation.lug: Omukulembeze wa ADF, Jamil Mukulu yeeyongedde okuwagira, okuduumira, n'okukwanagana emirimu gya ADF.

translation.en: Due to increased security vigilance against Allied Democratic Forces, new cells have emerged instead of the known traditional areas.
translation.lug: Olw'okuba ab'eby'okwerinda beerinze nnyo aba ADF, aba ADF batandiseewo obubinja obupya mu kifo ky'okugenda mu maaso n'obwo obumanyiddwa.

translation.en: The Allied Democratic Forces has also continued sending and receiving money through  Forex Bureaus and bus companies for operations.
translation.lug: Era aba ADF bakyasindika era bafuna ssente okuyitira mu bibanja bya ssente n'ebitongole bya bbaasi.

translation.en: The Allied Democratic Forces operatives have continuously acquired forged identification and travel documents.
translation.lug: Aba ADF bakyeyongera okufuna ndagamuntu n'ebiwandiiko ebibakkiriza okutambula ebijingirire.

translation.en: Allied Democratic Forces Identity Documents and Local Council recommendation letters looked authentic.
translation.lug: Ndagamuntu z'aba ADF awamu n'amabaluwa gaabwe aga bassentebe b'ebyalo byalabika ng'ebiyise mu mitendera emituufu.

translation.en: Allied Democratic Forces has embarked on using new fighters by replacing the known old runaways whose network had been penetrated by security agents.
translation.lug: ADF kati yasalawo okuyungula abalwanyi abapya mu kifo ky'okukozesa abakadde abamanyiddwa ab'eby'okwerinda.

translation.en: Allied Democratic Forces often make recruits cross to Democratic Republic of Congo especially on market days.
translation.lug: Aba ADF batera okukozesa ennaku z'obutale okufuna abantu abapya ab'okuyingiza mu ggye lyabwe.

translation.en: The mushrooming Salaaf Mosques are used as recruitment and indoctrination centres for Allied Democratic Forces.
translation.lug: Emizikiti gy'Abasalaafi gikozesebwa nnyo mu kufuna abantu ab'okuyingira ADF n'okubayingizaamu endowooza yaabwe.

translation.en: The Allied Democratic Forces operatives have  resorted to using foreign telephone service providers like SafariCom and Celtel Kenya.
translation.lug: Aba ADF kati baasalawo okukozesa layini z'ebitongole by'amasimu eby'ebweru w'eggwanga, gamba nga SafariCom ne Celtel Kenya.

translation.en: This is confirmed by the call phones recovered from the arrested Allied Democratic Forces operatives.
translation.lug: Kino kyakakasibwa oluvannyuma lw'okwekebejja amasimu ag'aggibwa ku ba ADF abaakwatibwa.

translation.en: The Allied Democratic Forces have also been discovered to have taken to undercover activities like truck drivers, hawkers and boda-boda riders.
translation.lug: Aba ADF era baatandika n'okwekwekera mu mirimu gamba ng'egy'abavuzi ba biroole, abatembeeyi, n'obwa bodabooda.

translation.en: Allied Democratic Forces has changed its mode of operations to using women, new fighters,disguised deployment and using foreign telephone lines.
translation.lug: Aba ADF bakyusizza obukodyo bwabwe ne batandika okukozesa abakazi, okuyungula abalwanyisa abapya, okwekweka mu mirimu egitali gimu, n'okukozesa layini z'amasimu ez'ebweru.

translation.en: In its spirited fight against terrorism, Joint Anti-terrorist Task Force has encountered a number of problems.
translation.lug: Mu kufuba okulwanyisa obutujju, ekitongole ekirwanyisa obutujju kisanze obuzibu obutali bumu.

translation.en: These are Democratic Republic of Congo and Kenya from where they plan and coordinate their operations.
translation.lug: Muno mwe muli ensi ya Democratic Republic of Congo n'eya Kenya abatujju gye balukira enkwe zaabwe era gye baddukanyiza emirimu gyabwe.

translation.en: This means Joint Anti-terrorist Task Force's operations in pursuing them are quite very difficult.
translation.lug: Kino kiba kitegeeza nti ebikwekweto eby'okuwondera abatujju abo ebikolebwa ekitongole ekyo bisanga emiziziko mingi.

translation.en: Allied Democratic Forces have sentimental feelings.
translation.lug: Aba ADF beegonza.

translation.en: The amnesty law until recently was being exploited, however a number of Allied Democratic Force operatives upon getting amnesty have bounced back to terror activities.
translation.lug: Etteeka erikwata ku kuwa abantu ekisonyiwo limaze ebbanga nga likozesebwa bubi, era aba ADF abawerako abaaweebwa ekisonyiwo baamala ate ne baddayo mu butujju.

translation.en: The Allied Democratic Forces has continued to use Salaaf Mosques and Luzira Prison as their indoctrination,recruitment and coordination centres,
translation.lug: Aba ADF beeyongedde okukozesa emizikiti gy'Abasalaafi n'ekkomera ly'e Prison ng'ebifo we bafunira ab'okuyingiza mu ggye lyabwe n'okubayingizaamu endowooza yaabwe.

translation.en: The lapse of immigration procedures makes recruitment into Allied Democratic Forces ranks very easy.
translation.lug: Okukkakkanya emisoso egiyitibwamu okukkiriza abantu okuyingira eggwanga kikifudde kyangu aba ADF okufuna abantu okuyingira mu ggye lyabwe.

translation.en: This is an intelligence brief from Joint Anti-terrorism Taskforce to Joint Intelligence Committee regarding Allied Democratic Force ongoing and imminent activities.
translation.lug: Bino by'ebyo akakiiko akalwanyisa obutujju bye kaategeeka ekitongole ekikessi ku ADF n'ebyo bye baali banaatera okukola.

translation.en: Timothy Kalyegira looks at Africa’s future and how in the coming years super and emerging world powers will partition the continent to themselves.
translation.lug: Timothy Kalyegira yeetegereza ebiseera bya Afirika eby'omu maaso n'engeri ensi kirimaanyi eziriwo n'ezo ezijja gye zijja okwegabanyizaamu ssemazinga ono.

translation.en: These new discoveries of oil have increased Africa's strategic importance on the world stage, but there is even more to this than these mineral deposits.
translation.lug: Amafuta agaazuuliddwa mu Afirika galeetedde ensi endala okugissaako ennyo amaaso, naye waliwo n'ebirala ng'oggyeeko ebyo.

translation.en: The last fifteen years have seen countries like China, Brazil, Russia, and India registering strong economic growth.
translation.lug: Mu myaka 15 egiyise ensi gamba nga China, Brazil, Russia, ne Buyindi zikulaakulanye nnyo mu by'enfuna.

translation.en: From Australia to the United States’ desert areas, to Asia and Africa, drought has become a common feature of life.
translation.lug: Mu Australia, ebitundu bya Amerika eby'eddungu, mu Asiya, ne mu Afirika, ebyeya byeyongedde nnyo.

translation.en: Since 2000, the world witnessed many more destructive monsoon rains, tropical cyclones, hurricanes and unusually heavy rains.
translation.lug: Okuva mu 2000, ensi ebaddemu emiyaga egy'amaanyi mingi n'enkuba ey'amaanyi nnyingi.

translation.en: The world oil prices have continued to rise since the late 1990s and more and more voices have started calling for alternative sources of fuel.
translation.lug: Okuva awo ng'emyaka gya 1990 ginaatera okuggwaako, ebbeeyi y'amafuta yeeyongedde okulinnya era bangi basaba wabeewo ebintu ebirala ebikozesebwa mu kifo ky'amafuta.

translation.en: The whole tracts of land in South America and the United States were converted to the production of ethanol.
translation.lug: Mu nsi z'omu Bukiikaddyo bwa Amerika ne mu USA baatandika okukola ethanol.

translation.en: Maize ranks second behind wheat and just ahead of rice as the world’s most important food crop.
translation.lug: Kati kasooli akwata kya kubiri era y'addirira engaano mu kuba ow'ettunzi era asinga omuceere okuba ow'ettunzi mu birime ebisinga okwettanirwa mu nsi yonna.

translation.en: It is the most important food crop grown in the United States, the world’s largest economy.
translation.lug: Ye mmere esinga obukulu erimibwa mu Amerika, ng'ate eyo ye wansinga okukolerwa eby'obusuubuzi mu nsi yonna.

translation.en: In 2008, before the world financial crisis struck in September, much of the news was dominated by regular reports and warnings on inflation.
translation.lug: Mu 2008, ensi bwe yali tennagwa mu katuubagiro k'eby'enfuna mu Ssebutemba, ku mawulire mangi baali balabula ku kweyongera kw'ebbeeyi y'ebintu.

translation.en: The rising price of food between 2007 and 2008 proved food security is critical in the coming years.
translation.lug: Okweyongera kw'ebbeeyi y'emmere wakati w'omwaka gwa 2007 ne 2008 kwalaga nti kyali kyetaagisa okwongera ku bungi bw'emmere mu myaka egiddirira.

translation.en: The German news magazine Spiegel reported on July 30, 2009 that the urgency of acquiring farmland has focused eyes on Africa.
translation.lug: Magazini emu efulumira mu Bugirimaani eyafuluma nga Jjulaayi 30, 2009 yagamba nti obwetaavu bw'okufuna ettaka okulimirwa kireetedde amawanga okutunuulira ennyo Afirika.

translation.en: Though most of the northern, Horn and southwestern part of Africa is desert or semi-desert, the tropical interior has an abundance of fresh water.
translation.lug: Wadde ng'ekitundu ekisinga mu bukiikakkono bwa Afirika ne mu bugwanjuba bw'e bukiikaddyo bya ddungu oba bikalu, ebitundu bingi munda mu Afirika birimu amazzi amalungi mangi.

translation.en: The Great Lakes region of East-Central Africa has Lake Victoria, the world’s second largest fresh water lake, River Nile and  River Congo.
translation.lug: Ebitundu bya Great Lakes birimu Ennyanja Nnalubaale, ng'eno y'ennyanja esingayo obunene mu nsi erina amazzi amayonjo, era birimu Omugga Kiyira n'Omugga Congo.

translation.en: The region has lakes like George, Edward, Wamala, Mburo, Bunyonyi, Albert, Kyoga and others in Uganda..
translation.lug: Ekitundu ekyo kirimu ennyanja gamba nga George, Edward, Wamala, Mburo, Bunyonyi, Albert, Kyoga n'endala eziri mu Uganda..

translation.en: Tanzania shares Rugwero and Kyohaha-Sud with Rwanda and Tanganyika with Burundi.
translation.lug: Tanzania egabana ne Rwanda Ennyanja Rugwero ne Kyohaha-Sud era egabana ne Burundi Ennyanja Tanganyika.

translation.en: There is Mai-Ndombe and Tanganyika in the Democratic Republic of Congo, Tanganyika, Eyasi, Manyara, Rukwa and Natron in Tanzania
translation.lug: Mu Democratic Republic of Congo mulimu ennyanja Mai-Ndombe ne Tanganyika, ate mu Tanzania mulimu ennyanja Tanganyika, Eyasi, Manyara, Rukwa, ne Natron.

translation.en: Comparing this large number of lakes in the Great Lakes region, Nigeria in West Africa has only one lake, Kainji.
translation.lug: Bw'ogeraageranya omuwendo ogwo omunene ogw'ennyanja ezisangibwa mu kitundu kya Great Lakes, Nigeria eri mu Bugwanjuba bwa Afirika erimu ennyanja emu yokka, Kainji.

translation.en: There is abundance of fresh water lakes and rivers that crisscross East-Central Africa, with rich volcanic soil in eastern Congo, Rwanda, and western Uganda.
translation.lug: Mu buvanjuba ne mu massekkati ga Afirika mulimu ennyanja n'emigga mingi, era mu buvanjuba bwa Congo, mu Rwanda, ne mu bugwanjuba bwa Uganda ettaka ggimu nnyo.

translation.en: Dr Kizza Besigye remarked at a campaign rally in Amolatar District that the government had leased part of Lake Kyoga to a South African society.
translation.lug: Mu lukungaana lwe yakuba ng'anoonya akalulu mu disitulikiti y'e Amolatar Dr Kizza Besigye yagamba nti gavumenti yawa ekitongole ekimu eky'omu  South Africa liizi ku Nnyanja Kyoga.

translation.en: Many Ugandans take fresh water for granted and could not understand why “a mere lake” caused Museveni to react with such sensitivity.
translation.lug: Bannayuganda bangi tebamanyi kya bugagga kye balina eky'okuba n'amazzi ago amayonjo era tebamanyi lwaki “ennyanja obuyanja” yatabula Museveni.

translation.en: Africa is geopolitically important in counter terrorism, apart from resources discovered and others gradually reducing, there is also another essential value in Africa.
translation.lug: Ekifo Afirika w'eri kya nkizo mu kulwanyisa obutujju, ng'oggyeeko okuba nti waliwo ebintu eby'omuwendo ebyeyongerwa okuzuulwa ate ng'ebirala bikendeera, waliwo ekintu ekirala ekikulu mu Afirika.

translation.en: The continent, through the Red Sea and the Suez Canal, is one of the major trade gateways of the world.
translation.lug: Ennyanja Emyufu n'omukutu gwa Suez bisobola okusobozesa amawanga mu nsi yonna okukwatagana mu by'obusuubuzi.

translation.en: Ocean going ships and oil tankers would have to make their way round the southern tip of Africa on to markets in Europe.
translation.lug: Emmeeri ezitambulira ku gayanja aganene zandibadde zitindigga olugendo luwanvu nnyo okuyita ebukiikaddyo bwa Afirika okutwala ebyamaguzi n'amafuta mu Bulaaya.

translation.en: Since the terrorist attacks on the United States the Horn of Africa states of Djibouti and Ethiopia have become important surveillance bases.
translation.lug: Okuva abatujju lwe baakola obulumbaganyi ku Amerika amawanga g'omu Afirika, Djibouti ne Esiyopiya gaafuuka bifo bikulu nnyo eby'okuketteramu abatujju.

translation.en: There were attacks on embassies in Kenya and Tanzania in 1998, on western tourists in Egypt and Israeli airline.
translation.lug: Mu 1998 obulumbaganyi bwakolebwa ku bitebe bya Amerika mu Kenya ne Tanzania, ne ku balambuzi abaali bavudde mu Bulaaya abaali batambulira mu nnyonyi ya Misiri n'eya Isirayiri.

translation.en: Timothy Kalyegira, is the most committed of media skeptics about Rwanda and its President, Paul Kagame.
translation.lug: Timothy Kalyegira, ye munnamawulire asinga okusonga olunwe mu Rwanda ne pulezidenti waayo, Paul Kagame.

translation.en: On a recent visit there, almost everyone I know and bumped into, said something about him and his “hatred of Rwanda”.
translation.lug: Jjuuzi bwe nnakyalako e Rwanda, kumpi buli omu gwe nnayogerako naye alina kye yamwogerako ne ku ngeri "gy'atayagalamu Rwanda”.

translation.en: Pan Butamire credits Kalyegira with “a cynical streak” that makes him “sound ludicrous”.
translation.lug: Pan Butamire atendereza nnyo Kalyegira ng'omusajja ataluma mu bigambo.

translation.en: Is there no reconciliation in Rwanda?
translation.lug: Wasobola okubaawo okukkaanya mu Rwanda?

translation.en: Although milder than some of the things I have heard people say about him in Kigali, these are serious accusations.
translation.lug: Wadde ng'ebyo si bya maanyi nnyo bw'obigeraageranya n'ebintu ebirala bye mpulidde ng'abantu mu Rwanda bamwogerako, ensonga ezo si ntono.

translation.en: It is not the first time Kalyegira has had a go at Rwanda or its leadership.
