translation.lug: Ogwo si gwe mulundi ogwali gusoose Kalyegira okuvumirira Rwanda oba obukulembeze bwayo.

translation.en: He and I have fought several times over the years about Rwanda, a country he loves to dismiss as ordinary.
translation.lug: Okumala emyaka tubadde tuguluba naye ku nsonga za Rwanda, ensi ye gy'atwala ng'etalina bw'eri.

translation.en: Remarkably, his first and last visit to Rwanda, he stopped in Kigali this was more than four years ago.
translation.lug: Mu butuufu, omulundi gwe yasooka era gwe yasembayo okugenda e Rwanda, yakoma Kigali era kati wayise emyaka egisukka mu ena.

translation.en: For example, he argues that comparison of countries such as Uganda and Rwanda amount to comparing “the normal with the dysfunctional”.
translation.lug: Ng'ekyokulabirako, agamba nti okugeraageranya ensi nga Uganda ne Rwanda kuba nga kugeraageranya “ekintu ekikola obulungi ku kitakola bulungi”.

translation.en: One could justifiably rate Uganda as dysfunctional, given its recent history.
translation.lug: Abantu abamu bayinza okugamba nti Uganda tetambula bulungi nnaddala bw'olowooza ku bigibaddemu mu myaka egyakayita.

translation.en: At the time it seized power, the Rwanda Patriotic Front inherited a country in ruins, without money, and with no functioning state institutions.
translation.lug: Gavumenti ya Rwanda eriko we yajjira mu buyinza, yasanga ensi eyo ng'esensebuse, nga terina ssente, nga terina kitongole kya ggwanga kyonna kikola.

translation.en: Operations of Joint Anti-terrorist Task Force were also geared to the arrest or extermination of urban terrorist squads.
translation.lug: Ebikwekweto by'ekitongole ekirwanyisa obutujju era byali bigendereddwa okukwata oba okusaanyaawo obubinja bw'abatujju mu bibuga.

translation.en: Joint Anti-terrorist Task Force arrested Seka Adam Nsubuga Mukalazi,Yudaya Nsubuga and Mubiru Muhammed for their connection to Allied Democratic Forces.
translation.lug: Ekitongole ekirwanyisa obutujju kyakwata Seka Adam Nsubuga Mukalazi, Yudaya Nsubuga ne Mubiru Muhammed olw'okuba n'akakwate ne ADF.

translation.en: In the 2000s they started to experiment with ethanol fuel, the so-called “hybrid” cars.
translation.lug: Mu myaka gya 2000 baatandika okugezesa emmotoka ezikozesa ethanol.

translation.en: Saudi Arabia, South Korea, China and Russia started to negotiate purchases of land in Africa on which to grow food.
translation.lug: Saudi Arabia, South Korea, China ne Russia baatandika okuteeseganya ne gavumenti z'omu Afirika okubaguza ettaka okulimirako emmere.

translation.en: Governments and investment funds are buying up farmland in Africa and Asia to grow food.
translation.lug: Gavumenti ne kampuni ezitali zimu zigula ettaka mu Afirika ne mu Asiya okulimirako emmere.

translation.en: The smaller part of Lake Chad to the northeast a lake that is now rapidly shrinking in size.
translation.lug: Ekitundu ekisinga obutono ku Nnyanja Chad ku luuyi olw'ebukiikakkono kikendeerera ku sipiidi.

translation.en: Abundance of fresh water makes the region the most fertile and fresh water endowed in Africa.
translation.lug: Amazzi amangi amalungi agali mu kitundu ekyo gakireetedde okuba ekitundu ekisingayo obugimu n'okubaamu amazzi amalungi mu Afirika.

translation.en: President Yoweri Museveni reacted defensively.
translation.lug: Ekyo Pulezidenti Yoweri Museveni yakiwakanya.

translation.en: France and the United States keep an eye on militant activities in Yemen and Saudi Arabia.
translation.lug: Bufalansa ne Amerika batadde eriiso ku bikolwa by'amagye mu  Yemen ne mu Saudi Arabia.

translation.en: In the Russian region of Chechnya starting in 1994 to the Philippines, Thailand, Indonesia, Spain, Britain, to attacks on US.
translation.lug: Ku kitundu kya Russia eky'e Chechnya okutandika mu 1994 ku Philippines, Thailand, Indonesia, Spain, Bungereza, ku bulumbaganyi ku Amerika.

translation.en: Timothy Kalyegira has been the subject of much animated discussion in Kigali.
translation.lug: Timothy Kalyegira y'omu ku basinga okwogerwako mu Kigali.

translation.en: Pascal Gahamanyi accuses Kalyegira of relying “entirely on ignorance and prejudice” and “ignoring basic information”.
translation.lug: Pascal Gahamanyi yagamba nti Kalyegira  by'ayogera tabitegeera era aby'ogeza busosoze era nti tafuddeeyo kwetegereza bukakafu.

translation.en: He sees Rwanda admirers as hopelessly naïve and impressionable.
translation.lug: Agamba nti abo abagamba nti Rwanda eri bulungi bakyogeza butamanya.

translation.en: Rwanda should not be characterised as a normal country.
translation.lug: Rwanda tesaanidde kutwalibwa nga nsi ya bulijjo.

translation.en: In the 19th century, the economic race was to control her vast resources.
translation.lug: Mu kyasa ekya 19, embiranyi mu by'enfuna yali eva ku kuba na buyinza ku by'obugagga byayo.

translation.en: Filling the Uganda Police and Uganda Revenue Authority with government team appears to have made the situation worse.
translation.lug: Okujjuza abantu ba gavumenti mu kitongole kya Poliisi ya Uganda ne mu kitongole ekiwoozi ky'omusolo, URA, kirabika kyayongera kwonoona mbeera.

translation.en: Corruption is the biggest challenge in Uganda, says Buturo.
translation.lug: Buturo agamba nti obulyi bw'enguzi kye kizibu ekisinga obunene mu Uganda.

translation.en: Tanzania is the second best performer with an incidence of twenty eight point six percent.
translation.lug: Tanzania ekwata kya kubiri mu mawanga agasinga okukola obulungi.

translation.en: Uganda, Kenya, and Burundi have bribery acceptance of thirty three percent, thirty one point nine percent, and thirty six point seven percent respectively.
translation.lug: Obulyi bw'enguzi mu Uganda, Kenya, ne Burundi buli ebitundu 33, 31.9, ne 36.7 ku buli kikumi.

translation.en: Just a few weeks after a devastating terrorist attack in Kampala, the African Union still convened in Uganda’s capital city to tackle our most urgent priorities.
translation.lug: Nga wayise wiiki ntono oluvannyuma lw'obulumbaganyi bw'abatujju mu Kampala, ekibiina ekigatta amawanga ku lukalu lwa Afirika kyalina olukungaana mu Kampala okwogera ku nsonga ezisinga okukwata ku Uganda.

translation.en: It was inspiring to see that African heads of state continued to make time for meetings of the recently formed African Leaders Malaria Alliance.
translation.lug: Kyali kizzaamu amaanyi okulaba ng'abakulembeze b'amawanga ga Afirika baali beeyongera okufuna akadde k'ekungaana za African Leaders Malaria Alliance ekyali kyakatandikibwawo.

translation.en: African Leaders Malaria Alliance, a group dedicated to finding new solutions to malaria, had pledged to make real progress against the disease.
translation.lug: Ekibiina kya African Leaders Malaria Alliance, ekyatandikibwawo okuzuula engeri empya ez'okulwanyisa omusujja gw'ensiri , kyali kyeyama okwongera amaanyi mu kulwanyisa omusujja gw'ensiri.

translation.en: But today, the leading malaria vaccine candidate is in Phase III trials in seven countries across Africa.
translation.lug: Naye kati, abo abali mu maaso mu kaweefube w'okukola eddagala ly'omusujja bali ku mutendera ogw'okunoonyereza gwa kusatu mu nsi musanvu eza Afirika.

translation.en: So far, ten thousand infants and young children have been enrolled in this critical trial in Burkina Faso, Gabon, Ghana, Kenya, Malawi, Mozambique, and Tanzania.
translation.lug: Kati abaana abawere n'abato omutwalo gumu be bakagezesebwako eddagala lino mu Burkina Faso, Gabon, Ghana, Kenya, Malawi, Mozambique, ne Tanzania.

translation.en: With a malaria vaccine candidate on the horizon, now is the time to prepare for its introduction as five years can go by quickly.
translation.lug: Okuva bwe kiri nti eddala ly'omusujja eryo linaatera okukakasibwa, kino kye kiseera okweteekerateekera okwanjulwa kwalyo mu myaka etaano kubanga tegirwa.

translation.en: Partners need to engage and we need to start thinking about how to ensure malaria vaccine reaches those who need it most who are mainly the Africa’s children.
translation.lug: Kyetaagisa okukolera awamu n'okulaba engeri eddagala ly'omusujja eryo gye linaatuuka ku basinga okulyetaaga nga bano be baana abali mu Afirika.

translation.en: The process could start by engaging groups like African Leaders Malaria Alliance and international organisations such as the Roll Back Malaria Partnership and the Global Fund.
translation.lug: Kisoboka okutandika nga bayingizaamu ebitongole gamba nga African Leaders Malaria Alliance n'ebitongole by'ensi yonna gamba nga Roll Back Malaria Partnership ne Global Fund.

translation.en: For our part, Glaxo Smith Kline is doing all that it can to ensure that the price of falciparum circumsporozoite protein  T-cell epitopes hepatitis B surface antigen will not be a barrier to its use.
translation.lug: Ffe aba Glaxo Smith Kline tukola kyonna ekisoboka okulaba nti ebbeeyi y'eddagala teremesa bantu.

translation.en: Earlier this year, our Chief Executive Officer Andrew Witty announced that Glaxo Smith Kline  will sell falciparum circumsporozoite protein  T-cell epitopes hepatitis B surface antigen.
translation.lug: Ku ntandikwa y'omwaka guno, Andrew Witty akulira ekitongole kyaffe yakirangirira nti Glaxo Smith Kline ejja kutunda eddagala lya falciparum circumsporozoite protein  T-cell epitopes hepatitis B surface antigen.

translation.en: Such an approach should ensure that pharmaceutical companies continue to invest in research for similar vaccines.
translation.lug: Enkola eno esaanidde okuleetera kampuni z'eddagala okweyongera okussa ssente mu kunoonyereza zikoleyo amalagala amalala nga lino.

translation.en: Glaxo Smith Kline believes in broad collaboration to advance research against diseases like malaria.
translation.lug: Ekitongole kya Glaxo Smith Kline kikkiriza nti wateekwa okubaawo okukolagana okw'amaanyi okutumbula okunoonyereza ku ndwadde gamba ng'omusujja.

translation.en: All over the world, countries, companies, Non Governmental Organisations and scientists are motivated to advance the fight against malaria.
translation.lug: Mu nsi yonna, amawanga, kampuni, ebitongole ebitali bya gavumenti, ne bannassaayansi bafunye obumalirivu okwongera amaanyi mu kulwanyisa omusujja.

translation.en: African Leaders Malaria Alliance is a great example of what Africans can do when we work together on the highest level.
translation.lug: Omukago gwa African Leaders Malaria Alliance kyakulabirako kirungi ekiraga ekyo abakulembeze b'ensi za Afrika kye basobola okukola singa bakolera wamu.

translation.en: I hope African Leader Malaria Alliance and its friends gather at another African Union meeting to discuss new malaria involvement.
translation.lug: Ka nsuubire nti abali mu mukago gwa African Leader Malaria Alliance ne mikwano gyaabwe baddamu okuba ku lukungana olulala olw'ekibiina ekigatta amawanga ga Afirika ne boogera ku bipya ebikwata ku kulwanyisa omusujja.

translation.en: We have to start working together now to make sure Africa is ready for a vaccine.
translation.lug: Tusaanidde okutandika okukolera awamu kati Afirika esobole okwetegekera okufuna eddagala.

translation.en: One day, there may be means to save many more lives.
translation.lug: Lumu, tuyinza okuzuula engeri y'okutaasaamu obulamu bw'abantu bangi.

translation.en: Madiké Seye has served as the Vice President  for GlaxoSmithKline since  two thousand six.
translation.lug: Okuva mu 2006, Madiké Seye y'abadde omumyuka wa pulezidenti wa Glaxo Smith Kline.

translation.en: With a malaria vaccine candidate on the rise , now is the time to prepare for its introduction as five years can go by quickly.
translation.lug: Nga kati eddagala ly'omusujja liri ku mutendera ogusembayo, kino kye kiseera okwetegekera okwanjulwa kwalyo kubanga emyaka etaano tegirwa.

translation.en: At the end of July, the Uganda National Bureau of Standards was set to destroy expired items.
translation.lug: Ku nkomerero ya Jjulaayi, ekitongole ekikakasa omutindo gw'ebintu mu Uganda, UNBS kyali kya kusaanyaawo ebintu ebyali biyiseeko .

translation.en: The haul is part of goods worth one hundred forty seven million shillings that Uganda Nationai Bureau of Standards was destroying.
translation.lug: Ebintu ebyaboyebwa ekitongole kya UNBS okubisaanyaawo byali bibalirirwamu obukadde bwa ssente za Uganda 147.

translation.en: Uganda National Bureau of Standards confiscated them from businesses because they do not meet the standard bureaus requirements.
translation.lug: Ekitongole kya UNBS kyabowa ebintu ebyo olw'okuba byali tebituukana na mutindo.

translation.en: The Uganda National Bureau Standards Manager Quality Assurance, was speaking from his office at Kanjokya House on Kanjokya Street in Kamwokya, a Kampala suburb.
translation.lug: Maneja wa UNBS yali ayogerera mu ofiisi ye esangibwa ku kizimbe ekiyitibwa Kanjokya House ku luguudo lwa Kanjokya mu Kamwokya, ekisangibwa mu Kampala.

translation.en: In the interview week, Uganda National Bureau Standards had just discovered expired industrial chemicals.
translation.lug: Mu wiiki mwe baababuuliza ebibuuzo, aba UNBS baali bazudde ebidagala ebikozesebwa mu makolero ebyayitako.

translation.en: The officials at Lawsam Chemicals Ltd, a major importer and supplier of chemicals, claimed they were not aware of the expiry date.
translation.lug: Abakungu mu kampuni eyitibwa Lawsam Chemicals Ltd, emu ku kampuni ezisinga okuyingiza n'okubunyisa eddagala mu ggwanga, baagamba nti baali tebamanyi nti eddagala eryo lyali lyayitako.

translation.en: Uganda National Bureau of Standards officials say, in some cases, the offenders totally change the expiry date on the products.
translation.lug: Abakungu ba UNBS bagamba nti abamenyi b'amateeka abamu bakyusa ennaku z'omwezi ebintu kwe binaaba nga biyiseeko.

translation.en: Ssekitoleko says when the economy was set free some people turned their homes into factories.
translation.lug: Ssekitoleko agamba nti gavumenti bwe yawa abantu bonna olukusa okukola bizineesi, abantu abamu amaka gaabwe baagafuula makolero.

translation.en: Ssekitoleko says people involved in these acts work at night, distribute in the early hours of the morning.
translation.lug: Ssekitoleko agamba nti abantu abeenyigira mu mize gino bakola kiro, ebintu byabwe ne babitambuza ku makya nnyo.

translation.en: He says Uganda National Bureau of Standards  plans to start working at night to stop the illegal activities.
translation.lug: Agamba nti aba UNBS balina enteekateeka ez'okutandika okukola ekiro okukomya ebikolwa ebimenya amateeka.

translation.en: According to Uganda National Bureau of Standards, most expired commodities are sold in the small retail shops.
translation.lug: Okusinziira ku kitongole kya UNBS ebintu bingi ebyayitako bitundibwa mu maduuka amatono.

translation.en: Kahuma wants all district councils and police units to know how to negotiate with Uganda National Bureau of Standards
translation.lug: Kahuma ayagala abakulembeze ba disituliki n'aba poliisi bamanye engeri gye bayinza okukwatagana n'ekitongole kya UNBS

translation.en: In an earlier interview, Kampala City Traders Association spokesperson Issa Ssekito told The Independent that expired goods flood the market.
translation.lug: Bwe yali abuuzibwa emabegako, Issa Ssekito omwogezi wa Kampala City Traders Association yagamba olupapula lwa Independent nti waliwo ebintu bingi ebyayitako ebitundibwa.

translation.en: The rules and regulations to trade need changing to meet the present day challenges.
translation.lug: Amateeka agafuga eby'obusuubuzi geetaaga okukyusaamu gatuukane n'okusoomooza kwe twolekaganye nakwo mu kiseera kino.

translation.en: Charles Kwesiga who is the Executive Director of the Uganda Industrial Research Institute, which compliments Uganda National Bureau of Standards.
translation.lug: Charles Kwesiga ye mukulu wa Uganda Industrial Research Institute, ekitongole ekiyambako UNBS.

translation.en: Uganda National Bureau of Standards is supposed to ensure standards in protection of the public against harmful, dangerous and substandard products.
translation.lug: UNBS evunaanyizibwa ku kukakasa nti omutindo gw'ebintu ebitundibwa mulungi, bireme kuba bya bulabe eri abantu.

translation.en: Uganda National Bureau of Standards finds danger in `home factories’, says Uganda National Bureau of Standards Executive Director Terry Kahuma.
translation.lug: Terry Kahuma dayirekita mu kitongole kya UNBS agamba nti ab'ekitongole kino obuzibu basinze kubusanga mu makolero abantu ge baatandikawo mu mayumba gaabwe.

translation.en: How can new business be established in countries like Uganda where corruption is high?
translation.lug: Bizineesi empya ziyinza zitya okutandikibwawo mu nsi nga Uganda omuli obulyi bw'enguzi obungi?

translation.en: It’s discouraging when citizens lose six business hours per day because of potholes only explained by corruption somewhere in Kampala City Council.
translation.lug: Kimalamu amaanyi abasuubuzi okufiirwa ssaawa mukaaga ze bandimaze nga bakola ng'obuzibu buva mu binnya ebiri mu makubo olw'obulyi bw'enguzi obuli mu KCC.

translation.en: At Uganda National Chamber of Commerce and Industry, we are working to understand the way business is done in this country.
translation.lug: Ku Uganda National Chamber of Commerce and Industry, tufuba okutegeera engeri bizineesi gye zikolebwamu mu ggwanga.

translation.en: Is Uganda’s labour skilled enough to compete in the region?
translation.lug: Abakozi mu Uganda balina obukugu obumala okuvuganya n'amawanga amalala mu kitundu kyaffe?

translation.en: Uganda has an urgent need to prioritise free vocational, skills and business education.
translation.lug: Uganda yeetaaga nnyo okusoosoowaza eky'okutendeka abantu mu mirimu egy'emikono ne mu bizineesi ku bwereere.

translation.en: Uganda must also urgently create a scheme to create non-formal yet skilled operators.
translation.lug: Uganda era yeetaaga nnyo okuyamba abakozi bonna okufuna obukugu nga mw'otwalidde n'abo abeekozesa.

translation.en: With a population growing at three point two percent and sixty eight percent of the population engaged in subsistence farming, how can Uganda move to commercial farming?
translation.lug: Naye mu ggwanga lino ng'omuwendo gw'abantu gweyongera ebitundu bisatu n'obutundutundu bubiri ku buli kikumi era ng'abantu 68 ku buli kikumi balima mmere yaabwe, Uganda eyinza etya okusenvula n'edda ku bulimi obukola amagoba?

translation.en: Runaway corruption reported in the National Agricultural Advisory Services program must be arrested with rapidity.
translation.lug: Abantu abaalya enguzi mu nteekateeka ya National Agricultural Advisory Services balina okukwatibwa mu bwangu.

translation.en: Agriculture in Uganda lies in a planned investment focus along all nodes of value chain.
translation.lug: Eby'obulimi mu Uganda byetaaga okubaamu enteekateeka.

translation.en: At Uganda National Chamber of Commerce and Industry, we think that the size of the population should not cause discomfort.
translation.lug: Aba Uganda National Chamber of Commerce and Industry, tulowooza nti omuwendo gw'abantu tegusaanidde kutweraliikiriza.

translation.en: What should concern us is the quality of the population.
translation.lug: Ekisaanidde okutweraliikiriza gwe mutindo gw'obulamu bw'abantu.

translation.en: However, the rapid growth of low quality population in such a short time can have serious implications for Uganda’s hope.
translation.lug: Naye okuba nti mu kaseera katono omuwendo gw'abantu abalina omutindo gw'obulamu ogwa wansi gweyongedde nnyo kiyinza okukosa ennyo ebiseera bya Uganda eby'omu maaso.

translation.en: What measures does Uganda National Chamber of Commerce and Industry have in respect to power supply?
translation.lug: Nteekateeka ki Uganda National Chamber of Commerce and Industry z'erina ku kubunyisibwa kw'amasannyalaze?

translation.en: Uganda is yet to come up with a policy to guide prevent and adaptation to climate change adjuncts.
translation.lug: Uganda tennassaawo nteekateeka nnambulukufu zituukana na nkyukakyuka mu mbeera z'obudde.

translation.en: At Uganda National Chamber of Commerce and Industry, we believe that clean and green growth is a major answer to both our climate and economic problems.
translation.lug: Ku Uganda National Chamber of Commerce and Industry, enkulaakulana eteyonoona butonde y'esobola okugonjoola obuzibu mu mbeera y'obudde ne mu by'enfuna.

translation.en: The African Union meeting that ended on June twenty seventh in Kampala  will be remembered for its courage.
translation.lug: Olukungaana lw'ekibiina ekigatta amawanga ga Afirika olwaggwa nga Jjuuni 27 mu Kampala lujja kujjukirwa nnyo olw'obuvumu obwaragibwa abaalulimu.

translation.en: This could reduce the risk of malaria by half in children living in malaria originating in Sub-Saharan Africa.
translation.lug: Kino kiyinza okukendeeza omuwendo gw'abaana abalwala omusujja mu Sub-Saharan Africa ebitundu kimu kya kubiri.

translation.en: A small five percent charge will be directly reinvested into research for next-generation malaria vaccines or vaccines for other neglected diseases.
translation.lug: Ebitundu bitaano ku buli kikumi eza ssente zijja kussibwa mu kunoonyereza ku ddagala ly'omusujja ery'omulembe oguddako ne mu malagala g'endwadde endala ezibuusiddwa amaaso.

translation.en: Should Phase III results confirm studies to date?
translation.lug: Ebinaava mu mutendera gw'okunoonyereza ogw'okusatu binaakakasa ebyakazuulibwa?

translation.en: Madiké Seye has worked at Glaxo Smith Kline since ninteen ninty.
translation.lug: Madiké Seye akoledde mu Glaxo Smith Kline okuva mu 1990.

translation.en: We need to start thinking about how to ensure falciparum circumsporozoite protein  T-cell epitopes hepatitis B surface antigen reaches those who need it most.
translation.lug: Kati tusaanidde okulowooza ku ngeri eddagala lya falciparum circumsporozoite protein  T-cell epitopes hepatitis B surface antigen gye linaatuuka ku bantu abasinga okulyetaaga.

translation.en: This was at the Kampala city council garbage dumping site in Kiteezi off the Gayaza Road near Kampala city.
translation.lug: Kino kyaliwo mu kifo awakungaanyirizibwa kasasiro mu Kampala e Kiteezi ng'ovudde ku luguudo lw'e Gayaza okuliraana ekibuga Kampala.

translation.en: Patrick Ssekitoleko says inspite of such efforts to remove expired commodities off the shelves of shops, “the situation is worsening”.
translation.lug: Patrick Ssekitoleko agamba nti wadde nga wabaddewo kaweefube ow'okuggya ku katale ebintu ebiyiseeko, embeera yeeyongera bweyongezi kwonooneka.

translation.en: This was when Uganda Nationa Bureau of Standards recovered the expired chemicals in an attack on their shops.
translation.lug: Kino kyaliwo aba UNBS bwe baazuula eddagala eriyiseeko lwe yazingako amaduuka gaabwe.

translation.en: Therefore can’t kill the germs and bacteria,” said Ssekitoleko.
translation.lug: Ssekitoleko yagamba nti eddagala eryo liba terisobola kutta buwuka.

translation.en: By day break everything is in order.
translation.lug: We bukeerera buli kimu kiba bulungi.

translation.en: This happens in low income areas where buyers lack information and buy without first checking the expiry date.
translation.lug: Kino kibaawo mu bitundu bya bamufuna mpola abantu abasinga gye bali mu butamanya era abagula ebintu nga tebasoose kukebera ddi lwe biggwaako.

translation.en: This was said by Uganda National Bureau of Standards Executive Director Terry Kahuma in an interview at his office in Kyambogo.
translation.lug: Ebyo byayogerwa Terry Kahuma akulira UNBS bwe yali ayogerera mu ofiisi ye e Kyambogo.

translation.en: Also a citizen`s arrest of forgery, producers of substandard goods, people selling expired goods, and of people changing expiry dates.
translation.lug: Era okukwata abantu abajingirira ebintu, abakola ebintu by'omutindo ogwa wansi, abatunda ebintu ebiyiseeko, era n'abakyusa ennaku z'omwezi ebintu kwe biggwerako.

translation.en: Uganda has a Sale of Goods Act of niteen fifty which carries a very small penalty.
translation.lug: Etteeka erikwata ku kutunda ebintu Uganda ly'erina lyassibwawo mu 1950 era engassi omuntu akwatiddwa gy'awa okusinziira ku tteeka eryo ntono nnyo.

translation.en: Under Clause twenty of the Act, there is a legal responsibility for anybody not to manufacture, sell, distribute or hold for the purpose of selling any product that does not meet usual Uganda standards.
translation.lug: Okusinziira ku kawaayiro nnamba 20 ak'etteeka eryo, buli omu avunaanyizibwa mu mateeka okwewala okukola, okutunda, okubunyisa, oba okukuuma ekintu kyonna ekitatuukana na mutindo n'ekigendererwa eky'okukitunda.

translation.en: Uganda National Bureau of Standards officials say, in some cases, the offenders totally change the expiry date on the products and blame the practice on the expansion of small manufacturing units in homes turned into factories.
translation.lug: Abakungu mu UNBS bagamba nti mu mbeera ezimu abantu bakyusa ennaku z'omwezi ebintu kwe biggwerako era bagamba nti ekyo kivudde bukampuni bungi okutandikibwawo mu maka g'abantu.

translation.en: And to urgently build a awareness citizen agency determined to demand accountability and responsibility.
translation.lug: Okusobola okuzibula abantu amaaso, ekitongole kyasalawo okusaba abakola ebintu okuwa alipoota ku bye bakola.

translation.en: Forexample the Uganda Export promotion board and its District Information Centers program.
translation.lug: Ng'ekyokulabirako, waliwo ekitongole ekikola ku bintu ebifuluma eggwanga ne ofiisi zaakyo mu disitulikiti.

translation.en: Over the last ten years, agriculture productivity has been decreasing from seven percent to now one point three percent growth, as such the agriculture sector contribution to Growth Domestic Product is twentry one percent.
translation.lug: Mu myaka ekkumi egiyise, ebintu ebiva mu by'obulimi bikendedde okuva ku bitundu musanvu ku buli kikumi ne bituuka ku kitundu kimu n'obutundutundu busatu ku buli kikumi, ne kiba nti eby'obulimi biri ebitundu 21 ku buli kikumi ku bintu ebikolebwa mu ggwanga.

translation.en: Focus on building competent producer organisations and execute implementation strategies like National Agricultural Advisory Services with precision.
translation.lug: Okussa essira ku kuba n'abakozi b'ebintu abalungi n'okussa obulungi mu nkola enteekateeka gamba ng'eza National Agricultural Advisory Services.

translation.en: Uganda has one of the highest fertility rates and one of the fastest growing populations in Africa.
translation.lug: Uganda y'emu ku nsi za Afirika omuli abantu abazaala ennyo era omuwendo gw'abantu mwe gulinnyira ku sipiidi.

translation.en: To develop as a middle income economy over the next twenty five years.
translation.lug: Okutumbula eby'enfuna by'eggwanga bidde ku ddaala eriddako mu myaka 25 egiddako.

translation.en: Uganda like the rest of the world is struggling with addition of climate change; usual droughts, floods, landslides, diseases, and deepening water crisis.
translation.lug: Okufaananako amawanga amalala mu nsi ne Uganda nayo eyolekagana n'obuzibu bw'embeera y'obudde; omuli ebyeya, amataba, okubumbulukuka kw'ettaka, endwadde, n'ekizibu ky'amazzi.

translation.en: Let us take an example of Ingabire Victoire who has been cited by the international media as an example.
translation.lug: Ka tulowooze ku Ingabire Victoire amanyiddwa mu nsi okuba ekyokulabirako ekirungi.

translation.en: Ingabire's link to the Democratic Forces for the Liberation of Rwanda is well known.
translation.lug: Bangi bakimanyi nti Ingabire yakolagana n'eggye lya Democratic Forces okununula Rwanda.

translation.en: Her way of thinking, as shown by her speeches both before and after her arrival in Rwanda in two thousand ten.
translation.lug: Engeri gy'alowoozaamu erabikira mu bye yayogeranga nga tannatuuka mu Rwanda n'oluvannyuma lw'okutuukayo mu 2010.

translation.en: Her intention is to attain political power in Rwanda.
translation.lug: Ekigendererwa kye kya kufuuka mukulembeze mu Rwanda.

translation.en: Generally, it would be difficult to make a good analysis of the Rwandan situation.
translation.lug: Okutwalira awamu si kyangu kumanya bulungi mbeera eri mu Rwanda.

translation.en: The problem arises that analysts like George Ayitty mislead the world by focusing on isolated incidents.
translation.lug: Kigambibwa nti abantu abamu nga George Ayitty babuzaabuza ensi nga basinziira ku buntu obutonotono obuba bubaddewo.

translation.en: There is no way Rwanda would have made both political and socio-economic achievements if the people were under an oppressive regime.
translation.lug: Tewali ngeri Rwanda gye yandisobodde kukulaakulana mu bya bufuzi, mu mbeera z'abantu, ne mu by'obusuubuzi singa obukulembeze bwayo bwali bunyigiriza abantu.

translation.en: Today, the overall percentage of people insured is ninty one percent.
translation.lug: Leero, abantu 91 ku buli kikumi balina yinsuwa.

translation.en: As a result of this policy, child death rate fell from eighty six per one thousand  live births in two thousand five to sixty two per one thousand in two thousand eight.
translation.lug: Enkola eno yaleetera omuwendo gw'abaana abafa nga bazaalibwa okukka okuva ku 86 ku buli lukumi mu 2005 okutuuka ku 62 ku buli lukumi mu 2008.

translation.en: Maternal death has also dropped from more than one thousand seventy one  deaths per one hundred  live births between nineteen ninity five and two thousand to six hundred.
translation.lug: Omuwendo gw'abakazi abafa nga bazaala nagwo gwakka okuva ku bakazi abasukka 1,0701 mu 1995 okudda ku 600 mu 2000.

translation.en: Life expectancy has also gone up to fifty years from forty two years, ten years ago.
translation.lug: Era kati okutwalira awamu abantu bawangaala okusinga bwe kyali emyaka kkumi emabega; baali bawangaala emyaka 42 naye kati bawangaala 50.

translation.en: Under the Universal Primary Education, net pupil enrolment is at ninety six percent, according to two thousand nine statistics.
translation.lug: Era okusinziira ku kunoonyereza okwakolebwa mu 2006, okuva enkola ya bonna basome lwe yatandikibwawo, kati abaana 96 ku buli kikumi basoma.

translation.en: With such policies, Rwanda has realised Gross domestic product  growth throughout the past years.
translation.lug: Enkola ezo ziyambye Rwanda okulaba enkulaakulana mu myaka gyonna egiyise.

translation.en: The government of Rwanda is not perfect.
translation.lug: Gavumenti ya Rwanda nayo tetuukiridde.

translation.en: Crime is high in many cities of the United States.
translation.lug: Obumenyi bw'amateeka bungi mu bitundu bingi ebya Amerika.

translation.en: But that cannot make United States leaders dictators.
translation.lug: Naye ekyo tekituleetera kugamba nti abakulembeze mu Amerika bannakyemalira.

translation.en: Foreign governments and media should give chance to Rwandans.
translation.lug: Gavumenti z'amawanga amalala ne bannamawulire basaanidde okuwa Rwanda akadde.

translation.en: Let Rwandans decide who their leaders should be.
translation.lug: Abanyarwanda tusaanidde okubaleka beesalirewo baani abasaanidde okubakulembera.

translation.en: The fate of Rwandans will not be surrendered to self-appointed opposition leaders.
translation.lug: Ebiseera bya Rwanda eby'omu maaso tebijja kulekebwa mu mikono gy'abo abawakanya gavumenti abeenoonyeza ebyabwe.

translation.en: Rwandans have more stake in what is happening.
translation.lug: Abanyarwanda balina ekifaananyi kinene ku ebyo ebigenda mu maaso.

translation.en: George Ayittey and others should come down to Rwanda and interact with Rwandans before he makes his unlikely conclusions.
translation.lug: George Ayittey n'abalala basaanidde okusooka okugenda e Rwanda ne boogerako n'abantu baayo nga tebannayogera bintu bye bateekakasa.

translation.en: Declassified intelligence file of the Lord's Resistance Army defectors fear revenge for atrocities if they leave  the bush.
translation.lug: Abamu ku bayeekera ba LRA batya nti bajja kutulugunyizibwa singa bava mu nsiko.

translation.en: Kony sent a squad to meet Odyambo after he has crossed.
translation.lug: Kony yatuma ababaka basisinkane Odyambo ng'amaze okusala ensalo.

translation.en: At this point Odyambo is supposed to fire twice.
translation.lug: Ku luno Odyambo yalina okukola ebintu bibiri.

translation.en: Cautioned Okulu not to move quickly to Kony’s position.
translation.lug: Yalabula Okulu obutanguwa kukkiriza Kony ky'agamba.

translation.en: Instructed all units to avoid talking too much on the radio, as Uganda People's Defence Forces is busy monitoring them.
translation.lug: Yabalagira okwewala okwogerera ennyo ku leediyo, kubanga UPDF ebalondoola.

translation.en: Boasted of having a force of one thousand three hundred soldiers with a comment that the Lord's Resistance Army defectors are useless.
translation.lug: Beewana olw'okuba n'abajaasi 1,300 era nti abo abaayabulira LRA tebaalina kye bayamba.

translation.en: While referring to “Captian” Lukwiya who after defecting talked an Mega FM radio.
translation.lug: Ng'ayogera ku "Kapiteeni” Lukwiya eyayogerera ku leediyo ya Mega FM oluvannyuma lw'okuva mu LRA.

translation.en: Directed people with mixed feelings among the Lord's Resistance Army to report to Uganda People's Defence Forces.
translation.lug: Yalagira aba LRA abaalina okwemulugunya kwonna boogere ne UPDF.

translation.en: Revealed that the Lord's Resistance Army commanders can only survive in the bush but when released they will suffer.
translation.lug: Yategeeza nti abaduumizi ba LRA basobola kubeera mu nsiko era nti bwe bateebwa baba bajja kubonaabona.

translation.en: He cited the example of Angola who hails from Awach that if he is released to go back home.
translation.lug: Yawa ekyokulabirako kya Angola mu Awach singa ateebwa okudda eka.

translation.en: Warned his commanders that whatever is done in Uganda to help his family should be done in concealment.
translation.lug: Yalabula abaduumizi nti kyonna ekikolebwa mu Uganda okuyamba ab'amaka ge kisaanidde kukolebwa mu nkukutu.

translation.en: Directed Lukwiya not to stay with Kony’s old women; this was after realising that his old woman Margaret defected.
translation.lug: Yalagira Lukwiya obutabeera n'abo abaaliko bakazi ba Kony; ekyo kyaliwo oluvannyuma lw'okukimanya nti Margaret omu ku baaliko bakazi be naye yali ayabulidde LRA.

translation.en: Blamed seriously Alice Lakwena for accepting offers from the government she fought.
translation.lug: Baanenya nnyo Alice Lakwena olw'okukkiriza okugulirirwa gavumenti gye yali alwanyisa.

translation.en: But in contradiction, he okayed it, if it is President Museveni convincing her or God’s plans.
translation.lug: Naye ate y'ekuba endobo n'akisemba, ng'agamba nti Pulezidenti Museveni ayinza okuba nga ye yamusendasenda oba zaali nteekateeka za Katonda.

translation.en: Claimed that all learned Acholis with degrees are for the Lord's Resistance Army.
translation.lug: Baagamba nti Abacooli bonna abalina ddiguli ba LRA.

translation.en: He complained that he was taking long without hearing from Dominic.
translation.lug: Yeemulugunya nti yali amala ekiseera kiwanvu nga tawuliza Dominic.

translation.en: Otti reported that Alice Lakwena is very much willing to come back from exile .
translation.lug: Otti yagamba nti Alice Lakwena yali mwetegefu okuva mu buwanganguse .

translation.en: He revealed that one Aliga defected to Uganda People's Defence Forces.
translation.lug: Yagamba nti Aliga yabaabulira ne yeegatta ku UPDF.

translation.en: Lukwiya commented that in the Lord's Resistance Army culture Shea Nut oiI is not eaten during the Lord's Resistance Army operation period.
translation.lug: Lukwiya yagamba nti okusinziira ku nnono ya LRA bo tebakozesa buto wa binazi mu kiseera nga baliko obulumbaganyi bwe bakola.

translation.en: He revealed that one of Obura”s groups called SASA defected to Uganda People's Defence Forces with his Lukwiya’s wife.
translation.lug: Yagamba nti ekimu ku bibinja bya Obura ekiyitibwa SASA ekyalimu mukyala we kyabaabulira ne kyegatta ku UPDF.

translation.en: Odyam is coordinating to meet Kony and has already crossed.
translation.lug: Odyam akwasaganya ensonga z'okusisinkana Kony era amaze okusomoka.

translation.en: The second river, has shot twice in the air but Kony did not hear.
translation.lug: Omugga ogw'okubiri, akubye amasasi mu bbanga emirundi ebiri naye Kony tagawulidde.

translation.en: Okulu on a recce mission informed Kony that his surroundings are hostile.
translation.lug: Okulu yali agambye Kony nti we yali yali mu bulabe.

translation.en: He sent a message to Kony that he bumped into a very huge force of Uganda People's Defence Forces being deployed along a certain river.
translation.lug: Yasindikira Kony obubaka nti yasisinkanye abasirikale ba UPDF bangi nga bayiiriddwa ku mugga ogumu.

translation.en: AbudelIla reported that “Captian” Lukwiya was on radio calling the Lord's Resistance Army to leave the bush.
translation.lug: AbudelIla yagamba nti “Kapiteeni” Lukwiya yali asinziira ku leediyo okukubiriza aba LRA okuva mu nsiko.

translation.en: He claimed that he charged eighty Sub Machine Gun  rifles from Uganda People's Defence Force and commented that the Lord's Resistance Army prisoners of war will be destroyed by the government.
translation.lug: Yagamba nti yateeka amasasi mu mundu za UPDF sseruwandula masasi munaana era nti abayeekera ba LRA gavumenti be yakwata ejja kubasaanyaawo.

translation.en: Kapere who is coordinating to meet Ocan Bunia asked Labongo whether Okongo had retrieved their hidden ammo.
translation.lug: Kapere eyali akola enteekateeka okusisinkana Ocan Bunia yabuuza Labongo obanga Okongo eyali aggyeeyo eby'okulwanyisa byabwe bye baali bakwese.

translation.en: He also informed Dominic that his sickness is still serious.
translation.lug: Era yagamba Dominic nti yali akyali mulwadde nnyo.

translation.en: Angola promised that so long as “Major Generals” “Brigadiers” and “Colonels” like him are still there.
translation.lug: Angola yagamba nti kasita “Bameja Genero” “Babuligediya” ne “Bakano”nga ye bakyaliwo.

translation.en: Comments Kony’s negative comment on Lakwena’s return was shortened by after thought of what has been going on between him and Betty Bigombe.
translation.lug: Ebigambo ebitali birungi Kony bye yali ayogera ku Lakwena byasalwako ebyo ebyali bigenda mu maaso wakati we ne Betty Bigombe.

translation.en: Because the way he started, he looked ready to criticise Lakwena’s move with some abuses.
translation.lug: Kubanga engeri gye yatandikamu okwogera yalabika ng'eyali agenda okuvumirira ekyo Lakwena kye yakola.

translation.en: But he remembered how Otti and some other commanders are inclined to peace deal with government and they expect him to agree some how.
translation.lug: Naye yakijjukira nti Otti n'abaduumizi abalala baali baagala okukola endagaano ey'emirembe ne gavumenti era nga bamusuubira naye okukkiriziganya nakyo.

translation.en: Therefore his comment that “could be God’s plans and President Museveni’s convincing language” was meant to make Otti and other commanders hopeful.
translation.lug: N'olwekyo, ebigambo bye yayogera nti “ziyinza okuba nga ntegeka za Katonda oba nga Pulezidenti Museveni ye yasendasenda Lakwena” yabyogera kuwa Otti n'abaduumizi abalala ssuubi.

translation.en: Otti’s story on Lakwena’s move is meant to show Kony that things can end peacefully.
translation.lug: Otti bye yayogera ku Lakwena yabyogera kuleetera Kony kukiraba nti ebintu bisobola okukomekkerezebwa mu mirembe.

translation.en: Kony has now come clear on his move to incriminate his commanders by involving them, in committing atrocities in their home areas.
translation.lug: Ekigendererwa kya Kony kyeyoleka bulungi nti yali ayagala okutattana erinnya ly'abaduumizi be ng'abaleetera okukola ebivve mu bitundu gye bava.

translation.en: To director general internal security organisation, from director of intelligence date june thirteenth two thousand four  Kony, Otti, Lukwiya, Abudema, Ocan Bunia, Dominic, Angola and Okulu were on air.
translation.lug: Eri dayirekita genero wa ISO, okuva eri dayirekita w'ekitongole ekikessi nga Jjuuni 13, 2004:  Kony, Otti, Lukwiya, Abudema, Ocan Bunia, Dominic, Angola ne Okulu babadde ku mpewo.

translation.en: Kony was happy when Angola told him most of the Lord's Resistance Army  groups were in Uganda.
translation.lug: Kony yasanyuse Angola bwe yamugambye nti ebibinja ebisinga obungi ebya LRA biri mu Uganda.

translation.en: Instructed Okulu to hurry to Kony's position because Uganda People's Defence Force may follow him.
translation.lug: Baalagidde Okulu okwanguwa okugenda Kony w'ali kubanga eggye lya UPDF lyali lisobola okumugoberera.

translation.en: This was after Okulu reported that he crossed a certain road safely this morning.
translation.lug: Ekyo kyaliwo oluvannyuma lwa Okulu okugamba nti alina oluguudo lwe yasaze awatali buzibu bwonna ku makya ga leero.

translation.en: Wanted to know who ambushed the Kitgum Local council  five Chairman.
translation.lug: Yayagala okumanya ani yalumba ssentebe w'e Kitgum.

translation.en: He wanted to talk to Kapere but was off air.
translation.lug: Yayagala okwogera ne Kapere naye teyali ku mpewo.

translation.en: He could not read Otti and Dominic very well.
translation.lug: Yali tafuna bulungi Otti ne Dominic.

translation.en: Otti asked Abudema to explain what he had gone to do in Ngomoromo area and the location of Opio.
translation.lug: Otti yagamba Abudema okunnyonnyola ekyali kimututte e Ngomoromo n'ewa Opio.

translation.en: He told Sam Otto that it is Ojera who met Lagulu before Otto Sam revealed that Lagulu has something for him.
translation.lug: Yagamba Sam Otto nti Ojera ye yasisinkana Lagulu nga Otto Sam tannakyatuukiriza nti Lagulu alina obubaka bwe.

translation.en: He permitted Otto to release the problematic women of their fallen comrade saying their role is minimal.
translation.lug: Yawa Otto olukusa okuta bakazi ba munnaabwe eyali afudde ng'agamba nti tebaalina kya maanyi kye baali babeetaaza.

translation.en: Kony supported the idea.
translation.lug: Ekyo Kony yakiwagira.

translation.en: Abudema reported to Otti that Kitgum Local council five chairman Nahaman Ojwee survived ambush in Ngomoromo yesterday.
translation.lug: Abudema yagamba Otti nti ssentebe wa LC5 owa Kitgum Nahaman Ojwee yawonyeewo mu bulumbaganyi obwakoleddwa e Ngomoromo jjo.

translation.en: He further reported that Acaye, one of the commanders they have been looking for has been got.
translation.lug: Era yamugamba nti Acaye, omu ku baduumizi be baabadde anoonya bamufunye.

translation.en: He replied to Otti that he went to Kitgum to attack a certain project and withdrew safely.
translation.lug: Yagamba Otti nti yali agenze e Kitgum okulumba projekiti emu naye nti yavuddeyo mirembe.

translation.en: Kapere reported that yesterday he got in contact with Uganda People's Defence Force and claimed that nothing happened to him.
translation.lug: Kapere yagamba nti jjo yasisinkanye aba UPDF era nti tewali kabi kaamutuusiddwako.

translation.en: He did not give the details.
translation.lug: Teyamubuulira byonna ebyali bibaddewo.

translation.en: Otti and Otto Sam may start moving to Sudan after Sam brings the tapes he retrieved.
translation.lug: Otti ne Otto Sam basobola okutandika okugenda e Sudan oluvannyuma lwa Sam okuleeta obutambi bwe yafunye.

translation.en: But the way things are; we cannot rule out Otti and Sam Otto separating from Kony to either government or exile.
translation.lug: Naye engeri ebintu gye bitambulamu; Otti ne Sam Otto bakyayinza okwabulira Kony ne badda ku ludda lwa gavumenti oba ne bagenda mu buwanganguse.

translation.en: Otti’s question to Abudema why he was in Kitgum may be connected with what some government agents.
translation.lug: Otti okubuuza Abudema ensonga lwaki yagenda e Kitgum kiyinza okuba nga kyalina akakwate n'ekyo abamu ku babaka ba gavumenti [kye bagamba??]

translation.en: This is in Kitgum, Otti might be knowing about it and there is likelihood that he thinks Abudema doesn’t know.
translation.lug: Kino kiri Kitgum, Otti ayinza okuba akimanyiiko era ayinza okuba alowooza nti Abudema takimanyi.

translation.en: Lieutenant Ronnie Balya's report for august thirteenth to nineteenth.
translation.lug: Lipoota ya Lutenanti Ronnie Balya eya Agusito 13-19.

translation.en: I come from a farming family and I used to milk cows in the morning before going to school.
translation.lug: Amaka mwe nnakulira twali balunzi ba nte era nnakamanga ente ku makya nga sinnagenda ku ssomero.

translation.en: Wanted to know who ambushed the Kitgum Local council  five Chairman.
translation.lug: Njagala okumanya ani yalumbye ssentebe wa LC5 e Kitgum.

translation.en: I have no cow to milk here, so I spend my early morning catching up with news, mainly on television.
translation.lug: Eyo sirinaayo nte za kukama, n'olwekyo ebiseera byange eby'oku makya ebisinga mba mpuliriza mawulire, nnadala ku ttivi.

translation.en: Three times in a week I jog in the morning to refresh myself.
translation.lug: Emirundi esatu buli wiiki nzirukamu ku makya okwekuuma nga ndi mulamu bulungi.

translation.en: I also read a lot in the morning before I set off to office.
translation.lug: Era nsoma nnyo ku makya nga sinnagenda ku ofiisi.

translation.en: Usually by eight ante-meridiem I am at office.
translation.lug: Essaawa bbiri ez'oku makya we zituukira ntera okuba nga mmaze okutuuka ku ofiisi.

translation.en: This has been cited in a two thousand nine United Nations report on Rwandan rebels in Democratic Republic of Congo.
translation.lug: Kino kyayogerwako mu alipoota y'ekitongole ky'Amawanga Amagatte eya 2009 eyali ekwata ku bayeekera Abanyarwanda abali mu Democratic Republic of Congo.

translation.en: Through mobilisation of ethnic divisions by deceiving the International community as a democrat fighting "dictatorship" in Rwanda.
translation.lug: Baleetawo enjawukana mu mawanga nga balimbalimba ensi nti bannadimokulasiya abalwanyisa "obwannakyemalira" mu Rwanda.

translation.en: Without basing on where the country is coming from sixteen years after mass killing.
translation.lug: Nga tetusinziira ku wa eggwanga gye livudde emyaka mukaaga oluvannyuma lw'okutta kw'abantu ekikungu.

translation.en: Basing on the present without looking back into Rwandan history and in the process they make poor judgement about Rwanda.
translation.lug: Bwe basinziira ku biriwo kati mu Rwanda ne batatunuulira bibaddewo mu byafaayo basalawo bubi ku Rwanda.

translation.en: University graduates have increased from two thousand one hundred sity in nineteen ninety four to forty four thousand in two thousand nine.
translation.lug: Omuwendo gw'abayizi ba yunivasite gulinnye okuva ku bayizi 2160 mu 1994 ne gutuuka ku bayizi 44,000 mu 2009.

translation.en: Growth in Rwanda was seven point nine five , eleven point two percent and five point five percent in two thousand seven, two thousand eight and  two thousand nine  respectively .
translation.lug: Rwanda yakula ebitundu 7.95 , 11.2, ne 5.5 ku buli kikumi mu 2007, 2008, ne mu 2009 .

translation.en: To rebuild their shattered lives after the genocide and decades of bad leadership.
translation.lug: Okwedaabulula oluvannyuma lw'ekitta bantu n'oluvannyuma lw'okumala emyaka nga balina abafuzi ababi.

translation.en: Because they live in Rwanda and they appreciate Kagame’s effort to modernise the country.
translation.lug: Olw'okuba babeera mu Rwanda era basiima ebyo Kagame by'afubye okukola okukulaakulanya ensi eyo.

translation.en: Kony, Otti, Lukwiya, Abudema, Otto Sam, Kapere, Angola, Opio Makas, Dominic, Odyambo, Labongo and Okulu were all on air.
translation.lug: Kony, Otti, Lukwiya, Abudema, Otto Sam, Kapere, Angola, Opio Makas, Dominic, Odyambo, Labongo ne Okulu bonna baali ku mpewo.

translation.en: He is supposed to cross two of the three rivers they agreed with Kony.
translation.lug: Alina okusomoka emigga ebiri ku egyo esatu gye bakkiriziganyaako ne Kony.

translation.en: And should be careful not to leave any trails behind that can lead the Uganda People's Defence Forces.
translation.lug: Era alina okwegendereza obutaleka buufu mabega buyinza kuyamba UPDF kumulondoola.

translation.en: This was after Okulu sighted a huge force of Uganda People's Defence Forces deployed along a certain river.
translation.lug: Kino kyaliwo oluvannyuma lwa Okulu okulengera abajaasi ba UPDF bangi nga bayiiriddwa ku mugga ogumu.

translation.en: She is only waiting for the delegates from Uganda to collect her.
translation.lug: Alinda bulinzi babaka okuva e Uganda okumukima.

translation.en: Being a prophet she wants to come back to Uganda to treat people in Acholi land because she has all the medicine.
translation.lug: Olw'okuba nnabbi, ayagala kukomawo e Uganda ajjanjabe abantu b'omu kitundu kya Acholi kubanga alina buli ddagala.

translation.en: That he heard him talking on the radio and claims that Aliga was shot in the legs and hence was useless to the Lord's Resistance Army.
translation.lug: Nti yamuwulira ayogera ku leediyo era agamba nti Aliga yakubwa amasasi mu magulu era kati takyali wa mugaso eri LRA.

translation.en: Also complained that soldiers at the division Governmental Military.
translation.lug: Era yeemulugunya ku bajaasi ba gavumenti abali ku divisoni emu.

translation.en: And that he could not talk on his radio for fear of being attacked by Uganda People's Defence Force.
translation.lug: Era nti yali tasobola kwogera ku leediyo ye olw'okutya okulumbibwa aba UPDF.

translation.en: Commented that according to the Lord's Resistance Army culture only commanders are not allowed to eat ducks, mudfish, and malakwanga vegetables and that is why other soldiers have started eating them.
translation.lug: Yagamba nti okusinziira ku nnono za LRA, abaduumizi be bokka abatakkirizibwa kulya mbaata, mmamba, ne malakwanga, era nti eyo ye nsonga lwaki abajaasi abalala batandise okubirya.

translation.en: The Lord's Resistance Army  will continue to survive and carry out full time operations regardless of other Lord's Resistance Army soldiers   defecting to Uganda People's Defence Forces.
translation.lug: Eggye lya LRA lijja kweyongera okukola obulumbaganyi wadde nga waliwo abamu ku basirikale baalyo abalyabulidde ne beegatta ku UPDF.

translation.en: Planning and deploying for operations on camps to cause atrocities as instructed by Kony earlier.
translation.lug: Okukola enteekateeka n'okuyungula eggye okulumba enkambi okukolamu ebyambyone nga Kony bwe yali yalagira.

translation.en: In Kitgum are doing that is luring the commanders to come out especially Lukwiya.
translation.lug: Mu Kitgum bakola ebisendasenda abaduumizi okuvaayo naddala Lukwiya.

translation.en: He doesn’t want Abudema to know especially now that Abudema is a confidant of Kony.
translation.lug: Tayagala Abudema kumanya naddala kati nti Abudema mukwano gwa Kony nfanfe.

translation.en: They are immense and not unique to parambot breweries limited but common with any new player making a strike into a strong market.
translation.lug: Kirungi naye ekitongole kya parambot breweries limited si kye kyokka ekikikola naye kampuni nnyingi empya zikikola.

translation.en: There is a target of eight percent in two thousand ten.
translation.lug: Baluubirira okutuuka ku bitundu munaana ku buli kikumi mu 2010.

translation.en: I'm an early raiser from childhood.
translation.lug: Okuva mu buto mbadde nzuukuka ku makya nnyo.

translation.en: Most of the serious candidates were eliminated from the race and the opposition candidates that remained were actually escorts of Kagame.
translation.lug: Abasinga obungi ku abo abaali bamuvuganya abaali ku mulamwa baggibwa mu lwokaano n' abanafu abagoberera obugoberezi Kagame.

translation.en: In respect to Kagame, I think we need to go back to the history of this country.
translation.lug: Ku nsonga za Kagame, ndowooza twetaaga okuddayo mu byafaayo bya Rwanda.

translation.en: They formed an alliance arising from the Arusha accord.
translation.lug: Baakola omukago nga basinziira ku ndagaano y'e Arusha.

translation.en: As political entities, they were there.
translation.lug: Olw'okuba baali bannabyabufuzi abatongole, baaliyo.

translation.en: The difference is they decided to form an alliance with Railway Protection Force.
translation.lug: Eky'enjawulo, baasalawo okukola omukago ne Railway Protection Force.

translation.en: I know that three political parties went to register and they were denied either for legal reasons or for an institute reason.
translation.lug: Nkimanyi nti ebibiina by'obufuzi bisatu byagenda okwewandiisa naye ne bigaanibwa oboolyawo nga tebituukiriza bisaanyizo by'amateeka oba lwa nsonga ndala.

translation.en: We recently met one of them, the green party, and they gave us a briefing of their position.
translation.lug: Gye buvuddeko twasisinkana ab'ekimu ku bibiina ebyo, ekya langi eya kiragala, ne batubuulira kye balowooza.

translation.en: We hope that this will be the case in the future.
translation.lug: Ka tusuubire kino kijja kuba bwe kityo mu biseera eby'omu maaso.

translation.en: However, we are also saying clearly that in doing so, one has to take into account the careful approach.
translation.lug: Naye era tugamba nti mu kukola bw'atyo, omuntu alina okulowooza n'obwegendereza ku ngeri entuufu.

translation.en: There should be no repetition. We should not give one an opportunity, including to the media, given their history.
translation.lug: Tewasaanidde kubaawo kuddingana. Tetusaanidde kuwa muntu yenna kakisa nga mw'otwalidde ne bannamawulire, naddala bw'olowooza ku byafaayo.

translation.en: The former Tanzanian Prime Minister sat down with the Independent’s Managing Editor Andrew Mwenda.
translation.lug: Eyaliko katikkiro wa Tanzania yanyumyako ne  Andrew Mwenda, omusunsuzi w'olupapula lwa Independent.

translation.en: Salim was sent to Rwanda to lead the Commonwealth Observer Group.
translation.lug: Salim yatumibwa e Rwanda okukulemberamu abatunuulizi ba Commonwealth.

translation.en: President Kagame, as you said, was attracting large crowds.
translation.lug: Nga bwe wagambye, Pulezidenti Kagame, yali awagirwa abantu bangi.

translation.en: On the other hand, people say if you go in that party,"Kagame will attack you".
translation.lug: Ate era abantu bagamba nti bwe weeyunga ku kibiina ky'obufuzi gundi,"Kagame ajja kukulumba".

translation.en: It is not special for Rwanda that the ruling party had a superior position in the campaign.
translation.lug: Tekyewuunyisa mu Rwanda okuba nti ekibiina ekiri mu buyinza kiba kya nkizo mu kunoonya akalulu.

translation.en: We met with the Social Democratic Party, and we met with the Liberal party.
translation.lug: Twasisinkana ab'ekibiina kya Social Democratic Party era n'ab'ekibiina kya Liberal party.

translation.en: The lady from the People's Party of Canada party did not come.
translation.lug: Omukyala ow'ekibiina kya People's Party eky'omu Canada teyajja.

translation.en: For example, we met with the chairman of the Green party and he was very clear in his engagement.
translation.lug: Ng'ekyokulabirako, twasisinkana ssentebbe w'ekibiina kya Green era yali mulambukufu mu bye yayogera.

translation.en: We are going through that experience in Tanzania and Zanzibar.
translation.lug: Era tuyita mu mbeera y'emu mu Tanzania ne mu Zanzibar.

translation.en: Every time there is a rally, either by Chama Cha Mapinduzi or the Civic United Front, the language is different.
translation.lug: Buli lwe wabaawo olukungaana lw'eby'obufuzi olw'ekibiina kya Chama Cha Mapinduzi oba ekya Civic United Front, olulimi luba lwa njawulo.

translation.en: Since November last year, the language has been toned down.
translation.lug: Okuva mu mwaka ogwagwa, olulimi lukyuse.

translation.en: Is not something we should see as a problem? I am saying it is something that is happening in Rwanda.
translation.lug: Ekyo kiba tekifuuse kizibu? Kye ngamba kiri nti ekyo kyennyini kye kiri e Rwanda.

translation.en: I cannot generalize that what is happening in Rwanda may also happen elsewhere.
translation.lug: Sigamba nti ekigenda mu maaso e Rwanda kiyinza okubaawo n'awalala.

translation.en: But what happens when they have to vote in the secrecy of the ballot?  How come they vote for Kagame?
translation.lug: Naye ddala kiki ekibaawo mu kulonda nga tewali alaba? Kijja kitya nti balonda Kagame?

translation.en: I think there are limits and it would be unfortunate to underestimate the desires or the talent of the people of Rwanda.
translation.lug: Ndowooza nti tuba n'ekkomo era tetusaanidde kubuusa maaso kwagala na busobozi bantu b'omu Rwanda bwe balina.

translation.en: We went right into the masses and we saw their energy and how they reacted to what Kagame was saying.
translation.lug: Twagenda mu bantu era ne tumanya bye baalowooza ku ebyo Kagame bye yali agamba.

translation.en: Are you concerned that it has taken two days since the election to announce all the results?
translation.lug: Okifaako okuba nti kitutte ennaku bbiri nga tebannalangirira byonna ebyava mu kulonda?

translation.en: And I have seen their system here and they are supposed to announce within a maximum of five days.
translation.lug: Era ndabye enkola gye bagoberera nti tebalina kusussa nnaku ttaano nga bamaze okulangirira ebiba bivudde mu kulonda.

translation.en: In your assessment, was this ninty three percent we are hearing reflected at the polling centers?
translation.lug: Okusinziira ku kye walaba awalonderwa, ddala abantu abaalonda baaweza ebitundu 93 ku buli kikumi?

translation.en: Some of the electoral observers who were in Kigali for Presidential Polls held on August nineth
translation.lug: Abamu ku batunuulizi abaali mu Kigali okulondoola okulonda kwa pulezidenti okwaliwo nga Agusito 9

translation.en: President Paul Kagame casts his vote during the just concluded presidential elections.
translation.lug: Pulezidenti Paul Kagame asuulamu akalulu ke mu kulonda kwa pulezidenti okwaliwo gye buvuddeko awo.

translation.en: However, some agencies such as Saachi and Saachi or Mawad say they are hesitant to accept this work out of concern.
translation.lug: Kyokka ebitongole ebimu gamba nga Saachi and Saachi oba Mawad bigamba nti birinamu enkenyera okukkiriza omulimu ogwo olw'obweraliikirivu bwe birina.

translation.en: First we have been here for seven days.
translation.lug: Ekisooka kuno twakamalako ennaku musanvu.

translation.en: Therefore, they are just escorts of president Kagame.
translation.lug: N'olwekyo, balinga mperekeze buperekeze za Pulezidenti Kagame.

translation.en: Other parts of Tanzania where there is going to be a government of national unity after the elections.
translation.lug: Ebitundu ebirala ebya Tanzania awagenda okubeera gavumenti ya national unity oluvannyuma lw'okulonda.

translation.en: This is due to  been abuses and counter abuse from the ruling party Chama Cha Mapinduzi, where I belong, and the Civic United Front, which is extremely strong in Zanzibar.
translation.lug: Kino kivudde ku kuba nti ekibiina ekiri mu buyinza nange kyendimu ekya Chama Cha Mapinduzi n'ekya Civic United Front, eky'amaanyi ennyo mu Zanzibar, birinnyirira eddembe ly'obuntu.

translation.en: When you moved around the Kagame campaigns?
translation.lug: Bw'ogenda ku nkungaana Kagame z'akuba ng'anoonya akalulu?

translation.en: I do not buy the idea that the people of Rwanda, all these crowds that went to Gasabo were not energetic.
translation.lug: Sikkiriza nti abantu ba Rwanda, abo bonna abaagenda e Gasabo, tebajjumbira kulonda.

translation.en: To be able to understand the people of Rwanda can make up their mind.
translation.lug: Okusobola okutegeera nti abantu ba Rwanda beesalirawo.

translation.en: As election momentum builds in the country for National Resistance Movement primaries and the general election.
translation.lug: Ebbugumu mu kulonda bwe ligenda lyeyongera mu ggwanga mu kusunsula kwa National Resistance Movement primaries ne mu kulonda kw'eggwanga.

translation.en: Geoffrey Nyakana AmootiAmooti is competing again to become chairperson of the Kampala central division.
translation.lug: Geoffrey Nyakana Amooti azzeemu okwesimbawo ku bwa ssentebe bwa Kampala central division.

translation.en: Turkey is in business with East Africa.
translation.lug: Turkey ekola bizineesi n'ensi eziri mu buvanjuba bwa Afirika.

translation.en: The plane brings the airline’s fleet total to four aircraft, two CRJ-200 and two DC- 9s.
translation.lug: Bw'ogattako ennyonyi eyo, ennyonyi zonna awamu ziba nnya, bbiri ez'ekika kya CRJ-200 ne bbiri ez'ekika kya DC- 9s.

translation.en: Following the acquisition of the plane, the airline has introduced a new frequency along the Entebbe-Nairobi route.
translation.lug: Oluvannyuma lw'okugula ennyonyi eyo, kati omuwendo gw'ennyonyi eziva Entebbe okugenda e Nairobi oba okuva e Nirobi okugenda Entebbe zeeyongedde.

translation.en: The new route brings the number of flights the airline will operate from Entebbe to Nairobi on a weekly basis to fourteen.
translation.lug: Ekyo kitegeeza nti kati buli wiiki emirundi ena wabaawo ennyonyi eva Entebbe okugenda e Nairobi.

translation.en: At the end of February 2010, the airline launched daily flights between Entebbe and Kigali.
translation.lug: Ku nkomerero ya 2010, ekitongole ky'ennyonyi kyassaawo ennyonyi ezitambuza abasaabaze wakati wa Entebbe ne Kigali buli lunaku.

translation.en: Air Uganda started operations in November 2007.
translation.lug: Ekitongole ky'ennyonyi ekya Uganda kyatandika okukola mu Noovemba 2007.

translation.en: Air Uganda gets another Bombardier CRJ-200.
translation.lug: Ekitongole ky'ennyonyi ekya Uganda kyafuna ennyonyi ey'ekika kya Bombardier CRJ-200.

translation.en: Amongst the socialites, were numerous young talented actors, editors, screenwriters and directors who had all gathered to celebrate the success of Ugandan film.
translation.lug: Abamu ku abo abaakungaana okujaguza olw'ekyo Uganda kye yali etuuseeko mu kuzannya firimu mwe mwali bannakatemba bangi abato, abasunsuzi, abawandiisi, ne badayirekita.

translation.en: In the auditorium, people clamoured for seats for the showpiece of the night, a screening of IMANI.
translation.lug: Abantu bangi baanoonya ebifo aw'okutuula basobole okulaba firimu eyitibwa IMANI.

translation.en: IMANI was directed by Carol Kamya and other alumni from Maisha, an organization dedicated to providing training to Ugandan filmmakers.
translation.lug: Carol Kamya n'abalala okuva mu kitongole kya Maisha be baali badayirekita ba firimu ya IMANI era ekitongole ekyo kifuba okutendeka bannayuganda mu kukola firimu.

translation.en: The scenes are familiar to a Ugandan audience but actually seeing them onscreen, executed in such a professional manner, is wholly unfamiliar.
translation.lug: Ebyali mu firimu eyo byali si bipya nnyo eri Bannayuganda, naye okubiraba ku lutimbe nga bitegekeddwa mu ngeri ey'ekikugu kyali kipya nnyo.

translation.en: Inorder to understand the story properly it is important to go back to 2005 to when Mina Zair, acclaimed director of international hits such as Monsoon Wedding and The Namesake, established Maisha.
translation.lug: Kino okusobola okukitegeera, kikulu okuddayo ne tulowooza ku mwaka gwa 2005 ekibiina kya Maisha lwe kyatandikibwawo Mina Zair, eyali dayirekita wa firimu ezaakyaka ennyo mu nsi gamba nga Monsoon Wedding ne The Namesake.

translation.en: For years, Uganda has tended to import most of its culture, the hip hop, RnB and reggae that populates the charts is based on western music.
translation.lug: Uganda yamala emyaka mingi nga yeesigama nnyo ku nnyimba z'ebweru omuli hip hop, RnB ne reggae nga ze zisinga okukubwa.

translation.en: Sharpe Ssewali, a young screenwriter and director who is currently getting his film off the ground, says this phenomenon has to be stopped. .
translation.lug: Sharpe Ssewali, omuwandiisi era dayirekita omuto kati alina firimu ye gy'akolako, agamba nti enkola eyo erina okukoma.

translation.en: Kimanje Mark, the marketing manager for IMANI, cited the example of how Congolese music, another outside source, dominated in Uganda until ten or fifteen years ago.
translation.lug: Kimanje Mark, kitunzi wa firimu ya IMANI, yayogera ku ngeri ennyimba z'e Congolese gye zaali zeefuze Uganda okutuusa emyaka nga kkumi oba kkumi n'etaano emabega.

translation.en: Now the music scene is almost exclusively populated by Ugandan acts, many of them performing in their native tongue, and it remains a massively popular industry.
translation.lug: Naye kati ekisaawe ky'okuyimba kati kumpi kirimu bannayuganda bokka, nga bangi ku bo bayimba mu nnimi za wano era bettanirwa nnyo.

translation.en: Even the fact that IMANI, a relatively low-budget film made by several young Ugandan filmmakers, was shown at Cineplex, up against the enormous power and finances of Hollywood films shows that Ugandan film deserves its platform.
translation.lug: Okuba nti firimu ya IMANI, eyakolebwa Bannayudanga abato abawerako ku nsaasaanya entono, yalagibwa mu Cineplex, omulagibwa firimu ez'amaanyi eziteekebwamu ssente empitirivu gamba ng'eza Hollywood kiraga nti Bannayuganda basobola okuyingira mu bujjuvu mu kisaawe kya firimu.

translation.en: There are, however, some serious challenges to Ugandan filmmaking.
translation.lug: Naye waliwo okusoomooza mu kisaawe ky'okukola firimu mu Uganda.

translation.en: Matt Bish, a director and editor who previously worked in the Netherlands, says that even as someone who owns and manages his own studio, he has no proper way of controlling the distribution of his films.
translation.lug: Matt Bish, dayirekita era omusunsuzi eyakolerako mu Netherlands, agamba nti okufaananako omuntu alina era addukanya situdiyo ye ey'obwannanyini, kiba kizibu okufuga engeri firimu ze gye zibunyisibwamu.

translation.en: Thankfully, events like Maisha African Film festival and, the other great film event in Kampala, Amakula Film Festival, which has now been running for six years, are around to try and increase awareness of Ugandan films outside of pirated distribution.
translation.lug: Ekirungi kiri nti emikolo ng'egyo egitegekebwa aba Maisha African Film n'emirala egikwata ku firimu egitegekebwa mu Kampala aba Amakula Film Festival, kati egimaze emyaka mukaaga nga gitegekebwa gigendereddwa okumanyisa abantu ku firimu za Uganda awatali kuzibunyisa mu ngeri emenya amateeka.

translation.en: Amakula showcases reclaiming national culture for years, Uganda has tended to import most of its culture, the hip hop, RnB and reggae that populates the charts is based on Western music, the films that dominate Cineplex and get quickly copied and sold in Wandegeya or Kisementi are normally from the United States of America or India.
translation.lug: Okumala emyaka mingi aba Amakula bafubye okulwanirira obuwangwa bw'eggwanga, kubanga ennyimba ezisinga obungi mu Uganda omuli eza hip hop, RnB, ne reggae zibaddenga zitumbula buwangwa bwa bweru, era firimu ezisinga okulagibwa mu Cineplex abantu ne banguwa okuzikopa n'okuzitundira e Wandegeya oba ku Kisementi emirundi mingi zisibuka mu Amerika oba mu Buyindi.

translation.en: Before the ecstasies of the inaugural screening of the first African Film Festival at National Theatre, Maisha had been running a series of workshops where industry experts had been teaching young Ugandans techniques and tricks for how to put together a great movie.
translation.lug: Firimu y'oku lukalu lwa Afirika bwe yali tennaba kulagibwa mu National Theatre mulundi gusooka, aba Maisha baali bamaze ekiseera nga bategeka emisomo okubangula Bannayuganda mu bukodyo obw'okukola firimu.

translation.en: At the last workshop, run by American actor Giancarlo Esposito (The Usual Suspects, School Daze, Do The Right Thing), there was a packed room of aspiring actors and actresses who soaked up Mr Esposito’s remarkable passion and sensible advice.
translation.lug: Omusomo ogwasembayo ogwategekebwa omuzannyi wa firimu Omumerika Giancarlo Esposito (eyazannya The Usual Suspects, School Daze, Do The Right Thing), gwajumbirwa nnyo abantu bangi abaali baagala okufuuka abazannyi ba firimu abaassaayo ennyo omwoyo ku ebyo Mw. Esposito bye yayogera ne ku magezi amalungi ge yawa.

translation.en: One of the people he touched with his workshop was Peace Among, a twenty four year old actress who first started performing in plays at school.
translation.lug: Omu ku bantu abaakwatibwako omusomo ogwo yali Peace Among, omuzannyi w'emizannyo ow'emyaka 24 nga yasooka kugizannya ng'akyasoma.

translation.en: Just like several other young people involved in the burgeoning film industry here, Among studied an unrelated subject at university, Journalism, others had done Civil Engineering, Architecture and even Biological Science before realising that she had to follow her passion.
translation.lug: Okufaananako abavubuka abalala abali mu kisaawe ky'okuzannya firimu ekitandese okukula mu Uganda, Among yasomerera bintu birala ku yunivasite, yasomerera bya mawulire, ate abalala baali baasomerera bya kuzimba, bya kukuba pulaani, n'ebirala, naye oluvannyuma Amongo yakiraba nti yalina okukola ekyo ky'asinga okwagala.

translation.en: Among says her real passion is acting and that it will take her all the way to Hollywood, a line that is said with a laugh but with an undercurrent of determination that seems firmly rooted in everyday life.
translation.lug: Among agamba nti asinga kwagala kuzannya firimu era nti ekyo kijja kumutuusa ne mu Hollywood; ekyo yakyogera aseka naye ng'alaga obumalirivu era obumalirivu bwe bweyolekera ne mu by'akola mu bulamu bwe obwa bulijjo.

translation.en: The platform provided by excellent teaching at Maisha combined with the incredible passion and support of the young Ugandans who want to make films stands them in good stead.
translation.lug: Okutendekebwa okulungi ennyo okuva mu kibiina kya Maisha, okwagala Bannayuganda abato kwe balina mu kuzannya firimu, n'obuwagizi bwe bafuna bijja kubayamba nnyo.

translation.en: What is more, this is a country in which there are many stories to tell, the international success of The Last King of Scotland is a prime example of this, most of which remain untold.
translation.lug: Okugatta ku ekyo, Uganda erina ebintu bingi ebisobola okwogerwako n'okulagibwa n'etutumuka, nga bwe kyali ku firimu ya The Last King of Scotland eyasigala nga waliwo bingi ebitalagiddwa.

translation.en: The more this energy that surrounds filmmaking in Uganda lasts the more likely high quality films such as IMANI or Bish’s Battle Of The Souls, will be produced.
translation.lug: Singa amaanyi agateereddwa mu kukola firimu mu Uganda tegakendeera, tujja kusobola okulaba nga firimu endala ez'omutindo ogwa waggulu gamba nga IMANI oba Bish’s Battle Of The Souls, nga zikolebwa.

translation.en: Trust and public awareness of Ugandan filmmaking will consequently grow, creating more opportunities and, finally a proper industry.
translation.lug: Abantu bajja kweyongera okwettanira n'okumanya ebikwata ku kukola firimu mu Uganda era ekisaawe kya firimu kijja kweyongera okukula kiggumire.

translation.en: “Whenever people see a really good Ugandan film there’s a lot of excitement about it, people think  yeah, we can really do this!’” says Bish.
translation.lug: Bish agamba nti “Buli abantu lwe balaba firimu ya Bannayuganda ennungi basanyuka nnyo era bagamba nti ddala naffe tusobola okuzannya obulungi firimu!’”

translation.en: Having that belief is one of the big issues for funding because these companies don’t believe that Ugandans can actually make something good.
translation.lug: Obwesige obwo bukulu Bannayuganda bwe baba ba kuweebwa ssente kubanga kampuni eziteekamu ssente tezikkiriza nti Bannayuganda basobola okukola ekintu kyonna ekirungi.

translation.en: This is the dream of those young filmmakers who stood and applauded Ms Nair’s message.
translation.lug: Ekyo kye kirooto abakozi ba firimu abato abasituka ne bakubira Nair engalo kye balina.

translation.en: As ironic as it may seem, this is the type of guy who appeals to the average Ugandan female.
translation.lug: Ono ye musajja asobola okusikiriza kumpi buli mukazi Munnayuganda.

translation.en: Unlike some Ugandan men, they are easy to identify from their arrogant behaviour while in public places especially average to high class eatouts or entertainment spots.

translation.en: Air Uganda received CRJ-200, its second bombardier, last week.
translation.lug: Wiiki ewedde, ekitongole kya Uganda eky'ennyonyi kyafuna ennyonyi ey'ekika kya CRJ-200, ng'eno ye bombardier ey'okubiri gye balina.

translation.en: Foris Telecom launches 4G internet.
translation.lug: Ekitongole kya Foris Telecom kitongoza Intaneeti ya 4G.

translation.en: IMANI depicts a day in the life of three Ugandans, a child soldier returning home, a maid desperate to help her friend and a young breakdancer trying to follow his dreams.
translation.lug: Firimu ya IMANI eraga obulamu bwa Bannayuganda basatu, omwana eyayingizibwa mu magye ng'akomawo awaka, omukozi wa waka ayagala ennyo okuyamba mukwano gwe, n'omuzinyi omuto agezaako okutuuka ku birooto bye.

translation.en: Ms Zair stated publically on opening night, “If we don’t tell our own stories, no one else will".
translation.lug: Ku lunaku olwasooka, Muky. Zair yagamba abawuliriza nti, “Bwe tutabuulira balala bitukwatako, tewali ajja kubibabuulira".

translation.en: The films that dominate Cineplex and get quickly copied and sold in Wandegeya or Kisementi are normally from the USA or India, even something as simple as what people wear everyday is, by and large, far from Ugandan in origin.
translation.lug: Firimu ezisinga okulagibwa mu Cineplex era ezikopebwa amangu ne zitundibwa e Wandegeya ku Kisementi ziteera kuba za Bamerika oba Bayindi, n'ekintu ekirabika ng'ekitono gamba ng'ebyo abantu bye baambala buli lunaku, biba byawukana nnyo ku bya Bannayuganda.

translation.en: "It’s time Africa exported its culture to the rest of the world,” he reasons.
translation.lug: Agamba nti "Kye kiseera Afirika okubunyisa obuwangwa bwayo ne mu mawanga amalala mu nsi.”

translation.en: Uganda's film movement is providing entertainment and showcasing East African talent as well as bringing international films, although some have criticised the festival for placing too much emphasis on the latter, to the attention of the general public.
translation.lug: Ekisaawe kya firimu mu Uganda kisanyusa abantu era kitumbula ebitone by'abantu abali mu nsi z'omu Buvanjuba bwa Afirika, nga mw'otwalidde n'okubaleetera firimu ez'amawanga amalala, wadde ng'ekyo abamu bakyemulugunyaako nga bagamba nti batumbula nnyo firimu ez'amawanga amalala.

translation.en: She models in Nairobi and has just released a single under her stage name Peace "The Luo".
translation.lug: Modo mu kibuga Nairobi era yaakafulumya alubaamu ya singo mu mannya ga Peace "The Luo" g'akozesa ku siteegi .

translation.en: It isn’t easy to survive as a performer in Uganda and it takes a special kind of commitment, a type of courage to do so.
translation.lug: Mu Uganda si kyangu kumalako mu kisaawe ky'okusanyusa abantu naye kyetaagisa obumalirivu n'obuvumu okusobola okutuuka ku buwanguzi.

translation.en: The National Theatre was filled with activity and excitement on Aug 13, the opening night of the inaugural Maisha African Film Festival.
translation.lug: Ku lunaku lwe baatongoza Maisha African Film Festival nga Agusito 13, National Theatre yakubako abantu era buli omu yali mucamufu.

translation.en: The public is frustrated by the fact that it is very difficult to find films other than the latest big Hollywood blockbusters.
translation.lug: Abantu beemulugunya ku ky'okuba nti kizibu okufuna firimu endala okuggyako ezo eza Hollywood.

translation.en: I cannot continue with joint campaigns because they are fraught with irregularities of bribery which is contrary to the National Resistance Movement election guidelines.
translation.lug: Sikyayinza kweyongerayo na kakuyege ono kubanga ajjudde obulyi bw'enguzi ate ng'ekyo kikontana n'ennono za NRM ezikwata ku by'okulonda.

translation.en: Baguma Isoke is the National Resistance Movement parliamentary aspirant for Buyanja County.
translation.lug: Baguma Isoke ye yeesimbyewo ku lwa NRM ku kifo ky'omubaka wa paliyamenti owa Buyanja County.

translation.en: First of all there is no need on the part of any candidate to waste time on whether people should elect President Museveni.
translation.lug: Ekisookera ddala, tekyetaagisa kumala budde bantu kukubaganya birowoozo obanga balonda Pulezidenti Museveni.

translation.en: In fact President Museveni can be summed up as a president for poverty and corruption.
translation.lug: Mu butuufu, kisobola okugambibwa nti Pulezidenti Museveni pulezidenti wa bwavu na bulyi bwa nguzi.

translation.en: President Kizza Besigye says child kidnap and terrorism are enjoined because terrorists get their money through ransom and then fund their terror attacks.
translation.lug: Pulezidenti Kizza Besigye agamba nti okuwamba abaana n'obwannalukalala bitambulira wamu kubanga bannalukalala ssente ze bakozesa bazifuna mu kuwamba baana ne basaba bannanyini bo ssente.

translation.en: The Inspector General is Major General Kale Kayihura.
translation.lug: Insipekita Genero ye Meja Genero Kale Kayihura.

translation.en: Public Health Alliance, a health advocacy group continues to talk about corruption but nothing happens.
translation.lug: Ekitongole kya Public Health Alliance kyeyongedde okwogera ku bulyi bw'enguzi naye tewali kikoleddwawo.

translation.en: Netherlands Ambassador to Uganda, Jeroen Verheul says the hypocrisy with which the Uganda Police Defense Force approach the issue of senseless civilian deaths in their military escapades is tasteless, sadistic and dangerous.
translation.lug: Omubaka wa Netherlands mu Uganda agamba nti obunnanfuusi obuli mu ngeri poliisi ya Uganda gy'ekwatamu abantu abaleetawo obujagalalo obuviirako abantu bangi okuttibwa bubi era bwa bulabe.

translation.en: Why would the Uganda Police Defence Force be in exchanges of fire in which children die?
translation.lug: Lwaki aba poliisi mu Uganda bwe baba balwanagana n'abantu battiramu n'abaana?

translation.en: Niccolo Machiavelli says the desire for freedom resides in every human heart.
translation.lug: Niccolo Machiavelli agamba nti eky'okwagala eddembe kiri mu mutima gwa buli muntu.

translation.en: George W. Bush, addressing the United Nations General Assembly on September 21, 2004 saying that in his country we go to prison first and then become President.
translation.lug: George W. Bush, bwe yali ayogera mu lukungaana lw'ekitongole ky'Amawanga Amagatte nga Ssebutemba 21, 2004 yagamba nti mu nsi ye omuntu asooka kugenda mu kkomera n'alyoka afuuka pulezidenti.

translation.en: Nelson Mandela upon becoming South Africa’s first Black president after 27 years in prison on orders of the apartheid government.
translation.lug: Nelson Mandela ng'afuuse pulezidenti wa South Africa omuddugavu eyasooka oluvannyuma lw'okumala emyaka 27 mu kkomera ng'asibiddwa gavumenti y'abasosoze.

translation.en: Last week Uganda People's Congress President Olara Otunnu announced that his party had pulled out of the Interparty Cooperation.
translation.lug: Wiiki ewedde, Olara Otunnu pulezidenti wa UPC yalangirira nti ekibiina kye kivudde mu mukago gw'ebibiina by'obufuzi.

translation.en: Fourteen police officers have been arrested for suspected looting of cargo they had salvaged from a burning trailer in Jinja on its way to Kampala from Mombasa.
translation.lug: Abapoliisi 14 bakwatiddwa olw'okuteeberezebwa okubba eby'amaguzi mu kiroole ekyakwata omuliro e Jinja nga kiva Mombasa kidda Kampala.

translation.en: A lady translates for the deaf during the launch of the report about the plight of disabled people at Grand Imperial Hotel on August 26.
