translation.lug: Omukazi ng'ataputira kiggala, lipoota ekwata ku bantu abaliko obulemu bwe yali esomebwa ku Grand Imperial Hotel nga Agusito 26.

translation.en: Dr Kizza Besigye and fellow contenders were at the Interparty Cooperation conference at Namboole Stadium on August 31 when he was announced the joint presidential candidate for 2011 elections.
translation.lug: Dr Kizza Besigye ne be yali yeesimbyewo nabo ku lukungaana lw'ekibiina ekigatta ebibiina by'obufuzi mu kisaawe ky'e Namboole nga Agusito 31 bwe yalangirirwa ng'omu ku baali basimbiddwawo okuvuganya ku bwapulezidenti mu kulonda kwa 2011.

translation.en: Museveni is immovable was written by author John Ruganda in his novel The Floods.
translation.lug: Mu kitabo ekiyitibwa The Floods kye yawandiika, John Ruganda yagamba nti Museveni talina gy'adda.

translation.en: It happened in the 1970s when Idi Amin declared he would eat for life until he was herded out like a stubborn bull in a kraal in 1979.
translation.lug: Kyaliwo mu myaka gya 1970 Idi Amin bwe yagamba nti agenda kufuga obulamu bwe bwonna okutuusa lwe yasindiikirizibwa mu 1979 ng'ente esindiikirizibwa okuva mu kiraalo.

translation.en: In 2005, President Museveni removed presidential term limits from the constitution to make the period of eating well indefinite.
translation.lug: Mu 2005, Pulezidenti Museveni yaggyawo ekkomo ku bisanja bya pulezidenti asobole obutaba na kkomo ku kiseera ky'anaamala ng'alya bulungi.

translation.en: In fact for this reason Uganda has never relinquished leadership peacefully since independence.
translation.lug: Mu butuufu eyo ye nsonga lwaki okuva lwe twafuna obwetwaze, mu Uganda obufuzi tebukyukangako mu mirembe.

translation.en: While in other countries leadership is changed by the ballot, in Uganda it looks it will be changed by either the inevitable fate of age or any other unpreventable occurrence.
translation.lug: Wadde nga mu nsi endala omufuzi akyusibwa kalulu, kirabika mu Uganda omufuzi ajja kukyusibwa lwa myaka gye oba ekintu ekirala ekiteebeereka.

translation.en: Just on August 28th while commissioning the regional office for people with disabilities in Mbarara, President Museveni declared that he is not going anywhere.
translation.lug: Wano jjuuzi nga Agusito 28, bwe yali atongoza ofiisi y'abantu abaliko obulemu e Mbarara, Pulezidenti Museveni yagamba nti talina gy'adda.

translation.en: It has always been perceived that Museveni is a manager running an enterprise called Uganda on behalf of its thirty three million shareholders on a contract renewable every five years through elections.
translation.lug: Kati Museveni atwalibwa nga maneja addukanya kampuni eyitibwa Uganda ku lw'abantu obukadde 33 abagirinamu emigabo naye nga kontulakiti ye ezzibwa buggya buli luvannyuma lw'emyaka 5 okuyitira mu kulonda.

translation.en: Just on Stretcher Road between Ntinda and Nakawa at 4am, tragedy struck claiming six lives of estimated fifteen occupants mainly youthful undergraduates and other students.
translation.lug: Ku ssaawa 10 ez'ekiro, emmotoka eyalimu abantu nga 15 yagwa ku kabenje ku luguudo oluva e Ntinda okuda e Nakawa abantu mukaaga ne bafa, ng'okusingira ddala baali bayizi ba yunivasite n'abayizi abalala.

translation.en: Their car overturned several times as they were returning from Club Palui, a popular night spot in Kampala.
translation.lug: Emmotoka gye baalimu yeevulungula emirundi egiwerako bwe baali bava ku kiraabu Palui, emmanyiddwa ennyo okubeeramu abantu ekiro mu Kampala.

translation.en: Those who succumbed to the cruel hand of death are: Washington Agondua, Isaac Edobo, Juma Rashid, Dan Babuwa, Imran Abdu and Innocent Yoti.
translation.lug: Abaafa be bano: Washington Agondua, Isaac Edobo, Juma Rashid, Dan Babuwa, Imran Abdu, ne Innocent Yoti.

translation.en: Vincent Opio, Jacqueline Asero, Akuya Qin Inid, Moses Anguyo and Francis Arua suffered grievous bodily injuries and were still recuperating at Mulago Hospital by press time.
translation.lug: Vincent Opio, Jacqueline Asero, Akuya Qin Inid, Moses Anguyo, ne Francis Arua baafuna ebisago eby'amaanyi era baali bajjanjabirwa mu ddwaliro ly'e Mulago.

translation.en: Remember Uganda has the second highest road carnage on the continent after Ethiopia.
translation.lug: Kijjukire nti Uganda y'eddirira Esiyopiya mu nsi za Afirika esizingayo okubaamu obubenje.

translation.en: The Uganda People's Congress announced it had pulled out of the Inter Party Cooperation.
translation.lug: Ekibiina kya UPC kyalangirira nti kivudde mu mukago ogugatta awamu ebibiina by'obufuzi.

translation.en: The Uganda People's Congress cited lack of transparency, accountability and deviating from the collective position initially agreed upon.
translation.lug: UPC yagamba nti temwali bwerufu era nti abaalimu baali bavudde ku mulamwa gwe bakkiriziganyaako.

translation.en: The Uganda People's Congress  was part and parcel of the founding of Inter Party Cooperation.
translation.lug: Aba UPC be bamu ku baatandikawo omukago gw'ebibiina by'obufuzi.

translation.en: However president Olara Otunnu said his party would be willing to work with its former partners  within a broader framework of the national democratisation process.
translation.lug: Naye pulezidenti Olara Otunnu yagamba nti yali mwetegefu okukolera awamu n'ebibiina ebirala mu kuleetawo demokulasiya mu ggwanga.

translation.en: The Uganda People's Congress instead will now partner with Civil Society Organisations, religious institutions and pressure groups to push for free and fair elections.
translation.lug: Era yagamba nti kati ekibiina kya UPC kyali kijja kusinga kukolagana ne bibiina ebikola ku mbeera z'abantu, ebibiina by'obufuzi, n'ebibiina ebyagala okuleetawo enkyukakyuka, okulaba nti wabaawo okulonda okw'obwenkanya.

translation.en: Uganda People's Congress exit  started a fortnight ago when the other cooperating parties nominated their flag bearers to compete for the joint candidate for 2011.
translation.lug: Aba UPC baasalawo okuva mu mukago wiiki bbiri emabega ebibiina ebirala bwe byamala okulonda eyandibikiikiridde mu kuvuganya ku bwa pulezidenti mu 2011.

translation.en: Even then, accusations were flying high that the Forum for Democratic Change was planning to take the  presidency through fraudulent means.
translation.lug: Mu kiseera ekyo, waaliwo abaali balumirizza FDC nti yali mu nteekateeka ez'okukozesa olukujjukujju okulya obwa pulezidenti.

translation.en: Forum for Democratic Change was also being accused of lack of transparency and  manipulation.
translation.lug: Era baali balumiriza FDC olw'obutaba na bwerufu n'olw'okukozesa abalala okutuukiriza ebigendererwa byayo.

translation.en: A lady casts her vote during the National Resistance Movement primaries at Kireka Rehabilitation Centre on August 30.
translation.lug: Omukyala omu ng'asuula akalulu ke mu kulonda kwa NRM okw'okusunsulamu e Kireka Rehabilitation Centre nga August 30.

translation.en: Mpanga GrowersTea Factory was responsible for the minutes of the Inter Party Cooperation and being insensitive to the politics of the country.
translation.lug: Ekkolero lya Mpanga Growers Tea Factory lye lyavunaanyizibwanga ku byayogerwangako mu nkungaana za Inter Party Cooperation n'olw'obutafaayo ku by'obufuzi by'eggwanga.

translation.en: Otunnu’s cabinet was also opposed to their leader participating in the ongoing nomination of the joint Inter Party Cooperation presidential candidate.
translation.lug: Kabineeti ya Otunnu yawakanya n'eky'omukulembeze waabwe okwenyigira mu kusunsula aneesimbawo mu kulonda kw'obwa pulezidenti okwategekebwa Inter Party Cooperation.

translation.en: A senior official claimed Forum for Democratic Change is trying to force the Uganda People's Congress to join the  presidency nominations.
translation.lug: Omukungu omu yagamba nti FDCA egezaako okukaka UPC okwenyigira mu kulonda abaneesimbawo ku bwa pulezidenti.

translation.en: The Head of the Inter Party Cooperation Secretariat Dr Frank Nabwiso described Uganda People's Congress decision to quit the opposition alliance.
translation.lug: Dr Frank Nabwiso akulira Inter Party Cooperation Secretariat yayogera ku kya UPC okusalawo okuva mu mukago gw'ebibiina ebivuganya gavumenti.

translation.en: It is unfortunate that Uganda People's Congress has reached that decision.
translation.lug: Kyannaku nti UPC yasalawo bw'etyo.

translation.en: Uganda People's Congress has always been at the forefront of inter party cooperation right from 1962.
translation.lug: Okuva mu 1962, UPC ebadde ku mwanjo nnyo mu mukago gw'ebibiina.

translation.en: In 1979 during the Moshi conference, again Uganda People's Congress was very instrumental and also played a major role in the politics in the 1980.
translation.lug: Mu 1979 mu lukungaana olwali e Moshi, UPC era yalina kinene kye yakola era yalina ekifo kikulu mu by'obufuzi mu 1980.

translation.en: He said Uganda People's Congress had pulled out of a scientific struggle.
translation.lug: Yagamba nti UPC yava mu kuvuganya okwalimu ebibalo.

translation.en: He said that all the issues that the Uganda People's Congress raised had all been discussed during the summit meetings and found to have no merit.
translation.lug: Yagamba nti ensonga zonna UPC ze yaleeta zaali zoogeddwako mu lukungaana era ne kizuulwa nti tezaalimu ggumba.

translation.en: The Al-Shabaab struck Mogadishu on Aug 25 and threatened to overrun the presidential palace.
translation.lug: Aba Al-Shabaab baalumba ekibuga Mogadishu nga Agusito 25 era ne batiisatiisa okuwamba amaka g'obwa pulezidenti.

translation.en: The onslaught continued until African Union peacekeepers, comprised of Ugandan and Burundians intervened to rescue the Somali government.
translation.lug: Embeera eyo yeeyongera okutuusa abasirikale b'ekibiina ekigatta amawanga ga Afirika omwali abasirikale ba Ugandan ne Burundi bwe baayingira mu nsonga okutaasa gavumenti ya Somali.

translation.en: The AlShabaab extended the war theatre from Mogadishu to Kampala on July 11 and killed more than 76 people who were watching the World Cup finals.
translation.lug: Aba Al-Shabaab baagaziya eddwaniro lyabwe ne liba nga kati liva Mogadishu okutuukira ddala e Kampala era nga Jjulaayi 11 baakola obulumbaganyi mu Kampala ne batta abantu abasukka mu 76 abaali balaba empaka z'ekikopo ky'ensi yonna ez'akamalirizo.

translation.en: When they finally met at Munyonyo Resort, they did not even just resolve, they vowed to send more peace keeping troops to Somalia.
translation.lug: Bwe baasisinkana e Munyonyo Resort, tebaasalawo busazi, naye baamalirira okwongera ku bajaasi be basindika e Somalia okukuuma emirembe.

translation.en: More than a month after the pledge, the terrorists are still wreaking havoc in Somalia and even threatening to take over the interim government.
translation.lug: Nga wayise omwezi ogusukka mu gumu oluvannyuma lw'amawanga ago okukola obweyamo obwo, abatujju bakyatigomya Somalia era batiisatiisa n'okuwamba gavumenti ey'ekiseera.

translation.en: In fact, if the Ugandan and Burundian troops did not intervene, probably there would be no government for African Union to protect in Mogadishu.
translation.lug: Mu butuufu, singa amaggye ga Uganda n'aga Burundi tegaayingira mu nsonga, oboolyawo wandibadde tewali gavumenti maggye g'amawanga amalala gye gandibadde geetaaga kukuuma mu Mogadishu.

translation.en: What are the African Union member states who pledged troops to Somalia waiting for?
translation.lug: Kiki amawanga ga Afirika agaali geeyama okusinda amaggye mu Somalia kye galindirira?

translation.en: Where are the troops you pledged for Mogadishu during the African Union summit in Kampala after  terror attacks?
translation.lug: Amaggye ge mweyama okusindika mu Mogadishu nga muli mu lukungaana lw'ekibiina ekigatta amawanga ga Afirika olwali mu Kampala oluvannyuma lw'obulumbaganyi bw'abatujju galiwa?

translation.en: On 4th August 2010 Kenyans ratified a new constitution via a referendum, and they gave at least nominal support to devolution of political power in a way that isn’t really federalism.
translation.lug: Nga Agusito 4, 2010, Bannakenya baakola enkyukakyuka mu ssemateeka okuyitira mu referendamu era tebaawagira nnyo nsonga ya kuwaayo buyinza mu ngeri etali ya Federo.

translation.en: Love and fear can hardly exist together, if we must choose between them, it is far safer to be feared than loved.
translation.lug: Okwagala n'okutya tebitera kutambulira wamu, bwe tuba ab'okulondako kimu, kisingako okutiibwa okusinga okwagalibwa.

translation.en: This is what happened on August 28 when a group of young people comprising mainly students were returning from a night club in Ntinda.
translation.lug: Kino kye kyaliwo nga Agusito 28 ekibinja ky'abavubuka abamu bwe kyali kiva mu kifo awasanyukirwa e Ntinda.

translation.en: The African Union needs to get a little more serious and graduate from political rhetoric to political action.
translation.lug: Abali mu kibiina ekigatta amawanga ga Afirika basaanidde okukolera ku bye boogera mu kifo ky'okubyogerako obwogezi.

translation.en: Federalism will not work in Uganda today for the same reason something similar just might work in Kenya.
translation.lug: Eky'okuba nti enkola eyeefananyiriza federo eyinza okukola mu Kenya tekitegeeza nti enkola ya federo esobola okukola mu Uganda leero.

translation.en: The difference is that in Kenya there are powerful challengers to the authority of the state.
translation.lug: Enjawulo eriwo eri nti mu Kenya abawakanya gavumentii ba maanyi.

translation.en: As pressure on the Kenyan government mounted, the government could have closed ranks to defend its power against honest businesses.
translation.lug: Akazito bwe keeyongera okuteekebwa ku gavumenti ya Kenya, gavumenti yandibadde yeegatta wamu n'abalala okukuuma obuyinza bw'erina ku bizineesi ezikolebwa mu bwesimbu.

translation.en: In Uganda, by difference, there is almost no pressure on the centre to reform.
translation.lug: Mu Uganda, kumpi tewali kazito konna kasobola kuteekebwa ku gavumenti ya wakati kugireetera kukola nkyukakyuka.

translation.en: The last experiment with giving real power to local government failed after ninteen ninty three.
translation.lug: Omulundi ogwasembayo okugezaako okuwa gavumenti z'ebitundu obuyinza obwa nnamaddala mu 1993 ebintu tebyatambula bulungi.

translation.en: Until last year Kenya had two hundred fifty four districts but now has forty six.
translation.lug: Omwaka oguwedde we gwatuukira, Kenya yalina disitulikiti 254 naye kati erina 64.

translation.en: The population of Kenya is about forty million people.
translation.lug: Abantu mu Kenya bali ng'obukadde 40.

translation.en: Each of Kenya’s sixty four districts can thus muster an average of around one point four billion dollars.
translation.lug: Ekyo kitegeeza nti buli emu ku disitulikiti za Kenya 64 esobola okukungaanya doola akawumbi kamu mu obukadde bina.

translation.en: But the point is that it was precisely this power which forced the new constitution through Kenya’s parliament in April.
translation.lug: Amaanyi ago ge gaasobozesa okusindiikiriza paliyamenti ya Kenya okuyisa ssemateeka omuggya mu Apuli.

translation.en: It is different here in Uganda.
translation.lug: Kya njawulo mu Uganda.

translation.en: Uganda has one hundred one districts with ten others waiting approval.
translation.lug: Uganda erina disitulikiti 101 era n'endala 10 zirindiridde kutongozebwa.

translation.en: Uganda’s population is around thirty three million people.
translation.lug: Abantu mu Uganda bali ng'obukadde 33.

translation.en: Those one hundred one districts account for about four hundred sixteen million dollars and three hundred twenty seven thousand people on average in economic and political power.
translation.lug: Disitulikiti ezo 101 zikozesa doola ng'obukadde 416 era okutwalira awamu zirimu abantu nga 327,000 abali mu by'obusuubuzi ne mu by'obufuzi.

translation.en: It is easier to see how civil society in Uganda is less able to balance the power of the state than it is in Kenya.
translation.lug: Kyangu okulaba ensonga lwaki mu Uganda kizibu okukoma ku buyinza bwa gavumenti nga bwe kiri e Kenya.

translation.en: This means that the most urgent task of the Ugandan federalist is not the winning of an election.
translation.lug: Ekyo kitegeeza nti omulimu ogusinga obukulu Bannayuganda abaagala federo gwe balina si gwa kuwangula kalulu.

translation.en: State House is strong enough to push Parliament to do its' bidding.
translation.lug: Pulezidenti alina obuyinza bungi ne kiba nti asobola okuleetera paliyamenti okusalawo nga bw'ayagala.

translation.en: There is six point five percent inflation adjusted economic growth.
translation.lug: Eby'enfuna bikulira ku bitundu mukaaga n'obutundutundu butaano ku buli kikumi.

translation.en: That so little of this benefits the starving farmers of Kotido or the struggling shopkeepers of Fort Portal.
translation.lug: Ekyo kiganyula kitono abalimi abayala abali mu Kotido oba abatunda mu dduuka abaavu abali e Fort Portal.

translation.en: A serious devolution of power similar to but more complete than the efforts of the ninteen ninty three Decentralisation Programme.
translation.lug: Okuwaayo obuyinza mu bujjuvu, so si nga bwe kyali mu 1993.

translation.en: Michael Madill is Adjunct Professor of Political Science,Department of Historical and Policy Studies, Oakton Community College United states of America.
translation.lug: Michael Madill ye Adjunct Professor of Political Science, Department of Historical and Policy Studies, Oakton Community College United states of America.

translation.en: Why federalism can work in Kenya but fail in Uganda by Andrew M.
translation.lug: Lwaki federo esobola okukola mu Kenya naye n'egaana mu Uganda, kyawandiikibwa Andrew M.

translation.en: The judgment marked a major and symbolic watershed in Uganda’s democratisation process.
translation.lug: Ekyasalibwawo kyalaga nti waaliwo enkyukakyuka ey'amaanyi mu lugendo lwa Uganda olwa demokulasiya.

translation.en: For almost a century, the law of rebellion has been used by successive regimes in Uganda to stifle free speech.
translation.lug: Okumala emyaka nga 100, etteeka erikwata ku kujeemera gavumenti libadde likozesebwa abakulembeze mu Uganda okumalako abantu eddembe ly'okwogera.

translation.en: Uganda have continually retreated to this law to stifle democratic expression in this country.
translation.lug: Abakulembeze mu Uganda bazze beekwasa etteeka lino okumalako abantu mu ggwanga eddembe ly'okwogera.

translation.en: The main celebrants of the judgment were journalists because we have born the biggest brunt of this law.
translation.lug: Abaasinga okusanyukira okusalawo okwo baali bannamawulire kubanga be basinze okunyigirizibwa etteeka eryo.

translation.en: The Nataional Resistance Movement government and President Yoweri Museveni specifically should celebrate too.
translation.lug: Gavumenti ya NRM ne Pulezidenti Yoweri Museveni nabo ekyo basaanidde okukisanyukira ennyo.

translation.en: In Uganda, the president is not born but elected.
translation.lug: Mu Uganda, omuntu tazaalibwa nga pulezidenti naye alondebwa bulondebwa.

translation.en: The cancellation of the law by the courts was a major national news item and was carried on all major news networks across the world.
translation.lug: Kooti okusazzaamu etteeka eryo gaali mawulire ga maanyi mu ggwanga lyonna ne ku mikutu gy'amawulire egy'amaanyi mu nsi yonna.

translation.en: The National Resistance Movement should have taken this credit by arguing that it has established independent courts that are actively promoting democracy.
translation.lug: NRM yali esobola okwewaana olw'ekyo ekyaliwo ng'egamba nti ye yassaawo kooti z'amateeka ezeetengeredde ezitumbula demokulasiya.

translation.en: But it reflects the National Resistance Movement  in the light as a regime hold onto an anti-democratic colonial relic.
translation.lug: Naye ekyo kiraga nti gavumenti ya NRM ekyatambulira mu bigere bya gavumenti endala ezizze zitatambulira ku nkola ya demokulasiya.

translation.en: Going to court to challenge certain laws that are inconsistent with the constitution publicized in ninteen nity five.
translation.lug: Okugenda mu kooti okuwakanya amateeka agamu agatakwatagana na ssemateeka wa 1995.

translation.en: We were only helping advance the nation-building process apparently set in motion by the National Resistance Movement.
translation.lug: Twali tuyambako buyambi mu kaweefube ow'okuzimba eggwanga ayinza okuba nga yatandikibwa NRA.

translation.en: Therefore the National Resistance Movement government should have joined journalists to celebrate the victory.
translation.lug: N'olwekyo aba NRM bandibadde beegatta ku bannamawulire okujjaguza obuwanguzi obwali butuukiddwako.

translation.en: Since it came to office, the National Resistance Movement has not abolish a single anti-democratic law.
translation.lug: Okuva lwe yajja mu buyinza, gavumenti ya NRM teggyangawo wadde etteeka erimu eritali lya dimokulasiya.

translation.en: Yet overall, the National Resistance Movement is fighting yesterday’s war.
translation.lug: Naye ate okutwalira wamu, NRM erwana ntalo za mabega.

translation.en: For increasingly, newspapers are dying in Uganda.
translation.lug: Empapula z'amawulire zifaafaaganira mu Uganda.

translation.en: However, since Uganda was connected by fiber-optic cable to the ocean, the technological foundation of a free media is uniting.
translation.lug: Kyokka okuva Uganda lwe yayungibwa ku layini za fiber-optic eziyita mu guyanja, kyongedde okuwa bannamawulire eddembe okuyitira mu tekinologiya.

translation.en: First, over half a million Ugandans are visiting the internet daily.
translation.lug: Ekisooka, Bannayuganda abasukka mu mitwalo ataano bakozesa Intaneeti buli lunaku.

translation.en: By two thousand fifteen, internet access is going to cost only five percent of its two thousand five price.
translation.lug: Omwaka gwa 2015 ebisale bya Intaneeti  bijja kuba biri ebitundu bitaano ku buli kikumi byokka eby'ebisale bya Intaneeti mu 2005.

translation.en: The reduction of technology would double the performance at half the price, giving technological innovation a price performance ratio of one to four.
translation.lug: Okukendeeza ku bunene bw'ebyuma bya tekinologiya kijja kwongera ku sipiidi kwe bikolera ate nga bigula ssente ntonoko.

translation.en: From this perspective, an iPad that costs one thousand five hundred dollars  today will sell for less than ninty four dollars in two thousand forteen.
translation.lug: Ekyo kiba kitegeeza nti iPad egula doola 1,500 leero ejja kuba egulwa doola ezitasukka 94 mu 2014.

translation.en: As I write, Uganda has over eleven million mobile phone lines sold.
translation.lug: We mpandiikira bino, layini z'essimu ezaakatundibwa mu Uganda zisukka mu bukadde 11.

translation.en: Since many people have more than one line, we can cut price three million lines.
translation.lug: Okuva bwe kiri nti abantu bangi balina layini ezisukka mu emu, tusobola okusala bbeeyi ya layini obukadde busatu.

translation.en: This leaves eight million Ugandans with a mobile line.
translation.lug: Ekyo kiba kitegeeza nti Bannayuganda obukadde munaana baba ne layini y'essimu.

translation.en: The adult population of Uganda is only thirteen million (out of thirty two people).
translation.lug: Abantu abakulu mu Uganda bali obukadde 13 (babiri ku buli bantu asatu mu babiri).

translation.en: The ability to send tonnes of data through cyber space in a second  is impossible.
translation.lug: Tekisobokka kusindika data wa Intaneeti n'emikutu gy'empuliziganya emirala mu butikitiki butono.

translation.en: Uganda was producing only two thousand university graduates per year in ninteen ninty four (when I joined Makerere).
translation.lug: Mu 1994 (we nnagendera e Makerere) Uganda yali ettikkira abayizi ba yunivasite 2,000 bokka buli mwaka.

translation.en: Indeed, the number of young Ugandans already hooked on Facebook and Twitter is growing every night and the debate on blogs is bloody.
translation.lug: Mu butuufu, buli lukya omuwendo gwa Bannayuganda abavubuka abeegatta ku Facebook ne Twitter gweyongera era kati babbulooga bangi.

translation.en: Most “intellectuals” in Africa have remained blind to these structural changes taking place before our own eyes.
translation.lug: Enkyukakyuka eno egenda mu maaso, “abayivu” bangi mu Afirika bagibuusizza amaaso.

translation.en: We were only helping advance the modernize process apparently set in motion by the National Resistance Movement.
translation.lug: Twali tugezaako kuyambako mu kutwala mu maaso mulamwa ogw'okuleetawo enkulaakulana oguyinza okuba nga gwatandikibwa NRM.

translation.en: Therefore the National Resistance Movement government should have joined journalists to celebrate the victory.
translation.lug: N'olwekyo, aba NRM bandibadde beegatta ku bannamawulire okujaganya obuwanguzi obwali butuukiddwako.

translation.en: On the morning of August twenty fifth, two thousand ten a dozen or so journalists screamed into the registrar’s gloomy basement office.
translation.lug: Ku makya nga Agusito 25, 2010 bannamawulire nga 12 n'omusobyo baakubira enduulu mu ofiisi ya registrar.

translation.en: This is because a High Court ruling in September two thousand nine abolished the creation of two hundred eight districts after ninteen ninty two, claiming there was no constitutional basis for it.
translation.lug: Ekyo kyava ku kuba nti mu Ssebutemba 2009, Kooti Enkulu yagaana eky'okuteekawo disitulikizi 208 oluvannyuma lwa 1992, ng'egamba nti tewali we basinziira mu ssemateeka kukikola.

translation.en: Its Gross Domestic Product at Purchasing Power Parity is about sixty three point five billion dollars or one thousand six hundred dollars per head per year.
translation.lug: Ensaasaanya ku bintu eri doola ng'obuwumbi mukaaga n'ekitundu oba doola lukumi mu lukaaga buli muntu buli mwaka.

translation.en: And eight hundred sixty nine people in economic and political power.
translation.lug: Era abantu 869 balina obuyinza mu by'obusuubizi ne mu by'obufuzi.

translation.en: Through the referen-dum in August.
translation.lug: Okuyitira mu referendamu mu Agusito.

translation.en: They support a Gross Domestic Product at Purchasing Power Parity of about forty three point two billion dollars or one thousand three hundred dollars per person annually.
translation.lug: Bayambako mu nsaasaanya ku bintu ya doola obuwumbi ana mu busatu mu obukadde bibiri oba doola lukumi mu bisatu buli muntu buli mwaka.

translation.en: When you also consider that for almost three decades the power of religious, ethnic and cultural institutions was systematically opressed here instead of manipulated openly as in Kenya.
translation.lug: Era bw'olowooza ku ky'okuba nti okumala emyaka ng'asatu, amaanyi agali mu ddiini ne mu by'obuwangwa gaatuulwako mu kifo ky'okugeeyambisa nga bwe kiri mu Kenya.

translation.en: Or writing of a new constitution but economic development outside of Kampala.
translation.lug: Oba okuwandiika ssemateeka omupya akwata ku nkulaakulana mu by'enfuna mu bitundu ebiri wabweru wa Kampala.

translation.en: And in Uganda we have a long way to go before the districts can make the centre feel their muscle.
translation.lug: Era mu Uganda disitulikiti zikyalina olugendo luwanvu gavumenti ya wakati okutandika okuwulira amaanyi gaazo.

translation.en: In Uganda’s case, where around thirty five percent of the population lives in official poverty and where eighty percent scratches a living from subsistence agriculture.
translation.lug: Mu Uganda abantu 35 ku buli kikumi baavu era 8 ku buli kikumi babeerawo ku mmere gye beerimira.

translation.en: There are great expectations that oil revenues will push growth higher as soon as two thousand twelve.
translation.lug: Bangi basuubira nti ssente ezinaggibwa mu mafuta zijja kuleetawo enkulaakulana ya maanyi omwaka gwa 2012 we gunaatuukira.

translation.en: This is a symptom that there is not anyone or anything outside the centre which can force government to forego the purchase of  Russian fighter jets and apply greater effort to food security and population growth problems.
translation.lug: Ekyo kiraga nti tewali kisobola kulemesa gavumenti kugula nnyonyi ennwanyi kuva ku Russia ssente ezo ezikozese okugonjoola ekizibu ky'ebbula y'emmere ne ku kulinnya kw'omuwendo gw'abantu.

translation.en: Although introduced by the colonial state to suppress African demands for independence, post independence governments.
translation.lug: Wadde nga byassibwawo amawanga agaalina amatwale okulemesa amawanga ga Afirika okufuna obwetwaze.

translation.en: The victors included opposition politicians and the people of Uganda generally.
translation.lug: Mu bafunyeemu mwe muli ab'oludda oluvuganya gavumenti ne Bannayuganda okutwalira awamu.

translation.en: This could be so because of the political environment the National Resistance Movement government and Museveni have created.
translation.lug: Ekyo kiri kityo olw'embeera y'eby'obufuzi NRM ne Museveni gye bassizzaawo.

translation.en: It was in the suit Charles Onyango Obbo and I won in two thousand three.
translation.lug: Eno ye mbeera nze ne Charles Onyango Obbo mwe twawangulira mu 2003.

translation.en: A pursuit of the National Resistance Movement nation-building programme.
translation.lug: Okulondoola enteekateeka ya NRM ey'okuzimba eggwanga.

translation.en: This is played by National Resistance Movement in trying to retain power in Uganda.
translation.lug: Kano kazannyo ka NRM okusobola okwekuumira mu buyinza.

translation.en: A committee of such men as Adolf Hitler, Josef Stalin and Idi Amin would even find a child harsh.
translation.lug: Ekigambo kyonna ekyayogerwa abasajja nga Adolf Hitler, Josef Stalin ne Idi Amin tekitwalibwa bulungi.

translation.en: The combined circulation of New Vision and Daily Monitor has declined by about twenty percent since ninteen ninty seven in spite of a big boom in education and increasing size of upper and middle classes.
translation.lug: Okutwalira awamu, omuwendo gw'empapula z'amawulire olwa New Vision ne Daily Monitor ezibunyisibwa gukendedde ebitundu nga 20 ku buli kikumi okuva mu 1997 wadde nga kati omuwendo gw'abantu abasomye n'abalina ssente ensaamusaamu gweyongedde.

translation.en: Gordon Moore (Intel’s found-ing Chief Executive Officer) argued in the ninteen sixty's that it would happen after every two years.
translation.lug: Mu myaka gya 1960, Gordon Moore (CEO wa Intel’s found-ing) yagamba nti ekyo kya kubangawo buli luvannyuma lwa myaka ebiri.

translation.en: Sixty two percent of our adult population is curved onto the mobile phone that is, modern technology.
translation.lug: Nkaaga ku buli kikumi ku bantu abakulu mu ggwanga obulamu bwabwe butambulira ku ssimu, tekinologiya ali ku mulembe.

translation.en: It is producing over fifty thousand per year in two thousand ten and these students are increasingly taking advantage of different technology platforms.
translation.lug: Efulumya abasukka mu mitwalo ataano mu mwaka mu 2010, era abayizi bano beeyongedde okukozesa tekinologiya owa buli ngeri.

translation.en: I only laugh when I see it introducing laws to control the mass media as if we are living in the ninteen seventys.
translation.lug: Kinneewuunyisa okulaba ng'essaawo amateeka agakugira enkozesa y'emikutu gy'empuliziganya nga galinga gy'obeera tukyali mu myaka gya 1970.

translation.en: This is when the East African Media Institute and I took the sedition matter to court.
translation.lug: Mu kiseera ekyo nze ne East African Media Institute lwe twatwala ensonga y'okukuma mu bantu omuliro mu kkooti.

translation.en: This was at the Court of Appeals on Parliament Avenue in the hope of witnessing history.
translation.lug: Wano nga tuli ku Kooti ejulirwamu okuliraana paliyamenti nga tusuubira okulaba ekyafaayo.

translation.en: In a shy, quiet voice began reading the summation of the petition that had been filed almost five years prior by journalists Andrew Mwenda and Haruna Kanaabi, represented by the Eastern African Media Institute.
translation.lug: Nga yeebwalabwala era ng'ayogerera mu ddoboozi ery'awansi yatandika okusoma okusaba okwakolebwa emyaka ng'etaano emabega bannamawulire Andrew Mwenda ne Haruna Kanaabi, abaali bakiikiriddwa Eastern African Media Institute.

translation.en: Non-compliance with provisions of section nine of the Act attracts court proceedings against the offending party.
translation.lug: Obutakolera ku kawaayiro ak'omwenda aka ssemateeka kireetera ennamula ya kooti obutaba ku ludda lw'oyo akamenye.

translation.en: Where a political party or organization fails to comply with this section within twenty one  days after the notice from the Electoral Commission.
translation.lug: Singa ekibiina ky'eby'obufuzi oba ekibiina ekirala kiremwa okutuukiriza akawaayiro ako mu nnaku 21 oluvannyuma lw'okufuna obubaka okuva mu kitongole ky'eby'okulonda.

translation.en: Section twelve of the Act also provides that if the Electroral Commission fails to make a party comply, it petitions court.
translation.lug: Ekitundu ekya 12 ekya ssemateeka kigamba nti singa ekitongole ky'eby'okulonda kiremwa okuleetera ekibiina okutuukiriza ebisaanyizo, ensonga kizikwasa kkooti.

translation.en: When the party is convicted and court issues the deregistration order.
translation.lug: Ekibiina omusango bwe gukisinga era kooti n'eragira kisazibwemu.

translation.en: Under the Act, political parties are also required to have audited books of accounts verifiable by the Electoral Commission.
translation.lug: Okusinziira ku ssemateeka, ebibiina by'obufuzi birina okukebera embalirira yaabyo era n'ekakasibwa ekitongole ky'eby'okulonda.

translation.en: The National Resistance Movement  has not met these legal requirements, but so are other political parties.
translation.lug: NRM tennatuukiriza bisaanyizo ebyo eby'omu mateeka, naye n'ebibiina by'obufuzi ebirala tebibituukiriza.

translation.en: National Resistance Movement party is not officially funded by the government like in the case in Tanzania and South Africa where parties have business subsidiaries which generate revenue.
translation.lug: Ekibiina kya NRM tekiweebwa sssente za gavumenti mu butongole nga bwe kiri mu Tanzania ne South Africa ebibiina gye birina bizineesi ezongereza ku ssente bye zifuna.

translation.en: Elamoit missed his scholarship in India because of the university’s one week staff strike that was suspended on August twenty seventh.
translation.lug: Elamoit yasubwa sikaala ey'okusomera e Buyindi olw'akeediimo k'abakozi ba yunivasite akayimirizibwa nga Agusitoi 27.

translation.en: Elamoit was supposed to get some necessary documents from the university to be submitted to the Indian University.
translation.lug: Elamoit alina ebiwandiiko bye yalina okufuna ku yunivasite abiwe yunivasite y'omu Buyindi.

translation.en: Elamoit arrived in Kampala on Augest twenty third from Gulu.
translation.lug: Elamoit yatuuka mu Kampala nga Agusito 23 ng'avudde e Gulu.

translation.en: The lecturers vowed not to resume their duties until National Insurance Corporation  pays them their earned savings.
translation.lug: Abasomesa ba yunivasite beeyama obutaddamu kukola mirimu okutuusa ng'ekitongole kya National Insurance Corporation kibasasudde ssente zaabwe.

translation.en: Even at the duress of a gun we are not going back to work without our money,” said Tanga Odoi, chairman of Makerere University Academic Staff Association.
translation.lug: Tanga Odoi, ssentebe w'ekibiina ky'abasomesa ba Makerere, yagamba nti, "Ne bwe batutiisatiisa n'emmundu tetuddamu kukola okutuusa nga batuwadde ssente zaffe.”

translation.en: Five billion, which they saved with the national insurer between nineteen ninety six and two thuosand five.
translation.lug: Obuwumbi butaano bwe baateresa National Insurance wakati wa 1996 ne 2005.

translation.en: This is not the first time a strike is frustrating Makerere University.
translation.lug: Guno si gwe mulundi ogwali gusoose abasomesa ba yunivasite y'e Makerere okwediima.

translation.en: There have been many strikes by both lecturers and students at the eighty eight year old institution.
translation.lug: Wabaddewo okwekalakaasa kw'abasomesa n'abayizi okutali kumu ku yunivasite eno emaze emyaka 88.

translation.en: Strikes were reminders to the administration that hey this is our University,says Mugisha from campus.
translation.lug: Mugisha, omuyizi ku yunivasite, agamba nti, kino kyabadde kijjukiza abakulembera yunivasite nti eno yunivasite yaffe.

translation.en: I also suffered a lot in two thuosand six and two thuosand eight when I was doing my masters at the University.
translation.lug: Era nabonaabona nnyo mu 2006 ne mu 2008 bwe nnali nsoma emisomo gyange egya Masita ku yunivasite.

translation.en: The lecturers laid down their tools because of poor pay and we never had classes for close to a month.
translation.lug: Abasomesa baalekera awo okusomesa nga bagamba nti tebabasasula bulungi era twamala omwezi nga gumu nga tetusoma.

translation.en: Doctor George Lugalambi, the head of the Mass communication department at the university.
translation.lug: Dokita George Lugalambi, akulira ekitongole kya Mass Communication ku yunivasite y'e Makerere.

translation.en: Makerere is a big institution and people feel that they can make a point out there by laying down their tools, he says.
translation.lug: Bagamba nti, yunivasite y'e Makerere nnene era nti kyangu okuleetera abalala okubaako kye bakolawo singa abakozi baayo bassa wansi ebikola.

translation.en: Unlike before when President Museveni could not intervene in staff issues, now he has.
translation.lug: Obutafaananako bwe kyali emabega nga Pulezideni Museveni tayingira mu nsonga z'abakozi, ennaku zino aziyingiramu.

translation.en: This time around President Museveni, in a letter to the Makerere staff dated august twenty sixth, asked the lecturers to resume teaching.
translation.lug: Ku mulundi guno Pulezidenti Museveni yawandiikira Makerere ebbaluwa nga Agusito 26, n'alagira abasomesa okuddamu okusomesa.

translation.en: Staff members were defiant to suspend the strike questioning the seriousness of the president’s guarantee.
translation.lug: Abasomesa baagaana okuddamu okusomesa nga tebakakasa nti pulezidenti bye yali abasuubizza yali abitegeeza.

translation.en: Let us unanimously suspend the strike President’s intervention buys three months for a solution to contested NIC payments.
translation.lug: Ka tuyimirize akeediimo kubanga pulezidenti okuyingira mu nsonga zino kiwa gavumenti ebbanga lya myezi esatu okulaba eky'okukola abasomesa bafune ssente za NIC ze baagala.

translation.en: Jimmy Siya staff members were defiant to suspend the strike questioning the seriousness of the president’s guarantee.
translation.lug: Jimmy Siya agamba nti abasomesa baagaana okusazaamu akeediimo olw'okuba baali tebakakasa obanga ebyo pulezidenti bye yali asuubiza byali bituufu.

translation.en: Give little time to the auditor general and update the president as the president deals with National Insurance Corporation  as he requested, said Odoi.
translation.lug: Odoi yagamba nti basaanidde okuwa auditor genero akaseera katono era basaanidde okutegeezanga pulezidenti wa ebintu we bituuse ng'eno pulezidenti bw'akwatagana n'ekitongole kya NIC nga bwe yasuubizza.

translation.en: The lecturers agreed to convene after three months to decide on whether to lay down their tools again.
translation.lug: Abasomesa bakkiriziganya okusisinkana oluvannyuma lw'emyezi esatu balabe obanga baddamu okussa wansi ebikola.

translation.en: We will use it again if we do not get our money,” said a professor from the chemistry department.
translation.lug: Polofeesa okuva mu kitongole kya ssaayansi yagamba nti, "Tujja kuddamu twediime singa tetusasulwa.”

translation.en: Earlier this year staff members announced a strike only to suspend it again after Makerere’s Vice Chancellor.
translation.lug: Ku ntandikwa y'omwaka guno abasomesa baalangirira akeediimo naye ne bakasazaamu oluvannyuma lw'akulira ettendekero lya Makerere.

translation.en: Venansius Baryamureeba, convinced the staff members that president Museveni would attend the fifty seventh graduation and would address their grievances in his speech.
translation.lug: Venansius Baryamureeba, bwe yakakasa abasomesa nti pulezidenti Museveni ajja kubaawo ku matikkira ag'omulundi ogwa makumi attaano mu musaanvu ayogere ku ebyo ebibaluma.

translation.en: However, in the end the president did not attend the graduation.
translation.lug: Naye pulezidenti teyagenda ku matikkira.

translation.en: Secondly, top university officials, including the Vice Chancellor, were working around the clock .
translation.lug: Eky'okubiri, abakulu mu yunivasite omwali n'akulira yunivasite baali bakola butaweera, misana na kiro.

translation.en: The Vice Chancellor was hopeful that the president would assist them financially to develop certain projects such as their Kololo land.
translation.lug: Akulira yunivasite yali asuubira nti pulezidenti yali ajja kubayamba mu by'ensimbi basobole okukola ku projekiti zaabwe gamba ng'eyo ey'oku ttaka lyabwe ery'e Kololo.

translation.en: President Museveni had previously given shillings four.
translation.lug: Emabegako Pulezidenti Museveni yali awaddeyo ssente [……]

translation.en: Five billion to the Faculty of Food Science and Technology after visiting the faculty on October second,  two thuosand nine.
translation.lug: Obuwumbi butaano eri ekitongole kya yunivasite ekya ssaayansi ne tekinologiya oluvannyuma lw'okukirambula nga Okitobba 2, 2009.

translation.en: Despite having a big stake , makerere officials have been neglected by National Insurance Corporation, which has triggered more questions .
translation.lug: Wadde nga bakola omulimu mukulu nnyo, abakozi ba Makerere babuusiddwa nnyo amaaso ekitongole kya NIC, era ekyo kireeseewo ebibuuzo bingi.

translation.en: A lecturer who preferred not to be identified told the Independent that keeping Makerere University running is not an easy task and that such strikes help put things right.
translation.lug: Omu ku basomesa ataayagadde kwatuukirizibwa mannya yagamba olupapula lwa Independent nti omulimu gw'okuddukanya yunivasite y'e Makerere si mwangu, era nti obwediimo ng'obwo buyamba mu kutereeza ebintu.

translation.en: Those who say that lecturers are striking all the time should know that strikes are a negotiating tool.
translation.lug: Abo abagamba nti abasomesa beediima buli kiseera basaanidde okukimanya nti okwediima y'emu ku ngeri abantu gye bayitamu okutuuka ku kukkiriziganya.

translation.en: You have such a big university that is not paid attention to by a government that claims to have education in its priorities.
translation.lug: Mulina yunivasite ennene bw'etyo gavumenti gy'etefaako kyokka ng'egamba nti efaayo nnyo ku byenjigiriza.

translation.en: For instance, how else would the president have decided to pay attention to our troubles?
translation.lug: Mulowooza kiki ekirala ekyandireetedde pulezidenti okufaayo ku bituluma?

translation.en: He adds that despite being the biggest university in Uganda, Makerere has meagre funds which can not satisfy all its needs.
translation.lug: Agattako nti, wadde nga Makerere ye yunivasite esingayo obunene mu Uganda, obusente obugiweebwa butono era nti tebusobola kukola ku byetaago byayo.

translation.en: When Nuwagaba was chairman of  constitution of the Makerere University Academic Staff Association  the lecturers laid down their tools.
translation.lug: Nuwagaba bwe yali nga ye ssentebe wa ssemateeka afuga ekibiina ekigatta abasomesa ba Makerere yunivasite, abasomesa beediima.

translation.en: Doctor Saul Nsubuga says that strikes are mainly caused by the University council which makes poor policies all the time.
translation.lug: Dokita Saul Nsubuga agamba nti obwediimo buva ku kakiiko ka yunivasite akasalawo obubi buli kiseera.

translation.en: It is for instance the council that made us fall into this National Insurance Corporation problem and now they are not solving it.
translation.lug: Ng'ekyokulabirako, ab'akakiiko kano be baatuleetera okugwa mu buzibu bwa NIC naye ate ekizibu ekyo kibalemye okugonjoola.

translation.en: Nsubuga is not the first to blame the university council.
translation.lug: Nsubuga si ye yasooka okunenya akakiiko ka yunivasite.

translation.en: In the meeting at the university hall on August twenty seventh, lecturers after  blamed the university council for their problems.
translation.lug: Oluvannyuma lw'olukungaana olwali ku university hall nga Agusito 27, abasomesa baanenya akakiiko ka yunivasite olw'ebizibu bye baalimu.

translation.en: In fact one staff member took to the podium before the meeting started and requested that the council chairman Mathew Rukikaire be voted out of office.
translation.lug: Mu butuufu omu ku bakozi ba yunivasite yagenda ku katuuti ng'olukungaana terunnatandika n'asaba nti ssentebe w'akakiiko ako Mathew Rukikaire agibweko ofiisi ye.

translation.en: Members we are tired of this mess, our council has failed us and I request for a vote of no confidence in the council chairman right here and now.
translation.lug: Bannange tukooye obuvuyo buno, akakiiko kaffe katuyiyeeyo era nsaba mu kiseera kino tukube akalulu akajja obwesige mu ssentebe w'akakiiko kano.

translation.en: Doctor Odoi and other executive members of The constitution of the Makerere University Academic Staff Association  had earlier told a press briefing at the university guest house.
translation.lug: Dokita Odoi n'abalala abavunaanyizibwa ku ssemateeka afuga ekibiina ekigatta abasomesa ba yunivasite y'e Makerere baali basoose kwogerako ne bannamawulire ku university guest house.

translation.en: We are in mourning that the council chairman can praise National Insurance Corporation  for promising to pay arrears.
translation.lug: Kitunakuwazza nnyo ssentebe w'akakiiko kaffe okutendereza NIC olw'okusuubiza okusasula ssente zaffe ezirina okuba nga zaatuweebwa dda.

translation.en: However, Odoi later apologised and said that the council chairman had called him and clarified that he had no interests in National Insurance Corporation.
translation.lug: Naye oluvannyuma Odoi yeetonda n'agamba nti ssentebe w'akakiiko yali amukubidde essimu n'amutegeeza nti teyalina bye yeenoonyeza mu NIC.

translation.en: Yet despite Odoi’s apology, staff members insist that the university council is the root cause of all problems and strikes.
translation.lug: Wadde nga Odoi yeetonda, abasomesa bakyagamba nti akakiiko ka yunivasite ke kaviiriddeko ebizibu n'obwediimo ebiri mu yunivasite.

translation.en: Whether or not National Insurance Corporation clears the staffs’ savings remains unclear.
translation.lug: Tekinnaba kumanyibwa obanga aba NIC banaasasula oba tebaasasule ssente z'abasomesa ba yunivasite.

translation.en: But as the staff members deliberated on the resolution after receiving the president’s letter.
translation.lug: Naye abasomesa bwe baali bakyayogera ku ky'okuzzaako oluvannyuma lw'okufuna ebbaluwa okuva ewa pulezidenti.

translation.en: If their money is not paid, it is clear that these Makerereans are more than ready to plunge the institution into yet another strike come November.
translation.lug: Kyeyoleka lwatu nti singa tebasasulwa ssente zaabwe, abasomesa ba Makerere baali beetegefu okuddamu okwediima mu Noovemba.

translation.en: Tanga Odoi, President Museveni was told by Mwenda: You have won the election by ninety three percent.
translation.lug: Tanga Odoi, Mwenda yagamba Pulezidenti Museveni nti: Akalulu omaze okukawangula n'ebitundu 93 ku buli kikumi.

translation.en: Normally it is in Saddam Hussein’s Iraq that a presidential candidate gets such a figure.
translation.lug: Ekya pulezidenti okufuna obululu obungi bwe butyo okisanga mu Iraq ku mulembe gwa Saddam Hussein.

translation.en: Kagame,  well in some of those places elections have not been taking place at all.
translation.lug: Kagame, mu bimu ng'ebyo tewabaddengayo kulonda wadde.

translation.en: Many of them are represented in parliament.
translation.lug: Bangi ku bo bakiikirirwa mu paliyamenti.

translation.en: Just sixteen years ago nothing existed, even human life was at stake in Rwanda, no institutions, absolutely nothing.
translation.lug: Emyaka 16 emabega tewaali kintu, n'obulamu bw'abantu bwali mu matigga mu Rwanda, tewaali masomero, tewaali yadde.

translation.en: This is what operates in the minds of the people here; they have got a cow from Kagame, and the Rwandan Patriotic Front.
translation.lug: Kino kye kiri mu birowoozo by'abantu wano; baafuna ente okuva ewa Kagame, era okuva mu kibiina kya Rwandan Patriotic Front.

translation.en: But there have been concerns expressed in the international media by international human rights groups saying look; in the run up President Kagame created an atmosphere of fear.
translation.lug: Naye wabaddewo okwemulugunya ku mikutu gy'amawulire okwetoola ensi okuva eri ebitongole ebirwanirira eddembe ly'obuntu nga bigamba nti; akalulu bwe kaali tekannakubwa Pulezidenti Kagame yateekawo embeera etiisa abantu.

translation.en: Mwenda, hosted President Paul Kagame of Rwanda on a radio show on Contact FM in Kigali, a day after the voting in that country’s presidential election.
translation.lug: Mwenda, yakyaza Pulezidenti Paul Kagame owa Rwanda ku programu emu eya leediyo ya Contact FM mu Kigali, nga wayise olunaku lumu oluvannyuma lw'okulonda pulezidenti okugwa.

translation.en: Mwenda had started the show titled “Rwanda Decides” to promote public debate about the election in the country.
translation.lug: Mwenda yali atandiseewo programu eyitibwa “Rwanda Esalawo” okuwa abantu akakisa okuwa endowooza zaabwe ku kulonda mu Rwanda.

translation.en: Kagame speaks about his election victory, claims on political repression like ours, it will simply  happen.
translation.lug: Kagame ayogera ku buwanguzi bwe yali atuuseeko, ku bigambibwa nti yatiisatiisa abantu, n'ekyali kigenda okuddakko.

translation.en: The story they want to believe is that there is no democracy in Rwanda, that there is repression, and so forth.
translation.lug: Baagala okukkiriza nti mu Rwanda temuli demokulasiya, nti abantu banyigirizibwa, n'ebirala.

translation.en: For example, if you look at the case of the journalist who was killed here, the police investigated the case and the one who killed the journalist was arrested.
translation.lug: Ng'ekyokulabirako, bw'olowooza ku munnamawulire eyattirwa wano, poliisi yakinoonyerezaako era oyo eyamutta n'akwatibwa.

translation.en: The Electoral Commission may apply to the High Court for an order to deregister the political party or organisation,” reads section nine part six of the Act.
translation.lug: Mu kitundu eky'omwenda akawaayiro ak'omukaaga mu ssemateeka wagamba nti, "Ekitongole ky'eby'okulonda kisobola okuwandiikira Kooti Enkulu okuwanduukulula ekibiina ky'eby'obufuzi oba ekibiina kyonna."

translation.en: The court prescribes the mode of disposal of the party’s assets, rights and liabilities.
translation.lug: Kooti eraga engeri ebintu by'ekibiina gye bigenda okuggibwawo, ebisaanidde n'ebitasaanidde kukolebwa.

translation.en: Funding from the government on the basis of their numerical strength in parliament Daudi Migereko ,Kirunda Kivejinja ,Jim Muhwezi ,Mike Mukula ,Kabakumba Masiko.
translation.lug: Okuweebwa ssente za gavumenti okusinziira ku muwendo gw'abakiise baabwe mu lukiiko olukulu olw'eggwanga, Daudi Migereko, Kirunda Kivejinja, Jim Muhwezi, Mike Mukula, Kabakumba Masiko.

translation.en: When National Insurance Corporation operated a pension scheme for the institution.
translation.lug: Ekitongole kya NIC bwe kyaterekanga pensoni z'abakozi ba yunivasite.

translation.en: The reoccurrence of strikes at Makerere is mainly because of the nature of the institution.
translation.lug: Obwediimo obutatadde obuli e Makerere okusingira ddala buva ku ntegeka ya yunivasite eyo.

translation.en: Then deal with the proprietors of National Insurance Corporation and managers as we did in the case of green bank,reads the president’s letter.
translation.lug: Ebbaluwa ya pulezidenti yagamba nti, Bannanyini NIC n'abagiddukanya basaanidde okukwatibwa mu ngeri y'emu gye baakwatamu aba bbanka ya Green.

translation.en: Later resolved to suspend the strike for three months and wait for the auditor general to audit the funds in question as the president directed.
translation.lug: Oluvannyuma musalewo okuyimiriza akeediimo okumala emyezi esatu mulindirire auditor genero abalirire ssente ezivuddeko embetezi nga pulezidenti bwe yalagidde.

translation.en: Back to class for now  student crosses at the closed faculty of social science Makerere university during the Lecturers strike on August twenty seventh.
translation.lug: Bazzeemuko okusoma omuyizi ayita ku kizimbe kya Faculty of Social Science Makerere University ng'abasomesa bakyediimye nga Agusito 27.

translation.en: Later resolved to suspend the strike for three months and wait for the auditor general to audit the funds in question as the president directed.
translation.lug: Oluvannyuma basalawo okuyimiriza akeediimo okumala emyezi esatu balindirire auditor genero okubalirira ssente ezaali zivuddeko embetezi nga pulezidenti bwe yali alagidde.

translation.en: Amend staff relations with the government that have been strained for a long time on account of lecturers being perceived as anti-National Resistance Movement.
translation.lug: Okuzzaawo enkolagana wakati w'abasomesa ne gavumenti eyonoonese olw'abasomesa okutwalibwa ng'abawakanya NRM.

translation.en: The corporation has managed to neglect over two thousand staff members at the country’s most respected university.
translation.lug: Ekitongole tekifuddeeyo ku bakozi abasukka mu nkumi bbiri aba yunivasite y'eggwanga esinga okussibwamu ekitiibwa.

translation.en: Professor Augustus Nuwagaba, a former constitution of the Makerere University Academic Staff Association  chairman who led many lecturer’s strikes.
translation.lug: Polofesa Augustus Nuwagaba, eyaliko ssentebe w'ekibiina ekigatta abasomesa b'e Makerere era eyakulemberamu obwediimo bw'abasomesa obuwerako.

translation.en: Said a staff member who could only be identified as Grace, amidst applause.
translation.lug: Bw'ati omu ku bakozi eyamanyidwako erinnya limu erya Grace bwe yayogedde, wakati mu mizira.

translation.en: That they have started doubting whether the council chairman was working for the university or National Insurance Corporation as he seems to praise National Insurance Corporation  all the time.
translation.lug: Batandise okubuusabuusa obanga ssentebe w'akakiiko yali akolera yunivasite oba NIC kubanga kirabika buli kiseera aba mu kutendereza NIC.

translation.en: We are known for after sales service and genuine spare parts Snowmans Centre, Plot eighty nine, seventh Street, Industrial Area, Kampala.
translation.lug: Tuyamba mu kutunda ebintu era tutunda sipeeya mu Snowmans Centre, ku Plot eighty nine, ku seventh Street, mu Industrial Area, e Kampala.

translation.en: That is how the Rwandan Patriotic Front and Kagame have gained the confidence of the people.
translation.lug: Bwe batyo aba RPF ne Kagame bwe bafuuse abaganzi mu abantu.

translation.en: A leading opposition politician was killed, a journalist who was investigating a story here was killed, a major and powerful political party called the Green Party was blocked from registration.
translation.lug: Omu ku bavuganya ennyo gavumenti yattibwa, munnamawulire eyalina ensonga gy'alondoola wano yattibwa, ekibiina ky'obufuzi eky'amaanyi ekya Green Party kyagaanibwa okwewandiisa.

translation.en: The weapon that was used has been retrieved and the killer has admitted to committing the crime and given reasons why he did so.
translation.lug: Ekissi kye yakozesa kyafunibwa era eyamutta yakkiriza nti ye yazza omusango ogwo era n'awa n'ensonga lwaki yamutta.

translation.en: Haggai Matsiko Emanuel Elamoit, an international relations masters student at Makerere University, is a sad man.
translation.lug: Haggai Matsiko Emanuel Elamoit, asoma diguli eya masita mu nkolagana z'amawanga e Makerere alina ennaku ku mutima.

translation.en: The Rwandan Patriotic Front and Kagame have managed to reconstruct the country, to bring normalcy to the country, to bring back value to human life, to the people of Rwanda and through social and economic transformation, people’s lives have totally changed.
translation.lug: Aba RPF ne Kagame basobodde okuddamu okuzimba eggwanga, okuleetawo obutebenkemu mu ggwanga, okuleetera abantu okuwulira nga ba mugaso, era baleeseewo enkyukakyuka ez'omuggundu mu mbeera z'abantu ne mu by'enfuna mu Rwanda.

translation.en: A candidate who had potential to challenge Kagame and defeat Kagame called Victoire Ngabire was arrested and charged with divisionism.
translation.lug: Victoire Ngabire eyali asobola okuvuganya era n'awangula Kagame yakwatibwa era n'avunaanibwa ogw'okuleetawo enjawukana mu ggwanga.

translation.en: He is well known and also a former soldier under President Juvenal, Habyarimana regime.
translation.lug: Amanyiddwa nnyo era yali musirikale ku mulembe gwa Pulezidenti Juvenal, Habyarimana.

translation.en: Although Mr President, assuming your critics say that this guy who was arrested and confessed to the murder, is just a ploy by President Kagame and his government to just create a lie, the boy will be in jail for just a few months and when the story cools down, he will be released from prison.
translation.lug: Naye Pulezidenti, singa abakuvumirira bagamba nti omusajja oyo eyakwatibwa n'akkiriza okuba nga ye yatta, yagulirirwa Pulezidenti Kagame ne gavumenti ye okulimba abantu era nti ajja kusibbwa okumala emyezi mitono era oluvannyuma ateebwe ng'ebintu abantu babivuddeko.

translation.en: The candidate was very well known, a critic of President Kagame and he was killed in the runup to the election
translation.lug: Omusajja oyo yali amanyiddwa nnyo, ng'avumirira Pulezidenti Kagame, era n'attibwa ng'ebula ennaku ntono okulonda kubeewo.

translation.en: In fact, this man was not the leader of the Green Party.
translation.lug: Ekituufu kiri nti, omusajja ono si ye yali akulira ekibiina kya Green Party.

translation.en: The leader of the Green Party is Habineza, not Kagwa Rwisereka who was unfortunately killed.
translation.lug: Habineza y'akulira ekibiina kya Green Party, so si Kagwa Rwisereka eyattibwa.

translation.en: He is said to have been in the leadership of the Green Party.
translation.lug: Agambibwa okuba nga y'omu ku baali bakulembera ekibiina kya Green Party.

translation.en: Rwisereka lived in the Southern province, in the university town of Butare.
translation.lug: Rwisereka yali abeera mu kitundu eky'ebukiikaddyo, mu kabuga k'e Butare awali yunivasite.

translation.en: But of course the media there now blows things out of proportion,  claiming this is somebody who had capacity to defeat Kagame in the election.
translation.lug: Naye tekyewuunyisa nti bannamawulire abali eyo kati basavuwaza ebintu, nga bagamba nti omusajja ono yali asobola okuwangula Kagame mu kalulu.

translation.en: He was not even known in his home town of Butare itself.
translation.lug: Yali tamanyiddwa na mu kabuga k'ewaabwe ak'e Butare.

translation.en: "Okay, why did you refuse to reg-ister their party?" Mwenda asks.
translation.lug: Mwenda amubuuza nti, "Kati olwo lwaki mwagaana okuwandiisa ekibiina kyabwe?"

translation.en: This is how all these parties were registered including the Rwanda Political Front.
translation.lug: Ebibiina byonna nga mw'otwalidde n'ekya RPF by'ayita mu mitendera gye gimu egyo okuwandiisibwa.

translation.en: In the Green Party, they failed to do that.
translation.lug: Ab'ekibiina kya Green Party ekyo baalemererwa okukikola.

translation.en: At some point, the leaders of the Green Party went to Kampala, Uganda.
translation.lug: Waliwo ekiseera lwe kyatuuka abakulembeze ba Green ne bagenda e Kampala, mu Uganda.

translation.en: There was a meeting for the leaders of all the Green Parties in the whole of Africa and they met in Kampala.
translation.lug: Abakulembeze b'ebibiina byonna ebya Green Party mu Afirika baalina olukungaana era baalufunira Kampala.

translation.en: So you were not afraid of the Green Party?
translation.lug: Kitegeeza nti wali totidde kibiina kya Green Party?

translation.en: The President has a problem in the Rwanda Political Front then.
translation.lug: Kati olwo Pulezidenti alina obuzibu mu RPF.

translation.en: If things happen like this, the international media covers a story and the Rwanda Political Front and the Rwandan government are unable to put forth this explanation you have given me.
translation.lug: Singa ebintu bwe biti bibaawo, bannamawulire mu nsi yonna ne boogera ku bibaddewo era RPF ne gavumenti ya Rwanda ne batawa kunnyonnyola nga kw'ompadde.

translation.en: The international press, have prejudice, or even really contempt about Africa, about Rwanda, about these developing countries.
translation.lug: Bannamawulire b'ebweru balina obusosoze, era oboolyawo n'obukyayi ku Afirika, ku Rwanda, ku mawanga gano agakyakula.

translation.en: They consider themselves the do gooders for Africa.
translation.lug: Balowooza nti be bamanyi engeri Afirika gy'erina okuddukanyizibwamu obulungi.

translation.en: So they imagine whenever Africans are hungry, we feed them.
translation.lug: Balowooza nti buli Afirika bw'erumwa enjala, ffe tugiwa emmere.

translation.en: They think Rwandans have to keep quiet and they will tell us what to do and what not to do.
translation.lug: Balowooza nti Abanyarwanda balina kusirika busirisi bo ne bababuulira eky'okukola ne kye batalina kukola.

translation.en: Some of these countries where these journalists operate from have been responsible for the disasters that have taken place in our countries including the genocide in Rwanda.
translation.lug: Agamu  ku mawanga bannamawulire abo gye bakolera ge gavunaanyizibwa ku bizibu ebibaddewo mu mawanga gaffe, gamba ng'ekitta bantu ekyaliwo mu Rwanda.

translation.en: When you see masses of Rwandans, given Rwanda‘s ethnic configurations and the politics that existed in this country for so many years, do you think those crowds that turn up, the cheering they give is all genuine?
translation.lug: Bw'olaba abantu b'omu Rwanda nga bakungaanye mu bungi, era n'olowooza ku byafaayo by'amawanga gaabwe n'embeera y'eby'obufuzi eyaliwo mu ggwanga okumala emyaka mingi, olowooza abo bonna abakungaana era ne bakuba emizira baba beesiimbu?

translation.en: Are you saying that this country, in the 2010, has traversed a long journey away from its politics where one’s ethnicity determined their position in politics, that they would turn up and they cheer a certain candidate called Kagame,a Tutsi, who doesn’t share a common ethnicity with the majority Hutu and be very happy about him?
translation.lug: Ky'ogamba eggwanga lino, mu 2010, lizzeemu enkyukakyuka ne kiba nti kati ekifo omuntu ky'alina mu by'obufuzi tekisinziira ku ggwanga lye, era nti abantu basobola okujja mu bungi ne bawagira omusajja eyeesimbyewo ayitibwa Kagame, Omutuusi, atali wa ggwanga ly'abantu abasinga obungi, Abahutu, abantu ne baba nga ddala bamusanyukira nnyo?

translation.en: But leadership that is determined to change that course will also succeed with the same people, and that is what we are experiencing under a different leadership that values the people of this country irrespective of their background, and rallying them for a common cause of building a new nation of Rwanda.
translation.lug: Naye obukulembeze obumaliridde okukyusa endowooza eyo era busobola okutuuka ku buwanguzi n'abantu abo be bamu, era ekyo kyennyini kye kyabaawo obukulembeze obulala we bwajja ate nga bwo butwala abantu bonna nga ba muwendo ka babe ba ggwanga ki, era ne bubakuumaakuma okuba n'ekiruubirirwa kye kimu eky'okuzimba eggwanga eriggya erya Rwanda.

translation.en: This is what Rwandans deserve and not a Rwanda of the Hutu, Tutsi or Twa.
translation.lug: Kino Abanyarwanda kye beetaaga, so si Rwanda ey'Abahutu, Abatuusi, oba Abatwa.

translation.en: People will say that President Kagame has a very sophisticated intelligence system and this system has spread its tentacles up to the last village, he has intimidated everybody.
translation.lug: Abantu abamu bayinza okugamba nti Pulezidenti Kagame alina ekitongole ekikessi kya maanyi ekituuka ne mu bwalo obusembayo eyo,  aleetedde abantu bonna okutya.

translation.en: Ordinary Rwandan peasants were harassed.
translation.lug: Abanyarwanda aba bulijjo baatulugunyizibwa.

translation.en: People are just so afraid of this man called Kagame and they have to show up at his rallies and to vote.
translation.lug: Abantu batya nnyo omusajja ono ayitibwa Kagame era baba tebalina kya kukola okuggyako okujja ne babaawo ku nkungaana z'akuba era ne bamuwa akalulu.

translation.en: Millions of Rwandans, over 5 million Rwandans could be taken, intimidated, confused and manipulated and nobody complains.
translation.lug: Abantu bukadde na bukadde mu Rwanda, abantu abasukka mu bukadde 5 mu Rwanda basobola okukwatibwa, okutiisibwatiisibwa, ne babuzaabuzibwa, oba ne babagulirira ne watabaawo yenna yeemulugunya.

translation.en: You have reduced the incidence of malaria by almost eighty five percent, you have gotten ninety percent of Rwandans on medical insurance, you have done the roads and you have fought corruption.
translation.lug: Okendeezezza omuwendo gw'abantu abakwatibwa omusujja kumpi ebitundu 85 ku buli kikumi , Abanyarwanda 90 ku buli kikumi obatadde ku yinsuwa y'obujjanjabi, okoze enguudo, era olwanyisizza obulyi bw'enguzi.

translation.en: Kagame speaks about his election victory.
translation.lug: Kagame ayogera ku buwanguzi bwe yali atuuseeko mu kalulu.

translation.en: Oh my God! Do you think the Green Party would challenge the Rwanda Political Front?
translation.lug: Nedda! Ddala olowooza ekibiina kya Green Party kyandisobodde okuvuganya ekibiina kya RPF?

translation.en: They could not challenge anybody else, forget about the Rwanda Political Front.
translation.lug: Ng'oggyeeeko RPF, kyali tekisobola na kuvuganya wadde ebibiina biri ebirala.

translation.en: The Electoral Commission partnered with the United States government to post Uganda’s voter register online in a searchable and secure format.
translation.lug: Ekitongole ky'eby'okulonda kyakkiriziganya ne gavumenti ya Amerika okussa olukalala lw'abalonzi mu Uganda ku Intaneeti nga lwangu okuzuula era nga terusobola kutigoonyolwa.

translation.en: The Electoral Comission launched the online voters register on August 26 at Hotel Africana.
translation.lug: Ekitongole ky'eby'okulonda kyatongoza olukalala lw'abalonzi olw'oku Intaneeti nga Agusito 26 ku Hotel Africana.

translation.en: The Deputy Attorney General Fred Ruhindi presided over the launch of the online voters register.
translation.lug: Fred Ruhindi, Deputy Attorney General, ye yaliwo mu kutongoza olukalala lw'abalonzi olwo olw'oku Intaneeti.

translation.en: The United States Ambassador, Jerry Lanier said peaceful free and fair elections in 2011 are critical for Uganda’s  future.
translation.lug: Omubaka wa Amerika , Jerry Lanier, yagamba nti kikulu nnyo okuba n'okulonda okw'amazima n'obwenkanya mu 2011 ku lw'obulungi bw'ebiseera bya Uganda eby'omu maaso.

translation.en: Jerry Lanier said the launch of the online voter register is a step towards realising this goal.
translation.lug: Jerry Lanier yagamba nti okussa olukalala lw'abalonzi ku Intaneeti ddala kkulu mu kutuuka ku kiruubirirwa ekyo.

translation.en: Jerry Lanier said posting the voter register online should boost voter confidence in Uganda’s electoral processes.
translation.lug: Jerry Lanier yagamba nti okussa olukalala lw'abalonzi ku Intaneeti kijja kuleetera abalonzi okwongera okwesiga eby'okulonda bya Uganda.

translation.en: The United States government and the Electoral Commission are also working to develop an Short Message Service messaging system.
translation.lug: Amerika n'ekitongole ky'eby'okulonda era bakolera wamu okussaawo enkola eya SMS.

translation.en: The online voter register is part of the United States of America’s ongoing support to democracy and governance in Uganda.
translation.lug: Okussa olukalala lw'abalonzi ku Intaneeti kye kimu ku bintu Amerika by'efuba okukola okuwagira demokulasiya mu Uganda.

translation.en: The Chairman of the Electoral Commission,Badru Kiggundu, appealed to all supporting partners to continue cooperating with the Electoral Commission.
translation.lug: Ssentebbe w'ekitongole ky'eby'okulonda, Badru Kiggundu, yakubiriza abantu bonna okweyongera okukolera awamu n'ekitongole ky'eby'okulonda.

translation.en: Kiggundu said that the voters register will ensure integrity of all coming elections in Uganda if all Ugandans are involved.
translation.lug: Kiggundu yagamba nti olukalala lw'abalonzi olw'oku Intaneeti lujja kukakasa nti wabaawo obwerufu ne mu kulonda okulalala okujja mu maaso singa Baannayuganda bonna bazingirwamu.

translation.en: Kiggundu advised voters to check their names at their respective polling stations to ensure they are not wrongly recommended for deletion.
translation.lug: Kiggundu yagamba abalonzi okugenda mu bitundu gye balondera bakebere amannya gaabwe bakakase obanga tegagibwamu mu bukyamu.

translation.en: Kiggundu called upon the people to check the voter lists to ensure their names are there.
translation.lug: Kiggundu yakubiriza abantu okukebera ku nkalala z'abalonzi balabe obanga amannya gaabwe kwegali.

translation.en: Kiggundu cautioned that some people with ill motives might push for other people’s names to be scrapped off the voters register.
translation.lug: Kiggundu yalabula nti abantu abamu abalina ebigendererwa ebikyamu bayinza okuggya amannya g'abantu ku lukalala lw'abalonzi.

translation.en: The oppostion had denounced the Electoral Commission register saying they do not trust the commission to make an accurate register.
translation.lug: Ab'oludda oluvuganya gavumenti baawakanya enkalala z'Ekitongole ky'eby'Okulonda nga bagamba nti tebakyesiga kukola nkalala ntuufu.

translation.en: Wafula Oguttu, said the launch would have been more realistic if it had been done a few weeks back.
translation.lug: Wafula Oguttu yagamba nti okutongoza okwo kwandibadde kukola amakulu singa kwakolebwa wiiki eziwerako emabega.

translation.en: Asuman Basalirwa, the Justice Forum party president, praised the move as the right direction.
translation.lug: Asuman Basalirwa, pulezidenti w'ekibiina kya Justice Forum, yagamba nti ekyo kye baakola kyali kirungi.

translation.en: The opposition have been demanding the removal of the current Electoral Commission on account that it is partisan.
translation.lug: Ab'oludda oluvuganya gavumenti basaba ekitongole ky'eby'okulonda ekiriwo okuggibwawo nga bakirumiriza okubaamu kyekubiira.

translation.en: Basalirwa said the Electoral Commission failed to involve all the parties in the process leading to the launch of the online register.
translation.lug: Basalirwa yagamba nti ekitongole ky'eby'okulonda tekyasobozesa bibiina byonna kwenyigira mu mitendera egyayitibwamu okutongoza olukalala lw'abalonzi olw'oku Intaneeti.

translation.en: Basalirwa said the opposition was only called upon to witness the launch.
translation.lug: Basalirwa yagamba nti ab'oludda oluvuganya baayitibwa kulaba bulabi lukalala olwo nga lutongozebwa.

translation.en: Basalirwa said the opposition should have been involved in the process of making the online voters register.
translation.lug: Basalirwa yagamba nti ab'oludda oluvuganya nabo bandibadde beenyigira mu kukola olukalala olwo olw'oku intaneeti.

translation.en: Basalirwa said the opposition's involvement would have helped in countering arising issues like the missing voters’ pictures on the register.
translation.lug: Basalirwa yagamba nti ab'oludda oluvuganya bandibadde bakendeeza ku bizibu ebirimu gamba ng'ebifaananyi bya balonzi abamu obutaba ku lukalala.

translation.en: Basalirwa said the opposition needs to call upon the masses to embrace and ensure that all voter's names are on the register.
translation.lug: Basalirwa yagamba nti ab'oludda oluvuganya basaanidde okukubiriza abantu okukakasa nti amannya gaabwe gali ku lukalala olwo.

translation.en: Hussein Kyanjo, the Justice Forum flag bearer hailed the online voters register.
translation.lug: Hussein Kyanjo, akutte bbendera y'ekibiina kya Justice Forum flag yasanyukidde nnyo olukalala lw'abalonzi olw'oku intaneeti.

translation.en: Kyanjo said over one hundred villages have been affected.
translation.lug: Kyanjo yagamba nti ebyalo ebisukka mu kikumi bikoseddwa.

translation.en: Kyanjo said he had approached the Electoral Commission but it was adamant about his complaints.
translation.lug: Kyanjo yagamba nti yatuukirira ekitongole ky'eby'okulonda n'akitegeeza ku kwemulugunya kwe naye ne batamufaako.

translation.en: Salaam Musumba, the Deputy President of Forum for Democratic Change, expressed gratitude that the parties have been able to achieve something.
translation.lug: Salaam Musumba, omumyuka wa pulezidenti wa Forum for Democratic Change, yasiima nnyo ebibiina by'obufuzi ng'agamba nti bisobodde okubaako kye bituukako.

translation.en: Abed Bwanika, the president of People’s Democratic Party, joined other opposition officials to welcome the online voters’ register.
translation.lug: Abed Bwanika, pulezidenti w'ekibiina kya People’s Democratic Party, naye yeegatta ku b'oludda oluvuganya abalala abaasanyukira enkalala z'abalonzi ez'oku intaneeti.

translation.en: The opposition in Uganda has persistently asked President Museveni to breakup the Electoral Commission.
translation.lug: Ab'oludda oluvuganya bazzenga bagamba Pulezidenti Museveni okukyusa ekitongole ky'eby'okulonda.

translation.en: It appears the opposition is now applying pressure on the Electoral Commission from different directions.
translation.lug: Kirabika kati ab'oludda oluvuganya bakozesa nkola ndala okussa akazito ku kitongole ky'eby'okulonda.

translation.en: The opposition Attorney General Erias Lukwago has dragged the Electoral Commission to court for refusing to scrap polling stations in the army barracks.
translation.lug: Erias Lukwago, munnamateeka w'oludda oluvuganya, yakuba ekitongole ky'eby'okulonda mu mbuga z'amateeka olw'okugaana okujja ebifo ebironderwamu mu bbalakisi z'amagye.

translation.en: He said the Electoral Commission refused to phase out polling stations at Summit View barracks.
translation.lug: Yagamba nti ekitongole ky'eby'okulonda kyagaana okuggya ekifo ekironderwamu mu bbalakisi eri ku Summit View.

translation.en: All these polling stations are in Kampala Central Division where Lukwago is Member of Parliament.
translation.lug: Ebifo bino byonna ebironderwamu biri mu Kampala, Lukwago mw'ali omukiise mu paliyamenti.

translation.en: Lukwago says keeping such polling stations inside the military barracks would encourage rigging.
translation.lug: Lukwago agamba nti okuteeka ebifo ebironderwamu mu bbalakisi kikifuula kyangu okubba obululu.

translation.en: Lukwago wants the polling stations to be moved to a more friendly place outside the barracks.
translation.lug: Lukwago ayagala ebifo ebironderwamu okussibwa mu bifo ebitassa bantu ku bunkenke nga bwe kiba mu bbalakisi.

translation.en: Makindye West Member of Pariliament Hussein Kyanjo also has threatened to take the Electoral Commission to court.
translation.lug: Hussein Kyanjo, omukiise mu paliyamenti owa Makindye West naye ayagala kukuba kitongole ky'eby'okulonda mu mbuga z'amateeka.

translation.en: Kyanjo said one of the illegal polling station is Nsambya Police Barracks.
translation.lug: Kyanjo yagamba nti ekimu ku bifo ebironderwamu ebimenya amateeka ky'ekyo ekiri mu bbalakisi ya poliisi e Nsambya.

translation.en: We have advised the electoral commission in good faith but they have failed to listen.
translation.lug: Mu mwoyo mulungi twagamba ab'ekitongole ky'eby'okulonda okukiggyayo naye bagaanye okuwuliriza .

translation.en: Kyanjo said the opposition shall go to court or those with shallow brains will resort to violence.
translation.lug: Kyanjo yagamba nti ab'oludda oluvuganya bajja kugenda mu kkooti oba abo ab'obwongo obutono bajja kukola ebikolwa ebyefujjo.

translation.en: Electoral Commission Secretary Sam Rwakoojo said they phased out polling stations in the barracks long ago.
translation.lug: Sam Rwakoojo, omuwandiisi w'ekitongole ky'eby'okulonda yagamba nti ebifo ebirondebwamu baabiggya dda mu bbalakisi.

translation.en: Rwakoojo said the Electoral Commission cannot do anything about Kyanjo’s complaint.
translation.lug: Rwakoojo yagamba nti ekibiina ky'eby'okulonda tekirina kya kukola ku ebyo Kyanjo bye yeemulugunyaako.

translation.en: Lukwago is seeking court to halt the ongoing display of voters register until it is published in the gazette and print media.
translation.lug: Lukwago ayagala kooti eyimirize eky'okutimba olukalala lw'abalonzi olwo okutuusa nga lumaze okufulumizibwa mu magazini ya gazette ne mu mpapula z'amawulire.

translation.en: The opposition also is complaining that Electoral Commission did not involve them in constituting the parish tribunals.
translation.lug: Ab'oludda oluvuganya era beemulugunya nti ekitongole ky'eby'okulonda tekyabakkiriza kwenyigira mu kussaawo kooti z'ebitundu.

translation.en: Matthias Nsubuga, the Democratic Party General Secretary, says this is a plan to allow vote rigging.
translation.lug: Matthias Nsubuga, omuwandiisi wa DP, agamba nti luno lukwe lwa kubba kalulu.

translation.en: Salaam Musumba says the law requires the judiciary to constitute the parish tribunals in consultation with the political parties.
translation.lug: Salaam Musumba agamba nti amateeka geetaagisa ekitongole ekiramuzi okussaawo kooti z'omu bitundu oluvannyuma lw'okwebuuza ku bibiina by'eby'obufuzi.

translation.en: Musumba added that political parties were never given chance to participate in forming the tribunals.
translation.lug: Musumba yagattako nti ebibiina by'obufuzi tebyaweebwa kakisa kwenyigira mu kussawo kooti ezo.

translation.en: Musumba says the Electoral Commission did not ask the opposition a list of people to sit on the different parish tribunals countrywide.
translation.lug: Musumba agamba nti ekitongole ky'eby'okulonda tekyabuuza ba ludda luvuganya kuwaayo nkalala z'abantu ab'okuweereza mu kkooti z'ebyalo ezitali zimu okwetoola eggwanga.

translation.en: Rwakoojo argued that there wasn’t enough time to properly constitute the tribunals as required by the law.
translation.lug: Rwakoojo yagamba nti tewaali budde bumala kuteekateeka kkooti ezo ng'amateeka bwe galagira.

translation.en: Rwakoojo said that in some areas of Uganda these parish tribunals were none existent.
translation.lug: Rwakoojo agamba nti mu bitundu bya Uganda ebimu kkooti z'ebyalo ezo tezaaliyo.

translation.en: Engineer Badru Kiggundu blamed the opposition for lack of grassroots structures in every parish countrywide.
translation.lug: Yinginiya Badru Kiggundu yanenya ab'oludda oluvuganya olw'obutaba na bakiise mu buli kitundu ky'eggwanga.

translation.en: There's another sticking issue of voters’ cards for 2011 elections.
translation.lug: Ensonga endala ey'amaanyi ekwata ku kaadi z'abalonzi ezinaakozesebwa mu kulonda kwa 2011.

translation.en: The Electoral Commission has said it will not issue voters cards because it’s too expensive.
translation.lug: Ekitongole ky'eby'okulonda kigambye nti tekijja kuwa bantu kaadi za kulonda kubanga zeetaagisa ssente nnyingi nnyo.

translation.en: Musumba dismissed the Electoral Commission argument, saying it amounts to failure of its responsibility.
translation.lug: Musumba yagamba nti ensonga ekitongole ky'eby'okulonda gy'ewa teriimu ggumba era nti ekyo kiraga nti kiremereddwa okutuukiriza obuvunaanyizibwa bwakyo.
