translation.en: Rwakoojo said the voters’ cards are not provided for in the Electoral Commission budget because the government would be issuing national identity cards soon.
translation.lug: Rwakoojo yagamba nti kaadi z'abalonzi tezaali ku bbajeti ya kitongole ky'eby'okulonda kubanga gavumenti yali eneetera okuwa abantu ndagamuntu.

translation.en: Rwakoojo said it would be financially irresponsible if the Electoral Commission issued voters’ cards now when government is to offer national identity cards later.
translation.lug: Rwakoojo yagamba nti kwandibadde kudiibuuda ssente singa ekitongole ky'eby'okulonda kiwa abantu kaadi z'okulonda ate nga gavumenti egenda kubawa ndagamuntu.

translation.en: Tom Buruku, an Electoral Commissioner, said a lot of voters cards in the previous elections were still lying uncollected.
translation.lug: Tom Buruku, omukozi mu kitongole ky'eby'okulonda, yagamba nti kaadi z'abalonzi nnyingi ezaali zirina okukozesebwa mu kulonda okwaggwa zikyali eyo abantu tebazikimanga.

translation.en: Buruku said the Electoral Commission has thousands of voter cards seated at their district offices and at the national office.
translation.lug: Buruku yagamba nti ekitongole ky'eby'okulonda kirina kaadi z'abalonzi nnyingi ezitudde eyo ku ofiisi za disituliki ne ku ofiisi y'eggwanga.

translation.en: Buruku added that it is quite frustrating when people do not pick their cards.
translation.lug: Buruku yagattako nti kitama abantu bwe batakima kaadi zaabwe.

translation.en: Rwakoojo said voters cards which were not collected belong to people who registered late for the 2006 general elections.
translation.lug: Rwakoojo yagamba nti kaadi z'abalonzi ezitaakimwa za bantu abeewandiisa obudde nga buyise mu kulonda kwa 2006.

translation.en: By election time in February 2006 the Electoral Commission had not printed the cards for the people who registered late.
translation.lug: Okulonda we kwabeererawo mu Febwali 2006 ekitongole ky'eby'okulonda kyali tekinnafulumya kaadi z'abo abeewandiisa ekikeerezi.

translation.en: Rwakoojo said Electoral Commission only printed cards for the people who registered early.
translation.lug: Rwakoojo yagamba nti ekitongole ky'eby'okulonda kyakuba kaadi z'abo bokka abeewandiisa nga bukyali.

translation.en: Rwakoojo said some cards were misplaced during the sorting and distributing process before they were sent to the districts.
translation.lug: Rwakoojo yagamba nti kaadi ezimu zaababulako bwe baali bazitegeka era nga bazibunyisa nga tezinnasindikibwa ku disitulikiti.

translation.en: The Electoral Commission has given out cards which voters use to identify themselves at the polling stations.
translation.lug: Ekitongole ky'eby'okulonda kigabye kaadi abalonzi ze balagayo mu bifo ebironderwamu.

translation.en: Rwokoojo last week, said the voters’ cards had become irrelevant since some unethical people in town were forging them.
translation.lug: Wiiki ewedde, Rwokoojo yagamba nti kaadi z'abalonzi tezikyalina makulu kubanga abantu abamu mu kibuga baali bazigingirira.

translation.en: The Democratic Party has not entered, and has no intention of entering into an alliance with Uganda Peoples Congress.
translation.lug: Aba DP tebannayingira mu mukago na UPC era tebalina kiruubirirwa kya kuguyingiramu.

translation.en: Semogerere was commenting on the reported joint press conference held by veteran Democratic Party and National Consultative Council member, Mr Sebalu.
translation.lug: Semogerere yali ayogera ku lukungaana lwe yali nalwo ne Mw. Sebalu, eyaliko memba wa DP ne National Consultative Council.

translation.en: Semogerere said that the Democratic Party has not been a party to the statement.
translation.lug: Semogerere yagamba nti DP ensonga ezo teyaziriimu.

translation.en: Semogerere said the Democratic Party approves the proposals to hold a general election this year.
translation.lug: Semogerere yagamba nti DP ekkiriziganya n'ekiteeso eky'okuba n'okulonda kwa bonna omwaka guno.

translation.en: Semogerere said that if there will be any presidential election, such election ought to be held concurrently with the parliamentary elections.
translation.lug: Semogerere yagamba nti okulonda kwa pulezidenti kusaanidde okubaawo mu kiseera kye kimu n'okulonda kw'ababaka ba paliyamenti.

translation.en: Semogerere said that Democratic Party is opposed to the banning of political parties.
translation.lug: Semogerere yagamba nti DP tewagira kya kuwera bibiina bya bufuzi.

translation.en: Semogerere said that his party is convinced that it is useful in the interests of national unity.
translation.lug: Semogerere yagamba nti ekibiina kye kikakafu nti kiyamba mu kutwala eggwanga mu maaso.

translation.en: Democratic Party has no objections to holding the forthcoming general elections under the Uganda National Liberation Front.
translation.lug: DP terina buzibu kwenyigira mu kulonda okujja ng'eri wansi w'omukago gwa Uganda National Liberation Front.

translation.en: Semogerere noted that some of the proposals made in the recent joint statement had not been discussed.
translation.lug: Semogerere yagamba nti ebimu ku biteeso ebiri mu kiwandiiko eky'awamu ekyavulumizibwa gye buvuddeko awo tezaayogerwako.

translation.en: Muwanga and Sebalu told newsmen that their two parties, advocated for an electoral system that would allow the national political parties under their identities.
translation.lug: Muwanga ne Sebalu baagamba bannamawulire nti ebibiina byabwe ebibiri, baagala okulonda kubeewo ng'ebibiina byesimbawo mu mannya gaabyo.

translation.en: Mr Dan Wadada Nabudere, has said there is need to make some amendments in the 1967 constitution because it gives too much power to the President.
translation.lug: Mr Dan Wadada Nabudere, yagamba nti kyetaagisa okukola enkyukakyuka mu ssemateeka wa 1967 kubanga awa pulezidenti obuyinza bungi.

translation.en: Nabudere was officially opening the Uganda National Liberation Front Jinja Branch.
translation.lug: Nabudere yali agulawo mu butongole ettabi lya Uganda National Liberation Front ery'e Jinja.

translation.en: Nabudere emphasised that the task of restoring democracy in Uganda was one of the top priorities of the Uganda National Liberation Front  government.
translation.lug: Nabudere yakikkaatiriza nti ekimu ku bigendererwa bya Uganda National Liberation Front ebikulu kwe kuzzaawo demokulasiya mu Uganda.

translation.en: Nabudere added that the Uganda National Liberation Front stands for national unity of all the people, regardless of political and religious differences.
translation.lug: Nabudere yagattako nti omukago gwa Uganda National Liberation Front guleetawo obumu mu bantu bonna ka babe ba kibiina ki oba ddiini ki.

translation.en: The development of the online voter register was supported through a six hundred thousand dollar grant to International Foundation for Electoral Systems.
translation.lug: Doola emitwalo omukaaga ezaaweebwa ekitongole kya International Foundation for Electoral Systems ze zaakozesebwa mu kukola olukalala lw'abalonzi olw'oku intaneeti.

translation.en: Hussein Kyanjo said he would sue the Electoral Commission for creating more villages and polling stations in his constituency.
translation.lug: Hussein Kyanjo yagamba nti yali wa kukuba ekitongole ky'eby'okulonda mu mbuga z'amateeka olw'okuteekawo ebyalo n'ebifo ebironderwamu eby'ekimpatiira mu kitundu kyatwala.

translation.en: Nsambya Police Barracks polling station is not yet fully open to the black.
translation.lug: Ekifo awalonderwa mu bbalakisi y'e Nsambya tekinnagulwawo mu bujjuvu.

translation.en: Rwakoojo said he would consult the Local Government Minister on whether the zones the Electoral Commission used to create polling stations exist.
translation.lug: Rwakoojo yagamba nti ajja kwebuuza ku minisita wa gavumenti z'ebitundu obanga zooni ekitongole ky'eby'okulonda bye kyakozesa okussaawo ebifo awalonderwa ddala gyeziri.

translation.en: Uganda Communications Commission boss Patrick Mwesigwa customer makes a call from a public pay phone in Kampala.
translation.lug: Kasitoma wa Patrick Mwesigwa, omukungu w'ekitongole kya Uganda Communications Commission akuba essimu mu kifo ekya lukale mu Kampala.

translation.en: Stephen Mwanje is the Managing Director of  Forex Bureau and chairman of the Uganda Forex Bureau and Money Remittence Association .
translation.lug: Stephen Mwanje ye maneja addukanya ekibanda kya ssente era owa ssentebe wa Uganda Forex Bureau and Money Remittence Association .

translation.en: Common Market opens business  opportunities and challenges when you start your day.
translation.lug: Akatale katandika okukola era emikisa gy'okukola ssente giggulwawo naye era olunaku lubaamu n'ebisoomooza.

translation.en: You start your day at 4:45am.
translation.lug: Nzuukuka ku makya nnyo ku saawa 10:45.

translation.en: I stay in Mukono and I have a daughter and son that I drop at Greenhill Academy.
translation.lug: Nsula Mukono era nnina mutabani wange ne muwala wange be nsooka okutwala ku ssomero lya Greenhill Academy.

translation.en: So if am to get to beat the jam and get to office by 7:00am, I must leave home by 6:00 am.
translation.lug: Bwe mba ow'okwewala okukwatibwa jaamu saawa 1:00 ez'oku makya zisobole okunsanga ku ofiisi, saawa 12 ez'oku makya we zituukira mba nnina okuba nga nvudde awaka.

translation.en: I am also the Chairman of Uganda Forex Bureau and Money Remittance Association, and the Chairman of the Diocesan Advisory Committee for Centenary Bank.
translation.lug: Era nze ssentebbe wa Uganda Forex Bureau and Money Remittance Association, era nze ssentebe wa Diocesan Advisory Committee for Centenary Bank.

translation.en: But my biggest challenge is that for 2010-2011.
translation.lug: Naye okusoomooza okwa maanyi kwe nnina kwe kwa 2010-2011.

translation.en: I am the District Governor for Rotary District 9200, which covers Eritrea, Ethiopia, Kenya, Tanzania and Uganda.
translation.lug: Nze District Governor owa Rotary District 9200, ekiddukanya emirimu mu Eritrea, Ethiopia, Kenya, Tanzania ne Uganda.

translation.en: What impact will the East African Community common market have on the Forex Bureau business?
translation.lug: Omukago gw'amawanga ag'omu buvanjuba bwa Afirika gunaakwata gutya ku bizineesi y'ebibanda bya ssente?

translation.en: What advantages does the East African Community Common Market bring to service providers like you?
translation.lug: Birungi ki abantu abakola emirimu ng'egigyo bye bajja okufuna mu katale akagatta awamu amawanga g'omu buvanjuba bwa Afirika?

translation.en: What is the future of forex business in the East African Community Common Market?
translation.lug: Ebiseera by'omu mu maaso ebya bizineesi y'ebibanda bya ssente binaaba bitya wansi wa w'akatale akagatta amawanga g'omu buvanjuba bwa Afirika?

translation.en: During the transition, there shall be need for review of our laws that govern the Foreign Exchange Operations .
translation.lug: Ng'enkyukakyuka eyo egenda mu maaso tujja kwetaaga okuddamu okwekenneenya amateeka agafuga enzirukanya y'ebibanda bya ssente.

translation.en: But one gentleman that really made an impact on my life is Professor Munene of Makerere University, who was my supervisor for my Masters in Business Administration dissertation.
translation.lug: Naye omusajja eyannyamba ennyo mu bulamu ye Profesa Munene owa yunivasite y'e Makerere, eyannungamya nga nsoma diguli ya masita mu bya bizineesi.

translation.en: Development Finance Company of Uganda Bank last week announced stronger half year growth results, keeping the bank on track to achieve its 2010 targets.
translation.lug: Wiiki ewedde, bbanka ya DFCU yalangirira enkulaakulana gye yali etuuseemu mu myezi omukaaga egiyise, ne kiraga nti bbanka eyo eyolekedde okutuuka ku biruubirirwa byayo ebya 2010.

translation.en: The bank’s Managing Director, Juma Kisaame, while releasing the results said the growth indicates an improvement compared to the same period in 2009.
translation.lug: Bwe yabadde afulumya alipoota eyo, maneja wa bbanka eyo, Juma Kisaame, yagambye nti alipoota eraga nti wabaddewo enkulaakulana ya maanyi okusinga bwe kyali mu 2009.

translation.en: The bank’s net profit grew to shillings eleven point six billion from shillings eight point seven billion posted in the same period last year.
translation.lug: Amagoba ga bbanka gaalina okuva ku buwumbi munaana mu obukadde lusanvu omwaka oguwedde ne gatuuka ku buwumbi kumi na kamu mu obukadde lukaaga omwaka guno.

translation.en: Total assets grew to shillings seven hundred ten point nine billion from five hundred forty five billion in June 2009.
translation.lug: Omuwendo gwa ssente ezibalirirwa mu bintu byayo gwalinnya okuva ku buwumbi 545 mu Jjuuni 2009 ne gutuuka ku buwumbi nga 711 omwaka guno.

translation.en: Customer deposits grew to four hundred nineteen billion, up from two hundred eighty four billion in June 2009.
translation.lug: Ssente bakasitoma ze batereka mu bbanka zaalinnya okuva ku buwumbi 284 mu Jjuuni 2009 okutuuka ku buwumbi 419 omwaka guno.

translation.en: All the bank fundamentals are looking better than they were last year.
translation.lug: Ebitongole bya bbanka byonna birinye omutindo.

translation.en: Uganda Clays Limited, the manufacturers of clay construction materials, is negotiating for credit worth eleven point five billion from the National Social Security Fund .
translation.lug: Ekitongole kya Uganda Clays abakola eby'okuzimbisa mu bbumba, kyagala okwewola obuwumbi kkumi na kamu n'ekitundu okuva mu NSSF.

translation.en: The Finance Manager Richard Kajungu told shareholders at the company’s Annual General Meeting that the National Social Security Fund Board has approved the loan.
translation.lug: Mu lukungaana olubaawo mu mwaka, maneja w'eby'ensimbi Richard Kajungu yategeeza abalina emigabo mu kampuni eyo nti NSSF yakkiriza okubawola ssente ezo.

translation.en: Three billion of the loan will be used to facilitate the second phase of the factory slated to start next year.
translation.lug: Obuwumbi busatu ku ssente ezo bujja kukozesebwa mu kuzimba ekkolero ery'okubiri okujja okutandika omwaka ogujja.

translation.en: The company also plans to modernise its semi automated Kajjansi based factory by 2013.
translation.lug: Kampuni era eteekateeka okulinnyisa omutindo gw'ekkolero ly'e Kajjansi omwaka gwa 2013 we gunaatuukira.

translation.en: The other part of the money will help the company cut back costs of financing outstanding loans it received from Standard Chartered Bank and the East Africa. Development Bank.
translation.lug: Ssente endala zijja kuyamba kampuni okukeendeeza ku nsaasaanya ezikolebwa ku looni z'efuna okuva mu Standard Chartered Bank ne East Africa Development Bank.

translation.en: The loans were secured three years ago to help the company construct its second factory in Kamonkoli in eastern Uganda.
translation.lug: Kampuni yafuna looni emyaka essatu emabega esobole okuzimba ekkolero lyayo ery'okubiri e Kamonkoli mu buvanjuba bwa Uganda.

translation.en: Six month old Pinnacle Security Limited last week said they had acquired a hundred percent ownership of Protectorate Specialist Protection Consultants.
translation.lug: Ekitongole kya Pinnacle Security Limited ekyakaweza emyezi mukaaga, wiiki ewedde kyagamba nti kyafuna obuyinza obwenkomeredde ku bwannanyini bwa Protectorate Specialist Protection Consultants.

translation.en: The merger is looked at as a new development in the private security industry in Uganda.
translation.lug: Okwegatta okwo kutwalibwa ng'enkulaakulana empya etukiddwako mu by'okwerinda mu Uganda.

translation.en: Pinnacle Group Vice Chairman Vincent Kayemba said the merger is aimed at creating a world class and a redefined security firm with an unparalleled network providing outstanding customer service.
translation.lug: Vincent Kayemba Omumyuka wa Ssentebe wa Pinnacle Group yagamba nti okwegatta okwo kugendereddwa okutondawo eby'okwerinda ebiri ku mutindo gw'ensi yonna era nga biwa abantu obuweereza obuli ku mutindo ogwa waggulu ennyo.

translation.en: Pinnacle Security focuses on building a diplomatic security company with special emphasis on specialised security and risk management solutions.
translation.lug: Pinnacle Security essa essira ku kutumbula ekitongole ky'eby'okwerinda ekirina obukugu mu kukuuma eddembe n'okugonjoola ebizibu.

translation.en: Protectorate Special Police Constable was founded by the Haworth family originally based in the United Kingdom in 1998.
translation.lug: Ekitongole kya Protectorate Special Police Constable kyatandikibwawo amaka ga Haworth nga mu kusooka kyali mu Bungereza mu 1998.

translation.en: Special Police Constable is among the top five security companies in Uganda.
translation.lug: Ekitongole kya Special Police Constable kye kimu ku bitongole by'okwerinda ebitaano ebya waggulu mu Uganda.

translation.en: Pinnacle Security is worth five billion and has invested three billion into Protectorate Special Police Constable.
translation.lug: Ekitongole kya Pinnacle Security kibalirirwamu obuwumbi butaano era kyassa obuwumbi busatu mu kitongole kya Protectorate Special Police Constable.

translation.en: Uganda clays borrows eleven billion from workers fund Tanzania’s private airline, Precision Air, has added a sixth plane to its fleet.
translation.lug: Uganda clays yeewola obuwumbi kkumi na kamu okuva mu workers fund Tanzania’s private airline, Precision Air, eyeeyongeddeko ennyonyi ey'omukaaga ku nnyonyi zaayo.

translation.en: Other aircraft in the fleet have names like Kigoma, Zanzibar, Mwanza and Musoma.
translation.lug: Ennyonyi endala z'erina zirina amannya gamba nga Kigoma, Zanzibar, Mwanza ne Musoma.

translation.en: In 2006, the airline and Toulouse based Regional Transport Airplanes signed a one hundred twenty six million dollars deal to deliver seven brand new aircraft.
translation.lug: Mu 2006, ekitongole ky'ennyonyi kyakola endagaano ya doola obukadde 126 ne kampuni y'ennyonyi ey'e Toulouse okuguza Uganda ennyonyi musanvu empya ttuku.

translation.en: Up to six aircraft have been delivered from when the deal was signed and the fin al plane will be delivered in September 2010.
translation.lug: Okuva endagaano eyo bwe yakolebwa, ennyonyi mukaaga zaamala ddala okutuuka era endala ejja kuleetebwa mu Ssebutemba 2010.

translation.en: Precision air flies to Mombasa’s Moi International Airport, Jomo Kenyatta International Airport in Kenya and Entebbe International Airport in Uganda.
translation.lug: Ennyonyi ya Precision ebuuka n'etuuka ku kisaawe kya Mombasa’s Moi, ku kya Jomo Kenyatta mu Kenya, oluvannyuma n'etuuka ku kisaawe ky'Entebbe mu Uganda.

translation.en: An Australian newspaper reported last week that SAB-Miller had hired JPMorgan and Royal Bank of Scotland as advisers for a potential bid but no decision has yet been made.
translation.lug: Olupapula lw'amawulire mu Australian lwagamba wiiki ewedde ekitongole kya SAB-Miller kyali kipangisizza JPMorgan ne Royal Bank of Scotland okukiwa amagezi ku nsonga emu ey'eby'obusuubuzi gye kyali kitannasalawo.

translation.en: SABMiller generates about eighty five percent of its profits from the emerging markets of Latin America, Africa and Asia.
translation.lug: Ebitundu 85 ku buli kikumi ekya ssente ekitongole kya SAB-Miller kye zifuna kizikola mu butale obuli mu Latin America, Afirika, ne Asiya.

translation.en: Low paid South Africans who last year campaigned for Jacob Zuma as the people’s president now say he has betrayed them.
translation.lug: Abantu b'omu South Africans bamufuna mpola abaalonda Jacob Zuma okuba pulezidenti kati bagamba nti yabalyamu olukwe.

translation.en: These are some of the people who brought Zuma to power.
translation.lug: Bano be bamu ku bantu abaaleeta Zuma mu buyinza.

translation.en: As the strike raged, the same people were potentially talking about getting Zuma out.
translation.lug: Okwekalakaasa bwe kwali kugenda mu maaso, abantu abo be bamu baali bagamba nti baagala Zuma alekulire.

translation.en: The Congress of South African Trade Unions was one of the key players in the Zuma for president campaign.
translation.lug: Ekibiina kya Congress of South African Trade Unions kye kimu ku byasemba Zuma okuba pulezidenti.

translation.en: But there are also deep policy divisions and critics of Zuma in the unions want him to scrap the labour brokering system which bypasses unions pay negotiations.
translation.lug: Naye era waliwo okwemulugunya kwa maanyi mu nkola y'ebintu era abavumirira Zuma bamusaba aggyewo enkola y'abakozi okufunira emirimu okuyitira mu babbulooka kubanga etaataaganya ensasula y'abakozi eyakkiriziganyibwako.

translation.en: Zuma has wanted to please everybody but in this kind of situation you can’t please everybody.
translation.lug: Zuma ayagala nnyo okusanyusa buli omu naye ku luno ekyo tekisoboka.

translation.en: The strike could be a tipping point author William Gumede told South Africa’s Mail and Guardian newspaper.
translation.lug: Omuwandiisi William Gumede yagamba olupapula lw'amawulire olwa South Africa’s Mail ne Guardian nti  okwekalakaasa kuno kuyinza okuba nga kugenda kuleetawo enkyukakyuka ey'amaanyi .

translation.en: The Youth League, previously seen as another pillar of support for Zuma, has even more radical policy demands.
translation.lug: Ate bo aba Youth League, abamanyiddwa okuba ng'emabega nabo baali bawagira Zuma, balina n'enkyukakyuka endala ez'amaanyi ze basaba zikolebwe mu ntambula y'ebintu.

translation.en: After being criticised for indulging the ruling party youth league leader Julius Malema.
translation.lug: Julius Malema, akulira Youth League, oluvannyuma lw'okuvumirirwa olw'engeri gyea yali akolaganyeemu n'ekibiina ekiri mu buyinza.

translation.en: In response, Mr Malema, who once vowed to kill for Zuma is now turning his vitriol against the president.
translation.lug: Mu kwerwanako, Mw Malema, olumu eyagamba nti yali asobola okuta omuntu yenna amukwatira ku Zuma kati yali amukyukidde.

translation.en: Now that you are given power by the people of South Africa, you still go to the Queen  of England and behave like you don’t have power from the people.
translation.lug: Kati oluvannyuma lw'abantu ba South Africa okukukwasa obuyinza, okyagenda eri Nnaabakyala wa Bungereza nga weeyisa ng'atalina buyinza.

translation.en: Until now, Zuma had not said much about the strike, instead continuing with his pre planned presidential duties.
translation.lug: Okutuusa mu kaseera ako, Zuma yali talina kya maanyi ky'ayogedde ku kwekalakaasa okwo, era yagendanga bugenzi mu maaso nga yeekolera mirimu gye egy'obwa pulezidenti.

translation.en: What is Zuma doing in China while we struggle?
translation.lug: Kiki Zuma ky'akola mu China nga ffe tuli eno tulwana?

translation.en: These are some of the people who brought Zuma to power.
translation.lug: Bano be bamu ku bantu abaayamba Zuma okujja mu buyinza.

translation.en: As this strike goes on, the same people are potentially talking about getting Zuma out.
translation.lug: Ng'okwekalakaasa kuno kugenda mu maaso, abantu abo be bamu boogera ku ky'okuggya Zuma mu buyinza.

translation.en: But Mr Zuma has also been under pressure not to destroy Africa’s strongest economy.
translation.lug: Kyokka era Zuma ateekeddwako akazito obutasuula bya nfuna bya nsi ya Afirika esingayo okuba ey'amaanyi mu by'enfuna.

translation.en: While advances to customers increased to three hundred sixty five billion from three hundred and six billion in June 2009.
translation.lug: Mu kiseera kye kim, ssente bbanka ze ziwa bakasitoma zeeyongera okuva ku buwumbi 306 mu Jjuuni 2009 ne zituuka ku buwumbi 365.

translation.en: Zuma was finally moved to rebuke him after the young firebrand praised Zimbabwe's President Robert Mugabe while on a trip to Harare earlier this year.
translation.lug: Kya ddaaki Zuma yawalirizibwa okunenya omuvubuka eyawaana pulezidenti wa Zimbabwe, Robert Mugabe bwe yagendako mu Harare ku ntandikwa y'omwaka guno.

translation.en: I dont believe Zuma has the capability to offer leadership that would steer up the country beyond her current challenges.
translation.lug: Si kiwa nti obukulembeze bwa Zuma busobola okuyamba ensi yaffe okuvuunuka ebizibu bw'erimu kati.

translation.en: Zuma's obituary has already been written and will need all his survival instincts to see off these challeneges.
translation.lug: Simanyi Zuma kyakyayinza kukola kugonjoola bizibu bino.

translation.en: Industrial strikes detered Zuma's chances of acquiring a second term as South African civil servants staged an indefinite nation wide strike.
translation.lug: Abakozi ba kampuni okwekalakaasa kyalemesa Zuma okuweebwa ekisanja eky'okubiri.

translation.en: Between September third and nineth two thousand ten, the Independent wrote about an organised house party in Munyonyo in early tho thousand nine.
translation.lug: Wakati wa Ssebutemba 3 ne 9, 2010 olupapula lwa Independent lwawandiika ku kabaga ak'omu nnyumbaa akaategekebwa e Munyonyo ku ntandikwa ya 2009.

translation.en: At one point, a whisper circulated amongst those in attendance that Qwela would be performing.
translation.lug: Bwe kaali kagenda mu maaso, oluvuuvuumo lwatandika okuyita nti aba bbandi ya Qwela baali bagenda kuyimba.

translation.en: After the show, Qwela had to push their van out of the mud from where it had gotten stuck.
translation.lug: Oluvannyuma lw'akabaga ako, aba Qwela baalina okusindika emmotoka yaabwe okuva mu bisooto mwe yali eremedde.

translation.en: Over a year later, Qwela was nolonger stuck in the mud.
translation.lug: Oluvannyuma lw'omwaka okusukka mu gumu, aba Qwela baali tebakyalemedde mu bisooto.

translation.en: On August twentieth, they held a much publicised and hugely well received concert at Serena Hotel with fifty thousand shillings per ticket.
translation.lug: Nga Agusito 20, baategeka ekivvulu eky'amaanyi ku Serena Hotel era buli tikiti yali egula emitwalo etaano.

translation.en: The band played, sang, and danced for over three hours and left the stage with an applause from hundreds of spectators.
translation.lug: Aba bbandi eyo baazannya, baayimba, era baazina okumala essaawa ezisukka mu ssatu era baasanyusa nnyo enkumi n'enkumi z'abantu abajja okubalaba.

translation.en: One of the audience members, Darlyne Kyomukama said that the combination of Kinyarwanda and electric guitar was probably the best thing she had ever seen.
translation.lug: Darlyne Kyomukama, omu ku balabi, yagamba nti engeri gye baakwanaganyaamu Olunnyarwanda ne ggita y'amasannyalaze kye kintu ekikyasinzeeyo okusanyusa kye nnali ndabye.

translation.en: The music incorporated the strains of Fela Kuti, Santana, Eric Wainanina, Habib Koite and many more.
translation.lug: Ennyimba zaabwe zaalimu enkuba ya Fela Kuti, Santana, Eric Wainanina, Habib Koite, n'abalala bangi.

translation.en: The shouts coming from crowd during guitarist Michael Ouma's massively elaborate and extended solos seemed to draw surprise and delight.
translation.lug: Enduulu abantu ze baakubanga nga Michael Ouma asuna endongo zaali zeewuunyisa era nga zireeta akamwenyumwenyu.

translation.en: The production values, sound quality and professionalism exhibited at the show was world class.
translation.lug: Buli kimu kye baali bakola kyali ku mutindo gwa nsi yonna.

translation.en: For Joe Kahirimbanyi, singer, guitarist and band leader of Qwela, it was asn indicator of what's to come.
translation.lug: Joe Kahirimbanyi, omuyimbi, omukubi wa ggita, era akulembera bbandi ya Qwela yagamba nti ekyaliwo ku olwo kiraga nti waliwo ebirala bingi ebijja.

translation.en: He predicts that Afro-Fusion will happen in a big way within the next two years.
translation.lug: Yagamba mu myaka ebiri egijja, ennyimba z'Abafirika zigenda kweyongera okulabikira ku siteegi ennene.

translation.en: The recurring themes in Afro-Fusion separate the style from others because musicians are technically proficient and have a wide variety of musical influences.
translation.lug: Abayimbi Abafirika ba njawulo nnyo ku balala kubanga balina obukugu bungi era bayimba ku bintu bingi.

translation.en: One song detailed the story of a child soldier in Nothern Uganda.
translation.lug: Oluyimba olumu lwali lwogera ku mwana mu bukiikakkono bwa Uganda eyayingira amagye ng'akyali muto.

translation.en: Music has been referred to as the bloodless revolution as explained by Mister Kahirimbanyi.
translation.lug: Mister Kahirimbanyi yagamba nti ennyimba zirina amaanyi.

translation.en: Francis said that they aim at creating a distinctive  sound for Uganda that people will recognise as Ugandan just like Congolese music or West African music.
translation.lug: Francis yagamba nti zikubwa n'ekigendererwa eky'okulaga enjawulo, ng'omuntu bw'awulira oluyimba amanyirawo nti olwo lusibuka Ugand, nga bwe kiri ne ku nnyimba z'e Congo oba ez'amawanga agali mu bugwanjuba bwa Afirika.

translation.en: Qwela joins a generation of young, hungry artisitic Ugandans who are proud of their nationality and are acutely aware of the associated problems.
translation.lug: Aba Qwela beegasse ku mugigi gw'abavubuka Bannayuganda abayimbi beenyumiriza mu ggwanga lyabwe era abamanyi obulungi ebizibu lye birina.

translation.en: Local film makers fighting Holywood and Bollywood, young visual artists who turn their backs on the art promoters have the same challenges.
translation.lug: Abakozi ba firimu aba wano abavuganya ne Holywood ne Bollywood, abavubuka abalina ebirooto abeetongola ku bapromoota baabwe basanga okusoomooza kwe kumu.

translation.en: The promise of the genre was evident at Qwela's concert.
translation.lug: Ekivulu kya Qwela kyalaga nti aba bbandi eno baali ba njawulo nnyo.

translation.en: The people in attendance were diverse in terms of race, sex, age and were all enjoying themselves.
translation.lug: Abantu abajja mu kivvulu kino baali ba mawanga ga njawulo, ekikula kya njawulo, n'emyaka gya njawulo era bonna baali banyumirwa ebigenda mu maaso.

translation.en: Probably the biggest cheer of the night came in response to mister Kahirimbanyi's rallying call of "its a little bit of Africa".
translation.lug: Kirabika ekintu ekyasinga okubya abantu eduulu ku olwo bye bigambo Mw Kahirimbanyi bye yayogera nti "kino kiringa kya Kifirika".

translation.en: This is our music, this is Africa and this is who we are.
translation.lug: Zino ze nnyimba zaffe, eno Afirika era kino kye tuli.

translation.en: Most of the Afro-Fusion bands have been around for two or three years.
translation.lug: Bbandi z'Ekifirika esizinga obungi zibaddewo kumala myaka ebiri oba esatu.

translation.en: The large concert gave Qwela the chance to showcase their own song writing talents and also to express themselves fully.
translation.lug: Ekivulu ekyo ekinenen kyawa aba bbandi ya Qwela akakisa okulaga obukugu bwe balina mu kuwandiika ennyimba n'okwolesa kye balinawo.

translation.en: Over the next month or so, there were several high profile gigs for Afro-Fusion band. that is Bayimbi Festival showcasing between September seventeenth and nineteenth
translation.lug: Bakazannyirizi abatiikirivu baamala omwezi mulamba nga boogera ku ekyo bbandi eyo ey'Ekifirika kye yakola, gamba ng'ekivvulu kya Bayimbi Festival ekyaliwo okuva nga 17 okutuuka nga 19 Ssebutemba.

translation.en: In two thousand nine. mister Kahirimbanyi realised that the music scene in Kampala was starting to pay attention to the Afro-Fusion's Katch the Sun in Bugolobi.
translation.lug: Mu 2009 minisita Kahirimbanyi yakyetegereza nti abayimbi bangi mu Kampala baali batandise okwetannira ennyo Afro-Fusion's Katch the Sun e Bugolobi.

translation.en: On the evidence of that astonishing concert at Serena hotel, that is a feeling he has to get used to.
translation.lug: Okusinziira ku ekyo kye yalaba mu kivvulu ekyali ku Serena ekyo tekisaanidde kumwawuunyisa.

translation.en: The Independent wrote about Qwela's real coming out and performance at Serena hotel between September third and nineth two thousand ten.
translation.lug: Olupapula lwa Independent lwawandiika ku ngeri bbandi ya Qwela gye yaggyayo n'ag'omu buto mu kivvulu ekyali ku Serena okuva nga 3 okutuuka nga 9, 2010.

translation.en: W zero zero twenty five is the bond number.
translation.lug: W zeero zeero abiri mu ttaano ye nnamba ya bondi.

translation.en: They are nearing Uganda Manufacturers Association Lugogo, the mobile numbers are zero seven seven or zero seven one two followed by the same remaining numbers in seven six zero seven eight six.
translation.lug: Bali kumpi ne Uganda Manufacturers Association e Lugogo, nnamba zaabwe ez'essimu zitandika ne 0772 oba 0712, n'ozaako 760786.

translation.en: Shock absorbers dampen the effects of rough terrain, as well as the slight bouncing motion brought about by the springness of the tyre.
translation.lug: Saakamuzooba ziyamba mu butawulira nnyo binnya mipiira mwe girinnya.

translation.en: Hydraulics and shock absorbers are related, if your shock absorber is leaking, there is probably a leaking hydraulic fluid.
translation.lug: Hydrolic w'emmotoka ne sookamuzooba bikolera wamu era emirundi egisinga sookmuzooba bwe zibaako ekizibu kiba kitegeeza hydrolic aliko ekizibu.

translation.en: Your shock absorber is probably made of a fluid filled cylinder with a sliding piston inside of it.
translation.lug: Hydrolic wa saakamuzooba zo ayinza okuba nga mazzi ge batadde mu sirinda omuli pisitoni etambulira munda.

translation.en: The piston absorbs energy through viscous friction which occurs when the hydraulic fluid presses against it and slows down its motion.
translation.lug: Pisitono ekendeeza ku kwegudda kubanga amazzi agali mu sirinda gagikwatirira n'etambula mpolampola.

translation.en: A leaky shock absorber is faulty because it has less hydraulic fluid therefore it provides less and less viscous friction as time goes on.
translation.lug: Sookamuzooba etonnya ebaako obuzibu kubanga ebaamu amazzi matono era ekiseera bwe kigenda kiyitawo gaba tegakyakola bulungi mulimu.

translation.en: Shock absorbers make the drive smooth, though many people think that faulty shock absorbers do not need to be replaced.
translation.lug: Sakamuzooba zinyumisa okuvuga ekidduka, wadde ng'abantu bangi balooza nti sakamuzooba eziriko obuzibu tekyetaagisa kuzikyusa.

translation.en: In actuality, driving with faulty shock absorbers can extremely be dangerous.
translation.lug: Ekituufu kiri nti okuva ekidduka nga kirina sakamuzooba enfu kya bulabe.

translation.en: If a shock absorber is leaking and faulty, it should be replaced immediately.
translation.lug: Singa sakamuzooba eba etonnya era ng'eriko obuzibu eba yeetaaga okukyusibwa amangu ddala.

translation.en: The shock absorbers or dampers in a car's suspension system smooth out the recoil action of the springs.
translation.lug: Sakamuzooba ziyamba ekidduka obutegunda nnyo.

translation.en: One or more faulty shocks absorbers affect a car's handling.
translation.lug: Singa sakamuzooba emu oba n'okusingawo ebaako obuzibu kizibuwaza envuga y'emmotoka.

translation.en: A telescopic shock absorber forms the main suspension leg with a coil spring at the top.
translation.lug: Sakamuzooka ewanirira nnyo emmotoka era ebaako sepulingi waggulu.

translation.en: Rear suspensions have a leaf or coil spring with separate shock absorbers fitted between the axle or suspension arms and the body work.
translation.lug: Ne ku mipiira egy'emabega kuteekebwako sakamuzooba.

translation.en: Checking shock absorbers loosens the wheel nuts, jacks up the car and supports the chasiss on axle stands so that wheels hang free.
translation.lug: Okusobola okukebera sakamuzooba oba olina okuwanika emmotoka emipiira ne giba nga girengejja mu bbanga.

translation.en: Inspect each shock absorber for fluid leaks.
translation.lug: Kebera buli sakamuzooba olabe obanga waliwo ettonnya.

translation.en: Examine the body for deep dents and the piston rod for signs of pitting and rusting.
translation.lug: Zikebere olabe obanga waliwo awakyamye oba awatalazze.

translation.en: The ends of the shock absorber are bolted through rubber bushes.
translation.lug: Sakamuzooba zibaako ne nnatti ezisibiddwa mu bbulaasi.

translation.en: Hold the upper and lower part of the unit and try to move it backwards and forward, then twist it about its mounting bolt.
translation.lug: Gikwate waggulu ne wansi ogezeeko okugitambuza ng'ogizza emabega ne mu maaso, oluvannyuma ginyorere awali nnatti.

translation.en: If there is any movement, replace the bushes.
translation.lug: Bwe wabaawo okutambula kwonna, oba weetaaga okukyusa bbuusi.

translation.en: Place a jack under the suspension arm from a front shock absorber or under the axle at the rear while the car is still on axle stands.
translation.lug: Sakamuzooba zikoleko ng'emmotoka ekyawanikiddwa.

translation.en: Locate the top mounting which may be like the bottom one  or a threaded end of the piston called a pin mounting.
translation.lug: Zzuula nnati ya waggulu efaanana n'eya wansi oba zzuula enjola za pisitono.

translation.en: For a pin mounting, count the number of threads above the nut. the same number must show when the shock absorber is replaced.
translation.lug: Bala omuwendo gw'enjola eziri waggulu wa nnatti era ogwo gwe muwendo ogulina okulabika ng'omaze okukyusa sakamuzooba.

translation.en: Mbabazi win leaves a hard job for Museven as it sparks fear of more rifts in the party.
translation.lug: Obuwanguzi bwa Mbabazi buwa Museven omulimu omunene kubanga wajjawo okutya nti wayinza okujjawo enjawukana endala mu kibiina kyabwe.

translation.en: Otunnu faces revolt as Uganda People's Congress chiefs defy the boycott call.
translation.lug: Abakulu mu kibiina kya UPC bajeemera Otunnu ne bagaana okuzira akalulu nga bwe yali abagambye.

translation.en: How did five billion shillings disappear from the Bank of Uganda?
translation.lug: Ssente obuwumbi obutaano zaabula zita okuva mu bbanka ya Uganda?

translation.en: Fellow Rwandans, i stand before you greatly honoured by your renewed trust and confidence.
translation.lug: Bannyarwanda bannange nnyimirira mu maaso gammwe leero okubasiima ennyo olw'okuddamu okunzisaamu obwesige.

translation.en: We assure Honourable Otafiire that his concerns will be taken care of.
translation.lug: Tukakasa ow'ekitiibwa Otafiire nti okwemulugunya kwe kujja kukolwako.

translation.en: The National Resistance Movement electoral commision chairperson Felistus Magomu asserted that the voter's register will be displayed at the polling stations.
translation.lug: Ssentebe wa NRM, Felistus Magomu, yagamba nti olukalala lw'abalonzi lujja kutimbibwa mu bifo awalonderwa.

translation.en: Otafiire attacked Mbabazi openly for distributing amounts of money to delegates as allowances.
translation.lug: Otafiire yavumirira Mbabazi mu lujjudde olw'okugabira abantu ssente.

translation.en: You heard Mbabazi saying that one of the candidates said that the delegates compalined about receiving less money than they were entitled to.
translation.lug: Mwawulidde Mbabazi ng'agamba nti omu ku beesimbyewo yagambye abantu beemulugunye nti ssente ze baafunye zaabadde ntono ku ze baabadde balina okufuna.

translation.en: According to the World Food Programme, one point six million Kenyans need food this year.
translation.lug: Okusinziira ku kitongole ky'ensi eky'ebyemmere, Bannakenya akakadde kamu mu emitwalo nkaaga beetaaga emmere omwaka guno.

translation.en: Pastoralists, agro-pastoralists and people in marginal agricultural areas are in dire need of food in Kenya.
translation.lug: Mu Kenya, abalunzi n'abalimi abalimira awatono beetaaga emmere.

translation.en: In many places, the market price for maize is between seventy to eighty percent whic h is above the long term average.
translation.lug: Mu bitundu bingi, ssente ezigula kasooli zirinnye okusinga ku we zitera okukoma ne zituuka ku bitundu 70 oba 80 ku buli kikumi.

translation.en: It is no secret internally and abroad that the Rwandan government has strongly attempted to combat divisionism and genocide ideologies in its society.
translation.lug: Kimanyiddwa mu Rwanda ne mu nsi endala nti gavumenti ya Rwanda efubye nnyo okulwanyisa enjawukana n'endowooza ez'ekitta bantu mu bantu baayo.

translation.en: After the nineteen ninety four genocide, it became a priority for the government  to eradicate any potential divisions between Hutus and Tutsis.
translation.lug: Oluvannyuma lw'ekitta bantu ekyaliwo mu 1994, ekimu ku bintu gavumenti by'ebadde esoosoowaza kwe kumalawo enjawukana wakati w'Abahutu n'Abatuusi.

translation.en: Rwandans were told that these ethnic categories were nolonger in existance and the nation was comprised of Rwandans only.
translation.lug: Abanyarwanda baabagamba nti amawanga ago tegakyaliwo era nti kati abantu bonna mu Rwanda bayitibwa Banyarwanda.

translation.en: He targeted teachers to promote patriotism but teachers have been patriotic since nineteen eighty six.
translation.lug: Yakubiriza abasomesa okwagala ennyo ensi yaabwe naye okuva mu 1986 abasomesa babaddenga bakiraga nti baagala nnyo ensi yaabwe.

translation.en: They have been teaching Ugandans at a miserable pay.
translation.lug: Babaddenga basomesa Bannayuganda wadde ng'obusente bwe bafuna butono nnyo.

translation.en: Museveni would have started with his own homestead, the National Resistance Movement.
translation.lug: Museveni yandibadde asooka na babe, ab'ekibiina kya NRM.

translation.en: The way the National Resistance Movement behaved in the primary elections proved that they are highly unpatriotic yet they urge Ugandans to be.
translation.lug: Engeri ab'ekibiina kya NRM gye beeyisizzaamu mu kalulu ak'okusunsulamu eraga nti tebaagala nsi yaabwe kyokka ate nga be bagamba Bannayuganda okwagala ennyo ensi yaabwe.

translation.en: President Museveni blamed the election flaws on selfish leaders who brought about the party's current problems.
translation.lug: Pulezidenti Museveni obuzibu obwaliwo mu kulonda yabussa ku bakulembeze abeerowoozaako bokka abavuddeko ebizibu ebiri mu kibiina kati.

translation.en: Mathew Chapter seven Verse five in the Bible says that first take the plank out of your eye.
translation.lug: Matayo essuula musanvu olunyiriri olw'okutaano mu Bayibuli wagamba nti sooka oggye ekisiki mu liiso lyo.

translation.en: Let Museveni first instill patriotism in his own house before he takes to other homesteads.
translation.lug: Museveni asooke ayambe ab'omu nju ye okwagala ensi yaabwe alyoke ayambe ab'omu maka amalala.

translation.en: Mister President, clean your house first before you tell the neighbour to sweep his house.
translation.lug: Mwami Pulezidenti, sooka olongoose ennyumba yo olwo olyoke ogambe muliraanwa wo okulongoosa eyiye.

translation.en: Professor Sheila Meintjes from  the University of Witwatersrand in Johannesburg told the British Broadcasting Corporation.
translation.lug: Profesa Sheila Meintjes owa yunivasite y'e Witwatersrand ey'omu Johannesburg yagamba ekitongole ky'amawulire ekya BBC.

translation.en: He should do everything to earn a victory from the African National Congress conference set to happen in two weeks time.
translation.lug: Alina okukola kyonna ekisoboka okufuna obuwanguzi mu lukungaana lw'ekibiina kya African National Congress olutegekeddwa okubaawo mu wiiki bbiri okuva kati.

translation.en: A maximum of twenty guests milled around the pool.
translation.lug: Abagenyi abayite 20 baatuula okwetooloola amazzi.

translation.en: They would be playing regularly at Emin Pasha on Friday nights.
translation.lug: Bajja kukubanga ennyimba buli Lwakutaano ekiro ku Emin Pasha.

translation.en: The house lights illuminated the glassy surface of Lake Victoria and they began to play.
translation.lug: Amataala gakuba ku mazzi g'ennyanja Nnalubaale era batandika okukuba ennyimba .

translation.en: The musicians are determined to create something original with true Ugandan forms rather than being derivative from pre-existing western styles.
translation.lug: Abayimbi bano bamalirivu okukuba ennyimba ez'enjawulo ez'ekinnayuganda awatali kukoppereza nnyimba za bweru.

translation.en: Manama Francis, the lead guitarist and manager of Milege, a popular Afro-Fusion band asserted that music brings lasting impressions not only in Uganda but for Uganda.
translation.lug: Manama Francis, akulemberamu abakubi ba ggita era maneja wa bbandi y'Ekifirika eyitibwa Milege, yagamba nti ennyimba zirina kinene kye zikola ku bantu abali mu Uganda ne ku Uganda yennyini.

translation.en: He explained that there is little we get from over seas compared to the authentic Ugandan music.
translation.lug: Yannyonnyola nti tuganyulwa kitono mu nnyimba z'ebweru bw'ogeraageranya ku miganyulo gye tufuna mu nnyimba za Bannayuganda.

translation.en: They have made a name for themselves by playing the bar or restaurtant circuit around Kampala.
translation.lug: Beekoledde erinnya mu kukubira ennyimba mu mabaala ne mu bifo ebiriirwamu emmere mu Kampala.

translation.en: Qwela's single Maama Tokaaba received alot of attention from the Ugandan bloggers and music fans.
translation.lug: Oluyimba lwa bbandi ya Qwela oluyitibwa Maama Tokaaba lwakwata nnyo ku Bannayuganda babbulooga n'abanyumirwa ennyimba.

translation.en: The car parking was filled with Hummers and Escalades as a profusion of major stars like Bebe Cool, Chameleone, Mosey Radio and Weasel trappen in to see what the fuss was all about.
translation.lug: Emmotoka ez'ebbeeyi nga Zihummer ne Escalade zajjula awasimba emmotoka olw'okuba abayimbi ab'amannya gamba nga Bebe Cool, Chameleone, Mosey Radio ne Weasel nabo bajja okulaba ekyali kikyamuukiriza abantu.

translation.en: Al-Malik Group has the following cars, Prado, Land cruiser, Mitsubishi, Fuso, Isuzu and Toyota
translation.lug: Ekibiina kya Al-Malik kirina emmotoka zino, Prado, Land cruiser, Mitsubishi, Fuso, Isuzu, ne Toyota

translation.en: They are dealers in new and used Japanese vehicles.
translation.lug: Batunda emmotoka za Japan empya n'enkadde.

translation.en: This is called a MacPherson strut and is used on many cars.
translation.lug: Ekyuma ekyo kiyitibwa MacPherson era kikozesebwa mu mmotoka nnyingi.

translation.en: However, this is not the case with cars supported by only a jack.
translation.lug: Naye ekyo si bwe kiri mu mmotoka eziwanirirwa akuuma akayitibwa jack kokka.

translation.en: This happens when one is removing a shock absorber.
translation.lug: Kino kibaawo omuntu ng'akyusa sakamuzooba.

translation.en: Uganda National Roads Authority  telephone numbers are plus two, five, six, three, one, two, three ,double three, one hundred and plus two, five, six, four, one, four, three, one, eight, triple zero.
translation.lug: Nnamba z'ekitongole ky'enguudo mu Uganda ze zino: +256 312333100 ne +256414318000.

translation.en: Questions are being asked whether it is the end of Bukenya's reign and how Mbabazi defeated his opponents?
translation.lug: Abamu beebuuza obanga eno y'enkomerero y'omulembe gwa Bukenya era n'engeri Mbabazi gye yawanguddemu be yabadde avuganya nabo?

translation.en: On page eighteen, there is an Election watch involving President Kagame's inauguration speech.
translation.lug: Ku lupapula olw'omunaana kuliko ebyo Pulezidenti Kagame bye yayogedde mu kutongozebwa.

translation.en: Millions of people are insecure because of food.
translation.lug: Obukadde n'obukadde bw'abantu bali mu kabi olw'obutaba na mmere.

translation.en: The two are the country's two main ethnic group.
translation.lug: Ago ge mawanga abiri agasinga obukulu mu ggwanga eryo.

translation.en: The National Resistance Movement leaders propagated hate, violence and massive rigging during their primary elections which displayed unpatriotic tendencies among them.
translation.lug: Abakulembeze mu kibiina kya NRM basize obukyayi mu bantu, bakoze ebikolwa eby'obukambwe, era babbye obululu mu kulonda kwabwe okw'okusunsulamu, ekiraga nti mu bo mulimu abantu abataagala ggwanga lyabwe.

translation.en: David Mporampora asserted how good  the Banyakigezi are in the United States of America with the Batooro being filled with rumour mongering.
translation.lug: David Mporampora yagamba nti Banyakigezi abali mu Amerika balungi nnyo era nti Abatooro balina engambo.

translation.en: The job of shock absorbers is to smoothen out normal shocks in day driving.
translation.lug: Sakamuzooba ziyamba emmotoka obutegunda nnyo mu binnya.

translation.en: For more information, contact Uganda National Roads authority  Coporate communications, the electronic mail is at Uganda National Roads Authority dot government dot Uganda
translation.lug: Okumanya ebisingawo, weebuuze ku kitongole ky'enguudo mu Uganda, email yaabwe eri @ugandanationalroadsauthority.government.uganda

translation.en: Museveni always tries to balance while the genocide ideology faces fresh scrutiny.
translation.lug: Museveni agezaako obuteekubiira ludda buli lwe baleeta ensonga ekwata ku kitta bantu.

translation.en: The President earlier on promoted patriotism nation wide.
translation.lug: Pulezidenti yakubirizza abantu mu ggwanga lyonna okwagala ennyo ensi yaabwe.

translation.en: Abrahams of Fort Portal responded and told him to stop insulting the Batooro.
translation.lug: Abrahams ow'e Fort Portal yamuddamu ng'amugamba alekere awo okunyiiza Abatooro.

translation.en: The delegates held their breath at the fire spitting National Resistance Movement.
translation.lug: Abaaliwo baasiriikirira nga bawulira ekibiina kya NRM kiwanda omuliro.

translation.en: He made a bitter attack on his incumbent Amama Mbabazi.
translation.lug: Yakolokota nnyo munne Amama Mbabazi.

translation.en: “Mr Chairman, before I begin campaigning I have two complaints,” Otafiire started.
translation.lug: Otafiire yatandika n'ebigambo bino “Sssebo ssentebe w'olukungaana, nga sinnagenda mu maaso nnina okwemulugunya kwa mirundi ebiri.”

translation.en: Otafiire left the campaign podium for the President where Mbabazi was seated.
translation.lug: Otafiire yava ku katuuti Pulezidenti addeko okwogera era Mbabazi yali atudde awo.

translation.en: Journalists rushed to capture that dramatic photograph of an angry Otafiire making his case before the President.
translation.lug: Bannamawulire baayanguwa okukuba ebifaananyi bya Otafiire eyali omusunguwavu ng'alina ensonga gy'ategeeza Pulezidenti.

translation.en: Otafiire is the minister of trade, tourism and industry.
translation.lug: Otafiire ye minisita w'eby'obusuubuzi n'amakolero.

translation.en: After three minutes of dead silence, President Museveni rescued himself out of the crossroads.
translation.lug: Oluvannyuma lw'eddakiika ssatu ez'akasiriikiriro ak'amaanyi, Pulezidenti Museveni yeenunula mu kattu ke baali bamutaddemu.

translation.en: We assure Honourable Otafiire that his concerns are being taken care of.
translation.lug: Twakakasa ow'ekitiibwa Otafiire nti ensonga ze zikolwako.

translation.en: The voters’ register will be displayed at the polling stations,” said Felistus Magomu, the National Resistance Movement electoral commission chairperson.
translation.lug: Felistus Magomu, ssentebe w'eby'okulonda mu kibiina kya NRM yagamba nti, "Olukalala lw'abalonzi lujja kutimbibwa mu bifo ebironderwamu.”

translation.en: Defiant Otafiire openly attacked Mbabazi over distributing different and less amounts of money as allowances to the delegates.
translation.lug: Otafiire eyali tasalikako musale yalangirira Mbabazi mu lujjudde nti ssente ze yawa abantu zaali tezimala.

translation.en: Mbabazi said one of the candidates was telling delegates that they complained of receiving lesser money than they were entitled.
translation.lug: Mbabazi yagambye nti omu ku beesimbyewo yagamba abantu beemulugunye nti baali tebabawadde ssente zimala.

translation.en: I am that candidate and I will say it again,” Otafiire charged.
translation.lug: Otafiire yakyogera lunye nti, "Nze nnagambye abantu okwemulugunya, era nja kuddamu nkyogere.”

translation.en: Mbabazi, who campaigned first, said one of his competitors was spreading malicious rumours about him on distribution of money to delegates.
translation.lug: Mbabazi, eyasooka ne yeemulugunya, yagamba nti omu ku baavuganya nabo abunyisa ebigambo ebigendereddwa okwonoona erinnya lye ku kuwa abantu ssente.

translation.en: Other contenders for the Secretary General Gilbert Bukenya, Elijah Mushemeza, Theodore Ssekikubo and Kibibi, had made their two minute campaign speeches.
translation.lug: N'abalala abaali beesimbyewo ku kifo kya Secretary General, Gilbert Bukenya, Elijah Mushemeza, Theodore Ssekikubo, ne Kibibi, baali bamaze okwogera nga bakuba kampeyini yaabwe ey'eddakiika ebbiri.

translation.en: Mbabazi fired back.
translation.lug: Mbabazi yamwanukula.

translation.en: He counter accused Otafiire of making false accusations without consulting the relevant people for facts.
translation.lug: Yanenya Otafiire olw'okumwogerako ebintu ebikyamu nga tasoose kwebuuza kufuna bukakafu.

translation.en: Delegates from far away areas like Karamoja, Rwenzori, West Nile, Acholi, Lango and Kigezi were given three hundred thousand shillings as accommodation.
translation.lug: Abantu abaava mu bitundu by'ewala gamba ng'e Karamoja, Rwenzori, West Nile, Acholi, Lango, ne Kigezi baaweebwa emitwalo asatu zibayambe mu by'ensula.

translation.en: Mbabazi did not comment on the different accreditation cards and denying genuine delegates into the conference as Otafiire, Bukenya and Ssekikubo alleged.
translation.lug: Mbabazi teyayogera ku bya kaadi ndala na bya kugaana bantu abatuufu kubaawo mu lukungaana olwo nga Otafiire, Bukenya, ne Ssekikubo bwe baali balumiriza.

translation.en: Museveni did not call back Otafiire to respond to Mbabazi’s answers.
translation.lug: Museveni teyayita Otafiire kwanukula Mbabazi.

translation.en: Mbabazi appeared to have outdone his opponents.
translation.lug: Mbabazi yalabika ng'eyali awangudde abaali bamulumiriza.

translation.en: Otafiire kept telling delegates that this is the time to redeem our party but they seemed to have already made their choice.
translation.lug: Otafiire yasigala agamba abaaliwo nti kino kye kiseera okununula ekibiina kyaffe naye kirabika baamaze dda okusalawo gwe baagala.

translation.en: Mbabazi’s camp too was making similar rounds to groups of delegates selling their candidate.
translation.lug: N'aba Mbabazi nabo baali bayita mu bantu nga bamukuutira akadingidi.

translation.en: It was Bukenya’s camp that was making rather quiet campaigns.
translation.lug: Naye bo aba Bukenya baali basirise busirisi.

translation.en: Mbabazi’s “super” authority in the National Resistance Movement cannot be underrated.
translation.lug: Obuyinza Mbabazi bw'alina mu kibiina kya NRM bungi.

translation.en: Even after the electoral commissioner’s reminders that campaigns had closed, Mbabazi continued campaigning for votes thirty minutes into the voting time.
translation.lug: Akulira okulonda ne bwe yajjukiza abantu nti ekiseera ky'okunoonya akalulu kyali kiweddeko, Mbabazi yeeyongerayo eddakiika asatu ng'anoonya akalulu.

translation.en: It took the intervention of the president to announce that campaigns had closed for Mbabazi to stop.
translation.lug: Pulezidenti yamala kukyogera nti okunoonya akalulu kuwedde olwo Mbabazi n'alyoka alekera awo.

translation.en: When the results were announced, Mbabazi had carried the day with five thousand six hundred ninety four votes.
translation.lug: Ebyali bivudde mu kulonda bwe byalangirirwa, Mbabazi ye yali awangudde n'obululu 5,694.

translation.en: Other new faces were in the posts of national vice chairpersons for Karamoja, Northern Uganda, Central Uganda and Kampala.
translation.lug: Abantu abapya baali bazze mu bifo by'abamyuka ba ssentebe mu ggwanga mu bitundu bya Karamoja, mu Bukiikakkono bwa Uganda, mu Massekkati ga Uganda, ne mu Kampala.

translation.en: Museveni was chosen party national chairman and National Resistance Movement presidential candidate unopposed and so was Moses Kigongo for national vice chairman.
translation.lug: Museveni yalondebwa awatali amuvuganya okuba ssentebe wa NRM mu ggwanga era okuba oyo anaakwata bbendera yaabwe mu kalulu kw'oba pulezidenti era ne Moses Kigongo teyavuganyizibwa ku kifo ky'omumyuka wa ssentebe w'ekibiina mu ggwanga.

translation.en: Rebecca Kadaga was chosen national deputy vice chairperson and Michael Mukula for Eastern region.
translation.lug: Rebecca Kadaga yalondebwa okuba omumyuka w'omumyuka wa ssentebe w'ekibiina mu ggwanga era Michael Mukula yalondebwa mu kitundu ky'Ebuvanjuba bw'eggwanga.

translation.en: Matayo Kyaligonza defeated Chris Baryomunsi for vice chairman for Western Uganda.
translation.lug: Matayo Kyaligonza yawangula Chris Baryomunsi ku kifo ky'omumyuka wa ssentebe mu Bugwanjuba bwa Uganda.

translation.en: Why is Mbabazi still President Museveni’s blue eyed boy?
translation.lug: Lwaki Pulezidenti Museveni akyayagala nnyo Mbabazi?

translation.en: The delegates knew very well from the days of the Temangalo controversy when the President defended Mbabazi’s role in the land deal.
translation.lug: Abaliwo baali bamanyi bulungi engeri Pulezidenti gye yawolerezaamu Mbabazi mu nsonga z'ettaka ly'e Temangalo.

translation.en: The fact that Museveni did not fault Mbabazi on any of the accusations, it spoke volumes about how close the two are.
translation.lug: Okuba nti Museveni teyalaga nti Mbabazi yalina ensobi yonna kyalaga bulungi nti abantu abo ababiri enkolagana yaabwe ya ku lusegere nnyo.

translation.en: Nearly every candidate who stood up to campaign had to repeatedly cite Museveni’s name to boost their campaign.
translation.lug: Kumpi buli omu eyavaayo okukuba kampeyini yalina okwogera ku linnya lya Museveni okusobola okufuna obuganzi.

translation.en: You could clearly see how candidates were fighting to endear themselves to Museveni.
translation.lug: Wali okiraba nti buli omu ku baali beesimbyewo yali agezaako okufuna  obuganzi okuva eri Museveni.

translation.en: Being the party’s Secretary General, Mbabazi was the lead organiser of the elections in which he was a candidate.
translation.lug: Okuva bwe kiri nti ye Muwandiisi omukulu ow'ekibiina, Mbabazi ye yawoma omutwe mu kutegeka okulonda naye kennyini mwe yali omu ku beesimbyewo.

translation.en: On voting day Mbabazi and his opponents only had two minutes to market their manifestos and candidature.
translation.lug: Ku lunaku lw'okulonda, Mbabazi ne be yali avuganya nabo baaweebwa eddakiika bbiri zokka okumatiza abantu nti balina obusobozi.

translation.en: Apart from the advantages of incumbency, Mbabazi is a clever strategist.
translation.lug: Ng'oggyeeko okuba nti yali wa nkizo okusinga banne, Mbabazi era mugezi.

translation.en: He allied with most delegates and candidates from the North, East, Karamoja and central regions.
translation.lug: Yakola omukago n'abakiise abasinga obungi awamu n'abo abaali beesimbyewo ku bifo by'omu Bukiikakkono, Ebuvanjuba, Karamoja, ne mu massekkati g'eggwanga.

translation.en: Each of the candidates from these region campaigned for themselves as they did for Mbabazi.
translation.lug: Buli omu ku bantu abo yali yeenoonyeza akalulu ng'ate mu kiseera kye kimu akanoonyeza ne Mbabazi.

translation.en: His only strong opposition came from the western region.
translation.lug: Okuvuganya okw'amaanyi yakufuna mu bitundu bya bugwanjuba mwokka.

translation.en: Indeed Mbabazi won in all the north, West Nile, east, Karamoja and central regions despite persistent accusa-tions of voter bribery.
translation.lug: Mu butuufu Mbabazi yawangula mu bitundu byonna eby'omu bukiikakkono, West Nile, buvanjuba, Karamoja, ne mu massekkati g'eggwanga wadde nga baamulumiriza okugulirira abalonzi.

translation.en: Delegates who spoke to the independent alleged that Mbabazi’s camp was giving ten thousand shillings to every delegate who voted.
translation.lug: Abaaliwo baagamba olupapula lwa Independent nti aba Mbabazi baali bawa buli omu eyalonda omutwalo gumu.

translation.en: A delegate who campaigned for Otafiire admitted to the Independent that he had been given twenty thousand shillings to vote Mbabazi.
translation.lug: Omu ku abo abaali banoonyeza Otafiire akalulu yagamba nti yaweebwa emitwalo ebiri alonde Mbabazi.

translation.en: Overall it underlined the indispensability of bribery in National Resistance Movement elections.
translation.lug: Okutwalira awamu ekyo kyalaga enguzi eri mu NRM.

translation.en: Mbabazi’s camp had also pulled off a tactical media manipulation the previous day, which worked in his favour.
translation.lug: Era eggulo limu enkambi ya Mbabazi yali ekozesezza akakodyo okuyitira ku mikutu gy'empuliziganya era kaamukolera.

translation.en: A government newspaper reported that the party’s National Executive Committee had asked Bukenya and Otafiire to step down for Mbabazi.
translation.lug: Olupapula lwa gavumenti lwagamba nti akakiiko k'ekibiina kya NRM kaali kalagidde Bukenya ne Otafiire okulekera Mbabazi ekifo ekyo.

translation.en: This created doubt among some delegates who had intended to vote Bukenya and Otafiire
translation.lug: Ekyo kyaleetawo okubuusabuusa mu bantu abamu abaali baagala okulonda Bukenya ne Otafiire

translation.en: On the first day of the conference Bukenya spent the most of the day doing damage control and denouncing the media reports.
translation.lug: Ekitundu ekisinga eky'olunaku olwasooka olw'olukungaana, Bukenya yakimala agezaako okumatiza abantu nti ebyayogeddwa emikutu gy'eby'empuliziganya tebyabadde bituufu.

translation.en: Bukenya’s troubles were not over yet.
translation.lug: Ebizibu bya Bukenya byali tebinnaggwa.

translation.en: Knowing that other media would have carried Bukenya’s rebuttal, the government newspaper moved faster.
translation.lug: Olw'okuba baali bakimanyi nti emikutu gy'empuliziganya emirala gyali gisobola okuwandiika ku kulambika kwa Bukenya, olupapula lw'amawulire olwa gavumenti lwabaako kye lukolawo mu bwangu.

translation.en: It was followed up with another story that Bukenya and Otafiire had defied the party’s central executive committee directive.
translation.lug: Lwaddako ne lugamba nti Bukenya ne Otafiire bajeemedde ekiragiro ky'abakulira ekibiina kyabwe.

translation.en: Bukenya had no more chance to rebut this.
translation.lug: Bukenya yali takyalina kakisa kalala kulambika ku nsonga eyo.

translation.en: Museveni addressed the party delegates at thirty minutes past two on Sunday night.
translation.lug: Ku ssaawa munaana ez'ekiro ku Ssande, Museveni yayogera eri ab'ekibiina abaali bazze mu lukungaana.

translation.en: "If we had wanted to vet Bukenya or Otafiire out, they would not have come here,” Museveni said.
translation.lug: Museveni yagamba nti, "Singa twabadde twagala okuggya Bukenya oba Otafiire mu lwokaano, bandibadde tebajja wano.”

translation.en: I put my thoughts to Central Executive Committe,” he added in response to reports that Otafire and Bukenya had defied his orders.
translation.lug: Ng'ayanukula ebyali bigambibwa nti Otafire ne Bukenya baali basambazze ekiragiro kye yagamba  nti, "Ebirowoozo byange nnabitegeezezza Central Executive Committee.”

translation.en: Only thirteen positions in National Resistance Movement were vetted.
translation.lug: Ebifo kkumi na bisatu byokka mu NRM bye byesimbiddwamu.

translation.en: P.hone text messages were sent to delegates claiming National Resistance Movement opinion polls had put Mbabazi in the lead.
translation.lug: Obubaka bwaweerezebwa ku masimu nga bulaga nti okunoonyereza mu NRM kulaga nti Mbabazi y'akulembedde banne.

translation.en: At seven in the evening, another text message was sent to the delegates that provisional results now showed Mbabazi in the lead.
translation.lug: Ku ssaawa emu ey'akawungeezi, obubaka obulala ku masimu bwasindikibwa eri abakiise ne bubategeeza kati Mbabazi ye yali akulembedde.

translation.en: This might have swayed voters in Mbabazi’s favor but what cannot be ascertained is how many were influenced by the text messages.
translation.lug: Kino kiyinza okuba nga kyaleetera abalonzi okwongera okwettanira Mbabazi naye kizibu okumanya bameka abaasendebwasendebwa obubaka obwo obw'oku ssimu.

translation.en: Many things worked in Mbabazi’s favour.
translation.lug: Ebintu bingi Mbabazi byali bimutambulira bulungi.

translation.en: Major General Kahinda Otafiire raised to the podium to campaign for the position of party Secretary General.
translation.lug: Meja Genero Kahinda Otafiire yagenda ku katuuti okukuba kampeyini ku kifo kya Secretary General w'ekibiina.

translation.en: Amama Mbabazi was accused of printing different accreditation cards for the delegates with the purpose of rigging the elections.
translation.lug: Amama Mbabazi baamulumiriza nti yali akubye kaadi z'abalonzi endala ng'alina ekigendererwa eky'okubba akalulu.

translation.en: Election chaos leaves National Resistance Movement in mess.
translation.lug: Obuvuyo obwaliwo mu kulonda bwatabula nnyo ab'ekibiina kya NRM.

translation.en: Museveni’s former principal private secretary Amelia Kyambadde won unopposed after the incumbent Ndaula Kaweesi pulled out at the last minute.
translation.lug: Amelia Kyambadde, eyaliko omuwandiisi omukulu owa Museveni yawangula nga tavuganyiziddwa oluvannyuma lw'eyali mu kifo ekyo Ndaula Kaweesi okuva mu lwokaano.

translation.en: The senior National Resistance Movement officials were making accusations against Mbabazi at the conference.
translation.lug: Abakungu ab'oku ntikko mu NRM baali balina bye balumiriza Mbabazi mu lukiiko olwo.

translation.en: This did not only affect their supporters’ morale but also created doubt about Bukenya and Otafiire’s loyalty to the party.
translation.lug: Ng'oggyeeko okumalamu abalonzi baabwe amaanyi, ekyo kyaleetera abakiise okubuusabuusa obanga Bukenya ne Otafiire baali beesigwa eri ekibiina.

translation.en: Museveni dismissed the media reports that Bukenya and Otafiire had defied the Central Executive Committee directive to stand down.
translation.lug: Museveni yagamba nti ebyafulumira ku mikutu gy'empuliziganya nti Bukenya ne Otafiire baali bajeemedde ekiragiro kye si bituufu.

translation.en: Mbabazi had seventy two percent followed by Bukenya with fifteen percent and Otafiire thirteen percent.
translation.lug: Mbabazi yafuna obululu 72 ku buli kikumi, n'addirirwa Bukenya n'obululu 15 ku buli kikumi, Otafiire n'addako n'obululu 13 ku buli kikumi.

translation.en: In fact there was complaining among the candidates that Mbabazi’s family had taken over the election process.
translation.lug: Mu butuufu waaliwo okwemulugunya mu bakiise nti ab'omu maka ga Mbabazi baali beefuze eby'okulonda.

translation.en: Why cannott we decentralise? Bukenya asked.
translation.lug: Bukenya yabuuza nti, Lwaki obuyinza tetubuwako ku balala?

translation.en: He was suggesting to Mbabazi’s family.
translation.lug: Ekibuuzo ekyo yali akyolekeza eri ab'omu maka ga Mbabazi.

translation.en: His daughter, Nina Mbabazi, was in charge of the party Information Technology system which stored information on every delegate.
translation.lug: Muwala wa Mbabazi, Nina Mbabazi, ye yali avunaanyizibwa ku byuma bya tekinologiya w'ekibiina omwali muteekeddwa ebikwata ku buli omu ku bakiise.

translation.en: His wife, Jacquiline Mbabazi, was elected chairperson of the National Resistance Movement Women’s League.
translation.lug: Mukyala we, Jacquiline Mbabazi, yalondebwa okuba ssentebe wa NRM ow'ekiwayi ky'abakazi.

translation.en: Her rival Nusura Tiperu accused her of bribing the voters.
translation.lug: Nusura Tiperu eyali amuvuganya yamulumiriza okugulilira abalonzi.

translation.en: Mbabazi’s wife was also handling the issue of refunding the delegates’ transport fare and allowances.
translation.lug: Mukyala wa Mbabazi era ye yali akola ku kuddiza abakiise ssente ze baasaasaanya ku ntambula.

translation.en: The hotels and restaurants that served food to the delegates were procured by the Mbabazi’ camp.
translation.lug: Wooteeri ezaagabula emmere abakiise mu lukungaana olwo ab'oku ludda lwa Mbabazi be baazifuna.

translation.en: Even the ushers were campaigning for Mbabazi.
translation.lug: N'abaali baweereza emmere baali bakubira Mbabazi kampeyini.

translation.en: They veiled their heads with scarfs with inscriptions to vote Mbabazi.
translation.lug: Obukofiira bwe baayambala bwaliko ebigambo ebikubiriza abakiise okulonda Mbabazi.

translation.en: Mbabazi had all the machinery under his control.
translation.lug: Buli kimu Mbabazi kyamuli mu ttaano.

translation.en: All the buses transporting the delegates were campaigning for him, how would you expect him to lose? said a delegate from Mityana.
translation.lug: Omu ku bakiise eyava e Mityana yagamba nti, Bbaasi zonna ezaali zitambuza abakiise mu lukiiko olwo zaali zinoonyeza Mbabazi akalulu. Akalulu yali tayinza butakawangula!

translation.en: In the June conference, the National Resistance Movement came under strong criticism by its members after logistics for the delegates were mishandled.
translation.lug: Mu lukungaana olwaliwo mu Jjuuni, aba NRM baavumirirwa nnyo ekibiina kyabwe ekyo olw'obutakola bulungi ku byetaago by'abakiise.

translation.en: The same mess was repeated during the September sixth -ninth Special Organs Conference.
translation.lug: Ekizibu kye kimu kye kyaliwo ne mu lukungaana olw'ebiwayi eby'enjawulo olwaliwo okuva nga 6-9 Ssebutemba.

translation.en: Hundreds of delegates queued up the whole day to get empowered.
translation.lug: Abakiise bangi baasimba ennyiriri okumala olunaku lwonna okuweebwa ebyetaagisibwa.

translation.en: Museveni’s reserved post Unlike in other political parties where the race for the party presidency was tight, Museveni’s was like God-reserved post.
translation.lug: Obutafaananako bibiina birala omwali okuvuganya okw'amaanyi ku kifo ky'anaakwata bbendera mu kulonda kw'obwa pulezidenti ye Museveni teyafuna kuvuganya kwonna mu kibiina kye, ng'ekifo ekyo kiringa ekyamutegekerwa Katonda.

translation.en: Nobody stood against him.
translation.lug: Tewali yamwesimbako.

translation.en: Even those who had expressed interest in the post were vet-ted out by the party’s National Eelection Confrence.
translation.lug: N'abamu ku abo abaakiraga nti baali baagala okuvuganya naye ku kifo ekyo, baagaanibwa olukiiko lw'ekibiina olukola ku by'okulonda.

translation.en: Salim Saleh, Museveni’s brother and he is a junior officer in the army.
translation.lug: Salim Saleh, muganda wa Museveni era wa wansiko mu ranka mu magye.

translation.en: This is not a person who would put Museveni on competition.
translation.lug: Ono si ye muntu asobola okuvuganya Museveni.

translation.en: In March this year Forum for Democratic Change nominated the incumbent Doctor Kizza Besigye.
translation.lug: Mu Maaki w'omwaka guno, ab'ekibiina kya FDC baalonda Doctor Kizza Besigye okubakwatira bbendera yaabwe.

translation.en: They carried out three-month rigorous campaigns countrywide.
translation.lug: Baamala emyezi esatu nga bamukubira kampeyini okwetooloola eggwanga.

translation.en: That competition was totally lacking in the National Resistance Movement elections for the presidency at Nambole.
translation.lug: Okuvuganya ng'okwo tekwaliwo mu NRM e Namboole mu kulonda anaabakwatira bbendera mu kuvuganya ku ntebe y'obwa pulezidenti.

translation.en: This has played in the attacker hands who say the National Resistance Movement is a one-man’s party.
translation.lug: Abo abavumirira NRM bagamba nti ekibiina ekyo kya muntu omu.

translation.en: Analysts say that the fact Museveni still does not allow anyone internally to compete against him for the party presidency.
translation.lug: Abeekenneenya ensonga bagamba nti ekituufu kiri nti Museveni takkiriza muntu yenna mu kibiina kye kumuvuganya ku bwa pulezidenti bwa kibiina kya NRM.

translation.en: They say such elections would allow Museveni and the National Resistance Movement identify an emerging successor if he was interested in one anyway.
translation.lug: Bagamba nti okulonda ng'okwo kuyamba Museveni ne NRM okumanya abo abasobola okumuddira mu bigere singa aba akyagadde.

translation.en: Museveni explains election mess Museveni dismissed claims that the violence in the primaries spelt the party.
translation.lug: Museveni yasambajja ebigambibwa nti obuvuyo obwaliwo mu kulonda bwe bulaga ki ekibiina kye kye kiri .

translation.en: He explained that opportunists within the National Resistance Movement who were charged with registering party members in the Yellow book.
translation.lug: Yagamba nti bannakigwanyizi mu kibiina kya NRM baaweebwa obuvunaanyizibwa obw'okuwandiika abantu b'ekibiina mu kitabo kya kyenvu.

translation.en: This forced the National Resistance Movement to use the national Electral Commission voters’ register because of the greed of the unscrupulous party members.
translation.lug: Olw'omululu gw'abantu abamu mu kibiina, NRM yawalirizibwa okusalawo okukozesa olukalala lw'abalonzi olw'ekitongole ky'eby'okulonda mu ggwanga.

translation.en: He said four billion shillings was released for the primaries for sixty thousand polling stations.
translation.lug: Yagamba nti obuwumbi buna bwe bwaweebwayo okukozesebwa mu kulonda okw'okusunsulamu mu bifo ebironderwamu kakaaga.

translation.en: Otafiire left immediately when it became clear he had lost the vote.
translation.lug: Amangu ddala ng'akirabye nti bamuwangudde, Otafiire yavaawo n'agenda.

translation.en: Vice President Bukenya too did not wait for announcement of the final results.
translation.lug: N'omumyuka wa pulezidenti, Bukenya, naye teyalinda kulangirira bya nkomeredde.

translation.en: But analysts say the chaos in the primary elections has revealed that National Resistance Movement is a party controlled by power hungry individuals.
translation.lug: Abeekenneenya ensonga bagamba nti okulonda okw'okusunsulamu kwalaga nti NRM eri mu mikono gy'abantu abalulunkanira obuyinza.

translation.en: That is why all complainants in the elections were petitioning Museveni instead of the established party structures to address their complaints.
translation.lug: Eyo ye nsonga lwaki okulonda bwe kwali kugenda mu maaso, okwemulugunya kwonna kwali kwolekezebwa eri Museveni mu kifo ky'okukwolekeza eri akakiiko k'ekibiina akassibwawo okukola ku kwemulugunya kwabwe.

translation.en: But Museveni had his own interpretation.
translation.lug: Naye ekyo ye Museveni yakiraba bulala.

translation.en: He said this showed Nationa Resistance Movement is a great party.
translation.lug: Yagamba nti ekyo kyalaga nti ekibiina kya NRM kya maanyi nnyo.

translation.en: Otafiire’s camp was headed by Jim Muhwezi as the campaign manager and Brig. Henry Tumukunde as his chief election strategist.
translation.lug: Ab'oku ludda lwa Otafiire baali bakulemberwa Jim Muhwezi ng'akola nga kampeyini maneja ate nga Brig. Henry Tumukunde ng'akola ng'omuwi w'amagezi omukulu mu kulonda.

translation.en: They could not launch an open attack on Mbabazi because the president had cautioned them to conduct campaigns free of personal attacks.
translation.lug: Baali tebasobola kulumba Mbabazi kubanga pulezidenti yali abalabudde baleme kulumbagana nga bakuba kampeyini.

translation.en: It was only fearless Otafiire who came out boldly to campaign for himself.
translation.lug: Otafiire ye yekka eyayoleka obuvumu n'avaayo ne yeekubira kampeyini.

translation.en: Tumukunde is believed to be a good mobilser.
translation.lug: Tumukunde agambibwa okuba omulungi mu kukumaakuma abantu.

translation.en: He would not dare restart his reducng troubles with the state especially that he would confronting security minister and a close confidant of Museveni.
translation.lug: Yali tasobola kuddamu kuttusa bizibu bye yalina ne gavumenti ebyali bigenda bikkakkana ng'alumba minisita w'ensonga z'eby'okwerinda era mukwano gwa Museveni ow'oku lusegere.

translation.en: Election petitions hang on the National Resistance Movement is grappling with about three hundred fifty election petitions arising from the primaries.
translation.lug: Abantu nga 350 okuva mu NRM baajulira oluvannyuma lw'okulonda okw'okusunsulamu.

translation.en: This is the most disputed issue the National Resistance Movement has to resolve or face a splinter force of disgruntled members.
translation.lug: Kino kizibu kya maanyi NRM ky'erina okugonjoola okusobola okwewala okuleka abantu baayo abangi bwe batyo okusigala nga si bamativu.

translation.en: Despite the mistakes in the National Resistance Movement primaries the elections have made the party stronger.
translation.lug: Wadde nga waaliwo ensobi ezaakolebwa mu kulonda kwa NRM okw'okusunsulamu, okulonda okwo kweyongedde okunyweza ekibiina.

translation.en: The contest has prepared the National Resistance Movement minds to the likelihood of a better way.
translation.lug: Okuvuganya okwo kwateekateeka aba NRM ne basobola okulaba engeri esingayo obulungi ey'okukwatamu ebintu.

translation.en: He said a committee headed by former Prime Minister Kintu Musoke that includes Professor.
translation.lug: Yagamba nti akakiiko akakulirwa eyaliko ssaabaminisita Kintu Musoke kaliko Profesa.

translation.en: Mondo Kagonyera, Moses Ali has been put in place to handle all election petitions.
translation.lug: Mondo Kagonyera, Moses Ali alondeddwa okukola ku kujulira okwakolebwa.

translation.en: He says Otafiire and Bukenya disagreed with Mbabazi in principle but disagreements were based on falsehood.
translation.lug: Yagamba nti Otafiire ne Bukenya tebaakwatagana na Mbabazi, naye ekyabaviirako obutakwatagana tekyali kituufu.

translation.en: Opondo says the contest for various posts in the party prove to its critics that there is debate in the party.
translation.lug: Opondo agamba nti okuvuganya ku bifo ebitali bimu mu kibiina kulaga abakivumirira nti ddala kirimu okuvuganya.

translation.en: He said when the claims against Mbabazi became many, he admitted and apologised, an acceptance of his mistakes.
translation.lug: Yagamba nti okwemulugunya ku Mbabazi bwe kweyongera obungi, yakkiriza ne yeetonda, ekiraga nti yali akkiriza ensobi ze.

translation.en: Mbabazi campaigns during the National Resistance Movement elections at Namboole.
translation.lug: Mbabazi ng'akuba kampeyini mu kulonda kw'ekibiina kya NRM e Namboole.

translation.en: Vice President Gilbert Bukenya greets National Resistance Movement delegates asking them to vote  him as their secretary general.
translation.lug: Omumyuka wa Pulezidenti Gilbert Bukenya ng'abuuza abakiise ba NRM era ng'abasaba bamulonde ku bw'omuwandiisi w'ekibiina.

translation.en: Alex Kamugisha is angry.
translation.lug: Alex Kamugisha nga munyiivu.

translation.en: He believes the Rujumbura County elections were stolen.
translation.lug: Agamba nti obululu bw'e Rujumbura County bwabbibwa.

translation.en: Kamugisha is expected to drop his candidature and support Major General Jim Muhwezi who is now the official National Resistance Movement candidate.
translation.lug: Kamugisha asuubirwa okuwanduka mu lwokaano awagire Meja Genero Jim Muhwezi kati avuganya ku kaadi ya NRM mu butongole.

translation.en: But Kamugisha says he is not dropping out.
translation.lug: Naye Kamugisha agamba nti tagenda kuva mu lwokaano.

translation.en: Another person who has declared his intention to stand as an independent candidate in Mbarara Municipality, James Tweheyo’s response is serious.
translation.lug: James Tweheyo ye muntu omulala alangiridde nti ayagala kwesimbawo ku bubwe mu munisipaali y'e Mbarara

translation.en: Tweheyo and Kamugisha are two of the many National Resistance Movement members who, discouraged by the primaries, are planning to run as independents.
translation.lug: Tweheyo ne Kamugisha be bamu ku bantu ba NRM abangi abataali bamativu n'okulonda okw'okusunsulamu abaagala okwesimbawo ku lwabwe.

translation.en: The National Resistance Movement primaries were so badly run that highly placed sources in the party have told The Independent that.
