translation.lug: Okulonda okw'okusunsulamu mu NRM tekwatambula bulungi n'akatono ne kiba nti ensonda ezeesigika zaategeeza olupapula lwa Independent nti.

translation.en: Felicitus Magomu has done a good job in the circumstances, but the Electral Commission needs a Chairman who is stronger.
translation.lug: Felicitus Magomu akoze omulimu mulungi okusinziira ku mbeera eriwo, naye ekitongole ky'eby'okulonda kyetaaga omuntu ow'amaanyiko okusinga.

translation.en: "We all realize this,” said the source.
translation.lug: Ensonda zaagamba nti, "Ekyo ffenna tukiraba.”

translation.en: On the morning of September thirteenth when he gave the closing speech to the party’s Delegates Conference.
translation.lug: Ku makya nga Ssebutemba 13 bwe yawa okwogera okufundikira mu lukungaana lw'ekibiina.

translation.en: "If you contest as an Independent you will be causing confusion,” Museveni said.
translation.lug: Museveni yagamba nti, "Bwe weesimbawo ku lulwo, oleetawo okutabulatabula.”

translation.en: Government Chief Whip, Daudi Migereko, told The Independent that a special committee is to be set up to deal with emerging petitions.
translation.lug: Daudi Migereko, Chief Whip wa gavumenti yagamba olupapula lwa Independent nti akakiiko ak'enjawulo kagenda kussibwawo okukola ku kujulira.

translation.en: How the National Resistance Movement's Electoral Commission addresses some of those challenges will be a determinant.
translation.lug: Engeri akakiiko ka NRM akakola ku by'okulonda gye kanaakwatamu ebimu ku bizibu ebyo ejja kukola kinene.

translation.en: At the National Resistance Movement National Conference showing support for their candidates at Nambole Stadium.
translation.lug: Nga bali mu lukungaana lwa NRM mu kisaawe e Nambole nga bawagira abantu baabwe abeesimbyewo.

translation.en: Mbabazi later apologised over the confusion.
translation.lug: Oluvannyuma Mbabazi yeetonda olw'okutabulwatabulwa okwajjawo.

translation.en: They expected only twelve thousand but thirty thousand turned up instead
translation.lug: Baali basuubira abantu omutwalo gumu mu enkumi bbiri naye omutwalo gumu mu enkumi ssatu be bajja

translation.en: The party’s Secretary for National Mobilisation Major General Mugisha for the party presidency.
translation.lug: Omuwandiisi w'ekibiina mu nsonga z'okukumaakuma abantu mu ggwanga Maja Genero Mugisha ku bwa pulezidenti w'ekibiina.

translation.en: After twenty five years at the wheel, reinforces the claim that he is not about to hand over power to anyone.
translation.lug: Oluvannyuma lw'okufugira emyaka 25, yeeyongera okukiraga nti tannatuusa kuta buyinza.

translation.en: He explained that opportunists within the National Resistance Movement who were charged with registering party members in the Yellow book were responsible for the mess in the primaries.
translation.lug: Yagamba nti bannakigwanyizi mu NRM abaakwasibwa obuvunaanyizibwa obw'okuwandiika bamemba b'ekibiina mu kitabo ekya kyenvu be baavaako obuvuyo mu kulonda okw'okusunsulamu .

translation.en: Amama Mbabazi flashes the thumps up NRM  sign to supporters as he did final touches to his for bid for party’s secreatary general post at Namboole on September eleventh.
translation.lug: Amama Mbabazi awanikira abawagizi ekigalo ng'amaliriza kampeyini ze mu kuvuganya ku kifo ky'omuwandiisi w'ekibiina e Namboole nga Ssebutemba 11.

translation.en: The national Electoral Commission has twenty six thousand polling stations and uses over one hundred twenty billion to conduct elections.
translation.lug: Ekitongole ekitegeka okulonda kw'ekibiina kirina ebifo ebironderwamu 26,000 era kikozesa obuwumbi obusukka mu 120 okutegeka okulonda.

translation.en: Hassan Bassajja Balaba as the financier, Brigdier. Matayo Kyaligonza and Bernard Mujansi, the Mbale district chairman.
translation.lug: Hassan Bassajja Balaba avunaanyizibwa ku by'ensimbi, Brigediya Matayo Kyaligonza ne Bernard Mujansi, ssentebe wa disitulikiti y'e Mbale.

translation.en: He could not openly campaign for Otafiire as the law bars serving army officers from active politics.
translation.lug: Yali tasobola kukubira Otafiire kampeyini kubanga amateeka tegakkiriza bannamagye abakyaweereza okwenyigira mu by'obufuzi.

translation.en: "That will eventually lead to a method of getting a successor to President Museveni,” Opondo told The Independent.
translation.lug: Opondo yagamba olupapula lwa Independent nti, "Ekyo kijja kuyamba mu kufuna anaddira Pulezidenti Museveni mu bigere.”

translation.en: After losing in the just concluded primaries for the ruling National Resistance Movement party flag-bearers’ race for the two thousand eleven general election.
translation.lug: Oluvannyuma lw'okuwangulwa mu kulonda okw'okusunsulamu okwa NRM okwakamalirizibwa okw'abo abanaakwata bbendera y'ekibiina mu kulonda kwa 2011.

translation.en: Under the National Resistance Movement constitution.
translation.lug: Okusinziira ku ssemateeka w'ekibiina kya NRM.

translation.en: When reminded that the National Resistance Movement party Chairman and presidential flag-bearer in the 2011 general elections, President Yoweri Museveni, has warned against such disloyalty to party.
translation.lug: Bwe bajjukizibwa nti Pulezidenti Yoweri Museveni, Ssentebe w'ekibiina kya NRM era oyo akikwatidde bbendera mu kulonda kw'obwa pulezidenti okwa 2011, yabalabula okwewala obutaba beesigwa eri ekibiina.

translation.en: At which the top party officials were elected amidst acrimony, Museveni got around and barked.
translation.lug: Olukungaana abakungu b'ekibiina mwe baalonderwa wakati mu kuvumagana n'okuyomba, Museveni yaboggola.

translation.en: Whether most of the losers in the party primaries will either join the opposition or stay in the National Resistance Movement, but defy Museveni and contest as independents.
translation.lug: Tekimanyiddwa obanga abasinga obungi ku b'ekibiina abaawangulwa baneegatta ku ludda oluvuganya gavumenti oba banaasigala mu kibiina kya NRM naye ne bajeemera Museveni ne beesimbawo ku lwabwe.

translation.en: As a group, the independents have pushed National Resistance Movement strategists into a tight corner.
translation.lug: Okutwalira awamu, abo abaagala okwesimbawo ng'abantu kinnoomu baleeseewo okusoomooza kwa maanyi eri abakulembera NRM.

translation.en: “The independents are very hard to control,” says Daudi Migereko, the National Resistance Movement Chief Whip.
translation.lug: Daudi Migereko, Chief Whip wa NRM agamba nti, “Abo abeesimbawo ng'abantu kinnoomu baba bazibu okufuga.”

translation.en: Migereko was referring to the doublebarreled punch that independents could give the National Resistance Movement during the 2011 elections and  thereafter in parliament.
translation.lug: Migereko yali ayogera ku kusoomooza abeesimbawo kinnoomu kwe bajja okuwa NRM mu kulonda kwa 2011 n'oluvannyuma mu paliyamenti.

translation.en: The issue of disgruntled National Resistance Movement members who run as independents was high on the agenda when the National Resistance Movement National Executive Committee met in January.
translation.lug: Ensonga eyo ekwata ku ba NRM abataali bamativu abaagala okwesimbawo ng'abantu kinoomu yasoosowazibwa mu lukungaana lw'abakulembeze ba NRM olwaliwo mu Jjanwali.

translation.en: Going into the meeting at Entebbe State House on January 11;
translation.lug: Nga bagenda okufuna olukungaana mu maka g'obwa pulezidenti nga Jjanwali 11;

translation.en: The National Resistance Movement Spokesperson, Ms Karooro Okurut, blamed independents on the Electoral College System, which was in use then.
translation.lug: Omwogezi wa NRM, Muky Karooro Okurut, yanenya abaali baagala okwesimbawo ng'abantu kinnnoomu mu nkola ya Electoral College, eyali ekozesebwa mu kiseera ekyo.

translation.en: Subsequently the National Executive Committee meeting, hoping to end the postprimaries wrangling, adopted the universal party member vote.
translation.lug: Bwe kityo, abaali mu lukungaana lw'abakulembeze ba NRM mu kugezaako okugonjoola okulumagana okwajjawo oluvannyuma lw'okulonda okw'okusunsulamu baasalawo okukozesa enkola ey'okulonda okw'awamu okwa bammemba b'ekibiina.

translation.en: The just concluded National Resistance Movement primaries are likely to produce the highest number of independents ever during an election and even in parliament.
translation.lug: Okulonda kwa NRM okw'okusunsulamu okwakakomekkerezebwa kuyinza okuvaako omuwendo ogukyasinzeeyo obunene mu byafaayo by'okulonda ogw'abantu abaagala okwesimbawo kinnoomu.

translation.en: Apart of the problem is exactly what Karooro Okurut predicted, the cost of the election.
translation.lug: Karooro Okurut yali yakiraga nti obumu ku buzibu bwe bandifunye bwandibadde bwa ssente ennyingi ezisaasaanyizibwa mu kulonda.

translation.en: Karooro Okurut was right when she said using adult votes at the primaries was like running “two sets of elections”.
translation.lug: Karooro Okurut yali mutuufu kubanga engeri gye baali balondamu "baali ng'abategeka okulonda kwa mirundi ebiri ”.

translation.en: For this reason, some National Resisance Movement members who feared being routed at the primaries opted to run as independents.
translation.lug: Eyo ye nsonga eyaleetera abamu ku ba NRM okutya okuwangulwa mu kulonda okw'okusunsulamu ne basalawo okwesimbawo kinnoomu.

translation.en: Peter Claver Mutuluza is typical.
translation.lug: Peter Claver Mutuluza y'omu ku bantu ng'abo.

translation.en: He is the incumbent Member of Parliament for Mawokota South but he was left in a lock when Amelia Kyambadde, the powerful former Principle Private Secretary to President Yoweri Museveni, threw her hat in the ring.
translation.lug: Ye mubaka wa paliyamenti owa Mawokota South naye yafunamu okutya Amelia Kyambadde, omukazi ow'amaanyi eyaliko omuwandiisi wa pulezidenti bwe yeesowolayo okuvuganya naye ku kifo ekyo.

translation.en: Amelia is a favourite because of her closeness to the President and Mutuluza had no chance against her in the primaries.
translation.lug: Amelia alina omukisa munene okuwangula olw'okuba mukwano gwa Pulezidenti wa ku lusegere nnyo era Mutuluza yakiraba nga tasobola kumuwangula.

translation.en: He says he will run as an independent Lt. Hannington Basakana and John Banalya who are going to contest against Government Chief Whip Daudi Migereko in Butembe County were in a similar situation.
translation.lug: Agamba nti agenda kwesimbawo ng'omuntu kinnoomu, Lt. Hannington Basakana ne John Banalya abagenda okuvuganya Daudi Migereko e Butembe nabo bali mu mbeera efaananako bw'etyo.

translation.en: Others are Moses Nagaya who will be challenging Nathan Igeme Nabeta in Jinja East, Naguib Kezaala who will be con party to fire its Electoral Commission bosses ,as jitters over independents spread National Resistance Movement fears trouble in 2011 after primaries Vice President Gilbert Bukenya.
translation.lug: Abalala mwe muli Moses Nagaya agenda okuvuganya ne Nathan Igeme Nabeta mu buvanjuba bwa Jinja, ne Naguib Kezaala...

translation.en: His election in Wakiso sparked off accusations of electoral malpractices.
translation.lug: Okulondebwa kwe mu Wakiso kwaviirako abantu bangi okulumiriza nti okulonda kwalimu okubba.

translation.en: Testing the Jinja West seat, Moses Kabusu who will be taking on Tim Lwanga for the Kyamuswa County seat and former director of Political Intelligence in the Internal Security Organisation and Charles Rwomushana, who will be contesting in Rujumbura County agains Jim Muhwezi.
translation.lug: Okugezesa ekifo ky'omu bugwanjuba bwa Jinja, Moses Kabusu ajja kuvuganya Tim Lwanga ku kifo ky'e Kyamuswa era eyaliko direkita w'ensonga z'eby'obufuzi mu kitongole ekikkessi ne Charles Rwomushana, ajja okuvuganya Jim Muhwezi mu kifo ky'e Rujumbura.

translation.en: Alex Kamugisha who lost to Jim Muhwezi in Rujumbura, James Tweheyo who came third in Mbarara Municipality and Ronah Ninsiima who lost the Kabale Woman Member of Parliament’s slot to Agriculture Minister Hope Mwesige, will contest.
translation.lug: Alex Kamugisha eyawangulwa Jim Muhwezi mu Rujumbura, James Tweheyo eyakwata eky'okusatu mu Munisipaali y'e Mbarara ne Ronah Ninsiima eyawangulwa minisita w'eby'obulimi Hope Mwesige ku kifo ky'omubaka wa paliyamenti omukazi owa Kabale, bajja kuvuganya.

translation.en: From Ndorwa East, Charles Musekura has petitioned against David Bahati’s win in the primaries.
translation.lug: Mu buvanjuba bwa Ndorwa, Charles Musekura awakanyizza obuwanguzi bwa David Bahati mu kulonda okw'okusunsulamu.

translation.en: Elsewhere, Zaake Kibedi who lost to Moses Balyeku in Jinja West, Santos Eruaga who lost to Moses Ali in Adjumani, Alex Onzima who lost in Maracha, Elizabeth Ociti Alimadi who lost to Betty Bigombe in the race for the Amuru Women’s seat, Kaddunabi Lubega who lost to Faisal Kikulukunyu in Butambala, Beatrice Nyakaisiki Byenkya who lost to Tafasi Kaahwa in the Hoima Women’s race and Patrick Isingoma Mwesigwa who lost to Henry Kajura in Hoima Municipality, say they will run as independents.
translation.lug: Awalala, Zaake Kibedi eyawangulwa Moses Balyeku e Jinja West, Santos Eruaga eyawangulwa Moses Ali mu Adjumani, Alex Onzima eyawangulwa e Maracha, Elizabeth Ociti Alimadi eyawangulwa Betty Bigombe ku kifo ky'omubaka w'abakyala mu Amuru, Kaddunabi Lubega eyawangulwa Faisal Kikulukunyu e Butambala, Beatrice Nyakaisiki Byenkya eyawangulwa Tafasi Kaahwa ku kifo ky'omubaka w'abakyala mu Hoima ne Patrick Isingoma Mwesigwa eyawangulwa Henry Kajura mu Munisipaali y'e Hoima, bagamba nti bajja kwesimbawo ng'abantu kinnoomu.

translation.en: The most dramatic announcements were however those made by Vincent Sempijja who lost Kalungu East to Lule Mawiya, and Samuel Abura Pirir who lost Matheniko to John Baptist Lokwii.
translation.lug: Naye ebyasinga okwewuunyisa bye bigambo bya Vincent Sempijja eyawangulwa Lule Mawiyae e Kalungu East, ne Samuel Abura Pirir eyawangulwa John Baptist Lokwii e Matheniko.

translation.en: Ssempijja said that being independent will help him fight “massive election rigging deeply embedded in the NRM,” while Abura Pirir announced that he had quit the National Resistance Movement.
translation.lug: Ssempijja yagamba nti okwesimbawo ng'omuntu kinnoomu kijja kumuyamba okulwanyisa “ekibba bululu eky'amaanyi ekiri mu NRM,” ate ye Abura Pirir yalangirira nti yali avudde mu NRM.

translation.en: Rigged elections sources within the National Resistance Movement and Electoral Commission indicate that all the one thousand and five hundred petitions cite ballot stuffing which resulted in figures that are either way above the numbers in the national register or in conflict with the total number of votes cast at district Chairman and Woman Member of Parliament’s level.
translation.lug: Ensonda ku kibba bululu mu NRM ne mu kitongole ky'eby'okulonda ziraga nti abantu bonna 1,500 abaajulira bagamba nti obusanduuko bw'okulonda bwakwatibwamu ne kiviirako obululu okusukka ennyo oba okuba obutono ennyo ku obwo obwakubwa mu kulonda ssentebe wa disituliki n'omubaka wa paliyamenti ow'abakyala.

translation.en: In Kalungu East, Vincent Sempijja has raised a red flag over disparities in the number of votes on the National Resistance Movement register and those on the national voter register.
translation.lug: E Kalungu East, Vincent Sempijja yeemulugunya ku butakwatagana wakati w'obululu ku nkalala za NRM n'obw'abalonzi abali ku nkalala z'eggwanga.

translation.en: He argues that while the total number of registered voters on the national voter register is about thirty two thousand those on the National Resistance Movement register were said to be thirty thousand eight hundred fifty three.
translation.lug: Agamba nti wadde ng'enkalala z'abalonzi ez'eggwanga ziraga nti abalonzi abaawandiisibwa bali nga 32,000, abo abali ku nkalala za NRM bagambibwa okuba nga bali 30,853.

translation.en: He wonders whether even members of the opposition participated in what was meant to be an apparently National Resistance Movement affair.
translation.lug: Yeebuuza obanga n'ab'oludda oluvuganya gavumenti beenyigira mu kulonda kwa NRM.

translation.en: In Rwemiyaga County, Patrick Nkalubo’s fifteen thousand and four hundred sixty six votes and Theodore Ssekikubo’s fifteen thousand and four hundred twenty three votes show that National Resistance Movement voters there were thirty one thousand four hundred eighty.
translation.lug: Mu Rwemiyaga, obululu 15,466 Patrick Nkalubo bwe yafuna n'obululu 15,423 Ssekikubo bwe yafuna bulaga nti abalonzi ba NRM mu kitundu ekyo baali 31,480.

translation.en: Foreign Affairs Minister Sam Kuteesa’s thirty nine thousand and eight hundred eighty four votes added to the fourteen thousand and six hundred ninety three votes that his two opponents, Isha Ntumwa and Vincent Kimbugwe, got gives Mawogola county forty four thousand and five hundred seventy seven votes.
translation.lug: Obululu 39,884 minisita ow'ensonga z'ebweru Sam Kuteesa bwe yafuna bw'obugatta ku bululu 14,693 banne ababiri, Isha Ntumwa ne Vincent Kimbugwe, abaali bamuvuganya bwe baafuna,  bulaga nti e Mawogola abantu 44,577 be baalonda.

translation.en: Sources within the National Resistance Movement are also afraid that where the number of independents surges, the group might form another political party or join the opposition and take charge of parliament.
translation.lug: Ensonda mu NRM ziraga nti omuwendo gw'ab'ekibiina ekyo abaagala okwesimbawo kinnoomu gweyongedde nnyo ekireeseewo obweraliikirivu nti bayinza okusalawo okukola ekibiina ky'eby'obufuzi ekirala oba okwegatta ku bawakanya gavumenti ne beefuga paliyamenti.

translation.en: The National Resistance Movement thrives on control of the legislature and has invested heavily in controlling its Member of Parliaments' in parliament.
translation.lug: Ekibiina kya NRM amaanyi gaakyo agasinga obungi gali mu kwefuga ekitongole ekiteesi ky'amateeka era kissa ssente nnyingi mu kukakasa nti kiba n'omuwendo gw'abakiise abasinga obungi mu paliyamenti.

translation.en: Under the relatively new multiparty dispensation, the National Resistance Movement which has a big majority in parliament has often opted to do most of its business in the National Resistance Movement parliamentary assembly and merely present them in parliament to be rubberstamped.
translation.lug: Mu nkola empya ey'ebibiina by'obufuzi, ekibiina kya NRM ekisinga okuba n'omuwendo gw'abakiise mu paliyamenti kyasalawo ebintu ebisinga obungi okubisalirawo mu lukiiko lw'ababaka ba paliyamenti aba NRM oluvannyuma ne babyanjulira paliyamenti okubisemba.

translation.en: However, it has had no policy of dealing with dispute, especially from independents.
translation.lug: Nye tekibadde na nkola ya kukwatamu kwemulugunya, naddala okwo okuva mu abo abeesimbawo kinnoomu.

translation.en: A raft of penalties and sanctions, including verbal and written reprimands from the chief whip, suspension of a member from the assembly, removal from leadership positions, and reference of a case to the part disciplinary bodies have been drafted to reign in dissenting National Resistance Movement Members of Parliament.
translation.lug: Waliwo ebibonerezo ebitali bimu ebibagiddwa okukangavvula bamemba ba NRM ab'omu paliyamenti, omuli okunenyezebwa mu bigambo oba mu buwandiike oyo avunaanyizibwa ku mpisa , okugobwa mu luliiko, okuggibwako obuyinza, oba ensonga okugikwasa ebitongole by'ekibiina ebikwasisa empisa.

translation.en: There are thirty eight independent Members of Parliament in the eighth parliament, one less than the number of the biggest opposition group, the Forum for Democratic Change.
translation.lug: Mu paliyamenti ey'omunaana mulimu bamemba ba paliyamenti 38 abeesimbawo kinnoomu, nga baabulako omu okuweza omuwendo gw'ab'ekibiina kya FDC, ekibiina ekivuganya gavumenti ekisingayo obunene.

translation.en: Of the independent Members of Parliament, thirty two are disgruntled former National Resistance Movement members.
translation.lug: Ku abo abeesimbawo kinoomu kwaliko aba NRM 32 abataali bamativu na kulonda kwa mu kibiina kyabwe.

translation.en: Some have signed Memorandums of Understanding with the National Resistance Movement party, but Chief Whip Migereko says that this does not bind them to supporting the party’s position all the time and that the party’s constitution cannot be invoked when dealing with them.
translation.lug: Abamu baatuuka ku kukkaanya n'ekibiina kya NRM, naye Chief Whip Migereko agamba nti ekyo tekibalemesa kuwakanya nsonga za kibiina mu paliyamenti era ssemateeka w'ekibiina aba takyabakolako.

translation.en: The law on independents, rule four of the party’s constitution, which deals with prohibited conduct spells out dismissal from the party of any member for leader of the National Resistance Movement who either campaigns against the party’s official candidate or funds such a candidate’s opponents, enforcement of the law has until now been impossible.
translation.lug: Etteeka erikwata ku beesimbawo kinnoomu, etteeka ery'okuna mu ssemateeka w'ekibiina, erikwata ku nneeyisa etekkirizibwa lyogera ku kugobebwa okuva mu kibiina memba yenna oba omukulembeze wa NRM avuganya omuntu ekibiina gwe kisimbyewo mu butongole, oba awa ssente oyo amuvuganya, naye n'okutuusa leero kikyali kizibu okussa etteeka eryo mu nkola.

translation.en: During the 2008 by elections to fill the vacant Bugembe Town Council chair, Migereko and Tororo Deputy Resident District Commissioner Richard Gulume supported independent candidate Sula Sentongo against the official candidate, Frank Kayemba who lost.
translation.lug: Mu kulonda okwa  2008 okujjuza ekifo kya Bugembe Town Council, Migereko ne Deputy Resident District Commissioner wa Tororo, Richard Gulume baawagira Sula Sentongo eyali yeesimbyewo yekka eyavuganya era n'awangula Frank Kayemba ekibiina gwe kyali kisimbyewo mu butongole.

translation.en: Migereko and Gulume were never punished.
translation.lug: Migereko ne Gulume tebaabonerezebwa.

translation.en: Though it is no explicit, Article 83 of the Uganda Constitution which deals with the tenure of office of Members of Parliament, says that a person ceases to be a legislator if that person quits the party for which he or she stood and was elected to parliament to join another party or remain in parliament as an independent member, or if having been elected as independent candidate, the person joins a political party.
translation.lug: Wadde nga tekirambikibwa bulungi, akawayiro 83 mu ssemateeka wa Uganda akakwata ku bifo by'obwa memba wa paliyamenti, kagamba nti omuntu alekera awo okuba ku ssiga eriteesi ly'amateeka singa ayabulira ekibiina kye baamulonderamu okujja mu paliyamenti ne yeegatta ku kibiina ekirala oba n'asigala mu paliyamenti ng'omuntu kinnoomu, oba singa yajja yekka naye oluvannyuma ne yeegatta ku kibiina ky'obufuzi ekimu.

translation.en: With the law on their side, losers in the party primaries have an open ticket to contest the 2011 elections as independent candidates and emerge as a major block in parliament.
translation.lug: Olw'okuba etteeka eryo libakolera, abo abaawangulwa balina ebbeetu okuvuganya mu kalulu ka 2011 ng'abantu kinnoomu era ne bafuuka nsonga mu paliyamenti.

translation.en: "Is this the National Resistance Movement’s real fear?That is not something we are preoccupied with,” says Migereko.
translation.lug: Migereko agamba nti, "Kyandiba nti ekyo NRM ky'etya? Nedda ekyo tekitulumya mutwe.”

translation.en: Sources within the National Resistance Movement Electoral Commission indicate that all the one thousand and five hundred petitions cite ballotstuffing which resulted in figures that are either way above the numbers in the national register or in conflict with the total number of votes cast at district Chairman and Woman Member of Parliament’s level.
translation.lug: Ensonda mu NRM ziraga nti abantu bonna 1,500 abaajulira bagamba nti obusanduuko bw'okulonda bwakwatibwamu ne kiviirako obululu okusukka ennyo oba okuba obutono ennyo ku obwo obwakubwa mu kulonda ssentebe wa disituliki n'omubaka wa paliyamenti ow'abakyala.

translation.en: On the morning of September 13, Vice President Gilbert Bukenya walked out of Namboole a lonely and dejected man.
translation.lug: Ku makya nga Ssebutemba 13, Omumyuka wa pulezidenti Gilbert Bukenya yava e Namboole nga munakuwavu nnyo.

translation.en: The elections to the post of Secretary General of the National Resistance Movement had just left Bukenya with an egg on his face.
translation.lug: Okulonda kw'omuwandiisi wa NRM Bukenya tekwamugendera bulungi n'akamu.

translation.en: So emphatic was Mbabazi’s victory that he got more than twice as much as the combined vote of all his opponents.
translation.lug: Obuwanguzi bwa Mbabazi bwali bwa maanyi era obululu bwe yafuna bwali bukubisaamu emirundi ebiri obw'abaali bamuvuganya.

translation.en: On the other hand, Mbabazi had always been projected as aloof, unavailable and inaccessible to party members, which made him look unsuitable to hold the office of Secretary General.
translation.lug: Kyokka bangi baali bagamba nti Mbabazi yeewulira era tatuukirikika, ekyamuleetera okulabika ng'atasobola kuwangula kifo ekyo.

translation.en: Following the chaotic National Resistance Movement primaries which most of the aggrieved candidates blamed on Mbabazi and the Secretariat, the elections had been expected to bring Mbabazi’s tenure as Secretary General tumbling down.
translation.lug: Oluvannyuma lw'obuvuyo obwali mu kulonda kwa NRM okw'okusunsulamu bangi bwe baateeka ku Mbabazi ne banne, kyali kirowoozebwa nti Mbabazi teyandisobodde kumalako kisanja kye.

translation.en: Bukenya and Mbabazi’s conflict is not new.
translation.lug: Bukenya ne Mbabazi bazze bagugulana.

translation.en: In 2007, Bukenya gave a recorded interview to daily Monitor in which he claimed there was a mafia in the government working to bring him down.
translation.lug: Mu 2007, Bukenya yawa ab'olupapula lwa Monitor akatambi mwe yagambira nti waaliwo mafiya mu gavumenti eyali ayagala okumusuula.

translation.en: But on the following day when the interview was published, Bukenya appeared at a press conference at State House to “clear the distortions".
translation.lug: Naye ku lunaku olwaddako ebyali ku katambi bwe byafulumira mu lupapula, Bukenya yayogera ne bannamawulire mu maka g'obwa pulezidenti “ng'aliko by'atangaaza ebikwata ku katambi ako."

translation.en: Sandwiched between Mbabazi and Sam Kutesa, he denied having said there was a mafia group plotting his downfall.
translation.lug: Ng'ayimiridde wakati wa Mbabazi ne Sam Kutesa, yeegaana okugamba nti waaliwo ekibinja kya bamafiya abaali bakola olukwe olw'okumusuula.

translation.en: However it was widely interpreted that Mbabazi and Kutesa were the group Bukenya had referred but had now succumbed to their pressure.
translation.lug: Nye bangi baakitaputa nti Mbabazi ne Kutesa be bamafiya Bukenya be yali ayogerako naye n'agonda oluvannyuma lw'okumussaako akazito.

translation.en: They are the same National Resistance Movement heavyweights that brought him down at the National Resistance Movement elections at Nambole last week.
translation.lug: Abo be basajja ba NRM ab'amaanyi be bamu abaamumegera mu kalulu ka NRM e Nambole wiiki ewedde.

translation.en: So where does this election leave Bukenya and his relations with the President and Mbabazi in the party?
translation.lug: Kati akalulu ako akaakubwa kaakwata katya ku nkolagana ya Bukenya, Pulezidenti, ne Mbabazi mu kibiina kyabwe?

translation.en: Forum for Democratic Change’s Vice Chairman in charge of Western Uganda, Patrick Baguma says Bukenya should better jump before he is pushed.
translation.lug: Patrick Baguma, ssentebe wa FDC mu bugwanjuba bwa Uganda yagamba nti Bukenya asaanidde okubuuka nga tebannamusindika.

translation.en: Most of those who took positions had Museveni’s support.
translation.lug: Abasinga obungi ku abo abaawangula baalina obuwagizi bwa Museveni.

translation.en: Bukenya’s defeat only shows that he is out of favour.
translation.lug: Okuba nti Bukenya yawangulwa kyalaga nti yali takyalina buganzi.

translation.en: "I don’t see him holding on as Vice President for long,” Baguma says.
translation.lug: Baguma agamba nti, "Siraba ngeri gy'asigala mu kifo ky'omumyuka wa pulezidenti.”

translation.en: Sources within the National Resistance Movement echo Baguma’s thinking.
translation.lug: Bangi mu NRM baali bakkiriziganya n'ebigambo bya Baguma ebyo.

translation.en: They say Bukenya has put himself in a very vulnerable situation.
translation.lug: Bagamba nti Bukenya yeetadde mu buzibu.

translation.en: He has given Museveni a blank cheque.
translation.lug: Anyiizizza nnyo Museveni.

translation.en: "There is no better opportunity for Museveni to sack him than now because his popularity at home in the party is now in question,” said a member of the National Resistance Movement’s Central Executive Committee who declined to be named.
translation.lug: Omu ku b'oku lukiiko olukulembeze mu NRM ataayagala kwatuukirizibwa mannya yagamba nti, "Tewali kakisa kasinga kano Museveni k'afunye kugoba Bukenya kubanga takyali muganzi mu kibiina.”

translation.en: "That is a vote of no confidence,” he said referring to cases where Bukenya got no vote at some polling stations in the National Resistance Movement elections.
translation.lug: Ng'ayogera ku ky'okuba nti mu bifo ebimu Bukenya teyafunawo kalulu, yagamba nti, "Kyalaga nti baali bamuggyeemu obwesige.”

translation.en: The same source said that as early as March this year, Bukenya was advised not to ‘demote’ himself from the post of National Resistance Movement Vice Chairman for Central Region to contest for Secretary General.
translation.lug: Ensonda y'emu yagamba nti mu  Maaki w'omaka guno, Bukenya baamuwa amagezi aleme kuta kifo kye yalina ng'omumyuka wa ssentebe wa NRM mu bitundu by'omu massekkati olw'okwagala okuvuganya ku kifo ky'omuwandiisi w'ekibiina.

translation.en: But not only did he defiantly go ahead to contest for the Secretary General post, he went for even a lower post of National Resistance Movement Chairman for Wakiso district.
translation.lug: Naye teyawuliriza n'agenda mu maaso okuvuganya ku ky'obuwandiisi bw'ekibiina ate era n'avuganya ne ku kifo ekya wansiko ekya ssentebe wa NRM mu disitulikiti ya Wakiso.

translation.en: Why did Bukenya go for a post he had earlier ridiculed as inferior?
translation.lug: Lwaki Bukenya yasalawo okuvuganya ku kifo mu kusooka kye yali anyooma nti kya wansi?

translation.en: Sources close to Bukenya say he had been aware that Museveni has been searching for someone to replace him as Vice President.
translation.lug: Abamu ku bali ku lusegere ne Bukenya bagamba nti yali akitegedde nti Museveni anoonya omuntu ow'okudda mu kifo kye eky'omumyuka wa pulezidenti.

translation.en: The preferred choice is a Catholic from Northern Uganda as National Resistance Movement prepares for 2011 general elections.
translation.lug: Okusingira ddala yali ayagala Mukatuliki ava mu bukiikakkono bwa Uganda kubanga NRM yali yeetegekera okulonda kwa 2011.

translation.en: The move is calculated to either split or win over the opposition vote in the region and compensate for the reversal the National Resistance Movement and Museveni are likely to suffer in Buganda.
translation.lug: Ekyo kyakolebwa okuleetawo enjawukana mu bavuganya gavumenti mu kitundu ekyo oba okuwangula emitima gyabwe okugezaako okuziba eddibu  ly'obululu NRM ne Museveni lye bayinza okufuna mu Buganda.

translation.en: This according to the sources, knowing that the curtain is about to come down on him, Bukenya had to hold a powerful position of Secretary General to prove his political cloud within the party ranks and Buganda.
translation.lug: Okusinziira ku nsonda ezimu, Bukenya bwe yamanya nti anaatera okufiirwa ekifo kye ekyo, yayagala okufuna ekifo eky'amaanyi eky'omuwandiisi w'ekibiina alage nti yali akyali wa maanyi mu kibiina ne mu Buganda.

translation.en: He has been repositioning himself in the central region.
translation.lug: Abadde agezaako okwenyweza mu bitundu by'omu massekkati g'eggwanga.

translation.en: For example though he supported the closure of Central Broadcasting Services radio, he was the first top government official to hand in a cheque for the rehabilitation of the burnt Kasubi tombs of Buganda.
translation.lug: Ng'ekyokulabirako, wadde nga yawagira eky'okuggala leediyo ya CBS, ye mukungu wa gavumenti ow'amaanyi eyasooka okuwaayo ssente okuyamba mu kuddaabiriza amasiro ga Buganda ag'e Kasubi agaali gayidde.

translation.en: The question now is whether the Namboole defeat did not leave him weaker and less politically relevant than before.
translation.lug: Kati ekyebuuzibwa kiri nti, Okulonda okwali e Namboole tekweyongera kumunafuya bunafuya kusinga ne bwe yali emabega?

translation.en: Where does defeat leave Bukenya?
translation.lug: Okuwangulwa okwo kuleka wa Bukenya?

translation.en: A supplementary display of lists of particulars recommended for correction ,deletion from the register or,inclusion on to the register will be conducted for a period of ten days within each parish from 3rd - 13th September 2010.
translation.lug: Olukalala lw'ebintu ebyetaaga okutereezebwa, okuggya amannya ku nkalala, oba okwongera amannya ku nkalala kujja kukolebwa okumala ennaku mu buli parisi, okuva nga 3 - 13 Ssebutemba 2010.

translation.en: The biggest fear is that once the losers contest, the number of independent Member of Parliaments will significantly increase making independent Member of Parliaments another power block in the Parliament of Uganda.
translation.lug: Okweraliikirira okusinga kuli nti singa abo abaawangulwa basalawo okuvuganya, omuwendo gw'abeesimbyewo kinnoomu gujja kulinnya nnyo kifuule ekiwayi ky'abeesimbawo kinnoomu nakyo okuba eky'amaanyi mu paliyamenti ya Uganda.

translation.en: With enough numbers to influence parliamentary business or even take the National Rsistance Movement hostage, the independent’s numbers may be crucial in swinging the vote.
translation.lug: Abeesimbawo kinnoomu bayinza okufuna amaanyi mangi nga basobola okwefuga paliyamenti n'okusiba NRM emikono n'okuba n'omukono gwa maanyi mu bisalibwawo paliyamenti.

translation.en: National Resistance Movement has lost control and some of its members will compete as independent candidates.
translation.lug: NRM ebintu bigivudde mu ngalo era abamu ku bantu baayo bajja kuvuganya ng'abantu kinnoomu.

translation.en: “This is a very difficult situation for both Museveni and Bukenya, but I am sure they will all free themselves,” says Government Chief Whip Daudi Migereko.
translation.lug: Daudi Migereko Chief Whip wa gavumenti agamba nti, “Eno mbeera nzibu eri Museveni ne Bukenya,  naye ndi mukakafu nti buli omu ajja kusala eggezi agiveemu.”

translation.en: Locals in Gulu not only move considerable distances to the chosen locations of CinemArena films but also brave the cold of the night till late as midnight.
translation.lug: Abantu b'e Gulu batambula engendo mpanvu okugenda okulaba sineema ate era bagumira obunyogovu bw'ekiro okutuusa eyo ekiro mu ttumbi.

translation.en: Contact personnel director is Evas Orland, the Chief Mechanic is Yunusu Kabuya and the workshop supervior is Isha Kyongo
translation.lug: Akwanaganya eby'empuliziganya ye Evas Orland, akulira bamakanika ye Yunusu Kabuya, ate alabirira ekkolero ye Isha Kyongo

translation.en: For example, most Jeep Cherokees are best at fifty five miles per hour and Toyota four runners are best at about fifty miles per hour.
translation.lug: Ng'ekyokulabirako, Jeep Cherokees ezisinga obungi zikola bulungi nga ziddukira ku mayiro 55 buli ssaawa ate Toyota four runners zikola bulungi nnyo nga ziddukira ku mayiro 50 buli ssaawa.

translation.en: Will the “deserters” take part in Democratic Party primaries?
translation.lug: Abaayabulira ekibiina baneenyigira mu kulonda kwa DP okw'okusunsulamu?

translation.en: Uganda’s most corrupt officials need to be invetigated.
translation.lug: Abakungu ba Uganda abasinga okulya enguzi basaanidde okunoonyerezebwako.

translation.en: Al-Shabaab terror attacks hijack African Union agenda.
translation.lug: Obulumbaganyi bwa bannalukalala ba Al-Shabaab butaataaganya enteekateeka z'ekibiina ekigatta amawanga ga Afirika.

translation.en: Kayumba shooting: The unresolved puzzle?
translation.lug: Kayumba okukubwa amasasi: Kakunyizo akatannagonjoolwa?

translation.en: Highly placed security sources in Uganda told the Independent that before he was shot, Lieutenant General Kayumba Nyamwasa approached Uganda’s military attachment to South Africa.
translation.lug: Ensonda z'eby'okwerinda ezeesigika mu Uganda zaagamba olupapula lwa Independent nti bwe yali tannakubwa masasi, Lefutinanti Genero Kayumba Nyamwasa yayogerako n'abajaasi ba Uganda ku nsonga za South Africa.

translation.en: Major General Steven Kashaka asked him to help establish contact with Kagame.
translation.lug: Maja Genero Steven Kashaka yamusaba awuliziganye ne Kagame.

translation.en: Kashaka consulted President Yoweri Museveni of Uganda and sought his guidance.
translation.lug: Kashaka yeebuuza ku pulezidenti wa Uganda Museveni amuwe ku magezi.

translation.en: It seems Museveni gave it a go ahead.
translation.lug: Kirabika ekyo Museveni yakisemba.

translation.en: Kashaka then contacted Kigali and delivered the message that Kayumba wanted to “talk”.
translation.lug: Kashaka yasindika obubaka e Kigali nti Kayumba ayagala “kwogera”.

translation.en: Why then was Kagame skeptical when informed of this effort?
translation.lug: Lwaki Kagame yafunamu okwekengera nga bamutegeezezza ku nsonga eyo?

translation.en: The July nineteenth to twenty first, African Union summit in Kampala was hijacked by the July eleventh terror attacks by the Al-Shabaab jihadists.
translation.lug: Olukungaana lw'ekibiina ekigatta amawanga ga Afirika olwaliwo okuva nga Jjulaayi 19-21, lwataataaganyizibwa obulumbaganyi bwa Al-Shabaab obwaliwo nga Jjulaayi 11.

translation.en: The summit which had been themed on “Maternal, infant and child development in Africa” was diverted to first discuss the Al-Shabaab latest terror missions.
translation.lug: Mu lukungaana olwo olwali lukwata ku baana n'abazadde ensonga eyasooka okwogerwako yali ekwata ku bulumbaganyi aba Al-Shabaab bwe baali bakoze.

translation.en: If you plan to seek the services of the Uganda police, prisons service, Mulago Hospital, any court, or Uganda main Electricity distribution company, be warned that you must be ready to bribe.
translation.lug: Bw'oba oyagala okufuna empeereza ya poliisi ya Uganda, ekitongole ky'ekkomera, eddwaliro ly'e Mulago, kooti yonna, oba ekitongole ekibunyisa amasannyalaze mu Uganda, olina okuba omwetegefu okuwa enguzi.

translation.en: According to the East African Bribery Index, no service is offered in these places unless a bribe is offered.
translation.lug: Okusinziira ku kitongole kya East African Bribery Index, tewali buweereza bukuweebwa mu bifo ebyo okuggyako ng'owaddeyo enguzi.

translation.en: Mugeni tolerates other people’s views, Karooro Okurut wrote in the press last week: “Why Uganda must stay in Somalia".
translation.lug: Mugeni awuliriza endowooza z'abalalala, Mu lupapula lwa wiiki ewedde Karooro Okurut yawandiika ku nsonga egamba nti: “Lwaki Uganda erina okusigala mu Somalia".

translation.en: Oyoo reported that he got four trails of Uganda Peoples Defence Forces who have made a U-turn.
translation.lug: Oyoo yagamba nti yasanga ebigere by'abajaasi ba UPDF bana abaali bakyusizza obuufu.

translation.en: Odyambo reported that he sent a force to where he has been on food mission.
translation.lug: Odyambo yagamba nti yasindika eggye mu kitundu gye yali okukola ku nsonga y'emmere.

translation.en: This was after Kony wanted to confirm from him.
translation.lug: Kino yakyogera oluvannyuma lwa Kony okwagala okukakasa okuva gy'ali.

translation.en: Opio Makas reported that he clashed with Uganda Peoples Defence Forces.
translation.lug: Opio Makas yagamba nti baalwanagana n'abajaasi ba UPDF.

translation.en: He said that Acelam is now too weak to move before he was advised to carry him on stretcher after meeting Lotiba
translation.lug: Yagamba nti Acelam kati yali mugonvu nnyo era oluvannyuma baamugamba bamusitulire ku katanda oluvannyuma lw'okusisinkana Lotiba

translation.en: Kony is still desperate and determined to meet Makas with whatever he is carrying.
translation.lug: Kony akyayagala nnyo okusisinkana Makas na buli kimu ky'asitudde.

translation.en: He is also sure that if Makas succeeds to meet him, it will restore some commanders’ hope that Kony could still command.
translation.lug: Era mukakafu nti Makas ajja kusobola okumusisinkana, kimukakase nti ddala Kony akyasobola okuduumira.

translation.en: Otherwise Makas’s failure to meet Kony could he disastrous to his command and control capabilities
translation.lug: Naye singa Makas alemwa okusisinkana Kony kiba kiraga nti eby'obuduumizi bimuvudde mu ngalo.

translation.en: If Makas loses everything, the meeting could be a boost to Kony.
translation.lug: Makas bw'afiirwa buli kimu, ensisinkano eyo eyinza okwongera Kony amaanyi.

translation.en: Other commanders will not know what exactly Makas has arrived with and what he lost.
translation.lug: Abaduumizi abalala tebajja kumanya ebyo byennyini Makas by'atuuse nabyo ne byafiiriddwa.

translation.en: Since President Paul Kagame's recent election victory, the majority of Rwandans in and outside the country have been in festive mood.
translation.lug: Bukya Pulezidenti Paul Kagame awangula kulonda gye buvuddeko awo, Abanyarwanda abasinga obungi mu Rwanda n'ebweru waayo bali mu kujaganya.

translation.en: Kony faces rebellion from his commanders.
translation.lug: Kony ayolekedde okujeemerwa abaduumizi be.

translation.en: On the night the election results were announced, I was in the Belgium capital, Brussels.
translation.lug: Ku lunaku ebyava mu kulonda lwe byalangirirwa, nnali mu Brussels, ekibuga ekikulu ekya Bubirigi.

translation.en: Brussels is a key site of anti Kagame and anti Rwanda Patriotic Front activism.
translation.lug: Mu Brussels mulimu bangi abavumirira Kagame ne gavumenti y'e Rwanda.

translation.en: Television Rwanda showed scenes of jubilation as the thousands of people in and outside Amahoro stadium sang, danced and cheered.
translation.lug: Ttivvi y'e Rwanda yalaga abantu bangi nga bajaganyiza munda ne wabweru w'ekisaawe ky'e Amahoro.

translation.en: President Kagame, his family and a host of government officials, were seen swinging to the music as the clock ticked towards dawn.
translation.lug: Pulezidenti Kagame, ab'omu maka ge, n'abakungu ba gavumenti abawerako baalagibwa nga nabo bajaganya ng'eno obudde bwe bugenda buwungeera.

translation.en: I was with fans and a few critics of President Kagame, his government and his party the Rwanda Patriotic Front.
translation.lug: Nnali wamu n'abawagizi ba Pulezidenti Kagame, gavumenti ye, n'ekibiina kye ekya Rwanda Patriotic Front, era waaliwo n'abatonotono abaali batamumatira.

translation.en: He bragged about being the first member of the local Rwandan Diaspora to cast his vote the previous day.
translation.lug: Yeewana ng'omu ku Bannyarwanda abaasooka okusuula akalulu jjo.

translation.en: Critics and admirers of Kagame rarely agree on anything.
translation.lug: Kizibu abo abawakanya Kagame n'abamuwagira okukkaanya ku nsonga yonna.

translation.en: The general argument that having a sense of humor and giving in to simple pleasures were not for which Kagame is famous.
translation.lug: Bangi baagamba nti Kagame tamanyiddwa kuba muntu asaaga oba asanyukamu.

translation.en: I was watching television Rwanda on the internet and the scenes of jubilation were truly disarming.
translation.lug: Nnali ndaba ttivi y'e Rwanda ku intaneeti naye bye nnalaba byali byawukana ku ebyo bye baali bamwogerako.

translation.en: The few voices, mainly of Rwandan officials and local columnists seek to tell the other side of the story.
translation.lug: Abantu abatonotono, nnaddala abakungu mu Rwanda n'abawandiisi b'olupapula lw'amawulire mu Rwanda, bo balaga kirala .

translation.en: They were literally drowned in stories claiming that Rwanda was growing into a typical African dictatorship.
translation.lug: Baali bettanira nnyo emboozi ezigamba nti gavumenti ya Rwanda yali efuuse ya nnakyemalira.

translation.en: The critics insisted that Kagame had no interest in opening up what they saw as restricted political space.
translation.lug: Baagamba nti Kagame tayagala kugaba buyinza.

translation.en: The Kagame government had no interest in allowing “the real opposition” or “the main opposition parties” from competing for power.
translation.lug: Gavumenti ya Kagame teyali nneetegefu kukkiriza bibiina bya bufuzi eby'amaanyi ebiwakanya gavumenti ye kuvuganya ku buyinza.

translation.en: They were literally drowned in stories claiming that Rwanda was growing into a typical African dictatorship.
translation.lug: Bettanira nnyo emboozi ezaali zigamba nti gavumenti ya Rwanda yali efuuse ya nnakyemalira.

translation.en: A common critique of the Kagame regime is “the climate of fear”.
translation.lug: Ekimu kye basinga okuvumirira ku bukulembeze bwa Kagame kiri nti aleeseewo okutya kungi mu bantu.

translation.en: Kagame regime has allegedly created fear to intimidate whoever wishes to engage in “real debate” about the situation in the country.
translation.lug: Gavumeni ya Kagame etiisa buli omu agezaako okugiwakanya mu ngeri yonna.

translation.en: The critics claim that the climate of fear, has turned Rwanda into “a volcano".
translation.lug: Abavumirira Kagame bagamba nti embeera eyo ey'okutya ereetedde Rwanda okuba ng'olusozi oluwandula omuliro.

translation.en: Rwanda is to “erupt anytime” into mass violence and possibly another genocide.
translation.lug: Rwanda etuuse okubalukamu obwegugungo obw'amaanyi sinakindi okuddamu okubaamu ekittabantu.

translation.en: Rwandans know that neither President Kagame nor the Rwanda Patriotic Front or the Rwanda government are without fault or weakness.
translation.lug: Abanyarwanda bakimanyi nti Pulezidenti Kagame, ekibiina kye ekya RPF, oba gavumenti ya Rwanda tebasobola kuba nga tebaliiko kya kunenyezebwa.

translation.en: If one spent time talking to Rwandans about several aspects of government and public life, they would be seen as complaining.
translation.lug: Singa omuntu yenna ayogera n'Abanyarwanda ku gavumenti oba ku mbeera y'obulamu bw'abantu, atandika okutwalibwa ng'eyeemulugunya.

translation.en: Those whose knowledge of Rwanda is limited have a tendency of disregarding context.
translation.lug: Abo abatamanyi bifa mu Rwanda batera obutalowooza ku byonna bizingirwamu.

translation.en: Critics who know Rwanda well, are often guilty of willful distortion and twisting of facts to suit their purpose.
translation.lug: Abavumirira gavumenti abamanyi obulungi ebifa mu Rwanda, emirundi mingi banyoolanyoola amazima basobole okutuuka ku biruubirirwa byabwe.

translation.en: Rwanda is often portrayed as a country in the grip of a suffocating monopoly of power by the Rwanda Patriotic Front.
translation.lug: Batera okuwa ekifaananyi  nti Rwanda efugibwa ekibiina kya RPF ekikajjala ku bantu.

translation.en: It is true that the Rwanda Patriotic Front is an overwhelmingly powerful political organization.
translation.lug: Kyo kituufu nti ekibiina kya RPF kya maanyi nnyo.

translation.en: The most powerful was the National Revolutionary Movement for Development, the former ruling party.
translation.lug: Ekibiina ekisinga amaanyi kye kya National Revolutionary Movement for Development, ekyaliko mu buyinza.

translation.en: The party leaders organized and arranged the genocide and mass murder of the early one thousand nine hundred nineties.
translation.lug: Abakulembeze b'ekibiina ekyo be baategeka ekittabantu ku ntandikwa y'emyaka gya 1990.

translation.en: The Arusha grants obliged the signatories to share power.
translation.lug: Endgaano y'e Arusha yeetaagisa abaagissaako omukono okugabana obuyinza.

translation.en: Given its military might, the Rwanda Patriotic Front could have easily opted to rule alone and sideline or even ban other parties.
translation.lug: Okusinziira ku maanyi ge kirina, ekibiina kya RPF kyali kisobola okusalawo okufuga kyokka ne kisambajja oba ne kiwera ebibiina ebirala.

translation.en: The country wide consultations led to the making of the post genocide constitution of two thousand three.
translation.lug: Okwebuuza ku bantu okwetoola eggwanga kwaviirako okukola ssemateeka mu 1993.

translation.en: The majority of Rwandans argued against the return to multi party politics on grounds that parties had created the instability.
translation.lug: Abanyarwanda abasinga obungi baawakanya eky'okuzzaawo ebibiina by'obufuzi ebingi nga bagamba nti byali bireetawo obutali butebenkevu.

translation.en: The Rwanda Patriotic Font could have easily capitalized on this anti party mood and barred political parties.
translation.lug: Ekibiina kya RPF kyali kisobola okukozesa akakisa ako okuwera ebibiina by'obufuzi ebirala.

translation.en: The consultations ran alongside elite focused consultative meetings presided over by then President, Pasteur Bizimungu.
translation.lug: Okwebuuza kuno kwaliwo mu kiseera kye kimu n'enkungaana ezitali zimu ezaabangamu abantu abagagga ezaakubirizibwa Pulezidenti, Pasteur Bizimungu.

translation.en: The consultations included clergy, notwithstanding the soiled image of the church at the Rwandan secrets.
translation.lug: Okwebuuza kuno kwazingiramu n'abakulembeze b'amadiini, abaali batasobola kugumira linnya bbi ekkanisa lye yali ekoze mu Rwanda.

translation.en: Some are directly responsible for its dirty history but are now determined to build a “new Rwanda”.
translation.lug: Abamu ku bo beenyigira ne mu bikolwa ebibi ekkanisa bye yakola naye nga kati bamalirivu okuzimba “Rwanda  empya”.

translation.en: The Rwanda Patriotic Front has run the country in cooperation with seven other political parties.
translation.lug: Ekibiina kya RPF kikoledde wamu n'ebibiina by'obufuzi ebirala musanvu mu kuddukanya eggwanga.

translation.en: The Liberal Party and the Social Democratic Party were both founded in opposition to the Habyarimana regime.
translation.lug: Ekibiina kya Liberal Party n'ekya Social Democratic Party byatandikibwawo kulwanyisa bufuzi bwa Habyarimana.

translation.en: The Liberal Party and the Social Democratic Party were both founded in the early one thousand nine hundred nineties.
translation.lug: Ekibiina kya Liberal Party n'ekya Social Democratic Party byombi byatandikibwawo ku ntandikwa y'emyaka gya 1990.

translation.en: Both sponsored candidates to run against President Kagame in the recent elections.
translation.lug: Byombi byasimbawo abantu okuvuganya Pulezidenti Kagame mu kulonda okuwedde.

translation.en: The Rwanda Patriotic Front candidate was welcomed as a sign of growing political maturity in the country’s politics.
translation.lug: Oyo eyali yeesimbyewo ku kaadi y'ekibiina kya RPF yayanirizibwa ng'akabonero akalaga okukula mu by'obufuzi by'eggwanga.

translation.en: One of them is Imberakuri, founded by Bernard Ntaganda.
translation.lug: Ekimu ku byo ye Imberakuri, ekyatandikibwawo Bernard Ntaganda.

translation.en: Ntaganda and some of his supporters ended up in jail on criminal charges.
translation.lug: Ntaganda n'abamu ku bawagizi be baasibwa nga babalanga kumenya mateeka.

translation.en: Inkingi of Victoire Ingabire and Democratic Green Party of Frank Habineza, have been denied permission to participate in elections as presidential candidates.
translation.lug: Ab'ekibiina kya Inkingi ekya Victoire Ingabire n'ab'ekibiina kya Democratic Green Party ekya Frank Habineza, baalemesebwa okusimbawo omuntu okuvuganya ku bwa pulezidenti.

translation.en: The real opposition criticized President Kagame and the government for their failure to secure permission to register.
translation.lug: Ab'oludda oluvuganya baanenya Pulezidenti Kagame ne gavumenti nti be baabalemesa okuwandiisa abantu baabwe.

translation.en: What Kagame’s critics have not bothered to do is examine and debate the reasons why the government has given for its decision.
translation.lug: Naye abo abavumirira Kagame tebafuddeeyo kumanya nsonga lwaki gavumenti yasalawo okukola ekintu ekyo.

translation.en: In two thousand six, those restrictions were relaxed.
translation.lug: Mu 2006, obukwakulizo obwo bwakkakkanyizibwamu.

translation.en: Rob Walker is a journalist.
translation.lug: Rob Walker munnamawulire.

translation.en: What distinguishes Rwanda from its neighbours is the real climate of fear.
translation.lug: Enjawulo wakati wa Rwanda ku mawanga agagiriraanye y'embeera ey'okutya eri mu ggwanga.

translation.en: Mr. Walker, who was in Rwanda on temporary assignment, is not alone in making these claims.
translation.lug: Mw. Walker, eyali agenze e Rwanda okubaako emirimu gy'akola, si ye yekka agamba ekyo.

translation.en: Until the early one thousand nine hundred nineties, pre Rwanda Patriotic Font Rwanda was a one party, half military.
translation.lug: Okutuusa ku ntandikwa y'emyaka gya 1990, Rwanda yali efugibwa kibiina kya bufuzi kimu na magye.

translation.en: The Rwanda Patriotic Front’s path to power was for most Rwandans, their first introduction to war on grand scale.
translation.lug: Okuggya kwa RPF mu buyinza Abanyarwanda bangi bagamba nti kwe kwaleeta olutalo olukyasinzeeyo obunene olwasookera ddala mu Rwanda.

translation.en: The war lasted in the late one thousand nine hundred nineties, leaving many death and mass disruption.
translation.lug: Olutalo olwo lwagendera ddala okutuuka ku nkomerero y'emyaka gya 1990 era lwafiiramu abantu bangi n'ebintu bingi byayonooneka.

translation.en: It was a war that few inside the country had expected the Rwandan Patriotic Front to win.
translation.lug: Bantu batono nnyo abaali balowooza nti eggye lya RPF lyali lisobola okuwangula.

translation.en: This is not the fear critics of Kagame and the Government of Rwanda had in mind.
translation.lug: Okwo si kwe kutya abo abavumirira Kagame ne gavumenti ya Rwanda kwe boogerako.

translation.en: What they mean is that there are on going efforts by the state and President Kagame to intimidate the citizens.
translation.lug: Kye bagamba kiri nti waliwo kaweefube agenda mu maaso gavumenti ne Pulezidenti Kagame gwe baliko nga bagenderera okutiisatiisa abantu.

translation.en: The writer is a Senior Research Fellow at the Makerere Institute of Social Research.
translation.lug: Omuwandiisi ye Senior Research Fellow e Makerere Institute of Social Research.

translation.en: Over the last few years he has conducted and overseen research for the Crisis States Research Centre at London School of Economics.
translation.lug: Amaze emyaka egiwerako ng'anoonyereza era ng'akola nga kalabalaba w'okunoonyereza mu Crisis States Research Centre ku London School of Economics.

translation.en: President Paul Kagame is mobbed by enthusiastic supporters during the just concluded elections.
translation.lug: Pulezidenti Paul Kagame nga yeetooloddwa abawagizi be bangi mu kulonda okwakaggwa.

translation.en: Mukiibi Joseph Kironde’s house is in Kansanga.
translation.lug: Ennyumba ya Mukiibi Joseph Kironde e Kansanga.

translation.en: Kironde’s house is a four roomed affair, with white washed walls, sitting on the edge of a lawn and no gate.
translation.lug: Ennyumba ya Kironde ya bisenge bina, ebisenge byasiigibwa langi njeru, eriranye ekisiko, era teriiko ggeeti.

translation.en: Kironde who is sixty two, is very proud and lucky to have it.
translation.lug: Kironde kati alina emyaka 62, era musanyufu okuba n'ennyumba eyo.

translation.en: From the two thousand two Uganda Population and Housing Census, only thirty percent of urban dwellers live in houses they own.
translation.lug: Okusinziira ku kunoonyereza okwakolebwa mu Uganda mu 2002 abantu 30 ku buli kikumi bokka mu bibuga be basula mu mayumba agaabwe ku bwabwe.

translation.en: One of the top housing managers in the country, rent on a four bedroom executive house in a prime location in Kampala.
translation.lug: Omu ku bakola buzineesi y'amayumba mu ggwanga, apangisa ennyumba ey'ebisenge bina mu kifo ekirungi ennyo mu Kampala.

translation.en: According to a two thousand nine report by Knight Frank, it indicated the cost of a house in the East African countries.
translation.lug: Alipoota eyafulumizibwa Knight Frank mu 2009 yalaga ebisale by'amayumba mu mawanga g'omu buvanjuba bwa Afirika.

translation.en: In Tanzania, a house costs six thousand United States dollars per month higher than a similar one in Uganda.
translation.lug: Mu Tanzania, ennyumba etwala ddoola z'Amerika 6,000 buli mwezi okusinga ennyumba y'emu wano mu Uganda.

translation.en: Private construction of residential houses rose from eight and eight percent of Gross Domestic Product in two thousand to two thousand one.
translation.lug: Omuwendo gw'abantu abazimba amayumba ag'obwannannyini ag'okusulamu gwalinnya wakati wa 2000 ne 2001.

translation.en: Until recently, private construction of residential houses rose to fifteen percent in two thousand eight and nine.
translation.lug: Omuwendo gw'abantu abazimba amayumba gaabwe gweyongera ebitundu 15 ku buli kikumi mu 2008 ne mu 2009.

translation.en: In two thousand seven and eight, the sector grew by nine and one percent.
translation.lug: Mu 2007 ne 2008 omuwendo gw'ennyumba ezizimbibwa gwalinnya ebitundu mwenda era n'ekitundu kimu ku buli kikumi.

translation.en: The sector grew basically at three and eight percent in two thousand eight and nine.
translation.lug: Okuzimba kwakula wakati w'ebitundu 3 ne 8 ku buli kikumi mu 2008 ne 2009.

translation.en: Ugandans traditionally buy plots and personally see through the construction of their houses without ever checking out possibilities for acquiring mortgage.
translation.lug: Okutwalira awamu Bannayuganda bagula poloti ne bazimba amayumba gaabwe nga tebalowoozezza ku birala.

translation.en: Only a small percentage of Ugandans earn a salary.
translation.lug: Bannayuganda batono nnyo abakolerera omusaala.

translation.en: Bududa District Chairman Wilson Watira had a meeting with Minister Mukwaya.
translation.lug: Ssentebe wa disitulikiti y'e Bududa Wilson Watira yafuna olukungaana ne minisita Mukwaya.

translation.en: Both the district and local leaders wanted the victims to be relocated to the neighbouring Sironko district.
translation.lug: Abakulembeze ba disitulikiti n'ab'ebitundu baali baagala abantu abakoseddwa okusengulwa babazze mu disitulikiti y'e Sironko.

translation.en: Area Members of Parliament David Wakikona and Oliver Wonekha opposed the decision, initiating a draw in the resettlement exercise.
translation.lug: Abakiise b'ebitundu ebyo mu paliyamenti, David Wakikona ne Oliver Wonekha ekyo baakiwakanya, ne kireetawo okusoomooza mu nteekateeka z'okusengula abantu.

translation.en: In the April 15th petition to the Prime Minister, residents of Bulucheke camp described that they were never consulted by district leaders on resettlement.
translation.lug: Mu kusaba kwabwe eri ssabaminisita w'eggwanga nga Apuli 15, abatuuze mu nkambi y'e Bulucheke baagamba nti abakulembeze ba disitulikiti tebaasooka kubeebuuzaako ku nsonga z'okubasengula.

translation.en: There is lack of abundant water resources, clinics,schools and insecurity from Karamajong cattle rustlers.
translation.lug: Mu kitundu temuli mazzi, malwaliro, na masomero gamala, era balumbibwa nnyo Abakalamoja ababbi b'ente.

translation.en: There has been constant conflict between the Bagisu and Sabiny of Kapchorwa and the Karamajong over the said land.
translation.lug: Wabaddengawo okusika omuguwa wakati w'Abagisu, Abassebbeyi b'e Kapchorwa, n'Abakalamoja ku ttaka eryo.

translation.en: Bududa District Woman Member of Parliament, Oliver Wonekha says the cattle rustling by the Karamajong and the swampy land created fear in people.
translation.lug: Omubaka w'abakyala mu paliyamenti owa Bududa, Oliver Wonekha, agamba nti Abakalamoja ababbi b'ente n'ettaka ery'entobazi bireeseewo okutya mu bantu.

translation.en: The cattle rustling by the Karamajong and the swampy land created fear in people regarding the land in Sironko.
translation.lug: Abakalamoja ababbi b'ente n'ettaka ery'entobazi bireeseewo okutya mu bantu ku nsonga z'ettaka ly'e Sironko.

translation.en: You cannot move people from landslides to floods and that is why the people rejected the land in Sironko.
translation.lug: Tosobola kuggya bantu mu kitundu ettaka gye libumbulukuka ate n'obazza mu ntobazi era eyo ye nsonga lwaki abantu baagaanye ettaka ly'e Sironko.

translation.en: Instead, the survivors proposed being resettled in Kayunga, Buikwe or within Bududa.
translation.lug: Naye abaawonyeewo baasabye batwalibwe mu bitundu by'e Kayunga, Buikwe, oba mu Bududa mwennyini.

translation.en: According to Watira, when the district officials and representatives of the victims went to Kayunga, they were shown a forest reserve.
translation.lug: Okusinziira ku Watira, abakungu ba disitulikiti n'abaakiikirira bakaawonawo bwe baagenda e Kayunga, baabalaga kibira.

translation.en: The area was unsuitable because of the tension from the September two thousand nine riots which were occasioned by the Banyala.
translation.lug: Ekifo ekyo kyali tekikola olw'obunkenke obwakiriko okuva lwe waabaawo obwegugungo obwatandikibwawo Abanyala ku nsonga y'ettaka eryo mu Ssebutemba 2009.

translation.en: The Banyala sought to culturally break away from Buganda kingdom.
translation.lug: Abanyala baayagala okwekutula ku bwakabaka bwa Buganda.

translation.en: On August sixth, when President Museveni was launching the Imbalu season in Mbale, the people asked him about the resettlement.
translation.lug: Nga Agusito 6, Pulezidenti Museveni bwe yali atongoza ekiseera ky'okusala embalu e Mbale, abantu baamubuuza ebikwata ku kubasengula.

translation.en: The president told them flatly that government will not resettle people in Sironko because of the land conflicts between Bagisu and Sabiny.
translation.lug: Pulezidenti yabagamba lunye nti gavumenti tegenda kusengula bantu olw'enkaayana z'ettaka eziriwo wakkati w'Abagisu n'Abassebbeyi.

translation.en: He said that the government was looking for public land in Bugisu, Bunyoro and Buganda.
translation.lug: Yabagamba nti gavumenti yali enoonya ettaka erya lukale mu Bugisu, mu Bunyoro, ne mu Buganda.

translation.en: The latest information on this matter indicates that Kiryandongo has been identified as the final resettlement place for the Bududa landslides victims.
translation.lug: Ebikyasembyeyo okumanyibwa biraga nti Kiryandongo kye kifo ekisaliddwawo okusenguliramu abantu b'e Bududa abaakosebwa okubumbulukuka kw'ettaka.

translation.en: On August twenty fifth, a team from the Office of the Prime Minister visited the Internally Displaced Persons at Bulucheke.
translation.lug: Nga Agusito 25, ttiimu okuva mu ofiisi ya ssaabaminisita yagenda okulaba abantu abaasengulwa e Bulucheke.

translation.en: The Office of the Prime Minister asked for representatives to tour Kiryandongo on September first.
translation.lug: Ofiisi ya ssaabaminisita yagamba ababaka baayo okulambula Kiryandongo nga Ssebutemba 1.

translation.en: State Minister for Disaster preparedness, Musa Ecweru, says the resettlement will be an ongoing process.
translation.lug: Minisita w'eggwanga ow'ebigwa bitalaze, Musa Ecweru, agamba nti okusengula abantu kijja kugenda kikolebwa mpolampola.

translation.en: Ecweru told the Independent that Kiryandonga was chosen because it is government land.
translation.lug: Ecweru yagamba olupapula lwa Independent nti baalonda Kiryandonga olw'okuba eryo ttaka lya gavumenti.

translation.en: Private land owners in areas such as Kayunga outrageously overprice their land.
translation.lug: Bannanyini ttaka mu bitundu gamba nga Kayunga baseera nnyo ettaka lyabwe.

translation.en: Kiryandongo also reportedly has a mix of ethnicities, which makes the Bududa people difficult to single out in case of ethnic tensions.
translation.lug: Kigambibwa nti e Kiryandongo waliyo abantu ba mawanga mangi, ekikifuula ekizibu abantu okulondobamu abantu b'e Bududa singa wabaawo obunkenke mu bantu ab'amawanga ag'enjawulo.

translation.en: Other victims will be resettled to areas like Kyangwanzi and other government owned land.
translation.lug: Abantu abalala bajja kusengulwa mu bitundu by'e Kyangwanzi, awali ettaka lya gavumenti eddala.

translation.en: Ecweru said the government is looking to resettle other areas affected by floods such as Butaleja and Teso as well.
translation.lug: Ecweru yagamba nti gavumenti eri mu nteekateeka ez'okusengula n'abantu abalala abaakosebwa amataba mu bitundu gamba nga e Butaleja ne Teso.

translation.en: According to Ecweru, the government will continue giving the Bududa victims relief food for six months.
translation.lug: Okusinziira ku Ecweru, gavumenti ejja kweyongera okuwa abantu b'e Bududa emmere okumala emyezi mukaaga.

translation.en: The minister says Kiryandongo has fertile soils and supports the growing of such staple food for the Bududa people.
translation.lug: Minisita agamba nti ettaka ly'e Kiryandongo limerako bulungi emmere esinga okulimibwa abantu b'e Bududa.

translation.en: Kiryandongo has fertile soils and supports the growing of staple food such as beans, maize, and cassava.
translation.lug: Ettaka ly'e Kiryandongo ggimu era likulako bulungi ebirime gamba ng'ebijanjaalo, kasooli, ne muwogo.

translation.en: The first phase will see three thousand Internally Displaced Persons transferred to Kiryandongo near the refugee camp.
translation.lug: Tujja kusooka tutwale abantu 3,000 e Kiryandongo okumpi n'enkambi y'abanoonyi b'obubudamo.

translation.en: Ecweru will also have to address the bureaucratic manner in which government conducted its business.
translation.lug: Ecweru era ajja kwetaaga okulaga emisoso gavumenti gy'ejja okuyitamu okukola ebintu ebyo.

translation.en: Bulucheke is an Interenally Displaced Person camp in Bududa district.
translation.lug: Bulucheke nkambi ya banoonyi b'obubudamo mu ggwanga eri mu disitulikiti y'e Bududa.

translation.en: Dison Kuloba sits in his tent at Bulucheke camp all day.
translation.lug: Dison Kuloba ali mu nkambi y'e Bulucheke amala olunaku lwonna ng'ali mu weema ye.

translation.en: He is in urgent need of help after surviving the March first Bududa landslides.
translation.lug: Yeetaaga nnyo obuyambi oluvannuuma lw'okusimatuka okubumbulukuka kw'ettaka e Bududa  nga Maaki 1.

translation.en: Kenya has made drastic cuts in mobile telephone call tariffs, posing a huge challenge to her Great Lakes regional counterparts.
translation.lug: Kenya esaze ebisale by'okukuba essimu, ekireeseewo okusoomooza eri amawanga amalala agali mu bitundu bya Great Lakes.

translation.en: Kenya posed a huge challenge to her Great Lakes regional counterparts to cope with the competitivenes in the sector.
translation.lug: Kenya yaleetawo okusoomooza eri amawanga amalala agali mu bitundu bya Great Lakes ku ngeri gye gayinza okusigala nga gavuganya mu nsonga eyo.

translation.en: Uganda charges three hundred forty Ugandan shillings.
translation.lug: Ebisale mu Uganda biri siringi za Uganda 340.

translation.en: Kenyans have been calling at an equivalent of three hundred Uganda shillings on average per minute across all networks.
translation.lug: Bannakenya bo babadde bakubira ku siringi za Uganda 300 buli ddakiika ku mikutu gyonna.

translation.en: The price difference has changed dramatically following the latest decision by Kenya’s telecom regulator.
translation.lug: Ebisale byakyuka nnyo gye buvuddeko awo oluvannyuma lw'ekyo ekyasalibwawo ekitongole ekirambika enkozesa y'amasimu mu Kenya.

translation.en: Kenyans now call for an equivalent of about seventy five shillings per minute across all networks.
translation.lug: Kati Bannakenya bakubira siringi nga 75 buli ddakiika ku mikutu gyonna.

translation.en: In Rwanda, the uniform call rate is ninety Rwandan franc per minute while it is five Tanzanian shillings per second in Tanzania.
translation.lug: Mu Rwanda, ebisale by'okukuba essimu okutwalira awamu biri ssente za Rwanda 90, ate yo e Tanzania biri siringi 5 buli katikitiki.

translation.en: This is still lower than nine shillings per second charged by Mobile Telephone Network per second in Uganda.
translation.lug: Ebisale ebyo era bikyali wansi bw'obigeraageranya ne siringi 9 buli katikitiki ezisalibwa kampuni z'amasimu mu Uganda.

translation.en: Uganda’s telecom regulator and Uganda Communications Commission’s  attempt to fix uniform interconnection tariffs at one hundred thirty one Uganda shillings.
translation.lug: Ekitongole ekivunaanyizibwa ku masimu mu Uganda n'ekitongole ky'eby'empuliziganya bigezaako okussaawo omutemwa gw'okukuba essimu ogutakyuka gube ssente za Uganda 131.

translation.en: Last year attracted litigation between Uganda Communications Commission and telecom market leader Mobile Telephone Network Uganda.
translation.lug: Omwaka oguwedde gwaleetawo obuzibu wakati w'ekitongole kya Uganda eky'eby'empuliziganya n'ekitongole ky'amasimu ekya MTN.

translation.en: Mobile Telephone Network sued Uganda Communications Commission.
translation.lug: MTN yakuba ekitongole ky'eby'empuliziganya mu mbuga z'amateeka.

translation.en: Mobile Telephone Network insists that the one hundred thirty one shillings per minute was way below the realistic interconnection rate.
translation.lug: MTN egamba nti siringi 131 buli ddakiika zaali ntono nnyo.

translation.en: According to Mobile Telephone Network, the realistic tax should not go below one hundred fifty one shillings.
translation.lug: Okusinziira ku MTN ebisale by'essimu tebirina kukka wansi wa siringi 151 buli ddakiika.

translation.en: The uniform interconnection rate ceilings were slated to come into force on January first two thousand ten.
translation.lug: Ebisale ebitakyuka byali bya kutandika okukola nga Jjanwali 1, 2010.

translation.en: The case was later withdrawn to allow further consultations between Uganda Communication Commission and the stakeholders in the telecom sector.
translation.lug: Oluvannyuma omusango ogwo gwaggibwayo mu kkooti okuwa ekitongole ky'eby'empuliziganya akakisa okwongera okwebuuza ku balala abazingirwamu.

translation.en: Last week, Uganda Communications Commission issued a statement indicating that the new interconnection rate is already operational.
translation.lug: Wiiki ewedde, ekitongole ky'eby'empuliziganya mu Uganda kyafulumya ekiwandiiko ekiraga nti ebisale ebipya byali bitandise okukola.

translation.en: It will take effect from July sixth two thousand ten.
translation.lug: Bijja kutandika okukola okuva nga Jjulaayi 6, 2010.

translation.en: It is not clear whether Mobile Telephone Network consented to the tax which they had initially opposed.
translation.lug: Tekimanyiddwa obanga aba MTN baamala ne bakkiriza ebisale ebyo bye baasooka okuwakanya.

translation.en: Attempts to contact Mobile Telephone Network did not yield much as officials were secretive about the issue.
translation.lug: Aba MTN baagezaako okwebuuzibwako naye tewali kalungi kavaamu kubanga abakungu b'ekitongole ekyo baali basazeewo okukuuma ensonga eyo nga ya kyama.

translation.en: Even at one hundred thirty one interconnection rate per minute, Uganda telecom Network telephone calls in Uganda are higher than in Kenya.
translation.lug: Wadde ng'ebisale byateekebwa ku siringi 131 buli ddakiika, ebisale by'amasimu mu Uganda era bikyali waggulu ku by'e Kenya.

translation.en: Telephone calls on Uganda’s telecom network are much higher than in Kenya.
translation.lug: Ebisale by'essimu mu Uganda bya waggulu nnyo ku by'e Kenya.

translation.en: Zain Kenya slashed its call rates by fifty percent offering its customers a competitve rate of three Kenya shillings.
translation.lug: Ekitongole kya Zain Kenya kyasala ebisale ebitundu 50 ku buli kikumi ne kiba nti bakasitoma baayo baali bakubira ku ssente za Kenya 3.

translation.en: Safaricom controls about eighty percent of Kenya’s telecom market.
translation.lug: Safaricom yeefuze ebitundu nga 8 ku buli kikumi mu katale k'amasimu mu Kenya.

translation.en: Safaricom swiftly responded by bringing its call rates down from twelve Kenyan shillings across all networks to three Kenyan shillings.
translation.lug: Safaricom yasitukiramu n'essa ebisale by'okukuba essimu okuva ku ssente za Kenya 12 okutuuka ku 3.

translation.en: The Communications Commission of Kenya target was to open the market to competition and break up the ‘club effect’ established by Safaricom.
translation.lug: Ekitongole ky'eby'empuliziganya mu Kenya kyalina ekigendererwa eky'okussaawo okuvuganya, Safaricom ereme kwefuga katale.

translation.en: Mobile Telephone Network Uganda is operating a similar model.
translation.lug: MTN nayo egwa mu ttuluba lye limu.

translation.en: The uniform interconnection rate would encourage subscribers of other networks not to crossover to Mobile Telephone Network Uganda.
translation.lug: Okussaawo ebisale ebyenkanankana kijja kuleetera abantu abali ku mikutu gy'amasimu emirala obutasala ate kudda ku MTN.

translation.en: Uganda’s interconnection rates in shillings.
translation.lug: Ebisale by'amasimu mu Uganda.

translation.en: Zain customers in Uganda get twenty five minutes for calling over twenty four hours within the same network under the Kika promotion.
translation.lug: Mu nkola ya Kika, bakasitoma ba Zain bafuna eddakiika 25 okumala essaawa 24 ez'okukuba ku mukutu gwe gumu.

translation.en: If they pay two thousand Uganda shillings to enter the unlimited promotion, they get eighty three minutes,
translation.lug: Bwe basasula 2,000 okuyingira promosoni etaliiko kkomo, bafuna eddakiika 83,

translation.en: Warid and Uganda Telecom have introduced similar arrangements for calling within their networks.
translation.lug: N'ekitongole kya Warid n'ekya Uganda Telecom nabyo bitaddewo enkola efaananako bw'etyo.

translation.en: For Orange Telecom, customers can load airtime, make calls within the same network for a specific period without any charge.
translation.lug: Ate bo bakasitoma ba Orange, balina okuteekako omutemwa gwa ssente ne bakuba essimu ezitali za kusasulira ku mukutu gwe gumu okumala ekiseera ekigere.

translation.en: Upon expiry of the period, the calls under Orange network are charged three hundred twenty Uganda shillings per minute.
translation.lug: Ekiseera ekyo bwe kiggwaako, omuntu atandika okusalibwa siringi za Uganda 320 buli ddakiika.

translation.en: Nakitende Shameem graduated from Makerere University recently.
translation.lug: Nakitende Shameem yatikkirwa e Makerere University gye buvuddeko awo.

translation.en: Namakula Hadijah's elder sister thinks holding multiple handsets is wasteful.
translation.lug: Mukulu wa Namakula Hadijah agamba nti okuba n'essimu z'omungalo ezisukka mu emu kuba kwonoona ssente.

translation.en: Kibuuka Godfrey is the communications director at the Ministry of Information Communication Technology.
translation.lug: Kibuuka Godfrey ye dayirekita w'eby'empuliziganya mu Ministry of Information Communication Technology.

translation.en: The low call rates in the regional telecom sector were occasioned by recent changes in Kenya,
translation.lug: Okussa ebisale by'amasimu kyava ku nkyukakyuka ezaakolebwa mu Kenya gye buvuddeko,

translation.en: Uganda will need to review the interconnection rates further downwards.
translation.lug: Uganda ejja kwetaaga okwongera okussa ebisale by'amasimu.

translation.en: The Uganda Communications Commission claims that the uniform interconnection rates took effect on July sixth.
translation.lug: Ekitongole ky'eby'empuliziganya mu Uganda Communications Commission kigamba nti ebisale ebyo byatandika okukola nga Jjulaayi 6.

translation.en: Fred Masadde, the Zain spokesperson, declined to comment.
translation.lug: Fred Masadde, omwogezi w'ekitongole kya Zain, yagaana okubaako ky'ayogera.

translation.en: Mark Kaheru, the marketing communications officer at Uganda Telecom, only referred the Independent to the company’s legal department.
translation.lug: Mark Kaheru, kitunzi wa Uganda Telecom, yagamba ab'olupapula lwa Independent okwebuuza ku kitongole ky'amateeka ekya kampuni.

translation.en: The Uganda Communications Commission Senior Communications Officer, Fred Otunnu, too declined to comment, saying he was on leave.
translation.lug: Akulira ekitongole ky'eby'empuliziganya mu Uganda, Fred Otunnu, naye yagaana okubaako ky'ayogera, ng'agamba nti yali mu luwummula.

translation.en: The question of why the interconnection rates in Uganda are set much higher than in Kenya remained unanswered.
translation.lug: Tebannannyonnyola nsonga lwaki ebisale by'amasimu mu Uganda bikyali waggulu ku by'e Kenya.

translation.en: The Uganda Communications Commission media and public relations officer said that he would forward them to the ‘right’ officers.
translation.lug: Omukungu mu kitongole kya Uganda eky'eby'empuliziganya akola ku nsonga z'abantu yagamba nti ensonga ajja kugikwasa abantu abatuufu ab'okugikolako.

translation.en: Many of the new changes in Kenya’s telecoms sector are attributed to the entry of India based telecom giant Bharti Airtel.
translation.lug: Kigambibwa nti nnyingi ku nkyukakyuka empya ezikoleddwa mu bitongole by'amasimu mu Kenya zajjawo oluvannyuma lw'ekitongole ky'Abayindi ekipya ekya Bharti Airtel okujja mu ggwanga.

translation.en: Bharti Airtel acquired Zain Africa operations last April.
translation.lug: Bharti Airtel yafuna obuyinza okuddukanya ekitongole kya Zain Africa mu mwezi gwa Apuli ogwayita.

translation.en: On his first visit to Kampala, Bharti Airtel’s international Chief Executive Officer Manoj Kohli, sounded an early warning.
translation.lug: Ku mulundi gwe yasooka okujja mu Kampala, Manoj Kohli, akulira Bharti Airtel’s mu nsi yonna alina okulabula kwe yawa.

translation.en: He said Zain Uganda will soon rebrand to Bharti Airtel.
translation.lug: Yagamba nti mu kiseera ekitali kya wala kampuni ya Zain Uganda yali ejja kutandika okuyitibwa Bharti Airtel.

translation.en: It was a clear statement of intent, especially targeting Mobile Telephone Network Uganda’s dominance of the market.
translation.lug: Okulabula okwo okusingira ddala yakwolekeza kampuni ya MTN eyali yeefuze akatale k'empuliziganya y'amasimu mu Uganda.

translation.en: Bharti Airtel is famous for targeting low income earners by offering competitive call rates.
translation.lug: Bharti Airtel emanyiddwa nnyo olw'okunoonya akatale mu bamufuna mpola ng'essaawo ebisale by'okukuba essimu ebya wansi.

translation.en: Zain Uganda is expected to announce lower call rates as a warning shot in a tariff battle that will be extended.
translation.lug: Ekitongole kya Zain Uganda kyali kisuubirwa okusssa ebisale by'okukuba essimu okwongera okulaga nti olutalo lw'ebisale by'amasimu lwali lutandika butandisi.

translation.en: Most likely they would still be higher than Kenya’s because of the difference in the interconnection taxes between the two countries.
translation.lug: Kyali kisuubirwa nti era ebisale ebyo byandibadde bikyali bya wagguluko ku by'e Kenya olw'enjawulo eriwo mu ngereka y'emisolo mu mawanga ago abiri.

translation.en: The excise duty on airtime in Rwanda was recently increased from five percent to eight percent.
translation.lug: Omusolo ku eyatayimu gwayongezebwa okuva ku bitundu 5 ku buli kikumi ne gutuuka ku bitundu 8 ku buli kikumi.

translation.en: Tom Mbalinda Nuwagaba argued that upholding the taxes was against public policy and would hurt taxable revenue.
translation.lug: Tom Mbalinda Nuwagaba yagamba nti okulemezaawo omusolo ogwo kyali kikontana n'amateeka era nti kijja kukosa omusolo oguggibwa ku magoba.

translation.en: Tom Mbalinda Nuwagaba is a senior manager of commercial law and litigation.
