translation.lug: Tom Mbalinda Nuwagaba y'akulira eby'amateeka mu by'obusuubuzi.

translation.en: He was reportedly involved in self deployment masquerading as a Chief of Millitary Intelligence Revenue officer by extorting and harassing civilians in the Islands of Lake Victoria.
translation.lug: Kigambibwa nti yeefuula ng'omu ku basirikale b'ekitongole ky'omusolo n'aggya ssente ku basuubuzi era n'abatulugunya ku bizinga by'Ennyanja Nnalubaale.

translation.en: He was then arrested by the Wembley Operations, taken to Court Martial and jailed.
translation.lug: Oluvannyuma yakwatibwa mu bikwekweto bya Wembley, n'atwalibwa mu kkooti era n'asibibwa.

translation.en: The Joint Anti-Terrorist Task Force car was seized and never recovered todate.
translation.lug: Emmotoka y'ekitongole ekirwanyisa obutujju yakwatibwa era n'okutuusa kati temanyiddwako mayitire.

translation.en: On March 2 several villages in Bududa district were buried under a landslide that killed around 350 people.
translation.lug: Nga Maaki 2 ebyalo ebiwerako mu disitulikiti y'e Bududa byabutikirwa ettaka eryabumbulukuka eryatta abantu nga 350.

translation.en: Coffee growing, specifically of Arabica appears to have been struck hard according to area politician and Chairman of the Bugisu Cooperative Union, Nandala Mafabi.
translation.lug: Nandala Mafabi munnabyabufuzi era ssentebe wa Bugisu Cooperative Union yagamba nti omulimu gw'okulima emmwanyi, nnaddala ez'ekika kya Arabica gwakosebwa nnyo.

translation.en: 250 acres of coffee gardens had been buried in the mudslide by March.
translation.lug: Maaki we yatuukira ennimiro z'emmwanyi eziweza eka 250 zaali zibutikiddwa ettaka.

translation.en: Mafabi told The Independent in a July interview that the full extent of the damage will only be felt in the future.
translation.lug: Mafabi yagamba olupapula lwa Independent mu Jjulaayi nti obuzibu obuzzeewo bujja kulabibwa bulungi nnyo mu biseera eby'omu maaso.

translation.en: The landslides did not destroy the coffee crops alone but even the people who were involved in coffee production died.
translation.lug: Ettaka eryabumbulukuka teryasanyawo mmwanyi zokka naye era lyatta n'abantu abaali bazirima.

translation.en: The welfare of the Bagisu will go down by the equivalent of the 40 metric tons that was being produced from that area.
translation.lug: Embeera y'obulamu bw'Abagisu ejja kukka okusinziira ku meturiki taani 40 ez'emmwanyi ezaali zirimwa mu kitundu ekyo.

translation.en: The Uganda Coffee Development Authority Eastern Regional Manager, Mike Butseya Maliro, says Bududa as a district had been harvesting about 20,000 metric tons of parchment.
translation.lug: Akulira ekitongole kya Uganda eky'emmwanyi mu bitundu by'ebuvanjuba, Mike Butseya Maliro, agamba nti mu disitulikiti ya Bududa mwoka baali bakungula emmwanyi eziweza meturiki taani 20,000.

translation.en: 60,000 trees of coffee were destroyed when the landslides swept through the area in March this year.
translation.lug: Ebikolo by'emmwanyi 60,000 byasaanawo ettaka bwe lyabumbulukuka mu kitundu ekyo mu Maaki w'omwaka guno.

translation.en: 8 metric tons of freshly picked coffee for this year alone in the two harvesting seasons.
translation.lug: Omwaka guno baakungula metuliki taani 8 zokka mu sizoni bbiri.

translation.en: The smallholder producers in Bududa district are the leading producers of Arabica coffee in Uganda.
translation.lug: Abantu ab'ennima entono mu disitulikiti y'e Bududa basinga kulima mmwanyi za Arabica mu Uganda.

translation.en: Uganda is among the 10 top coffee producing countries in the world.
translation.lug: Uganda y'emu ku nsi 10 ezisinga okulima emmwanyi mu nsi.

translation.en: Africa produces 10 percent of global output.
translation.lug: Afirika erima emmwanyi ebitundu 10 ku buli kikumi eby'emmwanyi ezirimwa mu nsi yonna.

translation.en: Uganda produced 198,000 metric tons of coffee in 2008/9 year, according to the East African Fine Coffee Association.
translation.lug: Okusinziira kitongole ekivunaanyizibwa ku mmwanyi mu nsi z'omu buvanjuba bwa Afirika, Uganda yalima metuliki taani 198,000 ez'emmwanyi mu mwaka gwa 2008/2009.

translation.en: The Uganda Coffee Development Authority is predicting a 10 percent decline in output for the 2009/10 coffee year which ends in September.
translation.lug: Ekitongole ky'emmwanyi mu Uganda kiteebereza nti omuwendo gw'emmwanyi ezikungulwa gugenda kukendeera ebitundu 10 ku buli kikumi mu mwaka gwa 2009/2010 ogugwako mu Ssebutemba.

translation.en: Mafabi says the government has shown no interest in restoring coffee production in the area.
translation.lug: Mafabi agamba nti gavumenti teraba bwetaavu bwa kuzzaawo kulima kwa mmwanyi mu kitundu ekyo.

translation.en: As a result, Bugisu Cooperative Union has started its own coffee revival effort.
translation.lug: N'ekivuddemu, ekibiina ekigatta abalimi mu Bugisu kyatandika okwekolamu omulimu okuzzaawo okulima kw'emmwanyi mu kitundu ekyo.

translation.en: Up to 100,000 seedlings have been secured for distribution in the Bugisu region.
translation.lug: Endokwa z'emmwanyi nga 100,000 zigenda kugabibwa mu bitundu bya Bugisu.

translation.en: Mafabi’s target is not merely to revive the destroyed coffee plantations but expand productivity to the peak levels of the 1970s.
translation.lug: Mafabi alina ekiruubirirwa eky'okuzzaawo emisiri gy'emmwanyi egyayonoonebwa era n'okukakasa nti omuwendo gw'emmwanyi ezirimwa gulinnya ne gutuuka nga bwe gwali mu myaka gya 1970.

translation.en: Uganda Coffee Development Authority’s Maliro wants more long term investment to ensure sustainable coffee production.
translation.lug: Maliro, ow'ekitongole ky'emmwanyi mu Uganda, ayagala ssente ziteekebwe mu nnima y'emmwanyi esobola okuwangaala ebbanga eddene.

translation.en: Mafabi says Bugisu Cooperative Union has been providing facilities to the survivors of the landslide, including land so that they can cultivate.
translation.lug: Mafabi agamba nti ekitongole ekigatta abalimi mu Bugisu kibaddenga kiwa abaawonawo mu kubumbulukuka kw'ettaka ebyetaagisa okulima, omuli n'okubawa ettaka kwe balimira.

translation.en: Mafabi and Bugisu Cooperative Union are pushing ahead to acquire a US $ 5 million plant to produce instant coffee.
translation.lug: Mafabi n'ekibiina ekigatta abalimi mu Bugisu bakola butaweera okussaawo ekkolero lya bukadde bwa ddoola z'Amerika 5 okukola kaawa.

translation.en: Bugisu Region was leading Arabica producer in Uganda before landslide.
translation.lug: Ettaka bwe lyali terinnabumbulukuka, ebitundu bya Bugisu bye byali bisinga okulima emmwanyi mu Uganda.

translation.en: Bugisu Cooperative Union plans rescue of Bududa coffee.
translation.lug: Ekitongole ekigatta abalimi mu Bugisu kikola enteekateeka okutaasa omulimu gw'okulima emmwanyi mu Bugisu.

translation.en: The first thing I encounter when I enter Kalita Bus Services Park, located next to Nakivibo stadium, is a security check.
translation.lug: Ekintu kye nsooka okusanga nga nnyingira paaka ya bbaasi eya Kalita, eri okumpi n'ekisaawe ky'e Nakivibo, kye kijjinji ky'eby'ab'okwerinda.

translation.en: The city is still clearly engulfed in fear less than a week after the Kyadondo and Ethiopian Village Restaurant bombings that left 74 dead and over 50 injured.
translation.lug: Ekibuga kikyali ku bwerinde oluvannyuma lw'okuyita ebbanga eritawera na wiiki bukya abatujju babwatusa bbomu e Kyadondo n'e Kabalagala, abantu abasukka mu 74 ne bafa era 50 ne bagendera ku bisago.

translation.en: "Kasese to the right,” the bus conductor calls out in the background.
translation.lug: Kondakita wa bbaasi ayogerera emabega nti, "Kasese ku ddyo.”

translation.en: The manager of the Kalita Bus Services, Spear Mugambwa, is a man in his late 40`s.
translation.lug: Maneja wa bbaasi za Kalita, Spear Mugambwa, anaatera okuweza emyaka 50.

translation.en: Talking from a former lorry container that he has turned into his booking office, Mugambwa says the bomb blasts have heavily impacted the transportation business.
translation.lug: Ng'asinziira mu konteyina emu gye yafuula ofiisi, Mugambwa agamba nti bbomu ezaakubwa zaakosa nnyo bizineesi y'eby'entambula.

translation.en: In a day we used to send nine buses out and into Kampala, but the number has reduced to five buses coming from upcountry.
translation.lug: Mu lunaku bbaasi 9 ze zaafulumanga era ne ziyingira Kampala, naye kati tuba na bbaasi 5 zokka.

translation.en: The company, according to Mugambwa, used to net Shs600,000 per bus.
translation.lug: Mugambwa agamba nti buli bbaasi yakolanga amagoba ga mitwalo 60.

translation.en: Because of the bombs and the fear they have created, Kalita is now netting only Shs2-3 million per day.
translation.lug: Naye okuva bbomu ezo lwe zaabwatuka, abantu batya okutambula era bbaasi za Kalita kati zikola obukadde 2 oba 3 bwokka buli lunaku.

translation.en: Mugambwa says people are not travelling from upcountry to the city.
translation.lug: Mugambwa agamba nti abantu tebakyava mu byalo kujja mu kibuga.

translation.en: Ben Kiwanuka Street is a short distance from the Kalita Bus Park.
translation.lug: Oluguudo lwa Ben Kiwanuka luliraanye paaka ya bbaasi za Kalita.

translation.en: The same answer is echoed by a trader on Nakivubo mews and a business man of Asian descent on William Street.
translation.lug: Omusuubuzi omu ku Nakivubo n'omulala ku William Street nabo boogera ekintu kye kimu.

translation.en: Started in 2002, Kampala City Traders Association boast 140,000 members involved in both retail and wholesale business.
translation.lug: Ekibiina ekigatta abasuubuzi mu Kampala ekyatandikibwawo mu 2002 kirimu bammemba 140,000 abatunda mu maduuka amanene n'amatono.

translation.en: At the top of Kampala City Traders Association is the soft-spoken chairman, Kayondo Everest.
translation.lug: Kayondo Everest, y'akulira ekibiina ekigatta abasuubuzi mu Kampala era mukwata mpola.

translation.en: Kayondo says he is relieved that none of Kampala City Traders Association members died in the blast.
translation.lug: Kayondo agamba nti musanyufu okuba nti tewali memba n'omu ow'ekibiina ekigatta abasuubuzi mu Kampala eyafiira mu bulumbaganyi bwa bbomu ezo.

translation.en: The blasts have scared off the would be customers coming from neighbouring countries like the Democratic Republic of Congo, South Sudan, Rwanda and parts of Northern Tanzania.
translation.lug: Obulumbaganyi bwa bbomu ezo bwatiisa abantu abandibaguzeeko ebintu abava mu nsi ez'oku muliraano, gamba nga Democratic Republic of Congo, South Sudan, Rwanda, ne Tanzania.

translation.en: Analysts in the business sector say the loss of business in central Kampala has been worth millions of shillings.
translation.lug: Abeekenneenya ensonga z'eby'obusuubuzi bagamba nti bannabyabusuubuzi bafiiriddwa obukadde n'obukadde bwa ssente.

translation.en: What new thing did you bring to Uganda Clays?
translation.lug: Kipya ki kye waleeta mu Uganda Clays?

translation.en: Do you think you made a wrong decision to expand to Kamonkoli?
translation.lug: Olowooza wakola nsobi okugaziya bizineesi eno ne mu bitundu by'e Kamonkoli?

translation.en: Moving to Kamonkoli was a wonderful decision.
translation.lug: Okutwala bizineesi eno e Kamonkoli kyali kirungi nnyo.

translation.en: Kamonkoli was designed to serve the eastern and northern part of Uganda, Sudan and western Kenya.
translation.lug: Ekkolero lyaffe ery'e Kamonkoli lyassibwawo okutuusa empeereza ku bantu b'omu buvanjuba ne mu bukiikakkono bwa Uganda, e Sudan, ne mu bugwanjuba bwa Kenya.

translation.en: I have a feeling that western Kenya might be our biggest market in years to come.
translation.lug: Ndowooza nti mu myaka egijja bakasitoma baffe abasinga obungi bajja kuba bava mu bugwanjuba bwa Kenya.

translation.en: In 2001, I decided to retire.
translation.lug: Mu 2001, nnasalawo okunyuka.

translation.en: Nicholas Bequelin is the Asia researcher with the Human Rights Watch.
translation.lug: Nicholas Bequelin ye munoonyereza ow'omu nsi ya Asiya ow'ekitongole ekirwanirira eddembe ly'obuntu.

translation.en: The comment came after Chinese security forces fired randomly on Tibetan protesters.
translation.lug: Byayogerwa oluvannyuma lw'abakuumaddembe mu China okukuba amasasi mu beekalakaasi Abatibeeri.

translation.en: Sarkozy was commenting on the recent execution of French hostage Michel Germaneau.
translation.lug: Sarkozy yali ayogera ku Michel Germaneau, munnansi wa Bufalansa gwe batta oluvannyuma lw'okumuwamba.

translation.en: His captors are linked to al-Qaeda.
translation.lug: Kigambibwa abaamuwamba baalina akakwate n'aba Al-Qaeda.

translation.en: We are going to show our support with Sheikh Raed Salah that the fight is for the Aqsa mosque.
translation.lug: Tugenda kulaga obuwagizi bwaffe ne Seeka Raed Salah nti tulwanirira omuzikiti gwa Aqsa.

translation.en: Islamic movement spokesman Zahi Injidat said that the Israeli authorities will not bring them down.
translation.lug: Omwogezi wa Islamic movement, Zahi Injidat, yagamba nti ab'obuyinza mu Isirayiri tebajja kubamalamu maanyi.

translation.en: He was commenting on the sentencing to five months in prison of the leader of the Islamic movement in Israel, Sheikh Raed Saleh.
translation.lug: Yali ayogera ku ky'okusiba omukulembeze wa Islamic movement, Sheikh Raed Saleh, mu Isirayiri okumala emyezi etaano.

translation.en: We are not obliged to arrest Omar Hassan al-Bashir.
translation.lug: Tekitukakatako kukwata Omar Hassan al-Bashir.

translation.en: Bashir is a sitting president.
translation.lug: Bashir pulezidenti akyali mu buyinza.

translation.en: Chad’s interior and security minister Ahmat Mahamat Bachir said Bashir will return home safe and sound.
translation.lug: Minisita wa Chad ow'ensonga ez'omunda n'eby'okwerinda, Ahmat Mahamat Bachir, yagamba nti Bashir ajja kuddayo ewuwe mirembe.

translation.en: Libyan leader Muammar Gaddafi has given US$90bn to the African Union for the creation of a United States of Africa.
translation.lug: Omukulembeze wa Libiya, Muammar Gaddafi, awadde ekitongole ekigatta amawanga ga Afirika ddoola z'Amerika obuwumbi 90 okufuula ssemazinga wa Afirika eggwanga limu.

translation.en: The bloc includes 29 African countries including Benin, Burkina Faso, Cape Verde, the Central African Republic, Chad and others.
translation.lug: Ssemazinga ono alimu amawanga 29 omuli Benin, Burkina Faso, Cape Verde, Central African Republic, Chad, n'amalala.

translation.en: Last week police and court bailiffs raided the home of Vice President Bukenya in Entebbe to recover a car which had been hidden there by a city businessman’s wife.
translation.lug: Wiiki ewedde poliisi ng'eri wamu ne bawanyondo ba kkooti baazingako amaka g'omumyuka wa pulezidenti, Bukenya, Entebbe okununula emmotoka eyali ekwekeddwayo mukyala w'omusuubuzi omu.

translation.en: The public was wondering whether Bukenya is related to the woman for her to keep her car at his residence.
translation.lug: Abantu baali beebuuza obanga Bukenya alina oluganda ku mukazi oyo eyatuuka n'okuba nti akuumira emmotoka eyo mu maka ge.

translation.en: Parliament learnt last week that prominent people have bought plots on Kampala Road for as little as Shs100,000 in collusion with Kampala City Council officials.
translation.lug: Wiiki ewedde paliyamenti yakitegeerako nti abantu abamu abamanyifu beekobanye n'abakungu abamu mu KCC ne bagula poloti ku lugguddo lw'e Kampala ku busente obutono ddala gamba ng'emitwalo 10.

translation.en: Olara Otunnu, the Uganda Peoples Congress party president has supported President Museveni's view not to withdraw Ugandan troops from Somalia following the July 11 terror attacks in Kampala.
translation.lug: Olara Otunnu, pulezidenti wa UPC yawagira endowooza ya Pulezidenti Museveni ey'obutaggya magye ga Uganda mu Somalia oluvannyuma lw'obulumbaganyi bw'abatujju obwakolebwa mu Kampala nga Jjulaayi 11.

translation.en: Other opposition leaders have called on the government to quit Somalia.
translation.lug: Abakulembeze abalala ku ludda oluvuganya gavumenti baagala gavumenti eggye amagye gaayo mu Somalia.

translation.en: Leonardo da Vinci made sketches of a submarine.
translation.lug: Leonardo da Vinci yakuba ebifaananyi by'emmeeri lubbira.

translation.en: William Bourne, a British mathematician, drew plans for a submarine in 1578
translation.lug: William Bourne, munnassayaansi Omungereza yakuba pulaani y'emmeeri lubbira mu 1578

translation.en: It was only in 1620 that Cornelius van Drebbel, a Dutch inventor, managed to build a submarine.
translation.lug: Cornelius van Drebbel, omuvumbuzi Omudaaki ye yasooka okukola emmeeri lubbira mu 1620.

translation.en: He took the first trip with 12 oarsmen in the Thames River staying submerged for 3 hours.
translation.lug: Olugendo lwe olwasooka yagendera wamu n'abasajja 12 ku Mugga Thames era baamala essaawa 3 nga bali wansi mu mazzi.

translation.en: The first submarine used for military purposes was built in 1776 by David Bushnell of the US.
translation.lug: David Bushnell ow'omu Amerika ye yakola emmeeri y'amagye lubbira eyasooka mu 1776.

translation.en: The US Navy purchased submarines built by John P Holland, while Russia and Japan opted for the designs of Simon Lake.
translation.lug: Eggye lya Amerika ery'okunnyanja lyagula emmeeri lubbira ezaakolebwa John P Holland, ate yo Russia ne Japan baagula ezo ezaakolebwa Simon Lake.

translation.en: The first nuclear powered submarine, the United States Ship Nautilus, was launched in 1955.
translation.lug: Emmeeri lubbira ekozesa amaanyi ga nukiriya eyasooka, United States Ship Nautilus, yatongozebwa mu 1955.

translation.en: In 1958 the Nautilus made the first voyage under the polar ice pack, completing the 2945 km journey in 6 days.
translation.lug: Mu 1958 emmeeri Nautilus yasaabala olugendo lwayo olwasooka ng'eyita mu mazzi agaali gakutte bbalafu, era yasaabala olugendo lwa kiromita 2,945 mu nnaku 6.

translation.en: The first submerged circumnavigation of earth was made in 1960 by the nuclear submarine United States Ship Triton.
translation.lug: Olugendo abantu lwe baasooka okutambula ne beetoola ensi nga bakozesa emmeeri lubbira lwaliwo mu 1960 nga bakozesa emmeeri lubbira eyitibwa United States Ship Triton ekozesa amaanyi ga nukiriya.

translation.en: Women rights activist Lina Zedriga and Gulu Woman Member of Parliament Betty Ochan attended the launch of a report on restoring hope for sexual violence victims on July 21.
translation.lug: Omulwanirizi w'eddembe ly'abakyala Lina Zedriga n'omubaka w'abakyala mu paliyamenti ow'e Gulu Betty Ochan baaliwo nga batongoza alipoota ekwata ku kuzzaamu essuubi abo abaakabasanyizibwa okwaliwo nga Jjulaayi 21.

translation.en: African Medical and Research Foundation medical staff from Kenya were at Mulago Hospital on July 21 to treat victims of the July 11 terror bomb blasts in Kampala .
translation.lug: Abasawo b'ekibiina kya African Medical and Research Foundation okuva e Kenya baali mu ddwaliro ly'e Mulago nga Jjulaayi 21 okujjanjaba abo abaali bakoseddwa bbomu ezaabwatukira mu Kampala nga Jjulaayi 11.

translation.en: Over 10 people drowned in Lake Victoria on July 20 when their boat capsised in Lake Victoria, about 15kms away from Jaana Island.
translation.lug: Abantu abasukka mu 10 be baafiira mu Nnyanja Nnalubaale nga Jjulaayi 20 oluvannyuma lw'eryato kwe baali okubbira, kiromita nga 15 okuva ku kizinga Jaana.

translation.en: The Jaana-Kiku local council chief Nelson Musisi said the boat capsised at about 5:30pm as it headed to Kasenyi landing site in Entebbe.
translation.lug: Omwami w'ekyalo kya Jaana-Kiku, Nelson Musisi, yagamba nti eryato eryo lyabbira ku ssaawa 11:30 ez'akawungeezi bwe lyali lyolekedde omwalo gw'e Kasenyi Entebbe.

translation.en: No law seems to work in Uganda and the cost is becoming too high for us.
translation.lug: Kirabika ng'awatali tteeka lisobola kukola mu Uganda era ekyo kigenda kweyongera okutuviiramu ebizibu eby'amaanyi.

translation.en: Accidents are happening every day and Uganda’s number of road accident deaths is probably the highest on the continent.
translation.lug: Obubenje bugwa buli lunaku era kirabika omuwendo gw'abantu abafiira mu bubenje bw'oku kunguudo mu Uganda gwe gusinga ku ssemazinga wa Afirika.

translation.en: Samalie Teru, a survivor, said that moments after departure, the boat developed a crack at the back and water started gushing in.
translation.lug: Samalie Teru, kaawonawo, yagamba nti nga wayise akaseera katono oluvannyuma lw'eryato eryo okusimbula, lyafuna ekituli amazzi ne gatandika okuliyingira ku sipiidi.

translation.en: Between May and July the waters become unstable because of strong winds.
translation.lug: Wakati wa Maayi ne Jjulaayi amazzi ku nnyanja gafuukuuka olw'omuyaga ogw'amaanyi ogubaako.

translation.en: Moses Kabuusu, the Kyamuswa County Member of Parliament, put the death toll at 28.
translation.lug: Moses Kabuusu, omubaka wa paliyamenti owa Kyamuswa, yagamba nti abantu 28 be baafa.

translation.en: Lack of record keeping in Uganda has also complicated the tragedy on our water ways.
translation.lug: Obutakuuma biwandiiko mu Uganda nakyo kikifudde kizibu okulondoola obulungi obubenje obugwa ku mazzi.

translation.en: In February 2008, some 30 people died when their canoe collided with another vessel near the shoreline of the Mukono-Mayuge district border.
translation.lug: Mu Febwali 2008, abantu nga 30 baafa eryato mwe baali bwe lyatomeragana n'eddala okumpi n'omwalo oguli ku nsalo ya disitulikiti y'e Mukono ne Mayuge.

translation.en: After the commotion over the NSSF mismanagement ,the pension fund has been taken over by senior banker Richard Patrick Byarugaba.
translation.lug: Oluvannyuma lw'obuvuyo obwaliwo mu nzirukanya ya NSSF, ssente za pensoni kati zikolwako siniya bbanka, Richard Patrick Byarugaba.

translation.en: He was named the new National Social Security Fund boss by finance minister Syda Bbumba.
translation.lug: Kati ye yalondebwa okukulira ekitongole kya NSSF era yalondebwa minisita w'eby'ensimbi  Syda Bbumba.

translation.en: Byarugaba has been the head of Global Trust Bank and replaces David Chandi Jamwa who is facing trial on counts of abuse of office.
translation.lug: Byarugaba y'abadde akulira bbanka ya Global Trust Bank era azze mu kifo kya David Chandi Jamwa avunaanibwa olw'okukozesa obubi ofiisi ye.

translation.en: Jamwa had announced an unexplained annual interest of 14 percent on the workers’ savings.
translation.lug: Jamwa yali yalangirira amagoba agatannyonnyolwa ku nsimbi z'abakozi ga bitundu 14 ku buli kikumi.

translation.en: Byarugaba has a big to task to do to restore sanity and public trust at National Social Security Fund following the Temangalo land and Nsimbe housing estate scandals.
translation.lug: Byarugaba alina omulimu munene gwe yeetaaga okukola okuleetera abantu okuddamu okwesiga ekitongole kya NSSF oluvannyuma lw'emivuyo egyali ku ttaka ly'e Temangalo ne ku mayumba ga Nsimbe.

translation.en: Byarugaba has taken over the National Social Security Fund at a time when the pension sector is and opening up for other players.
translation.lug: Byarugaba w'afunidde ofiisi eno mu NSSF enteekateeka ya pensoni ebadde egguliddwawo eri n'abantu abalala.

translation.en: National Social Security Fund managing directors often end up facing prosecution in court for various offences arising from execution of their duties.
translation.lug: Abantu abazze bakulira ekitongole kya NSSF bazze baggulwako emisango egiva ku ngeri gye bakozesaamu ofiisi yaabwe.

translation.en: Byarugaba has taken over the National Social Security Fund at a time when the pension sector is and opening up for other players.
translation.lug: Byarugaba w'afunidde ofiisi eno mu NSSF enteekateeka ya pensoni ebadde egguliddwawo eri n'abantu abalala.

translation.en: Byarugaba’s National Social Security Fund may not enjoy the privilege of monopoly of handling the workers’ pension those before him.
translation.lug: Ekitongole kya NSSF Byarugaba kyakulira kiyinza obuteefuga buyinza bwa kutereka nsimbi za bakozi nga bwe kibadde emabega.

translation.en: How he maneuvers through the coming competition and steers the National Social Security Fund ship clear of turbulent waves to safe docking, will tell what kind of manager he is.
translation.lug: Engeri gy'anaakwatamu embeera eno erimu okuvuganya okw'amaanyi n'engeri gy'anaddukanyaamu ekitongole kya NSSF ejja kulaga obanga maneja mulungi.

translation.en: Vincent Ssekkono said that Byarugaba beat 32 other candidates to take the National Social Security Fund job.
translation.lug: Vincent Ssekkono yagamba nti Byarugaba ye yalondeddwa mu bantu 32 abaali basembeddwa okutwala ekifo ky'akulira NSSF.

translation.en: Byarugaba is a fairly educated guy.
translation.lug: Byarugaba musajja muyivu.

translation.en: Byarugaba is highly educated with a degree in Statistics and Economics from Makerere University, plus experience of holding various high profile positions at Standard Chartered, Nile and Barclays Banks.
translation.lug: Byarugaba musajja muyivu era alina diguli mu kubala ebitabo ne mu by'enfuna ey'e Makerere University, era abaddeko mu bifo eby'amaanyi gamba nga mu bbanka ya Standard Chartered, eya Nile, n'eya Barclays.

translation.en: What the public now needs is to hear a turnaround of the National Social Security Fund.
translation.lug: Kati abantu kye baagala okuwulira ze nkyukakyuka ez'omu ggundu mu NSSF.

translation.en: Police stormed Vice President Bukenya’s house.
translation.lug: Poliisi ezingako amaka g'omumyuka wa pulezidenti.

translation.en: The more interesting news was not the raid on the country’s Vice President by security forces.
translation.lug: Ab'eby'okwerinda okuzingako amaka g'omumyuka wa pulezidenti si ge gaasinga okukwata abantu omubabiro.

translation.en: Kizza Besigye, Olara Otunnu and Asumani Basalirwa appeal to the visiting African Union leaders to listen to the opposition’s demand for electoral reforms.
translation.lug: Kizza Besigye, Olara Otunnu, ne Asumani Basalirwa basaba abakulembeze mu kibiina ekigatta amawanga ga Afirika okuwuliriza okusaba kwabwe okukola enkyukakyuka mu by'okulonda.

translation.en: Livingstone Ssewanyana and Justice Nyamihana Mulenga attend a dialogue on making the African Court on Human Rights.
translation.lug: Livingstone Ssewanyana n'omulamuzi Nyamihana Mulenga nga baliwo mu kukubaganya ebirowoozo ku ky'okussaawo Kkooti ya Afirika Erwanirira Eddembe ly'Obuntu.

translation.en: It is not easy to determine that the Kananuras are related to the Bukenyas although it’s possible.
translation.lug: Sikyangu kumanya obanga Kananura alina oluganda ku Bukenya wadde ng'ekyo kisoboka.

translation.en: Given Bukenya’s generosity to women, he and Sanyu Kananura could have agreed to keep the car at the Vice President’s home.
translation.lug: Olw'okuba Bukenya afaayo nnyo ku bakazi, ye ne Sanyu Kananura bayinza okuba nga bakkiriziganya akuumire emmotoka eyo mu maka ge.

translation.en: Kampala City Council now cannot collect billions of shillings in ground rate charges because most of the property has been converted into private Mailo land.
translation.lug: Kati KCC tesobola kukungaanya buwumbi na buwumbi bwa ssente okuva bwe kiri nti ettaka erisinga obungi kati lyafuuka lya mayiro.

translation.en: The prime commercial plots that were sold cheaply include places along Kampala Road, Industrial Area.
translation.lug: Poloti ez'enkizo mu bizineesi ezaatundibwa ku bbeeyi ey'okudondola mwe muli ezo eziri ku luguudo lwa Kampala ne Industrial Area.

translation.en: A committee of parliament is scrutinising queries by the Auditor General’s findings in the 2008 report regarding various plots in the prime area in Kampala Central Division.
translation.lug: Akakiiko ka paliyamenti kanoonyereza ku kwemulugunya kwa Auditor General mu lipoota ya 2008 gye yawandiika ku bye yazuula ebikwata ku poloti z'omu massekati ga Kampala ezaatundibwa.

translation.en: Mussujja also confirmed that 500 properties had already been given away in such a manner.
translation.lug: Mussujja era yakakasa nti poloti 500 zaali zimaze okuweebwayo mu ngeri eyo.

translation.en: On the list of the 49 properties tabled before the committee include Plot 77A Jinja Road, currently occupied by Ange Noir Discotheque.
translation.lug: Ku lukalala lwa poloti 49 ezaategeezebwa akakiiko mwe muli Plot 77A Jinja Road, omuli Ange Noir Discotheque.

translation.en: Others are Plots 34 Mackay Road, owned by Karim Hirji, Kampala Club on Plots 2.
translation.lug: Endala mwe muli Plots 34 Mackay Road, eya Karim Hirji, ne Plots 2 omuli Kampala Club.

translation.en: Thieving African leaders might soon realise the futility of their greed and primitive accumulation of wealth in a hard way.
translation.lug: Abakulembeze ba Afirika ababbi mu kiseera ekitali kya wala bayinza okukiraba nti  tekigasa kwefunira bya bugagga mu makubo makyamu era nti kivaamu ebizibu bingi.

translation.en: Eric Holder told the 23 African leaders at the African Union summit in Kampala that America is set to seize money stolen by corrupt leaders and hidden in America.
translation.lug: Eric Holder yagamba abakulembeze ba Afirika 23 abaali mu lukungaana lw'ekibiina ekigatta amawanga ga Afirika mu Kampala nti Amerika eteekateeka kuteeka nvumbo ku ssente ezibbibwa abakulembeze abalyi b'enguzi ne bazitereka mu Amerika.

translation.en: Holder was part of the United States delegation led by  top diplomat on Africa, Johnnie Carson, to the African Union summit.
translation.lug: Holder y'omu ku babaka ba Amerika abajja mu lukungaana lw'ekibiina ekigatta amawanga ga Afirika nga bakulembeddwamu omukungu ow'amaanyi avunaanyizibwa ku nsonga za Afirika, Johnnie Carson.

translation.en: African leaders who accumulate wealth at the expense of national good.
translation.lug: Abakulembeze ba Afirika abeekungaanyiza eby'obugagga ne baleka ensi zaabwe nga zibonaabona.

translation.en: Uganda is reported to be losing close to Shs500 billion million to corruption each year.
translation.lug: Kigambibwa nti Uganda efiirwa obukadde obuwumbi 500 buli mwaka olw'abo abalya enguzi.

translation.en: Holder also promised more support for the African Union force in Somalia.
translation.lug: Holder era yasuubiza nti eggye ly'amawanga ga Afirika eriri mu Somalia lijja kwongera okuteekebwamu ssente.

translation.en: Nigeria has already benefited from the new international cooperation to recover ill-gotten wealth of poor nations.
translation.lug: Nigeria y'emu ku nsi eziganyuddwa mu kaweefube akolebwa mu nsi yonna okununula ssente z'amawanga amaavu.

translation.en: By turning Uganda into a tropical garden of Africa, business, investments and tourism will increase in the country.
translation.lug: Uganda bw'etereera, eby'obusuubuzi bijja kweyongera okukula era n'abalambuzi bajja kweyongera obungi mu ggwanga.

translation.en: Uganda National Chamber of Commerce and Industry has prioritised interventions in its ten year strategic plan that include awareness campaigns on energy efficiency and renewable energy technologies.
translation.lug: Ekitongole kya Uganda eky'eby'obusuubuzi n'amakolero kisazzeewo okusoosoowaza ensonga ezikwata ku kubangula abantu ku nkozesa y'amaanyi ne tekinologiya.

translation.en: Morrison Rwakakamba is the Secretary General Uganda National Chamber of Commerce and Industry.
translation.lug: Morrison Rwakakamba ye Secretary General wa Uganda National Chamber of Commerce and Industry.

translation.en: The Independent’s Patrick Kagenda spoke to him.
translation.lug: Patrick Kagenda ow'olupapula lwa Independent yayogerako naye.

translation.en: What challenges do you face at Private Sector Foundation Uganda?
translation.lug: Kusoomooza ki kw'osanze mu Private Sector Foundation Uganda?

translation.en: The major challenge today is that of the East African Community economic integration.
translation.lug: Okusoomooza okusinga obunene okuliwo kwe kukwanaganya eby'enfuna mu mukago gw'amawanga agali mu buvanjuba bwa Afirika.

translation.en: The pace at which it’s unfolding is way beyond the potential and preparedness of Uganda’s private sector to engage the regional markets.
translation.lug: Sipiidi ebintu kwe bitambulira tesobozesa bantu bakola bizineesi za bwannannyini mu Uganda kuvuganya bulungi mu butale.

translation.en: The roles and tasks to accomplish for the Uganda government and the private sector are quite many compared to our regional trading partners.
translation.lug: Bye twetaaga okukolako nga Uganda n'abantu abalina bizineesi ez'obwannannyini bingi okusinga ku bya bannaffe mu mawanga amalala be tulina okukolagana nabo mu bizineesi.

translation.en: Uganda forms its non-tariff barriers against itself because all these frustrate its access to regional markets and beyond.
translation.lug: Obukwakulizo Uganda bw'essaawo bunyiga yo yennyini kubanga ekyo kigiremesa okutunda ebintu byayo mu butale mu mawanga agali ku muliraano n'ago agali ewala.

translation.en: This will help improve Uganda’s positioning in the regional competitiveness ranking.
translation.lug: Kino kijja kuyamba mu kusitula ekifo Uganda ky'erina mu kitundu olw'okuvuganya okunaabaawo.

translation.en: Private Sector Foundation Uganda is also working with associations and enterprises to build capacities at the enterprise level through the provision of Business Development Services.
translation.lug: Ekitongole kya Private Sector Foundation Uganda era kikolera wamu n'ebibiina ebitali bimu okubisobozesa okuba n'obusobozi bwe byetaaga okuddukanya bizineesi.

translation.en: What will Private Sector Foundation Uganda's role be in the EAC Common Market?
translation.lug: Ekibiina kya Private Sector Foundation Uganda kinaaba na kifo ki mu katale ak'awamu ak'amawanga agali mu buvanjuba bwa Afirika?

translation.en: The main role for Private Sector Foundation Uganda is to sensitise the businesses and the civil society and spread information relating to regional integration
translation.lug: Omulimu omukulu ogw'ekitongole kya Private Sector Foundation Uganda kwe kubangula abaddukanya bizineesi n'abantu okutwalira awamu n'okubunyisa obubaka obukwata ku bwegassi.

translation.en: What do you think will be the impact of the Common Market on Uganda?
translation.lug: Olowooza akatale ak'awamu kanaakwata katya ku Uganda?

translation.en: The East African Community Common Market is about free movement
translation.lug: Akatale ak'awamu ak'amawanga agali mu buvanjuba bwa Afirika kagendereddwa okuwa abasuubuzi eddembe okwetaaya

translation.en: For Uganda the level of readiness for the East African Community common market is still bad.
translation.lug: Naye Uganda tenneetegekera bulungi katale ako ak'awamu ak'amawanga agali mu buvanjuba bwa Afirika.

translation.en: All such obstructions are much likely to take their impact on the competitiveness and profitability of Ugandan companies.
translation.lug: Ekyo kiyinza okulemesa kampuni za Uganda okuvuganya obulungi mu katale ako n'obutakola bulungi magoba.

translation.en: What is the future of the Private Sector Foundation Uganda in the East African Community Common Market?
translation.lug: Ekitongole ekikwanaganya bizineesi ez'obwannannyini, Private Sector Foundation Uganda, kinaaba na buvunaanyizibwa ki mu katale ak'awamu ak'amawanga agali mu buvanjuba bwa Afirika?

translation.en: The future of the Private Sector Foundation Uganda and the private sector in Uganda is bright in view of the opportunities under integration
translation.lug: Ebiseera eby'omu maaso eby'ekitongole kya Private Sector Foundation Uganda ne bizineesi ez'obwannannyini eziri mu Uganda bitangaavu nnaddala bw'olowooza ku mikisa egiba gigguddwawo.

translation.en: What new innovations are coming up at Private Sector Foundation Uganda?
translation.lug: Bipya ki bye muyiiya mu kitongole kya Private Sector Foundation Uganda?

translation.en: James Mulwana and my predecessor Gabriel Hatega have been inspirational to me during the period I have been with the private sector.
translation.lug: James Mulwana ne Gabriel Hatega gwe nnaddira mu bigere babadde kyakulabirako kya maanyi gye ndi mu bbanga lye mmaze mu bizineesi ez'obwannannyini.

translation.en: Gideon Badagawa is the Chief Executive at Private Sector Foundation Uganda.
translation.lug: Gideon Badagawa ye Chief Executive wa Private Sector Foundation Uganda.

translation.en: He spoke to Patrick Kagenda.
translation.lug: Yayogera ne Patrick Kagenda.

translation.en: Arab Swis Engineering Company Engineering and Management had signed a three year renewable contract to provide technical management services for Alsalam Cement Production Company.
translation.lug: Kampuni ya Arab Swis Engineering Company Engineering and Management yassa omukono ku ndagaano ey'emyaka esatu esobola okuzzibwa obuggya okuwa obuyambi obw'ekikugu kampuni ekola seminti eya Alsalam Cement Production Company.

translation.en: The cement plant is located near Atbara in Sudan.
translation.lug: Kampuni ya seminti eyo eri kumpi ne Atbara mu Sudan.

translation.en: Arab Swis Engineering Company Engineering and Management is a wholly owned subsidiary of Arab Swis Engineering Company Holding.
translation.lug: Kampuni ya Arab Swis Engineering Company Holding y'erina obwannannyini ku kampuni ya Arab Swis Engineering Company Engineering and Management.

translation.en: Citadel Capital focuses on building regional platforms in select industries through acquisitions, turn-arounds among others.
translation.lug: Ekitongole kya Citadel Capital kigenderera okussaawo enkola ezituukana n'ebitundu okuyitira mu kufuna ebintu oba mu kukola enkyukakyuka mu makolero agaba galondeddwa.

translation.en: Citadel Capital’s 19 Opportunity Specific Funds now control Platform Companies with investments worth more than US$ 8.3 billion in 14 countries.
translation.lug: Ekitongole kya Citadel Capital kati kivunaanyizibwa ku kampuni ezitali zimu ezibalirirwamu obuwumbi bwa ddoola z'Amerika munaana mu obukadde bisatu mu nsi 14.

translation.en: Equity Bank ‘s half year profits rose to KShs 3.88 billion compared to KSh2.66 billion over a similar period the previous year.
translation.lug: Amagoba bbanka ya Equity ge yakola mu myezi mukaaga gaalinnya okuva ku ssente za Kenya obuwumbi bubiri mu obukadde lukaaga mu nkaaga omwaka oguwedde ne gatuuka ku buwumbi busatu mu obukadde lunaana kinaana omwaka guno.

translation.en: According to announcement by the bank, it recorded impressive returns from its investments in Southern Sudan.
translation.lug: Okusinziira ku kulangirira kwa bbanka eyo, yakola amagoba mangi mu bukiikaddyo bwa Sudan.

translation.en: The bank`s loan book expanded by over a quarter during the period.
translation.lug: Abantu abeewola ssente mu bbanka nabo beeyongera ekitundu kimu ku buli bitundu bina.

translation.en: Chief Executive James Mwangi attributed the increase to improved macro-economic environment, innovations and improved operational eficiency.
translation.lug: James Mwangi, yagamba nti okweyongerayongera okwo kwava ku mbeera y'eby'enfuna mu mawanga okwongera okulongooka, era n'okuba nti obuyiiya n'enzirukanya ya bizineesi nabyo byeyongera okulongooka.

translation.en: The Bank now plans to enter the Tanzanian market.
translation.lug: Kati bbanka eyo eyagala n'okuyingira akatale k'e Tanzania.

translation.en: Shoprite Holdings Ltd, the parent company of Shoprite Uganda continues to show its market leadership.
translation.lug: Kampuni ya Shoprite Holdings Ltd, nnannyini Shoprite Uganda, yeeyongedde okulaga amaanyi mu katale k'amawanga.

translation.en: For the 53-week trading period to end-June 2010, Shoprite said its turnover at R67.4bn.
translation.lug: Mu wiiki 53 ezigenda okugwako mu Jjuuni 2010, Shoprite egamba nti ekozesezza ssente za South Africa obuwumbi nkaaga mu musanvu mu obukadde bina.

translation.en: During this period, internal food inflation was 2.2%, compared to 15.8 percent in the last corresponding 12 month period.
translation.lug: Mu bbanga eryo, ebbeeyi y'emmere mu ggwanga yalinnya ebitundu 2.2 ku buli kikumi, bw'ogeraageranya n'ebitundu 15.8 ku buli kikumi mu myezi 12 egyayita.

translation.en: Shoprite said the South African supermarket division grew sales by 14.6 percent or 12 percent on a 52 week comparison.
translation.lug: Aba Shoprite baagamba nti omuwendo gw'ebintu ebitundibwa ssemaduuka zino eza South Africa gweyongera ebitundu 14.6 ku buli kikumi oba ebitundu 12 ku buli kikumi mu wiiki 52.

translation.en: Sales in the 106 supermarkets outside South Africa declined by 2.1% or 4.3% on a 52-week basis.
translation.lug: Omuwendo gw'ebintu ebitundibwa ssemadduuka zino 106 eziri wabweru wa South Africa gwakka ebitundu 2.1 ku buli kikumi oba 4.3 ku buli kikumi mu wiiki 52.

translation.en: A group of European oil companies led by Swiss-based Vitol Group and Elios have taken over Royal Dutch Shell’s interests in sub-Saharan Africa, including Uganda.
translation.lug: Kampuni z'amafuta ez'omu Bulaaya nga zikulembeddwamu Vitol Group eya Switzerland ne Elios kati ze ziddukanya Shell mu mawanga agali mu bukiikaddyo bw'eddungu Sahara, omuli ne Uganda.

translation.en: The new operators will continue using the Shell brand in the 21 country African market.
translation.lug: Abaddukanya kampuni eno abapya bajja kweyongera okukozesa erinnya lya Shell mu mawanga ga Afirika 21 kampuni eno mw'eri.

translation.en: Shell will remain a minority shareholder.
translation.lug: Shell ejja kusigala nga y'esinga okuba n'emigabo emitono.

translation.en: Shell put on market part of its Africa operations as part of a wider effort to reduce its global refining.
translation.lug: Shell yasalawo okutunda agamu ku masundiro gaayo mu Afirika mu kaweefube gw'eriko okukendeeza ku mirimu gyayo mu nsi yonna.

translation.en: The takeover brings to an end a bidding rivalry among oil companies that include Oilibya, Morocco Oils.
translation.lug: Okutwala kampuni eyo kyakomya okuvuganya okwaliwo wakati wa kampuni z'amafuta gamba nga Oilibya ne Morocco Oils.

translation.en: Shell was a market leader on the Ugandan market after acquiring Agip and BP until growing competition from local and Asian firms changed that.
translation.lug: Shell ye yali ekulembedde mu katale ka Uganda oluvannyuma lw'okugula kampuni z'amafuta eya Agip ne BP okutuusa lwe yafuna okuvuganya okuva mu kampuni z'amafuta mu ggwanga n'ez'a Asiya.

translation.en: Shell Uganda Managing Director Ivan Kyayonka, confirmed the news but declined to give details pending official communication from Shell Africa headquarters.
translation.lug: Eyali akulira kampuni ya Shell mu Uganda, Ivan Kyayonka, yakakasa amawulire ago naye n'atawa kalonda yenna azingirwamu ng'alinda okulambika okusingawo kuve ku kitebe ekikulu ekya Shell Africa.

translation.en: The sale comes at a time when court had ordered Shell Uganda Limited to deposit security of not less than Shs 35bn.
translation.lug: Okutunda amasundiro ago kyajjawo oluvannyuma lwa kkooti okulagira kampuni ya Shell mu Uganda okuwaayo omusingo ogutakka wansi w'obuwumbi 35.

translation.en: The deposit is for due performance of a court order obtained by Mercator Enterprises Limited.
translation.lug: Omusingo ogwo gwali gwa kusobozesa okussa mu nkola ekiragiro kya kkooti ekyafunibwa ekitongole kya Mercator Enterprises Limited.

translation.en: Former Minister of Finance Gerald Ssendaula has been appointed as the head of the Uganda Revenue Authority Board of Directors for a six year term.
translation.lug: Eyaliko minisita w'eby'ensimbi, Gerald Ssendaula, yalondeddwa okukulira akakiiko akaddukanya ekitongole ky'eby'emisolo mu Uganda okumala emyaka mukaaga.

translation.en: Ssendaula will serve with five other officials including the Managing Director of the DFCU Bank Juma Kisaame, the Uganda Revenue Authority Commissioner General Allen Kagina among others.
translation.lug: Ssendaula ajja kukolera wamu n'abakungu abalala bataano omuli maneja wa bbanka ya DFCU, Juma Kisaame, ne Commissioner General wa URA, Allen Kagina, awamu n'abalala.

translation.en: The old board was headed by Ibrahim Kabanda and served from 2004.
translation.lug: Akakiiko akakadde kaali kakulirwa Ibrahim Kabanda era kaaweereza okuva mu 2004.

translation.en: Minister of Finance, Syda Bbumba, asked the team to make Uganda Revenue Authority more efficient after inaugurating the new board last week.
translation.lug: Oluvannyuma lw'okutongoza akakiiko ako akapya, minisita w'eby'ensimbi, Syda Bbumba, yasaba abali ku kakiiko ako okusitula omutindo gw'empeereza y'ekitongole kya URA.

translation.en: Acuff gives overviews of the entire negotiating process.
translation.lug: Acuff alambika engeri enteeseganya gye zigenda okutambula.

translation.en: Armed with this Argentina to Zimbabwe negotiation manual, readers will be ready to do business with anyone, anywhere around the globe.
translation.lug: Okuba n'obulagirizi obulambika enteeseganya okuva mu Argentina okutuuka mu Zimbabwe, kijja kusobozesa ababusoma okuba abeetegefu okukola bizineesi n'omuntu yenna , mu kitundu kyonna eky'ensi.

translation.en: Bruce Peer, President and Managing Director, Canadian Management Centre, relates: “Frank Acuff provides practical, useful and effective advice on negotiating.
translation.lug: Bruce Peer, pulezidenti era maneja era dayirekita wa Canadian Management Centre, agamba nti: “Frank Acuff awa amagezi agakola era ag'omugaso agakwata ku nzikkirizaganya mu bizineesi.

translation.en: Acuff ’s knowledge of local business practices worldwide and his familiarity with many different cultures, customs, and national psychologies is impressive.
translation.lug: Okumanya Acuff  kw'alina ku bizineesi z'omu byalo mu nsi yonna n'okwo okukwata ku buwangwa obw'enjawulo, ennono, n'enneeyisa y'abantu kwewuunyisa nnyo.

translation.en: Acuff is Director of Management Development International, a Chicago area based management consulting firm specializing in employee and management development.
translation.lug: Acuff ye dayirekita w'ekitongole kya Management Development International, ekiri mu Chicago ekikugu mu nsonga z'abakozi ne mu nzirukanya y'ebintu.

translation.en: He lives in Olympia Fields, Illinois.
translation.lug: Abeera mu Olympia Fields, mu Illinois.

translation.en: Fortirwari Karamira  was a Tutsi and member of the Republic Democratic Movement party of Faustin Twagiramungu in Rwanda.
translation.lug: Fortirwari Karamira  yali Mutuusi era nga wa kibiina kya Republic Democratic Movement ekya Faustin Twagiramungu mu Rwanda.

translation.en: In 1992, he renounced his Tutsi identity, declared himself a Hutu and became one of the extremist Hutu supremacists.
translation.lug: Mu 1992, yagamba nti yali takyali Mutuusi, n'agamba nti ye Muhutu, era ne yeegatta ku kibinja ky'Abahutu bannalukalala.

translation.en: He split from Republic Democratic Movement to lead its extremist wing.
translation.lug: Yeekutula ku kibiina kya Republic Democratic Movement asobole okukulembera ekiwayi kyako ekya bannalukalala.

translation.en: Karamira then organised the worst massacres of the Tutsi.
translation.lug: Oluvannyuma, Karamira yateekateeka ekittabantu omwafiira omuwendo gw'Abatuusi ogukyasinzeeyo obunene.

translation.en: The head of the Interahamwe that headed the genocide was Kajuga, a Tutsi who had made himself Hutu.
translation.lug: Kajuga, ye yali omukulembeze w'ekibiina kya Interahamwe ekyawoma omutwe mu kittabantu, era naye yagamba nti takyali Mutuusi nti kati yali Muhutu.

translation.en: Basic knowledge of Rwanda would show 500 years of intermarriage and other social mechanisms of status change.
translation.lug: Ebyafaayo bya Rwanda biraga nti Abanyarwanda baamala emyaka 500 ng'abantu b'amawanga ag'enjawulo bafumbiriganwa ne kiba nti amawanga ago kumpi gaali gafuuse ggwanga limu.

translation.en: The Habyarimana government had to rigidly enforce an Identity Card system.
translation.lug: Gavumenti ya Habyarimana yalina okukaka abantu okufuna ndagamuntu.

translation.en: Many Hutu supremacists have actually been married to Tutsi women.
translation.lug: Ekituufu kiri nti bangi ku bannalukalala Abahutu baali bawasizza abakazi Abatuusi.

translation.en: Former president Gregory Kayibanda was married to a Tutsi.
translation.lug: Eyaliko Pulezidenti wa Rwanda, Gregory Kayibanda,yali yawasa mukazi Mutuusi.

translation.en: Karisiti Habimenshi was one of the leaders of the 1959 Hutu revolution.
translation.lug: Karisiti Habimenshi yali omu ku bakulembeze mu nkyukakyuka ezaakolebwa Abahutu mu 1959.

translation.en: Till his death, Karisiti Habimenshi took pride in having helped defeat Tutsi rebels in the 1960s.
translation.lug: Okutuusa lwe yafa, Karisiti Habimenshi yali yeenyumiriza nnyo mu ky'okuba nti yawangula abayeekera Abatuusi mu myaka gya 1960.

translation.en: His wife is Tutsi.
translation.lug: Mukyala we Mutuusi.

translation.en: Kayibanda’s ethnic revolution against the Tutsi could not have been because he hated them but because it was politically move for him.
translation.lug: Mu kulwanyisa Abatuusi abo, Kayibanda teyakikola lwa kuba nti yabalinako obukyayi naye yakikola lwa nsonga za bya bufuzi .

translation.en: Social relations across the Hutu-Tutsi divide are even more complicated when you dig deep into Rwanda’s social structure.
translation.lug: Enkolagana wakati w'Abahutu n'Abatuusi era yeeyongera okuba enzibu okutegeera bw'olondoola engeri abantu mu Rwanda gye bazze bakolaganamu.

translation.en: Michel Makuza is father of the current prime minister of Rwanda Bernard Makuza.
translation.lug: Michel Makuza ye taata wa ssaabaminisita wa Rwanda aliko, Bernard Makuza.

translation.en: He was the intellectual leader of the 1959 “revolution” and a close Kayibanda ally.
translation.lug: Y'omu ku baali abawi b'amagezi mu kulwana okwaliwo mu 1959 era yali nfanfe wa Kayibanda.

translation.en: He was married to a Tutsi and some people claim that his wife was a distant relative of President Paul Kagame.
translation.lug: Mukazi we yali Mutuusi era abamu bagamba nti mukazi we alina oluganda olwewala ku Pulezidenti Paul Kagame.

translation.en: The wife of the late Seth Sendashonga is also said to be Tutsi and distantly related to Kagame.
translation.lug: Mukyala w'omugenzi Seth Sendashonga naye kigambibwa nti Mutuusi era nti alina oluganda olwewala ku Kagame.

translation.en: It is hard to find a “pure” Hutu or Tutsi or one without relatives in the other group.
translation.lug: Kizibu okusanga Omuhutu oba Omutuusi yennyini, atalina banganda mu limu ku mawanga ago.

translation.en: The story of deep ethnic hatreds between Hutu and Tutsi is a myth.
translation.lug: Ebyo ebigambibwa nti Abahutu n'Abatuusi beerinako obukyayi bungi tebiriiko mutwe na magulu.

translation.en: Take the example of Rwanda in 1994.
translation.lug: Lowooza ku byaliwo mu Rwanda mu 1994.

translation.en: The Habyarimana regime had sought to create a mass awareness among the Hutu against Tutsi ever gaining power in that country.
translation.lug: Gavumenti ya Habyarimana yafuba nnyo okukunga Abahutu obutakkirizanga Batuusi kufuga ggwanga.

translation.en: However, the Hutu were not homogenous themselves.
translation.lug: Naye Abatuusi be yali agamba nabo baali ba musaayi mutabike.

translation.en: Habyarimana came from the north which under colonial rule had provided soldiers to the army.
translation.lug: Habyarimana yali asibuka mu bitundu by'ebukiikakkono ebyavaamu abasirikale b'eggye ly'eggwanga mu kiseera ky'abafuzi b'amatwale.

translation.en: He had overthrown Kayibanda from the south which under colonial rule had produced the educated.
translation.lug: Yali yawangula Kayibanda eyasibuka mu bukiikaddyo omwali muva abantu abayivu mu kiseera ky'abafuzi b'amatwale.

translation.en: Political tribalism in Africa is as modern as the ipad, created and recreated by elites daily.
translation.lug: Eby'obufuzi ebyesigamiziddwa ku mawanga bipya nnyo mu Afirika nga bw'olaba ipad, era bitandikibwawo abantu abeetwala okuba aba waggulu.

translation.en: Do the Hutu and Tutsi of Rwanda nurse ancient hatred?
translation.lug: Ddala Abahutu n'Abatuusi mu Rwanda balina obukyayi bwonna obuvudde edda?

translation.en: Habyarimana began his rule by eliminating the southern intellectuals including starving Kayibanda to death.
translation.lug: Habyarimana obufuzi bwe yabutandika na kufuba kusaanyaawo abantu abayivu ab'omu bukiikaddyo, nga muno mwe mwali n'okulumya Kayibanda enjala okutuusa lwe yafa.

translation.en: This set divisions among Hutu of the north against Hutu from the south.
translation.lug: Ekyo kyaleetawo enjawukana wakati w'Abahutu ab'omu bukiikakkono n'ab'omu bukiikaddyo.

translation.en: As Habyarimana’s rule consolidated, Hutu were divided further this time along clan.
translation.lug: Obufuzi bwa Habyarimana bwe bweyongera okukakata, enjawukana mu Bahutu zeeyongera ku luno ne zizingiramu n'ebika.

translation.en: Habyarimana was a Mushiru and his regime was seen in that light.
translation.lug: Habyarimana yali ava mu kika kya Mushiru era ne gavumenti ye bw'etyo bwe yali etunuulirwa.

translation.en: Power increasingly went into the hands of Habyarimana's village mates and in-laws from Gisenyi in north-western Rwanda.
translation.lug: Abantu b'oku kyalo Habyarimana gy'ava n'ab'okukyalo kya Gisenyi gye yajja omukyala, beeyongera okuweebwa ebifo mu gavumenti.

translation.en: So the contours of division now went along clan lines and districts of origin.
translation.lug: Ekyo kyaviirako enjawukana okulanda ne zizingiramu ebika ne disitulikiti abantu gye basibuka.

translation.en: Hutu from other districts began Habyarimana of creating akazu (kitchen cabinet).
translation.lug: Abahutu mu disitulikiti endala baatandika okunenya Habyarimana olw'okusosola mu bantu.

translation.en: There emerged the MDR which was the old Premahutu party of Kayibanda and led by Faustin Twagiramungu.
translation.lug: Ekibiina kya MDR kyatandikibwawo nga kino emabega kye kyali ekibiina kya Kayibanda ekyali kikulemberwa Faustin Twagiramungu.

translation.en: In fact Twagiramungu’s wife is a daughter to Kayibanda.
translation.lug: Mu butuufu, mukyala wa Twagiramungu muwala wa Kayibanda.

translation.en: There came the Social Democatic Party.
translation.lug: Oluvannyuma ekibiina kya Social Democatic Party nakyo kyatandikibwawo.

translation.en: Then came the Liberal Party led by Lando Ndasingwa, the only Tutsi in Habyarimana’s cabinet.
translation.lug: Oluvannyuma wajjawo ekibiina kya Liberal Party ekikulemberwa Lando Ndasingwa, ng'ono ye Mutuusi yekka eyali mu kabineeti ya Habyarimana.

translation.en: These political parties became signatories of the Arusha Peace Accords signed in 1993.
translation.lug: Ebibiina by'obufuzi ebyo byassa omukono ku ndagaano y'emirembe ey'e Arusha mu 1993.

translation.en: The principles to the agreement were Habyarimana’s  Republic Democratic Movement and Rwandan Patriotic Front would take 40 percent of the positions in government .
translation.lug: Ebibiina ebyali bisinga amaanyi mu ebyo ebyassa omukono ku ndagaano eyo, ekya Habyarimana ekiyitibwa Republic Democratic Movement n'ekyo ekiyitibwa Rwandan Patriotic Front byali bya kutwala ebitundu 40 ku buli kikumi eky'ebifo mu gavumenti.

translation.en: Within the context of Rwandan politics at the time, the main adversary of the opposition parties was Habyarimana.
translation.lug: Okusinziira ku byafaayo by'eby'obufuzi bya Rwanda mu kiseera ekyo, Habyarimana ye yali omulabe omukulu ow'ebibiina by'obufuzi.

translation.en: Because he controlled the army, the effective way to challenge Habyarimana’s power was to ally with Rwandan Patriotic Front because it had the military capacity to counter him.
translation.lug: Okuva bwe kiri nti Habyarimana yalina obuyinza ku magye, engeri yokka ey'okuvuganya Habyarimana kwali kukola mukago na kibiina kya Rwandan Patriotic Front kubanga nakyo kyalina obuyinza obumala ku ggye nga kisobola okumulwanyisa.

translation.en: So the Republican Democratic Movement, Social Democratic Party and Liberal Party entered an informal understanding with the Rwandan Patriotic Front for cooperation.
translation.lug: Bwe kityo, ekibiina kya Republican Democratic Movement, ekya Social Democratic Party, n'ekya Liberal Party  byatuuka ku nzikiriziganya n'ekibiina kya Rwandan Patriotic Front okukolera awamu.

translation.en: This understanding realigned politics in Rwanda.
translation.lug: Omukago ogwo gwakyusa nnyo eby'obufuzi mu Rwanda.

translation.en: Habyarimana realised that in the ensuing government of national unity, his party would be in a minority.
translation.lug: Habyarimana yakiraba nti omukago gw'ebibiina bino gwali gugenda kuleetera ekibiina kye okuba n'ebifo bitonoko mu gavumenti.

translation.en: Parties like the Republican Democratic Movement had calculated that given its Tutsi ethnic base, combined with the effectiveness of the ideology of Hutu power, Rwandan Patriotic Front stood no chance of winning the planned election.
translation.lug: Ebibiina gamba ng'ekya Republican Democratic Movement byali biraba nti olw'okuba RPF yalimu ab'eggwanga ly'Abatuusi bangi, ate ng'Abahutu balina obuyinza bungi, RPF yali tesobola kuwangula kulonda okwali kujja.

translation.en: If they could use Rwandan Patriotic Front's military power and add unto it their electoral strength, they would be able to gain and hold power.
translation.lug: Baakiraba nti singa bakozesa obuyinza RPF bwe yalina ku magye ne babugattako amaanyi amatono ge baalina baali basobola okuwangula.

translation.en: But Habyarimana and his extremist allies saw it differently.
translation.lug: Naye ye Habyarimana ne banne bannalukalala ebintu baali babiraba bulala.

translation.en: They realised that Rwandan Patriotic Front was going to capture power by allying with Hutu political parties.
translation.lug: Baakiraba nti RPF yali egenda kuwangula ng'eyitira mu kwekobaana n'ebibiina by'obufuzi eby'Abahutu.

translation.en: The understanding between Rwandan Patriotic Front and the other political parties had realigned the politics in a way that created a real possibility that Tutsi could actually get into power.
translation.lug: Okukwatagana wakati wa RPF n'ebibiina by'obufuzi ebirala byawa essuubi nti kati Abatuusi baali basobola okutwala obuyinza.

translation.en: Habyarimana decided on a double pronged strategy.
translation.lug: Habyarimana yasala amagezi amalala.

translation.en: First, he created Coalition for the Defence of the Republic, a Hutu extremist political party as his fifth column.
translation.lug: Ekisooka, yassaawo ekibiina kya Coalition for the Defence of the Republic, nga kino kyalimu Abatuusi bannalukalala.

translation.en: Coalition for the Defence of the Republic argued that Rwanda is for the Hutu only.
translation.lug: Ab'ekibiina kya Coalition for the Defence of the Republic baali bagamba nti ensi ya Rwanda ya Bahutu bokka.

translation.en: Initially, the Coalition for the Defence of the Republic rejected all the Arusha Accords and was actually excluded from the power sharing arrangement.
translation.lug: Mu kusooka, ab'ekibiina kya Coalition for the Defence of the Republic kyagaana endagaano y'e Arusha era tekyarowoozebwako mu ngabana y'obuyinza.

translation.en: But when this became clearly untenable, Coalition for the Defence of the Republic supported by Habyarimana began demanding inclusion.
translation.lug: Naye bwe baakiraba  nti eyo tewaali lugendo, ab'ekibiina kya Coalition for the Defence of the Republic  ekyali kiwagirwa Habyarimana baatandika okusaba nabo bateekebwe mu ndagaano eyo.

translation.en: The aim was to dilute the strength of Rwandan Patriotic Front and its allies.
translation.lug: Ekigendererwa kyali kya kunafuya maanyi ga mukago gwa RPF n'ebibiina ebirala.

translation.en: Secondly, Habyarimana encouraged divisions within the other political parties causing them to split between their moderate and extremist wings.
translation.lug: Eky'okubiri, Habyarimana yafuba okuleetawo enjawukana mu bibiina by'obufuzi ebirala.

translation.en: In the ensuing contest, the extremists joined Habyarimana while the moderates leaned to the Rwandan Patriotic Front.
translation.lug: N'ekyavaamu, bannalukalala abaali mu bibiina ebyo baasalawo okwegatta ku Habyarimana ate abo abaagala okukwata ebintu obulungi baanywerera ku RPF.

translation.en: These contestations caused the failure to swear in the government of national unity on five occasions from December 1993 to April 1994 when Habyarimana was killed.
translation.lug: Emirundi etaano, embiranyi eyo eyaliwo yakaandaaliriza eky'okukwasa gavumenti ey'awamu obuyinza, era embeera yali bw'etyo okuva mu Ddesemba 1993 okutuuka mu Apuli 1994 Habyarimana bwe yattibwa.

translation.en: Now, under the terms of the ceasefire, the Rwandan Patriotic Front had been made to withdraw from its occupied territories to its area before the May 1993 offensive.
translation.lug: Kati okusinziira ku byali mu bukwakulizo obw'okussa wansi eby'okulwanyisa, RPF yawalirizibwa okuva mu bifo bye yali ewambye n'eddayo mu bifo bye yalimu ng'okulwana tekunnatandika mu Maayi 1993.

translation.en: The areas from which the  Rwandan Patriotic Front withdrew were declared a demilitarised zone under the United Nations which organised local elections.
translation.lug: Ebifo RPF mwe yava byalangirirwa nti tebirina kubaamu magye era nti byali wansi w'ekibiina ky'Amawanga Amagatte ekyategeka okulonda mu Rwanda.

translation.en: Although all parties were free to participate, only the Republican Democratic Movement and Rwandan Patriotic Front fielded candidates.
translation.lug: Wadde ng'ebibiina byonna byali bikkirizibwa okwenyigiramu, ekibiina kya Republican Democratic Movement n'ekya RPF bye byokka ebyasimbawo abantu.

translation.en: Rwandan Patriotic Front sent its Hutu leaders like Sendashonga, Bizimungu and Kanyarengwe to campaign on its behalf.
translation.lug: Ekibiina kya RPF kyasindika abakulembeze baakyo Abahutu gamba nga Sendashonga, Bizimungu, ne Kanyarengwe okukikubira kampeyini.

translation.en: In a surprising and shocking turn of events,Rwandan Patriotic Front won all the local seats except for the top job of burgo master which was won by Republican Democratic Movement.
translation.lug: Ekyewuunyisa kiri nti ekibiina kya RPF kyawangula ebifo byonna okuggyako ekifo eky'oku ntikko ekyawangulwa ekibiina kya Republican Democratic Movement.

translation.en: When a contingent of the Rwandan Patriotic Front military was sent to Kigali as agreed in Arusha, people lined up the streets cheering its entry.
translation.lug: Ababaka b'eggye lya RPF bwe baasindikibwa e Kigali nga bwe kyali kikkaanyiziddwako mu Arusha, abantu baasimba ku makubo ne babasanyukira nnyo.

translation.en: These incidents changed the strategies of the architects of Hutu power.
translation.lug: Ebyo ebyaliwo byakiraga nti akakodyo Abahutu ke baali bakozesa kaali keetaaga okukyusibwa.

translation.en: They had succeeded in creating a widely shared social consciousness among elites and even ordinary Hutu that the Tutsi have no right to rule in Rwanda.
translation.lug: Baali basobodde okuleetera Abatuusi ab'amaanyi n'aba bulijjo okulowooza nti Abatuusi tebaggwana kufuga Rwanda.

translation.en: Short of genocide, their campaign to create a permanent wedge between Hutu and Tutsi would never succeed.
translation.lug: Baakiraba nti singa tewabaawo kittabantu, kaweefube gwe baaliko ow'okuleetawo enjawukana ez'enkalakkalira wakati w'Abahutu n'Abatuusi yali ajja kugwa butaka.

translation.en: Therefore, genocide was not born of some entrenched hatred of Tutsi by Hutu.
translation.lug: N'olwekyo, ekittabantu tekyava ku kuba nti waaliwo obukyayi obwali buvudde edda wakati w'Abatuusi n'Abahutu.

translation.en: If the architects of Hutu power were convinced that there was not a chance that Hutu and Tutsi would create an alliance, they would not have sought a “final solution.
translation.lug: Singa abo baali batumbula endowooza nti Abahutu be balina okufuga baali bakakafu nti Abahutu n'Abatuusi tebasobola kukola mukago, bandibadde tebasala ggezi ddala.

translation.en: Why then did masses of ordinary Hutu civilians pick machetes to kill Tutsi who were their friends, neighbours and relatives?
translation.lug: Kati olwo lwaki Abahutu aba bulijjo bangi baakwata ebijambiya okutta Abatuusi abaali mikwano gyabwe, baliraanwa baabwe, era nga babalinako oluganda?

translation.en: Many people believe that Hutu turned out in groups to kill Tutsi out of hatred.
translation.lug: Abantu bangi balowooza nti Abahutu bangi baasalawo okutta Abatuusi olw'okuba baabalinako obukyayi.

translation.en: The architects of the genocide put a price on the head of any Hutu who did not participate which was DEATH.
translation.lug: Abaali emabega w'ekittabantu baagamba nti Omuhutu yenna ateenyigira mu kittabantu yali ajja kuttibwa.

translation.en: Secondly, many Hutu were told that if Tutsi came, they would be exterminated.
translation.lug: Eky'okubiri, Abahutu bangi baagambibwa nti singa Abatuusi bajja, bajja kutta Abahutu babasaanyeewo.

translation.en: So many Hutu joined the bandwagon in a perverted search for preemptive self defence.
translation.lug: N'olwekyo, Abahutu bangi baasalawo okwenyigira mu kittabantu nga balowooza nti beetaasa.

translation.en: Therefore, genocide was not born of some entrenched hatred of Tutsi by Hutu.
translation.lug: N'olwekyo, ekittabantu tekyava ku kuba nti waaliwo obukyayi wakati w'Abatuusi n'Abahutu obwali buvudde emabega.

translation.en: These subtle reasons never find expression in both the pro and anti Rwandan Patriotic Front literature largely because of the complexity of the problem.
translation.lug: Ensonga zino tezitera kwogerwako mu bitabo ebikwata ku Rwanda, naddala olw'obuzibu obw'amaanyi bwe zaaleetawo.

translation.en: This background explains why it has been possible for Rwanda to achieve a large measure of reconciliation.
translation.lug: Okumanya ensonga ezo kiyamba mu kutegeera lwaki RPF esobodde okuleetawo okutabagana mu bantu bangi mu ggwanga.

translation.en: It also sheds light on why Rwandan Patriotic Front has been able to consolidate itself in power.
translation.lug: Era kituyamba okulaba lwaki RPF esobodde okwenywereza mu buyinza.

translation.en: Kagame can easily win a free and fair election in Rwanda in spite of being Tutsi in a major-ty Hutu electorate.
translation.lug: Kagame asobola bulungi okuwangula akalulu akategekeddwa mu bwenkanya n'amazima mu Rwanda wadde nga ye Mutuusi ate ng'Abahutu bangi mu ggwanga.

translation.en: The death last week of the former Ugandan president Godfrey Binaisa marks the start of the end of an era in Ugandan politics dominated by politicians who were born in the early 1900.
translation.lug: Wiiki ewedde, okufa kw'eyaliko pulezidenti wa Uganda, Godfrey Binaisa, kwalaga nti ekiseera ky'abantu abaazaalibwa ku ntandikwa y'emyaka gya 1900 okwefuga eby'obufuzi bya Uganda kitandise okuggwaako.

translation.en: The death in April 2007 of the Secretary for Defence, Brig. Noble Mayombo, should have attracted con-tinuous, hour by hour media coverage than the death of Binaisa.
translation.lug: Okufa kw'omuwandiisi w'ekitongole ky'eby'okwerinda, Brig. Noble Mayombo, mu Apuli 2007 kwandibadde kusikiriza nnyo emikutu gy'amawulire okusinga okufa kwa Binaisa.

translation.en: He was shaped by most of the same upbringing, education, religion, ethnicity, professional career and attitude as most enlightened Ugandans who attained young adulthood between 1940 and 1950.
translation.lug: Alina bingi byafaanaganya n'abantu abaavubukira mu myaka gya 1940 ne 1950 gamba nga mu buyigirize, eddiini, obuwangwa, emirimu, n'endowooza.

translation.en: This period was marked by young adults raised to aspire for formal, white collar, clerical jobs and a middle class lifestyle.
translation.lug: Abantu abaavubukira mu kiseera ekyo baakubirizibwanga kuluubirira mirimu gya ofiisi era egitali gya kukakaalukana nnyo.

translation.en: The writing was on the cards after Tiger Woods’ confession of his series of extra marital relationships had damaged his relationship with his wife Elin Nordegren.
translation.lug: Kyeyoleka bulungi oluvannyuma lwa Tiger Woods okukkiriza nti yali yayenda era ekyo kyali kikosezza enkolagana ye ne mukyala we Elin Nordegren.

translation.en: There was nothing left in Tigers’ relationship with his wife Elin, after Tiger woods’ extra marital relationships leaked in the media channels.
translation.lug: Enkolagana wakati wa Tiger Woods ne mukyala we Elin yali tekyasobola kutaasibwa, oluvannyuma lw'emikutu gy'empuliziganya egitali gimu okukitegeerako nti Tiger woods yali yayenda.

translation.en: It was a tough time for Tiger Woods’, as he put his career on hold to rectify his error, and spent some time at a sex rehabilitation clinic.
translation.lug: Kaali kaseera kazibu nnyo eri Tiger Woods, kubanga yawummula omulimu gwe asobole okutereeza ebyasoba, era yamala ekiseera ng'abudaabudibwa mu ddwaliro erimu erikola ku nsonga z'okwegatta.

translation.en: He also tried his best to repair the broken relationship with his wife Elin Nordegren.
translation.lug: Era yakola kyonna ky'asobola okuzzaawo enkolagana ye ne mukyala we Elin Nordegren.

translation.en: The divorce settlement definitely made Elin richer by millions.
translation.lug: Ebyasalawo nga bagattululwa byafuula Elin nnagagga.

translation.en: Tiger Woods and Elin Nordegren were always in favour of sharing their children’s custody.
translation.lug: Tiger Woods ne Elin Nordegren bombi baali bakkiriziganya n'eky'okugabananga abaana baabwe.

translation.en: However, nothing was yet clear on this issue by August 24 when we went to press.
translation.lug: Naye tewali kyali kimanyiddwa ku nsonga eyo we twafulumiza amawulire nga Agusito 24.

translation.en: Alfred North Whitehead said that words influence all causes, good or bad.
translation.lug: Alfred North Whitehead yagamba nti ebigambo bisobola okutereeza embeera oba okugisajjula.

translation.en: An educated person can listen to another person's point of view without necessarily accepting it
translation.lug: Omuntu omuyivu asobola okuwuliriza omuntu omulala ng'awa endowooza ye ne bw'aba nga takkiriziganya nayo.

translation.en: Aristole said there isn't a man who has the good forced upon him.
translation.lug: Aristole yagamba nti tewali muntu n'omu asobola kuwalirizibwa kukola kirungi.

translation.en: Ambrose Bierce said to be ignorant of one's ignorance is the typical of the ignorant.
translation.lug: Ambrose Bierce yagamba nti omuntu atamanyi aba tamanyi nti tamanyi.

translation.en: Amos Bronson Alcolt said one uses statistics as a drunken man uses lampposts for support rather than illumination.
translation.lug: Amos Bronson Alcolt yagamba nti omuntu akozesa ebibalo ng'omutamiivu bw'akozesa ebikondo by'ettaala okwewanirira so si okufuna ekitangaala.

translation.en: Andrew Pudliner said justice is considered to mean equality for those who are equal and not for all.
translation.lug: Andrew Pudliner yagamba nti obwenkanya butwalibwa ng'omwenkanonkano eri abo abenkana naye si eri buli omu.

translation.en: Aristole said it is the path of least resistance that makes rivers and men crooked.
translation.lug: Aristole yagamba nti okuyita awangu kye kireetera emigga n'abantu okwewetamu.

translation.en: Bj Palmer said the only thing required for evil to triumph is for good men to do nothing.
translation.lug: Bj Palmer yagamba nti ekintu kyokka ekyetaagisa ebibi okuwangula kwe kuba nti abantu abalungi bagaanye okubaako kye bakolawo.

translation.en: Castlevania said it is not the brains that matter most, but that which guides them.
translation.lug: Castlevania yagamba nti obwongo si kye kikulu naye ekibulungamya kye kikulu.

translation.en: Dostoyevsky said he disapproves of what you say but he will defend to the death your right to say it.
translation.lug: Dostoyevsky yagamba nti takkiriziganya na by'oyogera naye ajja kulwana n'okufiirawo okukakasa nti toggibwako ddembe lyo kukyogera.

translation.en: Evelyn Beatrice Hall said he who fights with monsters should look in that he himself does not be come one.
translation.lug: Evelyn Beatrice Hall yagamba nti oyo alwanagana n'agasolo ag'entiisa asaanidde okwegendereza aleme kugafaanana.

translation.en: Friedrich Nietzsche said if he accepts you as you are, he will make you worse.
translation.lug: Friedrich Nietzsche yagamba nti singa akukkiriza nga bw'oli, ajja kukuleetera okwonooneka okusinga bw'oli kati.

translation.en: Goethe said disobedience is the true foundation of liberty.
translation.lug: Goethe yagamba nti okujeema gwe musingi ogwa nnamaddala ogw'okufuna eddembe.

translation.en: Henry David Thoreau said that one should not do anything by half.
translation.lug: Henry David Thoreau yagamba nti omuntu tasaanidde kukola kintu kyonna n'akikomya wakkati.

translation.en: The Members of Parliament from Karamoja and human rights activists have accused the Uganda Peoples Defence Forces of killing civilians during the disarmament operations in Karamoja.
translation.lug: Ababaka ba paliyamenti ab'e Karamoja n'ebibiina ebirwanirira eddembe ly'obuntu birumiriza eggye lya UPDF okutta abantu aba bulijjo mu kaweefube ow'okuggya emmundu mu bantu mu Karamoja.

translation.en: The Uganda Peoples Defence Forces defended itself by saying that the said civilians are armed warriors who have been killing soldiers.
translation.lug: Mu kwewozaako, aba UPDF baagamba nti abantu aba bulijjo be boogerako be bantu abalina eby'okulwanyisa ababaddenga batta abasirikale.

translation.en: One of the Inter Party Coalition partners, Forum for Democratic Change, last week praised the Electoral Commission for doing a good job in the display of the national voter registers throughout the country.
translation.lug: Abamu ku abo abali mu mukago gw'ebibiina, aba FDC, wiiki ewedde baasiimye nnyo ekitongole ky'eby'okulonda olw'okutimba enkalala z'abalonzi okwetooloola eggwanga.

translation.en: The Inspectorate General of Government, Raphael Baku, has asked parliament to enact a law that provides for a death sentence to convicted corrupt officials.
translation.lug: IGG, Raphael Baku, yasaba paliyamenti okubaga etteeka erisobola okuviirako omuntu alya enguzi okuwanikibwa ku kalabba.

translation.en: Football began across the Atlantic Ocean in England during the early eighteen twenties.
translation.lug: Omuzannyo gw'omupiira gwatanda mu mawanga agali emitala w'Oguyanja Atlantic mu Bungereza ku ntandikwa y'emyaka gya 1820.

translation.en: American Football, known simply in America as ‘football’, was invented with a mixture from both these games during the 19th Century.
translation.lug: Omuzannyo gw'omupiira ogw'omu Amerika gwatandikibwawo nga gutobese emizannyo eggyo mu kyasa ekya 19.

translation.en: In 1820, students at a New Jersey college, currently known as Princeton University began kicking a ball around made from a blown up bladder.
translation.lug: Mu 1820, abayizi b'essomero lya New Jersey, kati eriyitibwa Princeton University, baatandika okusamba akapiira ke baali bakoze nga bafuuwa omukka mu nsawo.

translation.en: In 1609, a form of football was played in the colony of Virginia.
translation.lug: Mu 1609, waliwo ekika ky'omuzannyo gw'omupiira ekyazzannyibwanga mu Virginia.

translation.en: The history behind football dates back over three thousand years ago to the 2nd Century BC and China.
translation.lug: Ebyafaayo by'omupiira biva emyaka nga 3,000 emabega mu kyasa eky'okubiri BC mu China.

translation.en: Documentary evidence can be found in a Chinese military manual from the Han Dynasty period.
translation.lug: Obukakafu obwo busangibwa mu kitabo ky'eggye lya China eryaliwo mu kiseera ky'obwakabaka bwa Han.

translation.en: Later in the fourth century Before Christ, the Greeks and the Romans had invented their own football variations.
translation.lug: Oluvannyuma mu kyasa eky'okuna BC, Abayonaani n'Abaruumi nabo baali bayiiyizza emizannyo gyabwe egy'omupiira.

translation.en: The Greeks played ‘Pheninda’ which involved kicking, handling and running with the ball.
translation.lug: Omuzannyo gw'omupiira ogw'Abayonaani gwali guzingiramu okusamba, okukwata, n'okudduka n'omupiira.

translation.en: The Roman version was called ‘Harpastum’, and was played in teams with as many as a hundred people defending opposing ends of the field.
translation.lug: Ate gwo ogw'Abaruumi gwazannyibwanga mu ttiimu, ng'abantu abawera nga kikumi bazannya era nga baziyiza abalala okutuuka ku ludda lwabwe olw'ekisaawe.

translation.en: First Lady and Minister for Karamoja Affairs Janet Museveni was welcomed by Augusta Mushai from the Institute of Strategic Studies.
translation.lug: Mukyala wa Pulezidenti era minisita w'ensonga z'e Karamoja, Janet Museveni, yayanirizibwa Augusta Mushai ow'ekitongole kya Strategic Studies.

translation.en: The Uganda Peoples Congress President Olara Otunnu talks to the press on arrival at the Interparty Coalition Secretariat on Katonga Road for the Inter Party Coalition meeting on August 23.
translation.lug: Pulezidenti wa UPC, Olara Otunnu, ng'ayogera ne bannamawulire ng'atuuse ku ofiisi z'omukago gw'ebibiina ku luguudo lw'e Katonga ng'azze ku lukungaana lw'omukago gw'ebibiina nga Agusito 23.

translation.en: Uganda Peoples Congress did not nominate its flag bearer.
translation.lug: Ekibiina kya UPC tekyalonda anaakikwatira bbendera.

translation.en: Muhoozi Kainerugaba and the elite Special Forces he commands on Mount Moroto were behind the death of twelve innocent civilians in Karamoja.
translation.lug: Muhoozi Kainerugaba n'eggye ery'enjawulo ly'aduumira mu nsozi za Moroto be baali emabega w'okuttibwa kw'abantu aba bulijjo 12 e Karamoja.

translation.en: The following morning, while Muhoozi was still out of the country, a chorus of voices came to his defense.
translation.lug: Enkeera kumakya, Muhoozi bwe yali ng'akyali wabweru w'eggwanga, abantu bangi baamuwolereza.

translation.en: Special Forces Group Spokesman, Capt. Edison Kwesiga, denied the allegations and accused the Karimojong raiders of deliberately killing soldiers.
translation.lug: Omwogezi w'eggye ery'enjawulo, Capt. Edison Kwesiga, yagaana ebyali byogerwa n'alumiriza Abakalamoja abalumba ebyalo olw'okutta abasirikale.

translation.en: By the following morning the Uganda Peoples Defence Forces admitted that as a result of their ongoing disarmament exercise in Karamoja, ten individuals had died in crossfire with warriors in April in Rengen Sub-county.
translation.lug: Ku lunaku olwaddako kumakya, aba UPDF baagamba nti olwa kaweefube ow'okuggya emmundu mu bantu mu Karamoja, abantu kkumi baafa nga balwanagana n'Abakalamoja abalwanyi mu Apuli mu kitundu kya Rengen.

translation.en: No mention was made of Muhoozi’s forces.
translation.lug: Tebaayogera ku magye gaduumirwa Muhoozi.

translation.en: By now former government spy chief David Pulkol, who is originally from Karamoja, had entered the dispute.
translation.lug: Mu kiseera ekyo, eyakulirako ekitongole kya gavumenti ekikessi, David Pulkol, enzaalwa ya Karamoja, yali ayingidde mu nsonga ezo.

translation.en: He called on the United Nations and international rights groups to investigate the incidents.
translation.lug: Yasaba ekibiina ky'Amawanga Amagatte n'ebibiina ebirwanirira eddembe ly'obuntu okunoonyereza ku byaliwo.

translation.en: Pulkol also accused the Uganda Peoples Defence Forces of seizing Karimojong livestock indiscriminately.
translation.lug: Pulkol era yalumiriza aba UPF okumala gatwala buli nte ya Mukalamoja awatali kusooka kwetegereza.

translation.en: On Thursday August 19, First Lady Janet Museveni, irritated by the allegations being put against her son, entered the dispute.
translation.lug: Ku Lwokuna nga Agusito 19, Muka Mukulembeze w'eggwanga Janet Museveni, nga munyiivu olw'abo abaali bayingiza mutabani we mu nsonga ezo naye ensonga yaziyingiramu.
