translation.lug: Nga Jjulaayi 25, Mwenda yasoma n'obwegendereza ebyo Puleezidenti Museveni bye yawandiika ng'awagira eky'amagye okugenda mu Somaliya.

translation.en: I use the words “particular keenness” because I highly respect Museveni’s analysis of security issues.
translation.lug: Nkozesa ebigambo "obwegendereza" kubanga nzissa nnyo ekitiibwa ku ngeri Museveni gy'annyonnyolamu ensonga z'okwerinda.

translation.en: While his article is strong and persuasive, I was not convinced about intervention in Somalia.
translation.lug: Wadde nga bye yawandiika bikulu era nga bisikiriza, ssali mumativu ku nsonga y'amaggye okugenda mu Somaliya.

translation.en: First, the president makes clear that he has not made research on Somalia even though it is in relation to the collapse of Siad Barre.
translation.lug: Okusookera ddala, pulezidenti akiraga bulungi nti takolanga kunoonyereza ku Somaliya wadde nga kino kyekuusa ku kugwa kwa Siad Barre.

translation.en: President Museveni should have learnt this from his reading of the United States experience in Vietnam.
translation.lug: Pulezidenti Museveni kino yandibadde akiyigira ku ebyo by'asoma ebyatuuka ku Amerika mu Vietnam.

translation.en: These lessons constitute the Collin Powell Doctrine that was successful in the Gulf War one.
translation.lug: Eby'okuyiga bino bizingiramu endowooza ya Collin Powell eyali ennuŋŋaamu ku bikwata ku lutalo olw'omu Gulf olwasooka.

translation.en: George Bush Jr ignored those lessons at great peril.
translation.lug: George Bush Jr yabuusa amaaso eby'okuyiga ebyo era ebyavaamu tebyali birungi.

translation.en: The president did not respond to critical issues like the objectives, key success indicators, timeframe of our intervention and our exit strategy in Somalia.
translation.lug: Pulezidenti teyalowooza ku nsonga enkulu gamba nga ebigendererwa, obubonero obulaga obuwanguzi, ebbanga lye twandimmazeeyo awamu ng'engeri gye twandivuddeyo.

translation.en: President Museveni should be a student of his own history and that of Uganda before he labels all insurgents in Somalia names.
translation.lug: Pulezidenti Museveni asaanidde ayigire ku ebyo bye yayitamu awamu n'ebyo Uganda by'eyiseemu nga tannayogera ku bamawale bonna mu Somaliya.

translation.en: Just imagine if, in 1986, the international community had branded him a communist and the United States decided to use African troops to prop the Okello-Okello regime.
translation.lug: Kiteeberezeemu, singa mu 1986 ensi zonna zaasalawo okumuyita omukonomisiti ne Amerika n'esalawo okukozesa amaggye ga Afirika okuyamba gavumenti ya Okello.

translation.en: In other words, The Organisation of African Unity forces would have come to Uganda to block a more meaningful resolution of the crisis of the state in our country.
translation.lug: Mu ngeri endala, eggye ly'ekibiina ekigatta amawanga ga Afirika lyandibadde lijja ne liziyizza abo abali bafuba okuleetawo enkyukakyuka ennungi mu nsi yaffe.

translation.en: That is what Uganda is doing in Somalia.
translation.lug: Ekyo kyennyini Uganda ky'ekola mu Somaliya.

translation.en: Sadly, the president presents the emergence of the Islamic Courts Union  in American language as a group that sought to create an “Islamic fundamentalist state” governed by Sharia law.
translation.lug: musseewo "enfuga y'ekisiraamu" egoberera amateeka ga Sharia.

translation.en: What is wrong with this? Saudi Arabia is an Islamic fundamentalist state governed by Sharia law but Uganda has diplomatic relations with it.
translation.lug: Kikyamu ki ekiri mu kino? Saud Arebia ggwanga erifugibwa ku mateeka ga Sharia era Uganda erina enkolagana ennungi n'ensi eyo.

translation.en: What is so abhorrent in Somalia’s Islamic fundamentalist orientation and use of Sharia law that is intolerable to America and Uganda?
translation.lug: Kikyamu ki ennyo ekiri mu nfuga eno mu Somaliya ne kiba nti tekiyinza kugumiikirizikika Uganda ne Amerika?

translation.en: Besides, the primary objective in Somalia should be to get a group that can exercise effective military control over the country before we begin to talk of its religious.
translation.lug: Ng'oggyeko ekyo, ensonga eyandibadde esinga obukulu mu Somaliya yandibadde okufuna abantu abandikoze amaggye agandikuumye obulungi ensi eyo nga tetunnatandika kwogera ku bya ddiini.

translation.en: I am inclined to believe that President Museveni is either misled or is posturing to Washington DC or both to take his current position.
translation.lug: Mu kusalawo okukola kino, nze ndowooza nti Pulezident Museveni ayinza okuba ng'awubiddwa obanga amala gagoberera Amerika by'ekola.

translation.en: There is no way a coterie of corrupt and opportunistic civilians without basic military know-how can establish security in Somalia even if propped by Uganda and the African Union.
translation.lug: Tewaliwo ngeri yonna ekibinja ky'abantu ababi era bannakigwanyizi abatalina bumanyirivu mu bya kijjaasi gye bayinza okuleetawo emirembe mu Somaliya wadde nga bawagirwa Uganda n'ekibiina ekigatta amawanga g'Afirika.

translation.en: President Museveni, more than any other African I know understands well how foreign interventions, however well intentioned, are incapable of establishing a stable peace, leave alone a functional state.
translation.lug: Obutafaananako muntu yenna mu Afirika gwe mmanyi, pulezidenti Museven amanyi bulungi nnyo nti amawanga amaggwiira ka gabe nga galina ekigendererwa ekirungi tegayinza kuleetawo butebenkevu bwa lubeerera.

translation.en: President Museveni writes about the Tanzanian invasion of Uganda to liberate us from Idi Amin’s murderous tyranny as, a very good thing.
translation.lug: Pulezidenti Museveni mu bye yawandiika ayogera bulungi ku ngeri Tanzaniya gye yalumbamu Uganda n'ekigendererwa eky'okutununula mu ttemu n'obwakyemalira bwa Idi Amini.

translation.en: However, the removal of Amin did not create stability but state collapse in spite of the presence of the Tanzanian People’s Defence Forces troops on our soil.
translation.lug: Waddde kiri kityo, okuggyibwawo kw'obufuzi bwa Amini tekyaleetawo butebenkevu wadde nga n'Abatanzaniya bali bakyaliwo mu nsi yaffe.

translation.en: Ugandan exiles had misadvised President Julius Nyerere that resolving the post Amin situation required a democracy built on a consensus and coalition of different political groups.
translation.lug: Bannayuganda abaali mu buwaŋŋanguse baawa Julius Nyerere amagezi amakyamu nti okusobola okugonjoola ekizibu ekyali kizzeewo nga Amini avuddewo, kyali kyetaagisa demokulasiya okumuzimbira ku kukaanya n'okukolaganira awamu n'ebibiina by'obufuzi ebitali bimu.

translation.en: Museveni made a counter proposal to Nyereresaying that the emerging coalition should be based on military organisation and capability, not on opportunistic politics.
translation.lug: Museveni yawa Nyerere ekirowoozo ekyali kyawukana ku ekyo ng'agamba nti okwegatta okwo kwandibadde kwesigamizibwa ku nteekateeka y'ekijjaasi n'obusobozi so ku bannabyabufuzi bannakigwanyizi.

translation.en: He was ironically supported by Milton Obote.
translation.lug: Ekirowoozo kye kyawagirwa nnyo Milton Obote.

translation.en: Their disagreement was on the composition of the military coalition that Museveni wanted one based on 50:50 between his group and Obote’s.
translation.lug: Tebakkiriziganya ku ngeri eggye gye lyali lirina kubeeramu kubanga ye Museveni yali ayagala ye ne Obote buli omu abeere n'ebitundu ataano ku buli kikumi.

translation.en: Meanwhile the Uganda People's Congress leader wanted an 80:20 in his favour.
translation.lug: Songa ate ye omukulembeze wa Uganda People's Congress yali ayagala abeere n'ebitundu kinaana ate ye munne abeere n'ebitundu abiri.

translation.en: In the maneuverings that took place in Tanzania, Museveni and Obote lost.
translation.lug: Okusinzira ku ebyo ebyali e Tanzaniya, bombi Museveni ne Obote baafiirwa.

translation.en: That is how Yusuf Lule and the The Uganda National Liberation Front, completely lacking in military knowledge, came to power.
translation.lug: Eyo ye nsonga lwaki Yusuufu Lule n'eggye lya Uganda ennunuzi, abaatalina bumanyirivu bwonna mu by'ekijjaasi, be bajja mu buyinza.

translation.en: Uganda instead became extremely unstable as the state lost the ability to ensure personal security.
translation.lug: Ekyo kyatabangula nnyo Uganda kubanga ensi teyalina busobozi okukakasa nti wabaawo emirembe mu nsi.

translation.en: It was not until the Tanzanians withdrew when Obote and Museveni faced each other militarily in Luwero.
translation.lug: Abatanzaniya nga bagenze, Museveni ne Obote baayolesaganya obwanga mu lutulo e Luwero.

translation.en: It is ironic that among African leaders, Museveni is trying to impose a solution on Somalia when he was victim to Nyerere’s well intentioned but failed effort to stabilise Uganda.
translation.lug: Kyewunyisa okulaba nti mu bakulembeze ba Afirika bonna Museven y'agezaako okukakkatika endowooza ye ku Somaliya ate nga ye kennyini yayisibwa bubi nnyo olw'ekirowoozo kya Nyerere eky'okuleetawo emirembe mu Uganda wadde nga kyamala ne kiggwa butaka.

translation.en: Isn’t it also ironic that it is President Museveni of all people who is labeling Somalis fighting for their country as mere stooges of the Middle East?
translation.lug: Era tekyewuunyisa nti mu bonna pulezidenti Museveni y'avvumirira Abasomaali abalwanirira ensi yaabwe ng'abayita bakazanyirizi b'omu kyondo ky'Ebuwarabu.

translation.en: This was especially because he had been labeled a communist and a Marxist by the very people who do not see initiative in the struggles taking place in Somalia?
translation.lug: Kiri kityo kubanga abantu be bamu abaamutwala okuba n'endowooza y'ekikomunisti era be babuusa amaaso okufuba kw'abo abaagala okununula Somaliya.

translation.en: The Islamic Courts Union had made clear its desire to cooperate with the United States using its spokesman in Nairobi.
translation.lug: Ekibiina ky'Abasiraamu kya kyoleka bulungi nti kyali kyagala okukolaganira awamu ne Amerika okuyitira mu mwogezi waabwe e Nairobi.

translation.en: Had it been allowed it to consolidate, the United States could have leveraged technical and financial aid to moderate the extremist aspects of the government.
translation.lug: Singa baakkiriza okukolaganira awamu, Amerika yandibadde ewa obuyambi bw'ensimbi n'ebintu ebirala ebyetaagisa okusobola okukkakkanya endowooza ezitali nnungi gavumenti ze yalina.

translation.en: It would be the way it used similar tactics to dissuade Museveni from his Marxist economic policies of barter trade and state control of the commanding heights of the economy.
translation.lug: Yandikozeseza enkola y'emu gye yakozesa okuggyamu Museveni endowooza y'ekikominisiti ekwata ku by'ensubulagana eby'okuwanyisanganya eby'amaguzi.

translation.en: It is wrong for President Museveni to see in every initiative by the Somalis the hand of “ideologies” from the “Middle East”, whatever that means.
translation.lug: Kikyamu pulezidenti Museveni okugamba nti Abasomaali abalwanirira ensi yaabwe bakolera ku ndowooza y'abantu b'omu kyondo kya Buwalabu.

translation.en: On Tuesday, we were taken to court and I was told I had no case to answer.
translation.lug: Ku Lwokubiri nnatwalibwa mu kkooti naye ne baŋŋamba nti ssalina musango gwonna.

translation.en: Instead of being released, I was taken back to Bramelene Prison to clear myself.
translation.lug: Mu kifo ky'okundeka ŋŋende, nnazibwayo mu kkomera lye Bramelene mbeeko byemaliriza.

translation.en: I spent two days there and was finally released on Thursday.
translation.lug: Eyo nnamalayo ennuku bbiri oluvannyuma ne banta ku Lwokuna.

translation.en: Placed security sources in Uganda told The Independent that Kayumba approached Kashaka and asked him to help establish contact with Kagame.
translation.lug: Ab'eby'okwerinda mu Uganda baagamba olupapula lwa Independent nti Kayumba yatuukirira Kashaka n'amusaba abayambe okutuukirira Kagame.

translation.en: Kashaka consulted President Yoweri Museveni of Uganda and sought his guidance.
translation.lug: Kashaka yeebuuza ku Pulezidenti Museveni owa Uganda ng'ayagala omuwe obulagirizi.

translation.en: It seems Museveni gave it a go ahead.
translation.lug: Kirabika Museveni yamukkiriza okugenda mu maaso.

translation.en: Kashaka then contacted Kigali and delivered the message that Kayumba wanted to “talk”.
translation.lug: Awo Kashaka n'atwala Ekigali obubaka Kayumba bwe yali ayagala "okwogera."

translation.en: Kagame was informed of this effort but he was sceptical.
translation.lug: Kagame yagambibwa okufuba okwali kukoleddwa naye yali abuusabusa.

translation.en: First, Kayumba had appeared on Voice of America and made scathing criticisms of the government and Kagame personally.
translation.lug: Okusooka Kayumba yali alabikidde ku ttivi eyitibwa Voice of America ng'avvumirira nnyo gavumenti ne Kagame kennyini.

translation.en: Second, sources say that Kagame believes, on the basis of intelligence information that Kayumba was behind recent grenade attacks in Kigali.
translation.lug: Ekyokubiri, ensonda ezimu zigamba nti Kagame kennyini akikkiriza nti okusinziira ku kunoonyereza okwakolebwa, Kayumba ye yali emabega wa bbomu ezaakubibwa mu Kigali.

translation.en: The Rwandan president does not forgive such things easily.
translation.lug: Pulezidenti w'e Rwanda tamala gasonyiwa bintu ng'ebyo.

translation.en: However, some Kagame loyalists impressed it upon their boss that the country was better off having Kayumba inside than outside of it.
translation.lug: Kyokka abamu ku abo abakkiririza ennyo mu Kagame baamugamba nti kyandibadde kirungi eri eggwanga singa Kayumba abeera munda mu kifo ky'okubeera ebweru.

translation.en: Kagame felt conceding to such logic would be like giving in to blackmail.
translation.lug: Kagame yalowooza nti okukolera ku magezi ng'ago kwandibadde ng'okwekkiriranya n'okukkiriza okusiigibwa enziro.

translation.en: Kashaka had offered to travel from South Africa to Kigali to begin discussions with key Rwanda Patriotic Front insiders.
translation.lug: Kashaka yali yeewaddeyo okuva e South Afirika agende e Kigali asobole okutandika okuteesaganya n'abakulu b'ekibiina ekiyitibwa Rwanda Patriotic Front.

translation.en: Those concerned argued that a Ugandan military member could not travel to Kigali from Pretoria without Museveni’s personal approval.
translation.lug: Abo be kyali kikwatako baagamba nti omujaasi mu ggye lya Uganda tayinza kuva Pretoria n'agenda e Kigali nga Museveni tamukkiriza.

translation.en: It is then that information arrived in Kigali that Kayumba’s driver had been issued with a Ugandan passport.
translation.lug: Awo obubaka we bwatuukira e Kagali nti duleyiva wa Kayumba yali awereddwa pasipota y'e Uganda.

translation.en: Uganda and Rwanda share a complicated relationship characterised by intrigue, dexterity and double crossing.
translation.lug: Uganda ne Rwanda balina bye bafaanaganya mu nkolagana yaabwe gamba nga enkwe, obumanyirivu n'ensalo.

translation.en: Rwanda learnt that when Kayumba left for South Africa, Ugandan intelligence kept close contact with him.
translation.lug: Rwanda yakitegerako nti Kayumba bwe yagenda mu South Afirika, abakeessi ba Uganda beeyongera okukolagana naye.

translation.en: Kigali was told that Bichisha’s passport was delivered to him by the Ugandan police.
translation.lug: Kigali yagambibwa nti owa polisi w'e Uganda ye yatwalira Bichisha paasipota ye.

translation.en: His air ticket was reportedly bought by the Ugandan police.
translation.lug: Kiragambibwa nti poliisi ya Uganda ye yamugulira ttikiti y'ennyonyi.

translation.en: He was also reportedly driven to the airport by the Ugandan police.
translation.lug: Era kigambibwa nti poliisi ya Uganda ye yamutwala ku kisaawe ky'ennyonyi.

translation.en: Later in his prison cell, Gakwerera says, Bichisha revealed all this Ugandan police involvement to him.
translation.lug: Oluvannyuma ng'ali mu kkomera, Gakwereza agamba nti Bishisha yakyasanguza nti poliisi ya Uganda ye yamuyamba.

translation.en: Upon release, Gakwerere informed Rwandan authorities.
translation.lug: Gakwerere bwe yava mu kkomera ye yategeza ab'obuyinza mu Rwanda.

translation.en: As top Rwanda Patriotic Front officials pondered what Museveni’s game plan was in this Kayumba saga, “a friend” from the American Central Intelligence Agency called Kigali.
translation.lug: Awo ekitongole ekikeessi ekya Amerika ne kikuba essimu e Kigali.

translation.en: He claimed that Kayumba had sent a message to Museveni seeking contact.
translation.lug: Yagamba nti Kayumba yali aweerezza Museveni obubaka ng'ayagala kumutuukirira.

translation.en: He said he had confirmed from reliable Ugandan security sources that Museveni had received Kayumba’s message .
translation.lug: Yagamba nti kino yali akikakasizza okuva mu nsonda z'eby'okwerinda ezeesigika mu Uganda nti Museveni yali afunye obubaka bwa Kayumba.

translation.en: However, it seemed the Ugandan president had not responded to it, at least not yet.
translation.lug: Kyokka kirabika nti pulezidenti wa Uganda yali tannamuddamu.

translation.en: Was Museveni betting his time yet It is in this context that Kayumba was shot?
translation.lug: Kayumba we yakubirwa amasasi kyandiba nga Museveni yali akyerowooza?

translation.en: In Kigali, core people sat to assess the issue.
translation.lug: Mu Kigali abakulu baatuula okwekenenya ensonga eno.

translation.en: One option was that a faction among them could have taken it upon itself to shoot Kayumba.
translation.lug: Kitebeerezebwa nti wayinza okubaawo abamu ku bo abaasalawo okukuba Kayumba amasasi.

translation.en: Dicta Asiimwe, in the Election Watch under the 2011 national elections, said, the Democratic Party has started its primaries to elect leaders for all the party’s political positions in the country.
translation.lug: Mu mawulire agayitibwa Election Watch Dicta Asiimwe yagamba nti, ekibiina ky'eby'obufuzi ekya Democratic Party kitandise okulonda okw'okusunsulamu abakulembeze baakyo ku bifo byonna mu ggwanga.

translation.en: The one month exercise will end on August 25.
translation.lug: Omulimu guno ogwokumala omwezi ogumu gujja kukomekkerezebwa nga Agusto 25.

translation.en: According to the party spokesperson Emmanuel Mwaka Lutukumoi, Democratic Party district councils will choose the dates when they want to hold the primaries in their respective areas.
translation.lug: Okusinziira ku mwogezi w'ekibiina Emmanuel Mwaka Lutukumoi bakansala ba disitulikiti ab'ekibiina kya DP bajja kusalawo ennaku kwe banaaberera n'okulonda kwabwe okw'okusunsulibwamu.

translation.en: However, they must submit names of the flag bearers immediately after August 25.
translation.lug: Naye basaanidde okuwaayo amannya g'abo abanaabakwatira bbendera amangu ddala oluvannyuma lwa Agusito 25.

translation.en: The party has also asked members who will stand as party flag bearers to pay two hundred thousand shillings to the party treasury for Member of Parliament.
translation.lug: Ekibiina era kisabye abo abanaakikwatira bbendera okusasula emitwalo amakumi abiri eri omuwanika w'ekibiina akola ku babaka ba palamenti.

translation.en: However, Democratic Party Secretary General Matia Nsubuga says the members know the money is necessary to prepare for the primaries.
translation.lug: Kyokka omuwandiisi w'okuntiko ow'kibiina kya DP Matia Nsubuga agamba nti bamemba bakimanyi nti sente zeetaagisa okusobola okutekega okulonda.

translation.en: “We are not like the National Resistance Movement", Matia Nsubuga said.
translation.lug: Matia Nsubuga yagamba nti "ffe tetuli nga ab'ekibiina kya NRM.

translation.en: We get our money from our supporters,” Nsubuga added.
translation.lug: Era Nsubuga yagattako nti "ffe sente tuzifuna okuva mu bawagizi baffe."

translation.en: He says that while the National Resistance Movement uses public funds for the party activities, Democratic Party has to raise money from its supporters to finance party activities.
translation.lug: Agamba nti wadde nga aba NRM bo bakozesa ssente za gavumenti okusobola okutegeka okulonda kwabwe, bo aba DP ssente balina kuzifuna kuva mu bawagizi baabwe. okusobola okukola ku byetaago byabwe.

translation.en: However, Lulume Bayiga, Buikwe South Member of Parliamnet and the Secretary General of the Sam Lubega faction, says, Democratic Party would be better off  settling the internal divisions first.
translation.lug: Naye kyandibadde kirungi nnyo ekibiina okusooka okumalawo enjawukana ezikirimu.

translation.en: He says he believes the Democratic Party President Norbert Mao and Secretary General Matia Nsubuga are not interested in the party reconciliation.
translation.lug: Ye alowooza nti pulezidenti wa DP Nobart Mao ne Ssabawandiisi w'ekibiina Matia Nsubuga tebaagala kibiina kibe bumu.

translation.en: Mukono North Member of Parliament Betty Nambooze says, she will participate in the Mao led Democratic Party’s primaries despite the fact that the two have not been on good terms.
translation.lug: Omubaka wa palamenti owa Mukono north Betty Nambooze agamba nti ajja kwetaba mu kulonda kwa DP okutegekebwa Mao wadde nga tebabadde na nkolaga nnungi.

translation.en: This was because Mao had sided with the former party President Sebaana Kizito and went to Mbale for the delegate’s conference living Nambooze and other party members behind.
translation.lug: Kino kiri kityo kubanga Mao yali akwataganye ne eyali omukulembeze w'ekibiina kya DP Ssebaana Kizito ne bagenda e Mbale mu ttabamiruka w'ekibiina nga Nambooze ne bamemba abalala babalese.

translation.en: “We shall have nominations for the general elections in two months, and we have to be prepared to participate,” Nambooze said.
translation.lug: Nambooze yagamba nti: "mu myezi ebiri tujja kuba n'okusunsulamu abo abaneenyigira mu kulonda okw'awamu era tulina okwetegeka okukwenyigiramu.

translation.en: Nambooze also joined Suubi a coalition of Buganda politicians aligned to Inter-Party Cooperation and is currently in conflict with Democrtic Party.
translation.lug: Nambooze era yeegatta ku Suubi ekibiina omwegattira bannabyabufuzi abava mu Buganda era nga mu kiseera kino ekibiina kino tekikwatagana na kibiina kya DP.

translation.en: The party has also castigated Kampala Central Member of Parliament Erias Lukwago for supporting the Inter-Party Cooperation.
translation.lug: Ekibiina era kivumiridde nnyo omubaka wa palamenti ow'e Kampala Erias Lukwago olw'okuwagira akabondo kano ak'ababaka abava mu bibiina by'obufuzi ebitali bimu.

translation.en: Lutukumoi said those “renegade” members are welcome to contest in the Democratic Party primaries but they are warned.
translation.lug: Lutukumoi yagamba nti "bakyewagula abo baddembe okuvuganya mu kusunsulibwa kw'ekibiina kya DP naye beeralikirivu.

translation.en: He said this because the party would field candidates to stand against Democratic Party members who will not participate in the party’s primaries.
translation.lug: Kino yakyogera kubanga ekibiina kijja kusimbawo ababaka ate abajja okuvuganya bannakibiina bannaabwe abanaaba tebayise mu kusunsulibwa.

translation.en: He says the party constitution requires that candidates who stand on the Democratic Party ticket must first go through the primaries.
translation.lug: Yagamba nti amateeka g'ekibiina gakirambika bulungi nti abo abeesimbawo ku ttikiti ya DP balina okusooka okusunsulibwa.

translation.en: “We are doing this under the party constitution and everybody must abide by it,” Lutukumoi says.
translation.lug: Lutukumoi yagamba nti: "kino tukikolera wansi w'amateeka agafuga ekibiina buli muntu yenna g'alina okugoberera."

translation.en: Nambooze asked why she was being asked whether she will participate in the primaries if that is the position she will take while Lukwago did not confirm his participation.
translation.lug: Nambooze yabuuza ensonga lwaki yali abuuzibwa obanga annenyigira mu kusunsulibwa ate ng'ekyo kye yali asazeewo okukola. Ate ye Lukwago abadde tannakakasa obanga annenyigiramu.

translation.en: The Democratic Party National Women Chairperson Maxensia Takirambule accused Nambooze and other “renegade” Democratic Party members of confusing the public by associating with Suubi 2011.
translation.lug: Maxensia Takirambule akola nga nnyinintebe w'abakyala mu kibiina kya DP anenyeza nnyo Nambooze ne "bakyewaggula" abalala aba DP olw'okubuzaabuza abantu nga beegatta ku Suubi 2011.

translation.en: Suubi 2011 which is a political pressure group allied to Inter-Party Cooperation, and then claiming they are members of Democratic Party.
translation.lug: Suubi 2011 kibiina ekyegattirwamu bannabyabufuzi okuva mu bibiina eby'enjawulo, ate mu kiseera kye kimu ne beeyita aba DP.

translation.en: She said they should be Democratic Party or stay in Suubi and leave the party.
translation.lug: Agamba nti bano basaanidde okuba mu kibiina kya DP oba okukivaamu ne basigala mu Suubi.

translation.en: The Independent of July 30 - August 05, 2010, had Solomon Kimbugwe reporting that the Conservative Party had named an unknown candidate as its flag bearer to challenge two presidential candidates.
translation.lug: Solomon Kimbugwe munnamawulire w'olupapula lwa independenti olwa Jjulaayi okuva nga 30 okutuuka nga Agusito 5 2010, yawandiika nti ekibiina kya CP kyali kirina omuntu atamanyiddwa gwe kyogeddeko ng'anaabakwatira bbendera avuganye n'abantu ababiri abeesimbyewo okuvuganya ku kifo kya pulezidenti.

translation.en: Those two were Forum for Democratic Change’s Kizza Besigye and Olara Otunnu of Uganda People's Congress for the Interparty Cooperation’s joint candidate in the national presidential elections.
translation.lug: Ku abo ababiri kwe kuli Kizza Besigye owa FDC ne Olara Otunu owa UPC

translation.en: Lukwago and Nambooze were wondering whether the “renegades” will take part in Democratic Party primaries?
translation.lug: Lukwago ne Namboozi baali beebuuza obanga "bakyewaggula" bannenyigira mu kusunsulibwa kw'ekibiina kya DP.

translation.en: Prof. James Kigongo has no known political or public profile other than having once been a head of the Department of Philosophy at Makerere University.
translation.lug: Tewaliwo nnyo kya maanyi kimanyiddwa ku Omukenkufu James Kigongo ku nsonga z'eby'obufuzi oba ku bikwata ku mirimu gye emirala okuggyako okuba nti olumu yakulemberako ekitongole mu Ssetendekero wa Makerere.

translation.en: The highest known political leadership position he has held is advisor to Conservative Party President Ken Lukyamuzi.
translation.lug: Ekifo ekisingayo okuba ekya waggulu kye yali abaddemu mu by'obufuzi kwe kuba nti yaliko omuwi w'amagezi wa pulezidenti wa CP Ken Lukyamuzi.

translation.en: Kigongo was elected during the Conservative Party national conference of 60 delegates representing the regions rather than districts, on July, 23 in Kampala.
translation.lug: Kigongo yalondebwa mu kiseera kya ttabamiruka w'ekibiina kya CP eky'ababaka 60 abakiikirira ebitundu so si disitulikiti era kino kyaliwo mu Jjulaayi nga 23 e Kampala.

translation.en: He defeated Wasiebe Magina, the Conservative Party Vice Chairman for Eastern region with 32 votes out of 60 voting delegates.
translation.lug: Yawangula Wasiebe Magina, omumyuka wa CP mu Buvanjuba n'obululu 32 ku obwo 60 obwakubibwa.

translation.en: Probably the biggest thing the election of Kigongo has proved is that the federalism is its strong value.
translation.lug: Oboolyawo ekintu ekisingayo obukulu ekikakasiddwa mu kulondebwa kwa Kigongo kwe kuba nti ekibiina kino kizimbiddwa ku musingi gwa federo.

translation.en: Kigongo is a known monarchist and federalist.
translation.lug: Kimanyiddwa bulungi nti Kigongo awagira nnyo obwakabaka ne federo.

translation.en: This shows that Buganda’s most cherished value of federalism would be a key component of the Inter-party Cooperation.
translation.lug: Kino kiba kiraga nti federo Buganda gy'esinga okutwala ng'ekikulu ennyo y'ejja okuba ku mwanjo mu kibiina kino ekigattira awamu ebibiina byonna.

translation.en: However sending Kigongo to face Besigye and Otunnu in a political race is like placing apples and mangoes together and ask customers to pick the better choice.
translation.lug: Kyokka bw'oleeta Kigongo avuganye Besigye ne Otunu obanga eddidde ekibala kya appo n'emiyembe n'obiteeka mu kisero n'ogamba omuntu alondeko ky'asinga okwagala.

translation.en: It suggests, and rather strongly, that the race for the opposition presidential candidate realistically lies between Otunnu and Besigye.
translation.lug: Kino kiba kyeyoleka kaati nti embiranye ku ludda oluvuganya gavumenti okusinga ejja kuba wakati wa Besigye ne Otunnu.

translation.en: However there is an important, though not crucial, a lesson from the election of Kigongo to hold the torch for Conservative Party.
translation.lug: Naye waliwo ensonga enkulu wadde nga si ya maanyi nnyo mu kulondebwa kwa Kigongo okukwattira ekibiina kya CP etaala.

translation.en: All political parties have demonstrated this except the National Resistance Movement.
translation.lug: Ebibiina by'obufuzi byonna bikikoze okuggyako ekya NRM.

translation.en: Uganda People's Congress has changed its leadership from Miria Obote to Otunnu in less than five years.
translation.lug: Mu bbanga eritasukka myaka etaano UPC ekyusizza obukulembeze bwaayo ne buva ku Maria Obote ne budda ku Otunnu.

translation.en: Miria Obote had been elected after the death of her husband Milton Obote who had been the exile party president.
translation.lug: Maria Obute yalondebwa oluvannyuma lw'okufa kw'omwami we Milton Obote eyali akulemberera ekibiina kino mu buwaŋŋanguse.

translation.en: The Democratic Party, its internal wrangles not withstanding, has changed its leadership twice since the National Resistance Movement came to power in 1986.
translation.lug: Ng'oggyeko enjawukana eziri mu kibiina kya DP,  kyo kyakakyusa obukulembeze bwakyo emirundi ebiri bukya NRM ejja mu buyinza mu 1986

translation.en: The Forum for Democratic Change, the youngest of the big four parties, having been formed in 2004, is also likely to change its leadership after 2011.
translation.lug: Ate kyo ekibiina kya FDC ekisngayo obuto mu bibiiina ebinene ebina era nga kyatandikibwawo mu 2004 nakyo kisuubirwa okukyusa obukulembeze bwakyo mu 2011.

translation.en: The incumbent Dr. Kizza Besigye has already said he will not seek re-election to lead the party beyond the current term.
translation.lug: Omukulembeze w'ekibiina kino Dr. Kizza Besigye yagamba nti tajja kuddamu kwesimbawo ng'ekisanja kye kiweddeko.

translation.en: Among parties that are more than 10 years old, it’s only the National Resistance Movement that has not changed its top leadership or elected a new candidate.
translation.lug: Mu bibiina byonna ebyakamala emyaka egisukka mu kkumi, ekibiina kya NRM kyokka kye kitakyusanga bukulembeze bwakyo obwoku ntikko.

translation.en: It has been Museveni in the last 24 years.
translation.lug: Museveni y'abaddewo mu myaka 24 egiyise.

translation.en: Museveni has been the chairman of the National Resistance Movement since 1986 when it took over power.
translation.lug: Museveni y'abadde ssentebe wa NRM okuviira ddala mu 1986 lwe yajja mu buyinza.

translation.en: The argument that the National Resistance Movement only became a party in 2003 but had been a system since 1986 only exists in form not in substance.
translation.lug: Eky'okugamba nti NRM yafuka ekibiina ky'eby'obufuzi mu 2003 naye nti okuva mu mwaka 1986 ebadde nkola ya mugendo, ebyo byo bigambo bugambo.

translation.en: In 2002 the Constitutional Court ruled that the Movement was a political party disguising as a “system” because it had a chairman and all structures of a party no matter what one called it.
translation.lug: Mu 2002 kkooti ya ssemateeka yasalawo nti NRM kyali kibiina kya bya bufuzi wadde nga kyali kyefula okuba omugendo obugendo kubanga kyalina ssentebe na byonna ebikigwanyiza okuba ekibiina.

translation.en: Is Uganda seeing the dawn of peaceful transition from one political leadership to another or is this just a cosmetic change?
translation.lug: Kati tusuubire nti mu Uganda mujja kubaamu enkyukakyuka ey'emirembe mu bakulembeze b'eby'obufuzi oba kino kifaananyi bufaananyi?

translation.en: In the Independent, in the  Jul 30 - Aug 05, 2010 news, Ken Lukyamuzi was featured under national elections news.
translation.lug: Mu mawulire ga Independent aga Jjulaayi 30 okutuuka ku Agusito 5, 2010 Ken Lukyamuzi yayogerwako mu kitundu ekikwata ku by'okulonda mu ggwanga.

translation.en: Sam Serwanga wrote about the election violence between the years of 1980 and 2011.
translation.lug: Sam Serwanga yawandiika ku bukambwe obweyolekera mu kulonda wakati mu myaka gya 1980 ne 2011.

translation.en: Mr. Nakendo is Vice Chairman of the Military Commission.
translation.lug: Mwami Nakendo ye mumyuka wa ssentebe w'akakiiko k'amagye.

translation.en: "Yoweri Museveni does not have a private army", said Nakendo.
translation.lug: Nakendo yagamba nti "Yoweri Museveni talina magye gage ku bubwe."

translation.en: Museveni, the president of the Uganda Patriotic Movement, one of the four political parties contesting next Wednesday’s general elections, was allegedly said to be commanding and training a private army.
translation.lug: Museveni nga pulezidenti w'ekibiina ky'eby'obufuzi ekiyitibwa UPM, ekimu ku bibiina ebina ebivuganya mu kulondebwa okunaabaawo ku Lwokusatu olujja, kigambibwa nti alina eggye ly'addumira era ly'atendeka.

translation.en: The chairman of the military commission, Mr. Paulo Muwanga disclosed this during a Uganda Peoples Congress rally at Kashongi in Nyabushozi, Museveni’s home area.
translation.lug: Bino byayogerwa Paul Muwanga ssentebe w'akakiiko k'amagye mu lukuŋŋaana lwa UPC olwali e Kashongi mu Nyabushozi ekitundu Museveni gy'asibuka.

translation.en: Muwanga who has been on a six day grueling tour of remote places, addressing Uganda People's Congress rallies in Mpigi, Masaka and Mbarara districts, gave a stern warning to Dr. Bernard Buzabo.
translation.lug: Muwanga amaze ennaku omukaaga ng'alambula ebitundu eby'omukyalo era ng'akuba enkuŋŋaana z'ekibiina kya UPC mu Mpigi, Masaka ne Mbarara, yawa okulabula eri Dr. Bernard Buzabo.

translation.en: Dr. Buzabo who is deputy minister for Animal Industry and Fisheries was told to stop the politics of confrontation, designed to intimidate the Uganda People's Congress supporters in Mbarara North Constituency.
translation.lug: Dr. Buzabo era nga ye mumyuka wa minisita w'eby'obulunzi n'obuvubi yakubirizibwa okulekera awo eby'obufuzi ebirumba abalala era ebirimu ekigendererwa eky'okutiisatiisa abawagizi ba UPC mu Mbarara.

translation.en: Museveni admitted publicly that he owns no private army and that he was not training any force.
translation.lug: Museveni yakyogera kaati nti ye yali talina ggye lirye ku bubwe era nti talina ggye lyonna ly'atendeka.

translation.en: But if anybody is training a private army, that army cannot match the Uganda National Liberation Army which is your army.
translation.lug: Naye singa wabaawo omuntu yenna atendeka eggye erirye ku bubwe, eggye eryo teriyiza kusinga eggye lya Uganda ennunuzi ate nga lye ggye lyammwe.

translation.en: He turned to the county chief of Nyabushozi, a Uganda Patriotic Movement member who was accused of abetting intimidators of the Uganda People's Congress members in the area.
translation.lug: Yakyukira ow'egombolola ly'e Nyabushozi ate nga wa kibiina kya UPM eyali agambibwa okukunga abantu okutiisatiisa aba UPC mu kitundu ekyo.

translation.en: Muwanga said many of the Uganda People's Congress supporters who were killed in Ankole were reported by the former Prime Minister also known as 'Enganzi'.
translation.lug: Muwanga yagamba nti bangi ku b'ekibiina kya UPC abattibwa mu Ankole baali balonkomeddwa eyaliko kattikiro era ng'amanyiddwa nga "Enganzi".

translation.en: Mr. John Kahigiriza is now a Democratic Party Member.
translation.lug: Mwami John Kahigiriza kati ali omu ku bamemba ba DP.

translation.en: The African Investigative Publishing Collective seeks one million signatures to push for electoral reforms.
translation.lug: Ekibiina ekiyitibwa African Investigative Publishing Collective kinoonya emikono kakadde kamu okusobola okukola enkyukakyuka mu by'okulonda.

translation.en: Kizza Besigye, Forum for Democratic Change party leader and Ingrid Turinawe, the party Women League have tested the wrath of the state.
translation.lug: Kizza Besigye omukulembeze w'ekibiina kya FDC ne Ingrid Turinawe, akulira abakazi mu kibiina ekyo banozezzaako ku bukambwe bwa gavumenti.

translation.en: Asuman Basalirwa of the Justice Forum too, has tasted the same.
translation.lug: Asuman Basalirwa ow'ekibiina kya Justice Forum, naye abunozezzaako.

translation.en: They are going to collect one million signatures across the country to back up their petition to parliament.
translation.lug: Bagenda okunoonya emikono akakadde kamu okwetoloola eggwanga lyonna basobole okwanjulira palamenti ensonga yaabwe.

translation.en: This will be for electoral reforms and dissolution of the incumbent Electoral Commission.
translation.lug: Kino kijja kuba kikwata ku nkyukakyuka mu by'okulonda n'okuddaabulula akakiiko k'eby'okulonda akaliko.

translation.en: Kizza Besigye, chairman of the Interparty Corporation Summit, was present at the launch of People’s Power Campaign for Free and Fair Elections.
translation.lug: Kizza Besiggye nga ye ssentebe w'olukuŋŋaana olugatta bannabyabufuzi okuva mu bibina ebitali bimu naye yaliwo mu kutongoza akabiina akayitibwa People Power akalina ekigendererwa eky'okuleetawo enkyukakyuka wasoble okubaawo okukonda okw'amazima n'obwenkanya.

translation.en: This took place at Christ the King in Kampala on August 6 and he said it was targeting all Ugandans to join the opposition.
translation.lug: Kino kyaliwo ku Christ the King e Kampla nga Agusito 6 era yagamba nti kyali kigendererwa kye okulaba nga Bannayuganda bonna beegatta ku ludda oluvuganya gavumenti.

translation.en: The Inter-Party Cooperation has widened the scope of agitation.
translation.lug: Ekibiina kino ekyegattirwamu bannabyabufuzi okuva mu bibiina ebitali bimu kyongedde amaanyi mu nsitaano.

translation.en: Pressure political groups like Ssubbi and any other institutions interested in free and fair elections will be incorperated too.
translation.lug: Ebibiina byonna gamba nga Suubi awamu n'ebirala ebyagala okulonda okw'amazima n'obwenkanya bijja kuyingizibwa.

translation.en: The Inter-Party Cooperation leaders are resolute on stopping Badru Kiggundu’s Electoral Commission from presiding over the 2011 elections.
translation.lug: Abakulembeze b'ekibiina kino ekyegattirwamu bannabyabufuzi okuva mu bibiina eby'enjawulo bamalirivu okulemesa akakiiko ka Badru Kigundu okuteekateeka okulonda kwa 2011.

translation.en: They say the Kiggundu led Electoral Commission is partisan and has been the primary instrument of electoral fraud.
translation.lug: Bagamba nti akakiiko akakulemberwa Kiggundu kalina oludda lwe kawagira era ke kabadde kasinga okukozesebwa okubba obululu.

translation.en: The fraud is on behalf of the National Resistance Movement.
translation.lug: Nga babbira ekibiina kya NRM.

translation.en: They want an independent Electoral Commission based on a clean and verified national voter register.
translation.lug: Baagala wabeewo akakiiko akeetengeredde akanaateekateeka okulonda nga keesigamiziddwa ku nkalala z'abalonzi abatuufu.

translation.en: The Inter-Party Cooperation rejects the voter register compiled by the Electoral Cooperation.
translation.lug: Ekibiina kino ekyegattirwamu bannabyabufuzi okuva mu bibiina ebitali bimu tekakkiriziganya na nkalala z'abalonzi ezaategekebwa akakiiko k'eby'okulonda.

translation.en: The Electoral Commission in its weekly press briefing at its headquarters in Kampala on August 4, the acting chairperson, made an announcement.
translation.lug: Mu lukuŋŋana lw'abamawulire olwaliwo nga 4 ku kitebe ekikulu eky'akakiiko k'eby'okulonda era ng'olukuŋŋaana nga luno lubaawo buli wiiki, oyo akola nga ssentebe yawa ekirango.

translation.en: Joseph Biribonwa, announced that they had discovered 159,419 double or multiple registration cases on the national voters register.
translation.lug: Joseph Biribonwa yagamba nti baali bazudde mu lukalala lw'abalonzi abantu 159,419 abaali beewandisizza emirundi ebiri oba n'okusingawo.

translation.en: A total of fifteen million two thousand seven hundred voters registered out of Uganda’s estimated population of thirty two million people.
translation.lug: Abantu obukadde kkumi na butaano mu emitwalo abiri mu musanvu be balonzi abeewandiisa mu bantu abateeberezebwa okuba obukadde amakumi asatu mu bubiri abali mu Uganda.

translation.en: Apart from increasing pressure for electoral reforms, getting one million signatures also brings to the Inter-Party Cooperation, more supporters on board.
translation.lug: Ng'oggyeko eky'okuteeka akazito ku bikwata ku nkyukakyuka erina okukolebwa mu by'okulonda, okufuna emikono akakadde kamu nakyo kijja kwongera okuleeta abawagizi mu kibiin ky'eby'obufuzi kino ekyegattirwamu bannabyafuzi okuva mu bibiina ebitali bimu.

translation.en: Margret Wokuri, the Coordinator of National Alliance for Free and Fair Elections, said the move will boost them positively.
translation.lug: Margret Wokuri, omukwanaganya w'ekibiina ekirwanirira wabeewo okulonda okw'amazima n'obwenkanya yagamba nti ebinaavaamu bijja kuba birungi nnyo.

translation.en: Ingrid Turinawe appealed to more pressure groups to join the struggle for free and fair elections.
translation.lug: Ingrid Turinawe yakubiriza ebibiina ebiralala okubeegattako mu lutalo luno olw'okulwanirira okulonda okw'amazima n'obwenkanya.

translation.en: It has gained supporters like the Inter-Party Cooperation Youth, National Alliance for Free and Fair Elections and Ssuubi coming on board.
translation.lug: Kimaze okufuna abawagizi okuva mu bibiina eby'enjawulo gamba nga ekyo eky'abavubuka abava mu bibiina eby'enjawulo, ekyo ekirwanirira wabeewo okulonda okw'amazima n'obwenkanya era n'ekya Suubi.

translation.en: Turinawe says the violent clashes during the National Resistance Movement primaries last week was a clear manifestation the party's violence.
translation.lug: Turinawe agamba nti okulwanagana okw'amaanyi okwaliwo wiiki ewedde mu kusunsulibwa kw'ekibiina kya NRM kulaga bulazi nti ekibiina kino kirimu ebikolwa eby'obukambwe.

translation.en: Besigye also condemned the warrant of arrest issued against Uganda People's Congress president Olara Ottunu for alleged sedition.
translation.lug: Besigye era yavumirira ekiwandiiko ekyafulumizibwa okukwata Olara Otunnu pulezidenti wa UPC nga alangibwa okulya mu nsi ye olukwe.

translation.en: The Inter-Party Cooperation regards the summons as direct political persecution.
translation.lug: Ekibiina kino ekyegattirwamu bannabyabufuzi okuva mu bibiina ebitali bimu kitwala ekiwandiiko ekyo okuba okuyigganyizibwa okwenkukunala.

translation.en: The legality of the sedition charge is being challenged in the Constitutional Court.
translation.lug: Tuwakanya obutuufu bw'omusango guno mu kkooti ya ssemateeka.

translation.en: Rukiya Makumaamin’s family is to laugh all the way to the bank.
translation.lug: Ab'omu maka ga Rukiya Makumaamin balina okubaako akamyenyumyenyu okuvira ddala awaka okutuuka ku bbanka.

translation.en: The family of former president Idi Amin is about to pocket $100m as part of a secret deal.
translation.lug: Ab'omu maka ga eyaliko pulezidenti wa Uganda Idi Amin bannatera okwefunira omudidi gwa bukadde kikumi obwa ddola olw'omulimu omwekusifu ogwakolebwa.

translation.en: He brokered this deal with Yasser Arafat who was the Palestine leader, in the 1970s.
translation.lug: Yakwanaganya omulimu guno ne Yasser Arafat eyali pulezidenti wa Palesitina mu myaka gya 1970.

translation.en: Amin’s son Jafari Amin has confirmed that the family is pursuing the cash with the help of Saudi royals.
translation.lug: Mutabani wa Amini ayitibwa Jafari Amini akikakasizza nti ab'omu maka gaabwe baluubirira okufuna sente ezo nga bayambibwako abalangira b'e Saudi.

translation.en: The money was a reward to Amin for shifting his allegiance from Israel to the Arab world.
translation.lug: Ssente ezo zaali kirabo ekyaweebwa Amini olw'okusalawo okuwa Abawarabu ekitiibwa kye yali awa Abaisirayiri.

translation.en: Amin had initially been an ally of Israel which facilitated his coup against Obote in January 1971.
translation.lug: Mu kusooka Amini yali munywanyi wa Isirairi era nga bano be baamuyamba okummamulako Obote mu Jjanwali 1971.

translation.en: However, Amin later changed his political allegiance and in June 1972, he visited various Arab countries announcing his change of allegiance.
translation.lug: Kyokka, oluvannyuma Amin yakyusa endowooza ye mu by'obufuzi era mu Jjuuni 1972 yakyalira amawanga ga Buwarabu agatali gamu era n'abagamba nga kati bw'akolagana nabo mu kifo kya Yisirayiri.

translation.en: King Faisal made a reciprocal visit to Uganda in November 1972.
translation.lug: Awo mu Noovemba  wa 1972 Kabaka Faisal naye yakyala mu Uganda.

translation.en: Prime Minister Prof. Apolo Nsibambi says he has directed the internal affairs minister to put up a policy for the cabinet.
translation.lug: Ssabaminisita Omukenkufu Apolo Nsibambi agamba nti alagidde ekitongole ekikola ku nsonga z'omunda okuteerawo bamanisita enkola ey'okugobererwa.

translation.en: In the Independent of  August 13 - 19, 2010, Chairman and Forum for Democratic Change leader Kizza Besigye displays a campaign document.
translation.lug: Mu lupapula lw'amawulire olwa Independenti olwa Agusito 13 okutuuka nga 19, 2010, lulaga nga ssentebe era omukulembeze wa FDC Dr. Kizza Besigye alaga abantu ekiwandiiko ekikwata ku kampeyini.

translation.en: The campaign document was about free and fair elections at Christ the King on August 6.
translation.lug: Ekiwandiiko kya kampeyini kino kyali kikwata ku kulonda okw'amazima n'obwenkanya era nga kino kyali mu Christ the King nga Agusito 6.

translation.en: Looking on are Inter-Party Cooperations colleagues Asuman Basarirwa and James Kigongo.
translation.lug: Mu bantu abaali awo nga balaba ebigenda mu maaso mwe mwali Asuman Basalirwa ne James Kigongo nga nabo ba mu kibiina ekyegattirwamu bannabyabufuzi abava mu bibiina ebitali bimu.

translation.en: Jimmy, an elderly Rwandan national is cleared to vote at the Rwandan Embassy in Kampala.
translation.lug: Nnamukadde Jimmy nga nzalwa y'e Rwanda akkirizibwa okukubira akalulu ke ku kitebe kya Rwanda mu Uganda e Kampala.

translation.en: This was on the eve of the Rwanda’s general elections on August 9.
translation.lug: Kino kyaliwo mu kiseera Rwanda ng'ekuba akalulu nga Agusito 9.

translation.en: President Kagame won the elections without a doubt.
translation.lug: Awatali kubuusabuusa, pulezidenti Kagame yawangula okulonda okwo.

translation.en: The Independent will host Jimmy soon, for a discussion.
translation.lug: Mu kiseera ekitali kya wala olupapula lw'amawulire olwa Independenti lujja kukyaza Jimmy n'ekigendererwa eky'okukubaganya ebirowoozo.

translation.en: The move is to strengthen public safety systems following July 11 Al-Shabaab terror bombings in Kampala.
translation.lug: Ekigendererwa kye ky'okwongera okunyweza obukuumi eri abantu oluvannyuma lwa bbomu aba Al-Shabaab ze baatulisizza e Kampla mu Jjulaayi nga 11.

translation.en: Uganda has no more former presidents and will have to wait so long to have another ex-president.
translation.lug: Mu Uganda temukyalimu eyaliko pulezidenti era wajja kuyitawo ekiseera kiwanvu nga tewannabaawo mulala.

translation.en: The only surviving ex-president Godfrey Binaisa passed away last week.
translation.lug: Godfrey Binaisa abadde akyasigaddewo ku abaaliko ba pulezidenti naye yafa wiiki ewedde.

translation.en: Binaisa ruled Uganda from June 20, 1979 to May 1980.
translation.lug: Binaisa yafuga Uganda okuva Jjuuni nga 20, 1979 okutuuka Maayi 1980.

translation.en: He was overthrown on May 12, 1980 by the Military Commission headed by Paulo Muwanga whose deputy was Yoweri Museveni.
translation.lug: Akakiiko k'amagye akakulemberwa Paulo Muwanga era nga Yoweri Museveni ye mummyuka waako, kaamummamula ku ntebe mu Maayi nga 12, 1980.

translation.en: Throughout the 1980s and 90s, Binaisa practised law in New York.
translation.lug: Mu myaka gya 1980 n'egya 1990 gyonna Binaisa yali akola nga munnamateeka mu kibuga New York.

translation.en: Other former Ugandan leaders Gen. Tito Okello Lutwa and Apollo Milton Obote passed away in the last 24 years.
translation.lug: Abalala abaaliko abakulembeze ba Uganda gamba nga Generali Tito Okello Lutwa ne Apollo Milton Obote bo baafa dda emyaka nga 24 egiyise.

translation.en: Idi Amin Dada and Paulo Muwanga too passed away.
translation.lug: Idi Amin Dada ne Paulo Muwanga nabo baafa.

translation.en: National Resistance Movement devour each other in what observers fear could be a mirror image of next year’s general elections.
translation.lug: Ab'omu kibiina kya NRM balwanagana bokka na bokka era kino abeetegereza ebigenda mu maaso bagamba nti kiwa ekifaananyi ku ebyo ebijja okubaawo mu kulonda kw'omwaka ogujja.

translation.en: National Resistance Movement has been engulfed in violent elections characterised by shooting, pushing, shoving and accusations of bribery and other election vices.
translation.lug: Ekibiina kya NRM kyenyigidde mu bikolwa eby'obukambwe ebirimu okukuba amasasi, okusindikagana n'okulumiriziganya olw'okugulirira abalonzi awamu n'ebikolwa ebirala ebibi.

translation.en: The most grisly scenes were in Sembabule district last week with Lwemiyaga’s Theodore Sekikubo and Mawogola County’s Sam Kuteesa.
translation.lug: Ebikyasinze okubeerera ddala ebibi byebyo ebyali mu disitulikiti y'e Sembabule wiiki ewedde nga bikwata ku Theodore Sekikubo ow'e Lwemiyaga ne Sam Kuteesa ow'e Mawogola.

translation.en: These two, raised under the same roof, National Resistance Movement, were at it again.
translation.lug: Ababiri bano nga bonna baakulira mu nnyumba y'emu nga kye kibiina kya NRM, baakiddamu nate.

translation.en: Sekikubo taught the Uganda police how to treat an opponent.
translation.lug: Sekikubo yayigiriza poliisi ya Uganda engeri y'okuyisaamu omulabe.

translation.en: He ably took the Sembabule police chief by the collar.
translation.lug: Yasikkambula ebitogi omukulu wa poliisi.

translation.en: Vice President Gilbert Bukenya was accused by his rival, Wakiso district chairman Ian Kyeyune.
translation.lug: Omummyuka wa pulezidenti Gilbert Bukenya yavunaanibwa oyo gw'avuganya naye era ng'ono ye ssentebe wa disitulikiti y'e Wakiso Ian Kyeyune.

translation.en: Ian Kyeyune accused him of bribing voters with a lavish party at his home 12 hours to the voting time.
translation.lug: Ian Kyeyune yamuvunaana okugulirira abalonzi ng'abagabula ekijjulo makeke kye yabategekera mu maka ge ng'ebulayo essaawa 12 okulonda kubeewo.

translation.en: The National Resistance Movement disciplinary committee summoned Bukenya to defend himself against the allegations.
translation.lug: Akakiiko akakwasisa empisa mu kibiina kya NRM kaayita Bukenya yeennyonnyoleko ku ebyo ebyali bimuvunaanwa.

translation.en: Bukenya however snubbed the summons, a reminder that he is still mahogany as before.
translation.lug: Kyokka Bukenya yabuusa amaaso okuyitibwa okwo era kino ne kiraga nti akyali mahogany nga bwe yali.

translation.en: The National Resistance Movement deputy secretary general Dorothy Hyuha, was among the suspects of election vices.
translation.lug: Omumyuka wa Ssabawandiisi w'ekibiina kya NRM Dorothy Hyuha y'omu ku abo abateeberezebwa okubaako ebikyamu bye baakola ku nsonga z'eby'okulonda.

translation.en: Dorothy Hyuha was summoned to face the National Resistance Movement disciplinary committee.
translation.lug: Dorothy Hyuha yayitibwa ku kakiiko akakwasisa empisa mu kibiina kya NRM.

translation.en: The National Resistance Movement house seems to be on fire.
translation.lug: Kirabika ng'ennyumba y'ekibiina kya NRM kati ekutte omuliro.

translation.en: The World Bank and other donors on August 9, fired a warning shot of a 10% cut of their budget support to Uganda.
translation.lug: Bbanka y'ensi yonna awamu n'abagabirizi b'obuyambi abalala nga 9, baawa okulabula okw'amaanyi bwe baasala ku buyambi bwe bawa Uganda ebitundu kkumi ku buli kikumi.

translation.en: This was because the Uganda government had failed to address the “high-level corruption".
translation.lug: Kino kyakolebwa kubanga gavumenti ya Uganda yali eremereddwa okukola ku buli bw'enguzi obukudde eggyembe.

translation.en: ”The donors had planned to give Uganda $360 million for 2010/2011 financial year.
translation.lug: Abagabirizi b'obuyambi baali bategese okuwa Uganda ensimbi ezibalirwa mu ddoola z'Amerika obukadde 360 mu mwaka gw'eby'ensimbi 2010/2011.

translation.en: This was said by Uganda’s aid basket holders.
translation.lug: Kino kyayogerwa abo abavunaanyizibwa ku kuwa Uganda obuyambi.

translation.en: They include the World Bank, European Commission, Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Germany, Ireland, Norway, Netherlands, Sweden and the UK.
translation.lug: Nga mu bano mwe muli Banka ey'ensi yonna, omukago gwa Bulaaya, Austrelia, Bubirigi, Denmark, German, Ireland, Norway, Netherlands, Sweden ne Bungereza.

translation.en: They said the decision followed findings of an appraisal of the government’s performance in 2008/2009 financial year, concluded in early 2010.
translation.lug: Baagamba nti baatuuka ku kusalawo okukola kino oluvannyuma lw'okwetegeereza engeri gavumenti gye yakolamu mu mwaka gw'eby'ensimbi ogwa 2008/2009, ogwafundikirwa mu 2010.

translation.en: The donors are angry at the government for taking no concrete action against several high-level corruption cases in 2008/2009.
translation.lug: Abagabirizi b'obuyambi banyiivu nnyo olwa gavumenti okulemererwa okubaako eky'amaanyi ky'ekolawo ku misango gy'obuli bw'enguzi mu mwaka 2008/2009.

translation.en: The cases were especially those cited in the Commonwealth Heads Of Government Meeting audit reports of 2008.
translation.lug: Okusingira ddala emisango egyo gyegyo egyayogerwako mu alipoota y'olukuŋŋaana lw'abakulembeze b'amawanga agali mu lusse olumu ne Bungereza eya 2008 ekwata ku by'embalirira.

translation.en: “More than a year after the Commonwealth Heads Of Government Meeting audit reports were issued, insufficient action had been taken", donors said.
translation.lug: Mu bbanga erisukka omwaka omulamba oluvannyuma lw'alipoota eyo okufulumizibwa, abagabirizi b'obuyambi bagamba nti tewaliwo kya maanyi kikoleddwa.

translation.en: In the 2008/2009 financial year, foreign aid accounted for 30 per cent of the national budget.
translation.lug: Mu mwaka gw'eby'ensimbi ogwa 2008/2009, obuyambi obuva ebweru bwali ebitundu asatu ku buli kikumi mu mbalirira y'eggwanga.

translation.en: An arrest warrant for Olara Otunnu, the Uganda People's Congress President, was sent out to anyone who knows his whereabouts.
translation.lug: Ekiwandiiko ekyafulumizibwa okukwata Olara Otunnu, pulezidenti wa UPC kyawerezebwa buli muntu yenna eyali amanyi amayitire ge.

translation.en: It was mandated to cause his arrest and to be presented to Lira Grade One Magistrate’s Court on sedition and sectarianism charges.
translation.lug: Yali alina okukwatibwa atwalibwe mu kkooti y'omulamuzi asookerwako e Lira ng'avunaanibwa emisango gy'okulyamu ensi ye olwe n'okukutulakutula mu bantu.

translation.en: Magistrate Faith Everest Palodi, issued a warrant of arrest for the former United Nations man for failing to appear in court to answer the charges.
translation.lug: Omulamjuzi Faith Everest Palodi yafulumya ekiwandiiko ky'okukwata eyali omukungu w'Ekibiina ky'Amawanga Amagatte olw'okulemererwa okulabikako mu kkooti. olw'emisango egimuvunaanibwa.

translation.en: But Otunnu is no easy chap.
translation.lug: Otunnu naye si muntu mwangu.

translation.en: In a News round-up in the Independent on  August 13 - 19, Andrew Mwenda wrote.
translation.lug: Mu lupapula lw'amawulire olwa Independenti olwa Agusito nga 13 okutuuka nga 19, Andrew Mwenda yawandiika.

translation.en: In the summer of 1995, former United States president, Jimmy Carter, organised a conference on Rwanda in Tunis.
translation.lug: Mu kyeya kya 1995, Jimmy Carter eyaliko pulezidenti w'Amerika yateekateeka olukuŋŋaana mu kibuga Tunis nga lukwata ku Rwanda.

translation.en: The conference was to “convince" the Rwandan Patriotic Front to be more ethnically inclusive by appointing Hutu politicians to cabinet.
translation.lug: Ekigendererwa ky'olukuŋŋaana olwo kwali okumatiza gavumenti ya Rwanda okussaawo kabineeti ey'ekintabuli nga mulimu ne bannabyabufuzi Abahutu.

translation.en: In attendance were the presidents of Rwanda’s neighbours; Zaire’s Mobutu Sese Seko, Uganda’s Yoweri Museveni and Tanzania’s Ali Hassan Mwinyi.
translation.lug: Mu lukuŋŋaana olwo mwalimu baliraanwa ba Rwanda gamba nga pulezidenti wa Zaire Mobutu Sese Seko, owa Uganda Yoweri Museveni n'owa Tanzania Ali Hassan Mwinyi.

translation.en: Rwanda’s Pasteur Bizimungu was in attendance as well as former Tanzanian president, Julius Nyerere.
translation.lug: Mwalimu ne pulezidenti wa Rwanda Pasteur Bizimungu awamu ne eyaliko pulezidenti wa Tanzaniya Julius Nyerere.

translation.en: During the coffee break, they sat down for an informal chat with Carter.
translation.lug: Bwe baali nga banywa ku kakyayi, balina bye baayogerako ne Carter.

translation.en: The former United States president turned to Bizimungu and asked him why he doesn't appoint a few Hutu into his cabinet.
translation.lug: Eyaliko pulezidenti wa Amerika yabuuza Bizimungu ensonga lwaki tabaako Abahutu b'alonda okubeera ku kabineeti.

translation.en: Bizimungu requested Carter to direct the question to Nyerere.
translation.lug: Bizimungu yasaba Carter ekibuuzo ekyo akibuuze Nyerere.

translation.en: Carter asked Julius pensively, “why can’t the Rwandan Patriotic Front appoint at least one Hutu to cabinet?”
translation.lug: Carter yabuuza Julius nti, "Lwaki gavumenti ya Rwanda terondayo waakiri omu ku Bahutu n'abeera ku kabineeti?"

translation.en: "This would reflect ethnic inclusion” Carter added.
translation.lug: Carter yagattako nti singa kino kikolebwa kyandiraze nti tewaliiwo busosoze mu mawanga.

translation.en: Nyerere answered in his characteristic sarcastic style; “I do not answer questions about tribes".
translation.lug: Nyerere yaddamu mu ngeri ye ey'okujeregerera nti: "Nze siddamu bibuuzo bikwata ku mawanga".

translation.en: "Ask Mobutu over there since he is the master of tribal politics", Julius added.
translation.lug: Julius yagattako nti buuza Mobutu wuuwo okuva bwe kiri nti ye kakensa w'eby'obufuzi ebyawula mu mawangaa.

translation.en: A frustrated Carter turned to Africa’s iconic predator.
translation.lug: Carter ng'atabuddwa, yakyukira ensolo enkambwe ey'omu Afirika.

translation.en: “Mr President,” he began, looking in the eyes of Mobutu, “why can’t the Rwandan Patriotic Front appoint a Hutu politician to cabinet?
translation.lug: "Ow'ekitiibwa pulezidenti," awo n'atunuulira Mobutu mu maaso, "lwaki mu kabineeti ya Rwanda temuli bannabyabufuzi Abahutu?"

translation.en: The Prime Minister Faustin Twagiramungu is also a Hutu.
translation.lug: Ssabaminisita Faustin Twagiramungu naye Muhutu.

translation.en: Some Rwandans seated at a table beyond, immediately drew up a list of the cabinet and gave it to Carter.
translation.lug: Abanyarwanda abalala abaali batudde awo ku mmeeza ne batandika okunokolayo abalala, era amangu ago ne bakola olukalala lwa baminisita ne baluwa Carter.

translation.en: More than 60 percent of ministers were actually Hutu.
translation.lug: Ebitundu ebisukka mu nkaaga ku buli kikumi baali baminisita Abahutu.

translation.en: Carter was shocked and turned to all the other leaders and asked: “Why then are we holding this conference?”
translation.lug: Carter yawuniikirira nnyo era n'akyukira abakulembeze abalala bonna n'ababuuza nti: "Kati olwo olukuŋŋaana luno lwaki?"

translation.en: This farce tends to characterise a lot of political discussions about Rwanda in Western media but most worryingly in Africa.
translation.lug: Kino kigendereddwamu okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku Rwanda ku mikutu gy'amawulire egy'e Bulaaya naye ng'okusingira ddala kikanga abali mu Afirika.

translation.en: The narrative on Rwanda about Hutu and Tutsi nursing hatred has been spanning for centuries.
translation.lug: Okumala ebyesa n'ebyasa kibadde kyogerwa nti Abahutu n'Abatusi tebaagalanira ddala.

translation.en: It is one of those grand distortions of history that has left an indelible mark on Rwanda's politics.
translation.lug: Obulimba ng'obwo obuli mu byafaayo bwe busiize enziro ku by'obufuzi bwa Rwanda.

translation.en: There is no writing of precolonial Rwanda that shows that the Hutu-Tutsi had constituted an antagonistic relationship.
translation.lug: Tewaliiwo biwandiiko ebikwata ku Rwanda ng'abafuzi b'amatwale tebannajja biraga nti Abatusi n'Abahutu babaddenga tebaagalana.

translation.en: Indeed, even the broader story of deeply entrenched ethnic hatreds between African tribes is part of this distorted narrative.
translation.lug: Mu butuufu n'ebyafaayo ebikwata ku bulabe obwasimba amakanda mu mawanga g'omu Afirika kitundu ku bulimba buno.

translation.en: This narrative was fostered by 19th century European sociology and political anthology.
translation.lug: Bino byonna byasavuwazibwa omuntu omu okuva mu Bulaaya mu kyasa ekya 19.

translation.en: Political tribalism in Africa is as modern as the ipad that is created and recreated by elites daily.
translation.lug: Eby'obufuzi bya Afirika ebyesigamiziddwa ku njawukana mu mawanga si bikadde nga bw'olaba essimu ezikolebwa ate ne ziddamu okukolebwa buli lunaku.

translation.en: It is not surprising therefore that an Afrobarometer survey of 2009 found ethnic consciousness strongest among elites than ordinary peasants.
translation.lug: Kale tekyewuunyisa nti okusinziira ku kunoonyereza okwakolebwa mu 2009 kyazuulibwa nti enjawukana mu mawanga okusinga eri abo abatwalibwa okuba abagezi ennyo okusinga bw'eri mu bantu aba wansi.

translation.en: Sadly, many African intellectuals and elites accept European anthropology as a fact.
translation.lug: Eky'ennaku kiri nti abagezi bangi mu Afirika batwala endowooza y'abazungu okuba nti ye ntuufu.

translation.en: They don't know that some of our continent’s largest “tribes” like Kikuyu and Yoruba were created by the colonial state.
translation.lug: Tebakimanyi nti amawanga agamu agasinga obunene mu ssemazinga waffe gamba nga Abakyukuyu n'Abayoruba gaatondebwawo abafuzi b'amatwale.

translation.en: But once created, these identities took on a life of their own.
translation.lug: Naye kasita gaamala okutondebwawo ne gatandika okugoberera empisa ezaabwe ku bwabwe.

translation.en: For example, Rwandan Patriotic Front recently changed the name of the genocide from the “Rwandan genocide” to the “Tutsi genocide".
translation.lug: Ng'ekyokulabirako, gye buvuddeko awo gavumenti ya Rwanda yakyusa erinnya ly'ekitta bantu okuva ku "Kitta bantu ekyali e Rwanda" ne liba "Ekitta abatuusi."

translation.en: Because its legitimacy is partly based on having ended genocide, Rwandan Patriotic Front has constantly used the genocide to promote itself politically.
translation.lug: Olw'okuba baakola kinene okukomya ekitta bantu, gavumenti ya Rwanda yeyongedde okukozesa ekitta bantu ekyo okwenywereza mu bufuzi.

translation.en: There is also a possibility of focusing on public policy as a campaign platform and recognising the dangers Rwanda faces from ethnic politics.
translation.lug: Ate essira liyinza okuteekebwa ku nkola erina okugobererwa abantu bonna era kino ne kikozesebwa okulaga obuzibu Rwanda bw'eyolekaganye nabwo mu by'obufuzi obwesigamiziddwa ku njawukana mu mawanga.

translation.en: Politicians in the West can fight over public policy issues like healthcare.
translation.lug: Bannabyabufuzi mu mawanga g'Abazungu basobola okulwanirira ensonga ezikwata ku bantu gamba ng'ensonga ekwata ku by'obulamu.

translation.en: Africans are expected to fight over identity.
translation.lug: Abafirika bo balwanirira kumanyika.

translation.en: In pitching their campaign on public policy issues, the Social Democratic Party has made itself look like pretenders in the race.
translation.lug: Nga kampeyini yaabwe bagyesigamizizza ku nsonga ezikwata ku bantu bonna, ekibiina kya Social Democratic Party kiringa ekisaagirira obusaagirizi.

translation.en: In other words, they are Kagame’s auxiliaries.
translation.lug: Mu ngeri endala, bawagizi ba Kagame.

translation.en: It is clear to me that Rwandans are not very boisterous.
translation.lug: Kati nkitegeera bulungi nti Abanyarwanda si bantu bazibu nnyo.

translation.en: For those who ignore specificity, they conclude that this is because the Rwandan Patriotic Front and Kagame have suffocated free speech.
translation.lug: Abantu ababuusa amaaso ebintu ebyenkukunala, bawunzika bagamba nti eno ye nsonga lwaki gavumenti ya Rwanda ne Kagame bamazeewo eddembe ery'okwogera.

translation.en: The Independent of  August 13 - 19, 2010 said those who know Rwanda well, will tell a crowd attending an oppostion party campaign.
translation.lug: Olupapula lw'amawulire oluyitibwa Independenti olwa Agusito nga 13 okutuuk nga 19, 2010 lwagamba nti abo abamanyi obulungi Rwanda basobola okutegeera abantu ababa bali mu lukuŋŋaana lw'ekibiina ky'eby'obufuzi ekivuganya gavumenti.

translation.en: Oppostion parties in Rwanda include Social Democratic Party.
translation.lug: Mu bibiina by'obufuzi ebiri e Rwanda mwe muli ekya Social Democratic Party.

translation.en: It could be that the five hundred years of strong and authoritarian states has given Rwandans a distinct deference to authority.
translation.lug: Kiyinzika okuba nti emyaka ebitaano egy'obufuzi obw'amaanyi era obwannakyemalira bwe busobozesezza Abanyarwanda okuba n'obuyinza obw'enjawulo.

translation.en: Rwandans seem obedient to a fault.
translation.lug: Kirabika Abanyarwanda oli ne bw'aba mukyamu baba bawulize gy'ali.

translation.en: On August 4, I drove from Kigali to Kirehe near the border to Tanzania.
translation.lug: Nga 4 Agusito, nnavuga nnenva e Kigali ne ŋŋenda e Kirehe okumpi n'ensalo y'e Tanzaniya.

translation.en: I was shocked at the masses of people who were walking on foot to go attend Kagame’s rally there.
translation.lug: Nnewuunya nnyo bwe nnalaba enkuyanja y'abantu abali batambuza ebigere nga bagenda mu lukuŋŋaana lwa Kagame.

translation.en: At Kagame’s rallies, I was continuously struck by the level and effectiveness of organisation.
translation.lug: Nga ndi mu lukuŋŋaana lwa Kagame nneeyongera okwewuunya engeri gye lwali lutegekeddwamu obulungi.

translation.en: This level of organisation is only made possible by the obedience of ordinary Rwandans to what the authorities have told them.
translation.lug: Entegeka ennungi ey'ekika kino ebaawo olw'okuba Abanyarwanda aba bulijjo bawulize eri ab'obuyinza ababa babagambye okukikola.

translation.en: The Permanent Secretary of Ministry of Defence, Jack Nziza, said that even under former President Habyarimana, this capacity for mobilisation existed.
translation.lug: Omuwandiis ow'enkalakalira mu minisutule y'eby'okwerinda Jack Nziza yagamba nti ne mu bufuzi bwa Habyarimana eyaliko pulezidenti wa Rwanda, kino bwe kityo bwe kyabanga.

translation.en: “Rwanda has always had a strong state,” Nziza said wistfully.
translation.lug: Nziza yagamba nti bulijjo Rwanda ebaddenga ne gavumenti ya maanyi.

translation.en: The problem was that Habyarimana did not employ this vital national asset for development but largely for remaining in power.
translation.lug: Ekizibu ekyaliwo kiri nti Habyarimana teyakozesa bantu bano mu ngeri ey'okukulaakulanya ensi wabula okwenywereza mu buyinza.

translation.en: If the Rwandan Patriotic Front seeks to undermine free expression, it is easy for them to secure compliance from the population.
translation.lug: Bwe kiba nti gavumenti ya Rwanda erina ekigendererwa eky'okumalawo eddembe ly'okweyogerera, kino kiba kibasobozesa okuleetera abantu bonna okuba abawulize.

translation.en: Rwanda enjoys the rare capacity of an African state that has unprecedented capacity to penetrate society and the public with its desires.
translation.lug: Rwanda obutafaananako nsi yonna mu Afirika esobola bulungi okutuukirira abantu nga bw'eba eyagadde.

translation.en: John Bosco Nivuyekure, aged 28, is a Hutu peasant in Ngoma, Rwanda.
translation.lug: John Bosco Nivuyekure ow'emyaka 28, Muhutu era mulimi mu kitundu ekiyitibwa Ngoma, mu Rwanda.

translation.en: I met him at a poorly attended rally of Ntawurikuryayo on August 7.
translation.lug: Nnamusanga mu lukuŋŋaana olutaalimu bantu bangi olwali tutegekeddwa Ntawurikuryayo nga 7 Agusito.

translation.en: He was soft spoken, laid back and expressed little enthusiasm in his candidate while others sang and chanted support for Ntawurikuriryayo.
translation.lug: Yali ayogeza simbo, ng'atudde emabega era nga talaga ssanyu lingi eri oyo eyali yeesimbyewo wadde ng'abalala baali bayimba era nga bwe bajaganya nga bawagira Ntawurikuriryayo.

translation.en: Nivuyekure said he joined Social Democratic Party because it stands for justice, development and social welfare.
translation.lug: Nivuyekure yagamba nti yayingira ekibiina ky'eby'obufuzi ekya Democratic Party kubanga kirwanirira obwenkanya, okukulaakulana n'embeera z'abantu.

translation.en: When I asked why there were so few people out to support the Social Democratic Party, Nivuyekure had an answer.
translation.lug: Bwe nnabuuza ensonga lwaki abantu baali batono nnyo abaali bazze okuwagira ekibiina kya Social Democratic Party, Nivuyekure yalina eky'okuddamu.

translation.en: He said that people who do not support Rwandan Patriotic Front are afraid to be seen publicly.
translation.lug: Yagamba nti abantu abatawagira kibiina ky'eby'obufuzi ekifuga Rwanda batya okuvaayo mu lwatu.

translation.en: He said that, the local leaders who are largely Rwandan Patriotic Front will discriminate against you if you support other political parties.
translation.lug: Yagamba nti abakulembeze b'ekitundu ate ng'abasinga obungi ku bo ba mu kibiina ekifuga bakusosola bw'owagira ekibiina ekirala.

translation.en: One of the greatest achievements Rwanda has registered over the last ten years is the impersonal application of public policy.
translation.lug: Ekimu ku bintu ebikulu ennyo Rwanda by'etuuseeko mu myaka kkumi egiyise kwe kussa mu nkola ebyo ebikwata ku bantu aba bulijjo.

translation.en: I asked Nivuyekure if his children are stopped from going to school or his family is denied fertilizers or mutual health.
translation.lug: Nnabuuza Nivuyekure obanga abaana be balemesebwa okugenda ku ssomero era obanga ab'omu maka ge tebaweeebwa bigimusa oba obujjanjabi bwe beetaaga.

translation.en: This was because some over enthusiastic “Rwandan Patriotic Front-looking” election official came asking for our accreditation, which he did not have.
translation.lug: Kyali kityo kubanga abamu ku abo abalabika ng'abawigira ennyo ekibiina ekiri mu buyinza ekya Rwanda bajja babuuza ebisaanyizo ate nga ye yali tabirina.

translation.en: Sam Mutabaruka is another Social Democratic Party supporter I met at Ntawukuriryayo rally in Bugesera.
translation.lug: Ate era mu lukuŋŋaana olwo olwali mu Ntawukuriryayo mu Bugesera n'asangayo Sam Mutabaruka era nga naye muwagizi w'ekibiina kya Social Democratic Party.

translation.en: Hutu and 33 years, he had the look of an educated and enlightened man.
translation.lug: Yali Muhutu era ng'aweza emyaka 33 egy'obukulu. Yali alabika ng'omuntu omuyigirize.

translation.en: However, people and their leaders at the local level do not understand this.
translation.lug: Kyokka abantu ab'omu kyalo awamu n'abakulembeze baabwe kino tebakitegera.

translation.en: He said that Rwandan Patriotic Front leaders at the local level want to please their bosses in Kigali.
translation.lug: Yagamba nti abakulembeze b'ekibiina ekiri mu buyinza abali ku mutendera ogwa wansi baagala kusanyusa bakama baabwe abali e Kigali.

translation.en: They did this by showing that everyone in their area supports Kagame.
translation.lug: Kino bakikola nga baagala okulaga nti buli muntu mu kitundu kyabwe awagira Kagame.

translation.en: That is if you are not in Rwandan Patriotic Front supporters.
translation.lug: Nnaddala bw'obanga toli muwagizi w'ekibiina ekiri mu buyinza.

translation.en: “This tendency needs not be dictated by the centre,” Mutabaruka told me pensively.
translation.lug: Kino bakama baabwe abali e Kigali si be basaanidde okukikkakkatika ku bantu," Mutabaruka kino yakyogera nga mwenyamivu.

translation.en: That is why Social Democratic Party wants power sharing to begin at village level.
translation.lug: Eno ye nsonga lwaki ab'ekibiina kya Social Democratic Party baagala okugabana obuyinza kutandkire ku mutendera gw'ekyalo.

translation.en: This is important to undermine the tendency of lower level cadres using subtle ways to induce people to join Rwandan Patriotic Front.
translation.lug: Kino kikulu nnyo okusobola okuggyawo endowooza y'abafuzi b'omu byalo abakozesa engeri enneekusifu okuleetera abantu okuyingira mu kibiiina ekiri mu buyinza.

translation.en: However, Rwandan Patriotic Front has been dragging its feet on this matter because they are profiting from the current situation.
translation.lug: Kyokka ekibiina ekiri mu buyinza mu Rwanda kikyasimbidde ekkuli ensonga eno kubanga be bakiganyulwamu.

translation.en: In the end, Kagame romped the election with 93 percent of the votes.
translation.lug: Ku nkomerero, Kagame yawangula okulonda n'ebitundu 93 ku buli kikumi.

translation.en: That is for the people of Rwanda to decide.
translation.lug: Ekyo Abanyarwanda be balina okukisalawo.

translation.en: Yet the size of Kagame’s victory only reflects the complexity of Rwanda’s politics.
translation.lug: Kyokka obuwanguzi bwa Kagame obwo bwoleka bwolesi nti eby'obufuzi bw'e Rwanda si byangu.

translation.en: The Rwandan state under Kagame has been effective in almost all the policy issues.
translation.lug: Gavumenti ya Rwanda ng'ekulemberwa Kagame ekola bulungi kumpi ku buli nsonga yonna.

translation.en: However, the major issue an opposition candidate can build  on for a strong profile is ethnicity, which is legitimately prohibited in Rwanda.
translation.lug: Kyokka ensonga esinga obukulu abo abali ku ludda oluvuganya gavumenti gye bayinza okussaako essira ye njawukana mu mawanga era nga kino tekikkirizibwa wonna mu Rwanda.

translation.en: In other words, the opposition candidates have been forced to run on issues where Kagame holds all the aces.
translation.lug: Kyokka abo abeesimbawo ku ludda oluvuganya gavumenti bawamanta buwamansi ensonga ku ebyo byonna Kagame by'asobodde okukola.

translation.en: In Rwanda the population is 50% Catholics, 40% Protestants and 10% Muslims.
translation.lug: Mu Rwanda abantu ebitundu ataano ku buli kikumi bakatoliki, ana ku buli kikumi bapolositanti ate ekkumi ku buli kikumi basiraamu.

translation.en: Social Development Party candidate Ntawukuriryayo, votes Liberal Party candidate Higiro votes.
translation.lug: Ntawukuriryayo eyeesimbyewo okukiikirira ekibiina kya Social Development Party alonda, ne Higiro owa Liberal Party naye n'alonda.

translation.en: Rwandan Patriotic Front candidate Kagame casts his vote.
translation.lug: Kagame ow'ekibiina ekiri mu buyinza naye n'asula akalulu ke.

translation.en: In the Independent of  August 13 - 19, 2010, Muganwa Gonzaga said the Rwandan Patriotic Front’s Chairman, Paul Kagame, drew unprecedented crowds.
translation.lug: Mu  mawulire ga Independenti aga Agusito nga 13 okutuuka Agusito nga 19, Muganwa Gonzaga yagamba nti ssentebe w'ekibiina ekiri mu buyinza Paul Kagame yasikiriza enkuyanja y'abantu.

translation.en: It opened on July 20, at Amahoro stadium in Kigali and got bigger in the countryside.
translation.lug: Lwatandika nga 20 Jjulaayi mu kisaawe ky'omupiira eky'e Amahoro mu Kigali ne lugenda nga lweyongera okugejja okutuukira ddala mu bitundu eby'omu byalo.

translation.en: Even in unexpected areas like the north western districts of Nyabihu and Rubavu, people were cheering and dancing for Kagame.
translation.lug: Wadde ne mu bitundu gye kitasuubirwa gamba nga mu bukiikadyo bwa disitulikiti y'e Nyabihu ne Rubavu, abantu baali booleka obuwagizi bwabwe eri Kagame nga bwe bazina n'amazina.

translation.en: This is a region that had been the stronghold of former president Juvenal Habyarimana and his Akazu clan.
translation.lug: Ekitundu kino pulezidenti Juvenal Habyarimana n'ekika kye ekya Akazu gye baali basinga okuba n'amaanyi.

translation.en: The crowds that greeted Kagame indicated how much the Rwandan leader has served as a unifying force in post-genocide Rwanda.
translation.lug: Eky'okuba nti abantu bangi bwe batyo baayaniriza Kagame, kiraga engri omukulembeze wa Rwanda gy'asobodde okugatta abantu oluvannyuma lw'ekitta bantu ekyali e Rwanda.

translation.en: This has been set up by refugees seeking to return to Rwanda, to a mass movement that encompasses many supporters.
translation.lug: Embeera eno eteereddwawo abanoonyi b'obubudamu abaagala okuddayo e Rwanda basseewo ekibiina ekinaabaamu abawagizi abangi ennyo.

translation.en: In preparation for this second multi-party election in the history of the country, the Rwandan Patriotic Front seemed well prepared.
translation.lug: Mu kuteekateeka okulonda okw'omulundi ogwokubiri okwenyigiddemu ebibiina by'obufuzi ebitali bimu mu byafaayo bya Rwanda, ekibiina ekiri mu buyinza kirabika ng'ekyetegese obulungi.

translation.en: If his detractors cannot recognize the support he enjoys, Kagame said, "they can reach for the nearest rope and hang".
translation.lug: Kagame yagamba nti bwe kiba nga waliwo abatalaba buwagizi bw'alina, "bayinza okufuna omuguwa ne beetuga."

translation.en: After seven years of presidency, Kagame has been credited with doubling the economy and  lowering crime.
translation.lug: Kigambibwa nti oluvannyuma lw'emyaka musanvu nga Kagame ye pulezidenti, asobodde okukubisaamu emirundi ebiri mu by'enfuna bya Rwanda era n'okukendeza obumenyi bw'amateeka.

translation.en: Paul Kagame is re-elected easily on his record of improving food security, empowering women and building up Rwanda’s social welfare system.
translation.lug: Kyangu nnyo okuddamu okulonda Kagame okusinziira ku ebyo by'akoze gamba nga okuyamba abantu okuba n'emmere emala, abakyala okubawa obuyinza n'okudaabulula ebyo ebyekuusa ku mbeera z'abantu.

translation.en: Nevertheless, these accomplishments have been overshadowed in recent weeks by the shooting of former Rwandese General, Kayumba Nyamwasa, in South Africa.
translation.lug: Kyokka ebirungi bino byonna byasaanawo mu wiiki ntono eziyise Kayumba Nyamwasa bwe yakubibwa amasasi mu South Afirika.

translation.en: Also the mysterious murder of Green Party official Andre Kagwa Rwisereka, the arrest of politicians and the closure of two critical newspapers.
translation.lug: N'ekirala lye ttemu eryatuusibwa ku mukungu wa Green Party Andre Kagwa Rwisereka, okusiba bannabyabufuzi n'okuggalawo empapula z'amawulire ebbiri ez'amaanyi.

translation.en: It was only the Social Democratic Party Permanent Secretary, Imberakuri managing to be officially recognised.
translation.lug: Omuwandiisi ow'enkalakalira mu kibiina kya Social Democratic Party, Imberakuri ye yekka eyakkirizibwa mu mateeka.

translation.en: However, Permanent Secretary, Imberakuri later failed to compete in the election after an internal squabble.
translation.lug: Kyokka oluvannyuma omuwandiisi ono ow'enkalakalira, Imberakuri yalemererwa okuvuganya mu kulonda olw'ebizibu eby'omunda.
