translation.en: This led to a split and the ouster of its founding chairman, Bernard Ntaganda, who is in prison on charges of violence.
translation.lug: Kino kyaleetawo enjawukana era n'okuggyibwako kwa ssentebe waakyo eyakitandikawo, Bernard Ntaganda, kati ali mu kkomera olw'emisango egyekuusa ku bikolwa eby'obukambwe.

translation.en: The Democratic Green Party led by Frank Habineza failed to get registered as did the United Democratic Forces led by Victoire Ingabire.
translation.lug: Ekibiina kya Democratic Green Party ekikulemberwa Frank Habineza kyalemererwa okuwandiisibwa era n'ekya United Democratic Forces ekikulemberwa Victoire Ingabire nakyo kyalemererwa.

translation.en: Ingabire had controversial stances on the Rwanda Patriotic Front’s behavior in ending the genocide.
translation.lug: Ingabire yalina endowooza ez'enjawulo ku ngeri ekibiina kya Rwanda Patriotic Front gye kyeyisaamu nga kikomya ekitta bantu.

translation.en: Her statements on the treatment of Hutus too led to criminal charges that kept her movements restricted.
translation.lug: Bye yayogera ku ngeri Abahutu gye baayisibwamu kyamuviirako okuvunaanibwa emisango egyekuusa ku ttemu era kino kyamuviirako okukugirwa okutambula.

translation.en: It is the long established parties, such as the Social Democratic Party, led by its secretary general and deputy speaker of parliament.
translation.lug: Ebibiina ebyali byatandikibwawo edda gamba nga ekya Social Democratic Party ekikulemberwa ssabawandiisi waakyo n'omumyuka w'omwogezi wa palamenti.

translation.en: The Liberal Party, led by Senator Higiro and the Party for Progress and Concord, led by Senator Mukabaramba Alvera, entered the race.
translation.lug: Waliwo n'ebibiina ebirala ebyayingira mu lwokaano gamba nga ekya Liberal Party ekikulemberwa Omubaka Higiro n'ekya Party for Progress and Concord ekikulemberwa Omubaka Mukabaramba Alvera.

translation.en: Liberal Party, a party known to command a disproportionately high level of genocide survivors in its leadership.
translation.lug: Kimanyiddwa nti ekibiina kya Liberal Party kikulemberwa abantu bangi nnyo abasumattuka ekittabantu.

translation.en: This including Higiro himself, promised to deal with the issue of compensation for genocide victims.
translation.lug: Abantu abo nga mw'otwalidde Higiro kennyini, baasuubiza nti bajja kukola ku nsonga ey'okusasulira abo bonna abaakosebwa ekitta bantu ekyo.

translation.en: Social Democratic Party promised more open public debate on major policy changes.
translation.lug: Ekibiina kya Democratic Party kyasuubiza nti kijja kwogera nnyo ku nkyukakyuka ezirina okukolebwa ku ebyo ebiruma abantu.

translation.en: Those changes have been interpreted as an appeal to those disgruntled by the shift from French to English in Rwandese society.
translation.lug: Enkyukakyuka ezo zitwalibwa okuba omulanga ogukubiddwa eri abo bonna abatali bamativu n'ekyo Rwanda kye yakola eky'okuva ku Lufalaansa n'edda ku Lungereza.

translation.en: Inside Rwanda, the situation was not nearly as controversial or repressive as the outside media made it sound.
translation.lug: Mu Rwanda embeera yali terabika kuba mbi nnyo nga bwe kyali kiwulika ku mikuttu gy'ebweru egy'eby'empuliziganya.

translation.en: Posters, colors and giant billboards of the dominant Rwandan Patriotic Front, were on the streets of Kigali and across the country side.
translation.lug: Ebipande ebinene n'ebitono awamu ne langi z'ekibiina kya Rwandan Patriotic Front byali ku nguudo zonna ez'omu Kigali n'okutuukira ddala mu byalo.

translation.en: Otherwise the sort of tension that tends to characterise African elections was absent.
translation.lug: Wadde kyali kityo, obunkenke obutera okubawo mu biseera eby'okulonda mu Afirika tebwaliwo.

translation.en: The population know that Kagame is not going anywhere soon, so confidence and support in him is widespread.
translation.lug: Abantu bonna bakimanyi bulungi nti Kagame talina gy'alaga mu kiseera kino, n'olwekyo obuwagizi bw'alina bwa maanyi nnyo.

translation.en: On July 4, the Chief of Defence Forces, Gen Aronda received a radio message believed to be a threat.
translation.lug: Nga Jjulaayi 4 akulira amaggye ga Uganda Generali Aronda yafuna essimu eyamutuusaako obubaka obutiisatiisa.

translation.en: Whatever little they were willing to give, they channeled to Non Government Organizations and wasteful United Nation agencies.
translation.lug: Ka kibe kitono kitya kye baali baagala okuwaayo, baakizza mu bibiina by'obwannakyewa ne mu bitongole ebirala eby'ekibiina ky'amawanga amagatte.

translation.en: Uganda National Chamber of Commerce and Industry has strengthening networks all over the country through its branches.
translation.lug: Ekitongole kya Uganda ekikola ku by'ensubulagana n'amakolero kirina enkola ennungi ennyo mu ggwanga lyonna okuyitira mu matabi gaayo.

translation.en: That is about one third the pressure on the centre in Uganda compared to Kenya.
translation.lug: Kino ekikoleddwa kitundu kimu kyakusatu bw'ogeraageranya Uganda ne Kenya.

translation.en: Alex Mugisha, a Makerere alumni, says strikes are part of the University culture.
translation.lug: Alex Mugisha omuyizi w'e Makerere agamba nti okwekalakasa mpisa ya Yunivasite.

translation.en: The new plane has been christened Bukoba in recognition of the business support Precision Air enjoys from people in that region.
translation.lug: Ennyonyi empya ettumiddwa erinnya Bukoba olw'obuwagizi ekitongole ekyo eky'ennyonyi bwekifuna okuva mu bantu b'omu kitundu.

translation.en: Australia’s fosters Nile Breweries parent company is considering a stake in Foster’s Group beer operations but has not decided on making a formal offer.
translation.lug: Kampuni ya Australia ensogozi y'omwenge eyitibwa fosters eyazaala kampuni ya Nile Breweries erowooza ku ky'okufuna omugabo mu makolero amalala agasogola omwenge naye ebadde tennasalawo.

translation.en: A number of potential suitors including SABMiller and Japanese Asahi have been looking at the business since Foster’s announced formal plans to split its beer and wine operations earlier this year.
translation.lug: Abawabi abawerako nga mw'otwalidde SABMiller ne Japanese Asahi babadde batunuulira busineesi bukya ekkolero lya fosters liraga enteekateeka zaalyo ez'okwala bbiya ku nvinyo.

translation.en: Foster’s runs one of the highest margin brewing operations in the world.
translation.lug: Aba Fosters be basinga okusogola omwenge mu nsi yonna.

translation.en: Its brands include Foster’s Lager, Victoria Bitter and Pure Blonde.
translation.lug: Omwenge gwe basogola guzingiramu ebikka gamba nga Foster's Lager, Victoria Bitter ne Pure Blonde.

translation.en: By the end of last year, the company’s debt obligations stood at thirteen point six billion compared to seven point seven billion in 2008.
translation.lug: Ku nkomerero y'omwaka oguwedde, kampuni eno yalina ebbanja lya buwumbi kkumi na busatu n'obukadde lukaaga ate nga mu 2008 yalina ebbanja lya buwumbi musanvu n'obukadde lusanvu.

translation.en: Otafiire said old habits die hard: “we are the very people who fought Uganda People's Congress castigating election stealing".
translation.lug: Otafiire yagamba nti empisa enkadde tezivaawo: "ffe twalwanyisa ekibiina kya UPC nga tuvumirira eky'okubba obululu."

translation.en: His former junior colleague, Alex Kamugisha is to contest against him as an independent in Rujumbura County.
translation.lug: Eyaliko mukozi munne ku mutendera ogwa wansi Alex Kamugisha agenda kumuvuganya mu Saza ly'e Rujumbura era ng'azze bwannamunigina.

translation.en: The Electoral Commission displayed the National Voters’ Register from 11th - 31st August 2010 at each polling station within the parish.
translation.lug: Akakiiko k'eby'okulonda kaattimba enkalala z'abalonzi okuva nga 11 okutuuka nga 31 Agusito 2010 mu buli kifo ku muluka we bannaakubira akalulu.

translation.en: In preparation for the General Elections 2011 as mandated under section twenty five of the Electoral Commission act (Cap One hundred and forty) the Uganda Electoral Commision displayed the register.
translation.lug: Mu kuteekateeka okulonda okwa 2011 nga bwe kirambikiddwa obulungi mu kitundu ekya kikumi mu abiri mu bitaano mu mateeka agafuga Akakiiko Akakola ku by'Okulonda, Akakiiko akakola ku by'okulanda mu Uganda kaattimba enkalala.

translation.en: A clean voters’ register is the cornerstone for free and fair elections.
translation.lug: Enkalala ezikoleddwa obulungi nga teziriimu nsobi ze ziraga nti wajja kubaawo okulonda okw'amazima n'obwenkanya.

translation.en: He first belittled the post of Secretary General as “small” but later contested for it claiming he wanted to strengthen the party.
translation.lug: Yasooka kubuusa maaso ekifo ky'okuba Ssabawandiisi ng'akitwala okuba "ekitono" naye oluvannyuma yakivuganyaako ng'agamba nti yayagala kunyweza kibiina.

translation.en: Check for correspondences of your particulars on the Voters Register and report the dead, non citizen, under age, to the Officer, if they appear on the Voters’ Register.
translation.lug: Mu nkalala keeberamu ebyo ebikukwatako, era abo abaafa, abatali batuuze, abatannatuuka kulonda boogereyo eri omukulu akubiriza eby'okulonda singa bibaamu.

translation.en: The disorganised primaries worsened the problem.
translation.lug: Enteekateeka etaali nnuŋŋamu ekwata ku kusunsulibwa ye yasajjula ekizibu.

translation.en: Some of the losers have since declared that they will contest as independents.
translation.lug: Okuva olwo abamu ku abo abataayitamu baagamba nti bajja kwesimbawo bwannamunigina.

translation.en: Others are weighing their options.
translation.lug: Abalala bakyerowooza.

translation.en: The two constituencies, therefore, had a combined total of seventy six thousand and fifty seven votes cast.
translation.lug: N'olwekyo, konsituwensi zombi ng'ozigasse wamu obululu obwakubibwa bwali emitwalo nsanvu mu mukaaga mu ataano mu musanvu.

translation.en: One would expect that the total number of votes cast for both the candidate for the district Chairman’s slot and the district woman Member of Parliament’s slot would come to that seventy six thousand and fifty seven, but that has not been the case.
translation.lug: Omuntu yandikisuubidde nti obululu bwonna obwakubibwa okulonda bassentebe ba disitulikiti n'ababaka ba palamenti abakazi mu disitulikiti bwe bwandibadde emitwalo egyo ensanvu mu mukaaga mu ataano mu musanvu, naye bwe kityo si bwe kibadde.

translation.en: How come the votes cast for the Woman Member of Parliament and the Local Council five Chairman were in excess of those cast for those who contested for the Member of Parliament’s slots?
translation.lug: Kijja kitya okuba nti obululu obwakubibwa okulonda omubaka wa palamenti omukazi ne bassentebe ba LC 5 bwali bungi okusinga obwo obwa ababaka ba palamenti?

translation.en: Besides, barring party members from contesting as independents would be a violation of the constitution.
translation.lug: Ng'oggyeko ekyo, okukugira bamemba b'ekibiina okwesimbawo ku bwannamunigina kyandibadde kityobola ssemateeka.

translation.en: Any move against the independents can only lead to unnecessary litigation, from which the party would emerge more scathed.
translation.lug: Omuntu yenna alemesa abo abeesimbyewo ku bwannamunigina ayinza okukubibwa mu mbuga z'amateeka era nga kino kiyinza okuba eky'akabi eri ekibiina.

translation.en: He is either bluffing or running a big risk, if he is not.
translation.lug: Awo aba asaaga busaazi oba aba yeetadde mu buzibu.

translation.en: His situation was understandable.
translation.lug: Embeera ye yali tetebenkedde.

translation.en: Sources close to Bukenya had told The Independent late in August that the president had made a substantial financial contribution towards his campaign.
translation.lug: Ku nkomerero y'omwezi gwa Agusito, abo abali okumpi ne Bukenya baali bategezezza olupapula lw'amawulire olwa Independenti nti pulezidenti yali awaddeyo ssente nnyingi nnyo okumuwagira mu kampeyini.

translation.en: This did not happen.
translation.lug: Naye ekyo si bwe kyali.

translation.en: The Vice President is meant to be the most powerful man after the president, but once he starts getting zeros in some districts, then you know his political rating is really down.
translation.lug: Omumyuka wa pulezidenti alina okuba nga y'addirira pulezidenti mu kuba n'amaanyi naye bw'atandika okuba nga mu disitulikiti ezimu tafunayo kalulu, awo omanya nti ali wansi nnyo mu by'obufuzi.

translation.en: This, the insiders say, portrayed his as a politically hungry person.
translation.lug: Ab'omunda bagamba nti kino kimwoleka okuba omuntu alumwa enjala mu by'obufuzi.

translation.en: The purpose of the display exercise was to enable the general public to inspect the voters register for accuracy and completeness.
translation.lug: Ekigendererwa ky'okuttimba enkalala kwali kusobozesa bantu kuzikebera balabe nga ntuufu era nga tewali kizibulamu.

translation.en: It is very unfortunate that our democratic principles have been brought under examination.
translation.lug: Kya nnaku nnyo okulaba nti omusingi gwaffe ogwesigamiddwa ku demokulasiya gwolekaganye n'ekigezo.

translation.en: It is unfortunate that our leaders are being found with ballots, cheating, ballot papers found on the streets.
translation.lug: Kya nnuku nnyo okulaba nti abakulembeze baffe basangibwa n'obululu, babba, era nga n'obululu busangibwa ku nguudo.

translation.en: But his camp was fear.
translation.lug: Naye waaliwo okutya mu bantu be.

translation.en: So he campaigned under ground and the results showed this.
translation.lug: N'olwekyo yakuba kampeyini mu mankwettu era n'ebyavaamu tebyali birungi.

translation.en: Most of the petitioners are threatening to stand as independents if their complaints are not resolved.
translation.lug: Abangi ku abo abaawaaba omusango bagamba nti bajja kwesimbawo ku bwabwe singa okwemmulugunya kwabwe tekukolwako.

translation.en: This is likely to increase the number of independents in parliament.
translation.lug: Kirabika kino kijja kwongera ku bungi bw'abo abeesimbawo bokka mu palamenti.

translation.en: The campaigns were stiff but there were no opposition generated.
translation.lug: Kampeyini yali ya kaasammeeme naye nga tewaliwo ludda luvuganya.

translation.en: The exercise has built democracy and debate in the party.
translation.lug: Kino kireeseewo demokulasiya n'okukubaganya ebirowoozo mu kibiina.

translation.en: He says all the party needs is to ensure an effective mediation mechanism for those contesting the election results.
translation.lug: Yagamba nti ekibiina bye kyagala kwe kuba n'omutabaganya omulungi eri abo ababa bawakanya ebivudde mu kulonda.

translation.en: Instead he says he plans to run as an independent.
translation.lug: Mu kifo ky'ekyo agamba nti ateekateeka kwesimbawo ku lulwe.

translation.en: “I am loyal to the party, but not to the chaos,” he says.
translation.lug: Agamba nti mpagira kibiina so si buvuyo.

translation.en: I appeal to competitors who did not win in primaries, not to think of running as independents.
translation.lug: Nkubiriza abo abataayitamu mu kakuŋŋunta obutalowooza ku kya kwesimbawo ku bwabwe.

translation.en: He said fresh elections will be held where grounds are considered strong and adjustments will be made where grounds are weak.
translation.lug: Yagamba nti akalulu kajja kuddibwamu we balaba nti ddala kisaanidde  ate enkyukakyuka zijja kukolebwa gye balowooza nti tekisaanidde.

translation.en: Other delegates who were lucky to have secured approval earlier were already attending the conference.
translation.lug: Abakiise abalala abaali basobodde okukkirizibwa nga bukyali baali baatuuse dda ku lukuŋŋaana.

translation.en: The returning officer also wants to steal, the problem is attitude, he added.
translation.lug: Yagattako nti ekizibu kiri ku ndowooza kubanga n'oyo akubiriza eby'okulonda naye ayagala kubba.

translation.en: They were responsible for the mess in the primaries.
translation.lug: Be baali bavunaanyizibwa olw'obuvuyo obwali mu kulonda okw'okusunsulamu.

translation.en: It has been a learning point for organising future elections.
translation.lug: Tufunye eky'okuyiga ku ngeri okulonda okuliddawo gye kulitegekebwamu.

translation.en: That there is complete healing of the mistakes witnessed in the elections.
translation.lug: Nti ensobi ezaakolebwa mu kulonda zitandise okugwerawo ddala.

translation.en: And make recommendations that will leave the party united.
translation.lug: Era mwogere ku bintu ebitaayabuluzeemu kibiina.

translation.en: Its Electoral Commission leadership and membership is to be reconstituted “very soon”.
translation.lug: Abakulembeze mu kakiiko kaakyo akakola ku by'okulonda awamu ne bamemba byonna bijja kudaabululwa "mu bwangu ddala".

translation.en: If the primaries were stolen bring facts and these people will cancel results.
translation.lug: Bwe kiba nti waaliwo okubbira mu kulonda kuno okw'okusunsulibwamu, muleete obukakafu era ebyavaamu bijja kusazibwamu.

translation.en: The party cannot be centred only in the Kampala.
translation.lug: Ekibiina tekiyinza kubeera mu Kampala mwokka.

translation.en: You have the same person working on delegation cards, the same person handling transport, and the Delegates.
translation.lug: Omuntu omu nga y'akola ku kaadi eziweebwa abakiise, era y'omuoyo akola ku by'entambula era nga y'ayaniriza n'abagenyi.

translation.en: Same person ensuring that you are registered.
translation.lug: Omuntu y'omu nga y'alina okukakasa nti owandiisiddwa.

translation.en: Literally they were in charge of the conference.
translation.lug: Be baali balina obuvunaanyizibwa ku lukuŋŋaana lwonna.

translation.en: He has the money and was literally in charge of everything at the conference ranging from organisation to determining who accesses the venue.
translation.lug: Alina ssente era n'olw'ekyo ye yali avunaanyizibwa ku buli kimu ku lukuŋŋaana olwo okuviira ddala ku kutegeka n'okusalawo ani akkirizibwa okujja mu lukuŋŋaana olwo.

translation.en: The organisers of the conference argued that they were overwhelmed by the number of delegates.
translation.lug: Abaateekateeka olukuŋŋaana olwo baagamba nti baatendewalirwa olw'obungi bw'abakiise.

translation.en: They were also of no known political power.
translation.lug: Era nga tebamanyi buyinza ki bwe balina mu bya bufuzi.

translation.en: Nobody was sure who would win the presidency.
translation.lug: Tewali n'omu eyali akakasa ani anaawangula ekifo ky'obwa pulezidenti.

translation.en: The only competition was in the lower positions especially the Secretary General.
translation.lug: Okuvuganya kwali mu bifo ebya wansi byokka nnaddala ku kifo kya Ssabawandiisi.

translation.en: You can aspire for other positions in the party, but not the presidency.
translation.lug: Osobola okuluubirira ekifo ekirala kyonna mu kibiina naye nga si kya bwa pulezidenti.

translation.en: He instead said it shows the need for people to change attitude about time keeping and respecting electoral rules,” he said defiantly.
translation.lug: Ng'oggyeko ekyo yagamba nti kino kiraga nti waliwo obwetaavu abantu okukyusa endowooza yaabwe ku nsonga y'okukwata ebiseera n'okussa ekitiibwa ku mateeka agafuga eby'okulonda," kino yakyogera ng'alaga nti yeetamiddwa.

translation.en: People were still campaigning while time for voting had started until I shouted.
translation.lug: Abantu baali bakyakuba kampeyini ng'ate ekiseera eky'okulonda kituuse, awo nnendyoka nkangula ku ddoboozi.

translation.en: The problem is that people have not internalised the struggle of democracy, the printer, transporter of the ballot wants.
translation.lug: Ekizibu kiri nti abantu tebannategeerera ddala nti kyetaagisa okufuba kwa maanyi okusobola okuleetawo demokulasiya n'ebirala ebyetaagisa.

translation.en: He said they recorded names of their supporters leaving out others who did not support them.
translation.lug: Yagamba nti baawandiika amaanya g'abawagizi baabwe ne baleka ag'abo abatabawagira.

translation.en: His partly attributed the mess to meager.
translation.lug: Ekibiina kye kyagamba nti okuba n'eby'okukozesa ebitono kye kyaviirako obuvuyo obwo.

translation.en: He said they recorded names of their supporters leaving out others who did not support them.
translation.lug: Yagamba nti baawandiika amaanya g'abawagizi baabwe ne baleka ag'abo abatabawagira.

translation.en: He won resources.
translation.lug: Yafuna ebyetaagisa.

translation.en: The intense fight among the party officials suggests the thirst for power rather than to serve the country.
translation.lug: Okulwanagana okw'amaanyi okwali mu bakungu b'ekibiina kulaga nti balina nnyonta ya kufuna buyinza so si kuweereza bantu.

translation.en: We are going to vote in a few hours but we do not know which delegate with which card will be allowed to vote.
translation.lug: Ebulayo essaawa ntono tulonde naye tetumanyi mukiise ki era ng'alina kaadi ki anaakkirizibwa okulonda.

translation.en: The genuine delegates have been denied entry into this venue and non delegates have been allowed in.
translation.lug: Abakiise abatuufu balemeseddwa okuyingira mu kifo kino era abo abatali bakiise be bakkiriziddwa okuyingira.

translation.en: The candidates have been denied access to the voters' register.
translation.lug: Abeesimbyewo balemeseddwa okulaba enkalala z'abalonzi.

translation.en: It is unfair that one of the candidates is involved in the organisation of the election process.
translation.lug: Si kya bwenkanya okulaba nti omu ku abo abeesimbyewo ate y'omu ku bategesi b'okulonda.

translation.en: He grumbled as he waved a sample of two different accreditation cards.
translation.lug: Yeemulugunya ng'eno bw'ayolesa kaadi ez'emirundi ebiri ezikkirizibwa.

translation.en: Tension took over the audience.
translation.lug: Waaliwo obunkenke mu abo abaaliwo.

translation.en: The presidential guards rushed to make a security ring around the President.
translation.lug: Abakuumi ba pulezidenti baayanguwa mangu ne bassaawo obukuumi okumwetooloola.

translation.en: Everyone watched in wonder and anxiety.
translation.lug: Buli omu yatunuulira ebyali bigenda mu maaso era ne yeewuunya.

translation.en: The audience fell silent.
translation.lug: Tewaaliwo kanyego mu bantu abaaliwo.

translation.en: You could hear a pin drop.
translation.lug: Wali osobola n'okuwulira akayiso akagudde wansi.

translation.en: He asked the party electoral commission to explain.
translation.lug: Yasaba akakiiko k'ekibiina ak'eby'okulonda kannyonnyole.

translation.en: He said delegates were receiving varying amounts of allowances depending on the distance from their districts.
translation.lug: Yagamba nti abakiise baali bafuna ensako za njawulo okusinziira ku buwanvu bw'olugendo gye baali bava.

translation.en: Each district had one hundred delegates.
translation.lug: Buli disitulikiti yalina abakiise kikumi.

translation.en: Each district had a polling station.
translation.lug: Buli disitulikiti yalina w'ekubira akalulu.

translation.en: The old party leadership was returned save for the posts of National Party Treasurer.
translation.lug: Obukulembeze bw'ekibiina obw'edda bwakomezebwawo nnaddala obwo obw'omuwanika w'ekibiina.

translation.en: Therefore, they could not dare throw out his man.
translation.lug: N'olwekyo bali tebayinza kwetantala kufulumya musajja we.

translation.en: He had an additional advantage over his rivals.
translation.lug: Alina bye yali asingako ku banne abalala abaali beesimbyewo naye.

translation.en: This gave him more time than his opponents to market his candidature.
translation.lug: Kino  kyamusobozesa okuba n'ebiseera bingi okwennyonnyolako okusinga banne.

translation.en: The delegates kept chorusing “abewo!”.
translation.lug: Abakiise baagenda mu maaso nga boogera nti "abeewo!"

translation.en: He spoke on the first day of the conference and he kept reminding delegates of his name and candidature.
translation.lug: Yayogera ku lunaku olwasooka olw'olukuŋŋaana era buli lunaku yabajjukizanga erinnya lye era n'abategeza nga bwe yeesimbyewo.

translation.en: Strategically it was these regions that had the swing vote and a candidate who would win them would be the Secretary General.
translation.lug: Ebitundu bino bye byali bisinga okubaamu abalonzi era ne ku abo abeesimbyewo eyandiwangudde yandibadde Ssabawandiisi.

translation.en: He did and was given the cash.
translation.lug: Yakola era yaweebwa ssente.

translation.en: The other camps were also giving out money to delegates to vote for their preferred candidates.
translation.lug: Abaali mu bubondo obulala nabo baali bagabira abakiise ssente basobole okulonda abo be baagala.

translation.en: Probably the difference was who had more money and power.
translation.lug: Oboolyawo enjawulo yali ku ani asinza ssente n'obuyinza.

translation.en: He was appearing to be an insubordinate candidate who has no respect for party decisions.
translation.lug: Yali alabika ng'omujeemu era atassa kitiibwa ku ebyo ekibiina bye kiba kisazeewo.

translation.en: How could such people be entrusted with a top party office?
translation.lug: Abantu ng'abo bayinza batya okulondebwa mu bifo ebya waggulu mu kibiina?

translation.en: “Nobody can disobey the Central Executive Committee, that is a dream.
translation.lug: Kiba kirooto bulooto "omuntu yenna okujeemera Akakiiko ak'Oku Ntikko.

translation.en: It cannot be any single moment.
translation.lug: Ekyo tekisobola kubaawo n'omulundi n'ogumu.

translation.en: Central Executive Committee sat and passed through these names.
translation.lug: Akakiiko ak'Oku Ntikko kaatuula ne kayitayita mu mannya ago gonna.

translation.en: Others were removed for various reasons.
translation.lug: Agamu gaagibwamu olw'ensonga ezitali zimu.

translation.en: I do not work alone.
translation.lug: Nze sikola nzekka.

translation.en: Yet at this time, voting was still going on in all polling stations.
translation.lug: Kyokka mu kiseera kino okulonda kwali kukyagenda mu maaso mu bifo ebironderwamu byonna.

translation.en: These text messages swung the voters’ mood.
translation.lug: Abalonzi baawerezebwanga obubaka era bulina engeri gye bwa batabulangamu.

translation.en: It would be futile to vote a losing candidate.
translation.lug: Kyandibadde kya kabi nnyo okulonda omuntu agenda okuwangulwa.

translation.en: It cannot be mathematically established that voters changed their mind because of this.
translation.lug: Tekikkirizika nti kino kyakyusa endowooza y'abalonzi.

translation.en: Usually voters do not want to vote a losing candidate.
translation.lug: Bulijjo abalonzi tebaagala kulonda oyo agenda okuwangulwa.

translation.en: His daughter was in charge of accreditation and managing data of delegates.
translation.lug: Muwala we ye yali avunaanyizibwa ku by'okukakasa n'okukola ku ebyo ebikwata ku bakiise.

translation.en: He talked amidst the wild applause from the delegates.
translation.lug: Yayogerera mu abo abaali bakuba obuluulu.

translation.en: He was figuring out what to do with his fighting strongmen and whether he should support one against the other.
translation.lug: Yali alowooza ku ky'okukolera basajja be ab'amaanyi abaali balwanagana era nga yeebuuza oba abeeko omu ku bo gw'awagira.

translation.en: After falling out with the unions, one of his main support bases, the soft-spoken man with a vibrant and infectious personality and dance moves to boot.
translation.lug: Oluvannyuma lw'okulemagana n'ebibiina, omu ku abo abasingirayo ddala okumuwagira era nga ye musajja ayogeza esimbo era alina engeri endala ezisikiriza, yatandika okukyakyankya.

translation.en: But that reputation is rapidly being eroded by a president criticised as indecisive on the country’s main problems.
translation.lug: Naye erinnya eryo eddungi ligenda lisaanyizibwawo puleziddenti ayogerwako ng'atasalawo ku bizibu eby'amaanyi ebiri mu ggwanga.

translation.en: We have nothing to celebrate.
translation.lug: Tewali nsonga lwaki tujjaganya.

translation.en: We lost more than one point one million jobs.
translation.lug: Tufiiriddwa emirimu egisukka mu kakadde kamu mu emitwalo kkumi.

translation.en: As a result, five point five million South Africans have been pushed into poverty.
translation.lug: Ekigenda okuva mu kino, abantu b'omu South Afirika abasukka mu bukadde butaano mu emitwalo ataano bagenda kuba baavu.

translation.en: With some one million public sector workers about to enter their third week on strike and as Cosatu threatened to bring the entire economy to a standstill by calling other sectors to join the stoppage.
translation.lug: Abakozi kumpi akadde kamu banaatera okuyingira wiiki ey'okusatu nga beedimmye, kyokka ekibiina kya Cosatu kitiisizza okuyimiriza abakozi bonna kireete abalala bagikole.

translation.en: Public workers want an eight point six percent wage increase, while the government has been standing firm on its offer of seven percent.
translation.lug: Abakozi baagala okwongezebwa omusaala gwa bitundu 8.6, kyokabaka nga yo gavumenti ebadde ekyanyweredde ku bitundu musaanvu.

translation.en: If he chooses one side, then he loses the other.
translation.lug: Bw'anaabaako oludda lw'awagira ajja kubaako lw'afiirwa.

translation.en: The strike has had a crippling effect on schools and hospitals, leaving health facilities having to function with skeleton staff, military aid and ordinary South Africans.
translation.lug: Okwekalakasa kulina kya maanyi kye kukoze ku masomero n'amalwaliro era ng'abantu aba bulijjo n'abasirikale be baddukanya amalwaliro.

translation.en: This further alienated his supporters.
translation.lug: Kino kyayongera kumalamu maanyi bawigizi be.

translation.en: Some believe his handling of the strike has deeply damaged the ruling's long standing alliance with the left.
translation.lug: Abamu bagamba nti engeri gye yakwatamu abeekalakaasi erina engeri gye yakosaamu enkolagana ye n'abagabirizi b'obuyambi.

translation.en: Meeting the demands of his union and left wing backers would have alarmed the markets and the business community.
translation.lug: Okutuukiriza obukwakulizo bw'ekibiina kye era n'obw'abagabirizi b'obuyambi kyandiwaawaazizza amatu mu butale ne mu basuubuzi.

translation.en: And in terms of alleviating poverty, his ministers have argued that raising pay for those with jobs would mean less money to potentially create work.
translation.lug: Ate mu ngeri y'okuggyawo obwavu baminisita be bagamba nti okwongeza omusaala gw'abo abalina emirimu kijja kumalawo ssente ez'okutondawo emirimu.

translation.en: Some analysts say his biggest challenge is his need to appease the conflicting interests in the broad alliance which propelled him to power.
translation.lug: Abamu ku beekenenya bagamba nti ekizibu eky'amaanyi ky'alina kwe kusanyusa enjuuyi zombi ezaamusobozesa okujja mu buyinza.

translation.en: The challenge I am facing is that of balancing family and work.
translation.lug: Okusoomoza okw'amaanyi kwe nnina kwe kukola ku by'awaka ne by'omulimu.

translation.en: I am serving on several boards of schools.
translation.lug: Ndi ku bukiiko bungi obw'amasomero.

translation.en: The most obvious impact is that of opening up markets and therefore making it easy for us to open branches in the member countries.
translation.lug: Ekintu ekisinga obukulu kwe kuggulawo obutale era n'okutwanguyiza okuggulawo amatabi mu nsi ze tukolagana nazo.

translation.en: The common market, I hope,will bring a wider market for our products and services
translation.lug: Nsuubira nti akatale kano ak'awamu kajja kutusobozesa okuba n'akatale akagazi gye tusobola okutunda ebintu byaffe.

translation.en: The future for this business is very bright only that those that fail to style up will be forced to close.
translation.lug: Ebiseera by'omu maaso ebya buzineesi eno birungi kyokka abo abaanaalemererwa okutuukagana n'omutindo bajja kuwalirizibwa okuggalawo.

translation.en: Those are our secrets for now which we can’t tell everyone.
translation.lug: Ebyo bye byama bye tulina mu kiseera kino bye tutayinza kubuulira buli muntu yenna.

translation.en: I personally believe in systems and control and this has a lot to do with my background in banking, especially in audit where I spent a while.
translation.lug: Nze nzikkiririza mu nkola ennuŋŋaamu era kino kikwatagana bulungi n'emirimu gyange egya banka, nnaddala ogw'eby'embalirira gwe nkoze okumala ekiseera.

translation.en: Upgrading the core banking application to a more robust platform that will enable them serve customers better and act as a launch pad for more innovative solutions.
translation.lug: Okusitula omutindo gwa banka kijja kubasobozesa okuweereza abantu obulungi era n'okumanya ebirala ebisingayo obulungi bye basaanidde okukola.

translation.en: Which will be given to the company at between thirteen and fifteen per cent interest which is below the bank rates.
translation.lug: Zijja kuweebwa kampuni ku magoba agali wakati w'ebitundu kkumi na bisatu ne kkumi na bitaano ku buli kikumi era nga bino biri wansi w'omutemwa gwa banka.

translation.en: Move faster to implement a national insurance health plan and take firm action against corrupt individuals who use the government for personal enrichment.
translation.lug: Mwanguwe okussa mu nkola enteekateeka ya yinsuwa y'obulamu era mukole ku bali b'enguzi abeeyambisa gavumenti okwegaggawaza.

translation.en: Nationalise the country’s mines,speed up the redistribution of white owned land to the black majority and transfer more business into black ownership.
translation.lug: Ebirombe mubifuule bya ggwanga lyonna, mwanguye okugabanya bakaddugala abasinga obungi ettaka lya bakyeruppe era buzineesi ezisinga obungi muziwe bakaddugala.

translation.en: You are saying that it will remain the same as during the colonial regime.
translation.lug: Ogamba nti bijja kusigala bye bimu nga bwe kyali mu biseera by'obufuzi bw'amatwale.

translation.en: Some union members chanted during nationwide marches last week.
translation.lug: Bamemba b'ekibiina abamu baayimba wiiki ewedde mu kutambula okwaliwo mu ggwanga lyonna.

translation.en: Uganda Nile Breweries' Operations operations could be worth more than ten billion dollars.
translation.lug: Ebyo Uganda Nile Breweries by'ekola biyinza okuba nga bibalirwamu obuwumbi bwa ddola obusukka mu kkumi.

translation.en: The merger will not affect the existing management, staff and the services rendered by the two companies.
translation.lug: Okukolera awamu tekujja kukosa nkola y'emirimu eriwo mu kiseera kino, abakozi n'emirimu eginaakolebwa kampuni zombi.

translation.en: The Chief Executive Officers of both companies will lead a transition team, which will develop a specific integration plan.
translation.lug: Abakulu ab'oku ntikko aba kampuni zombi be bajja okukulemberamu abo anaakola enkyukakyuka eno era bajja kukola enteekateeka ennuŋŋamu.

translation.en: The French made  Regional Transport Airplanes aircraft has a capacity of 48 passengers.
translation.lug: Ennyonyi ze tulina ezaakolebwa mu Bufalaansa zisobola okutwala abantu 48.

translation.en: Like other aircraft in the fleet, it will feature inflight entertainment that allows passengers to watch movies and listen to music inflight.
translation.lug: Okufaananako nga bwe kiri mu nnyonyi endala, abasabaze bajja kuba nga basobola okwesanyusaamu nga balaba emizannyo era nga buwuliriza n'ennyimba.

translation.en: How are you resolving these challenges?
translation.lug: Obuzibu obwo ogenda kubusonjola otya?

translation.en: However I am prioritising and delegating wherever possible.
translation.lug: Nkulembeza ebisinga obukulu ate ebirala ne mbikwasa abalala bwe kiba kisoboka.

translation.en: But this also has challenges, in that we must be prepared to face very stiff competition.
translation.lug: Naye na kino kirimu obuzibu obulala. Tulina okuba abeetegefu okwaŋŋaanga okuvuganya okw'amaanyi.

translation.en: The free flow of labour will also avail us skills that were hitherto scarce in our own individual countries.
translation.lug: Okufuna abakozi okuva mu bitundu ebirala kijja kutusobozesa okufuna obumanyirivu bwe tutabadde nabwo mu nsi zaffe.

translation.en: The competition will improve efficiency, which is good for customers.
translation.lug: Okuvuganya kujja kutuleetera okukola obulungi emirimu era kino kijja kuba kya muganyulo nnyo eri abo be tuweereza.

translation.en: What new innovations are coming up at the forex bureau?
translation.lug: Bippya ki ebigenda okuleetebwa ku mulimu gw'okuvungisa ssente?

translation.en: But certainly we have new innovations up.
translation.lug: Naye ekituufu kiri nti tulina ebippya ebijja.

translation.en: What is your style to successful management and who are your mentors?
translation.lug: Odduukanya otya emirimu gyo era baani abakuwa amagezi?

translation.en: Unfortunately I don’t have a particular mentor, because I have been mentored by several people in the different trades.
translation.lug: Eky'ennaku sirina muntu omu gwe nnyinza okugamba nti y'ampa amagezi kubanga mpeereddwa amagezi abantu abatali bamu mu mirimu egy'enjawulo.

translation.en: He taught me how to use my brain a little better and that totally changed my life.
translation.lug: Yanjigiriza engeri y'okukozesaamu obwongo bwange mu ngeri esingayo obulungi era ekyo kyakyusa obulamu bwange.

translation.en: This strong growth was driven by increased customer deposits and customer lending,prudent cost management and better portfolio management.
translation.lug: Okukulaakulana kuvudde mu kuba ne bakasitoma abampola era be nnewolako, okukkekkereza n'engeri ennungi ey'okuddukanyaamu emirimu.

translation.en: In spite of the pressure on the net interest margins, we are on track for yet another good year.
translation.lug: Wadde tufuba nnyo okulaba nti tufuna amagoba, tusuubira nti n'omwaka ogujja tujja kukola.

translation.en: During the period under review, the bank remained steadfast in implementing its investment plans of expanding the delivery channel mix.
translation.lug: Mu kiseera ekyo ekyali kyogerwako, bbanka yasigala nga nywevu mu kussa mu nkola enteekateeka zaayo ezikwata ku kutumbula busineesi.

translation.en: The new brick and tile factory cost thirty six billion in equity and loans.
translation.lug: Ekkolero eppya ery'amatoofaali ne tayilo lyatwala obuwumbi asatu mu mukaaga.

translation.en: What challenges are you facing?
translation.lug: Kusoomoozibwa ki kw'oyolekaganye nakwo?

translation.en: I have taken on a lot of responsibilities, and yet I still have a young family to take care of.
translation.lug: Nnina obuvunaanyizibwa bungi nnyo ate nkyalina abaana abato bendabirira.

translation.en: In addition to my several business interests, I also serve my church in various capacities.
translation.lug: Ng'oggyeko buzineesi nnyingi ze nnina, mpeereza ne mu kkanisa yange mu bifo ebitali bimu.

translation.en: I must physically visit the over one fifty clubs that exist in these countries in the course of the year.
translation.lug: Mu mwaka nnina okukyalira ebibiina ebisukka mu amakumi attaano mu ggwanga lino.

translation.en: I have to do all this in six days of the week because Sundays are for my family and my mother whom I must visit whenever I am around.
translation.lug: Bino byonna nnina okubikolera mu nnaku mukaaga mu wiiki kubanga ku Sande mbeera wamu n'ab'omu maka gange era nkyalira ne maama wange.

translation.en: Do you consider yourself an overachiever?
translation.lug: Weetwala okuba omuntu alina ebingi by'akoze?

translation.en: This would not work if the people I am leading and supporting through different institutions were not hard working.
translation.lug: Bwe kityo si bwe kyandibadde singa abantu be nkulembera era n'abo be nnyamba tebaba bazibu.

translation.en: This would not work if the people I am leading and supporting through different institutions were not hard working.
translation.lug: Bwe kityo si bwe kyandibadde singa abantu be nkulembera era n'abo be nnyamba tebaba bazibu.

translation.en: This was giving us a very bad name for sure.
translation.lug: Mu butuufu kino kibadde kituwa erinnya ebbi.

translation.en: I think after he served a sentence or something.
translation.lug: Ndowooza oluvannyuma ng'amazeeko ekiseera kye eky'obusibe.

translation.en: Have you arrested the people who killed this politician?
translation.lug: Mwakwata abantu abatta munnabyabufuzi ono?

translation.en: That is a different issue now.
translation.lug: Eyo nsonga ya njawulo kati.

translation.en: There are parties that were registered but did not front a candidate.
translation.lug: Waliwo ebibiina ebyewandiisa naye nga tebyasimbawo muntu yenna.

translation.en: I will not suggest it is all of them,  there are sections of the international press.
translation.lug: Sijja kugamba nti bonna, ekitundu kya bannamawulire ab'ensi yonna.

translation.en: Whenever they are violent and they are killing each other, we must go and pacify them.
translation.lug: Buli lwe booleka ebikolwa eby'obukambwe era nga battiŋŋaana, tulina okugendayo okuzzaawo emirembe.

translation.en: Do you sometimes have doubt and say," wow, possibly people are afraid and that is why they are showing up at these rallies?"
translation.lug: Oluusi oyinza okubeera awo n'otandika okubuusabuusa ng'ogamba nti, "oboolyawo abantu balina okutya era ng'eyo ye nsonga lwaki bajja mu bungi mu nkuŋŋaana zino?"

translation.en: One would be making a very serious mistake to ignore the level of maturity that has been reached in the process by our people.
translation.lug: Omuntu yandibadde akoze ensobi ya maanyi nnyo okubuusa amaaso endowooza y'ekikulu abantu baffe gye balina mu kiseera kino.

translation.en: You see leadership is very important in everything.
translation.lug: Okimanyi bulungi nti obulembeze kintu kikulu nnyo mu buli kintu.

translation.en: You can get even a hundred percent of the votes, but a hundred percent of what?
translation.lug: Osobola n'okufuna kikumi ku kikumi eky'obululu, naye nga kikumi ku kikumi ekya ki?

translation.en: It should be, I guess, about ninety six to ninety seven percent.
translation.lug: Nze ndowooza kirina kuba kyenda mu mukaaga oba kyenda mu musanvu ku buli kikumi.

translation.en: The title of superman seems to confirm everything.
translation.lug: Ekitiibwa eky'okuba omununuzi kikakasa bulungi ensonga eno.

translation.en: No, in fact, I should not be overpraised.
translation.lug: Nedda, sisaanidde kutenderezebwa kisukkiridde.

translation.en: I have really never doubted my people and more so in the recent days.
translation.lug: Sibuusabuusangako bantu bange nnaddala ennaku zino.

translation.en: We have explained it to the media.
translation.lug: Kino tukinnyonnyola ku mikutu gy'eby'empuliziganya.

translation.en: So why do you think the international press remains negative?
translation.lug: Kati olowooza kiki ekiviirako bannamawulire okuva mu nsi yonna okukwogerako obubi?

translation.en: I think there is a much deeper problem than this.
translation.lug: Nze nsuubira waliwo ekizibu eky'amaanyi okusinga ku kino.

translation.en: In their view nothing good is happening here, nothing good should be happening here.
translation.lug: Bo balowooza nti tewali kirungi kiri wano, era nti tewali kirungi kirina kuba wano.

translation.en: So there is this whole thing about image, perception and bias.
translation.lug: Kati bino byonna bikwata ku kifaananyi, endowooza, n'okwekuubira.

translation.en: That is why we are here as you see us, forget the names they call us.
translation.lug: Eyo ye nsonga lwaki tuli nga bw'otulaba, weerabire amannya ge batuyita.

translation.en: We are determined to shape our future, decide for ourselves, fight for our dignity, for selfdetermination and there is no question about it.
translation.lug: Tuli bamalirivu okutereeza ebiseera byaffe eby'omu maaso, okwesalirawo, okulwanirira ekitiibwa kyaffe, okubeera abamalirivu era ekyo tekibuusibwabuusibwa.

translation.en: I followed you on many campaign rallies and I saw huge crowds.
translation.lug: Nnakugoberera ku kampeyini zo nnyingi era wabanga n'abantu bangi

translation.en: I know the expressions they make out there are genuine, are honest and I think anybody is mistaken to underrate that.
translation.lug: Mmanyi nti abantu bye boogera eyo bituufu naye abamu bayinza okulowooza nti byabulimba

translation.en: What do you think could have caused that?
translation.lug: olowooza ekyo kyaava ku ki?

translation.en: Leaders led our people to kill each other, to have genocide in this country that took a million lives of our people.
translation.lug: Abakulembeze baleetera abantu okuttiŋŋana, ensi yaffe n'ebeeramu ekittabantu ekyattirimbula obukadde n'obukadde bw'abantu

translation.en: We have seen it work over the years and these are the results.
translation.lug: Kikoze okumala ebbanga ddene era bino bye bivuddemu

translation.en: You are talking about the turnout or the votes?
translation.lug: Oyogera ku bantu abajja okulonda oba abalonda?

translation.en: What is the turnout?
translation.lug: Bantu bameka abajja okulonda?

translation.en: There are things you can’t do and achieve unless people are imagining that I am a superman.
translation.lug: Waliwo ebintu bingi ebitasoboka mu bulamu okuggyako ng'abantu balowooza nti ndi wanjawulo

translation.en: You could have people on the rally who have been brought at gunpoint and forced into being there, herded there and guarded there.
translation.lug: Osobola okukozesa eryannyi okukaka abantu okubaawo ku nkuŋŋaana z'eby'obufuzi

translation.en: Whether you would also force them to be even happy on their faces and they jubilate and even when they are going back home they go singing, they go running and the next day they come the earliest time to vote, you cannot achieve that.
translation.lug: Naye okukaka abantu okulaga essanyu, bajaganye, baddeyo ekka nga badduka bayimbira waggulu olw'essanyu era nti enkeera babukeereze nkokola balonde, ekyo kiba kizibu okukituukiriza

translation.en: You know you have achieved many things.
translation.lug: Okimanyi bulungi nti waliwo bingi by'okoze

translation.en: That is true.
translation.lug: Era ng'ekyo kituufu

translation.en: So what would stop you from mobilising people through intimidation and fear to come to your rallies?
translation.lug: Kati olwo kiki ekyandabadde kikulemesa okukunga abantu okujja ku nkuŋŋaana zo ez'eby'obufuzi ng'oyita mu kubatiisatiisa?

translation.en: I think if that is the way it is, people should respect it for so long as it works for the people of the country and they are happy with it.
translation.lug: Nze ndowooza bwe kiba kikola, abantu bajja kukimanyiira

translation.en: Even if they don’t respect me, they should respect the fact that I am superman.
translation.lug: Ne bwe kiba nti tebanjagala, balina okukikkiriza nti ndi w'amaanyi

translation.en: This has been made known to everybody because we all were concerned and worried.
translation.lug: Kino ffenna twakimanya era kyatweraliikiriza

translation.en: This socalled journalist had actually earlier on been charged with genocide.
translation.lug: Munnamawulire ono yavunaanibwako omusango gwa kittabantu

translation.en: He had been prosecuted in the courts of law as a genocidaire but later on he was released.
translation.lug: Yatwalibwako mu mbuga z'amateeka ng'avunaanibwa omusango ogwekuusa ku kittabantu naye n'ajjeerezebwa

translation.en: I didn’t even know he was ever a journalist.
translation.lug: Ssaakimanyaako nti yaliko munnamawulire

translation.en: All these facts are out there in the public but journalists choose to ignore them because they want to keep the story that the journalist was killed by government,that this was to do with repression and it was to do with elections.
translation.lug: Ebifa ku musajja oyo abantu bangi babimanyi naye bannamawulire tebaagala kubyogerako kubanga baagala okulowoozesa abantu nti gavumenti yamutta olw'ensonga ez'eby'okulonda

translation.en: It had nothing to do with election.
translation.lug: Naye tebyali bya kulonda

translation.en: The confession is just forged.
translation.lug: Ebyo babigweteka bugwetesi

translation.en: This time they will have evidence and facts to support their suspicion.
translation.lug: Ku luno abantu bajja kuleeta obujulizi obulaga nti ebyo bannamawulire bye boogera bya bulimba

translation.en: They can keep checking on him in jail to see whether he will be secretly released.
translation.lug: Bajja kumulambulanga mu kkomera okutuusa lwe balimuta mu kyama

translation.en: Let’s now come to the politician who was killed.
translation.lug: Kati katwogere ku munnabyabufuzi eyattibwa

translation.en: The blogs, the international media and the human rights groups are saying that he was a very strong politician.
translation.lug: Bannamawulire abawano n'ab'ebweru n'abalwannirizi b'eddembe ery'obuntu bagamba nti yali munnabyabufuzi wa ttutumu

translation.en: First of all the government refused to register his party, which was very strong, because you feared his party would defeat the Rwanda Political Front in the elections.
translation.lug: Gavumenti yagaana okuwandiisa ekibiina kye eky'eby'obufuzi ekyali eky'amaanyi ennyo, kubanga baatya nti mu kulonda akalulu kisobola okuwangula ekya Rwanda Political Front

translation.en: First of all, there are lots of distortions and there is no truth at all in that.
translation.lug: Waliwo bingi ebyogerwa naye nga byonna si bituufu

translation.en: I have no issue with that one.
translation.lug: Nange sirina kye mmanyi

translation.en: He actually owned a bar, which was more known than the man himself.
translation.lug: Yalina ebbaala era abantu baali bagimanyi bulungi kyokka nga tebamanyi nnyo nnannyini yo

translation.en: Secondly I didn’t know this man, I had never heard of him until I heard of his death.
translation.lug: Nnali simanyi musajja oyo, naye nawulira buwulizi nti afudde

translation.en: The press have suggested that he was a strong and influential politician whom you were afraid of.
translation.lug: Bannamawulire bagamba nti yali munnabyabufuzi wa maanyi nnyo era ng'atiika

translation.en: Absolutely not!
translation.lug: Naye ekyo si kituufu

translation.en: I am telling you he was not known to me and he was not known to many.
translation.lug: Nnali simumanyi era n'abalala bangi baali tebamumanyi

translation.en: If you ask people around, many people had never heard of him.
translation.lug: Ne bw'obuuza abantu, bajja kugamba nti tebamuwulirangako

translation.en: This fellow was an unknown entity.
translation.lug: Omusajja eyo tamanyiddwa.

translation.en: How could I have been afraid of him to the point of killing him?
translation.lug: Kati olwo lwaki nnandimutidde nnyo ne ntuuka n'okumutta?

translation.en: The police is under pressure to investigate to get to the bottom of the matter.
translation.lug: Kati police ekola butaweera okumunoonyerezaako

translation.en: This is why I am saying some journalists put together all sorts of things that are unrelated but have happened randomly due for different reasons and just create a story even if these things are not related.
translation.lug: Nkizudde nti bannamawulire abamu bamanyi okugunjaawo ebiboozi boozi ebitali bituufu nga balina ebigendererwa ebyabwe ku bwabwe.

translation.en: There are many events that happened in the runup to the election that seem related.
translation.lug: Waliwo ebintu bingi ebyaliwo mu kiseera kye kimu ng'okulonda kunaatera okubaawo.

translation.en: For example, this politician who was killed, it coincides with denying his party registration.
translation.lug: Okugeza, ekiseera munnabyabuzi oyo kyafiiramu kikwatagana n'ekiseera we bagaanira okuwandiisa ekibiina kye eky'eby'obufuzi

translation.en: Why?
translation.lug: Lwaki?

translation.en: There are parties that wanted to front candidates but did not qualify or did not go through the normal procedures.
translation.lug: Waliwo ebibiina by'obufuzi ebyasimbawo abantu baabyo naye ne bitatuukiriza bisaanyizo olw'okulemererwa okugoberera emitendera

translation.en: There are two things, the party qualifies through a process and the party leader or the would be presidential candidate also has to qualify through another process.
translation.lug: Waliwo ebintu bibiri, ekibiina ky'eby'obufuzi n'omukulembeze waakyo bisunsulwa bulala, n'oyo ey'esimbyewo ku ntebbe y'obukulembeze bw'eggwanga asansulwa mu ngeri ndala

translation.en: This is how parties get registered here, you get two hundred supporters, they get together, they form a general assembly, they declare their intention of forming a party, they call a Notary Officer that is the lawyer from the Ministry of Justice to come and witness and endorse that.
translation.lug: Ebibiina by'eby'obufuzi babiwandiisa bwe bati mu nsi eno; bafuna abawagizi ebikumi bibiri, ne bakuŋŋaana wamu ne batuuza olukiiko tabamiluka ne bannyonnyola ensonga ebateesezzaawo ekibiina ky'eby'obufuzi, ne bayita Notary Officer ng'ono ye munnamateeka okuva mu Kitongole Ekiramuzi n'abaawo ng'omujjulizi abasemba.

translation.en: This goes to the Minister of Local Government who ensures that this has gone on according to the law and procedure and brings the matter to cabinet and the party is registered.
translation.lug: Bagenda eri Minisita wa Gavumenti z'Ebitundu n'akakasa nti bagoberedde emitendera n'amateeka ebirambikiddwa oluvannyuma n'ayanjula ensonga mu lukiiko lwa baminisita ekibiina ekyo ne kiwandiisibwa mu butongole

translation.en: They have had quarrels within the party that neither were they able to bring together a general assembly.
translation.lug: Babaddenga n'enkaayana mu kibiina kyabwe eky'oby'obufuzi era baalemererwa  okutuuza olukiiko tabamiruka

translation.en: In fact what happened when they tried, they were fighting among themselves and they had split.
translation.lug: Lumu bwe bagezaako okutuuza olukiiko tabamiruka, balwanagana bulwanaganyi era ne beeyawula yawulamu

translation.en: They had people fighting over the leadership of the party.
translation.lug: Mwalimu abantu abaali bakayaanira obukulembeze bw'ekibiina

translation.en: I don’t know what happened there, but by the time they came back they had internal problems within the party and they said no, this man who went leading us is not our leader, we don’t want this person.
translation.lug: Ssimanyi ebyo ebyali mu lukiiko, naye baavaayo nga bakayaana nga bagamba nti oyo omusajja tumukooye tetukyamwagala.

translation.en: These are things we learnt after the minister of Local Government investigated to find out what was wrong.
translation.lug: Waliwo ekirala kye twayiga nga Minisita wa Gavumenti z'Ebitundu amaze okwekkenneenya ensonga z'ekibiina ky'obufuzi ekipya

translation.en: Later on, the Minister of Local Government tried to help the Green Party, and he said  "you know what, if you want to run, you better abide by this,sort out your internal problems, get together, form a general assembly and declare your intentions, and then later on you have to front somebody who will qualify as a presidential candidate and it is as simple as that".
translation.lug: Nga wayiseewo ekiseera, Minisita wa Gavumenti z'Ebitundu yagezaako okuyamba ab'ekibiina kya Green Party. Yabagamba bw'ati; "Mumanyi, bwe muba mwagala ekibiina kyammwe kikkule, musooke mummalawo obutakkaanya obuli mu kibiina kyammwe, mutuuze olukiiko tabamiruka, mwogere ku biruubirirwa by'ekibiina kyammwe, n'oluvannyuma musimbeewo oyo mmwenna gwe munaasemba okuvuganya ku ntebe y'omukulembeze w'eggwanga

translation.en: They wouldn’t even challenge these other small parties.
translation.lug: Tewaaliwo kuvuganya kw'amaanyi n'ebibiina ebirala ebitaali bya ttutumu

translation.en: You can’t blame the international human rights groups when you have failed to explain yourselves.
translation.lug: Temusobola kunnenya balwanirizi b'eddembe ly'obuntu ab'ensi z'ebweru nga mulemereddwa okwennyonnyolako

translation.en: We have more than explained this story several times with a lot of clarity.
translation.lug: Eno emboozi tugyogeddeko emirundi mingi

translation.en: We have put together these ambassadors who stay here for example American, European and all others.
translation.lug: Tugezezaako okwogera n'ababaka b'amawanga amalala ababeera mu nsi yaffe, okugeza abo abava mu America, Bulaaya ne mu nsi endala

translation.en: We have taken them through detail by detail.
translation.lug: Tufuba okubannyonnyola buli kimu

translation.en: They know it very well.
translation.lug: Bamanyi buli kimu

translation.en: We shop the world for you!
translation.lug: Tutunda buli kimu ekiri mu nsi

translation.en: We sell milk coolers of three hundred liters to ten thuosand liters, generators ,milk reception unit yoghurt mixing motor, cream seperator and Butter churner.
translation.lug: Tutunda ebyuma ebinyogoza amata okuva ku lita ebikumi bisatu okutuuka ku lita omutwalo gumu, tutunda zigenereeta, ebyuma ebitabula yoghurt, n'ebyuma ebikola cream n'omuzigo

translation.en: That is an unprecedented figure.
translation.lug: Ogwo omuwendo tegumanyiddwa.

translation.en: Your critics are saying that this was a stage-managed election.
translation.lug: Abo abavumirira enkola za gavumenti bagamba nti okulonda kwali kwa kimpatiira

translation.en: So it is different here in a sense that there are different parties already that exist and that participated in this election process.
translation.lug: Waliwo ebibiina by'eby'obufuzi bikasangwaawo ebyenyigira mu kulonda kuno

translation.en: But I want to say that you get ninety three percent because of our context.
translation.lug: Naye njagala kukutegeeza nti ommanyi kyenda mu ssatu ku kikumi ku mbeera yaffe

translation.en: So we have had to build from scratch.
translation.lug: N'olwekyo twalina kutandikawo butandisi kipya

translation.en: The context involves the fact that there was instability, lack of security, people were desperate, everywhere it was just death and despair.
translation.lug: Embeera ezingiramu okuba nti waaliwo obutaabanguko, ng'abantu baffa nnyo era nga tebalina bukuumi n'assuubi.

translation.en: We have had to build and as we build, people identify themselves with those people or processes or struggle that have impacted their lives.
translation.lug: Abantu basalawo okukolagana n'abo abalina kye boongera ku bulamu bwabwe

translation.en: There is a saying in our local language here.
translation.lug: Tulina enŋŋombo mu lulimi lwaffe.

translation.en: It means, ‘you thank the one who gave you the cow, not the one you anticipate will give you a cow.
translation.lug: Eŋŋombo eyo egamba nti, 'weebaza oyo akuwadde ente, so si oyo gw'osuubira okugikuwa

translation.en: So their vote was an expression of that culture.
translation.lug: N'olwekyo abantu baalonda balina endowooza

translation.en: That in other words you and your government created an atmosphere where any strong and potential opposition was crushed.
translation.lug: Mu ngeri endala ggwe ne gavumenti yo mwateekawo embeera eremesa ab'oludda oluvuganya

translation.en: It is not easy to do that and you continue to gain the confidence of the people.
translation.lug: Gavumenti teyinza kukola ekyo, ab'oludda oluvuganya ne basigaza obuwagizi bw'abantu

translation.en: Below are edited excerpts of Part one of the interview.
translation.lug: Wansi waliwo ekiwandiiko eky'ekitundu ekisooka ekya yintaviyo

translation.en: The second part runs in the next edition.
translation.lug: Ekitundu eky'okubiri kiri mu kiwandiiko ekiddako

translation.en: He had scooped a fully paid scholarship in conflict studies, his dream course.
translation.lug: Yawangula sikaala mu misomo egikwata ku ebyo ebireetera abantu okuba n'obukuubagano era nga yali ajaagala nnyo

translation.en: He works in a non-governmental organisation, only to be greeted by closed, padlocked doors and police trucks patrolling the University.
translation.lug: Akola mu kitongole kya bannakyewa, naye atuuka ku Yunivasite asanga nzigale era nga waliwo ne polisi

translation.en: At a press briefing amidst loud applause from staff members.
translation.lug: Ng'ali mu lukuŋŋaana lw'abannamawulire abamu ku bakozi banne basaakanya

translation.en: The  government committed to take responsibility of the situation.
translation.lug: Gavumenti yasalawo okukola ku nsonga eyo

translation.en: They demanded an increment in payment
translation.lug: Baali baagala babongeze omusaala

translation.en: In fact were beginning to think that he has conflict of interest,” he said.
translation.lug: Yagamba nti," baali balowooza nti alina ekiruubirirwa ekirala."

translation.en: It was clear that more than eighty percent of the hundreds that had gathered wanted the strike to continue.
translation.lug: kyeraga kaati nti abantu kinaana ku kikumi ku abo abaaliwo baali baagala okwekalakaasa kweyongere mu maaso

translation.en: We shop the world for you!
translation.lug: Twogera byonna ebifa ku nsi yaffe.

translation.en: It was not a genuine election.
translation.lug: Okulonda kwalimu okubba akalulu.

translation.en: One has to know where we are coming from?
translation.lug: Ddala kyetaagisa omuntu okumanya gye tuvudde?

translation.en: What remained to be your competitors were actually your allies in government who were just escorting you on this joy ride.
translation.lug: Abamu ku abo abaali bakuvuganya beegatta ku gavumenti yo.

translation.en: The biggest problem is that the university lacks autonomy to implement certain decisions.
translation.lug: Ekizibu ekiriwo kiri nti Yunivasite terina buyinza kussa mu nkola ebyo ebiba bisaliddwawo

translation.en: The lecturers are demanding a lot of money from the university.
translation.lug: Abasomesa babanja Yunivasite ssente nnyingi.

translation.en: However, the insurer says the deposits amount to only shillings thirteen billion.
translation.lug: Naye ow'eby'embalirira agamba nti ku akawunta kuliko obuwumbi kkumi n'abusatu bwokka obwa sente za Uganda.

translation.en: We never used to stage strikes for nothing.
translation.lug: Tetutera kwekalakaasa awatali nsonga

translation.en: They were tools to right the wrongs like unjustifiable fees increments and poor policies.
translation.lug: Twekalakaasa nga tuwakanya okwongezebwa kw'ebisale by'essomero oba enkola embi

translation.en: He adds that these events tarnish the image of the university and questions why the government can’t solve them for once and all.
translation.lug: Agamba nti ebyokwekalaakasa byonoona ekifaananyi kya Yunivasite era yeebuuza lwaki gavumenti tegonjoola bizibu ebyo ne biggweerawo ddala

translation.en: For God ’s sake this is the country’s best university.
translation.lug: Eno ye Yunivasite y'eggwanga enkulu.

translation.en: For instance this strike has elevated negotiations to a higher level.
translation.lug: Okwekalakaasa kuno kuviiriddeko ensonga okutwalibwa mu mbuga z'amateeka

translation.en: In case of any problem with the deposited money, government would have to take responsibility towards the depositors.
translation.lug: Bwe kituuka ku bbula lya ssente mu bbanka, gavumenti y'erina okufuba okukubiriza abantu okutereka ssente mu bbanka

translation.en: Let us remove our catalyst.
translation.lug: Katulekeeyo okwogera ku kizibu kyaffe

translation.en: It will not be the first time a strike is suspended to be resumed again.
translation.lug: Okwekalakaasa kusobola okuddamu

translation.en: When the president failed to turn up to the graduation, the lecturer’s hopes were shuttered.
translation.lug: Abasomesa baggwaamu essuubi ng'omukulembeze w'eggwanga tazze ku mattikira.

translation.en: What do you expect?” asked the lecturer.
translation.lug: "Kati olwo ki ky'osuubira?" bw'atyo omusomesa omu bwe yabuuza.

translation.en: Strikes should be expected as long as there are disagreements.
translation.lug: Tusuubira okwekalakaasa

translation.en: Lecturers are paid poorly and not in time because there are no funds and as the result they lay down their tools.
translation.lug: Abasomesa basasulwa bubi, tebasasulwa mu budde olwokuba tewali ssente, ne kinaavamu bajja kussa wansi ebikola

translation.en: The issue of strikes is mainly because of the poor policies made by the university council,” he says.
translation.lug: Agamba nti, "Ekisinga okuleeta okwekalakaasa z'enkola embi eziba zisaliddwawo abo abali ku kakiiko akafuzi aka Yunivasite."

translation.en: They are missing the point.
translation.lug: Bava nnyo ku mulamwa

translation.en: The chairman tried out the two options but he still failed to win the elections in Rubaga.
translation.lug: Ssentebbe bamuwangula mu kalulu k'e Lubaga wadde nga byombi yabikola

translation.en: The results were the riots and murders which followed the two thousand seven general election there.
translation.lug: Okwekalakaasa n'okuttiŋŋana bye byaliwo nga akalulu ka nkumi bbiri mu musanvu kawedde

translation.en: The idea that saving the state was the only way to save the power of those sitting in government.
translation.lug: Endowooza ey'okutaasa eggwanga ye yokka eyali esobola okuwonya abo abalina obuyinza mu gavumenti

translation.en: So, the idea of decentralization was resurrected.
translation.lug: Wajjawo endowooza y'okugabanya obuyinza

translation.en: There is dissatisfaction with government among those who do not benefit directly from its hospitality or who nurse historical unfairness..
translation.lug: Gavumenti teyagalibwa nnyo abo abatalya buteerevu ku keeki y'eggwanga

translation.en: But this does not manifest as touch-proof election majorities or civil unrest.
translation.lug: Naye buno si bukakafu obulaga nti abasinga obungi benyigira ku kulonda oba nti waliwo obutabanguko.

translation.en: Public debate is distracted with changing the people who run the system instead of changing the system itself.
translation.lug: Ebisinga okwogerwako kwe kukyusa abantu abaddukanya enteekateeka eyo mu kifo ky'okukyusa enteekateeka yennyini.

translation.en: One reason this is so is political.
translation.lug: Kiri bwe kityo kubanga kirimu eby'obufuzi.

translation.en: The distribution of people and money by district is not uniform.
translation.lug: Sente n'abantu disitulikiti tebigabanyaamu kyenkanyi.

translation.en: In conditions like that federalism can not work.
translation.lug: Federo teyinza kukolera mu mbeera ng'eyo.

translation.en: Not for lack of passion or new proposals for reform, those are abundant but for the lack of the right tools.
translation.lug: Si lwa kuba  nti tebalina bwagazi kukikola era nga tebalina na birowooza biyinza kuleetawo nkyukakyuka, naye lwa kuba tebalina bikozesebwa bituufu.

translation.en: Elections and constitutions are important.
translation.lug: Okulonda ne konsititusoni bikulu nnyo.

translation.en: That is the point, you need both but they have to arrive together.
translation.lug: Eyo ye nsonga enkulu, byombi obyetaaga naye birina kujjira wamu.

translation.en: This is different than saying federalism is not needed.
translation.lug: Kino kyanjawulo ku kugamba nti enfuga ya federo teyeetaagisa,

translation.en: In general, very strong executives in countries with weak or volatile economies are sponges.
translation.lug: Tekiba kyamakulu okuba n'abakulembeze ab'amaanyi mu nsi eri obubi mu by'enfuna.

translation.en: They soak up money, people and information that could be put to better uses elsewhere.
translation.lug: Baba bajja kutwala ssente n'abantu ebiyinza okukozesebwa awalala.

translation.en: It is fair to ask what the government has done with its monopoly of power.
translation.lug: Kiba kirungi okwebuuza ekyo gavumenti ky'esobodde okukola mu kwefuga obuyinza.

translation.en: If that works, though, it will be because people in the districts have clubbed together.
translation.lug: Ekyo bwe kiba kisoboka, kiba kiraga nti abantu mu disitulikiti bakolera wamu.

translation.en: The Constitutional Court declared the sedition law unconstitutional.
translation.lug: Kkooti eya ssemateeka yagamba nti omusango gw'okulyaamu ensi olukwe teguli mu mateeka.

translation.en: The sedition law was bad law because it was wild, literally making criticism of government a crime.
translation.lug: Etteeka lino erikwata ku kulyaamu ensi olukwe lyali bbi kubanga omuntu yenna bw'ayogera ku gavumenti aba azizza omusango.

translation.en: To remove it from our statute books is therefore an important step in promoting democratic debate.
translation.lug: Singa liggyibwa mu bitabo byaffe eby'amateeka, kijja kutumbula demokulasiya.

translation.en: Anyone who publishes information that is likely to cause disaffection, hatred or contempt against the “person of the president” is a criminal.
translation.lug: Omuntu yenna awandiika ekintu ekikyayisa oba ekivumirira pulezidenti, aba mumenyi w'amateeka.

translation.en: Therefore, people should be free to try and spread disaffection, hatred and contempt against him personally.
translation.lug: N'olwekyo, abantu basaanidde okuba n'eddembe okukola ekintu ng'ekyo.

translation.en: To criminalise such actions is as good as saying the president should not be criticised.
translation.lug: Okulowooza nti omuntu aba ezizza omusango okukola ekintu ng'ekyo, kiba kiraga nti pulezidenti talina kwogerwako.

translation.en: The existence of independent courts and  judges with confidence to make a judgment against the state could only have been possible.
translation.lug: Kyandibadde kisoboka okuba ne kkooti eyetengeredde era n'abalamuzi abeetengeredde abasobola okusalira gavumenti omusango.

translation.en: Instead, the government has promised to appeal to the Supreme Court, itself a legally legitimate step.
translation.lug: Mu kifo ky'ekyo, gavumenti esuubizza okuddukira mu kkooti ensukulumu, ate nga nayo eriwo mu mateeka.

translation.en: Besides, the Supreme Court has almost already pronounced itself on this law.
translation.lug: Ng'oggyeko ekyo, kkooti ensukulumu emaze okulaga oludda lw'eriko ku tteeka lino.

translation.en: The principles of command set out in that judgment formed the basis for the judgment.
translation.lug: Omusingi oguli mu nsala y'omusango gwe gwesigamiziddwako okusala omusango.

translation.en: The president and his ruling party have consistently argued that they put in place a democratisation process.
translation.lug: Pulezidenti n'ekibiina kye ekiri mu buyinza bulijjo bagamba nti bataddewo enkola ya demokulasiya.

translation.en: The basis of this process was the constitution making exercise.
translation.lug: Enkola eno yeesigamiziddwa ku kukolebwa kwa konsititusoni.

translation.en: There is therefore a big gap between promoting democracy and the actual politics.
translation.lug: N'olwekyo waliwo enjawulo ya maanyi nnyo wakati w'okutumbula demokulasiya n'eby'obufuzi.

translation.en: On the contrary, it has reinforced many of them.
translation.lug: Okwawukana ku ekyo, ebiwadde amaanyi.

translation.en: It is currently writing a media regulatory law.
translation.lug: Mu kiseera kino waliwo okuwandiikibwa kw'amateeka agafuga emikutu gy'eby'empuliziganya.

translation.en: This has previously been driven by the spread of radio.
translation.lug: Kino kitumbuddwa nnyo olwa radiyo ezeeyongedde obungi.

translation.en: Increasingly, the computer and the mobile phone handset are connecting most especially around information and news.
translation.lug: Okusingira ddala kompyuta n'amasimu bituusa ku bantu amawulire aga wano.

translation.en: Moreover, across this country, there is an unsual boom in education at all levels, most importantly secondary and university education.
translation.lug: Songa ate mu nsi endala waliyo bingi ebikwata ku by'enjigiriza nnaddala ebyo ebya siniya ne Yunivasite.

translation.en: Websites and blogs are spreading like wildfire and today constitute the most effective forms of communication by our growing middleclass.
translation.lug: Emikuttu emiyunga bantu nagyo gyeyongedde obungi ne kiba nti eby'empuliziganya byeyongedde okuba ebirungi.

translation.en: The registrar, dressed in a navy-blue suit, was not used to the media spotlight.
translation.lug: Omuwandiisi eyali ayambadde esuuti eya bululu yali tamanyiridde kubuuzibwa bibuuzo bannamawulire.

translation.en: Together the men were challenging the constitutionality of the rebellion charges the state had imposed against them.
translation.lug: Bombi baali bawakanya obutuufu bw'omusango gw'obujeemu gavumenti gwe yali ebasibyeko.

translation.en: Around the country, journalists, politicians, students were glued to their televisions in prediction.
translation.lug: Okwetooloola eggwanga lyonna, bannamawulire, bannabyabufuzi n'abayizi amaaso baali bagasimbye ku ttivi zaabwe.

translation.en: The Daily Monitor’s newsroom briefly stopped chasing their daily stories to hear the Constitutional Court’s decision.
translation.lug: Ab'olupapula lw'amawulire olwa Monitor baasooka ne bayimirizaamu okufulumya amawulire nga bwe balinda okusalawo kwa kkooti ya ssemateeka.

translation.en: After the summation came a summary of the submissions of the petitioner and a summary of the state’s responses.
translation.lug: Oluvannyuma lw'ensala ya kkooti, baawa okuwumbawumba okukwata ku muwaabi w'omusango n'ekyo gavumenti kye yagamba.

translation.en: The strength of officeholders and institutions at the centre is decreasing relative to the rest of the country.
translation.lug: Amaanyi g'abo abali mu zi ofiisi ne gavumenti yennyini geeyongera okukkendera mu ggwanga lyonna.

translation.en: In Uganda there is frustration with the government but no real balance to it.
translation.lug: Mu Uganda abantu bawulira nga gavumenti ebamazzeemu amaanyi naye tebalina kya kukola.

translation.en: And also local government, or it could have tried to buy off disaffected tribes.
translation.lug: Era ne gavumenti ez'ebitundu, oba yandigezezaako okusasula ebikka ebitali bimativu.

translation.en: The realisation that worse violence was near and the influence of donors and international agencies finally brought home the idea.
translation.lug: Eky'okuba nti ebikolwa eby'obukambwe eby'amaanyi byali biri kumpi okukoma, era n'obuyambi bw'abagabirizi b'obuyambi n'ebibiina ebirala  mu nsi yonna, byasobozesa ensonga okulambikibwa obulungi.

translation.en: This was because districts were too poor to deliver on the short term expectations of participants.
translation.lug: Kyali bwe kityo kubanga disitulikiti zaali njavu nnyo nga tezesobola kutuukiriza ekyo mu kiseera ekitono ekyali kibaweereddwa.

translation.en: And not everybody in a district is an opponent of the central government.
translation.lug: Si buli omu mu disitulikiti nti mulabe wa gavumenti.

translation.en: And far from pressure to limit the total there is little standing in the way of increasing it by administrative order.
translation.lug: Ng'oggyeko okukolera mu bugubi, waliwo obutamanya ngeri ya kukolamu mirimu.

translation.en: But they must arrive together with economic power directed to the same end if they are to be successful.
translation.lug: Naye bwe baba ab'okutuuka ku buwanguzi, balina okuba n'ekiruubirirwa kimu mu nkola y'emirimu.

translation.en: And even to manipulate or avoid rulings of the High Court.
translation.lug: Era n'okulimba oba okwewala ensala ya kkooti enkulu.

translation.en: Because they are the only institution strong enough to ensure that it gets what it wants.
translation.lug: Kubanga kye kitongole kyokka ekisobola okukakasa nti kifuna bye kyagala.

translation.en: Pooled resources and created political and economic power through their cooperation and directed it to their own, local benefit.
translation.lug: Beegatta ne bassaawo eby'obufuzi n'eby'enfuna okuyitira mu bibiina byabwe ebiyamba abantu mu kitundu kyabwe.

translation.en: That is according to the law of sedition.
translation.lug: Ekyo kisinziira ku tteeka erikwata ku kulya mu nsi olukwe.

translation.en: Those who feel an incumbent president has done a poor job.
translation.lug: Abo abalowooza nti pulezidenti aliko takoze mulimu mulungi.

translation.en: This is in the sedition suit in the Constitutional Court.
translation.lug: Kino kiri mu musango oguli mu kkooti ogukwata ku kulya mu nsi olukwe.

translation.en: This is if combined with the spread of mobile phone usage across the country is rapidly rendering government control of information flow.
translation.lug: Kiri bwe kityo singa okwongerezaako, enkozesa y'amasimu mu ggwanga yeeyongera okuleetera gavumenti okufuga eby'empuliziganya.

translation.en: Luckily, giraffes have elastic blood vessels in their necks, this makes it possible for them to drink water from a stream, without fainting.
translation.lug: Ekirungi kiri nti entugga zirina emisuwa egigonda mu bulago egigisobozesa okunywa amazzi mu luzzi ne zitaziyiira.

translation.en: A group of giraffes constitute a herd.
translation.lug: Entugga bwe zibeera awamu nga nnyingi, kiba kiraalo.

translation.en: Neck wrestling matches are often held to show authority in their herds.
translation.lug: Okuzannya kwe ziba nabo nga zikozesa obulago, kiba kiraga obuyinza bwe zirina mu kiraalo.

translation.en: A giraffe is the one of the largest, strongest and peaceful animals on Earth.
translation.lug: Entugga y'emu ku nsolo ezisingayo okuba ennene, ez'amaanyi era ez'emirembe mu nsi yonna.

translation.en: An adult male giraffe is called a bull, a female is called a cow and a young giraffe a calf.
translation.lug: Entugga enkulu nga nsajja eyitibwa nnume, ate enkazi eyitibwa nte ate ento eyitibwa nyana.

translation.en: The average life span of a giraffe is twenty to twenty five years.
translation.lug: Entugga esobola okuwangala emyaka abiri oba abiri mu ettaano.

translation.en: A large male giraffe can eat up to one hundred pounds of food in a single day.
translation.lug: Entugga ennene obulungi esobola okulya kilo nga attaano olunaku.

translation.en: He was replaced by successive insatiable other eaters.
translation.lug: Yasikirwa abalala ab'omululu.

translation.en: What is most amusing is his reason for not leaving.
translation.lug: Ekisinga okwewunyisa ye nsonga gye yawa ey'obutagenda.

translation.en: That his government has made a lot of money for the country and it would be foolhardy to leave it for others to enjoy it.
translation.lug: Nti kubanga gavumenti ye ekoze ssente nnyingi nnyo era nti kyandibadde kya busiru okuzirekera abalala okuzirya.

translation.en: Now that he is entering the last year of his contract, he says he cannot leave because he has made a lot of profit for the company.
translation.lug: Kati ng'ayingidde omwaka ggwe ogusembayo, agamba nti tayinza kugenda kubanga kampuni agikoledde ssente nnyingi nnyo.

translation.en: We are entering a good service with the production of oil, security is good and those who led the liberation should be part of the team that looks after these resources.
translation.lug: Kati tugenda kuyingira mu buweereza obulungi kubanga amafuta gagenda kutandika okusimibwa, eby'okwerinda nabyo birungi era abo abeenyigira mu kununula ensi eno basaanidde okuba mu abo abagenda okulabirira eby'obuggaga buno.

translation.en: The president concluded that it was a strange occurrence.
translation.lug: Pulezidenti yagamba nti ekyo ekibaddewo si kya bulijjo.

translation.en: When a manager makes profit for a company and even gives dividends to the shareholders, does he declare he cannot leave to let new managers eat the money he made for the enterprise?
translation.lug: Manejja bw'akola amagoba era n'abalala abali mu busineesi eyo n'abawa ennyongeza, kiba kiraga nti tasaanidde kugenda alekere bamanejja abalala nabo balye ku ssente ze yakolera kampuni?

translation.en: Cruel hand of death strikes and life can be real cruel.
translation.lug: Okufa bwe kubaawo, obulamu buyinza okuzibuwala.

translation.en: Imagine you are wining, dining and dancing and in the next hour you are in a mortuary or unconscious on the hospital bed.
