translation.lug: Kubamu akafaananyi ng'otuuse ku buwanguzi, oli ku mmeeza olya era ng'ozina n'amazina, naye mu ssaawa eddako n'oba ng'oli mu ggwanika oba ng'oli mu ddwaliro totegeera.

translation.en: The police said the cause of accident is suspected to have been high speed and overloading.
translation.lug: Poliisi yagamba nti okuvuga endiima n'okuttika akabindo bye byaviirako akabenje.

translation.en: Driving under influence of alcohol could not be ruled out in such circumstances.
translation.lug: Era kiyinzika n'okuba nti eyali avuga yali atamidde.

translation.en: Such is the everyday trend of carnage on the Ugandan roads.
translation.lug: Ekyo bulijjo kye kiviirako obubenje mu nguudo za Uganda.

translation.en: The fire outbreak that destroyed merchandise of unspecified amount was attributed to an electric fault.
translation.lug: Kyagambibwa nti omuliro ogwasanyaawo eby'amaguzi ebingi bwe kibyo gwava ku masanyalaze agaaliko ekizibu.

translation.en: Voting in many parts of the country was disrupted by violence and the delay of election materials.
translation.lug: Okulonda mu bitundu bingi eby'eggwanga kwatabulwatabulwa olw'okulwanagana n'okulwawo kw'ebikozesebwa mu kulonda.

translation.en: By then, however, at least 32 lives, including members of parliament, had been lost.
translation.lug: Kyokka, mu kiseera ekyo, abantu nga 32 nga mw'otwalidde n'omubaka wa palamenti baali bafiiriddwa obulamu bwabwe.

translation.en: This is an extraordinary casualty toll in a single military offensive.
translation.lug: Abantu abo abaafa omulundi ogumu baali bangi nnyo okusinga ku mbeera eya bulijjo ng'amaggye gazinzeeko ekitundu.

translation.en: But one firm lesson has been delivered.
translation.lug: Naye waliwo eky'okuyiga eky'amaanyi kye tufunye mu kino.

translation.en: Africa is unable to sort its house in order.
translation.lug: Afirika terina busobozi kumalawo bizibu byayo.

translation.en: Supporters of federo here are asking themselves whether Ugandans could accomplish the same thing.
translation.lug: Abo abawagira federo beebuuza obanga Uganda esobola okukola ekintu kye kimu.

translation.en: It might not surprise anyone if the oil proceeds go into the pockets of only those who led the liberation.
translation.lug: Kiyinza obuteewunyisa muntu yenna singa ssente eziva mu mafuta zigenda mu nsawo z'abo abaakulemberamu olutalo lw'okununula.

translation.en: He has been leading our country for a quarter of a century hence the levels of poverty in the country and the level of corruption.
translation.lug: Y'abadde omukulembeze w'ensi yaffe okumala emyaka 25 n'olwekyo tekyewunyisa nti waliwo obwavu obw'amaanyi mu nsi yaffe awomu n'obuli bw'enguzi.

translation.en: So whoever engages in kidnap must be treated as a terrorist.
translation.lug: N'olwekyo, buli muntu eyenyigira mu kiwamba bantu alina kutwalibwa ng'omutujju.

translation.en: The main causes of the estimated five million deaths of children under the age of five are malnutrition, diarrheoa, respiratory infections and malaria.
translation.lug: Ebisinga okuleetera abaana okufa abateebeerezebwa okuba mu bukadde butaano abali wansi w'emyaka ettaano kwe kulya obubi, ekiddukano, ekiziyiiro n'omusujja gw'ensiri.

translation.en: In Uganda the people do not own the budget.
translation.lug: Mu Uganda abantu si be bannanyini mbalirira ya ggwanga.

translation.en: The desire cannot be contained forever by prison walls, or martial laws, or secret police.
translation.lug: Okwagala okukola ekintu tekuyinza kumalibwawo makomera, amateeka agakwata ku bufumbo, oba poliisi.

translation.en: Over time, and across the Earth, freedom will find a way.
translation.lug: Ekiseera kituuka era mu nsi yonna ne wabaawo eddembe.

translation.en: It always seems impossible until its done.
translation.lug: Bulijjo kiba kirabika ng'ekitasoboka okutuusa nga kikoleddwa.

translation.en: There were wild celebrations among journalists and politicians last week when the Constitutional Court nullified the sedition law.
translation.lug: Waaliwo okujjaganya kwa maanyi nnyo wiiki ewedde mu bannamawulire ne mu bannabyabufuzi nga kkooti esazizzaamu etteeka erikwata ku kulya mu nsi olukwe.

translation.en: Each time a giraffe lifts up its neck it picks up five hundred and fifty pounds.
translation.lug: Entugga buli lw'eyimusa obulago bwaayo, eyoola kilo 275.

translation.en: A new born giraffe measures about six feet.
translation.lug: Entugga eyaakazaalibwa eweza ffuuti mukaaga obuwanvu.

translation.en: A giraffe is one of the animals who is born with a horn.
translation.lug: Entugga y'emu ku nsolo ezizaalibwa n'amayembe.

translation.en: The scientific name of the giraffe is Camelopardalis.
translation.lug: Erinnya ly'Entugga erya kinnasayansi ye Camelopardalis.

translation.en: Each giraffe has a unique coat pattern.
translation.lug: Buli Ntugga erina engeri ya njawulo gy'eba ettoneddwattoneddwamu.

translation.en: The tongue of an adult giraffe measures twenty seven inches.
translation.lug: Olulimu lw'Entugga enkulu luweza yinkyi abiri mu musanvu.

translation.en: Giraffes are vegetarians and live on the leaves of the baobab tree.
translation.lug: Entugga zirya muddo n'amakoola g'emiti.

translation.en: Every step a giraffe takes is fifteen feet in length.
translation.lug: Buli lutta entugga lw'ekuba luweza ffuuti kkumi na taano.

translation.en: The giraffe is able to grasp objects such as leaves with the help of its tongue.
translation.lug: Entugga zikozesa olulimi lwaazo okukwata ebintu gamba ng'ebikoola by'omuti.

translation.en: Giraffes sleep for no more than five to thirty minutes in twenty four hours.
translation.lug: Entugga zeebaka kumala ddakiika ezitasukka ttaano oba amakumi asatu mu ssaawa abiri mu nnya.

translation.en: The film has been screened around the world, collecting praise and six international awards.
translation.lug: Firimu eno ekwatiddwa okwetooloola ensi yonna, era etenderezeddwa nnyo era n'efuna n'ebirabo mukaaga eby'ensi yonna.

translation.en: As it stands, the industry is propped up by one off commissions, donations, art grants and filmmakers who are able to self-finance.
translation.lug: Kino kiwomyemu omutwe abakwasi ba firimu abasobola okweyimirizaawo bokka.

translation.en: There is no properly functioning infrastructure that ensures any lasting growth.
translation.lug: Tewaliiwo kintu kyonna kikola bulungi kiyinza kuleetawo nkolakulaana ya lubeerera.

translation.en: The best he can hope for is to leave it with the people who run the pirate DVD racket around the country as they have more expertise than anyone else.
translation.lug: Ekintu ekisingayo obulungi ky'ayinza okusuubira kwe kukirekera abantu abaddukanya DVD okwetooloola eggwanga lyonna kubanga bo balina obumanyirivu okusinga omunutu omulala yenna.

translation.en: There is no legitimate framework that filmmakers can work within once they’ve actually created their product, it just gets released to whomever or wherever will stock it.
translation.lug: Tewaliiwo nkola yonna ekkirizibwa mu mateeka nti abakwasi ba firimu basobola okukolera wano kasita bamala okukola ebintu byabwe, biweebwa omuntu yenna anaasobola okubitunda.

translation.en: The only way he has ever gotten any recognition is by entering film festivals.
translation.lug: Ekintu kyokka mwe yali amanyikiddwa kwe kuba nti yayingira mu lwokaano lw'okukwata firimu.

translation.en: Sometimes it takes too long for films to get here or they don’t appear at all, so in the end I grow tired of looking for it.
translation.lug: Oluusi kitwala ekiseera kiwanvu firimu okutuuka wano era oluusi tezirabikira ddala, n'olwekyo ku nkomerero nkoowa okuzinoonya.

translation.en: He stripped it back to the basics of what being in a creative industry means, communication.
translation.lug: Yannyonnyola bulungi ebyo ebizingirwamu okusobola okukola omulimu guno ogwetaagisa okuba omuteeteenkanya, nga kwe kuba n'empuliziganya ennungi.

translation.en: It’s all about being an excellent communicator.
translation.lug: Kyetaagisa okuba n'empuliziganya ennungi.

translation.en: Film is the language of many different nations and people, I truly believe that it has the ability to change the world.
translation.lug: Firimu lwe lulimi olwogerwa amawanga mangi n'abantu abatali bamu, era nkikkiriza nti kisobola okukyusa ensi eno.

translation.en: For her, it’s something she feels she has to do.“Acting lives in me" she says.
translation.lug: Yalowooza nti kye kintu ky'alina okukola. "Okuzannya abantu abalala" bw'atyo bw'agamba.

translation.en: She says if they gave her any part, she would do it.
translation.lug: Agamba nti singa bamuwa ekitundu kyonna, asobola okukizannya.

translation.en: "I know I’ll make it, I have faith, I have hope" she says.
translation.lug: Agamba nti: "mmanyi nga njakukisobola, ekyo nkikkiriza, era nkisuubira."

translation.en: She is always perfectly dressed, ready trained for stardom, and burns with ambition.
translation.lug: Bulijjo aba ayambadde bulungi, nga yeetegekedde okuba emmunyeenye era ng'alina okwagala kungi nnyo.

translation.en: Her days are spent meeting with potential employers, cajoling them, networking, persuading and constantly selling herself to everyone just in case they might be the ones to take her to the heady heights of fame.
translation.lug: Buli kiseera aba asisinkana abo abayinza okumuwa emirimu, ng'afuba okubamatiza, ng'akolagana n'abantu abalala, ng'abasendasenda era ng'afuba okwewomya eri buli muntu sinakindi nga be basobola okumuyamba okuyitamu.

translation.en: This is part of what these workshops have given her.
translation.lug: Bino by'afunye mu nkuŋŋaana nga zino.

translation.lug: Bwe tutabaako kye tukolawo, ffenna tujja kukosebwa.

translation.en: We also need to start thinking about new tools, including a malaria vaccine, which could complement existing interventions.
translation.lug: Era tulina okutandika okulowooza ku birala eby'okukozesa nga mw'otwalidde okugema omusujja gw'ensiri, era kino kiyinza okuyambako enkola eriwo mu kiseera kino.

translation.en: Vaccines and immunization services have been critical to improving Africa’s health over the last several decades.
translation.lug: Okugema kuyambye nnyo mu kutereeza obulamu bw'abantu mu Afirica okumala emyaka mingi egiyise.

translation.en: There are only few of us who have not directly been affected by the disease but anyone whose child has suffered from malaria can imagine what a malaria vaccine would mean.
translation.lug: Tuli batono nnyo abatannakwatibwa bulwadde obwo naye omuntu yenna alina omwana eyali akwatiddwa omusujja gw'ensiri amanyi nga bwe kiri ekikulu okufuna eddagala erigema omusujja gw'ensiri.

translation.en: Several years ago, when I started working in pharmaceuticals, a malaria vaccine was only a distant dream.
translation.lug: Emyaka mingi egiyise we nnatandikira okukola ng'omusawo agaba eddagala, kyali tekirowoozeka nti eddagala erigema omusujja gw'ensiri lisobola okufunika.

translation.en: The vaccine candidate is approaching the end of a long journey.
translation.lug: Tunaatera okufuna eddagala eryo.

translation.en: Policymakers will need to design a policy structure and strengthen health systems.
translation.lug: Abo abakola amateeka kijja kubeetaagisa okussaawo enkola enneegobererwa era ennenyweza eby'obulamu.

translation.en: This means everything from improving infrastructure and delivery systems to training healthcare workers to administer a new vaccine.
translation.lug: Kino kiba kizingiramu byonna okuviira ddala ku kutereeza enkola egobererwa, enkola ey'okubitambuza, n'okutendeka abasawo okusobola okugema.

translation.en: These efforts can build upon work that is already underway for other new tools, such as rotavirus and pneumococcal vaccines.
translation.lug: Bino biyinza okwongerezebwa ku ebyo ebiriwo mu kiseera kino okusobola okufuna ebikozesebwa ebirala, gamba nga eddagala erigema eriyitibwa rotavirus ne pneumococcal.

translation.en: Partners need to get involved.
translation.lug: N'abantu abalala balina okwenyigiramu.

translation.en: The chemicals involved are mostly bought by the small companies in soft drink and alcohol business.
translation.lug: Ebiragalalagala ebikozesebwa bigulibwa okusingira ddala amakolero amatono agakola eby'okunywa.

translation.en: The health danger to the consumer of such expired chemicals is that the active ingredients become inactive.
translation.lug: Kino kisobola okubeera eky'akabi eri obulamu bw'abo ababikozesa.

translation.en: He warns that the most affected products on the list of expired consumer goods.
translation.lug: Awa okulabula ku bimu ku bintu ebyo bye balina ku lukalala ebiyinza okuba nga byayitako.

translation.en: We need more money to be able to deepen awareness more effectively.
translation.lug: Twetaaga ssente ezimala okusobola okunyikizza okuyigiriza kwaffe eri abantu nga tubalabula.

translation.en: We would want police to confiscate commodities which they suspect to be expired and then call us.
translation.lug: Twagala poliisi ebowe ebintu ebiteeberezebwa okuba nga byayitako era batuyite.

translation.en: We want it to get to that point where people should not only get arrested for criminals because it is under the Police Act.
translation.lug: Twagala kituuke ku ssa eryo nga tekikoma bukomi ku kukwata bantu olw'okuzza emisango kubanga kiri mu mateeka agafuga Poliisi.

translation.en: “Because of weak regulation, when they are arrested they pay the fine and return to business,” he said.
translation.lug: Yagamba nti olw'amateeka amanafu, abantu bwe bakwatibwa basasula ssente ne beddirayo okukola emirimu gyabwe."

translation.en: Stricter new laws could help.
translation.lug: Amateeka amakakali gayinza okuyambako.

translation.en: Impacts of corruption are destructive for both private and public sectors.
translation.lug: Ebyo ebiva mu buli bw'enguzi bikosa bonna.

translation.en: I think two of the major solutions to corruption are to strengthen moral value systems.
translation.lug: Nze ndowooza nti ebintu bibiri ku ebyo ebisinga obukulu ebiyinza okuyamba mu kulwanyisa obuli bw'enguzi kwe kuyamba abantu okuba n'empisa ennungi.

translation.en: Most private sector entrepreneurs in Uganda lack information, how can this be overcome for them to go into public private partnerships?
translation.lug: Abasuubuzi bangi mu Uganda balina ekizibu eky'obutaba na kumanya, bayinza batya okuyambibwa?

translation.en: We are developing an integrated communication system that will allow feedforward and feedback delivery of business information.
translation.lug: Tulina enkola ey'eby'empuliziganya gye tukola enneetusobozesa okumanya ebibafaako nabo okumanya ebitukwatako.

translation.en: Our efforts will tap into unity of other private and public agencies engaged in brokerage of business information.
translation.lug: Okufuba kwaffe kujja kusobozesa abalala abakola busineesi okufuna okumanya okwetaagisa.

translation.en: Skilled labour or human capital is key software for a country to develop and maintain development.
translation.lug: Abantu abakola obulungi emirimu bamugaso nnyo eri enkulaakulana y'ensi.

translation.en: The issue of skilled labour is historical and has to be resolved through fair and complete change options.
translation.lug: Ensonga eno ekwata ku bakozi abalina obukugu si ya kakati era kino kirina okutereezebwa okuyitira mu nkola ennuŋŋamu.

translation.en: This action will restore their confidence and allow their availability in the expansive labour market provided by the Common Market.
translation.lug: Enkola eno ejja kubaleetera okuba nga tebeetya era ejja kubasobozesa okwenyigira mu mirimu gyonna eginnabaawo.

translation.en: This is happening at a time when the country is experiencing unsual population with a high fertility rate.
translation.lug: Kino kituukidde mu kiseera ng'eggwanga lyeyongeddemu abantu olw'okuba bazaala nnyo.

translation.en: Where food production fails to match or exceed population growth you have terrible food insecurity as a result.
translation.lug: Emmere bw'eba nga ntono ku bantu abali mu ggwanga, awo ab'olina ekizibu kya maanyi.

translation.en: Though the overall poverty rate in Uganda has fallen in recent years, about four million households, half of them classed as “subsistence".
translation.lug: Wadde ng'obungi bw'abantu abankuseere mu Uganda bukendeddeko gyebuvuddeko awo, abantu obukadde nga buna, nga kimu kyakubiri ku bo batwalibwa okuba abo abakolerera okubaawo obubeezi.

translation.en: Large and small scale commercial farming will only be possible if as a country and people increase financing for the sector.
translation.lug: Kijja kusoboka okukola eby'obulimi ku kigero ekinene n'ekitono singa ffenna ng'eggwanga era ng'abantu kinnoomu twongera ssente mu by'obulimi.

translation.en: We must also invest in rehabilitation of our environmental and ecological togetherness.
translation.lug: Era tulina okuteeka ssente mu kudaabiriza ebintu nga mw'otwalidde n'embeera etwetoolodde.

translation.en: Sebaggala denied he had crossed to National Resistance Movement  four years ago.
translation.lug: Sebaggala yagaana okukkiriza nti yasala eddiiro n'adda mu kibiina kya National Resistance Movement emyaka ena emabega

translation.en: But in any case, what is wrong with cooperating with Museveni and the NRM?
translation.lug: Naye kikyamu ki ekiri mu kukolagana ne Museveni n'ekibiina kya NRM?

translation.en: Did they want me to be like Ssebaana who spent most of his time as mayor trading words with Museveni?
translation.lug: Baali baagala mbeerenga Ssebaana eyamala ebiseera bye byonna ng'awanyisaganya ebigambo ne Museveni?

translation.en: Sebaggala stood for the Democratic Party  presidency during the party’s Delegates Conference in Mbale in February this year, but lost to Norbert Mao.
translation.lug: Sebaggala yeesimbawo okulondebwa nga pulezidenti w'Ekibiina kya DP mu ttabamiruka w'ekibiina e Mbale mu Febwali omwaka guno naye Norbert Mao n'amuwangula

translation.en: Party members who attended the Mbale conference say the money Sebaggala was dishing out before and during the conference aroused suspicion about the source
translation.lug: Bannakibiina abaaliwo mu lukuŋŋana e Mbale bagamba nti sente Sebaggala ze yagaba ng'olukuŋŋaana terunatandika era nga lugenda mu maaso, zeewuunyisa nnyo abantu wa gye yazigya

translation.en: They say that during private meetings with DP members, Sebaggala would often talk about striking  a power sharing deal with Museveni
translation.lug: Bagamba nti bwe yasisinkananga bamemba b'Ekibiina kya DP, Sebaggala yayogeranga ku ky'okugabana obuyinza ne Museveni

translation.en: It was strange that he was talking about doing business with Museveni if he failed to get a fifty one percent majority in the coming elections
translation.lug: Kyewuunyisa okuba nti yali ayogera ku kukola bizineensi ne Museveni singa alemwa okufuna ebitundu ataano ku kikumi mu kulonda okujja

translation.en: Sources say that Sebaggala provided some of the mattresses for the delegates
translation.lug: Abamu bangamba nti Sebaggala yawa abamu ku bagenyi emifaliso

translation.en: They wondered how the UPDF could have released its mattresses to facilitate an opposition conference unless someone high in government was interested in Sebaggala taking the Democratic Party presidency
translation.lug: Beewuunya engeri UPDF gye yawaayo emifaliso gyayo okuvujjirira olukuŋŋaana lw'abo bali ku ludda oluvuganya okugyako nga waliwo omukungu okuva mu gavumenti awagira Sebaggala okufuuka pulezidenti w'Ekibiina kya DP

translation.en: This has impelled observers to say Sebaggala had long planned to hand over DP to Museveni and the NRM, but his mission was thwarted by the defeat at the Mbale conference
translation.lug: Kino kyawaliriza abalaba ebigenda mu maaso okugamba nti Sebaggala amaze ekiseera ng'akola entegeka okuwaayo ekibiina kya DP eri Museveni ne NRM, naye ekigenderwa kye kyagwa butaka mu lukuŋŋaana olwali e Mbale

translation.en: The NRM has celebrated Sebaggala’s arrival
translation.lug: NRM yasanyukira okujja kwa Sebaggala

translation.en: NRM spokesperson, Mary Karooro Okurut wrote: “Sebaggala is one of those few people in Uganda who are a little more than just individuals.
translation.lug: Omwogezi w'ekibiina kya NRM, Mary Karooro Okurut yawandiika nti: "Sebaggala y'omu ku bantu abatono mu Uganda asukkulumako kato ku bantu kinnoomu

translation.en: Mabikke dismissed the assessment as an  overestimation of Sebaggala’s popularity.
translation.lug: Mabikke yasambajja ekya Sebaggala okuba omututumufu

translation.en: It has already been killed by a weed,” Mabikke said.
translation.lug: Mabikke yagamba nti omuddo gumaze okukitta

translation.en: Mabikke says that NRM falsely believes that Sebaggala is the weapon they will deploy to rout the opposition and recapture Kampala
translation.lug: Mabikke agamba nti ekibiina kya NRM kyerimbalimba nti Sebaggala ky'ekyokulwanyisa kye bajja okukozesa okusaanyaawo oludda oluvuganya n'okuddamu okuwamba Kampala

translation.en: Opposition FDC candidate Dr Kizza Besigye received 245,004 votes, which translate into over 50% of the total votes cast
translation.lug: Eyesimbawo ku ludda oluvuganya ow'ekibiina kya FDC Dr Kizza Besigye yafuna obululu 245,004 nga bino bye bitundu ataano ku buli kikumu ku bululu bwonna obwakubibwa

translation.en: Democratic Party candidate Ssebaana Kizito got 11,993 votes, Abed Bwanika 3,045 votes and Miria Obote 1,425
translation.lug: Eyesimbawo mu Kibiina kya DP Ssebaana Kizito yafuna obululu 11,993, Abed Bwanika 3,045 Miria Obote 1,425

translation.en: Museveni scored 170,688 votes.
translation.lug: Museveni yafuna obululu 170,688

translation.en: If the 2006 electoral statistics are anything to go by, Sebaggala cannot deliver Kampala to the NRM
translation.lug: Singa ebyava mu kulonda mu 2006 bye bikozesebwa, Sebaggala tayinza kuwaayo Kampala eri ekibiina kya NRM

translation.en: How long did he stay with the Progressive Democratic Party?
translation.lug: Mu kibiina kya Progressive Democratic Party yamalamu bbanga ki?

translation.en: "How long did he stay with LDP before he ran to the NRM?” Kezaala wonders
translation.lug: Kezaala agamba nti, "yamala bbanga ki mu kibiina kya LDP nga tannagenda mu NRM?"

translation.en: Mabikke says that all Kampala Division Chairpersons except Godfrey Nyakana and all MPs except Freddie Ruhindi, were key mobilisers and planners in Sebaggala’s 2006 campaigns, but have since fallen out with him.
translation.lug: Mabikke agamba nti Basentebe bonna mu Kampala okugyako Godfrey Nyakana era n'ababaka ba palimenti bonna okugyako Freddie Ruhindi, baali basaale mu kunoonyezza Sebaggala akalulu mu 2006, naye okuva olwo, tebakolagana naye

translation.en: He supports the claim that Sebaggala cannot win an election on his own.
translation.lug: Akiriziganya n'ekigambibwa nti Sebaggala tayinza kuwangula okulonda ku lulwe yekka

translation.en: Senior researcher at Makerere Institute of Social Research, Golooba Mutebi, also believes Sebaggala will not add any political value to the NRM.
translation.lug: Omukugu mu kunoonyereza okuva e Makerere Institute of Social Research, Golooba Mutebi, naye akkiriza nti Sebaggala talina kintu kyonna kya byabufunzi ekiyinza okuyamba NRM

translation.en: “History will judge us,” Sebaggala said defiantly.
translation.lug: Sebaggala yakyogera kaati nti "Ebyafaayo bijja kutulamula"

translation.en: His first election as mayor in 1997 was based on his DP membership and his participation in 1996 presidential campaigns for the joint candidate of Inter Political Forces Cooperation.
translation.lug: Omulundu gwe ogwasooka okulondebwa ku bwa meeya mu 1997 kwesigama ku kuba nti yali wa kibiina kya DP n'okunoonya akalulu k'obwapulezidenti okw'oyo eyali yeggase ne banne eyali ow'ekibiina kya Plitico Force Cooeration

translation.en: In 2001 Sebaggala supported Besigye who was standing under the Reform Agenda flagship.
translation.lug: Mu 2001 Sebaggala yawagira Besigye eyali owa Reform Agend

translation.en: At that time the NRM ridiculed Besigye as unfit for a national leader for allying with a convicted fraudster yet he was purporting to fight corruption in government.
translation.lug: yali mukumpanya naye yali awagira okulwanyisa obuli bw'enguzi mu gavumenti

translation.en: It’s now the same NRM that is applauding Sebaggala as a big political catch that will boost the party’s support in 2011.
translation.lug: Kati ekibiina kya NRM kye kimu ekitendereza Sebaggala nga munnabyabufuzi ajja okutuumbula obuwagizi bw'ekibiina mu 2011

translation.en: The problem of double registration in Uganda in the voters’ register has been teasing the Electoral Commission for last three elections.
translation.lug: Ekizibu ky'okuwandiika abalonzi emirundi ebiri mu Uganda kubadde kusoomo kw'amaanyi eri Akakiiko k'Eby'okulanda mu kulonda kwa mirundi esatu emabega

translation.en: Pontius Namugera you have so far identified 150,000 double registrations; does that mean you have cleared the voter register by 150,000?
translation.lug: Pontius Namugera ozudde amanya 150,000 agawandiikiddwa emirundi ebiri; kino kitegeeza nti osangudde amanya 150,000 mu nkalala z'abalonzi?

translation.en: Kalisa’s latest project is to invite bids from fuel operators to manage the national fuel reserves at Jinja in spite of an earlier agreement with Tamoil to manage the same facility as part of the KenyaUganda petroleum products pipeline.
translation.lug: Kati omulimu gwa Kalisa kwe kunoonya abakozi b'amafuta okuddukanya amaterekero g'amafuta ag'e Jinja wadde nga waaliwo endagaano eyakolebwa ne kampuni ya Tamoil okukola mu kifo ekyo ng'ekitundu ky'omuddumu gw'amafuta ogwa Kenya ne Uganda

translation.en: The reserves on Mutibwa Road in Jinja now stand dry and empty with no one to manage them.
translation.lug: Amaterekero agali ku oluguudo lwa Mulibwa e Jinja kati makalu era meerere tewali agalalabirira

translation.en: The bid document indicates that the procurement method for the bid is Open International Bidding, however, in his usual opaque operations style, Kalisa is keeping a tight lid on any information despite a mandatory right to such information by the public.
translation.lug: Ekiwanddiko ekisabirwako buli omu ayagala ekintu kiraga nti enkola eno ya Nsi Yonna, naye mu nkola ye eya bulijjo, Kalisa takiriza kintu kyonna kumayika wadde ng'abantu baddembe okubaako kye bamanya

translation.en: The Ministry of Energy decision on how to manage the oil reserves is supposed to be approved by parliament but MP Fred Bukeni Gyabi, who is the Chairman of the Parliamentary Committee on Natural Resources, says he is not aware of any such bidding and is hearing it from the press.
translation.lug: Okusalawo kwa Ministry of Energy ku ngeri y'okuddukanyamu amaterekero amafuta erina kulina kukolebwa palimenti naye omubaka wa palimenti, Fred Bukeni Gyabi, Ssentebe w'Akakiiko ka Palamenti ak'Eby'Obugagga ebyomu Butonde, agamba nti talina kyamanyi ku kusaba okwo era akuwulira mu mpapula z'amawulire

translation.en: Kalisa’s latest venture is not the first time the ministry is reaching out for bidders to manage the facility.
translation.lug: ebizimbe

translation.en: In 2008 President Museveni said the government’s maintenance of the fuel reserves would unnecessarily tie up public monies.
translation.lug: Mu 2008 pulezidenti Museveni yagamba nti gavumenti okuddukanya amaterekero g'amafuta kiyinza okusiba sente za gavumenti

translation.en: MP Gyabi wonders how the ministry can award a contract to another bidder when they are already in contract with another company
translation.lug: Omubaka wa palamenti Gyabi yeewuunya engeri ekitongole gye kiyinza okuwa omulimu kampuni esaba ng'ate yamaladda okukolagana ne kampuni endala

translation.en: Observers say that Kalisa’s ministry seems to be playing games as its offers are on and off.
translation.lug: Abantu bagamba nti ekitongole kya Kalisa kiri mu muzannyo buzannyo, tekisagasagana

translation.en: However, like many other critics, Parliamentary Energy Committee Chairman Gyabi insists that “the reserves are so critical; they should be a preserve of government,” he says, “that responsibility can not be left to private oriented players.
translation.lug: Kyokka, okufaananako abakolokosi abalala, Sentebe w'Akakiiko ka  Palamenti ak'Amasanyalaze Gyabi agamba nti "amaterekero mabi nnyo; gavumenti ye yandibadde egakuuma," agamba nti, "obuvunaanyizibwa tebuyinza kulekerwa balala.

translation.en: Some experts disagree with Gyabi.
translation.lug: Abakugu abamu tebakkiriziganya na Gyabi

translation.en: Critics say the failures of Kalisa’s ministry stem from its failure to be transparent, poor planning and poor negotiation skills of its officials.
translation.lug: Abakolokosi bagamba nti okugwa kw'ekitongole kya Kalisa kusibuka okukulemwe okuba omwerufu, entegeka embi n'entesaganya embi

translation.en: She was among the first Ugandan loan recipients when BRAC opened shop in Uganda in 2006
translation.lug: Y'omu ku abo abaasooka okufuna okwewola mu banka  BRAC bwe yaggualawo mu Uganda mu 2006

translation.en: But the loans aside, Ruth says she has also benefitted from the basic training and encouragement from BRAC officers
translation.lug: Ng'oggyeko okwewola, Ruth agamba nti aganyuddwa mu kutendekebwa n'okuzibwamu amanyi abakungu ba BRAC

translation.en: Every Monday Ruth deposits Shs 52,725 on her BRAC loan repayment account and says loan repayment is hard and she has to sacrifice to make the weekly repayments
translation.lug: Buli lwa bbalaza Ryth asasula ebbanja lya banka ya BRAC siringi 52,725 era agamba nti si kyangu kusasula bbanja naye neefiriza buli wiiki ne nsasula

translation.en: Instead, she adds, she cannot imagine life without BRAC
translation.lug: Agamba nti tamayi bulamu bwebwandibadde awatali banka BRAC

translation.en: Their fortunes may vary, but BRAC’s clientele has grown phenomenally, to over 130,000 borrowers over the four years they have been in operation in Uganda
translation.lug: Emikisa giyinza okuba egy'enjawulo, naye abo abeewola mu banka BRAC beeyongedde obungi, abeewozi abasukka mu 130,000 beefunye mu myaka enna mu Uganda

translation.en: No wonder BRAC Uganda was one of five institutions nominated for this year’s Africa microfinance bank of the year award
translation.lug: Tekyewuunyisa nti banka ya BRAC mu Uganda y'emu ku bitongole ebitaano ebyalondebwa okuweebwa ekirabo ky'omwaka ekigabibwa banka eziwola

translation.en: BRAC is an acronym for the Bangladesh Rural Advancement Committee
translation.lug: BRAC ye Bangladesh Rural Advancement Committee mu bujjuvu

translation.en: ” Deputy Bank of Uganda Governor Louis Kasekende is one of them
translation.lug: Gavana Louis Kasekende Omumyuka wa Bank of Uganda y'omu ku bo

translation.en: Khondoker Ariful Islam, the founding BRAC Uganda Country Program Head, says BRAC is currently the largest NGO in the developing world, and in Uganda
translation.lug: Khondoker Ariful Islam, eyatandikawo BRAC Uganda Country Program Head, agamba nti BRACkye kitongole ekitali kya gavumenti ekikyasinzeeyo obunnene mu nsi ezikyakula era ne mu Uganda kye kisinga

translation.en: BRAC provides microcredit at an interest rate of 22 percent per year, which is somewhat high, Khondoker admits
translation.lug: Khondoker agamba, banka ya BRAC esaba amagoba ga butundu 22 ku buli kikumi buli mwaka, ekirabika ng'esaba amangi

translation.en: BRAC’s monthly interest rate is 18 per cent
translation.lug: amagoba ga BRAC buli mwezi gali obutundu 18 ku kikumi

translation.en: After setting up the branch offices, the BRAC officers identify the target population of the area, usually within a radius of seven kilometers from the area office
translation.lug: Oluvannyuma lw'okuggulawo yafeesi, abakungu ba BRAC baatandika na bantu bo mu kitundu abali kiromita musanvu okuva awali yafeesi

translation.en: He joined the BRAC organization 27 years ago, soon after graduation
translation.lug: Yayingira ekibiina kya BRAC emyaka 27 emabega, amangu ddala nga yakattikirwa

translation.en: Talking to The Independent at BRAC’s country offices in Nyanama, Kampala, Khondoker said they have enjoyed success in Uganda because of three main reasons
translation.lug: Ng'ayogera n'Eyetongodde, ku yafeesi ya BRAC mu Nyanama, mu Kampala, Khondoker yagamba nti batuuse ku buwanguzi mu Uganda lwa nsonga satu

translation.en: Over half of BRAC’s offices are located away from district headquarters
translation.lug: Kimu kya kubiri ekya yafeesi za BRAC zeesudde akabanga okuva ku kitebe kye disitulikiti

translation.en: Brac’s second unique feature, according to Khondoker, is the absence of shareholders within its ranks
translation.lug: okusinziira ku Khondoker, ekintu eky'okubiri eky'enjawulo kwekuba nti tewali alinamu migabo

translation.en: ” Because BRAC is not run with the intention to make profit, he explains, the interests of the beneficiaries take center stage
translation.lug: agamba nti olw'okuba BRAC teruubirira kufuna magoba, essira liteekebwa ku bagiganyulwamu

translation.en: By this approach, he says, BRAC provides several other essential services apart from microfinance
translation.lug: Agamba nti, olw'ekiruubirirwa kino, BRAC ewa obuweereza obulala obukulu ennyo ng'oggyeko okuwola

translation.en: ” He adds that the support BRAC accords its clients encourages them to cooperate and repay their loans on schedule, explaining the organization’s minimal default rate of less than 2 per cent
translation.lug: Agamba nti obuwagizi BRAC bw'ewa abantu baayo bubakubiriza okufaayo n'okusasula amabanja gaabwe mu budde, ne kiraga nti obunafu bw'ekibiina tebusukka butundu bubiri ku kikumi

translation.en: By the end of August, BRAC had covered 98 per cent of its operating costs and Khondoker says they project that they will have ‘broken even’ by the end of March 2011
translation.lug: Ku nkomerero ya Agusito, BRAC yali emaze okufuna ebitundu 98 ku kikumi ekya sente z'ekozesa era Khondoker agamba nti basuubira okufuna zonna ku nkomerero ya Maaki 2011

translation.en: When BRAC eventually makes profits, he says, they will be reinvested
translation.lug: Agamba nti BRAC bweneekola amagoba bajja kugakozesa mu gikulaakulanya

translation.en: For now, BRAC receives support from, among others, BRAC International, BRAC USA, BRAC UK, Living Goods Foundation, Nike International, Master Card International and Whole Planet Foundation
translation.lug: Naye kati BRAC efuna obuyambi okuva mu BRAC International, BRAC USA, BRAC, UK, Living Goods Foundation, Nike International, Master Card International ne Whole Planet Foundation

translation.en: The battle for customers between Bharti Airtel and MTN is however expected to heat up
translation.lug: Olutalo olwokulwanira okulwanira abantu oluli wakati wa Bharti Airtel ne MTN lusuubirwa okweyongera

translation.en: MTN has announced a massive reduction in the cost of calls in addition to launching MTN Play
translation.lug: Ng'oggyeko omutimbagano gwa MTN, MTN erangiridde okukendeeza ku sente ezikozesebwa okuba essimu

translation.en: MTN Play is the company’s mobile content portal, offering a rich variety of downloadable content and services, including ringtones, wall papers, games, news and information, sport results and caller tunes
translation.lug: MTN Play gwe mutimbagano gwa kampuni, ogusobozesa okuwanula ebintu n'empeereza, nga mwotwalidde obudde bw'essimu, obuzannyo, amawulire n'obubaka, ebivudde mu by'emizannyo n'engri essimu gy'evugamu ng'ogikuba

translation.en: Top winners at this year’s annual Presidential Export Awards were Nile Breweries Ltd, for exporting products worth US$5.6 million
translation.lug: Abawanguzi abo ku ntikko aba Presidential Export Awards ab'omwaka guno Nile Breweries Ltd, olw'okutunda ebweru ebyamaguzi ebibalirwamu obukadde 5.6 obwa ddoola

translation.en: Hima Cement won the Diamond Award for exporting products worth US$52 million.
translation.lug: Kampuni ya Hima Cement yawangula Ekirabo kya Diamond lw'okutunda ebweru ebintu ebiweza obukadde 52 obwa ddoola

translation.en: Over 70 big, medium, and small companies either won awards or recognition at the event organised by the Uganda Export Promotion Board (UEPB)
translation.lug: Amakolero agasukka mu 70, amanene, amasaamusaamu n'amatono gaawangula ebirabo oba gaatenderezebwa ku mukolo ogwategekebwa Uganda Export Promotion Board (UEPB)

translation.en: President Yoweri Museveni attended
translation.lug: Pulezidenti Yoweri Museveni yaliwo

translation.en: UEPB Executive Director, Florence Kata said if Uganda’s informal cross border trade is factored in, the overall performance of the export sector would exceed the US$3.6 billion in revenue
translation.lug: Omukungu wa UEPEB Florence Kata yagamba nti singa ebyamaguzi bikkirizibwa okusala ensalo za Uganda okutunda ebyamaguzi mu nsi enddala kujja kuvaamu ddoola ezisukka mu 3.6

translation.en: MTN explains why it’s not panicked by competitors
translation.lug: MTN ennyonnyola lwaki tejja kutya bagivuganya

translation.en: Museveni’s  strategy that could tilt the war against AlShabaabLooming attack
translation.lug: Enteekateeka za Museveni ez'okutabangula olutalo lwa AlShabaab

translation.en: The UPDF commander told journalists after the fighting: “When they ran, they exposed us and made our positions more vulnerable, we had to move to take tactical advantage
translation.lug: Omudduumizi w'eggye lya UPDF lwatuteeka mu kabi, twalina okubaako kye tukolawo

translation.en: This is the second time a Warid tariff cut is shaking up the market
translation.lug: Guno gwe mulunndi ogw'okubiri ng'okusalibwa kw'emiwendo gya Warid guleetawo akakyankalano mu miwendo

translation.en: When Warid Telecom cut its call tariff to other networks to Shs 299 or Shs 5 per second (Peak) and Shs 249 (off Peak) in February 2008, it sparked off a similar price war as the competition scrambled to match its offer
translation.lug: Warid Telecom bwe yasala ku miwendo gyayo ng'omuntu akuba mu mukutu omulala ne giba ku siringi 299 oba siringi 5 buli katikitiki (ng'abakuba amasimu bangi) ne siringi 249 (ng'abakuba amasimu baatono) mu Febwali wa 2008, kyaleetawo okuvuganya mu miwendo

translation.en: Kavuma Kaggwa  Kyaggwe, Mukono NRM fleecing Ugandan taxpayer, Rujumbura County MP and Chairman of NRM Veterans, Jim Muhwezi, says Museveni will deploy some of the election losers within the party or the state and facilitate others to carry out private business.
translation.lug: Kavuma Kaggwa  Kyaggwe, Mukono NRM etwal sente nyingi ez'omuwe w'omusolo, omubaka wa palementi ow'esaza lya Rujumbura  ne Sentebe w'Abawummula Obusirikale owa NRM, Jim Muhwezi, agamba nti Museveni ajja kuwa emirimu abawangulwa mu kulonda mu kulonda n'okuvujjirira abalala mu bizinensi

translation.en: I now know why fuel prices are high; money is being collected from us and used to bribe voters and disgruntled NRM cadres
translation.lug: Kati manyi lwaki emiwendo gya mafuta giri wa ggulu; batusoloozaamu sente ne zikozesebwa okugulirira abalonzi n'okunyiiza bannakibiina NRM

translation.en: "Why give out jobs to losers if politics is not employment?" asked Galiwango Daniel.
translation.lug: Galiwango Daniel yabuuza nti "Lwaki abawanguddwa baweebwa emirimu bwe kiba ng'eby'obufuzi si mulimu?"

translation.en: Everything about President Museveni is becoming ridiculous
translation.lug: Buli kimu ekikwata ku Pulezidenti Museveni kiswaza

translation.en: During the NRM national conference at Namboole last month he condemned people who join politics as means to employment
translation.lug: Bwe yali mu lukungaana lw'ekibiina kya NRM e Namboole omwesi oguwedde yafvumirira abayingira ebyobufuzi nga bagutwala ng'omulimu

translation.en: Haven’t you heard about two South African police officers who rejected a million dollar bribe by the assassin who almost ended the life of Lt Gen Kayumba Nyamwasa during the World
translation.lug: Tannawulirako abakungu ba poliisi babiri mu South African abaagana enguzi ey'akakadde kaddoola akaali kabaweebwa omutemu eyabulako akatono okutta  Lt Gen Kayumba Nyamwasa mu Ssematalo

translation.en: I have read several comments in the media attributed to NRM historicals who are now in opposition saying they regret participating in the Luwero rebellion because of what President Museveni has turned out to be 23 years down the line
translation.lug: Nsomye ebintu bingi mu mawulira ebikwata ku bantu abaali mu kibiina kya NRM kati bali kuludda oluvuganya gavumenti bagamba nti bejjusa olw'okwenyigira mu bujeemu obwali e Luweero olw'ekyo Pulezidenti Museveni ky'akoze mu myaka 23

translation.en: I’m not a fan of President Museveni but whatever has become of him today, I still believe the Luwero Triangle war was justified
translation.lug: Olutalo lw'e Luweero lwali lusaana okubaawo

translation.en: Fallout with Museveni cannot write off gains of the bush warThere are moral arguments that are probably torturing the consciences of those who fought in Luwero because things have not changed that much in Uganda as they expected, yet people died
translation.lug: oboolyawo olw'okuleetera abo abaalwana mu Luweero okulumizibwa omuntu waabwe ow'omunda olw'okuba ebintu

translation.en: Museveni’s war against Obote’s forces was justified
translation.lug: Museveni yali mutuufu okulwanyisa magye ga Obote

translation.en: Obote had to go
translation.lug: Obote yalina okugenda

translation.en: But don’t ask me if the same deserves of Museveni of today
translation.lug: Tobuuza obanga ekintu kye kimu kigwanira Museveni leero

translation.en: Those who want answers should ask Museveni for a cup of tea, put him in a relaxing mood and then directly ask him: “What happened to you, buddy?”Abbey Kibirige Semuwemba UK2
translation.lug: Abo abaagala eby'okuddamu babuuze Museveni, mukkakkanye  omubuuze butereevu nti: "Kiki ekyakutuukako?" ”Abbey Kibirige Semuwemba UK2

translation.en: James MukonoWhy NRM losers don’t join FDC It’s Movement hangover or people are still drunk with the Movement system where the power of individual merit still reigns
translation.lug: James Mukono agamba nti Lwaki abava mu kibiina kya NRM tebayingira ekibiina kya FDC ekikivuganya oba bakyayagala enkola ya Movement egamba nti omuntu aba n'obuyinza kubuwe

translation.en: Rutamwebwa The question then is one of identifying the extent to which a reformist agenda might be pursued from within the NRM
translation.lug: Rutamwebwa agamba ensonga ekwata ku kumanya wa okukyusa eby'obufuzi gye kuyinza omukoma mu NRM

translation.en: Just because every Musevenist is a Movementist, it does not follow that all Movementists are Museveniists
translation.lug: Eky'bokuba nti abawagizi ba Museveni bawagira enkola ya Muvumenti, tekiteeza nti abawagira enkola ya Muvumenti bonna bawagira Museveni

translation.en: Museveni might not always be able to defuse the threat posed by a popular wouldbe rebel MP by allowing that MP space within his party
translation.lug: Museveni bulijjo ayinza obutamalaawo kabi akaleetebwa Omubaka wa Palamenti eyewaggula ng'amuwa ekifo mu kibiina kye

translation.en: OchiengNRM members are joining IPC in record numbers, they have just woken up and realised that Uganda is decaying, the little Museveni gives them to stay in NRM doesn’t match the suffering the rest of Uganda is enduring
translation.lug: Ochieng agamba nti bannakibiina kya NRM beesogga ekibiina kya IPC mu bungi, baakazuukuka era bagamba nti Uganda evvuunda, akatono Museveni k'abawa okusigala mu NRM tekenkana ku bonaabona Uganda kwerimu

translation.en: Uganda is not NRM and NRM is just a small part of Uganda
translation.lug: Uganda si NRM naye NRM katundu butundu aka Uganda

translation.en: The cost of being with Museveni is about to affect those with him and those without him equally
translation.lug: Ekyokubeera ne Museveni kinaatera okukosa babeera nabo era n'abo batabeera nabo kijja kubakosa kyenkanyi

translation.en: Adam Kifaliso said that people who depended on the master Museveni to get elected and hired, to find themselves on their own, they are at a loss, frightened and do not know what to do or where to go except to remain within his domain
translation.lug: Adam Kifaliso agamba nti abantu abatunuulira Museveni okubayamba okulondebwa era abapangisibwa, tebasobola kyeyimirizaawo, bafiiriddwa, batidde era tebamanyi kya kukola oba wakulaga okuggyako okusigala wansi w'obuyinza bwe

translation.en: NRM knew this, thus after realising how wildly the process of micromanaging patronage had become, even though it served well entrenching them, they now found it expedient to subject all their members to a system of suffrage
translation.lug: Kino ekibiina kya NRM kya kimanya, oluvnnyuma lw'okulaba wa enkola ey'okuwa obuyambi bw'eby'ensimbi w'ekoma, baalaba nti kisingako abantu baabwe bonna okubawa eddembe ly'okulonda

translation.en: It wasn’t because the NRM are democrats at heart; it was just more convenient
translation.lug: tekyali nti NRM yalina omutima ogwa demokulase; kyali kibanguyira

translation.en: I was very confident and had studied the Kenyans’ strategy before the race; it feels great to be a double champion  Moses Kipsiro, the Ugandan athlete who won two gold medals (10,000m and 5,000m races) at the Commonwealth Games in New Delhi, India
translation.lug: Nnanali mukakafu era nali njize obukoddyo bwa Bannakenya nga sinnayingira mpaka; owulia ng'oli wa kitalo okuba kyampiyooni ow'emirundi ebiri bw'atyo Moses Kipsiro bw'agamba, Munnayuganda omuddusi eyawangula emiddaali egyazaabu ebiri (mu misin'de egya mita 10,000 n'egya mita 5,000) mu Mizannya egy'Amawanga g'Omukago gwa Bungereza mu New Delhi, India

translation.en: 50,000,000 The ransom in shillings that kidnappers wanted from the parents of four and a halfyear old Stanley Conrad Kizito before the police’s Rapid Response Unit rescued him
translation.lug: Stanley Conrad Kizito alina emyezi omukaaga egy'obukulu, nga tanunulibwa ekitongole kya polisi ekya Rapid Response Unit

translation.en: Conman Baguma impersonated Gen Salim Saleh and tricked Inspector General of Police Maj Gen Kale Kayihura into ordering the Gulu DPC to release Rebecca Garang’s bus which had been involved in an accident
translation.lug: Conman Baguma yatega  Jenulo Salim Saleh akatego era n'akatega ne'okukulu wa Polooso Meeja JenulaKale Kayihura okulagira Omukulu wa Poliisi y'e Gulu okuta baasi ya Rebecca Garang eyali egudde ku kabenje

translation.en: Last week, during a closed session meeting in Entebbe with UN Security Council envoys, President Museveni reportedly said that Uganda is willing to pay any price, including jeopardising relations with Omar alBashir’s National Congress Party, to ensure the secession of the South if they vote for independence
translation.lug: Wiiki ewedde, mu lukungaana olwali Entebe ng'asisinkanye n'Olukiiko olw'eby'Okwerinda olw'ekibiikak ky'Amawanga Amagatte Pulezidenti Museveni yakiddingaana nti Uganda yali nnetegefu okuwaayo sente, nga mwotwalidde n'okugyawo enkolagana n'ekibiina kya Omar alBashir ekya National Congress, n'okukakasa nti Ekitudu ky'Obukiikaddyo kifuna obwetwaze bwe balonda eky'okufuna obwetwaze

translation.en: Museveni’s statement is the strongest show of support for secession by any head of state yet
translation.lug: Ebigambo bya Museveni byesingirayo ddala okulaga pulezidenti awagira obwetwaze

translation.en: In 2008, according to Uganda’s Bureau of Statistics, informal trade alone exceeded $900 million
translation.lug: Mu 2008, okusinziira ku Kitongole ky'Eby'Embalira, eby'obusuubuzi bya vaamu obukadde bwa ddoola 900

translation.en: Michael ezra: Uganda’s wanted man Police continue to hunt Mike Ezra over charges resulting from a false cheque worth $550,000 he had issued to Dr Charles Mushabe, a software engineer, and his brother Frank Katusiime, an IT consultant
translation.lug: Michael Ezra: Uganda gw'enoonya, Poliisi yeeyongera okunoonya Micheal Ezra, olw'emisango gyokuwa Dr Charles Mushabe ceeke ey'ebicupuli eya ddoola 550,000 enginiya wa kompyuta, ne muganda we Frank Katusiime, kakensa eyebuziibwako owa IT

translation.en: “We desperately need him and are searching for him inside and outside Uganda,” said Criminal Investigations Directorate boss Edward Ochom
translation.lug: Tumwagala era tumunoonya munda ne wabweru wa Uganda, bw'atyo Akulira ekitongole ekyo'kunnonyereza Edward Ochom bw'agamba

translation.en: Ezra reportedly issued the false cheque after he convinced the pair to loan him the money so he could set up a joint venture in the city centre
translation.lug: Ezera emirundi egyomuddingana bombi yabawa ceeke ez'ebicupuli oluvanyuma lw'okubamatiza okumuwola ssente okusobola okutandikawo bizineensi wakati mu kibuga

translation.en: Ezra reportedly promised to refund the money after a week and provided the brothers with a postdated cheque as a guarantee he would return the money
translation.lug: Ezera yabasuubiza okubaddiza sente mu wiiki emu era ab'oluganda abo yabawa akakalu ka ceeke eyayitako ennaku

translation.en: They allege Ezra had ordered the bank not to cash the cheque, which prompted them to report the incident to police
translation.lug: Ezera yalagira banka obutabawa sente, ekyabaviirako okuwaaba ku poliisi

translation.en: Worrying that his image could be in jeopardy, Ezra called an impromptu press briefing at Emin Pasha Hotel in Kampala where he displayed what he says was $3 million worth of cash before journalists
translation.lug: Olw'okweraliikirira okuba mu kabi, Ezera yatuuza bannamawulira mu Pasha Hotel mu Kampala gye yabalagira ekyo kye yagamba nti zaali obukadde bwa ddoola 3

translation.en: The stunt, however, stroked the ire of the authorities who were already seeking Ezra’s detainment over outstanding debts of Shs 1.21.6 billion to the Uganda Revenue Authority for unpaid income tax and Shs 400 million to the National Bank of Commerce over an outstanding loan
translation.lug: Kabi kano kanyiiza nnyo ab'obuyinza abaali banoony Ezera okumusiba olw'ebanja ly'Ekitongole kya Uganda Revenue Authority ly'obuwuumbi 1.21.6 obwa siringi olw'obutasasula musolo era n'ebbanja lya bukadde 400 obwa siringi erya National Bank of Commerce

translation.en: On October 8, in a telephone interview with the Daily Monitor, Ezra claimed that his $500,000 cheque to Katusiime bounced because the URA froze transactions on all his accounts, not because he was insolvent
translation.lug: Nga 8 Okutoba nga boogerea ku ssimu n'abolupapula wa Daily Monitor, Ezera ceeke ye eya ddoola 500,000 gye yawa Katusiime teyayitamu kubanga URA yali yassa envubo ku akawunta ze, naye si lwakuba nti yali tayalina sente

translation.en: “I am not aware of any summon,” said Ezra referring to the police demands he turn himself in
translation.lug: "Kooti tempitangako," bwatyo Ezra bwe yagamba ng'ajjuliza okusaba kwa poliisi

translation.en: ”Ezra became famous for being a philanthropist
translation.lug: Ezra yamanyibwa nnyo olw'okubeera nnagagga ayamba abalala

translation.en: President Museveni talks to the UN Security Council delegation at State House Entebbe on October 10
translation.lug: Pulezidenti Museveni ayogera n'Abakungu okuva mu Lukiiko lw'eby'Okwerinda olw'Amawanga Amagattte mu Maka g'Obwa Pulezidenti Entebe nga Okiitoba 10

translation.en: communicate with him, while Ndamira’s young brother, John Bosco Turyasingura, has appealed to both governments to resolve the matter immediately
translation.lug: yogera naye, nga John Bosco Turyasingura, muto wa Ndamira asabye gavumenti zombi okugonjoola ensonga mu bwangu

translation.en: Acting Foreign Affairs Permanent Secretary Amb. Rhoda Kaisho said that the Ugandan government wants the two Ugandans’ rights, including the right to legal representation, respected
translation.lug: Omuwandiisi w'Ekitongole Ekikola ku Nsonga z'Ebweru, Omubaka Rhoda Kaisho yagamba nti gavumenti ya Uganda eyagala eddembe lya Bannayuganda lya mirindi ebiri, nga mwotwalidde eddembe ery'okukiikirirwa mu mateeka

translation.en: Court stops besigye’s double trial The Forum for Democratic Change President Dr Kizza Besigye and ten others are now partially relieved after the Constitutional Court ruled that their trial on treason in different courts was unconstitutional
translation.lug: Kooti yagaana Pulezidenti w'Ekibiina kya The Forum for Democratic Change Dr Kizza Besigyeera n'abalala kkumi okuwozesebwa emirundi ebiri era kati bafunyeeko akalembereza oluvannyuma lwa Kooti ya Mateeka okusalawo nti okuwozesebwa kwabwe ku musango gw'okulya mu nsi olukwe oguli mu kooti ez'enjawulo tegukwatagana na semateeka

translation.en: Besigye and his coaccused have been on trial for treason in the High Court and on a parallel trial on terrorism in the court martial since 2005 when he returned from exile
translation.lug: Besigye ne banne babadde mu Kooti ya Ssemateeka nga bawoza omusango ogw'okulya mu nsi olukwe mu kiseera kye kimu nga bawoza omusango gw'obuttujju mu kkooti y'amagye okuva lwe yakomawo mu buwanganguse 2005

translation.en: The judges agreed with Besigye’s lawyer David Mpanga that by prosecuting the suspects in both the civil and military court the state had subjected the accused to double jeopardy and caused them psychological torture
translation.lug: Abalamuzi bakkiriziganya ne looya wa Besigye David Mpanga nti abawawabirwa okuwozesebwa mu kooti y'abantu babulijjo n'ey'amagye kibateeka mu kabi era kuba kubatulugunya

translation.en: Besigye’s lawyer had submitted that the rearrest created doubt whether the accused would ever get a fair trial since the state had treated them as if they were guilty even before the court judgement
translation.lug: Balooya ba Besigye baagamba nti eky'okuddamu okumukwata kireetawo okubuusabuusa obanga omuwawabirwa aliramurwa mu bwenkanya okuva bwe kyali nti eggwanga lyali libatwala nti baaliko omusango nga ne kooti tenagubasalira

translation.en: After the judgement on October 12, Besigye said he  was relieved to see the outrageous double trial end
translation.lug: tennasalawo

translation.en: “The people of Uganda can now discipline those who abused the power trusted them with,” Besigye said
translation.lug: Oluvannyuma lw'okusala omusango nga Okitobak 12, Besigye yagamba yadda mu nteeko olw'emisango egy'emirundi ebiri okuggwa

translation.en: “The DPP had the power and ability to rid the country of this disgraceful process,” Besigye added
translation.lug: Besigye yagattako yagamba nti: "DPP yalina obuyinza n'obusobozi okugya ensi mu nkola eno embi"

translation.en: Justices Alice Mpagi Bahigeine, George Engwau, Amos Twinomujuni, Costance Byamugisha and Augustine Nshimye presided over the petition
translation.lug: Justices Alice Mpagi Bahigeine, George Engwau, Amos Twinomujuni, Costance Byamugisha ne Augustine Nshimye Augustine Nshimye omusango beebaguli mu mitambo

translation.en: The cost, in men, material, and money, of the Somalia war has become an issue since President Yoweri Museveni announced in September that he is ready to deploy another 12,000 and 20,000 UPDF troops to Somalia to bolster the 7000strong contingent already there
translation.lug: Pulezidenti Yoweeri Museveni yalangirira mu Sebutemba nti yali mwetegefu okuyungula abalala 12,000

translation.en: Museveni is conscious of this
translation.lug: Kino Museveni akimanyi bulungi

translation.en: The UPDF Spokesperson Felix Kulayigye is more laconic
translation.lug: Omwogezi wa UPDF Felix Kulayigye wa bigambo bitono

translation.en: However, it is no secret that President Barack Obama’s administration has provided military and financial support to Museveni’s Mogadishu mission
translation.lug: Kyokka si kya nkiso nti gavumenti ya Pulesidenti Barack Obama wadde Museveni sente n'obuyambi bw'ebyekijaasi okukola ku nsonga za Mogadishu

translation.en: Museveni has vowed not to let the AlShabaab, which controls most of Somalia, take over power
translation.lug: Museveni alayidde obutalekka AlShabaab, alina obuyinza ku kintu ekisinga obunene mu Somalia obutatwala buyinza

translation.en: Recently, however, Museveni’s military campaign looks to be falling into place
translation.lug: Gye buvuddeko awo, kaweefube wa Museveni ow'okukunga amagye alabika agudde obutaka

translation.en: Uganda’s representative at the UN in New York, veteran politician Dr Ruhakana Rugunda moved quickly to put Somalia on the UN agenda
translation.lug: Omukiise wa Uganda mu kibiina ky'Amawana Amagatte mu New York, eyawummula amagye Dr Ruhakana Rugunda yayanguwa mangu okuteeka Somalia mu lukalala lwa UN olw'ebirina okuteesebwako

translation.en: When on Oct 3, Rugunda led a United Nations Security Council delegation to a meeting with Museveni at State House in Entebbe, two issues were top on the agenda; a pledge from the UN for support to Uganda’s mission in Somalia and increased scrutiny of the upcoming referendum in Southern Sudan
translation.lug: Nga Okitoba 3, Rugunda yatwala abakungu b'Olukiiko lw'Eby'Okwerinda olw'Ekibiina ky'Amawanga Amagatte okusisinka Museveni mu Maka g'Obwapulezidenti Entebe, ebintu bibiri ebyasooka ku lukalala lw'ebigenda okuteesebwako; sente okuva mu Kibiina ky'Amawanga Amagate okuwangira Uganda mu lutalo lw'e Somalia n'okwongera kwetegereza kalulu k'ekikungo mu Southern Sudan

translation.en: Museveni told the UN team that Uganda’s contribution of peacekeepers in Somalia under the AU Mission is proof of the history of solidarity among Africans
translation.lug: Museveni yagamba abakungu b'Ekibiina ky'Amawanga Amagate nti ekya Uganda okuteekawo abakuuma ddembe mu Somalia ng'eri wa nsi w'Ekibiina kya AU bukakafu mu byafaayo obulaga nti Abaafirika bali bumu

translation.en: In the same week, Museveni hosted 27 members of the European Union’s top military organ to rally efforts against the resurgent Al Shabaab
translation.lug: Mu wiiki y'emu, Museveni ya kyaza abakungu okuva mu kibiina kya European Union nga bano basirikale abo ku ntikko okubakubiriza okussa amanyi mu kulwanyisa Al Shabaab

translation.en: Museveni, who has been in power for 24 years, needs to reinvent himself
translation.lug: Museveni abadde mu buyinza okumala emyaka 24, yeetaaga okwezza obugya

translation.en: As a reaction, Museveni has muzzled free expression in the media and other public spaces and clawed back the little democratic space his government previously let citizens enjoy
translation.lug: Ng'ayanukula, Museveni ayogedde kaati mu mawulire n'empuliziganya eddala n'ayogera ku demokulase gavumenti ye gwe yaaleetera abantu

translation.en: When he attended the UN General Assembly late last month in New York, Museveni met with US President Barack Obama on the sidelines of the summit to discuss the Somalia situation and the pending referendum in Sudan under the 2005 Comprehensive Peace Agreement that ended Sudan’s 22year old rebellion
translation.lug: Bwe yagenda mu Lukungaana lw'Ekibiina ky'Amawanga Amagate, ku nkomerero y'omwezi oguwedde, Pulezidenti w'Amerika Barack Obama yasisinkanamu ne Museveni okwoogera ku mbeera eri mu Somalia n'okulonda okw'ekikungo mu Sudan wa nsi wa 2005 Comprehensive Peace Agreement okwakomya obwewagguzi obwali mu Sudan emyaka 22 egiyise

translation.en: Museveni’s biggest impediment to increasing the number of troops in Somalia is the funding and other logistical support for the additional troops
translation.lug: Ekiruubirirwa kya Museveni mu kwongera magye e Somalia kwe kufuna obuwangizi obulala n'amagye amalala

translation.en: We have the human beings, we have the experience, we have the training, but we cannot provide the money,” Museveni told the press recently
translation.lug: Tulina abantu, obumanyirivu, okutendekebwa, naye tetulna sente," bw'atyo Museveni bwe yagamba bannamawulire gyebuvuddeko awo

translation.en: Museveni asked the Security Council delegation to commit more money for his increased deployment but they were noncommittal
translation.lug: Museveni yasaba abakungu okuva mu Olukiiko Olukuuma Ddembe okwongera okubawa sente olw'abantu bakozesa naye tebaayanukula

translation.en: Museveni is known to take unilateral positions if consensus seeking fails him
translation.lug: Museveni akola nnyo ebintu ku lulwe yekka singa ebiteeso by'abalala tebimuyamba

translation.en: Museveni would have been more credible if in explaining the electoral chaos, he had continued his ‘hunter’ and ‘carcass’ analogy and told Ugandans that beasts like hyenas will always follow vultures all the way to some other predator’s kill or carcasses
translation.lug: Museveni yandibadde yeesigika singa bwe yali annyonnyola akavuyo akaali mu kulonda yakozesa eky'okulabirako kye eky'omuyizzi n'ensolo ettiddwa n'agamba ba Uganda nti ebisolo gamba ng'empisi egoberera ensega esobole okugituus awali 'ensolo effude'

translation.en: If anything, the NRM primaries brought into the open what critics and commentators have often spoken out about but in abstract terms: the collapse of institutional governance and processes, systemic corruption and a culture of political impunity
translation.lug: Akalulu ak'okusunsulamu ak'ekibiina kya NRM kaleeseewo okukolokota era aboogezi bakoogerako mu ngeri embi: obutabaawo obukulembeze n'enkola egobererwa mu bitongole, obulyi bw'enguzi n'obutavunaanwa

translation.en: The electoral irregularities showed it is practically impossible to hold a free and fair election under the NRM
translation.lug: Akavuyo mu by'okulonda kalaga nti tewasoboa kubaawo kulonda kutuufu wansi w'obuyinza bw'ekibiina kya NRM

translation.en: The NRM political elites view elections through a different lorgnette fogged by their desire for selfadvantage
translation.lug: Abakungu mu kibiina kya NRM okulonda bakutwala ng'engeri y'okwerunira bye baagala

translation.en: Although Lubega remains defiant that the court injunction is inconsequential, the legal advisor to the Democratic Party of the Norbert Mao leadership, Mukasa Mbidde, says it is enforceable
translation.lug: Wadde nga Lubega agaana nti ekiragiro kya kooti si kikulu, omuwi w'amagezi ew'Ekibiina ya Ddemokulase ekiri wansi w'obukulembeze bwa Norbert Mao, Mukasa Mbidde, yagamba nti kirina okugobererwa

translation.en: Mbidde says the court order issued on October 8 will result in the arrest and prosecution of Lubega and his group if they continue “masquerading” as leaders of DP
translation.lug: Mbidde agamba nti ekiragira kya kooti nga Okkutoba 8 kijja kuviirako okukwatibwa n'okugulwako omusango ku Lubega ne banne singa baneeyongera "okwefuula nga" abakulembeze b'Ekibiina kya Demokulase

translation.en: He says the ruling was delivered by judge Lawrence Giddudu the same person who presided over the petition the Lubega faction had taken to court challenging the legitimacy of the DP leadership under Mao
translation.lug: Yagamba nti omulamuzi Lawrence Giddudu ya yasala omusango nga ye muntu y'omu eyakola ku musango gwa Lubega gwe yatwala mu kooti ng'awakanya nti Ekibiina kya Demokulase tekiri mu mateeka

translation.en: Giddudu dismissed the petition in May
translation.lug: Giddudu omusango yagugoba mu Maayi

translation.en: Lubega had sought court to nullify the February party delegates conference in Mbale which elected Mao’s DP leadership
translation.lug: Lubega yasaba kooti okugyawo olukungaana olwaliwo mu Febwari mu Mbale olw'abakungu abaalonda Mao ng'omukulembeze w'Ekibiina kya Demokulase

translation.en: Lubega had contended that the delegates conference had been held unconstitutionally and was therefore a nullity
translation.lug: Lubega yagamba nti olukungaana lw'abakkungu telwali mu mateeka era lwagaanibwa

translation.en: But the judge dismissed the petition on a technical ground that in the petition, the Lubega group had presented themselves as DP leaders yet the national Electoral Commission only recognises the Mao DP leadership
translation.lug: Naye omulamuzi yagoba omusango, Lubega ne banne mwe baali beetwala okuba abakulembeze b'Ekibiina kya Demokulase

translation.en: Mbidde told The Independent that he had forwarded the court order to the Electoral Commission and the police to arrest Lubega and his group if they continued to present themselves in public as DP leaders
translation.lug: Mbidde yagamba oyo eyesimbawo awatali kibiina nti ekiwandiiko kya kooti akitute eri Akakiiko k'Eby'Okulonda era nti poliisi ekwate Lubega ne banne singa beeyongera okwelaga mu lujjudde bakulembeze b'ekibiina kya DP

translation.en: Lubega denied knowledge of the court order and said his lawyer had not received it either
translation.lug: Lubega yagamba nti talabangako kiwandiiko kuva mu kooti era nti ne balooyabe tebakifunangako

translation.en: He speculated that Mbidde was lying
translation.lug: Yagamba nti Mbidde yali alimba

translation.en: He argued that Mbidde could not have gotten the court order on the basis of a ruling that had been appealed
translation.lug: Yagamba nti Mbidde yali teyeerabidde kiragiro kya kooti ekigamba nti yali ajjulira

translation.en: Lubega said he had, on October 7,  appealed against the dismissal of his petition and the case was still pending hearing
translation.lug: Lubega yagamba nti nga Okutoba 7, yajulira eky'okugoba omusango gwe era nti omusango gwali gulinda kuwulirwa

translation.en: He claimed even when the court dismissed his petition, it did not pronounce itself on whether Mao’s leadership was the legitimate representatives of DP
translation.lug: Yabyogera wadde nga kooti yali egobye omusango gwe, teyalangirira obanga obukulembeze bwa Mao mu Kibiina kya Demokulase bwali bukkirizibwa mu mateeka

translation.en: Mbidde said they did not secure the injunction on the basis of Lubega’s appeal
translation.lug: Mbidde yagamba nti tebaafuna kiragiro kya kooti kyonna ekikwata ku kujulira kwa Lubega

translation.en: He said the injunction was based on its own merits and the Lubega’s appeal would have no bearing on it
translation.lug: Yagamba nti okusalawo okwo kwaganyula bo era okujulira kwa Lubega kwalina akakwate nakwo

translation.en: “The appeal will probably be heard two years from now,” Mbidde said
translation.lug: Mbidde yagamba nti "okujulira kujja kuwulirwa emyaka ebiri okuva kati"

translation.en: However, while Mbidde says he forwarded the court  injunction to the police and the Electoral Commission, the police spokesperson for Kampala Metropolitan Idi Senkumba said he had not heard of it
translation.lug: Kyokka Mbidde agamba nti ekiragiro kya kooti yakitwala ku poliisi n'eri Kakiiko k'Eby'Okulonda, naye omwogezi wa poliisi mu Bendobendo lya Kampala Idi Senkumba yagamba nti yali takirabangako

translation.en: The head of the Political Parties Desk at the Electoral Commission Patrick Byakagaba also denied knowledge about the injunction, saying he had not seen it or heard of it by October 7 when he left office
translation.lug: Akulira Ebibiina by'Obufuzi ku Kakiiko k'Eby'Okulonda Patrick Byakagaba era yagaana nti tafunangako kiragiro, yagamba nti takirabangako oba okukiwulirako okuva Okutobba 7 lwe yava mu yafeesi

translation.en: The Electoral Commission recognises the Mao leaders as the official DP establishment and this has sucked the national electoral body into the fray
translation.lug: Akakiiko k'Eby'Okulonda katwala abakulembeze ba Mao ng'abakungu b'ekibiina kya DP era kino kireetedde abalonzesa okusatulukuka

translation.en: The court appeal by the Lubega faction shows that the Electoral Commission has been sued together with the Mao leadership, former DP president Ssebaana Kizito and Mathias Nsubuga who acted as the party Secretary General during the delegates conference in Mbale
translation.lug: Okujulira kwa Lubega mu kooti kulaga nti Akakiiko k'Eby'Okulonda kali bumu ne n'obukulembeze bwa Mao, eyaliko omukulembeze w'Ekibiina kya Demokulase Ssebaana Kizito ne Mathias Nsubuga eyakolanga Omuwandiisi mu lukungaana lwa bakungu e Mbale

translation.en: Lubega accuses the Electoral Commission of legitimising Mao’s leadership by recognising them as the rightful leaders of DP when the process through which they were elected is still in dispute in court
translation.lug: Lubega avunaana Akakiiko k'Eby'Okulonda okukkiriza Mao ng'omukulembeza w'Ekibiina kya Demokulase omutuufu, ate ng'enkola eyayitibwamu okumukonda ekyawakanyizibwa mu kooti

translation.en: Dismissing the Lubega petition, court held that it’s Mao leadership which was recognised by the Electoral Commission
translation.lug: Ng'egoba omusango gwa kooti, kooti yagamba nti obukulembeze bwa Mao bukkirizibwa Akakiiko k'Eby'Okulanda

translation.en: Kasese is the only district in western Uganda where the opposition FDC president Dr Kizza Besigye defeated President Museveni in the 2006 elections
translation.lug: Kasese ye distulikiti yokka mu bugwanjuba wa Uganda alikuludda oluvuganya gavumenti Dr Kizza Besigye gye yawangulira Museveni mu kulonda okwaliwo mu 2006

translation.en: For Bukonzo West the FDC has fielded Lucy Biira Kabanyoro, former chairperson of Kasese District Service Commission, to challenge NRM’s Dr Chrispus Kiyonga, the Defence Minister, for the seat
translation.lug: Mu bugwanjuba wa Bukonzo ekibiina kya FDC kitaddeyo Lucy Biira Kabanyoro, eyali sentebe wa Kasese District Service Commission, okuvuganya Dr Chrispus Kiyonga, Minisita w'Eby'Okwerinda

translation.en: Kiyonga has represented the constituency in parliament since the 1980 elections
translation.lug: Kiyonga akiikiridde konsituwense mu palamenti okuviira ddala mu kulonda okwa 1980

translation.en: He was the only person who won the parliamentary seat on Museveni’s Uganda Patriotic Movement in the opposition in 1980
translation.lug: Ye muntu yekka eyawangula ekifo kya palimenti ng'ali mu kibiina kya Museveni ekya Uganda Patriotic Movement ekyali ku ludda oluvuganya gavumenti mu 1980

translation.en: Since 1986 Kiyonga held different cabinet positions in the Museveni government ranging from Minister for Cooperatives and Marketing to Minister Without Portfolio
translation.lug: okuva mu 1986 Kiyonga n'ekifo ku kakiiko ka baminisita mu gavumenti ya Museveni okuva ku bwa Minisita w'Obwaggasi n'Okutunda nazibwa ku bwa Minisita Atalina Mirimu gya Nkizo

translation.en: In 2006, Kiyonga polled 20,837 votes
translation.lug: Mu 2006, Kiyonga yafuna obululu 20,837

translation.en: His closest challenger Mathina Bwambale was an independent candidate
translation.lug: Eyali amuvuganya Mathina Bwambale teyalina kibiina

translation.en: He got 20,083 votes, losing to Kiyonga by 754 votes
translation.lug: Yafuna obululu 20,083, Kiyonga yamusinga obululu 754

translation.en: The FDC candidate Yohazi Baruku, who scored 1,185 votes, was among the trailing pack of four who collectively raised a paltry 2200 votes
translation.lug: Eyesimba wo ow' Ekibiina kya FDC Yohazi Baruku eyafuna obululu 1,185,  yali omu ku bana abafuna obululu 2200 bona awamu obwali obw'olubatu

translation.en: Although Kabanyoro has not been in active politics for quite a time, she is already raising excitement in Bukonzo West
translation.lug: okujjaganya okwali mu Buggwanjuba bwa Bukonzo

translation.en: She is a daughter of Bulasio Maate, the first Kasese District Commissioner in the 1970s
translation.lug: Yali muwala wa Bulasio Maate, eyali Kaminsona wa Disitulikiti ya Kasese eya sooka

translation.en: However not all is rosy for FDC in the constituency
translation.lug: Kyokka si buli kimu nti kirungi eri Ekibiina kya FDC mu konsituwense

translation.en: He had no known links to either the NRM or the opposition
translation.lug: Talna kakwate konna ku kibiina kya NRM oba eky'o ekiri kuludda oluwabula gavumenti

translation.en: He aimed at tapping into both the NRM and FDC support, which may explain the small vote difference by which Kiyonga beat him
translation.lug: enjawulo Kiyonga gye yamusinga

translation.en: Now that Bwambale will not stand in 2011, his votes could go either side
translation.lug: Okuva bwe kiri nti Bwambale tajja kwesimbawo mu 2011, obululu bwe buyinza okugenda ku ludda lwonna

translation.en: Busongora South MP Christopher Kibanzanga (FDC), who has left parliament for the district leadership position, says the FDC has addressed the weaknesses it had in the 2006 elections, especially in Bukonzo West
translation.lug: Christopher Kibanzanga (FDC) omubaka wa palimenti mu bikiikaddyo bwa Busongora, alese ekifo kya palimenti okugenda ku bukulembeze bwa disitulikiti, agamba nti Ekibiina kya FDC kikoze ku bunafu bwe kyalina mu kulonda kwa 2006 mu Bugwanjuba wa Bukonjo

translation.en: He dismisses the claim that Kabanyoro having been out of active politics for while is a big undoing on her political clout in the area
translation.lug: Awakanya ekigambiwa nti ekyokuba nti Kabanyoro tabadde mu byabufuzi okumala ekiseera kinafuyiza obuyinza bw'alina mu by'obufuzi mu kitundu

translation.en: Kasese District Woman MP Winfred Kiiza and Yokasi Bihande MP for Bukonzo East will contest on FDC ticket
translation.lug: Omubaka wa Palamenti owa Disitulikiti y'e kasese omukyala Winfred Kiiza n'omubaka wa Palamenti owa Buvanjuba wa Bukonjo Yokasi Bahinde bajja kuvuganya ku tikiti y'Ekibiina kya FDC

translation.en: He says the three candidates who lost to Kabanyoro in the FDC primaries have joined her
translation.lug: Agamba nti bannabyabufuzi abasatu abawaangulwa Kabanyoro mu kalulu ak'okusunsulamu ak'e Kibiina kya FDC bamweggaseeko

translation.en: Kabanyoro polled 409 votes to beat Richard Baluku (188 votes), Yohazi Baluku (50 votes), who was the FDC candidate in 2006 elections and Benon Muhindo (19 votes)
translation.lug: Kabanyoro yafuna 409 n'awangula Richard Baluku eyafuna obululu 188, Yohazi Baluku obululu 50, eyali yeesimbawo ku tiketi ya FDC mu kulonda kwa 2006 ne Benon Muhindo ( obululu 19)

translation.en: The FDC’s incumbent District Woman MP Winfred Kiiza will face challenge from NRM’s Rehema Muhindo, a district councillor
translation.lug: Omubaka wa Palamenti omukyala owa Disitulikiti Winfred Kiiza ajja kubiisanya ne Disitulikiti kansala Rehema Muhindo owa NRM

translation.en: In Bukonzo East NRM’ Fred Businge will tussle it out with FDC’s Yokasi Bihande, former Kasese LCV chairman and incumbent MP for Bukonzo East
translation.lug: Mu buvanjuba wa Bukonjo, owa NRM Fred Busingye ajja kubiisanya n'owa FDC Yokasi Basinde eyali Ssentebe wa Disitulikiti ate nga ye mubaka wa Palamenti omulonde ow'Ebuvanjuba wa Bukonzo

translation.en: In Busongora South FDC has elected to Jackson Mbaju, former attorney general of Rwenmzururu kingdom, to stand against NRM’s Boaz Kafuda
translation.lug: Mu bukiikaddyo wa Busongora, FDC eronze Jackson Mbaju eyali Ssaabawolereza w'o Bwa Kabaka bwa Rwenzururu okuvuganya Boaz Kafuda owa NRM

translation.en: Mbaju is a new candidate
translation.lug: Mbaju munnabyabufuzi mupya

translation.en: He fills the void left by Kibanzanga, who will stand for LCV seat
translation.lug: Ajjuza ekifo kya Kibanzanga agenda okw'esimbawo mu kifo kya Ssentebbe wa Disitulikiti

translation.en: But Mbaju’s chances of winning maybe affected by Constantine Siwako who has indicated he will stand as an independent after his candidature in FDC primaries for  the same seat was cancelled on academic grounds
translation.lug: Naye omukisa gwa Mbaju okuwangula guyinza okulemesebwa Constantine Siwako alaze nti ajja kwesimbawo ku bwa nnamunigina oluvanyuma lw'okwesimbawo kwe mu kalaulu k'okusunsulamu mu FDC mu kifo kye kimu okusazibwamu olw'ensonga z'obuyigirize bwe

translation.en: In Busingora North FDC has fronted William Nzoghu, who has worked with a number of NGOs in the region, to contest against incumbent NRM legislator Elijah Kyetunda
translation.lug: Mu bukiikakono wa Busingora FDC etaddewo Williama Nzoghu, abadde akakola mu bitongole eby'enjawulo ebitali bya gavumenti okuvuganya n'omukungu okuva mu NRM Elijah Kyetunda

translation.en: He lost to Kyetunda in 2006 by a margin of 751 votes
translation.lug: Kyetunda yamusinga obululu 751 mu 2006

translation.en: In the newly created Kasese Municipality constituency FDC has deployed Musa Bwambale, a son to former Kasese District Woman MP Loyce Biira Bwambale
translation.lug: Mu Munisupaali empya mu konsituwense ya Kasese, FDC etaddewo Musa Bwambale mutabani wa Loyce Biira Bwambale eyali Omubaka w'Abakyala mu Palimenti owa Disitulikitu ya Kasese

translation.en: He will compete for the seat with NRM’s James Mbahimba
translation.lug: Ajja kuvuganya ku kifo ekyo ne James Mbahimba owa NRM

translation.en: This was even in defiance of the advice by then de facto cultural leader of the people of Rwenzururu, Charles Wesley Iremangoma, to his subjects to vote UPC
translation.lug: Kino kyali okunyoma amagezi g'omukulembeze w'ebyobuwangwa owa Rwenzururu, Charles Wesley Iremangoma, eri abawagizibe okulonda ekibiina kya UPC

translation.en: In the 2006 multiparty elections, Kasese again showed their stubbornness by voting the FDC’s Besigye to defeat President Museveni
translation.lug: Mu kulonda kw'ebibiina mu 2006, era Kasese yalaga nti eronda Besigye owa FDC awangule Pulezidenti Museveni

translation.en: It was widely interpreted that Kasese had voted the opposition as a protest vote because President Museveni had refused or failed to recognise their kingdom, Obusinga bwa Rwenzururu
translation.lug: Kigambibwa nti Kasese yalonda oludda oluvuganya kubanga Pulezidenti Museveni yagaana oba yalemererwa okukkiriza obwakabaka bwa Rwenzururu

translation.en: There is a general feeling among the populace that the recognition of the kingdom came too late and was because of their pressure rather than the NRM and Museveni’s magnanimity
translation.lug: Kigambibwa nti okukkiririza obwa Kabaka kyajja kikeerezi era kyava ku kupikirizibwa so si kusiima kwa NRM ne Museveni

translation.en: According to Dr Aaron Mukwaya of Makerere University’s Department of Political Science, the index, “fails to analyse the underlying factors and forces involved in Africa’s struggling political and economic spheres
translation.lug: Okusinziira ku Dr. Aaron Mukwaya ow'ekitongole ky'eby'o bufuzi ekya Yunivasite y'e Makerere, ebiwandiiko biremererwa okulaga ensonga n'amaanyi ebiteekebwa mu by'obufuzi n'ebyenfuna bya Afirika.

translation.en: ” Dr Mukwaya says the index is based on a consultant’s model and an “outside outlook”
translation.lug: Dr.Mukwaya agamba nti ebiwandiiko byesigamye kunkola y'abakugu n'abantu ab'ebweru"

translation.en: Fredrick Golooba Mutebi of Makerere University’s Institute for Social Research agrees with this sentiment
translation.lug: Fredrick Golooba Mutebi ow'ekitongole kya Social Research e Makarere Yunivasite akkiriziganya n'endowooza eyo

translation.en: According to Golooba Mutebi the danger with such indexes is how they create perceptions about Africa which are not necessarily accurate, even if they do give a broad picture of what people already know
translation.lug: Okusiinziira ku Golooba Mutebi, akabi akali mu biwandiiko ngebyo y'engeri gye bireetawo endowooza ku Afirika etali ntuufu wadde nga biwa ekifaananyi kinene ku ekyo abantu kye bamanyi

translation.en: “There is a tendency to see African countries as static and these indexes recycle this picture,” Golooba Mutebi says
translation.lug: Golooba Mutebi agamba nti, batera okukitwala nti ensi z'Afirika tezikulaakulana era endowooza ezo zikomyawo ekifaananyi ekyo

translation.en: Mutebi notes that drawing conclusions from data which does not represent current underpinnings of African country performance, as it is seen on the ground, stands to discredit the index
translation.lug: Mutebi agamba nti,okukkiriza ebintu ebitawa kifaananyi kituufu ku ngeri ensi z'Afirika gye zikolamu, kyeyoleka kaati, era kikontana n'endowooza ezo

translation.en: Mutebi sees utility for the prize committee to refuse giving out the award until its criteria are met as to not reduce the award to a mere “ritual”
translation.lug: Mutebi akiraba nti akakiiko okugaana okugaba ekirabo okutuusa ng'emitendera gigobereddwa, kiyamba okukendeeza ku kufuula ekirabo obutaba ky'amakulu.
