translation.en: Mutebi notes that “Presidents are not driven by their desire for recognition rather than for their narrow interests
translation.lug: Mutebi agamba nti abakulembeze b'amawanga tebatwalirizibwa kwegomba kwabwe okw'okumanyika wabua ebyo bye baagala

translation.en: Margaret Asiimwe, 14, a Primary Six pupil of Kivumbi Primary School in Kampala cannot read or answer questions in English
translation.lug: ddamu ebibuuzo mu Lungereza

translation.en: However, her teacher, Arthur Bwiire, says Asiimwe is one of the brightest pupils at the school
translation.lug: Kyokka omusomesa we Arthur Bwiire agamba nti Asiimwe y'omu ku baana abasinga obugezi mu ssomero

translation.en: Despite being the health prefect for her school, Asiimwe is incapable of addressing her fellow pupils in English
translation.lug: Wadde nga ye muyizi akulira eby'obulamu ku ssomero, Asiimwe tasobola kwogera eri bayizi banne mu Lungereza

translation.en: Bwiire, who is not well conversant in English himself, blames a lack of textbooks and opportunities to practise on the pupils’ failure to speak English
translation.lug: Bwiire ateekakasa Lungereza, yeekwasa eky'obutaba na bitabo n'eky'baana obuteemanyiiza kwogera Lungereza

translation.en: As a result of increased enrollment, says Fortunate Ahimbisibwe of the Ministry of Education, there is now a critical shortage Uganda amongst worst places to be in school Pupils and teachers can’t speak English Pupils at a primary school Rwemiyaga, Sembabule district study under a tree
translation.lug: Olw'omuwendo gw'abaana ogeyongedde, Fortunate Ahimbisibwe ow'ekitongole ky'ebyenjigiriza agamba nti waliwo ebbula ly'ebifo mu masomero; abaana n'abasomesa tebasobola kwogera Lungereza ate era abaana b'essomero e Remiyaga Ssembabule basomera wansi wa muti

translation.en: Michael Niyitegeka, Head of Corporate Relations at Makerere University computer facility, says that universities are often blamed for poor education but the problem resides at lower levels
translation.lug: Michael Niyitegeka omukula wa Corporate relations mu kitongole kya computer ku Ssetendekero e Makerere agamba nti amatendekero agawaggulu ge gatera okunenyezebwa olw'eby'enjigiriza ebibi naye ekizibu kitandikira wansi

translation.en: President Museveni has often argued that it is the parents’ responsibility, not the government’s, to provide lunch for their children
translation.lug: Emirundi mingi Pulezidenti Museveni agamba nti buvunaanyizibwa bw'abazadde okuwa abaana babwe eky'emisana so si gavumenti

translation.en: Wafula Oguttu, the spokesperson for Forum for Democratic Change, says that the report’s findings are important
translation.lug: Wafula Oguttu omwogezi w'ekibiina kya FDC agamba nti abizuuliddwa mu alipoota bikulu nnyo

translation.en: Wafula says that the majority of government schools lack teaching facilities and teachers, yet the government does not want to recruit more teaching staff
translation.lug: Wafula agamba nti amasomero ga gavumenti agasinga teggalina bikozesebwa era tegalina basomesa atenga gavumenti teyagala  kwongera ku muwendo gw'abasomesa

translation.en: Those who are there are paid poorly and as a result end up dodging classes,” Wafula says
translation.lug: Wafula agamba nti, "abo abaliyo basasulwa obusente butono n'ekivaamu tebasomesa

translation.en: For example in the districts of Butaleja, Mbale, Arua, Maracha, Oyam, Pader and Abim, the ratio is 1:120, alarmingly higher than the recommended 1:50
translation.lug: Ng'ekyokulabirako, disitulikiti za Butaleja, Mbale, Arua, Maracha, Oyam, Pader ne Abim, omuwendo guli 1:120 nga guno munene nnyo okusinga 1:50 ogusuubirwa

translation.en: Wafula adds that for as long as enrolment keeps rising with fixed school facilities, education standards in Uganda will keep deteriorating
translation.lug: Wafula agamba nti singa okuwandiisa abaana mu masomero kweyongera nga tewali bikosesebwa mutindo gw'ebyenjigiriza mu Uganda gujja kweyongera okuddirira

translation.en: The only exception has been MTN which continues to charge Shs 6 per second
translation.lug: MTN yokka ye kyasasuza Sillingi 6 buli katikitiki

translation.en: “There are no plans for tariff changes in the pipeline at the moment,” says MTN Chief Marketing Officer Isaac Nsereko, “Our customers get value for money since most of the subscribers are on MTN
translation.lug: Tewaliwo ntegeka mukiseera kino bwatyo omukungu Isaac Nsereko akolanga Marketing Officer mu MTN bwa gamba, "Bakasitoma baffe baganyulwa mu sente okuva bwe kiri nti abeewandiisa bangi bali ku MTN

translation.en: ”MTN’s reaction is unusual for a market leader
translation.lug: MTN byekola tebisuubirwa mu oyo akulira akatale

translation.en: This is the second time a Warid tariff cut is shaking up the market
translation.lug: Guno gwe mulunndi ogw'okubiri ng'okusalibwa kw'emiwendo gya Warid kugataanya emiwendo

translation.en: When Warid Telecom cut its call tariff to other networks to Shs 299 or Shs 5 per second (Peak) and Shs 249 (off Peak) in February 2008, it sparked off a similar price war as the competition scrambled to match its offer
translation.lug: Warid Telecom bwe yasala ku miwendo egy'okukuba ku mikutu emirala ne giba  Siringi 299 oba Siringi 5 ku bulii katikitki (ng'abakuba amasimu bangi) nesiringi 249 (ng'abakuba amasimu bakendedde) mu Febwali wa 2008, kyaleetawo okuvuganya n'akakyankalano mu miwendo

translation.en: Back then market leaders, MTN, launched its MTN Zone which offered up to 99 percent discounts to customers depending on availability of capacity and Zain introduced its 12hour free innetwork calling
translation.lug: Mu kiseera ekyo abaali bakulembera mu katale k'amasimu aba MTN bateekawo enkola ya MTN zone eyasalako emiwendo okutuuka ku bitundu 99 ku 100 okusinziira ku busobozi ne kampuni ya Zain yateekawo essaawa 12 ez'okukubira ku bwereere

translation.en: MTN could also be counting on ‘customer confusion’ which renders customers unable to switch to the competition, according to Charles Omagor, a marketing expert who is also the dean of the Faculty of Commerce at Makerere University Business School
translation.lug: Okusinziira ku Charles Omagor omukugu mu bwa kitunzi era nga y'akulira amasomo g'e by'obusuubuzi ku ttendekero ly'eby'obusuubuzi e Nakawa, MTN nayo yandibadde erowooza ku kutabulatabula ba kasitoma ekiviirako ba kasitoma okulemererwa okwetaba mu kuvuganya

translation.en: He says MTN offers packages like yellowmax, paygo standard, MTN zone and per second and a subscriber who is already confused on which package on the MTN network to choose is likely to get even more confused if tempted to switch to another network, where there are also several packages to select from
translation.lug: Agamba nti MTN etaddewo enkola za kitunzi gamba nga; yellowmax, paygo standard, MTN zone, ne per second era kasitoma yenna asobeddwa okulondako enkola ku mpuliziganya ya MTN ajja kweyongera okusoberwa singa agenda ku mpuliziganya endala nazo ezirina enkola zaazo ez'enjawulo

translation.en: “Fearing that there could be even worse confusion elsewhere, the subscriber will most likely choose to stay where he is,” argues Omagor
translation.lug: "Olw'okutya nti ajja kweyongera okusoberwa, kirabika nti omuntu ajja kusalawo okusigala ku mukutu kwali," bw'atyo Omagor bwagamba

translation.en: But Omagor says the natural reaction from a marketer’s perspective is to pause and watch the competitors
translation.lug: Naye Omagor agamba nti ba kitunzi batera okuyimirizaamu ne batunuuliraa abavuganya

translation.en: Commenting on its reaction, MTN’s Nsereko told The Independent: “We are studying the situation and we can only respond when we think it is necessary
translation.lug: Ng'ayogera ku ekyo kye kyakola, Nsereko owa yagamba olupapula lw'amawulire olwa The Independent nti 'Tukyetegeza embeera era tujja kubaako kye tukola bwe kiba kyetaagisa'

translation.en: Nation Media, owned by the Aga Khan Fund for Economic Development SA, first announced plans in March to list in Rwanda, Tanzania and Uganda
translation.lug: Ekitongole kya Nation Media ekya Aga Khan Fund for Economic Development SA, kyasooka kulangirira nteekateka okuwandiisa amawanga gano mu Maaki; Rwanda, Tanzania ne Uganda

translation.en: According to press reports, Dr Gitahi Githinji, the Managing Director of the Ugandabased NMG subsidiary, Monitor Publications Ltd (MPL), made the announcement in Kampala last week
translation.lug: Okusinziira ku alipoota za ba nnamawulire, Dr. Gitahi Githinji, akulira NMG subsidiary ne Monitor Publications Ltd yayisa ekirango  Kampala wiiki ewedde

translation.en: NMG is the region’s biggest media publisher with radio, TV, newspaper, magazine, and courier services in four of the five East African Community member states
translation.lug: NMG ye mpuliziganya ekyasizeeyo obunene ng'erina ladiyo TV, olupapula lw'amawulire, magazini, n'okutambuza ebiereke mu mawanga ana kw'ago ataano agali mu Mukago gw'Ensi z'Afirika ez'Ebuvanjuba

translation.en: In Uganda, it owns MPL, Nation Television (NTV), Nation Courier, and KFM radio
translation.lug: Mu Uganda, kirinamu MPL, Terefayina ya (NTV), Abatambuza Ebitereke, ne ladiyo ya KFM

translation.en: Equity Bank already has a presence in Uganda, with 43 branches, but has yet to make a play in Tanzania or Rwanda
translation.lug: Equity Bank kati weeri mu Uganda, era erina amatambi 43, kyokka ekyalina okugulawo amalala mu Tanzania oba  Rwanda

translation.en: Equity Bank, founded 25 years ago as a building society, has expanded by targeting customers without bank accounts
translation.lug: Equitya Banka, eyatndikawo emyaka 25 emabega, egaziye ng'eyitira mu kufuna abantu abatalina akaawunta za banka

translation.en: Bank of India will join longestablished Bank of Baroda (BOBU), from India
translation.lug: Banka ya India ejja kwegatta ku Banka ya Baroda eyo mu India

translation.en: Bank of Baroda Uganda started in 1953 as a subsidiary of Baroda but was incorporated as a separate entity in 1969
translation.lug: Banka of Baroda Uganda yatandikibwawo mu 1953 ng'etabi lya Baroda naye yetongola mu 1969

translation.en: Like so many overly ambitious and simplistic Africans, Isabirye, the play’s central character goes to great length to “buy” a visa to fly abroad for greener pastures
translation.lug: Okufaananako Abafirika bangi abaagala okugaggawala n'okuba mu bulamu obweyagaza, Isabirye akola kyonna ky'asobola "okugula" viza agende ebweru awali obulamu obulungi

translation.en: His family of three; Nabirye and Kaudha are filled with excitement and are joyous about the pending flow of cash when the breadwinner is abroad
translation.lug: Alina amaka agalimu abantu basatu; Nabirye ne Kauda basanyufu olwa sente sebasuubira okufuna ng'oyo abalabirira agenze ebweru

translation.en: For Nabirye, the wife of the wandering moneyhunter, the pinch of having to provide the basic needs of his family singly starts to bite hard
translation.lug: Eri Nabirye; mukyala w'oyo ayigga sente, ebyetaago by'abomu maka ge byeyongera okuzibuwala okufuna

translation.en: The background from which 23year old Moses Kipsiro, the 2007 5,000 meter bronze medallist as well as 2008 world cross country runnerup, came to prominence is both disjointed and bewildering, but strikingly similar to AkiiBua’s
translation.lug: Ebikwata ku Moses Kipsiro ow'emyaka 23, eyadduka n'awangula omudaali gw'ekikomo mu 2007, mu misinde egya mita 5,000 era omuddusi eyakwata ekifo eky'okubiri mu misinde mubuna byalo mu 2008, afaananako Akiibua

translation.en: Idi Amin may be gone but poverty is rampant
translation.lug: Idi Amin ayinza okuvaawo naye obwavu tebuvaawo bweyongera bweyonngezi

translation.en: Julius Baribangba, a journalist of The EastAfrican newspaper explains:“Few people in Uganda can afford a decent meal
translation.lug: Julius Baribangba, munnamawulira ow'olupabula lw'amawulire olwa The East Africa agamba nti; "abantu batona asobola okufuna emmere esaana

translation.en: The Kipsiros have grown up amongst this lot
translation.lug: Kipsiros akulaakulanye mu bino

translation.en: ”The country’s few successful athletes in recent times like Kipsiro himself, Boniface Kiprop (former world junior 10k record holder) and Dorcus Inzikuru (2005 steeple world champ) are all school drop outs who sought the track as a shortcut to earning a living
translation.lug: Bannansi abatono abatuuse ku buwanguzi mu kudduka gyebuvuddeko awo ngamba nga Kipsiro, Boniface, Kiprop  (eyaliko omwana w'ensi yonna eyawangula omutwalo) ne Dorcus Inzikuru (owo ku ntiko mu nsi yonna mu 2005) bonna baava mu masomero ne banoonya engeri y'okweyimirizaawo

translation.en: Moses is highly regarded
translation.lug: Moses afiibwako nnyo

translation.en: The country had hinged all its hope on (Boniface) Kiprop but his failed promise put added pressure on Kipsiro
translation.lug: Ensi yali etadde obwesige mu (Boniface ) Kiprop naye bw'atawangula kya teeka Kipsiros ku bunkenke

translation.en: Kiprop had not done too badly but he remains in the shadow of the Ethiopians and Kenyans
translation.lug: Kiprop yali takoze bubi naye yasigala wansi wa Ab'Esiyopiya ne Bannakenya

translation.en: “I always wanted to be an athlete,” Moses Kipsiro says quietly
translation.lug: "Nalinga njagala kubeera muddusi," bw'atyo Moses Kipsiro bwe yagamba

translation.en: ”Kipsiro showed some early promise but nothing striking
translation.lug: "Kipsiro yalagirawo essuubi naye tewali kyavaamu

translation.en: Kipsiro at HomeKipsiro is mentally resilient, and pragmatic as is evident from a recent journey from Limerick, Ireland back home to Uganda
translation.lug: Kipsiro yasiriikirira ng'ali waka, era okuba nti yagoonjola ekizibu kyalabikira mu kukomawo okuva mu Limerick, Ireland okudda mu Uganda

translation.en: Moses Kipsiro of Uganda is the favourite
translation.lug: Moses Kipsiro  muganzi nnyo

translation.en: 21:18 Kipsiro is turning out to be a “stubborn competitor” for the Kenyans
translation.lug: 21:18 Kipsiro 'abobbya Bannakenya omutwe'

translation.en: Kipsiro accepts the rigours of his journey with equanimity
translation.lug: Kipsiro akkiriza mu bukakkamu okwolekagana n'obuzibu bwonna obuli mu lugendo lwe

translation.en: Kipsiro is a quiet unassuming man and an intensely religious man
translation.lug: Kipsiro teyeewaana era munaddiini nnyo

translation.en: Kipsiro’s trainingHis training in Uganda is determined necessarily by the terrain, the environment and the time of year
translation.lug: Okutendekebwa kwa Kipsiro mu Uganda kwesigama ku nkula y'ekitundu, embeera ekiseera ky'omwaka

translation.en: In keeping with the African approach, Kipsiro doesn’t count mileage
translation.lug: Ng'agoberera enkola y'Ababafirika, Kipsiro tatunuulira bbuzibu obunaabaawo

translation.en: Kipsiro will run for an hour or ninety minutes each day
translation.lug: Kipsiro yaddukanga essaawo emu oba eddakiika kyenda buli lunaku

translation.en: Kipsiro trains alone, at altitude, without the presence of his coach and agent Ricky Simms, who is better known for being Usain Bolt’s agent as well
translation.lug: Kipsiro yetendeka yekka, ku kasozi, ng'omutendesi we taliiwo era n'omuwambi we Ricky Simms, amanyidda ng'omukozi wa Usain Bolt

translation.en: But the coach is keenly aware of what Kipsiro is doing each day and is satisfied that he will not over train
translation.lug: Naye omutendesi we amanyi Kipsiro ky'akola buli lunaku era akimanyi nti teyeetendeka kisukkiridde

translation.en: When it’s compatible with his own training, Kipsiro trains with the elite staple of Kenyans under Simm’s tutelage
translation.lug: Bwe kiba nga kikwatagana n'okwetendeka kwe, Kipsiro yetendeka ne Bannakenya abagagga n'omusomesa wa Simm

translation.en: These sessions allowed Kipsiro to mingle with the Kenyan athletes whom he admired, namely Daniel Komen and the great Moses Kiptanui
translation.lug: Kino kisobozesa Kipsiro okwegatta Bannakenya abaddusi be yeegomba nga ye Daniel Komen ne Moses Kiptanui nantameggwa

translation.en: ”Simms’s task is to fine tune and maximise Kipsiro’s exciting potential
translation.lug: Omulimu gwa Simm kwe kugyayo obusobozi bwa Kipsiro

translation.en: 21:26 A brilliant finish by Kipsiro and another gold for Uganda
translation.lug: 21:26 obuwanguzi bwa Kipsiro n'omuddaali ogwa zaabu omulala gwe yawangulira Uganda

translation.en: Kipsiro is the first runner after 70 years to win a double
translation.lug: Kipsiro ye muddusi eyasooka okuwangula emirundi ebiri oluvannyuma lw'emyaka 70

translation.en: “My favourite distance is the 5000m and I hope to get my time down to 12:45,” says Kipsiro who in addition to his bronze in 2007 was 4th at the 2008 Games and 2009 world champs in the 5k
translation.lug: "Njagala nnyo okudduka embiro za mita 5000 era nsuubira okukendeeza ku saawa zenziddukira zituuke ku 12:45 bw'atyo Kipsiro bw'agamba era yangula omuddaali gw'ekikomo mu 2007 era yali wakuna mu mizannyo egyaliwo mu 2008 ne bannantemegwa b'ensi mu 2009 mu nkumi etaano

translation.en: ”Should Kipsiro fulfill the full arc of his athletic career he will have created a considerable legacy
translation.lug: "Singa Kipsiro atuukiriza ekiruubirirwa kye mu by'emisinde ajja kuba atuuse ku buwanguzi

translation.en: You don’t displace a giant like AkiiBua
translation.lug: Toyinza kugyawo nnantameggwa afaananako AkiiBua

translation.en: What a week!Ugandan fans cheer Kipsiro
translation.lug: Nga wiiki yanjawulo nnyo! Bannauganda batendereza Kipsiro

translation.en: Equatorial Real Estate is aiming to change this by bringing structured developments to the market in Kampala and surrounding areas
translation.lug: Equatorial Real Estate erina ekiruubirirwa eky'okukikyusa ng'ereetawo enkulaakulana okuyitira mu kuzimba ebizimbe mu Kampala n'ebitundu ebikyetoolodde

translation.en: New book unveils the lies, rape of suspects at CMI and state killings under Museveni regime What happened to NRM’s fundamental change?
translation.lug: Ekitabo ekippya kibikkula obulimba, abateeberezebwa okukwata abakazi ne gavumenti okutta abantu mu mulembe gwa Museveni, Kiki ekyatuuka ku nkyukakyuka sinziggu eya NRM?

translation.en: “One afternoon in 1981 when I had been at Makerere University for only a couple of weeks, my niece Annette burst into my room at Africa Hall wailing
translation.lug: Lumu mutuntu mu mwaka gwa 1981 bwe nnali ku Universty y'e Makerere okumala wiiki ntono, muwala wange Annette yayingira mu kisenge kyange mu Africa Hall ng'atema emiranga

translation.en: Her mother Beatrice Kemigisha had been taken away by Obote’s security operatives
translation.lug: Maamawe Beatrice Kemigisha yali atwaliddwa abasirkale ba Obote

translation.en: We never saw her again,” Dr Olive Kobusingye’s prohibited book starts
translation.lug: Tetwaddayo kumulaba," Ekitabo kya Dr Olive Kobusingye ekyawerebwa bwe kityo bwe kitandika

translation.en: This reminiscence brings an instant juxtaposition of the character of Museveni’s regime and the regimes he overthrew, which shows that they are not much different today
translation.lug: Ekitabo kino kigata wamu enkola y'omulembe gwa Museveni n'emirembe emirala ggye yaggyawo, ekiraga nti si bya njawulo leero

translation.en: The book catalogues the extrajudicial killings especially of political opponents under Museveni’s regime, the collapse of the rule of law and the role of the state in the death of Besigye’s brother Joseph Musasizi Kifefe
translation.lug: Ekitabo kiraga okutta okumenya amateeka bannabyabufuzi abali ku ludda oluvuganaya gavumenti omulembe wansi w'obufuzi bwa Museveni, okugibwawo kw'amateeka obuvunaanyizibwa bw'eggwanga mu kufa kwa muganda wa Byesigye, Joseph Musasizi Kifefe

translation.en: Andrew Mwenda, President Paul Kagame has absolutely nothing to fear of his leadership
translation.lug: Andrew Muwenda, Pulezidenti Paul Kagame tebatya bukulembeze bwe

translation.en: Mwenda, just enjoy Paul Kagame’s wealth in piece
translation.lug: Mwenda, yeeyagalira mu by'obugagga bwa Kagame mu mirembe

translation.en: Many people even doubt the motive or your socalled opposition to Museveni
translation.lug: Abantu bangi babuusabuusa ekigendererwa oba ekyo kyoyita okuwakanya Museveni

translation.en: Ugandans must not allow President Museveni to turn its wealth into his own
translation.lug: Bannayuganda tebandikkiriza Pulezidenti Museveni okweddiza eby'obugagga bwabwe

translation.en: MunnansiMuseveni vs KagameI don’t know what makes some Ugandans not able to reason out Mwenda logically
translation.lug: Museveni avuganya Kagame si manyi kigana bannayuganda abamu okufumiitiriza, Muwenda yagamba

translation.en: When he talks of corruption, nepotism, etc in Museveni’s government, people don’t see it in a democratic perspective
translation.lug: Bwe baba boogera ku kulya enguzi, okuwa ab'engandaze emirimu, n'ebirala, mu gavumentii ya Museveni, abantu tebala bwa dimokulaase bwayo

translation.en: Kamya was phased out, Susan Nakawuki was chased away and Sam Njuba is retiring
translation.lug: Kamya yayimirizibwa, Susan Nakawuki yagabwa ne Sam Njuba agenda kuwummula

translation.en: Which plan do they have?” Kampala District  Woman MP Nabillah Ssempala Nagayi charged at the FDC party headquarters in Najjanankumbi on October 18
translation.lug: Nteeketeeka ki gye balina? Omubaka wa palimenti omukyala owa Disitulikiti ya Kampala Nabillah Ssempala Nagayi yeekalakasiza ku kitebe ekikulu eky'ekibiina kya FDC e Najjanankumbi nga Okutobba 18

translation.en: She took over the briefing from Mukalazi Kibuuka, the party deputy secretary for foreign affairs, who was mandated to give the address
translation.lug: Yatwala amagezi agamuweebwa Mukalazi Kibuuka omumyuka w'omuwandiisi w'ekibiina ow'ensonga ez'ebweru, yaweebwa olukkusa okwogera

translation.en: Sempala was complaining over disputed elections for party structures in Kampala
translation.lug: Sempala yeemulugunya olw'enkayana z'okulonda ez'ebibiina by'obufuzi by'omu Kampala

translation.en: They get hides besides eating crocodile meat,” President Museveni advised Buliisa District residents to eat crocodiles that have been terrorising them them
translation.lug: Ng'oggyeko okulya ennyama ya goonya bazigyako amaliba," Pulezidenti Museveni yagamba ababatuuze okulya goonya ezibadde zibatigomya

translation.en: He was responding to a petition by Buliisa MP Stephen Mukitale Biraahwa, who requested for government’s intervention to stop the crocodiles that are attacking the fishing communities on Lake Albert
translation.lug: Yali ayanukula omulanga gw'Omubaka wa palamenti Stephen Mukitale Biraahwa eyasaba gavumenti okutangira goonya ezilumba ebintundu omuli eby'obuvvubi ku Nnyanja Mutta Nzige

translation.en: The book by Dr Olive Kobusingye accuses President Museveni of veering off the correct ideals of the NRM revolution
translation.lug: Ekitabo kya Dr Olive Kobusingye kinenya Pulesidenti Museveni okukyusa ebiruubirirwa by'ekibiina kya NRM

translation.en: Interparty Cooperation candidate and FDC president Dr Kizza Besigye has said the opposition will have their own vote tally centre during next year’s elections
translation.lug: Akwanaganya ebibiina by'obufuzi ne pulezidenti wa FDC Dr Kizza Besigye yagamba nti abali ku ludda oluvuganya bajja kubeera n'ebifo ebyabwe kubwabwe we babalira obululu mu kulonda kw'omwaka ogujja

translation.en: The Electoral Commission has warned him against such a move
translation.lug: Akakiiko k'Eby'okulanda kamulabudde ku ekyo kyayagala okukola

translation.en: The trigger was the arrival of Kampala Woman MP, Nabilah Naggayi Ssempala, who stormed the meeting room and usurped Mukalazi Kibuuka’s mandate to address the conference
translation.lug: Ekyaviirako ekyo kyali okutuuka kw'Omubaka wa Palamenti omukyala Nabilah Naggayi Ssempala eyakyankalanya ekisenge awakungaanirwa n'okuyimiriza Mukalazi Kibuuka okukuba olukungaana

translation.en: She claimed that her supporters were being systematically rigged out to give her opponent, Rashida Naluwooza, undue advantage
translation.lug: Yagamba nti abawagizi be baali bawalirizibwa okuwa amuvuganya Rashida Naluwooza, omukisa egw'enjawulo

translation.en: The suspects, Charles Iga, Robert Ssempebwa Kazahura
translation.lug: Abavunaanibwa, Charles Iga, Robert Ssempebwa Kazahura

translation.en: The gang is also suspected to have killed Nkata Mugagga, Claude Ndeezi alias Munyarwanda, Constatine Ssempala, and two men only identified as Mubaraka and Younger
translation.lug: Kabinja ka bazigu era katebeerezebwa nti katta Nkata Mugagga, Claude Ndeezi, Alias Munyarwanda  Constantine Ssempala, n'abasajja babiri bokka abamanyiddwa nga Mubaraka ne Younger

translation.en: Police Chief Maj. Gen. Kale Kayihura said that enough evidence has been gathered to convict the criminals and have them safely away from society for a reasonably long time
translation.lug: Omukulu wa poliisi Maj. Gen. Kale Kayihura yagamba nti obujulizi obumala bumaze okunganyizibwa okukwata abamenyi b'amateeka n'okubagya mu bantu okumala ekiseera ekiwera

translation.en: Kayihura also promised to investigate allegations that rogue officers within the police connive with criminals, often releasing them soon after their arrest
translation.lug: Kayihura era yasuubiza okunoonyereza ku kigambibwa nti abakulu mu poliisi beekoobaana n'abazzi b'emisango, era babata amangu ddala nga bakasibibwa

translation.en: The new law which seems designed to catch Kabaka Mutebi who through former Buganda Premier, Mulwanyamuli Semwogerere, and the likes of former Mengo Minister Medadi Sseggona, is associated with the pressure group Suubi 2011, bars cultural leaders from engaging in partisan politics or joining any political party
translation.lug: Etteeka epya kirabika lyateekebwawo okukwasa Kabaka Mutebi eyayitira mu eyali Katikkiro wa Buganda Mulwanyamuli Semwogerere n'eyali minisita w'e Mengo Medadi Sseggona, yapikirizibwa akabinja akayitibwa Ssuubi 2011 akagaana omukulu w'ebyo buwangwa yenna okwetaba mu by'obufuzi oba okuyingira ekibiina kye by'obufuzi kyonna

translation.en: Mutebi does not get the Shs5 million monthly token from the government and does not have a government house or car
translation.lug: Mutebi tafuna bukadde 5 obwa buli mwezi okuva mu govumenti era talina nnyumba ya gavumenti oba emmotoka

translation.en: Prime Minister Apollo Nsibambi addresses the press after opening a conference on Uganda noncommunicable diseases at Hotel Africana on October 15
translation.lug: Katikkiro wa Uganda Apollo Nsibambi yagamba bannamawulire oluvannyuma lw'okuggulawo olukungaana olukwata ku bululwadde obutasiigibwa mu Uganda ng'ali  ku Hotel Africana nga Okitoba 15

translation.en: You might have been wondering how much each of Moses Kipsiro’s gold medals from the just concluded Commonwealth Games in New Delhi is worth
translation.lug: Oyinza okuba nga weebuuza nti buli gumu ku midaali gya zaabu egya Moses Kipsiro gye yawangula mu mizannyo gya Common Wealth mu New Delhi gibalirilwamu ssente mmeka

translation.en: Well, President Yoweri Museveni has eventually given you a clue
translation.lug: Pulezidenti Yoweri Museveni abawadde oluwenda

translation.en: On top of the cash, Museveni promised to construct a residential house for the marathoner who raced himself into Uganda’s and the Commonwealth Games’ record books with the country’s first double gold at a major international event
translation.lug: Okugatta ku ssente enkalu, Museveni yasuubiza okuzimbira omuddusi ennyumba eyawangulira Uganda emiddaali ebiri era eyawandiikibwa mu byafaayo by'emizanyo gya CommonWealth egy'ensi yonna

translation.en: Museveni also promised to upgrade a training field in Kipsiro’s home district of Bukwo into a fourlane training field to provide athletes there with high altitude training facilities
translation.lug: Era Museveni yasuubiza okuzibwa ekisaawe ekitekerwamu abaddusi mu disitulikiti ya Kipsiro ey'e Bukwo nga kyakubeera n'enkuubo nnya eziddukirwamu kisobozese abaddusi okutendekebwa obulungi

translation.en: I like President Museveni’s style
translation.lug: Njagala enkola ya Pulezidenti Museveni

translation.en: Voter register not readyThe Electoral Commission once again has the opposition really worried
translation.lug: Enkalala z'Abalonzi bwe zitaba ntegeke Akakiiko k'Eby'Okulonda kaba keraliikiriza ab'oludda oluvugannya

translation.en: The EC displayed the national voters register between August 11 and September 13 to allow village tribunals to clear it of dead, underage or other ineligible voters
translation.lug: Akakiiko k'eby'okulonda kaalaga enkalala z'abalonzi wakati wa Agusito 11 ne sebutemba 13 kisobozese obukiiko bw'ebyalo okunsunsulamu abaafa, abataweza myaka n'abo abalala abatakkirizibwa kulonda

translation.en: In early August the EC kicked off a storm when it announced that it had registered 15,002,720 voters, a figure that the opposition challenges on grounds that it is practically impossible for half of the country’s population to be eligible voters
translation.lug: Ku ntandikwa ya Agusito, akakiiko k'eby'okulonda kaaleetawo akakyankalano bwe kalangira nti kawandiisizza abalonzi obukadde 15,002,720, abo bali ku ludda oluvvuganya kye bawakanya nti tekisoboka abalonzi okuba ekitundu kimu kya kubiri  ekya bantu bonna abali mu Uganda

translation.en: Now with EC Boss Kiggundu saying that the final number of voters is yet to be tallied and the final register yet to be finalised, the question of how many people qualify to vote remains a major contention, at least the coming weeks Minister of Works and Transport John Nasasira (R) talks to the the African Union official Paulus Geraedts at the opening of the SubSaharan African Transport Policy meeting at Speke Resort Munyonyo on October 18
translation.lug: Omukulu w'akakiiko k'eby'okulonda Kiggundu agamba nti omuwendo gw'abalonzi gukyaina okukakasibwa era n'okumaliriza enkalala z'abalonzi. Akatuubagiro kakyali ku bantu bameka abagwanidde okulonda. Naye mu wiiki ezijja Minisita webyentambula John Nasasira ajja kwogera n'omukungu wa African Union Paulus Geraedts ku lukungana lw'amawanga aga SubSaharan African Transport Policy ku Speke Resort Munyonyo nga Okitoba 18

translation.en: Police quell demonstrators over the damaged Kafumbe Mukasa Road on October 15
translation.lug: Poliisi yagumbulula abeekalakasa olw'okwonoona Oluguuddo lwa Kafumbe Mukasa nga Okitoba 15

translation.en: Mwenda Last Saturday, October 16, I was a guest on Capital Radio’s Capital Gang programme and our debate settled down to the subject of democracy in Africa – specifically on Uganda and Rwanda
translation.lug: Ku lwomukaaga oluwedde nga Okitoba 16, Mwenda yakyazibwa Capital radio ku pulogulaamu ya capital gang era ekyakubaganyizibwako ebirowoozo ye demokulasiya mu Afrika okusingira ddala mu Uganda ne Rwanda

translation.en: But look: The second most influential man in Uganda after President Yoweri Museveni is Amama Mbabazi from Kanungu district
translation.lug: Omuntu omututumufu mu Uganda addirira Puleezidenti Yoweri Museveni ye Amama Mbabazi okuva mu Disitulikiti ya Kanungu

translation.en: Mbabazi and a few elites are not “the people of Kanungu
translation.lug: Mbabazi n'abagagga abawerako si "bantu be Kanungu

translation.en: ” Yet Mbabazi is not an oddity; his is the story of Africa’s democratic experiment
translation.lug: Mbambazi si muntu wa njawulo; muwagizi wa demokulase w'Afirika

translation.en: If Museveni wants to win the Bairu vote in Ankole, he does little to address their concerns over healthcare, education and transportation
translation.lug: Museveni bwaba ng'ayagala okufuna obuwagizi bwa Abairu mu Ankole, aba alina okukola ku nsonga zaabwe ezikwata ku by'obulamu, eby'enjigiriza n'eby'entambula

translation.en: He appoints Amanya Mushega, Kahinda Otafiire and Ephraim Kamuntu into his cabinet
translation.lug: Alonda Amanya Mushega, Kahinda Otafiire and Ephraim Kamuntu mu kakiiko ke aka ba minisita

translation.en: His opponent, Kizza Besigye, in trying to win over the Baganda does not address their concerns over land and agricultural policy
translation.lug: Oyo amuvuganya Kiiza Besigye mu kugezaako okufuna obuwagizi mu Baganda tagezaako kuyingirira bya ttaka na byabulimi

translation.en: He strikes a deal with two former Katikkiros – Ssemwogerere Mulwanyamuli and Daniel Muliika
translation.lug: Ateeseganya n'abaaliko bakattikiro babiri - Ssemwogerere Mulwanyamuli ne Daniel Muliika

translation.en: When Museveni openly gives envelops stuffed with cash to ordinary people, as has become his norm these days, he is addressing a vital existential need to gain political advantage
translation.lug: Museveni bw'awa abantu babulijjo ebbaasa ezijjudde sente nga bw'akola ebiseera bino, aba akola ku kyetaago ekikuku asobole okufuna obuwagizi mu by'oufuzi

translation.en: While appearing before parliament on October 13, the Minister of Internal Affairs, Kirunda Kivejinja, claimed the book is a national security threat
translation.lug: Bwe yali mu Palamenti nga Okitoba 13, Minisita w'Ensonga ez'omunda Kirunda Kivejinja, yagamba nti ekitabo kyabulabe eri eby'okwerinda kw'egwanga

translation.en: Dr Kobusingye, the author, is a sister of the leader of the opposition Forum for Democratic (FDC) party, retired Col. Dr. Kizza Besigye
translation.lug: Dr. Kobusingye omuwandiisi w'ekitabo ekyo mwannyina wa  Col. Dr. Kizza Besigye eyawummula, omukulu w'ekibiina kya FDC

translation.en: It’s a chronology and examination of how Museveni has made 360degree turn from his passionate promises and ideals of 1986 to the political evils of the past regimes he had contemptuously condemned
translation.lug: Kyewuunyisa engeri Museveni gyakubye enkyukira okuva ku bisuubizo ebisikiriza era ebirungi ebyomu 1986 okudda mu muvuyo gw'ebyobufuzi ogw'emabega gwe yali avumirira

translation.en: It chronicles the early signs in the 1990s of what the author calls Museveni’s derailment from the Movement’s original ideals, the failed internal struggles to reform the Movement and the emergency of Besigye on the political arena
translation.lug: Kiraga obubonero obusooka mu 1990 omuwandiisi ky'ayita okuva kwa Museveni ku biruubirirwa by'ekibiina kya Muvumenti, olutalo olwomunda olwalemwa okuzaawo ekibiina kya Muvumenti n''okugya kwa Besigye mu nsiike ye by'obufuzi

translation.en: It shows how, prior to announcing his candidature, Besigye warned his family of the dangers his action would expose them to during his pursuit of democratic change in Uganda
translation.lug: Kiraga ebyayogerwa nga tanneesimbawo, Besigya yalabula ab'omu maka ge ku kabi akandivuddemu bwe yandiruubiridde okukola enkyukakyuka ez'okuzzaawo demokulase mu Uganda

translation.en: “Besigye repeated his warning that we might be targeted for harassment, and I recall Margaret [Besigye’s sister now in exile] saying she was not going into the second exile,” the author writes
translation.lug: Omuwandiisi agamba nti " Besigye yaddamu okulabula ng'agamba nti bayinza okutulugunyizibwa era ajjukira Margaret [Mwanyina wa Byesigye kati ali mu buwanganguse] agamba nti tagenda kudda mu buwanguse

translation.en: Margaret Kifefe was first forced into exile by Amin’s military regime
translation.lug: Margaret Kifefe ye yasooka okuwangangusibwa mu biseera bya Amin eby'ekinamagye

translation.en: The author catalogues the extrajudicial killings especially of political opponents under Museveni’s regime, the collapse of the rule of law and the role of the state in the death of Besigye’s brother Joseph Musasizi Kifefe to whom the book is dedicated
translation.lug: Omuwandiisi yateekamu okutta okutalkkirizibwa mu mateeka naddala okw'abo abali ku ludda oluvuganya okuli mu bufuzi bwa Museveni, obutagoberera mateeka n'egwanga kye lyakola mu kufa kwa muganda wa Byesigye Joseph Musasizi Kifefe

translation.en: In fact in its preface, the book begins with a reminiscence of the state kidnappings and killings during Obote’s regime before it quickly brings you back to a similar state of affairs under Museveni today
translation.lug: Mu ntandikwa yakyo, ekitabo kyogera ku kuwata abakazi n'okutta okwaliwo mu mulembe gwa Obote amangu ddala nga tekinakuzaayo mu mbeera y'emu eriwo kati mu bufuzi bwa Museveni

translation.en: “One afternoon in 1981 when I had been at Makerere University for only a couple of weeks, my niece Annette burst into my room at Africa Hall wailing
translation.lug: Olweggulo olumu mu 1981, muwala wange Annette yayingira mu kisenge kyange mu Africa Hall ng'atema emiranga

translation.en: Her mother Beatrice Kemigisha had been taken away by Obote’s security operatives
translation.lug: Maamawe Beatrice Kemigisha yali atwaliddwa abasirkale ba Obote

translation.en: This reminiscence brings an instant juxtaposition of the character of Museveni’s regime and the regimes he overthrew, which shows that they are not much different today
translation.lug: Ekitabo kino kigata wamu enkola y'omulembe gwa Museveni n'emirembe emirala ggye yaggyawo, ekiraga nti si bya njawulo leero

translation.en: She uses Museveni’s own book and other writings on the political evils like state inspired violence, political persecution of opponents and arbitrary arrests he contemptuously condemned in the past
translation.lug: Akozesa ekitabo kya Museveni n'ebiwandiiko ebiralala eby'ogerwa ku bikolobero by'obufuzi nga ebikolwa eby'ettemu, bannabyafubuzi okutulugunya ababavuganya n'okusiba abantu awatali musango ekintu kye yavumirira emabega

translation.en: The author brings out how Museveni has since become a vicious perpetrator of the same evils
translation.lug: Omuwandiisi alaga engeri Museveni gy'akoze ebikolebero bye bimu

translation.en: For example in The Price of Bad Leadership; What is Africa’s Problem? Museveni condemned Milton Obote’s government for attacking the Kabaka’s palace in 1966
translation.lug: Ng'ekyokulabirako, ebikwata ku ffuga bbi; ekizibu kya Afrika kye kiriwa? Museveni yavumirira gavumenti ya Milton Obote olw'okulumba olubiri lwa Kabaka mu 1966

translation.en: He stated: “During the 1966 when Obote was quarrelling with Mutesa, Obote’s army massacred many people
translation.lug: Yagamba nti, " Mu mwaka gwa 1966 Obote bwe yali ayomba ne Mutesa, amagye gatirimbula abantu bangi"

translation.en: If Mutesa is having a political quarrel with Obote, what does the population have to do with it and why kill them? I do not agree with the proverb that when two elephants fight, it is the grass that suffers
translation.lug: Bwe kiba nga Mutesa alina enkaayana z'ebyobufuzi ne Obote, abantu ba bulijjo kibakwatirako wa era lwaki battibwa? sik mu lwaki obatta? Sikkiriziganya n'enjogera egamba nti enjovu we zirwanira, omuddogwe guboonaabona

translation.en: The incidents were a test on Museveni’s sincerity
translation.lug: Ebyaliwo byagezesa obwesimbu bwa Museveni

translation.en: Museveni disagreed with Kabaka Muwenda Mutebi (Buganda’s king) who wanted to visit Kayunga, a part of his kingdom
translation.lug: Museveni teyakkiriziganya na Kabaka Muwenda Mutebi (Kabaka wa Buganda) eyali ayagala okukyala e Kayunga, ekitundu ky'obwakabaka bwe

translation.en: The disagreement was sparked by a much smaller issue than the one between Obote and Mutesa in 1966
translation.lug: Obutakkaanya bwava ku kantu akatono ennyo akatenkana n'obwo obwaliwo wakati wa Obote ne Muteesa mu 1966

translation.en: Museveni stopped the Kabaka on account that a local community in Kayunga was opposed to the king’s visit
translation.lug: Museveni yamiriza okukyala kwa kabaka olwokuba banna Kayunga baawakanya okukyala kwa kabaka

translation.en: So what had happened to the government’s capacity to arrest rioters without killing them? Had Museveni lied in his book? Dr Kobusingye’s book shows that Museveni has so changed that he is no longer his former self
translation.lug: Kati kiki ekyatuuka ku busobozi bwa gavumenti okukwata abeekalakaasi nga tebabase? Museveni yalimba mu kitabo kye? Ekitabo kya dokita Kobusingye kiraga nti Museveni akyuse

translation.en: Museveni had said nominations for all political posts would be done on individual merit under the Movement
translation.lug: Museveni yali agambye nti okusemba abantu ku bifo by'obufuzi kyandibadde kisinzira ku busobola bwa buli muntu wansi w'ekibiina  kya Muvumenti

translation.en: But when Dr Besigye announced his candidature, Museveni declared him a deserter from the Movement
translation.lug: Naye Besigye bwe yalangirira eky'okwesimbawo kwe, Museveni yagamba nti yali yadduka mu kibiina kya Muvumenti

translation.en: Museveni rallied the cabinet and the Caucus to announce him as the Movement’s preferred candidate for the 2001 elections
translation.lug: Museveni yakunga ba minisita be n'akabinja k'ekibiina okumulangirira ng'ekibiina kya Muvumenti gwe kisembye okwesimbawo mu kulonda kwa 2001

translation.en: ” The resolution was formally signed by Movement Caucus chairman Prof. Gilbert Bukenya on December 9, 2000
translation.lug: Ekyasalibwawo kyatekebwako omukono eyali Ssentabbe w'ekibiina kya Muvumenti Prof. Gilbert Bukenya nga Ddesemba 9,2000

translation.en: By this, the author says, no other candidate was eligible to stand on the Movement ticket except Museveni yet the election was supposed to be on “individualmerit” basis
translation.lug: Mu kukola bwatyo, omuwandiisi agamba nti tewali eyesimbawo yenna eyali agwanira okutwala tiketi y'ekibiina kya muvumenti okugyako Museveni ng'ate okulonda kwali kwesigama ku busobozi bwa buli muntu sekinoomu

translation.en: This amounts to blatant manipulation of the political system which Museveni had castigated shortly after capturing power
translation.lug: Kino kiringa okukyusakyusa enkola y'eby'obufuzi Museveni kya yali agyewo amangu ddala nga yakatwala obuyinza

translation.en: So when Museveni was seeking to be endorsed as the only candidate for the Movement, wasn’t he in essence manipulating the political system against public interest?
translation.lug: Museveni bwabanga ye yekka ye yali ayagala okwesimbawo okuva mu kibiina kya Muvumenti, yali tatyobodde nkola ya bya bufuzi abantu kye batayagala?

translation.en: According to Museveni’s earlier writing, such cannot be called freedom
translation.lug: Okusinziira ku Museveni bye yasooka okuwandiika, ekyo tekiyitibwa ddembe

translation.en: Kobusingye doubts Museveni’s sincerity in his earlier writings and suggests he was just covering up his political dishonesty
translation.lug: Kobusingye abusabuusa obwesimbu bwa Museveni mu ebyo bye yasooka okuwandiika, era agamba nti yali abikkiriria ku bulyake bwe mu by'obufuzi

translation.en: “Since the NRM is not officially a political party despite having the characteristics of a ruling political party in a single party state, it has sought to create an illusion that Uganda is a noparty state
translation.lug: Okuva ekibiina kya NRM bwe kitali kya bya bufuzi mu butongole, wadde nga kikolanga ekibiina ky'eby'obufuzi ekikola, kireeseewo endowooza egamba nti Uganda terimui kibiina kya byabufuzi

translation.en: Such semantics obscure the basic reality of the NRM’s partisan dominance of the political process in Uganda,” the report reads in part
translation.lug: Mu bufunze, alipoota egamba ebintu ng'ebyo bikweka amazima agalaga nti ekibiina kya NRM kyefuze enkola z'eby'obufuzi mu Uganda,"

translation.en: ” However when Besigye announced his candidature in 2000, Museveni declared him a deserter, meaning he was no longer a member of the Movement
translation.lug: Naye Besigye bwe yagamba nti agenda kwesimbawo mu mwaka gwa 2000, Museveni yagamba nti yali yadduka mu Muvumenti

translation.en: So where did Museveni want him to go?
translation.lug: Kati olwo Museveni yali ayagala agende wa?

translation.en: But after the elections, NRM officials announced that the Movement had won
translation.lug: Naye oluvannyuma lw'okulonda, abakungu ba NRM baalangirira nti Ekibiina kya Muvumenti kye kisinze

translation.en: The Constituent Assembly elections in 1994 were conducted on individual merit under the allinclusive Movement
translation.lug: Okulonda kwa Constituent Assembly okwaliwo mu 1994 kwesigama ku busobozi bwa buli muntu nga mwotwalidde Ekibiina kya Muvumenti

translation.en: The book says some EC top officials were representatives or agents of companies which were doing business with the Commission
translation.lug: Ekitabo kigambo nti abakungu b'Akakiiko k'Eby'Okulonda baali bakikiridde kampuni ezikola bizineensi n'Akakiiko ako

translation.en: One example was Lithotec, a South African company, which was contracted to print ballot papers for the EC in 2001
translation.lug: Ekyokulabirako kye kya kampuni ya Lithotec eya South Africa eyaweebwa omulimu gw'okukuba obukonge mu mwaka gwa 2001

translation.en: One of the EC top officials, whom the book names, was the company’s business representative and indeed it won the contract
translation.lug: Omu ku bakungu b'ekitongole ky'eby'Okulonda  ekitabo gwe kyayatuukiriza amannya yali akiikirira kampuni eyo era omulimu gwa giweebwa

translation.en: The parliamentary committee which investigated the 2001 election violence in 2002 discovered that more than half of the EC senior staff were not qualified
translation.lug: Akakiiko ka Palamenti akaanoonyereza ku muvuyo ogwali mu kulonda kwa 2001, mu mwaka gwa 2002 kaakizuula nti okusukka mu kimu kya kubiri eky'abakungu b'ekitongole ky'Eby'Okulonda tebaalina bisaanyizo

translation.en: The book cites several cases of fraud in procurement deals which were carried out even after the government contracted SWIPCO, a Swiss procurement company, had advised A military squad called Black Mamba lays siege on the High Court after the judge had released treason suspects on bail on November 16, 2005
translation.lug: Ekitabo ky'ogera ku bulyake obwaliwo nga ne gavumenti emaze okuwa kampuni ya SWIPCO omulimu, ng'eno ye kampuni ya Swiss enfunira gavumenti eby'amaguzi, yawa amagezi ekibinja ky'amagye ekya Black Mamba okugumba ku kooti enkulu ng'omulamuzi amaze okuta ku kakalu abateeberezebwa okulya mu gavumenti olukwe  nga Novemba 16,  2005

translation.en: The indictment on the EC incompetence is reinforced by the findings of the Supreme Court in 2001 and 2006  which showed the Electoral Commission could not be trusted to deliver free and fair elections
translation.lug: Ebyayogerwa ku bunafu bw'akakiiko k'Eby'Okulonda bisibwako essira mu ebyo ebyazuulibwa kooti ensukkulumu mu 2001 ne 2006 ekyalaga nti Akakiiko k'Eby'okulonda kaali tekayinza kussibwamu bwesige kutegeka kulonda okw'amazima n'obw'enkanya

translation.en: In his Mustard Seed, Museveni says that lack of trust is a big impediment to the democratisation process
translation.lug: Mu kitabo kye ekya Mustard Seed, Museveni agamba nti obutali bwesigwa kizibu ky'amaanyi mu kuba n'enkola ya demokulase

translation.en: “Not to be trusted is the greatest strategic handicap for any political group,” Museveni writes
translation.lug: Museveni awandiika nti "obutali bwesigwa kye kintu ekikyasinzeyo okulemesa ebibiina by'obufuzi

translation.en: Yet he has rejected the opposition and civil society organisations’ demands to dissolve the EC well knowing that the public has lost faith in it
translation.lug: Kyokka ayagaanye okuwuliriza okusaba kwa ab'oludda oluvuganya n'abantu ababulijjo okugyawo Akakiiko k'Okulonda ng'amanyi nti abantu tebakyakakkiririzaamu

translation.en: Our country has gone through a traumatic experience for the last twenty or so years, mainly because Obote and Amin had no respect for the rule of law
translation.lug: Ensi yaffe eyise mu katuubagiro akamanyi emyaka abiri oba n'okusingawo olwo'kuba Obote Amin tebaagoberera mateeka

translation.en: Nobody has the right to take away a person’s life, freedom or property except within the due process of the law,” Museveni said passionately at the seminar
translation.lug: Tewali alina buyinza kutta muntu, okutyoboola eddembe ly'obuntu oba okwonoona ebintu by'abalala ng'amateeka bwe galagira, bw'atyo Museveni bwe yayogera mu lukungaana

translation.en: However this contrasts sharply with the Museveni who ordered the rearrest of Besigye and his 21 coaccused who had been duly released on bail by the High Court in Kampala on November 16, 2005
translation.lug: Kyokka kino kikontana ne Museveni eyalagira baddemu basibe Besigye ne banne 21 abaali baateebwa ku kakalu ka Kooti Enkulu mu Kampala nga Novemba 16, 2005

translation.en: His soldiers, like Obote’s and Amin’s armies, deprived the suspects of their liberty contrary to his promise at the law seminar in 1987
translation.lug: Okufaananako abasirikale ba Obote ne Amini, abasirikale be bagyako abawawabirwa eddembe lyabwe nga kino kitontana ne kye yasuubiza mu lukungaana lw'amateeka olwaliwo mu 1987

translation.en: In February 2002 two opposition supporters Peter Oloya Yumbe and Steven Olanya were arrested on charges of murdering Alfred Bongomin, the Movement chairman for Pabbo in Gulu
translation.lug: Mu Febwali wa 2002 abali ku ludda oluvuganya ababiri Peter Oloya Yumbe ne Steven Olanya baasibwa olw'okutemula Alfred Bongomin, sentebe w'Ekibiina kya Muvumenti mu Pabbo Gulu

translation.en: In his “Ours is a Fundamental Change” Museveni had stated: “No regime has a right to kill or beat any citizen of this country
translation.lug: Okuyitira mu "Ours is a Fundamental Change” Museveni yali agambye nti: "Tewali mulembe gukkirizibwa kukuba omutuuze yenna ow'omu nsi eno

translation.en: ” However, for Yumbe’s murder by Museveni’s soldiers, the government did not even investigate the case
translation.lug: Kyokka amagye ba Museveni bwe gatta Yumbe, gavumenti teyafaayo ku kunoonyereza ku musango ogwo

translation.en: Olanya and Penytoo were released but later rearrested on March 9, 2005
translation.lug: Olanya ne Penytoo baateebwa ate oluvannyuma ne bakatibwa nga Maaki 9, 2005

translation.en: When the police were about to release them, the UPDF grabbed them again and took them to the military barracks where they were joined by another opposition supporter Ochan Laryang
translation.lug: Poliisi bwe yali eneetera okubata, abasirikale ba UPDF baabasikambula ne babatwala mu nkambi y'amagye gye beegatirwako Ochan omuwangizi w'oludda oluvuganya

translation.en: The suspects were transferred to Kampala and charged with murder of Ochaya, Kitgum RDC, who police said was killed in 2002
translation.lug: Abawawabirwa baatwalibwa e Kampala ne bateekebwako omusango gw'okutta Ochaya, omukulembeze wa Disitulikiti e Kitigumu, poliisi gwe yagamba nti yattibwa mu 2002

translation.en: One month later the police said the suspects had killed Alfred Bongomin in Gulu, not Ochaya
translation.lug: Oluvannyuma lw'omwezi gumu poliisi yagamba nti abawawabirwa batta Alfred Bongomin mu Gulu so si Ochaya

translation.en: Then the state arrested MPs Michael Ocula and Reagan Okumu and charged them with killing Bongomin
translation.lug: Ate abasirikale baakwata Omubaka awa palimenti Micheal Ocula ne Reagan Okumu ne babateekako omusango gw'okutta Bongomin

translation.en: One day a man came to her home and told her that the state had heard that she was planning to report to the Uganda Human Rights Commission (UHRC)
translation.lug: Lumu omusajja yajja awakawe n'amugamba gavumenti yali ewulidde nti ategeka okubawawabira mu Kitongole ky'Eddembe ry'Omuntu mu Uganda

translation.en: He warned that the day she would report to UHRC was the day she would die
translation.lug: Yamulabula nti olunaku lwaliwaaba mu Kitongole ky'Eddembe ry'Omuntu mu Uganda lwalifiirako

translation.en: She has never reported to UHRC
translation.lug: Nokutuusa leero, tawaabanga mu Kitongole ky'Eddembe ry'Omuntu mu Uganda

translation.en: Frank Atukunda was arrested for subversion and taken to a garage at Arua Presidential Lodge
translation.lug: Franka Atukunda yakwatibwa n'atwalibwa ku garagi mu Arua Presidetial Lodge olw'okusekeeterera gavumenti

translation.en: A military intelligence officer called Drani led the beatings and told the suspects they did not deserve to live
translation.lug: Omukungu w'amagye ayitibwa Drani yakulemberamu okukuba era n'agamba abawawabirwa nti baagwana kufa

translation.en: He would tell them Museveni is “a good parent and whoever opposes him deserves to die
translation.lug: Yabagambanga nti Museveni "muzadde mulungi era nti amuwakanya asaana kufa

translation.en: ” Drani is still in CMI, The Independent has established
translation.lug: Drani akyali mu CMI,  bwe lutyo olupapula lw'amawule The Independent bwe lugamba

translation.en: Another intelligence officer Arnold Kajjo, a relative of Security Minister Amama Mbabazi, would use big sticks to hit the suspects
translation.lug: Omukungu w'Amagye omulala Arnold Kajjo, alina oluganda ku Minisita w'Eby'Okwerinda Amama Mbabaz yakozesa omuggo omunnene okukuba abawawabirwa

translation.en: Patrick Mamenero was arrested from Kabale for alleged subversion
translation.lug: Patrick Mamenero yakwatibwa e Kabale olw'okusekeeterera gavumenti

translation.en: He died in CMI detention on July 23, 2002
translation.lug: Yafiira mu kadduukulu ka CMI nga Jjulaayi 23, 2002

translation.en: Noble Mayombo told the press that Mamenero had died of malaria
translation.lug: Noble Mayombo yagamba abamawulire nti Mamenero yali afudde omusujja gw'ensiri

translation.en: Mamenero had been detained with his father
translation.lug: Mamenero yali sibiddwa ne kitaawe

translation.en: From Museveni’s early days of the struggle, he was resolute that sorting out the A death certificate of Patrick Mamenero from Kabale district who was arrested by soldiers for alleged subversion and killed at CMI in 2002
translation.lug: Okuviira ddala ku ntandikwa y'olutalo lwa Museveni, yali amaliridde okunoonya ekiwandiiko ekiraga enfa ya Patrick Mamenero okuva mu disitulikiti y'e Kabale yakwatibwa abasirikale ng'ateeberezebwa okusekeeterera gavumenti era yatibbwa mu CMI mu mwaka gwa 2002

translation.en: In his Selected Articles on the Uganda Resistance War  1985, Museveni said: “There is quite a lot of misconception not only on the question of Uganda but also on many African issues
translation.lug: Mu biwandiiko bye ebimu eby'ogerwa ku Uganda Resistance War olwa 1985, Museveni yagamba nti waliwo endowooza enkyamu si ku Uganda yokka naye era ne ku nsonga z'Afirika nnyingi

translation.en: ”However in 2005 after the constitution had been controversially amended amidst accusations that he had bribed parliament to pass the amendment removing presidential term limits, Museveni changed his previous statement and told the press: “You wasted a lot of time and power discussing kisanja (presidential tenure)
translation.lug: Kyokka mu 2005 oluvunnyuma lw'ebbago lya Ssemateeka okukyusibwamu wakati w'oluvuuvumo nti alidde olukwe mu Palamenti esobole okukyusa ebisanja by'obwa pulezidenti bibeeko ekkomo, Museveni yakuysa ebigambo bye ebyasooka n'agamba bannamawulire nti; "Mwonoonye ebiseera bingi n'amaanyi nga mwogera ku kisanja (okukyusa pulesidenti)

translation.en: From then onwards Museveni started saying that Uganda’s fundamental problem was in fact economic development and serious people should talk about things like poverty alleviation and industrialisation
translation.lug: Okuva olwo n'okweyongerayo, Museveni yatandika okugamba nti ekizibu kya Uganda ekikulu kyali nkulankulana mu by'enfuna era abantu ab'amagezi bandyogedde ku bintu ng'ogyawo obwavu n'okutandikawo amakolero

translation.en: Before Musasizi Kifefe was arrested in November 2004, there had been an assassination attempt on his life
translation.lug: Nga Musaasizi Kifefe tannakwatibwa mu Novemba 2004, waaliwo olukwe lw'okugezaako okumutta

translation.en: Saasi left later in another car
translation.lug: Saasi yamala n'agendera mu motoka endala

translation.en: And how could Besigye have been so right and with such a precision?” the book reads
translation.lug: Besigye yasoboala atya okuba omutuufu?" ekitabo bwe kityo bwe kigamba

translation.en: Francis Ayume was the Speaker of parliament
translation.lug: Francis Ayume yali Mwogezi wa palamenti

translation.en: “Ayume was seen as a threat, so he was removed and made Attorney General and replaced with Edward Sekandi” the book reads in part
translation.lug: "Ayume yalabibwa ng'ekizibu, era yajjibwako n'aweebwa obwa Ssaabawolereza wa Gavument, olwo Edward Sekandi n'amuddira mu bigere" ekitabo bwe kigamba

translation.en: Ministers Bidandi Ssali, Eriya Kategaya, Miria Matembe, Amanya Mushega and Sarah Nakiyingi who opposed the change of the constitution were dropped from Cabinet
translation.lug: Ba minisita; Bidandi Ssali, Eriya Kategaya, Miria Matembe, Amanya Mushega and Sarah Nakiyingi abaawakanya eby'okukyusa Ssemateeka bagibwako ku kabindo ka ba minisita

translation.en: Then Museveni’s cheerleaders started choruses calling for him to rule for life
translation.lug: Olwo abawagizi ba Museveni baatandika okugamba nti ajja kufuga obulamu bwe bwonna

translation.en: At a rally in Sembabule in January 2004, four cabinet ministers and 20 MPs danced for the third term for Museveni
translation.lug: Mu lukungana e Ssembabule mu Janwali wa 2004, ba minisita bana n'ababaka ba Palamenti 20 baazina olw'ekisaanja kya Museveni ekyokusatu

translation.en: Minister Syda Bbumba took the issue a little further
translation.lug: Minisita Syda Bbumba ensonga yagyongerayo

translation.en: Khiddu Makubuya changes goal postsKizza Besigye’s arrest on treason and rape charges on November 14, 2005 threw his presidential candidature into balance
translation.lug: Kiddhu Makubuya akyusa ekigendererwa n'alaga nti Kizza Besigye bwe yakwatibwa ku misango gy'okulya mu nsi olukwe n'okukwata omukazi egyaliwo nga Noveemba 14, 2005 gyateeka okwesimbawo kwe ku bwa pulezidenti mu lusuubo

translation.en: The Electoral Commission sought the opinion of the Attorney General, Khiddu Makubuya
translation.lug: Akakiiko k'Ebyokulonda kaasemba ekirowoozo ky'Omuwoleleza wa gavumenti Kiddu Makubuya

translation.en: Makubuya was a member of the commission set up by Museveni in 1987 to investigate human rights abuses from 1962 to 1986
translation.lug: makubuya yali mmemba w'akakiiko akatekebwawo Museveni mu 1987 okunoonyereza ku ddembe ly'obuntu eryalinnyirirwa okuva mu 1962 okutuuka mu 1986

translation.en: Makubuya, then an associate professor of law at Makerere University, disagreed with his fellow commissioners on some issues and wrote a minority report
translation.lug: Makubuya eyali omukugu w'amateeka ku Yunivasite e makerere teyakkiriziganya na bakugu banne  ku nsonga ezimu era n'awandiika alipoota ye

translation.en: However, on Besigye’s case, he turned his statement on its head and said that the FDC leader’s candidature should be blocked because the treason charge had placed his level of innocence below that of other candidates
translation.lug: Wadde nga ku nsonga ya Besigye yakyusa bye yayogera nti eyala yeesimbyewo okuva mu kibiina kya FDC asaana okuyimirizibwa kubanga omusango gw'okulya mu nsi olukwe gwakkakanya nnyo ekifo kye bw'ogerageranya n'abo abaali beesimbyewo okuva mu bibiina ebirala

translation.en: The book also captures the various episodes in Besigye’s trial both in the High Court and military court and the protracted struggle by Besigye’s lawyers to stop the arbitrary prosecution by the state
translation.lug: Ekitabo era ky'ogera ku bintu ebirala ebyaliwo mu musango gwa Besigye mu kooti enkulu ne mu kooti y'amagye era n'olutalo lwa balooya ba Besigye okukomya efugabbi

translation.en: The book then delves into how the state blocked Besigye’s brother Musasizi Kifefe from getting proper treatment and in time, leading to his eventual death
translation.lug: Ekitabo era kyogera ku ngeri muganda wa Besigye Musasizi Kifefe gye yaziyizibwamu okufuna obujjajjabi obutuufu mu kiseera ekituufu, ekyamuviirako okufa

translation.en: It places Kifefe’s death at the hands of the state
translation.lug: kino kiranga nti okufa kwa Kifefe kyava ku gavumenti

translation.en: The author borrows from Museveni’s explanation in 2003 when he was justifying why he had lent his presidential jet to fly his daughter abroad to give birth instead of taking her to local public hospitals
translation.lug: Omuwandiisi yeyazika ebyannyonnyolwa Museveni mu mwaka gwa 2003 nga yeewozaako lwaki yakkiriza ennyonnyi y'obwa pulezidenti okutwala muwala we ebweru okuzaala mu kifo ky'okumutwala mu malwaliro ga gavumenti

translation.en: According to Museveni, the book suggests, the possibility of poisoning a vulnerable prisoner like Musasizi in prison is real in Uganda
translation.lug: Okusinziira ku Museveni, ekitabo kigamba nti okuwa obutwa omusibe atalina buyambi nga Musasizi mukkomera mu Uganda kisoboka

translation.en: The author narrates the various attempts by the family to get a medical report for Musasizi’s bail application in court and how doctors and administrators of Mulago Hospital refused to release it citing fear for their lives
translation.lug: Omuwandiisi attottola emirundi ab'omu nju gye baagezaako okufuna alipoota y'obujjanjabi okusaba kooti okuta Musaasizi ku kakalu era n'engeri abasawo n'abakulu b'eddwaliro ly'e Mulago gye baagaana okugibawa olw'okutya okussa obulamu bwabwe mu matigga

translation.en: According to Museveni, the book suggests, the possibility of poisoning a vulnerable prisoner like Musasizi in prison is real in Uganda
translation.lug: Okusinziira ku Museveni, ekitabo kigamba nti okuwa obutwa omusibe atalina buyambi nga Musasizi mukkomera mu Uganda kisoboka

translation.en: It bears a picture of Museveni in military uniform with an assault rifle, an image of militarism in Uganda’s politics
translation.lug: Kiraga ekifaananyi kya Museveni ng'ali mu byambalo by'amagye n'emundu, ekifaananyi ekiraga amagye okuyingizibwa mu by'obufuzi bya Uganda

translation.en: It holds Museveni against his every promise in Sowing the Mustard Seed and concludes that his political accountability has fallen flat
translation.lug: Museveni tanyweredde ku bisuubizo bye nga bwe kirambikiddwa mu "Mustard seed" ne kifundikirwa nti eby'obufuzi bwe biremereddwa

translation.en: Critics have pointed at the confiscation of the book as another sign of the growing intolerance of dissenting views by the Museveni regime
translation.lug: Abanonooza bogedde ku kuwambibwa kw'ekitabo ng'akamu ku bubonero obulaga obuzibu mu kuwa endowooza mu mulembe gwa Museveni

translation.en: With less than five months to the general elections next year in which Museveni and Besigye are likely to be candidates, human rights advocates are worried about the erosion of basic freedoms of speech, association, and the right to information
translation.lug: Ng'ebula emyezi egitasukka mu etaano okulonda kwa bonna kutuuke omwaka ogugya omuli Musevwni ne Besigye ng'abavuganya, Aba Besigye kirabika bajja kwesimbawo, abalwanirizi b'eddembe ly'obuntu beeraliikirivu olw'okulinyirirwa lw'eddembe ly'okwogera, ely'okukolagana n'eddembe ly'okumanya

translation.en: Legislators including Kitgum Women’s Member of Parliament Beatrice Atim Anywar objected to the introduction of the bill before the tabling of the more comprehensive law to govern the industry, the Petroleum Act
translation.lug: Bannamateeka nga mw'otwalidde n'omubaka omukyala akiikirira ab'e Kitgum mu Palamenti Beatrice Atim Anywar  baawakanya eky'okuyisa ekiteeso nga tebanaba kuteekawo teeka erifuga ekitongole, etteeka ly'amafuta

translation.en: By delaying the introduction of the Petroleum Act, the government is “overlooking the foundations of a solid and accountable system,” said Atim
translation.lug: Olw'okulwawo okuleeta ebbago ly'amafuta, gavumenti "ebuusizza amaaso enkola enywevu era eyesigika" Atim bw'agamba

translation.en: Energy Minister Hilary Onek held a press conference practically handing the Italians the keys to Uganda’s oil fields
translation.lug: Minisita w'amasanyalaze n'ebyobuggagga eby'ensibo Hilary Onek yatuuza olukiiko lwa bannamawulire ng'awa Abayitale ebikulu ku nzizi z'amafuta ga Uganda

translation.en: Just a few days later officials including the Minister of Investment Aston Kajara contradicted him, saying that a final decision had not yet been made on whether the government had rejected Tullow’s preemption of the sale
translation.lug: Ngawakayita ennaku ntono oluvanyuma lw'abakungu nga mw'otwalidde Minisita w'eby'okusiga ensimbi Aston Kajara bamuwakanya, nga bagamba nti okusalawo okusembayo tekunnaba kkolebwa oba gavumenti egaana ekiteeso kya kampuni ya Tullow ku by'okutunda

translation.en: According to some reports, the company had received a letter from the Permanent Secretary of Energy, Kabagambe Kaliisa, giving it permission to go ahead with its plan of paying Heritage and depositing the tax claimed by the government in an escrow account in London
translation.lug: Okusinziira ku alipoota ezimu, kampuni yali efunye ebbaluwa okuva ew'omuwandiisi ow'enkalakkalira mu kitongole ky'amasanyalaze n'obuggagga obw'ensibo, Kabagambe Kaliisa ng'abawa olukkusa okugenda mu maaso n'enteekateeka zaakyo e'zokusasula Heritage n'omusolo ogubanjibwa gavumenti mu akawunti e London

translation.en: The current chaos in the management of the industry points to a problem at the top, according to Dickens Kamugisha, of the Africa Institute for Energy Governance
translation.lug: Obukuubagano obulimu bakulembeze b'ekkolero busonga ku kizibu ekyamaanyi okusinziira ku Dickens Kamugisha, ava mu kitongole kya Africa Institute for Energy Governance

translation.en: “All this confusion we are seeing is the result of one man trying to manage everything,” said Kamugisha
translation.lug: Okubuzaabuzibwa kuno kwonna kwe tulaba kuvudde ku muntu omu okugezaako okuddukanya buli kimu, bwatyo Kamugisha bw'agamba

translation.en: He clamped down on officials jumping his signal with a letter to Minister Onek declaring that no oil deals were to be signed without written presidential consent
translation.lug: Yagaana abakungu abaasambajja okulabula okwali mu bbaluwa okugamba nti tewali kiwandiiko ky'amafuta ekijja okussibwako omukono nga pulezidenti takkiriza

translation.en: As Kamugisha says, “From the start, Museveni is creating the impression that he is so powerful, that ‘You companies can’t survive without my say
translation.lug: Nga Kamugisha bw'agamba, okuva ku ntandikwa Museveni ateekawo embeera eraga nti w'amaanyi nnyo; 'kampuni tezisobola kubaawa awatali kigambo kyange

translation.en: It’s clear that the government, especially President Yoweri Museveni, blames Tullow for letting Heritage get away without paying the US$404 million the government claims in tax
translation.lug: Kyeyoleka kaati nti gavumenti okusingira ddala pulezidenti Yoweri Museveni anenya Tullow olw'okuleka Heritage okusaanawo nga obukadde 404 obwa ddoola tebusasuddwa ng'omusolo gwa gavumenti

translation.en: The current chaos in the management of the industry points to a problem at the top, according to Dickens Kamugisha, of the Africa Institute for Energy Governance.
translation.lug: Obukuubagano obulimu bakulembeze b'ekkolero busonga ku kizibu ekyamaanyi okusinziira ku Dickens Kamugisha, ava mu kitongole kya Africa Institute for Energy Governance

translation.en: “All this confusion we are seeing is the result of one man  trying to manage everything,” said Kamugisha
translation.lug: Okubuzaabuzibwa kuno kwonna kwe tulaba kuvudde ku muntu omu okugezaako okuddukanya buli kimu, bwatyo Kamugisha bw'agamba

translation.en: He clamped down on officials jumping his signal with a letter to Minister Onek declaring that no oil deals were to be signed without written presidential consent
translation.lug: Yagaana abakungu abaasambajja okulabula okwali mu bbaluwa okugamba nti tewali kiwandiiko ky'amafuta ekijja okussibwako omukono nga pulezidenti takkiriza

translation.en: As Kamugisha says, “From the start, Museveni is creating the impression that he is so powerful, that ‘You companies can’t survive without my say
translation.lug: Nga Kamugisha bw'agamba, okuva ku ntandikwa Museveni ateekawo embeera eraga nti w'amaanyi nnyo; 'kampuni tezisobola kubaawa awatali kigambo kyange

translation.en: Musumba has been Buzaaya County MP since 1996
translation.lug: Musumba abadde mubaka wa palimenti owa Buzaaya okuva mu 1996

translation.en: It was therefore a shock that he lost to little known LCV councillor Martin Muzaale
translation.lug: N'olwekyo kyantiisa okufiirwa Martin Muzaale omukulembeze wa Disitulikiti

translation.en: Musumba and Menhya were reluctant to discuss their defeat, but Kiyingi, who rose to prominence in 2006 after handing FDC’s Eastern Region Vice Chairperson Salaamu Musumba a shock defeat, is not taking the loss lightly
translation.lug: Musumba ne Menhya tebeefirayo kukubaganya birowoozo ku kulemererwa kwabwe naye Kiyingi eyatutumuka mu 2006 oluvannyuma lw'okuwaayo Salaamu Omumyuka wa Ssentebe w'ekibiina kya FDC mu Kiitundu eky'Ebuvanjuba

translation.en: But if his 2006 election feat surprised Busoga, the NRM Returning Officer Sanubi Namusisi’s announcement on September 7 that Kiyingi had lost to former Makerere University guild president, Henry Maurice Kibalya, left Busoga shell shocked
translation.lug: Naye singa okulondebwa kwe okwa 2006 kwewuunyisa Busoga, omukungu wa NRM Sanubi Namusisibwe yalangirira mu  Ssebutemba 7 nti Kiyingi awanguddwa ng'ono yeyali omukulu w'abayizi e Makerere, Henry Maurice Kibalya kyewuunyisa Busoga

translation.en: Kibalya got 17,171 votes and Kiyingi, 16,974
translation.lug: Kibalya yafuna obululu 17,171 ate Kiyinga 16,974

translation.en: The returning officer was under strict instructions to fix the results in favour of my opponent,” Kiyingi claims
translation.lug: Kiyingi agamba nti,omukungu alangirira ebivudde mu kulonda yagambibwa okuwagira amuvuganya

translation.en: Who issued the instructions to have the results fixed?  He claims it’s Kadaga
translation.lug: Ani yawa ekiragiro okufulumya ebivuddemu? Yagamba nti yali Kadaga

translation.en: He says Kadaga should not have supported Moses Kizige against Menhya in Bugabula North, Kibalya against him in Bugabula South and Martin Muzaale against Isaac Musumba in Buzaaya
translation.lug: Agamba Kadaga teyandiwagidde Moses Kizige avuvuganya ne Menhya e Bugabula w'e Bukiika kkono, yavuganya Kibalya mu Bukiika ddyo wa Bugabula ne Martin Muzaale n'avuganya Isaac

translation.en: All those who allegedly had Kadaga’s backing won the primaries
translation.lug: Abo bonna abaawagirwa Kadaga baawangula akalulu ak'okususula

translation.en: Government and NRM Chief Whip, Daudi Migereko, doubts the allegations against Kadaga
translation.lug: Gavumenti n'omukungu w'ekibiina kya NRM, Daudi Migereko babuusabuusa emisango gye baateeka ku Kadaga

translation.en: He says it is normal for new entrants to approach an established leader, like Kadaga, about their intentions
translation.lug: Agamba nti kya bulijjo abapya okutuukirira abakulembeze abateekebwawo nga Kadaga ku bikwata ku biruubirwa byabwe

translation.en: Former Iganga LCV Chairman George Patrick Bageya, says that protracted fights have always existed among Busoga’s leaders since 1986
translation.lug: Eyali Ssentebbe wa Disitulikiti ya Iganga Patrick Bageya agamba nti obukuubagano bubaddengawo mu bufuzi bwa Busoga okuva mu mu 1986

translation.en: He says former Vice President Speciosa Kazibwe ganged up with Kadaga to fight Kirunda Kivejinja who was viewed as Busoga’s undisputed political leader
translation.lug: Agamba nti Specioza kazibwe eyali omumyuka w'omukulembeze yeekoobaana ne kadaga okulwanyisa Kirunda Kivejinja eyali atwalibwa nga omukulembeze w'ebyobufuzi ow'e Busonga owa nnamaddala

translation.en: The friction between Kadaga and Kivejinja remained even after Kazibwe quit cabinet
translation.lug: Akakuubangano wakati wa Kadaga ne Kivejinja kaasigala wadde nga Kazibwe yava mu lukiiko lwa baminisita

translation.en: Bageya says the infighting led to the emergence of strong opposition politicians like Abdul Katuntu
translation.lug: Bageya agamba nti obukuubagano bwaleetawo bannabyabufuzi abavuganya nga Abdul Katuntu

translation.en: Bageya says Katuntu was introduced by Kadaga and supported by Kazibwe to defeat Kivejinja
translation.lug: Bageya agamba nti Katuntu yaletebwa Kadaga era n'alagirwa Kazibwe okuwangula Kivejinja

translation.en: How can three men claim that they were defeated because of one woman?
translation.lug: Abasajja basatu basobola batya okuganga nti omukazi omu yabalemesa?

translation.en: She argues Kiyingi was defeated because of refusing to support Prince William Gabula’s claim to the Kyabazinga’s throne
translation.lug: Agamba Kiyingi yawangulwa olw'okuba yagaana okuwagira omulangira William Gabula eyasaba entebe ya Kyabazinga

translation.en: "I would side with Kadaga if at all she fought him,” Musumba said.
translation.lug: Musumba yagamba nti "Ajja kuwagira Kadaga singa amulwanyisa"

translation.en: Kiyingi’s case is one of the several cases that are to be reviewed by a joint team the NRM formed to review and resolve electoral disputes, but the committee has not held a single meeting yet
translation.lug: Omusango gwa Kiyingi gwe gumu ku misango egigenda okutunulwamu akakiiko akaawamu akatondebwawo ekibiina kya NRM  okwekenneenya n'okuganjoola enkayana z'eby'okulonda, naye akakiiko kaali tekannatuuza lukiiko lwonna

translation.en: Even if the committee eventually visited Kamuli, can it indict Kadaga, a member of the party’s Central Executive Committee and  Deputy Speaker of parliament?
translation.lug: Wadde ng'akakiiko kaagenda e Kamuli, kaali kasobola okuemesa Kadaga memba w'akakiiko Akafuzi ak'ekibiina era  Omumyuka w'Omwogezi wa palamenti?

translation.en: In 2008 the two politicians also disagreed over how Kiyingi handled the petition Kadaga lodged before the parliament’s committee on rules, privileges and discipline, accusing Kibuku MP  Saleh Kamba of defamation
translation.lug: Mu mwaka gwa 2008, bannabya bufuzi era tebakkiriziganya ku ngeri Kiyingi gye yakwatamu omusango gwa Kadaga gwe yawaaba mu kakiiko ka palamenti ogukwata ku mateeka, enkizo n'empisa, nga bavunaana omubaka wa palamenti ow'e Kibuku Saleh Kamba okwonoona erinnya ly'abala

translation.en: During an NRM parliamentary caucus  meeting, Kamba had accused Kadaga of having facilitated Katuntu to defeat Kivejinja in the November 2007 byelections for Bugweri parliamentary seat
translation.lug: Mu lukungana lw'akabondo k'ababaka ba NRM, Kamba yanenya Kadaga olw'okuwagira katuntu n'awangula Kiveijinja mu kulonda okwaddibwamu mu Novemba 2007 okw'ekifo ky'omubaka wa palamenti e Bugwere

translation.en: Parliamentary sources say Kiyingi advised Kadaga to get a different person to present the petition rather herself
translation.lug: Ebiva mu palamenti bigamba nti Kiyingi awa Kadaga amagezii okufuna abantu ab'enjawulo okuwaaba mu kifo kye ye okuwaaba

translation.en: This was to save Kadaga from  appearing as a complainant, prosecutor and judge since she is Deputy Speaker of parliament
translation.lug: Kino kyali kya kutangira kadaga okuba omuwaabi, looya era omulamuzi okuva bwe yali  omumyuka w'Omwogezi wa palimenti

translation.en: Salaamu Musumba is preparing to stand again in Kamuli.
translation.lug: Salaamu Musumba ateekateeka okuddamu okwesimbawo mu Kamuli

translation.en: That is why the party is trying to resolve all those issues,” says Migereko
translation.lug: Eyo y'ensonga lwaki ekibiina kigezaako okugonjoola ebizibu ebyo," bw'atyo Migereko bw'agamba

translation.en: Moses Kisolo Wojega has given way for his rival Mutwalibi Zandya Mafabi to carry the party’s flag in next year’s elections
translation.lug: Moses Kisoro Wojega alekedde amuvuganya Mutwalibi Zandya Mafabi bbendera y'ekibiina mu kulonda okunabaawo mu mwaka ogujja

translation.en: The votes Zandya received from the two divisions exceeded the number of registered voters
translation.lug: Obululu Zandya bwe yafuna businga omuwendo gw'abalonzi abeewawandiisa

translation.en: According FDC officials the party investigated and found the allegations were correct.
translation.lug: Okusinziira ku bakungu b'ekibiina kya FDC okunoonyereza n'emisango egyazuulibwa bituufu

translation.en: Kisolo won the fresh elections  held on Oct 10 but Zandya refused to concede defeat.
translation.lug: Kisolo yawangula okulonda okwaddibwamu nga Okutobba 10 naye Zandya yagaana okukkiriza obuwanguzi obwo

translation.en: However Richard Kudeeba, the FDC district electoral commissioner, said Zandya had been duly informed
translation.lug: Naye Richard Kudeeba owa FDC akulira eby'okulonda mu Disitulikiti yagamba nti Zandya yali yagambibwa dda

translation.en: They convened a meeting and tasked Budadiri East MP Nandala Mafabi to mediate and persuade Kisolo to step down for Zandya
translation.lug: Baakola olukiiko ne bagamba omubaka w'e Budaadiri ey'e buvanjuba Nandala Mafabi okusendasenda Kisoro okulekera Zandya ekifo

translation.en: Kisolo was Nandala’s driver.
translation.lug: Kisolo yali dereeva wa Nandala.

translation.en: Kisolo says he yielded because people were complaining that the Bagisu from Budadiri were taking over all the positions in Mbale
translation.lug: Kisoro agamba nti yafunamu kubanga abantu baali beemulugunya nti Abagisu okuva e Budaadiri baali bawangula ab'oludda oluvuganya mu Mbale

translation.en: Some of the prominent politicians from Budadiri include Nathan Nandala Mafabi and Jack Wamai Wamanga, the incumbent Mbale Municipality MP
translation.lug: Budaadiri yalimu Nathan Nandala Mafabi ne Jack Wamai Wamanga, omubaka wa palamenti owa Mbale Munisipaali

translation.en: Kisolo says that his stay in the race would give credence the claims and polarise the party faithful
translation.lug: Kisolo agamba nti okusigala mu lw'okaano kyandiraze nti mutuufu era ne kisanyalaza obwesigwa bw'ekibiina

translation.en: Party supporters, he says, of Zandya’s camp were likely not to vote Wamai in the parliamentary elections
translation.lug: Agamba ab'ekibiina kya Zandya baali bayinza obutalonda Wamai mu kulonda kwa palamenti

translation.en: Wamai had lived abroad for over 30 years and was not well known in local politics
translation.lug: Wamai yali abeera bweru okumala emyaka 30 era yali tamanyiddwa mu by'obufuzi bwa wano

translation.en: Kisolo played a big role in marketing his candidature to win the municipality’s parliamentary seat in the byelections earlier this year
translation.lug: Kisolo yakola kyamaanyi okumanyisa ekifo kye okuwangula ebifo bya palamenti mu kulonda okwaddibwamu ku ntandikwa y'omwaka guno

translation.en: Kisolo has now turned his eyes on the seat for chairman of Industrial Division in the municipality.
translation.lug: Kisolo kati atunuulira kifo ky'obwa Ssentebbe w'eby'amakolero mu bendobendo lya munisupaali

translation.en: The meeting will determine whether a rerun should be held or the party upholds the disputed results that would make Nagudi the official flag bearer
translation.lug: Olukungana lugya kusalawo oba nga okulonda kuddibwamu oba ekibiina kisazaamu enkaayana ezatuusa Nagudi okuba nga y'akwata bendera y'ekibiina

translation.en: Mugarura confirmed that the party had investigated the alleged malpractices in the recently concluded primaries for Mbale Woman MP and discovered that in some places the votes exceeded the number of registered voters
translation.lug: Mugarura yakakasa nti ekibiina kinoonyereza kwebyo ebyali byogerwa ku kukuba akalulu ak'okusunsulamu akaali kakagwa ak'omubaka wa palamenti ow'abakyala e Mbale era kyazuulibwa nti mu bifo ebimu obululu bwassuka omuwendo gw'abalonzi abeewandiisa

translation.en: Last week, Kudeeba told The Independent  that the party had  decided to uphold the initial election results that made Nagudi the winner
translation.lug: Wiiki ewedde, Kudeeba yagamba ab'olupapula lwa Independent nti ekibiina kyali kisazeewo okugenda mu maaso n'ebyava mu  kulonda ebyasooka ebyawanguza Nagudi

translation.en: However, Mugarura insisted the party had not yet named the flag bearer for the Woman MP seat by October 19
