translation.lug: Naye Mugalura yalemerako nti ekibiina kyali tekinnalonda muntu mu kifo ky'omubaka wa palamenti nga Okutoba 19

translation.en: Francis Mwijukye, a committee member on the party’s Information and Publicity Department, said 80 voters were held at the FDC district chairman’s home on the day of the voting.
translation.lug: Francis Mwijukye atuula ku kakiiko k'ekibiina yagamba nti abalonzi 80 baakumirwa mu maka ga ssentebe wa disitulikiti w'ekibiina kya FDC ku lunaku olwo

translation.en: This is the question you hear among the Kamuli folk in most social talks.
translation.lug: Bino bye bigambo ebinyumizibwa mu batuuze b'e Kamuli

translation.en: Tayebwa said he would petition the party.
translation.lug: Tayebwa yangamba nti ajja kuwabira ekibiina

translation.en: Mwijukye says Tayebwa is a member of the party’s National Executive Committee and one of the founding members
translation.lug: Mwijukye agamba nti Tayebwa y'omu ku ba mmemba b'ekibiina abali ku kakiiko akakulu era y'omu ku bakitandikawo

translation.en: He said Tayebwa is a huge political asset to the FDC and the party would exhaust all avenues to ensure his grievances are addressed appropriately
translation.lug: Yagamba nti Tayebwa munnabyabufuzi owomugaso ennyo mu FDC eraekibiina kisobola okutema empenda eziyitwamu okukakasa nti okwemulugunya kwe kukolwako bulungi

translation.en: However Mugisha told The Independent that she had met with Besigye over the election irregularities in Nakawa Division where she is standing for FDC flag bearer for the parliamentary seat
translation.lug: Naye Mugisha yagamba ab'olupapula lwa The Independent nti yali asisinkanye Besigye ku bikwata ku mivuyo egiri mu kulonda mu ggombolola y'e Nakawa gye yeesimbiddewo ng'omukwasi wa bendera y'ekibiina kya FDC

translation.en: She is locked in a wrangle with Michael Kabaziguruka, another party stalwart in Nakawa
translation.lug: Ali mu katuubagano ne Michael Kabaziguruka, eyali omuwagizi lukulwe ow'ekibiia kirala mu Nakawa

translation.en: The party Secretary General Alice Alaso had said the election in Nakawa was being handled at the highest level
translation.lug: Ssabawandiisi w'ekibiina Alice Alaso yali agambye nti okulonda mu Nakawa kugenda bukwakku

translation.en: Mugisha says Besigye rarely involves himself in party wrangles over who is elected where or gets what, a style different from President Museveni’s system
translation.lug: Mugisha agamba nti Besigye tatera kwenyigira mu bukuubagano bw'abo abalondebwa oba kye bafuna, enkola eyawukana ku ya Pulezidenti Museveni

translation.en: Museveni would meet disgruntled supporters and try to persuade them to give up by promising them compensation in terms of jobs or business
translation.lug: Museveni yandisisikanye abatuuze abaali beemulugunya era n'agezaako okubawooyawooya ng'abasuubiza okubawa emirimu oba bizineensi

translation.en: In 2006 Dr Besigye received his first test when opposition members of parliament disagreed on who would become their leader of opposition between Sam Njuba and Prof. Ogenga Latigo
translation.lug: Mu mwaka gwa 2006 Dr. Besigye yafuna okusoomooza abaali ku ludda oluvuganya gavumenti mu palamenti bwe batakkaanya ku ani eyandibadde omukulembeze wabwe ow'oludda oluvuganya wakati wa Sam Njuba ne pulofeesa Ogenga Latigo

translation.en: Some senior party members took sides in the media but Besigye stayed out of the wrangle to allow the vote decide
translation.lug: Abakulembeze abamu mu kibiina bawa endowooza zaabwe mu mawulire naye Besigye teyawa ndowooza ye wabula yalinda akalulu kasalewo eggoye

translation.en: "She must be a very powerful woman,” Salaamu Musumba wonders
translation.lug: "Ateekwa okuba nga mukazi w'amaanyi nnyo," Salaamu Musumba yeewuunyo nnyo

translation.en: Abbey Semuwemba is a Ugandan living in the United Kingdom.
translation.lug: Abbey Semuwemba munnayuganda abeera mu Bungereza

translation.en: If anybody wants to enter parliament, they better run to State House for President Museveni’s blessings or anointment.
translation.lug: Omuntu yenna bwaba ayagala okuyingira palamenti, addukire mu state house afune emikisa gya pulezidenti Museveni oba amufukeko amafuta

translation.en: An important feature of the recently concluded NRM election primaries was the violence and fraud that characterised the process across almost the entire country
translation.lug: Okulonda kw'ekibiina kya NRM kubaddemu obukambwe n'obulimba obufuuse obw'olulango kumpi mu nsi yonna

translation.en: This produced a large number of aggrieved NRM politicians who have declared they want to run as independents
translation.lug: Kino kyavaamu bannabyabufuzi ba NRM  bangi okunyiikaala era ne bagamba nti baagala kwesimbawo ku bwannamunigina

translation.en: President Yoweri Museveni had previously sought to treat them as rebels and threatened to expel them from the NRM
translation.lug: Pulesidenti Musevini yali asazeewo okubatwala nga bakyewaggula era n'atiisatiisa okubagoba mu kibiina kya NRM.

translation.en: However, after meeting the party’s parliamentary caucus, many of whose members lost in the primaries, Museveni altered his stance and allowed them to run as independents
translation.lug: Naye oluvannyuma lw'okusisinkana bamemba b'ekibiina ab'akabondo ka palamenti, yakyusa endowooza ye n'asalawo abaleke beesimbewo bwannamunigina nga tebalina kibiina mwebajjidde.

translation.en: Given the multitude of losers in the NRM primary, this was a smart move by the party president
translation.lug: Olw'okuba baali bangi nnyo abaali batayiseemu ku kusunsulibwa kw'ekibiina kya NRM, pulezidenti kye yakola kyali kya magezi nnyo.

translation.en: Museveni may have been afraid that if he refused them to run as independents, many would have toed with the idea of joining the opposition
translation.lug: Museveni ayinza okuba nga yatya nti singa abagaana okwesimbawo ku lwabwe, bayinza okusala eddiiro ne badda ku ludda oluvuganya gavumenti.

translation.en: Consequently, we are likely to have an independent candidate in almost every constituency in Uganda
translation.lug: N'olwekyo, kirabika tujja kuba n'abo abeesimbyewo ku lwabwe kumpi mu buli disitulikiti.

translation.en: It is also possible that most independents will be from the NRM
translation.lug: Era kisoboka okuba nti abannesimbawo ku lwabwe abasinga obungi bajja kuba ba mu kibiina kya NRM.

translation.en: This means that NRM will most probably have two candidates in every constituency
translation.lug: Kino kiba kitegeeza nti NRM eyinza okuba n'abeesimbyewo mu konsituwensi abawera ababiri.

translation.en: Given that the opposition seems unable to field candidates in all constituencies, the real race in most of Uganda will be NRM running against NRM
translation.lug: Olw'okuba oludda oluvuganya gavumenti terusobola kusimbawo babaka mu konsituwensi zonna, kirabika aba NRM bajja kuba bavuganya na ba NRM bannaabwe.

translation.en: This means that even if NRM had not opened up to multiparty politics, its internal power struggles would have created an inevitable multiparty situation
translation.lug: Kino kiba kitegeeza nti NRM ne bwetandikkiriza byabufuzi eby'ebibiina ebingi, obukuubagano obuli munda mu kyo mwenyini  bwenditaddewo embeera eringa ey'ebibiina ebingi.

translation.en: The inability of the opposition parties to attract disgruntled NRM politicians is not because of lack of ideological support
translation.lug: Eky'ab'oludda oluvuganya gavumenti okulemererwa okusikiriza aba NRM abatali bamativu tekyesigamye ku kuba nti tebalina birowoozo birungi.

translation.en: We know that most NRM politicians share the sentiments of opposition parties regarding endemic corruption, incompetence and mismanagement of this nation
translation.lug: Tukimanyi bulungi nti abasinga obungi ku abo abali mu NRM nabo balina endowoozo ng'eya abo abali ku ludda oluvuganya gavumenti ku bikwata ku buli bw'enguzi, ku butaba na bumanyirivu ne ku ngeri etali nnungi eggwanga lino gye likulembeddwamu.

translation.en: Therefore, the challenge for us intellectually is how to explain NRM’s ability to retain a large number of followers among the leadership of this country even in the face of widespread discontent among them
translation.lug: Naye ekitulemye okutegeera ye ngeri NRM gy'erina abawagizi abangi

translation.en: Museveni has ensured that NRM is able to exhibit and project some form of democratic character
translation.lug: Museveni akoze kyonna ekisoboka okukakasa nti wabaawo enkola eyeefanaanyiriza enfuga ya demokulasiya.

translation.en: By allowing regular internal elections, he has created opportunities for many people seeking to climb the ladders of power inside NRM to do so
translation.lug: olw'okuba akkirizza okulonda okubaawo mu kibiina entakera, bangi abawadde akakisa okulinya amadaala g'obukulembeze mu kibiina kya NRM.

translation.en: More critically, Museveni understands that an election is a time to test a politician’s popular standing
translation.lug: Museveni akimanyi bulungi nnyo nti okulonda kiba kiseera kya kugezesa obuganzi munnabyabufuzi bw'aba alina mu bantu.

translation.en: But he also needs NRM to have a big win in every election in order to sustain the myth of his personal and his political party’s invincibility
translation.lug: Naye era ayagala NRM ewangulire waggulu esobole okuba ng'esukuluma ku bibiina ebirala.

translation.en: This is important to discourage potential defectors in NRM from joining other opposition parties
translation.lug: Kino kikulu nnyo okulemesa abali mu kibiina okukivaamu ne bayingira mu bibiina ebiri ku ludda oluvuganya gavumenti.

translation.en: For example, NRM has demonstrated that in western Uganda, it cannot be beaten
translation.lug: Ng'ekyokulabirako, NRM ekiraze nti teyinza kuwangulibwa mu Buggwanjuba bwa Uganda.

translation.en: Therefore, even the most ardent critics of the NRM in Western Uganda do not join any opposition party
translation.lug: N'olwekyo, oli ne bw'abanga ng'avumirira nnyo NRM eyo ku ludda olw'Ebuggwanjuba, tayinza kudda ku ludda oluvuganya gavumenti.

translation.en: Take the example of Alex Ruhunda who was recently elected as NRM flag bearer for Fort Portal Municipality
translation.lug: Ng'ekyokulabirako, lowooza ku Alex Ruhunda eyalondebwa gyebuvuddeko awo okukwatira NRM bendera mu Fort Portal.

translation.en: I argued that NRM should be credited for promoting liberal economic reforms that have sustained robust growth for two decades
translation.lug: Nnagamba nti NRM esaanidde okusiimibwa olw'okutumbula n'okuleetawo enkyukakyuka mu by'enfuna mu myaka kkumi egiyise.

translation.en: Ruhunda was angry with me for saying something positive about NRM
translation.lug: Ruhunda yannyigira nnyo olw'okubaako ekintu ekirungi kye njogera ku NRM.

translation.en: He accused me of having been probably compromised by Museveni
translation.lug: Yagamba nti Museveni yangulirira.

translation.en: Ruhunda’s decision had little to do with his personal character, morality and integrity as most Ugandans would argue
translation.lug: Abantu bangi bayinza okugamba nti ekyo Ruhunda kye yakola tekirina we kikwataganira n'engeri ye ng'omuntu, n'empisa ze era n'obwesigwa bwe.

translation.en: However, if he were to have any chance of going to parliament, he could only do so as an NRM candidate and possibly hope to join some progressive faction inside the party to promote reform
translation.lug: Naye bw'aba ow'okugenda mu palamenti, ateekeddwa okubeera mu kibiina kya NRM era awo ab'ajja kubeera mu kabondo akakola obulungi munda mu kibiina okusobola okuleetawo enkyukakyuka.

translation.en: The myth of invincibility that Museveni and NRM have cultivated over the years is the major reason disgruntled NRM politicians find it more profitable to run as independents
translation.lug: Endowooza y'obutawangulwa Museven n'ekibiina kya NRM ebadde egobererwa okumala emyaka mingi, y'eviiriddeko bannabyabufuzi bangi okwesimbawo ku lwabwe

translation.en: It is also the reason why people who are very critical of NRM join it nonetheless
translation.lug: Era eyo ye nsonga lwaki abo aboogerera ennyo NRM basalawo ne bayingira ekibiina ekyo.

translation.en: Museveni has been keen to reward everyone when they accept his leadership even when he knows that at heart they disagree with his politics
translation.lug: Museveni awa empeera oyo yenna akkiriza obukulembeze bwe wadde ng'akimanyidde ddala nti tebakkiriziganya na byabufuzi bwe.

translation.en: Museveni recognises that cooptation of elites is cheaper than fighting
translation.lug: Museveni akimanyi nti okulondamu abagezi kyangu okusinga okubalwanyisa.

translation.en: He has employed repression of course, but only selectively on those who have sought to challenge him – like Kizza Besigye
translation.lug: Oluusi kino akikozesa okusobola okunyigiriza abo ababa basazeewo okumusoomooza nga bwe kiri ku Besigye

translation.en: By demonstrating the rewards of loyalty and increasing the costs of opposition on the individuals who try, the president has scared many potential NRM defectors and opponents from attempting resistance to his rule
translation.lug: Ng'ayitira mu kuwa empeera abo abeesigwa gyali, era n'akaluubiriza nnyo abo abali ku ludda oluvuganya gavumenti, pulezidenti atiisizza nnyo abo abandyagadde okuva mu NRM era n'abo abandyagadde okulwanyisa obufuzi bwe.

translation.en: Museveni’s willingness to embrace potentially hostile politicians has led to what economists call “preference falsification” – people pretending to support NRM even when they actually don’t
translation.lug: Eky'okuba nti Museveni mwetegefu okwaniriza bannabyabufuzi ababadde bamuwakanya, kituukaganye n'abamu kye bayita "okusalawo okw'obulimba."  Abantu beefuula okuba abawagira NRM wadde nga ekituufu kiri nti tebagiwagira.

translation.en: Politicians in Uganda therefore face a choice of staying loyal to Museveni and hence continue to enjoy power and the privileges that go with it; or to openly challenge him and invite the wrath of the state like Besigye
translation.lug: Bannabyabufuzi mu Uganda boolekaganye n'okusalawo okweyongera okuba abawulize eri Museveni ne beeyongera okuba n'obuyinza era n'enkizo oba okumuwakanya ne bafuna ebizibu nga Besigye.

translation.en: Why NRM losers don’t join FDCthe Last WordMore critically, Museveni understands that an election is a time to test a politician’s popular standing
translation.lug: Ebigambo ebisembayo bikulu nnyo era biraga ensonga lwaki abo ababa tebayiseemu tabayinza kwesoga mu FDC, Museveni akimanyi nti ekiseera eky'okulonda kigezesa obuganzi munnabyabufuzi bw'aba alina mu bantu.

translation.en: 20 President Yoweri Museveni met about 3,000 supporters of his party, the National Resistance Movement (NRM), from Mawokota North constituency in Mpigi district
translation.lug: Pulesidenti Museveni yasisinkana abawagizi b'ekibiina kye abawera nga enkumi satu abaava e Mawokota North constituency, mu disitulikiti y'e Mpigi.

translation.en: The meeting was organised by the newly elected queen of the area, Amelia Kyambadde, who is the immediate past principal private secretary to the President
translation.lug: Omumbejja w'ekitundu ekyo Amelia Kyambadde ate nga yaliko omuwandiisi ow'ekyama owa pulezidenti, ye yategeka olukuŋŋaana olwo

translation.en: The meeting was intended to get the area MP, Peter Claver Mutuluuza, not to contest against Amelia in next year’s general elections
translation.lug: Ekigendererwa ky'olukuŋŋaana olwo kwali okumatiza omubaka wa palamenti ow'ekitundu ekyo Claver Mutuluuza obuteesimba ku Amelia Kyambadde mu kulonda okuddako.

translation.en: The calm and softspoken Mutuluuza is no stranger to battles with big shots in his party and, he says, defeating Kyambadde in the 2011 parliamentary elections will be easy  even if she has Museveni’s backing
translation.lug: Kyambadde ajja kuba mwangu mu kulonda kw'ababaka ba palaminti mu 2011 ne bw'anaaba ng'awagiddwa Museveni.

translation.en: According to a statement from State House, Mutuluuza told the President that he deliberately chose to contest as an independent candidate “because of the democracy and right guaranteed under the constitution”
translation.lug: Okusinziira ku bigambo ebyava mu State House, Mutuluuza yagamba pulezidenti nti yakigenderera okwesimbawo ku lulwe "olwa demokulasiya n'ebbettu erimuweebwa mu ssemateeka."

translation.en: I will have a picture of Mutuluuza and that of the President because I am his supporter
translation.lug: Njakuba n'ekifaananyi kya Mutuluuza era n'ekya pulezidenti kubanga ndi muwagizi we.

translation.en: I have no problem with Museveni
translation.lug: Museveni simulinako kizibu kyonna.

translation.en: I want to thank Amelia for the development she has done in Mawokota North
translation.lug: Njagala kwebaza Amelia olw'enkulaakulana gy'aleese e Mawokota North

translation.en: If I had also been given money I would have done the same,” he said in a veiled swipe at State House sponsorship of Museveni’s blueeyed girl, Amelia
translation.lug: Singa nnaweebwa ssente nnange nnandikoze ekintu kye kimu

translation.en: “Abantu abamu mu muvumenti basiwuka,” he said in Luganda, meaning: “some people lack manners”
translation.lug: Yagamba nti "abantu abamu mu Muvumenti baasiiwuka empisa."

translation.en: “They are Movement only in words but not in their actions,” Museveni said in a veiled reference to Mutuluuza
translation.lug: Ba Muvumenti mu bigambo mwokka naye si mu bikolwa," bw'atyo Museveni bwe yayogera ng'ajuliriza ku bigambo bya Mutuluuza.

translation.en: Museveni reportedly dangled a ministerial appointment for him if he dropped his 2011 bid
translation.lug: Museveni yamusuubiza okumuwa obwa minisita singa teyeesimbawo mu 2011.

translation.en: That was unusual and appears to have shocked Museveni
translation.lug: Ekyo tekyali kya bulijjo era kirabika kyakanga nnyo Museveni.

translation.en: The Amelia, Mutuluuza rift is not the only fallout from the recently concluded countrywide NRM primaries and NRM party leadership elections
translation.lug: Enjawukana ebaddewo wakati wa Mutuluuza ne Amelia si ye yokka ebaddewo mu kibiina kya NRM mu kulonda okw'okusunsulibwamu okubadde kwakabaawo mu ggwanga lyonna.

translation.en: Up to 600 election petitions have been filed with the NRM Electoral Commission and losers have been spewing threats to catch President Museveni’s eye
translation.lug: Emisango egisukka mu lukaaga egyekuusa ku bubbi bw'obululu gyawaabirwa eri akakiiko ka NRM ak'eby'okulonda era abo abaagwa batiitiisa okunaabira pulezidenti Museven mu maaso

translation.en: Museveni knows that very few of them would reject a ministerial job or any other in the government
translation.lug: Museven akimanyi nti batono nnyo ku abo abandigaanye okulondebwa okuba baminisita oba okuweebwa omulimu omulala gwonna mu gavumenti.

translation.en: Take Agaba Abbas, the former leader of the NRM youth league, who was beaten to the party’s flagbearer status in Kitagwenda constituency, Kamwenge district
translation.lug: Take Agaba Abbas eyaliko omukulembeze w'abavubuka mu NRM eyawangulibwa mu kalulu k'abo abanaakwatira ekibiina bbendera mu Kitagwenda, mu disitulikiti y'e Kamwenge

translation.en: He petitioned against the results claiming the incumbent MP and NRM flagbearer, Nulu Byamukama, used massive intimidation and violence in which some of his supporters were even cut with machetes
translation.lug: Yawaaba omusango ogwekuusa ku by'okulonda ng'agamba nti omubaka wa NRM aliko era nga y'akwatidde NRM bbendera, Nulu Byamukama yatiisatiisa nnyo abalonzi era yakozesa ebikolwa eby'obukambwe bingi ekyaviirako abamu ku bawagizi be okufumitibwa ebiso.

translation.en: He says, however, that he will not stand as an independent because he is sure Museveni will give him a job
translation.lug: Kyokka yagamba nti tajja kwesimbawo ku lulwe kubanga mukakafu nti Museveni ajja kumuwa omulimu

translation.en: He says Museveni persuaded him to drop out of the race for NRM vice chairperson for Western Uganda.
translation.lug: Yagamba nti Museveni yamukubiriza okuva mu lwokaano alekere omummyuka wa ssentebe wa NRM mu Buggwanjuba bwa Uganda.

translation.en: Matayo Kyaligonza on assurances that he was to be “deployed elsewhere within the state”
translation.lug: Matayo Kyaligonza yali mukakafu nti ajja kuweebwa omulimu mu kifo kyonna mu ggwanga.

translation.en: Museveni, whose urgent concern is to hold his supporters together after the acrimonious primaries and hardly five months to the general election, looks increasingly determined to use his prerogative to promise NRM losers to public office jobs
translation.lug: Museveni ng'ekisinga okumubobbya omutwe mu kiseera kino kwe kugatta awamu abawagizi be oluvannyuma lw'okulonda kuno okw'okusunsulamu okutaagenda bulungi ate ng'ebulayo emyezi egitasukka mu ettaano okulonda kwa bonna kubeewo, alabika nga mumalirivu nnyo okukozesa enkola ye ey'okusuubiza abo abaagwa emirimu emirala mu kibiina kya NRM.

translation.en: NRM cadres that have already been identified should not have to think that the electoral offices are the only offices of service.
translation.lug: Aba NRM abamaze okunokolwayo tebalina kulowooza nti emirimu egy'okulondebwa abalonzi gye gyokka egiriwo.

translation.en: ”Promises for jobs have raised concern during Museveni's campaign.
translation.lug: "Okusuubiza abantu emirimu kireeseewo obunkenke mu kampeyini za Museveni.

translation.en: Dr Yasin Olum of Makerere University Political Science department says Uganda’s politics has become transactional, is no longer a service and Museveni will use it to maximum advantage
translation.lug: Dr. Yasin Olum ow'omu Yunivasite y'e Makerere mu kitongole ekisomesa eby'obufuzi agamba nti eby'obufuzi bwa Uganda bifuuse bya busuubuzi, kuno tekukyali kuweereza bantu era kino Museveni ajja kukikozesa nnyo kiganyula ye.

translation.en: President Museveni will definitely achieve his immediate objective, which is keeping himself in power
translation.lug: Pulezidenti Museveni ajja kutuukiriza ekyo ky'ayagala, nga kino kwe kwenywereza mu buyinza.

translation.en: ”Olum, who is an expert on the democratisation process in Uganda, says the negative effects of the commercialisation of our politics will be borne by future generations
translation.lug: Olumu ate nga ye mukugu ku nsonga ezikwata ku demokulasiya mu Uganda, naye akabi akali mu kufuula eby'obufuzi okuba busineesi abanaabaawo mu biseera eby'omu maaso be bajja okwolekagana nabyo.

translation.en: The Uganda constitution limits the number of ministers and their deputies to 42 but, in a bid to appease numerous political interests, Museveni has appointed 69 ministers and their deputies, hundreds of RDCs, Presidential Advisors, and other state agents
translation.lug: Ssemateeka wa Uganda akirambika nti baminisita mu Uganda awamu n'abammyuka baabwe balina kubeera 42, naye olw'okuba Museveni ayagala okubaako b'asanyusa mu by'obufuzi, alonze 69 awamu n'abammyuka baabwe, ne ba RDC bangi ddala, abawabuzi ba pulezidenti awamu n'abalala bangi.

translation.en: For now, because it could jolt the gravy train ahead of the impending elections, Museveni cannot announce many new appointments but the job promises spewing out of State House suggest the legions of statesponsored leaches will increase in 2011
translation.lug: Museveni kino tayinza kukirangirira mu kiseera kino kubanga kiyinza okutabangula embeera naye eby'okusuubiza emirimu ebiva mu State House biraga nti omuwendo gwa baminisita gujja kulinnya nnyo mu 2011.

translation.en: Critics say this places a huge burden on the national purse but Museveni maintains that it is the price of peace and proponents of the jobsforpeace in the NRM are equally adamant
translation.lug: Abeekenenya  bagamba nti kino kijja kuba muggugu gwa maanyi eri eby'enfuna by'eggwanga, naye ye Museveni agamba nti kino kyetaagisa okusobola okubaawo emirembe era ng'eno ye nkola ya NRM.

translation.en: NRM Vice Chairman for Eastern Region, Mike Mukula says the strategy will work
translation.lug: Omummyuka wa ssentebe w'ekibiina kya NRM mu buvanjuba bwa Uganda Mike Mukula agamba nti enkola eno ejja kukola bulungi.

translation.en: A party supporter who spoke out on condition of remaining anonymous says he was rigged out in the NRM elections in 2005 for MP in Mayuge district
translation.lug: Omuwagizi wa NRM atayagadde kwatuukirizibwa mannya agamba nti yabbibwa akalulu mu 2005 nga yeesimbyewo okulondebwa ng'omubaka wa palamenti mu disitulikiti y'e Mayuge.

translation.en: He says Museveni and Hajji Moses Kigongo, at a meeting at the party headquarters on  Kyaddondo Road in Kampala, convinced him and others not to stand as independents on the understanding that they would work on the regional Museveni Task Force and later get jobs.
translation.lug: Agamba nti bwe baali ku lukuŋŋaana ku kitebbe ekikulu eky'ekibiina e Kyaddondo Road mu Kampala, Museveni ne Hajji Moses Kigongo baamumatiza nti ye n'abalala obuteesimbawo ku lwabwe kubanga baali bagenda kubeera mu abo abanaakulemberamu okunoonya akalulu n'oluvannyuma balifuna emirimu.

translation.en: He says they held several meetings chaired by Sembabule District Chairperson Herman Sentongo as they toed with the idea of going independent
translation.lug: Agamba nti baabanga n'enkuŋŋaana nnyingi nga zikubirizibwa ssentebe wa disitulikiti y'e Sembabule Herman Sentongo era mu kiseera ekyo baali bamalirivu okwesimbawo ku bwabwe.

translation.en: Rujumbura County MP and Chairman of NRM Veterans, Jim Muhwezi, says Museveni will deploy some of the losers within the party or the state and “facilitate others to carry out private business”
translation.lug: Omubaka wa palamenti ow'e Rujumbura era nga y'akola nga ssentebe w'abaazirwanako mu NRM, Jim Muhwezi, agamba nti Museveni ajja kuwa emirimu abamu ku abo abaawangulwa, mu kibiina mwenyini oba mu gavumenti, ate abalala abayambe okwekolera busineesi.

translation.en: ”Others, like Mutuluuza, are unlikely to pay attention to Muhwezi’s counsel
translation.lug: Abalala gamba nga Mutuluuza tebayinza kuwuliriza ebyo Muhwezi by'agamba.

translation.en: Until his party, the NRM, endorsed Amelia, Mutuluuza’s seat was secure
translation.lug: Mutuluuza yali akkalidde mu kifo kye okutuusa ekibiina kye ekya NRM lwe kyaleeta Amelia.

translation.en: The resident of Kammengo Township along KampalaMasaka highway remains very popular among his ethnic Banyarwanda who are a sizeable voting block in the constituency and has courted the other big voting blocks in his constituency, the Catholics and the Baganda establishment at Mengo
translation.lug: Omutuuze w'e Kammengo ekiri ku luguudo lw'e Masaka alina obuganzi bungi eri Banyarwanda banne abasinga obungi mu kitundu ekyo era ataddewo enkolagana n'abalonzi abalala era nga nabo bangi nnyo mu kitundu ekyo era bano be Bakatoliki n'abaganda abalina enkolagana ey'oku lusegere ne Mengo.

translation.en: When in 2008-2009 Museveni’s government fought with the Mengo establishment over the acrimonious Land Amendment Bill 2007, Mutuluuza voted with Buganda and ganged up with Buganda legislators to force an emergency recall of parliament from recess to discuss the arrest of three Buganda Kingdom officials who had spoken out against the proposed land amendments
translation.lug: Mu 2008-2009 gavumenti ya Museveni bwe yalwanagana ne gavumenti y'e Mengo ku bikwata ku tteeka ly'ettaka erya 2007, Mutuluuza yali ku ludda lwa Buganda era ye ne bannabyabufuzi okuva mu Buganda bayita palamenti eyali egenze mu luwummula basobole okwogera ku ky'okukwata abakungu abasatu ab'omu Bwakabaka bwa Buganda abaali bavumiridde eky'okukola enoongosereza mu tteeka ly'ettaka.

translation.en: Kyambadde tried to court ethnic Baganda by promising to engineer the return to air of the closed Buganda Kingdom radio station, CBS
translation.lug: Kyambadde yagezaako okusikiriza Abaganda ng'abasuubiza okuzaako laddiyo y'obwakabaka CBS eyali eggaliddwawo.

translation.en: She used to move with some of the former workers of CBS, assuring supporters that she is working hard to switch the radio back on air and she is taking care of the interests of the former workers
translation.lug: Yatambulanga n'abamu ku abo abaali abakozi ba CBS ng'akakasa abawagizi be nti akola butaweera okuzzaako laddiyo era afaayo nnyo ku abo abaali abakozi ba laddiyo eyo.

translation.en: Despite that, President Museveni appears to have anointed Amelia
translation.lug: Wadde nga kyali bwe kityo, kirabika ye Museveni yali yamala dda okulonda Amelia.

translation.en: Sensing this, Mutuluuza opted to step outside the NRM, not participate in its primaries but run as an independent in 2011
translation.lug: Mutuluuza bwe yategeera ekyo, yasalawo okudda ebbali wa NRM, era teyeenyigira mu kammyufu k'ekibiina naye yeesimbawo ku lulwe mu 2011.

translation.en: Museveni and Amelia know Mutuluuza could defeat them
translation.lug: Museveni ne Amelia bakimanyi nti Mutuluuza asobola okubawangula.

translation.en: The Mawokota North MP is no stranger to battles with party big shots
translation.lug: Omubaka wa palamenti ow'e Mawokota atera okuba mu ntalo n'abanene abali mu kibiina.

translation.en: He wrestled the constituency from an NRM strongman, the late former minister Zimula Mugwanya
translation.lug: Yalwanagana n'omunene omu mu kitundu ekyo, eyali minisita omugenzi Zimula Mugwanya.

translation.en: In the heat of the acrimonious 2001 campaigns in which Mutuluuza accused Mugwanya of violently attacking his supporters, Mutuluuza is thought to have sponsored a court case in which Mugwanya was eventually thrown out of parliament for lack of academic qualifications
translation.lug: Mu kampeyini eyali enzibu ennyo eya 2001 Mutuluuza alyoke avunaane Mugwanya olw'okulumba abawagizi be mu ngeri ey'obukambwe, kigambibwa nti Mutuluuza yawangula omusango era Mugwanya n'aggyibwa mu palamenti olw'obutaba na buyigirize bumala.

translation.en: Mugwanya was one of the financiers of the NRM bush war and his entourage on the campaign trail always had military escorts
translation.lug: Mugwanya yali omu ku abo abaawagira ennyo NRM mu by'ensimbi mu lutalo lw'omu nsiko era mu kampyeni ze kwabangako ab'amaggye.

translation.en: Museveni’s hands tiedAs he weighs his next move, Museveni has been meeting with delegations from different areas where primary elections were chaotic and threatened his support
translation.lug: Emikono gya Museveni gisibiddwa emmabega era alowooza ku kiddako. Museveni abadde asisinkana abantu okuva mu bitundu eby'enjawulo okulonda gye kutagenda bulungi ne kiviirako abawagizi be okutya.

translation.en: Museveni appears to merely seek opportunities to cajole, caution, and threaten
translation.lug: Kirabika nga Museveni ayagala okufuna akakisa okubalimba, okubakomako, n'okubatiisatiisa.

translation.en: One such delegation came from Nakaseke district
translation.lug: Abamu ku bantu abo baava Nakaseke.

translation.en: In Nakaseke, an NRM stronghold, antiriot police are still on patrol, and Finance Minister Syda Bbumba’s home is one of the highly guarded spots
translation.lug: Mu Nakaseke ate nga kye kimu ku bitundu NRM gy'erina obuwagizi obw'amaanyi, poliisi ekkakanya obujagalalo ekyalawuna, era n'amaka ga minisita w'eby'ensimbi Syda Bbumba ge gamu ku ago agasinze okukuumibwa.

translation.en: The district was gripped in tension when one Nsamba Bukenya was declared winner of the NRM flagbearer contest for the district chair
translation.lug: Disitulikiti yalimu obunkenke bungi Nsamba Bukenya bwe yalangirirwa nga bwe yali omuwanguzi anaakwatira NRM bbendeera mu kifo kya ssentebe wa disitulikiti.

translation.en: Incumbent chairperson, Ignatius Koomu, is believed to have won the election but the results were allegedly interchanged with those of Bukenya
translation.lug: Kigambibwa nti ssentebe aliko Koomu ye yawangula naye mbu ebyava mu kulonda byawanyisibwamu ne balangirira Bukenya

translation.en: NRM delegates boo the party General Secretary Amama Mbabazi during the National Conference at Namboole on June 26
translation.lug: Abakiise mu ttabamiruka wa NRM eyali e Namboole mu Jjuuni nga 26 baalonda ssabawandiisi w'ekibiina kya NRM Amama Mbabazi.

translation.en: Both Vice President Prof. Gilbert Bukenya and Trade Minister Maj. Gen. Kahinda Otafiire, who lost the secretary general post to Security Minister Mbabazi, have shown limited interest in party activities since the acrimonious showdown at Namboole
translation.lug: Bombi omummyuka wa pulezidenti Pro. Gilbert Bukenya ne minisita w'eby'obusuubuzi Maj. Gen. Kahinda Otafiire, abaawangulwa mu kifo kya ssabawandiisi, beesuliddeyo ogwannagamba mu ebyo ebikolebwa mu kibiina okuva okulonda lwe kwagwa e Namboole.

translation.en: Opponents accuse her of orchestrating a voterigging scheme that turned the results of the primary elections upside down
translation.lug: Abalabe be bamuvunaana nti yenyigira mu kubba obululu era kino ne kiviirako ebyali mu kulonda okwo obutaba bituufu.

translation.en: The moment Bukenya was declared winner, spontaneous demonstrations broke out in the district
translation.lug: Kasita Bukenya yalangirirwa ku buwanguzi, waaliwo okwekalakasa mu disitulikiti.

translation.en: Some 1,500 party cards were returned to the party offices in Semuto subcounty by angry supporters who felt their candidate had been robbed of victory
translation.lug: Kaada z'ekibiina eziwera nga 1500 zaakomezebwawo ku ofiisi y'ekibiina e Semuto ng'abawagizi bagamba nti oyo gwe babadde bawagira yabbibwa.

translation.en: The demonstrators took to digging up the new tarmac road that is being built from Matugga to Butalangwa, the seat of the district administration
translation.lug: Abeekalakaasi baagenda ne batandika okusimmula ekkubo lya kolaasi eppya erizimbibwa okuva e Matugga okudda e Butalangwa awali ekitebe kya disitulikiti.

translation.en: With the situation out of hand, Museveni invited a team from Nakaseke to explain to him what had happened
translation.lug: Olw'okuba embeera yali eyonoonese nnyo, Museveni alina be yayita okuva e Nakaseke bamubuulire ekyaliwo.

translation.en: A source that attended the meeting says that Bbumba tilted the composition of the team to include many of her supporters who would misinform the president about the situation on the ground in Nakaseke
translation.lug: Abamu ku abo abaali mu lukuŋŋaana olwo bagamba nti Bumba yakyusa abo abaalina okugenda eri pulezidenti n'assaamu abawagizi be abandigambye Museveni ebitali bituufu ku mbeera eyali e Nakaseke.

translation.en: “I felt uncomfortable throughout the meeting with the president because what was being fed to him was false but I was afraid to say the truth until Mubeezi, a resident of Ngoma subcounty, spoke out and informed the president that whatever he was being told was wrong,” the source told The Independent
translation.lug: Mu lukungaana olwo lwonna nnawulira nga siteredde olw'eby'obulimba ebyali bigambibwa pulezidenti naye nnali ntya okwogera amazima okutuusa Mubeezi, omu ku batuuze b'e ggombolola y'e Ngoma lwe yayogera n'agamba pulezidenti nti buli kye baali bamugamba si ge gaali amazima," waliwo ensonda ezaagamba The Independenti.

translation.en: After Mubeezi spoke out, the source added, he got support from a few members of the delegation and the president was put in a dilemma
translation.lug: Ensonda zigamba nti, Mubeezi bwe yamala okwogera, yafuna abamuwagira okuva mu abo abaali bagenze okusisinkana pulezidenti era kino kyasobera nnyo pulezidenti.

translation.en: “He (Museveni) promised to send a factfinding team to establish the truth of what was going on in Nakaseke,” continued the source
translation.lug: Era ensonga zigattako nti, Museven alina be yasindika e Nakaseke okusobola okuzuula amazima gennyini ku ebyo ebyaliwo.

translation.en: The factfinding team established that most people in Nakaseke favour Koomu and on the basis of this information, radio announcements were made to the effect that Koomu is the NRM flagbearer for Nakaseke district
translation.lug: Abo be baatuma baakizuula nti abantu b'e Nakaseke baali baagala Koomu era nti okusinziira ku kino, ku ladiyo baalangirira nti Koomu gwe balonze okukwatira NRM bbendera mu disitulikiti y'e Nakaseke.

translation.en: Bbumba sailed through the primaries for the Nakaseke North constituency unopposed
translation.lug: Bbumba ye yayitamu nga tavuganyiziddwa.

translation.en: One is a diplomat in Germany while another holds a big National Social Security Fund post in Northern Uganda
translation.lug: Omu aweereza ng'omubaka mu Germany ate omulala alina ekifo kya maanyi mu kitavu ky'abakozi mu Mambuka ga Uganda.

translation.en: 18, three disenchanted party members – Muhammad Nsereko, Steven Masinde and Rose Namayanja – went with their supporters and appealed to Museveni about what they say was rigging at the party’s Delegates Conference at Namboole
translation.lug: Bamemba basatu ab'ekibiina abataali basanyufu, kwe kugamba, Muhammad Nsereko, Steven Masinde ne Rose Namayanja, baagenda n'abawagizi baabwe eri Muzeveni ne boogera ku by'okubba obululu okwali mu lukungaana lw'abakiise e Namboole.

translation.en: Nsereko, who lost to former Kampala MP Francis Babu in the race for the newly formed Kampala Regional NRM vice chairperson post, told the President that his agents were forced to sign unfilled declaration forms
translation.lug: Nsereko eyawangulwa eyali omubaka wa palamenti ow'omu Kampala Francis Babu, yagamba pulezidenti nti ba agenti be baawalirizibwa okussa emikono ku foomu enkalu.

translation.en: The results that were entered in the forms and eventually declared at Namboole, Nsereko reportedly informed Museveni, were false
translation.lug: Kigambibwa nti Nsereko yagamba Museveni nti ebyo ebyali ku foomu era oluvannyuma ebyalangirirwa e Namboole, tebyali bituufu.

translation.en: Namayanja lost the deputy secretary general post to incumbent Dorothy Hyuha while Masinde lost to Katongole Singh in the race for deputy treasurer
translation.lug: Namayanja yawangulwa Dorothy Hyuha mu kifo ky'omummyuka wa ssabawandiisi, ate Masinde n'awangulwa Katongole Singh mu kifo ky'omuwanika.

translation.en: The three petitioners and their supporters, our source revealed, told Museveni that the ushers, who were pro Secretary General Amama Mbabazi who retained his post, are the ones who voted instead of the real delegates
translation.lug: Bano abaawangulwa awamu n'abawagizi baabwe, ensonda zitugamba, baagamba Museveni nti abawagizi ba Ssabawandiisi w'ekibiina Amama Mbabazi eyasigaza ekifo kye, be booka abaakuba akalulu mu kifo ky'abakiise bonna.

translation.en: “We went hoping to give testimonies to the president,” one of the candidates’ agents who was at the meeting told The Independent, adding, “he, however, came and served a big dinner after which he told us the Hajji Moses Kigongo commission will handle the complaints
translation.lug: Twagendayo nga tulowooza nti pulezidenti tujja kumuwa obujulizi," bw'atyo agenti w'omu ku abo abaali beesimbyewo eyali mu lukungaana olwo bwe yagamba Independent, era n'agattako nti, "kyokka, yatugabula ekijjulo kya maanyi era oluvannyuma n'atugamba nti akakiiko ka Hajji Moses Kigongo kajja kukola ku nsonga yaffe.

translation.en: Nsereko had fought Babu on three different fronts in just a couple of months
translation.lug: Mu myezi ebiri gyokka, Nsereko yali alwanye ne Babu entalo ssatu ez'enjawulo.

translation.en: Namayanja confirmed that the meeting took place but declined to divulge what was discussed
translation.lug: Namayanja yagamba nti olukungaana lwaliwo naye yagaana okwogera ebyalulimu.

translation.en: She was referring to the chaos and rigging that marred the Butaleja district primary elections in which Hyuha lost the flag for district woman MP despite being accused of participating in rigging
translation.lug: Yali ayogera ku kavuyo n'okubba obululu ebyali mu kulonda kw'e Butaleja Hyuha amale awangulwe wadde nga yavunaanibwa ogw'okubba obululu.

translation.en: Her only hope, she said, was in the new entrants on the executive team, especially Amelia Kyambadde (party treasurer), Abdul Nadduli (Vice Chairperson for Buganda region) and Sam Engola (vice chairperson for Northern region), to bring a new dimension
translation.lug: Yagamba nti esuubi lyokka lye yali asigazizza lyali mu bappya abaali bayingiddewo okusingira ddala Amelia Kyambadde (omuwanika w'ekibiina) Abdul Nadduli (omummyuka wa ssentebe mu Buganda) ne Sam Engola (omummyuka wa ssentebe mu Mambuka) nti bano bayinza okuleetawo enkola empya.

translation.en: Some of the other delegations he met recently came from Kalungu East where the incumbent MP, Umar Mawiya, is accused by Masaka district chairperson Vincent Ssempijja of rigging the MP primary election; and the recently elected members of the party’s youth league
translation.lug: Abalala be yasisinkana gye buvuddeko awo baali bava Kalungu East Umar Mawiya omubaka wa palamenti era ng'avunaanibwa ssentebe wa disitulikiti y'e Masaka Vicent Ssempijja olw'okuba obulul mu kulonda okw'okusunsulibwamu; ne mu kulondebwa kwa bamemba b'ekibiina ky'abavubuka okubadde kwakagwa.

translation.en: Both Vice President Prof. Gilbert Bukenya and Trade Minister Maj. Gen. Kahinda Otafiire, who lost the secretary general post to Security Minister Mbabazi, have shown limited interest in party activities since the acrimonious showdown at Namboole
translation.lug: Bombi omummyuka wa pulezidenti Pro. Gilbert Bukenya ne minisita w'eby'obusuubuzi Maj. Gen. Kahinda Otafiire, abaawangulwa mu kifo kya ssabawandiisi beesuliddeyo ogwannagamba mu ebyo ebikolebwa mu kibiina okuva okulonda lwe kwagwa e Namboole.

translation.en: Bukenya has since withdrawn from the public and the only time he has spoken, he said he was busy working on a science paper
translation.lug: Okuva olwo Bukenya abadde talabika mu bantu era lwe yayogera yagamba nti alina olupapula lwa sayansi lw'akolako.

translation.en: Otafiire, on his part, was reluctant to comment on NRM issues
translation.lug: Otafiire ye nga tayagala kubaako ky'ayogera ku nsonga za NRM.

translation.en: ” On Sept 26, the Moses Kigongo reconciliation team met in Mbarara with all candidates who participated in the primaries in the 14 districts of western Uganda
translation.lug: Nga Ssebutemba 26, akakiiko ka Moses Kigongo kaasisinkana abaali beesmbyewo bonna e Mbarara okuva mu disitulikiti 14 mu Buggwanjuba bwa Uganda.

translation.en: If Otafiire and other disgruntled party members choose to keep off party activities and leave it to Mbabazi’s group, as Otafiire’s comment suggests, Museveni would find himself in a complicated position on the campaign trail next year
translation.lug: Bwe kiba nga Otafiire n'abalala bonna abaali abanyiivu baasalawo emirimu okugirekera Mbabazi ne banne nga Otafiire bwe yagamba, Museven yandyesanze mu kiseera ekizibu ennyo mu kampeyini ze omwaka ogujja.

translation.en: Alice Karango, 39, uncomfortably sits in front of her two roomed house in Masheruka, Bushenyi District, desperately watching her three kids, Atwiine Martin, 15, Arinda Bridget 13 and Nelson Andinda 10, fight over a piece of bread
translation.lug: Alice Karango ow'emyaka 39 egy'obukulu, nga tawulira bulungi atudde awo mu maaso g'ennyumba ye ey'ebisenge ebibiri e Masheruka, mu disitulikiti y'e Bushenyi, atunuulira abaana be abasatu, Atwiine Martin ow'emyaka 15, Arinda Bridget, ow'emyaka 13 ne Nelson Andinda ow'emyaka 10, nga balwanira akagaati.

translation.en: Karango is a widow to the late Private Edris Kyeyune who died while fighting Kony’s Lords Resistance Army (LRA) with the Uganda People’s Defense Forces (UPDF) in the DRC in 2001
translation.lug: Karango nnamwandu w'omugenzi Private Edris Kyeyune eyafiira mu lutalo lw'okulwanyisa amaggye ga Kony, LRA

translation.en: Karango says that her husband’s body was brought home for burial
translation.lug: Karagaro agamba nti omulambo gwa bba gwakomezebwawo ne guziikibwa.

translation.en: Since 2004, Karango is supposed to have received her late husband’s pension from the government but has failed despite repeated efforts
translation.lug: Karango agamba nti okuva mu 2004 abadde alina okuba ng'afuna ssente za bba eza pensoni okuva mu gavumenti naye wadde ng'afubye nnyo, tazifunanga.

translation.en: Karango says that her inlaws were against the idea of her pursuing the pension and consequently hid the documents that were required for one to claim the pension
translation.lug: Karango agamba nti ab'engaanda ze baali tebaagala alondoole ssente ezo era ne basalawo bakweke ebiwandiiko ebyali byetaagisibwa omuntu okusobola okufuna ssente ezo.

translation.en: ”Karango has been helped by her friend Sirajj Musoke, a UPDF officer who retired from service because he is HIV positive, and who has also worked to get his own pension since 2003
translation.lug: "Karango ayambiddwako mukwano gwe ayitibwa Sirajj Musoke, naye nga mujaasi wa UPDF eyawummula olw'okuba nga mulwadde wa mukenenya era nga naye yeerwanyeeko nnyo okuva mu 2003 okusobola okufuna ssente ezo.

translation.en: Musoke says that he has been helping several widows and orphans to secure their pension
translation.lug: Musoke agamba nti ayambye bannamwandu bangi ne bamulekwa okufuna ssente zaabwe

translation.en: ”Ann Kalenzi, 24, also says that she dropped out of school in S.3 when her father, Sgt Alex Kalenzi died in 2004 in a motor accident
translation.lug: "Ann Kalenzi ow'emyaka 24 naye agamba nti okusoma yakukomya mu siniya yakusatu kitaawe Sgt Alex Kalenzi bwe yafiira mu kabanje ka mmotoka mu 2004.

translation.en: ”Karango and all other pension seekers only ray of hope lies with the previous exsoldiers’ registration that could see tens of thousands receive their pensions
translation.lug: Karango ne banne abalala abalina okufuna ssente za pensoni esuubi balirina mu abo bokka abaaliko abajaasi.

translation.en: ” However, Felix Kulayigye, the UPDF spokesman recently announced that the Ministry of Defence has already secured the money to clear the pension arrears
translation.lug: "Kyokka, Felix Kulayigye omwogezi wa UPDF gyebuvuddeko awo yagamba nti Minisitule y'eby'Okwerinda emmaze okufuna ssente ez'okusasula abantu abo.

translation.en: The audit titled “Pension Processing by the department of Compensation: ministry of Public Service” noted that “the general delays led to failure by retired officers to provide for themselves and their families leading to increased dependency burden, distress and frustration
translation.lug: Ekiwandiiko ekyaliko omutwe nti, "Minisitule y'abakozi ekola ku kusasula ssente za pensoni" kyagamba nti okulwa okwo kuleetedde abajaasi abaawummula okulemererwa okwetuusaako era n'okutuusa ku b'omu maka gaabwe ebyetaago byabwe era kino ne kibaviirako okwesigama ku balala era n'okwenyamira.

translation.en: Kulaigye says that in total over 140,000 exservice men were registered in the process and that these would benefit from the Shs 34billion that the government earmarked for the exsoldiers
translation.lug: Kulayigye agamba nti abajaasi abasukka mu 140,000 be baawandiisibwa era nga bano bajja kuganyulwa mu ssente obuwumbi 34 gavumenti ze yassaawo okusasula abajaasi bano.

translation.en: Kulaigye adds that another Shs120bn was also set aside for the same purpose, however this chunk is meant to cater for various exservicemen including civil servants, police and the like
translation.lug: Kulayigye era agamba nti waliwo n'obuwumbu obulala 120 obutegekeddwa ku lw'ekigendererwa kye kimu, kyokka zino era zijja kuweebwa n'abalala nga mw'otwalidde abaaliko aba poliisi n'abalala.

translation.en: The exercise will also see exsoldiers who served in Amin and Obote II regimes officially discharged from the army
translation.lug: Era mu mbeera y'emu abo abaaliko abajaasi mu kiseera kya Amini ne Obote nabo mu butongole bajja kusiibulwa okuva mu maggye

translation.en: In March 2009, there were reports that there was a racket in the Directorate of Records, Manpower Audit Section, in which billions meant for the departed soldiers were stolen
translation.lug: Mu mwezi gwa Maaki 2009 kyagambibwa nti waliwo abaali babbye obuwumbi bwa ssente ezo ezaali aza abajaasi.

translation.en: Emilio Mondo, chief of the Uganda Veterans Board who personally participated in the registration process says that although he cannot say that the ghosts were totally eliminated, he was sure that they were limited and reduced
translation.lug: Emilio Mondo akulira Akakiiko akakola ku abo abaazirwanako era nga ye kennyini yenyigira mu kuwandiika abantu abo agamba nti, wadde nga tayinza kugamba nti abo abaali batalina kufuna ssente ezo baamalibwamu bonna, mukakafu nti bakendezebwa.

translation.en: Mondo, a former soldier in the Obote and Amin governments, oversaw the registration of over 50,000 exsoldiers in West Nile and northern Uganda regions
translation.lug: Mondo ate nga naye yaweereza mu maggye mu gavumenti ya Amini ne Obote, yalabirira okuwandisibwa kw'abantu abaukka mu mitwalo ataano mu West Nile ne mu mambuka ga Uganda.

translation.en: “We are receiving the complaints from upcountry that the money is not coming, so we also do not know what is happening,” Mondo says
translation.lug: Mondo agamba nti, tufuna okwemmulugunya okuva mu bantu baffe nti tebatuna ssente zaabwe, naye naffe tetumanyi bigenda mu maaso.

translation.en: But the recent UFA national Delegates Conference, which took place from Sept 22 to 24 at Namboole Stadium, suugests that Kamya has either failed to sell her party ideas to the masses, or her mobilisers are letting her down
translation.lug: Naye mu lukungaana lwa UFA olwaliwo nga Sebutemba 22 ne 24 e Namboole, abaaluliko baagamba nti Kamya ayinza okuba ng'alemereddwa okuleetera abantu okukkiririza mu ndowooza z'ekibiina kye oba abo b'akozesa be bamuleetedde okulemererwa.

translation.en: UFA, which started as a pressure group that believes in the promotion of a federal system of government that would go far beyond the regional tier system, had delegates from Kampala’s four city divisions of Rubaga, Makindye, Kawempe, and Nakawa which were represented as districts
translation.lug: Ekibiina kya UFA ekikkiririza mu kutumbula enfuga ya federo kyalina ababaka baakyo mu divisoni ennya ez'omu Kampala, kwe kugamba, Rubaga, Makindye, Kawempe ne Nakawa era nga bino byali bitwalibwa nga disitulikiti.

translation.en: Kanyeihamba, the UFA coordinator, said these were part of the 12,000 delegates expected at the conference
translation.lug: Kanyeihamba nga ye mukwanaganya w'ekibiina kya UFA yagamba nti abo baali kitundu ky'abakiise 12,000 abaali basuubirwa mu lukungaana

translation.en: Mukono and Wakiso districts did not have delegates; these areas are composed of Baganda people, who have wanted the federal “federo” system of governance since the days of Sir Kabaka Edward Muteesa I
translation.lug: E Mukono ne Wakiso tewavaayo bakiise; ebitundu bino birimu Abaganda ababadde baagala enfuga ya Federo okuviira ddala mu kiseera kya Sir Kabaka Edward Muteesa ow'olubereberye.

translation.en: In April 2010, the party was almost deregistered for presenting ghost members on its registration form from Masindi, Buliisa, Kibaale, Iganga and other parts of the country when it was called upon by the electoral body to submit 50 members from at least twothirds of the districts of Uganda
translation.lug: Mu Apuli 2010, katono ekibiina kisazibwemu kubanga kyawaayo bamemba abataaliwo okuva mu disitulikiti y'e Masindi, Buliisa, Kibaale, Iganga ne mu bifo ebirala mu ggwanga bwe kyayitibwa akakiiko k'eby'okulonda kiweeyo amannya g'ababaka amakumi attaano okuva mu disitulikiti za Uganda.

translation.en: Ronald Kanyeihamba, the UFA coordinator, said each district was expected to bring six members who were appointed on the district executive committee, and two other delegates depending on how big the district was
translation.lug: Ronald Kanyeihamba omukwanaganya w'ekibiina kino yagamba nti buli disitulikiti yali esuubirwa okuleeta bamemba mukaaga abaali balondeddwa okubeera ku kakiiko akafuzi awamu n'abakiise abalala babiri okusinziira ku bunene bwa disitulikiti.

translation.en: Joseph Nkongoki, the chairperson from Rubirizi district, said his district had 10 representatives who included himself, his vice and other leaders of the party on the district level
translation.lug: Josepy Nkongoki ssentebe okuva mu disitulikiti y'e Rubirizi yagamba nti disitulikiti ye yalina abakiise kkumi nga naye mwali, omummyuka we n'abakulembeze abalala ku mutendera gwa disitulikiti.

translation.en: On Sept 20 Kanyeihamba said those elected at Kawempe were special groups who included representatives of women, youth and Persons with Disabilities
translation.lug: Nga Ssebutemba 20, Kanyeihamba yagamba nti abo be baalondera e Kawempe baali ba njawulo era baali bazingiramu abo abakiikirira abakazi, abavubuka n'abantu abaliko obulemu.

translation.en: A delegate from Ngora told The Independent that they were told to come and vote for the party president
translation.lug: Omukiise okuva e Ngora yagamba Independenti nti baagambibwa okujja okulonda pulezidenti w'ekibiina.

translation.en: Kamya was unopposed as party president as had been widely anticipated
translation.lug: Kamya  yayitamu mu kifo ky'obwa pulezidenti nga tavuganyiziddwa era nga kino kyali kisuubirwa.

translation.en: Kamya is the only woman candidate in the race and the second woman to contest for the highest office in the land after Miria Obote who contested in the 2006 presidential elections on a UPC ticket
translation.lug: Kamya ye mukyala yekka ali mu lwokaano ku abo abeesimbyewo era ye mukyala ow'okubiri okuvuganya mu kifo ekya waggulu mu ggwanga, eyasooka yali Miria Obote eyeesimbawo mu 2006 okuvuganya ku bwa pulezidenti ng'asinziira mu kibiina kya UPC.

translation.en: In northern Uganda, which also covers West Nile, where the election was first conducted, the losers were not as grumbling as their NRM counterparts
translation.lug: Mu mbambuka ga Uganda ate ng'ekitundu kino kitwaliramu Westi Nile, okulonda gye kwasookera, abo abaawangulibwa tebaali banyiivu nnyo nga bannaabwe ab'omu kibiina kya NRM.

translation.en: So was the case in the Gulu district chairman’s race where the loser, McMakot Kitara, immediately congratulated the winner Martin Ojara
translation.lug: Era bwe kityo bwe kyali mu disitulikiti y'e Gulu mu lwokaano lw'okulonda ssentebe. Oyo eyawangulwa McMakot Kitara yayanguwa okwozaayoza eyawangula Marin Ojara.

translation.en: Godi was defeated by Amina Atako, a local journalist who polled 52 votes against Godi’s 29
translation.lug: Godi yafuna obululu 29 n'awangulwa Amina Atako munnamawulire w'omu kitundu eyafuna obululu 52

translation.en: In Rukungiri Municipality, FDC Women’s League Chairperson, Ingrid Turinawe, lost to Roland Mugume, the party’s district chairperson
translation.lug: Mu munisipaali y'e Rukungiri, akulira abakya mu FDC Ingrid Turinawe, yawangulwa Roland Mugume, ssentebe wa disitulikiti.

translation.en: Conceding defeat Turinawe said the election had been free and fair but announced she would run for the district Woman MP seat to take on the minister of state for public service Sezi Mbaguta
translation.lug: Bwe yakkiriza okuwangulibwa Turinawe yagamba nti okulonda kwali kwa mazima na bwenkanya naye n'agamba nti ajja kwesimbawo avuganye ku kifo ky'omubaka omukyala owa disitulikiti avuganye minisita Sezi Mbaguta.

translation.en: In fact, after the election Turinawe, her fellow losers and the winner Mugume drove in the same car in the streets of Rukungiri town celebrating the victory
translation.lug: Mu butuufu, oluvannyuma lw'akalulu, Turinawe ne banne abalala abaawangulibwa awamu n'omuwanguzi Mugume beevugira mu mmottoka mu nguudo z'e Rukungiri nga bajaganya olw'obuwanguzi.

translation.en: He claimed the municipality mayor, Christopher Acire, manipulated the voters’ register by allegedly deleting some names and replacing them with those he perceived as supporters
translation.lug: Yagamba nti meeya wa munisipaali, Christopher Acire, yattigattiga olukalala lw'abalonzi ng'agyamu amannya agamu era mu kifo ky'ago n'ateekamu ag'abo be yalowooza nti be bawagizi.

translation.en: The source said the FDC officials from other regions were not happy that their colleagues from west had left the FDC president Kizza Besigye to fight as a lone ranger against the NRM party in the region
translation.lug: Ensonda zagamba nti abakungu ba FDC okuva mu bitundu ebirala tebaasanyukira bannaabwe ab'omu Buggwanjuba abaali baabulidde pulezidenti wa FDC Kiza Besigye ne basalawo okulwanyisa ekibiina kya NRM nga bali bokka.

translation.en: The source said officials from the east and north warned that if westerners were not committed to stamping the party in the region, this time round they (from north and east) will take full charge of the FDC leadership
translation.lug: Esonda era zaagamba nti abakungu b'ekibiina okuva mu Buvanjuba ne mu mambuka baalabula nti singa abo ab'e Buggwanjuba si bamalirivu kunyweza kibiina kyabwe mu kitundu, bo bajja kutwala obuvunaanyizibwa bw'okukulembera ekibiina kya FDC

translation.en: But, Toterebuka Bamwenda, FDC’s deputy publicist, refuted the claims
translation.lug: Naye Bamwenda Toterebuka omummyuka w'omunnamawulire w'ekibiina kya FDC yasambajja ebigambo ebyo

translation.en: Bamwenda, who is also contesting for the newly created Buyaga East County, said it’s not true that the FDC officials from the west had left Besigye to fight a lone political battle
translation.lug: Bamwenda ate nga naye avuganyiza mu kitundu kye babadde bakatondawo ekya Buyaga East yagamba nti si kituufu nti abakungu ba FDC abava mu Buggwanjuba baali baabulidde Besigye ne basalawo okulwana bokka olutalo lw'eby'obufuzi.

translation.en: Bamwenda said Muntu having stood for the party presidency, would not like to lower his candidature to constituency level
translation.lug: Bamwenda yagamba nti Muntu okwesimbawo mu kifo kya pulezidenti w'ekibiina, teyandyagadde kwezza wansi

translation.en: Besides, he adds, Muntu is representing Uganda in the East African Legislative Assembly for which he might seek reelection
translation.lug: Ng'oggyeko ekyo, era agamba, Muntu akiikirira Uganda mu Lukiiko lw'Ababaka abava mu East Africa ate era ng'ayinza okuddamu okwesimbawo.

translation.en: Bemwenda claims FDC this time round is set to win more seats in western Uganda as the conditions for voting in 2006 have changed in the opposition’s favour
translation.lug: Agamba nti ku mulundi guno FDC yeetegese okuwangula ebifo ebisinga obungi mu Buggwanjuba bwa Uganda.

translation.en: In some places like Kabarole, Bundibugyo, Kamwenge, and Kyenjonjo the FDC party barely has a member on the LCIII Council
translation.lug: Mu bitundu nga Kabarole, Bundibugyo, Kamwenge, ne Kyenjonjo aba FDC tebalinayo muntu mu kakiiko ka LCIII.

translation.en: According to Jack Sabiiti, the FDC treasurer and former Rukiga MP in Kabale district, what bogs down the party is where they lack a strong candidate in NRM strongholds
translation.lug: Okusinziira ku Jack Sabiiti, omuwanika wa FDC ate ye yali omubaka wa palementi mu disitulikiti, ekisinga okubabobbya omutwe bye bifo gye batalina eyeesimbyewo ow'amaanyi ate mu kifo NRM gy'erina amaanyi.

translation.en: He says one Wilfred Murumba who is the district FDC chairperson and his group are doing great mobilisation
translation.lug: Agamba nti Wilfred Murumba ssentebe wa disitulikiti mu kibiina kya FDC awamu ne banne bakola omulimu gwa maanyi nnyo ogw'okukunga abantu.

translation.en: He said he will contest for Rukiga parliamentary seat
translation.lug: Agamba nti ajja kuvuganya mu kifo ky'omubaka wa palamenti mu Rukiga.

translation.en: ”Constituencies to watch in western Uganda if FDC fields its big shots in the NRM strongholds include: Kinkizi West where NRM Secretary General Amama Mbabazi comes from and is standing
translation.lug: Ebifo bye balina okwerinda mu Buggwanjuba bwa Uganda singa FDC esimbayo abantu baayo ab'amaanyi mu kifo NRM gy'erina amaanyi, bizingiramu Kinkizi West,

translation.en: Who will take on Mbabazi in 2011?
translation.lug: Ani aneesimba ku Mbabazi mu 2011?

translation.en: John Nasasira has represented Kazo since the Constituent Assembly in 1994, who will unseat him? In the previous election the FDC fronted Mwetise Bintabara and he is willing to take on Nasasira again
translation.lug: John Nasasira y'abadde akiikirira Kazo okuvira ddala mu kiseera kya Constituent Assembly mu 1994, ani annamuggyawo? Mu kulonda okwagwa aba FDC baasimbawo Mwetise Bintabara era mwetegefu okuddamu okwesimba ku Nasasira.

translation.en: But will Bintabara dare the devil and defeat Museveni’s longest serving Minister for Works, Transport and Communication?
translation.lug: Naye Bintabara anaasobola okuwangula musajja wa Museveni amaze ekiseera kiwanvu ng'aweereza nga minisita w'enguudo, eby'entambula n'empuliziganya?

translation.en: Mbarara Municipality has for long been a lone opposition constituency until FDC strong women, Winnie Byanyima resigned her seat for a UN job and NRM captured the seat.
translation.lug: Okumala emyaka mingi Mbarara kyali kitundu ky'abo abavuganya gavumenti okutuusa omukyala ow'amaanyi owa FDC Winnie Byanyima lwe yalekulira ekifo kye ng'afunye omulimu mu Kibiina ky'amawanga amagatte olwo nno NRM n'etwala ekifo ekyo.

translation.en: FDC strongman retired Maj. John Kazoora has shown interest in recapturing the seat
translation.lug: Omusajja wa FDC ow'amanyi eyawummula amaggye Maj. John Kazoora ekiraze nti ayagala okwezza ekifo ekyo.

translation.en: But he has to defeat Dr Medard Bitekyerezo who won the NRM primaries for the same seat
translation.lug: Naye aba alina okuwangula Dr Medard Bitekyerezo eyawangula mu kammyufu ka NRM mu kifo ekyo kye kimu.

translation.en: Other FDC strongmen in western Uganda include Augustine Ruzindana who will contest for Ruhama to unseat First Lady Janet Museveni
translation.lug: Abasajja ba FDC abalala ab'amaanyi mu Buggwanjuba bwa Uganga mwe muli Augustine Ruzindana ajja okwesimbawo e Ruhama okuvuganya mukyala Museveni.

translation.en: Chapaa Karuhanga will tussle it out with NRM firebrand Maj. Gen. Kahinda Otafiire for Ruhinda constituency in the new Mitoma district (carved out of Bushenyi)
translation.lug: Chapaa Karuhanga ajja kusitaana n'omusajja wa NRM Maj. Gen. Kahinda Otafiire mu kitundu kya Ruhinda mu disitulikiti empya eya Mitoma (eyasalibwa ku Bushenyi)

translation.en: Odo Tayebwa will face former youth MP for Western Uganda, Nasser Basajjabalaba for BushenyiIshaka Municipality MP seat
translation.lug: Odo Tayebwa ajja kwolekagana ne ayali omubaka wa palamenti ow'abavubuka mu Buggwanjuba bwa Uganda, Nasser Basajjabalaba mu kifo ky'omubaka wa palamenti.

translation.en: FDC iron lady Ingrid Turinawe will lock horns with minister Mbaguta for Rukungiri district woman MP seat
translation.lug: Omukyala ow'amaanyi ennyo mu FDC Ingrid Turinawe ajja kwolekagana ne minisita Mbaguta mu kifo ky'omubaka wa palamenti mu disitulikiti y'e Rukungiri,

translation.en: Francis Mwijukye, an FDC youth winger and leader, will contest against NRM’s Ephraim Biraro for the Buhweju constituency
translation.lug: Francis Mwijukye,Omuvubuka mu FDC ate nga mukulembeze ajja kwesimba ku Ephraim Biraro mu Buhweju

translation.en: FDC vice chairperson for western Uganda, Amanya Mushega is facing NRM’s Raphael Magyezi who defeated Disaster Preparedness minister Tarsis Kabwegyere in the NRM party primaries
translation.lug: Omummyuka wa ssentebe wa FDC mu Buggwanjuba bwa Uganda, Amanya Mushega agenda kwolekagana ne owa NRM Raphael Magyezi eyawangula minisita Tarsisi Kabwegyere in kammyufu ka NRM.

translation.en: Other FDC strongmen like Mugisha Muntu, Musinguzi Garuga and Richard Kaijuka are not running for any elective office
translation.lug: Abasajja abalala ab'amaanyi mu FDC gamba nga Mugisha Muntu, Musinguzi Garuga, ne Richard Kaijuka bo tebajja kwesimbawo.

translation.en: In some places like Kabarole, Bundibugyo, Kamwenge, and Kyenjonjo the FDC party barely has a member on the LCIII Council
translation.lug: Mu bifo ebimu gamba nga Kabarole, Bundibugyo, Kamwenge, ne Kyenjonjo FDC terinayo muntu mu kifo kya LCIII

translation.en: Kayihura had been told by Toro Queen Mother Best Olimi Kemigisa, who has a money dispute with Kasango, that the President had ordered the arrest
translation.lug: Kayihura yali agambiddwa Kwiini wa Toro Besit Kemigisa, alina obutakaanya ku nsonga ezikwata ssente ne Kasango, nti pulezidenti yali alagidde nti akwatibwe

translation.en: State House sources say that the President’s protocol officials were shocked when she showed up with two other persons: Jonathan her nephew, who is the personal assistant to her and King Oyo Nyimba Iguru, and a Kampala lawyer, William Byaruhanga
translation.lug: Ensonda okuva mu maka g'obwa pulezidenti zigamba nti abakungu ba pulezidenti beekanga nnyo omukyala oyo bwe yajja n'abasajja abalala babiri: Kizibwe we ayitibwa Jonathan, era nga ye muyambi we ne Kabaka Oyo Nyimba Iguru, ne munnamateeka okuva e Kampala, William Byaruhanga

translation.en: The Permanent Secretary Ministry of Lands, GabindadeMusoke, has stolen my money, she told the President
translation.lug: Ygamba pulezidenti nti omuwandiisi ow'enkalakalira mu minisitule y'eby'ettaka, Gabindade Musoke, abbye ssente ze.

translation.en: But, Byaruhanga told the President, although the government had paid Kemigisa Shs 4.5 billion for land she sold to the government, her lawyer, Bob Kasango, had walked away with all the money
translation.lug: Naye Byaruhanga yagamba pulezidenti nti, wadde nga gavumenti yali esasudde Kemigisa essente obuwumbi buna n'ekitundu ku ttaka lye yaguza gavumenti, munnamateeka we Bob Kasango ssente zonna yali azitute.

translation.en: Kemigisa and her lawyer also told the President that Kasango owns properties in Kampala and expensive vehicles that should be impounded and sold to recover money from him
translation.lug: Kemigisa ne munnamateeka we nabo baagamba pulezidenti nti Kasango alina amayumba mu Kampala n'emmotokka ez'ebbeeyi ebirina okuboyebwa ne bitundibwa okusobola okununula ssente ze

translation.en: Upon leaving the meeting, the Queen mother called the President’s Principal Private Secretary (PPS), Grace Akello, informing her that the President had directed the immediate arrest of Kasango and that the PPS should cause that to happen by further communicating the President’s directives to the Inspector General of Police (IGP) to cause the arrest
translation.lug: Olukungaana nga luwedde, Kwiini yakubira essimu omuwandiisi omukulu owa pulezidenti, Grace Akello, ng'amugamba nti pulezidenti alagidde nti Kasango akwatibwe mu bwangu ddala era nti ekyo omuwandiisi asaanidde okukikolako ng'akitegeza ssabaduumizi wa poliisi

translation.en: State House has officially confirmed to The Independent that the President never promised to arrest Kasango nor has he ever instructed Kayihura to do so
translation.lug: Amaka g'obwa pulezidenti gategeezezza Independenti nti pulezidenti talagirangako nti Kasango akwatibwe era talagirangako Kayihura okukwata Kasango

translation.en: When The Independent contacted Kayihura, he confirmed that the President never instructed him to arrest Kasango
translation.lug: Independenti bwe yabuuza Kayihura, yakikakasa nti pulezidenti tamulagirangako kukwata Kasango

translation.en: Instead, said he had received a call from the queen mother claiming that the President had instructed him to arrest him
translation.lug: Kyokka agamba nti yafuna essimu okuva eri Kwiini ng'agamba nti Pulezidenti amulagidde akwatibwe

translation.en: According to Kayihura, he directed the arrest of Kasango after both the queen mother and her lawyers told him the President had ordered the arrest
translation.lug: Okusinziira ku Kayihura, ye yalagira Kasango akwatibwe oluvannyuma nga Kwiini awamu ne bannamateeka be bamugambye nti Pulezidenti alagidde nti Kasango akwatibwe

translation.en: What is more, the police also reported Kasango to have been elusive and that he could not be reached by phone or in his office
translation.lug: Ebyaddirira, poliisi nayo yagamba nti Kasango tabadde mwangu era nti kibadde tekisoboka kumutuukirira ku ssimu oba ku ofiisi ye.

translation.en: In fact Kayihura told The Independent that he had held a meeting with Kasango on other official matters in his (IGP’s) office “two or three days” before he was arrested
translation.lug: Mu butuufu Kayihura yagamba Independenti nti yaliko ne Kasango mu ofiisi ye "ennaku nga bbiri oba ssatu emmabega nga balina ensonga ze boogerako

translation.en: Kasango said Byaruhanga’s partner, Andrew Kasirye went to CID headquarters in Kibuli sometime in May 2010 to register a criminal case against him and have him arrested
translation.lug: Kasango yagamba nti munne wa Byaruhanga, Andrew Kasirye yaganda ku kitebe kya bambega e Kibuli gyebuvuddeko mu Maayi wa 2010, okukola sitatimenti ekwata ku buzzi bw'emisango era akwatibwe.

translation.en: He says he visited the queen mother at her residence in Munyonyo in the evening and in their conversation, she denied having any intentions to have him arrested and even challenged him if she had reported any matter to any police
translation.lug: Agamba nti yakyalira Kwiini mu maka ge e Munyonyo akawungeezi era mu mboozi yaabwe yeegaana nti tabangako na kiruubirirwa kyonna eky'okumukwata era n'amubuuza obanga ensonga eno yali agibuuliddeko omuntu yenna

translation.en: Instead, according to Kasango, she told him that it was the lawyers who were exerting pressure on her to have Kasango arrested
translation.lug: Mu kifo ky'ekyo, okusinziira ku Kasango, yamugamba nti bannamateeka be baali bamupikiriza okumukwata

translation.en: He visited the queen mother at her residence in Munyonyo in the evening and in their conversation, she denied having any intentions to have him arrested and even challenged him if she had reported any matter to any police.
translation.lug: Agamba nti yakyalira Kwiini mu maka ge e Munyonyo akawungeezi era mu mboozi yaabwe yeegaana nti tabangako na kiruubirirwa kyonna eky'okumukwata era n'amubuuza obanga ensonga eno yali agibuuliddeko owa poliisi yenna

translation.en: My conviction is buttressed by some other information a person close to William Byaruhanga volunteered to my wife regarding Byaruhanga’s role in having me arrested and what lengths, together with the queen mother they had gone to have me arrested regardless of the truth
translation.lug: Kino nkikakasa okusinziira ku bubaka obulala omuntu alina enkolagana ey'oku lusegere ne Byaruhanga bwe yagamba mukyala wange ku bikwata ku kya Byaruhanga okwagala okunkwata era ye ne Kwiini baali basabye nkwatibwe wadde ng'amazima weegali.

translation.en: ”When The Independent put this accusation to Andrew Kasirye, he denied having anything personal against Kasango but admitted that it was wrong on their part not to have written to Kasango demanding accountability on behalf of their client
translation.lug: Independent bwe yabuuza Andrew Kasirye ensonga eno, yeegaana okubaako ekintu kyonna ky'avunaana Kasango ye ng'omuntu naye n'akikkiriza nti kyali kikyamu bo obutawandiikira Kasango okumusaba yeennyonnyoleko.

translation.en: “We believed the queen mother,” Kasirye says, “and if it is true that Kasango paid her, then she lied to us and that was wrong and unfair of her to us and to Kasango
translation.lug: Tukkiriza nti Kwiini by'atugamba bituufu," bw'atyo Kasirye bw'agamba, "era bwe kiba nti Kasango yamusasula, awo aba atulimbye era aba akoze ekintu ekikyamu gye tuli n'eri Kasango

translation.en: But Gabindade wrote to Kemigisa’s lawyers saying that the queen mother had instructed him to pay all the money to Kasango’s law firm, Hall & Partners and also confirmed that the queen mother even talked to him about the matter and confirmed that Hall & Partners should receive the money on her behalf
translation.lug: Naye Gabindade yawandiikira bannamateeka ba Kemigisha ng'agamba nti Kwiini yali amulagidde ssente zonna azisasule eri Kasango era nti ekibiina kya bannamateeka ekiyitibwa Hall & Partners be basaanidde okufuna ssente ezo ku lulwe

translation.en: When Andrew Mwenda, the Managing Editor of The Independent, who is related to Kemigisa and is also Kasango’s business partner visited her, the Queen mother told him that Kasango had paid her “some little money” – about Shs 400 million only – after the first release of her funds.
translation.lug: Andrew Mwenda nga y'akulira olupapula lwa Independenti, era nga alina oluganda ku Kemigisa era nga ne Kasango akolagana naye mu bizineesi, bwe yakyalira Kemigisa, Kwiini yamugamba nti Kasango yamuwaako ku ssente eziwera obukadde nga bina zokka ku ssente ezaasooka.

translation.en: To that Kasango said, “Yes it is true some mutual friends have attempted to mediate in the matter and said to me that William is ready to apologize if the queen mother lied to them
translation.lug: Awo Kasango n'agamba nti, "Kituufu abamu ku mikwano gyange bagezezaako okuyingira mu nsonga eno era ne bagamba nti William mwetegefu okwetonda bwe kiba nti Kwiini yalimba.

translation.en: Kasango, who spoke very emotionally, said: Byaruhanga said of me, words laced with acid and bitter lies, nothing he does can take that back
translation.lug: Kasango eyayogera nga munnakuwavu yagamba nti: Byaruhanga yanjogerera ebigambo ebiruma ennyo era tewali ky'ayinza kukola ekiyinza okubiggyawo

translation.en: He came with the queen mother and Andrew Kasirye to me while I was in custody, they came at midnight in the company of my wife.
translation.lug: Yajja ne Kwiini ne Andrew Kasirye bwe nnali mu kkomera, bajja kiro nga bali ne mukazi wange.

translation.en: How can I Omukama of Bunyoro, Solomon Iguru Gafabusa and president Museveni dancing on  amakondere cultural dance during the 10th Coronation Anniversary of King Oyo Nyimba at Karuzika Palace on 4th March 2006.
translation.lug: Kisoboka kitya nze Omukama wa Bunyoro, Solomon Iguru Gafabusa ne pulezidenti Museveni ng'azinira ku makondere ku mattikira ga Kabaka Oyo Nyimba ag'ekkumi, ku lubiri lw'e Karuzika nga 4 Maaki 2006.

translation.en: Byaruhanga has made it his top agenda to fight me and he has done this in three different cases
translation.lug: Byaruhanga asazeewo okunwanyisa era kino yakakikola emirundi esatu egy'enjawulo

translation.en: In this particular matter of Kemigisa, he approached her thrice, convincing her to take away instrutions from me and give them to him
translation.lug: Ku nsonga eno yennyini ekwata ku Kemigisa, yaakamutuukirira emirundi esatu, ng'amulagira nziggyibweko obuyinza bumuweebwe

translation.en: On each occasion she told me the full discussion they had but I ignored Byaruhanga
translation.lug: Ku buli mulundi yangaamba buli kimu kye baayogerako naye mbadde Byaruhanga mubuusa amaaso

translation.en: Kemigisa instructed Kasango to represent her in the matter by a letter dated October 18, 2006, a copy of which The Independent has seen.
translation.lug: Kemigisa yalagira Kasango amukiikirire mu nsonga eyo era bino biri mu bbaluwa eya Okitobba nga 18, 2006 Independenti gy'erabyeko

translation.en: On the December 5, 2006, Kasango and Kemigisa executed two Retainer Agreements for legal fees – one for Shs1 billion and the other for Shs 600 million; total Shs 1.6 billion, that is, 35 percent of proceeds from the sale.
translation.lug: Nga Ddesemba 5, 2006, Kasango ne Kemigisa baakola endagaano era nga kino kyalina okusasulwa akawumbi kamu ate endala obukadde lukaaga; nga zonna awamu zirina kuba akawumbi kamu mu obukadde lukaaga, ebyo nga bye bitundu asatu mu bitaano ku buli kikumi ku ssente zonna.

translation.en: Kasango and Kemigisa established a relationship of mutual trust
translation.lug: Kasango ne Kemigisa bassaawo enkolagana nga buli omu alina okwesiga munne.

translation.en: “Bob is a very intelligent young man from who I sought very valuable advice on many issues and we had a good working relationship,” Kemigisa in particular told The Independent’s Managing Editor.
translation.lug: "Bob muvubuka mugezi nnyo era atera okumpa amagezi amalungi ku nsonga ezitali zimu era tubadde tukolagana bulungi," bw'atyo Kemigisa bwe yagamba Independent

translation.en: Kasango told The Independent he had officially written to the Director of Public Prosecutions (DPP) and attached all copies of payments made to the queen mother before the charges were sanctioned
translation.lug: Kasango yagamba Independent nti yali amaze okuwandiikira DPP era n'amuweereza ne lisiiti zonna eziraga nti Kwiina yasasulibwa

translation.en: Kasango says he knows the answer and, since he is now in court, he will say it in court for all to hear
translation.lug: Kasango agamba nti eky'okuddamu akimanyi era nti okuva kati bw'ali mu kkooti, byonna ajja kubyogerera mu kkooti bonna babiwulire

translation.en: Recently Adrian Jjuuko, a young and aspiring human rights lawyer, was set to have his petition heard in court, one and a half years after it was filed
translation.lug: Gyebuvuddeko awo, Adrian Jjuuko, omuvubuka era ayagala okuba munnamateeka alwanirira eddembe ly'obuntu, omusango gwe gwali gugenda okuwulirwa mu kkooti oluvannyuma lw'omwaka gumu n'ekitundu bukya aguwaaba

translation.en: Journalist Andrew Mwenda’s petition challenging the now abolished sedition law was filed five years ago
translation.lug: Omusango gwa Andrew Mwenda ng'awakanya etteeka ly'okulyaamu ensi olukwe, yaguwaaba emyaka ettaano egiyise naye kati etteeka eryo lyasazibwamu

translation.en: The significance, Jjukko says, is that without the resolution of such cases, Uganda can never experience and express fundamental human rights and freedoms as provided by our constitution
translation.lug: Ekikulu kiri nti, Jjuuko agamba, emisango ng'egyo bwe gitasalibwa, Uganda tesobola kuba oba okwogera ku ddembe ly'obuntu n'eddembe lyennyini nga bwe kirambikiddwa obulungi mu ssemateeka

translation.en: Similarly, Peter Magelah of Human Rights Network Uganda says their organisation has filed two petitions against legislation that impedes human rights which have stood unresolved for the last one and a half years
translation.lug: Mu ngeri y'emu, Peter Magelah ow'omu kibiina ekirwanirira eddembe ly'obuntu agamba nti ekibiina kyabwe kyawaaba omusango ogwekuusa ku kulinyirira eddembe ly'obuntu era nga gumaze emyaka ng'ebiri n'ekitundu

translation.en: The Judiciary Spokesman Elias Kisawuzi admits there are “gaps in the system” which require attention
translation.lug: Omwogezi wa kkooti Elias Kisawuzi agamba nti waliwo obuzibu obwetaagisa okussaako ebirowoozo

translation.en: Kisawuzi says people need to appreciate that the judiciary is overstretched and requires a lot of human effort
translation.lug: Kisawuzi agamba nti abantu balina okukitegeera nti ekitongole ekiramuzi kirina emirimu mingi nnyo naye ng'abakozi be batono

translation.en: Director of the Human Rights and Peace Centre at Makerere University’s Faculty of Law, Professor Joe Oloka Onyango says that “constitutional adjudication is not a priority for the government
translation.lug: Ssenkulu w'ekibiina Human Rights and Peace Centre mu Ssetendekero e Makerere mu kitongole ky'amateeka, Omukenkufu Joe Oloka Onyango agamba nti "okusalawo ebikwata ku ssemateeka ekyo gavumenti sibyekulembeza mu nteekateeka zaayo

translation.en: Former Soroti Municipality MP Mike Mukula, who is fighting to claw back the seat in the 2011 parliamentary elections, is getting support from an unlikely quarter – the Electoral Commission
translation.lug: Eyaliko omubaka wa munisipaali y'e Soroti Mike Mukula, alwanirira okwezza entebbe mu kulonda okwaliwo mu 2011 afuna obuyambi mu kifo gye butasuubirwa, okuva mu Kakiiko k'eby'okulonda.

translation.en: EC Secretary Sam Rwakoojo says that it is difficult to explain the circumstances under which such cases arose
translation.lug: Omuwandiisi w'akakiiko k'eby'okulonda Sam Rwakoojo agamba nti kizibu okunnyonnyola engeri kino gye kyajjamu
