translation.en: In Kampala Central is voter number 11823882, Nabankema Salam, born on Dec 5, 1980 and voter number 32984382 Nabankema Salmah who was born on Dec 05, 1980
translation.lug: Mu Kampala mulimu omulonzi alina nnamba 11823882, mu mannya ga Nabankema Salam eyazaalibwa nga 5, Ddesemba 1980 n'omulonzi alina nnumba 32984382 mu mannya ga Nabankema Salmah eyazaalibwa nga Ddesemba 5, 1980

translation.en: “If you are seeing such high incidences of multiple registration in nearby constituencies, how many are there in the registers of constituencies in Bundibugyo and Karamoja which are distant and hard to reach?” opposition Forum for Democratic Change (FDC) Vice Chairperson for Eastern Uganda, Salaamu Musumba, wonders
translation.lug: Ebintu nga bino eby'okwewandiisi emirundi egiwerako bw'oba osobola okubiraba wano okumpi, kati olwo kiri kitya mu bitundu eby'ewala gamba nga Bundibugyo ne Karamoja? Bw'atyo Salam Musumba owa FDC bw'agamba

translation.en: Opposition Chief Whip Kassiano Wadri says that failure to come up with a clean register is one of the reasons behind the opposition’s persistent demands for an overhaul of the EC, which is accused of being incompent and partial to the ruling National Resistance Movement (NRM) party of President Yoweri Museveni, who appoints the EC officials
translation.lug: Akulembera oludda oluvuganya gavumenti mu palamenti Kassiano Wadri agamba nti okulemererwa okuba n'olukalala lw'abalonzi olutuufu, y'emu ku nsonga lwai tukiremeddeko nti Akakiiko k'eby'okulonda era akavunaanibwa omusango gw'okuba nti tekalina bumanyirivu era n'okubbira NRM obululu kalina okudaabululwa

translation.en: The opposition has been very active in organizing protests against the Badru Kiggundu led EC which they want disbanded, but they are not jointly or at individual political party level applying all sorts of data analysis tools, to analyze the voter roll and provide their findings
translation.lug: Abali ku ludda oluvuganya gavumenti bakola butaweera okutegeka okwekalakasa nga baagala akakiiko k'eby'okulonda akakulemberwa Badru Kigundu kasatululwe naye tebakolera wamu oba ekibiina kinnakimu okwekennenya enkalala z'abalonzi.

translation.en: EC Chairman Badru Kiggundu said that the employment of biometric technology and the application of facial recognition would exorcise ghost voters from the register.
translation.lug: Ssentebe w'akakiiko k'eby'okulonda Badru Kigundu yagamba nti okukozesa obuma obuyamba okumanya ebikwata ku balonzi biyinza okuyambako mu kutereeza enkalala z'abalonzi

translation.en: Rwakojjo concedes that finger print match ups could not apply to the 10.5 million voters who had been on the register before June this year because they did not have finger print records in the old register
translation.lug: Rwakojjo agamba akikkiriza nti eby'ekinkumu biyinza obutakola ku balonzi obukadde kkumi abaali ku lukalala lw'abalonzi

translation.en: Sam Mugumya, a Forum for Democratic Change youth activist and Dr Kizza Besigye’s personal assistant, has borne the brunt of police wrath during political demonstrations
translation.lug: Sam Mugumya omuvubuka owa FDC era nga ye muyambi wa Dr Kizza Besigye ayolekaganyeeko n'obukambwe bwa poliisi mu kwekalakasa kw'eby'obufuzi

translation.en: The FDC president and joint presidential flag bearer for the Interparty Cooperation (IPC) Kizza Besigye was roughed up by stick wielding militia (Kiboko squad) as he led an  opposition demonstration at Katwe Mosque grounds near Clock Tower on June 9, 2010
translation.lug: Pulezidenti wa FDC era nga ye mukulembeze w'ekisinde ekyegattirwamu bannabyabufuzi okuva mu bibiina eby'enjawulo, Kizza Besigye yazingibwako abasajja abakubi ba kiboko bwe yali akulembeddemu okwekalakasa ku muzikiti gw'e Katwe okumpi n'essaawa ya Kwiini nga Jjuuni 9, 2010

translation.en: Police spokesman, Vincent Sekkate, says the police explanation on the Bill has been misunderstood and misrepresented in the media
translation.lug: Omwogezi wa poliisi Vincenti Sekkate, agamba nti ebyo ebyayogerwa poliisi ebikwata ku tteeka erikyali mu bubage bannamawulire baabitegeera bubi

translation.en: Mugumya says that the Bill is an a plot by the police to legitimise what they have been doing illegally since the Supreme Court ruled in the Muwanga Kivumbi vs Attorney General petition that demonstrators do not need police permission, they only need to notify the police
translation.lug: Mugwanya agamba etteeka lino poliisi ejja kulikozesa okukwasisa amateeka mu ebyo bye babadde bakola mu bukyamu okuva kkooti ey'oku ntikko lwe yasalawo omusango ogwali wakati wa Muwanga Kivumbi ne Ssabawolereza wa gavumenti nti abeekalakaasi tebeetaaga kufuna lukusa lwa poliisi, nti balina kugitegeezaako butegeeza.

translation.en: The FDC spokesman Wafula Oguttu said his party is working on legal documents to challenge the Bill as soon as it is tabled in parliament
translation.lug: Omwogezi w'ekibiina kya FDC Wafula Oguttu yagamba nti ekibiina kyabwe kyeteekateeka okuwakanya etteeka eryo amangu ddala nga lireteddwa mu palamenti

translation.en: Norbert Mao, the DP president, said the Bill’s “implementation will infringe on people’s right of association
translation.lug: Norbert Mao, pulezidenti wa DP yagamba nti "okussa mu nkola ebyo ebiri mu tteeka lino kijja kulinyirira eddembe ly'okukungaana awamu

translation.en: Some political observers say that the Bill also targets to check Buganda kingdom administration’s actions  following public riots in September last year after the government blocked the Kabaka of Buganda from visiting Kayunga, a part of Buganda kingdom
translation.lug: Abamu ku batunuulizi b'eby'obufuzi bagamba nti etteeka lino era luruubirirwamu okukkakkanya Obwakabaka bwa Buganda nnaddala oluvannyuma lw'okwekalakasa okwaliwo mu Ssebutemba omwaka oguwedde gavumenti bwe yakugira Kabaka okugenda e Kayunga.

translation.en: While celebrating his 17th coronation anniversary, Kabaka Ronald Mutebi said the persecution of Buganda should stop
translation.lug: Bwe yali ng'ayogerera ku mukolo ogw'okukuza amattikira ge age 17, Kabaka Ronald Mutebi yagamba nti Basaanidde okulekera awo okuyigganya Buganda.

translation.en: The journey from Hoima district town to Kyangwali takes over four stressful hours on dirty bumpy roads
translation.lug: Olugendo okuva e Hoimba okutuuka e Kyangwali lutwala essaawa ezisukka mu nnya ng'ovugira mu kkubo ebbi

translation.en: Nampera added that doctors have advised her and other patients to approach media houses to counter what the minister of health Stephen Malinga and state minister for health James Kakooza have said about the availability of cancer drugs
translation.lug: Nampera yagattako nti badokita bamuwadde amagezi nti ye n'abalwadde abalala bagende mu bannamawulire bajungulule ebyo minisita w'eby'obulamu Stephen Malinga ne minisita omubeezi Jamesi Kakooza bye baayogera nti eddagala lya kookolo weeliri.

translation.en: To solve the problem, Kakooza said meetings had been scheduled between stakeholders, the Uganda cancer institute board, the ministry of health and National Medical Stores (NMS), the government department charged with purchasing drugs for all government hospitals
translation.lug: Okusobola okumalawo ekizibu ekyo, Kakooza yagamba nti wategekeddwawo olukungaana olunaabaawo wakati w'abo bonna be kikwatako

translation.en: According to Chris Baryomunsi, the vice chairperson of the social services committee in parliament, because the cancer institute receives its own money to buy whatever it needs, Mulago hospital pharmacies cannot subsidize their shortage in drugs
translation.lug: Okusinziira ku Chris Baryomunsi, omummyuka wa ssentebe w'akabondo ka palamenti akakola ku by'emirimu, olw'okuba eddwaliro erijjanjaba abalwadde ba kookolo lifuna ssente zaalyo okugula buli kimu bye kyetaaga, ettundiro ly'eddagala ly'e Mulago teriyinza kubafunira ddagala ku bbeeyi eya wansi

translation.en: He was according to technical data analysis found to be in constant touch with Jamil Mukulu, Bwambale Sulait, Mark Matovu and Jowali Hatwib all hardcore operatives
translation.lug: Okusinziira ku kunoonyereza okwakolebwa, kyazuulibwa nti yalina enkolagana ne Jamil Mukulu, Bwambale Sulait, Mark Matovu ne Jowali Hatwibu nga bonna bantu bazibu nnyo

translation.en: He is married to 02 wives, Adong Fatuma and Amina Kawala, a Luhya by tribe from Kenya who is a niece to Sumaisha, a girlfriend to Jamil Mukulu
translation.lug: Alina abakyala babiri, Adong Fatuma, ne Amina Kawala Omuluya okuva e Kenya ng'alina oluganda ku Sumaisha muganzi wa Jamil Mukulu

translation.en: In 1995 in the run to his first arrest, he was a close confidant to ADF recruiters based in Iganga, Mpaulo Muhammed and Nkumachina Abduswabur  and was arrested on suspicion of being the head of Buseruka attack, incarcerated in Luzira Prison where he met Muzafali Muhindo, Muganura Idrisa, Mustafa Ssewankambo, Ismael Ntale Maguib Saali and others who had been in Luzira over terrorism
translation.lug: Mu 1995 bwe yali adduka aleme kukwatibwa, yalina enkolagana ey'oku lusegere n'abo abawandiika abantu okuyingira mu ADF mu Iganga, nga bano be Mpaulo Muhammed ne Nkumachina Abduswabur era yakwatibwa ng'ateeberezebwa okuba nga ye yakulembera obulumbaganyi obwakolebwa e Buseruka, yasibibwa mu kkomero ly'e Luzira gye yasanga Muzafali Muhindo, Muganura Idrisa, Mustafa Ssewankambo, Ismael Ntale Maguib Saali n'abalala abaaliko e Luzira ku misango egyekuusa ku butujju

translation.en: After release from Luzira Prison where he had been incarcerated for ADF activities, subject in concert with Hamim Serwanga, Matovu Mark and ten others met in Nairobi with mission to revamp and spearhead ADF operations
translation.lug: Bw'amala okusumululwa okuva mu kkomera ly'e Luzira gye yali asibiddwa olw'okuba n'enkolagana ne ADF, yaddamu okusisinkana Hamim Serwanga, Matovu Mark n'abalala kkumi e Nairobi nga balina ekigendererwa eky'okuddamu okukola ebikwekweto bya ADF

translation.en: Following the death of Mugoya Musa, subject took up recruitment on recommendation by Mark Matovu and concert with Kisambira Masoudi, he took up the assignment
translation.lug: Oluvannyuma lw'okufa kwa Mugoya Musa, baatandika okuwandiika abantu nga bakubirizibwa Mark Matovu era Kisambira Masoudi n'akkiriza okukola omulimu ogwo

translation.en: That around Jan 07, Sam Kalyango introduced Hamza Yasir Ivan to the subject at his home in Iganga.
translation.lug: Nga Jjanwali 7, Sam Kalyango yayanjula Hamza Yasir Ivan eri abantu abo mu maka ge e Iganga.

translation.en: That for the ADF cause, he has been dealing with people like Ali Mugoya, Jowali Hatwib, Mohammed Kabirizi, Ali Imran Emir, Adam Din aka Mulugwara a resident of Magamaga and keeping one of the motorcycles of ADF, Nasur Din, Khalid Mulinda who operates a butchery in Bulugo, on Bunya Road, Iganga district
translation.lug: Nti ku lw'emirimu gya ADF abadde akola n'abantu nga Mugoya, Jowali Hatwib, Mohammed Kabirizi, Ali Imran Emir, Adamu Din era amanyiddwa nga Mulugwara omutuuze w'e Magamaga era nga y'akuuma emu ku pikipiki za ADF, Nasur Din, Khalid Mulindda alina bukya mu Bulugo ku luguudo oludda e Bunya mu Iganga disitulikiti

translation.en: James William Mugeni an HIV/AIDS counselor from Tororo, 45 year old members can’t get NSSF savings yet.
translation.lug: James Williamu Mageni abudaabuda abalwadde ba mukenenya ng'ava Tororo, agamba nti ab'emyaka 45 egy'obukulu tebayinza kufuna ssente zaabwe ze baatereka ne NSSF.

translation.en: “Unless these pirates live in water which I doubt, the solution to ocean piracy is to ensure a stable government in Somalia,”  President Museveni tells 27 chiefs of Defence of the EU member states led by their Chairman, Gen. Hakan Syren from Sweden who met him at State House Entebbe
translation.lug: Okuggyako ng'ababbi bano babeera mu mazzi ate nga kino nkibuusabuusa, ekinnaamalawo obubbi obwo obw'oku gayanja aganene kwe kukakasa nti wabaawo gavumenti enywevu mu Somalia," bw'atyo pulezidenti Museveni bwe yagamba abakulu b'amaggye 27 okuva mu kibiina ekigatta ensi za Bulaaya ekyali kikulembeddwa ssentebe waakyo Gen. Hakan Syren okuva e Sweden abaamusanga mu maka g'obwa pulezidenti Entebbe

translation.en: "I know that there is goodwill on both the side of the President and his Highness the Kabaka to rectify the situation”, Amelia Kyambadde, former Principal Private Secretary to the President, commenting on the fallout between the central government and the Mengo establishment
translation.lug: Nkimanyi nti waliwo ekigendererwa ekirungi ku njuuyi zombi, ku luuyi lwa pulezidenti ne ku luuyi lwa Kabaka okugonjoola embeera," bw'atyo Amelia Kyambadde eyali omuwandiisi omukulu owa pulezidenti bwe yayogera ku butakkanya obwaliwo wakati wa gavumenti eya wakati ne gavumenti y'e Mengo

translation.en: Canon Bagaba consecrated as Bishop of Kinkizi Diocese1000People received free treatment from different diseases in Busujju county in Mityana district
translation.lug: Canon Bagaba attikirwa okuba Bisopu w'e Kinkizi Dayosisi, abantu lukkumi bajjanjabibwa ku bwereere e Busujju, mu disitulkiti y'e Mityana

translation.en: But the FDC Electoral Commission Chairman Dan Mugarura insisted no winner had been declared and the party has no flag bearer for Mbale Woman MP seat yet
translation.lug: Naye ssentebe w'akakiiko k'okulonda mu FDC Dan Mugarura yakalambira ng'agamba nti tewaaliiwo muwanguzi yali alangiriddwa era ekibiina tekirina gwe kisimbyewo mu kifo ky'omubaka omukyala e Mbale

translation.en: He says Richard Gudeeba, the FDC electoral commission chairman for Mbale district declined to declare the final results after it emerged that there had been cases of vote buying
translation.lug: Yagamba nti Richard Gudeeba, ssentebe w'akakiiko k'eby'okulonda mu FDC mu disitulikiti y'e Mbale yagaana okulangirira ebyava mu kulonda okuva bwe kyategeerebwa nti mwalimu okubbira

translation.en: Chief Justice Benjamin Odoki is helped by Edgar Kuhimbisa of Justice, Law and Order Sector to launch the JLOS website on October 4 during a  joint review workshop at Imperial Royale Hotel
translation.lug: Ssabawandiisi Benjamin Odoki ayambibwako Edgar Kuhimbisa okuva mu kibiina kya bannamateeka okutongoza omuttimbagano gwa JLOS nga Okitobba 4 ku wooteri ya Imperial Royale

translation.en: Daudi Ruhinda Maguru, a retired captain of the UPDF, sued Museveni, the NRM Secretary General and the party’s electoral commission
translation.lug: Dawudi Ruhinda Maguru omujaasi wa UPDF eyawummulira ku ddaala lya captain yawaabira Museveni, Ssabawandiisi w'ekibiina kya NRM n'akakiiko akakola ku by'okulonda mu kibiina

translation.en: Govt pays science exam costs for USE The first batch of students who pioneered the Universal Secondary Education (USE) programme will sit their Uganda Certificate of Education exams this year
translation.lug: Gavumenti esasulira ebigezo by'abo aba siniya abaasooka okusomera ku ssente za gavumenti era bajja kutuula ebigezo byabwe omwaka guno

translation.en: President Museveni said every village in Uganda will be a development cell with all LC1 chairmen being directly involved in monitoring the NAADS programme
translation.lug: Pulezidenti Museveni yagamba nti buli kyalo mu Uganda kijja kubaamu enteekateeka ey'okukulaakulana era bassentebe ba LCI bonna bajja kuba nga be bavunaanyizibwa ku nteekateeka ya NAADS

translation.en: In a revealing incident, President Museveni met Aiden Heavey the CEO of Tullow in Jinja
translation.lug: Kitegeerekese nti pulezidenti Museveni yasisinkana Aiden Heavey ssenkulu wa Tullow e Jinja

translation.en: Tullow Uganda President, Elly Karuhanga, was not available to comment on the issue but by press time, there were unconfirmed reports that his office was preparing to agree to pay the outstanding amount
translation.lug: Pulezidenti wa Tullow Uganda, Elly Karuhanga, tekyasobose kumutuukirira okubaako by'ayogera ku nsonga eyo naye we tufulumizza bino, wabaddewo alipoota etali nkakafu nti ofiisi ye ebadde yeeteekateeka okukkiriza okusasula ssente ezigibanjibwa

translation.en: "We have asked Tullow to trace Heritage to ensure that all taxes due to government are paid," said Peter Lokeris, Minister of State for Minerals
translation.lug: Minisita w'eby'obuggaga eby'omu ttaka Peter Lokeris yagamba nti "Tusabye Tullow okunoonya aba Heritage okusobola okukakasa nti emisolo gya gavumenti gyonna gisasulwa

translation.en: In 2000, at least 163 of these children were sent to Uganda to undergo military training in the UPDF camp at Kyankwanzi
translation.lug: Mu mwaka 2000, abaana 163 ku bano baatwalibwa e Uganda okusobola okutendekebwa mu by'ekijaasi mu nkambi za UPDF e Kyankwanzi

translation.en: Kutesa writes that the report accuses the UPDF of crimes in areas where it had not even been deployed
translation.lug: Kutesa agamba nti alipoota eyo erumika aba UPDF olw'okuzza emisango mu bifo gye bataali

translation.en: While the mission met up with several individuals, the Uganda Journalists’ Association (UJA) was not one of the prominent ones they said they met
translation.lug: Wadde nga baalina ekigendererwa eky'okusisinkana abantu abatali bamu, ekibiina kya bannamuwulire mu Uganda (UJA) tekyali mu abo be baasisinkana

translation.en: Chaos gripped City Hall recently when many journalists were stopped from accessing the premises where a new UJA leadership was to be elected, forcing New Vision’s Henry Mukasa to withdraw from the race for UJA president
translation.lug: Gyebuvuddeko awo, waaliwo akavuyo ku City Hall bannamawulire bangi bwe baalemesebwa okugenda mu kifo gye baali bagenda okulondera abakulembeze abapya aba UJA, era kino kyaleetera Henry Mukasa owa New Vision okuva mu lwokaano olw'okuba pulezidenti wa UJA

translation.en: Ibrahim Okum, a lecturer at the Faculty of Economics Makerere University says that multinational and foreign companies tend to have a perception that the indigenous people are not competent and skilled enough to head their companies and as a result expatriates are given the top positions
translation.lug: Ibrahim Okum, omusomesa mu ssetendekero e Makerere Yunivasite mu kitongole ky'eby'enfuna agamba nti kampuni z'ebweru zirina endowooza nti abantu ba muno tebalina bumanyirivu bumala okukulembera kampuni zaabwe era n'ekivaamu abantu okuva mu nsi z'ebweru baweebwa ebifo ebya waggulu

translation.en: The government, observers say, have extended tax waivers, sold parastatals such as NYTIL for peanuts all in the name of attracting FDI, while abandoning local investors
translation.lug: Abantu abeekeneenya ebigenda mu maaso bagamba nti gavumenti esonyiye amakampuni agamu emisolo, amakolero agamu egatunze ku bbeeyi ntono gamba nga NYTIL mbu okusobola okusikiriza abasiga nsimbi kyokka n'esuula muguluka abasigansimbi aba wano

translation.en: On October 1, the party’s National Vice Chairman Moses Kigongo met with over 300 petitioners who had stood for parliamentary and LC5 chairperson seats in Busoga subregion in Jinja town
translation.lug: Nga Okitobba 1, omummyuka w'ekibiina kya NRM mu Uganda yonna Moses Kigongo yasisinkana abantu abasukka bisatu abaali beesimbyewo okulondebwa nga bamemba ba palamenti ne bassentebbe ba L5 mu Busoga, mu Jinja era nga bano baalina okwemulugunya kwabwe

translation.en: Asuman Basalirwa, the JEEMA president, told The Independent that the party believes the provision of social services is a responsibility of the state
translation.lug: Asuman Basalirwa, nga ye pulezidenti wa JEEMA yagamb Independenti nti ekibiina kye kikakasa nti gavumenti y'erina okuwa abantu emirimu

translation.en: Sources close to Mao’s DP indicate that Kezaala and a few other members of the party executive who still uphold the Gaba dream had started talking Sebaggala to woo him back to DP
translation.lug: Abo abali ku lusegere lwa Mao pulezidenti wa DP bagamba nti Kezaala ne bamemba abalala abatonotono abakulembera ekibiina abakyanyweredde ku ebyo ebyali e Gaba batandise okwogereza Sebaggala okumukomyawo mu DP

translation.en: Barely 24 hours after his declaration to join President Museveni, 83 of his Liberal Democratic party members led by his Personal Assistant, Mulyanyama Nganda Kasirye, abandoned him and returned to DP
translation.lug: Nga tewannayita na ssaawa 24 oluvannyuma lw'okulangirira nti yeegase ku pulezidenti Museveni, abantu kinaana mu basatu  ab'omu kibiina kye ekya Liberal Democratic party nga bakulembeddwamu omuyambi we, Mulyanyama Nganda Kasirye, baamwabulira ne baddayo mu DP.

translation.en: Resident District Commissioner (RDC) is a favourite dumping ground for NRM election losers
translation.lug: Abo ababa bawanguddwa mu bululu bafuulibwa ba RDC

translation.en: “I can serve anywhere for now, I am still young,” he told The Independent
translation.lug: "Nze nkyali muto, nsobola okuweerereza mu kifo kyonna," bw'atyo bwe yagamba The Independent

translation.en: Having beaten him to the Kampala district NRM chair and flag bearer for Kampala Central division, he fell on the third hurdle, the Kampala regional NRM vice chairperson
translation.lug: Oluvannyuma lw'okuwangulwa mu lwokaano lw'okubeera ssentebe wa NRM mu Kampala era ng'akwatira NRM bbendera mu Kampala Central, yayolekagan n'ekifo eky'okusatu, eky'okubeera omummyuka wa ssentebe wa NRM mu Kampala

translation.en: She said the morning before heading to State House to meet Museveni, she had been to the party’s electoral commission offices to ask for official results for the post of deputy secretary general to enable her compare with what she had on her declaration forms
translation.lug: Yagamba nti ku makya bwe yali nga tannagenda mu maka g'obwa pulezidenti okusisinkana Museveni, yasooka kugenda ku ofiisi z'ekibiina ekikola ku by'okulonda okusaba ebyava mu kulonda ku kifo ky'omummyuka wa ssabawandiisi asobole okubigeraageranya n'ebyo bye yalina

translation.en: President Yoweri Museveni meets NRM leaders at State House
translation.lug: Pulezidenti Musevini asisinkana abakulembeze ba NRM mu maka g'obwa pulezidenti

translation.en: ”A private in the UPDF earns a paltry Shs 160, 000, too little to save to eventually sustain their families when they die
translation.lug: Omujaasi mu ggye lya UPDF asookerwako afuna ssente eziwera 160,000, ssente zino ntono nnyo ne kiba nti tasobola na kuterekawo ezinaayamba abantu ng'afudde

translation.en: Despite Universal Primary Education (UPE), Karango’s kids all dropped out of school
translation.lug: Wadde nga gavumenti yassaawo okusoma okw'obwereere, abaana ba Karango bonna tebakyasoma

translation.en: However, some veterans fail to be paid because they either refuse to provide copies of their discharge documents to the army or they submit wrong bank accounts.
translation.lug: Kyokka abamu ku abo abaazirwanako balemererwa okusasulwa oboolyawo kubanga tebalagayo mpapula eziraga nti amaggye baagavaamu mu mateeka oba bawaayo akawunta za bbanka enkyamu.

translation.en: Kulaigye says that the documentation exercise was intended to weed out ghosts by verifying claimants, capturing data, assessing the claims and computerisation of beneficiaries since 1962.
translation.lug: Kulaigye agamba nti eky'okulaga ebiwandiiko kyatandikibwawo okusobola okuggyamu abo abalimba, okufuna byonna ebikwata ku muntu n'okumanya abo abalina okufuna ssente okuviira ddala mu 1962

translation.en: As the president of the Uganda Federal Alliance (UFA) she moves with a magnificent poise and speaks confidently about federalism.
translation.lug: Nga pulezidenti w'ekibiina kya Uganda Federal Alliance, atambula agumidde era ayogeza buggumu ku federo.

translation.en: There were also delegates who presented themselves as district representatives from Lwengo, yet it’s a subcounty in Masaka district
translation.lug: Waaliwo n'abakiise abeeyanjula ng'abava e Lwengo songa ate lino ggombolola mu disitulikiti y'e Masaka

translation.en: Budaka had two representatives, Kisoro had 10 and Kibaale had 16 delegates
translation.lug: Budaka yalina abantu babiri abagikiikirira, Kisoro yalina kkumi ate Kibaale yalina kkumi na mukaaga

translation.en: But one delegate from Budaka said they were told they would find the third delegate already in Kampala
translation.lug: Naye omukiise omu okuva e Budaka yagamba nti baabagamba nti omukiise omulala bajja kusanga Kampala

translation.en: However, during UFA’s conference any member of the public could freely access the meeting venue at Namboole
translation.lug: Kyokka mu kiseera ky'olukungaana lwa UFA olwali e Namboole, buli memba yali asobola okugenda mu kifo ekyo nga takubiddwa ku mukono

translation.en: However, the party delegates at Namboole were not aware of the elections in Kawempe let alone the available contestable posts in the party
translation.lug: Kyokka abakiise b'ekibiina mu lukungaana olwali e Namboole tebaamanya nti waaliwo okulonda okulala e Kawempe era tebamanya nti waaliwo ebifo ebirala mu kibiina bye balina okwesimbamu

translation.en: The Forum for Democratic Change started its primary elections in its strongholds of Northern and Eastern regions
translation.lug: Ekibiina kya FDC kyatandika okulonda kwakyo okw'okusunsulamu mu bifo gye kirina amaanyi mu Mambuka ne mu Bukiikaddyo.

translation.en: Compared to the ruling NRM whose elections were by universal adult suffrage, FDC, the biggest opposition party, opted for electoral colleges due to logistical constraints
translation.lug: Bw'ogeraageranya n'ekibiina kya NRM ekiri mu buyinza abeeyambisa abantu abakulu okusalawo ebikwata ku kulonda, aba FDC nga kye kibiina ekisinga obunene ku ebyo ebivuganya gavumenti, baakikola mu ngeri ya njawulo.

translation.en: Arua Municipality MP Godi Hussein conceded defeat
translation.lug: Omubaka wa palamenti ow'omu munisipaali y'e Arua Godi Hussein yakkiriza okuwangulibwa

translation.en: The NRM electoral commission is grappling with over 600 election petitions where the losers are threatening court action or to stand as independent candidates in the forthcoming general elections next year unless their grievances are addressed to their satisfaction
translation.lug: Akakiiko ka NRM akakola ku by'okulonda katubidde n'emisango egisukka mu lukaaga egyekuusa ku by'okulonda era ng'abo abaawangulwa batiisatiisa okugenda mu kkooti oba okwesimbawo ku lwabwe mu kulonda okujja okuggyako ng'okwemmulugunya kwabwe kukoleddwako

translation.en: However, the FDC election primaries were not all rosy
translation.lug: Wadde kiri kityo, okusunsulamu kw'ekibiina kya FDC tetuyinza kugamba nti tekwalimu bizibu

translation.en: The incumbent Gulu Municipality legislator David Oceng Penytoo cried foul
translation.lug: Omubaka wa palamenti owa munisipaali y'e Gulu David Oceng Penytoo yakukuluma

translation.en: In electing the party flag bearers, who will face candidates from members of the interparty cooperation parties, the FDC used consensus where the rival candidates agreed on one representative among themselves and electoral colleges where consensus failed
translation.lug: Mu kulonda abanaakwatira ekibiina bbendera, abo abanaayolekagana n'abeesimbyewo okuva mu kisinde omwegattirwa bannabyabufuzi okuva mu bibiina ebitali bimu, FDC yakozesa kuteesaganya we kisoboka ate we kitasoboka ne balonda

translation.en: Meanwhile winning more parliamentary seats from the western region for the FDC remains a salient issue
translation.lug: Kyokka FDC okuwangula ebifo ebirala mu palamenti mu Bukiikakkono kukyatankanibwa

translation.en: Information available to The Independent indicates that top FDC officials from the north and east have been complaining that their counterparts from the western region seem to be in the struggle only by word of mouth, not action on the ground
translation.lug: Okusinziira ku ebyo ebimanyiddwa The Independenti biraga nti abakungu ba FDC mu mambuka ne mu bukiikaddyo beemmulugunya nti bannaabwe ab'omu bukiikakkono bo balwanyisa bigambo byokka, tebakola

translation.en: Besigye is from the west
translation.lug: Besigye ava mu buggwanjuba

translation.en: The FDC has only three MPs from western Uganda and all of them come from Kasese, the only western district where Besigye defeated President Museveni in the 2006 elections
translation.lug: FDC erina ababaka basatu bokka mu buggwanjuba bwa Uganda ate bonna bava Kasese, ate nga ye disitulikiti yokka Besigye gye yawangula pulezidenti Museveni mu kulonda kwa 2006

translation.en: The other four FDC legislators are from the central region
translation.lug: Ate abalala abana bava mu Buganda

translation.en: The FDC officials from the east and north have the numbers and can democratically take over the party leadership
translation.lug: Abakungu ba FDC ab'omu buvanjuba ne mu mambuka bo balina ababaka bangi era okuyitira mu nkola ya demokulasiya, basobola okwezza obukulembeze bw'ekibiina

translation.en: He said top FDC chiefs from western Uganda will contest in their constituencies
translation.lug: Yagamba nti abakungu ba FDC ab'oku ntikko mu buvanjuba bwa Uganda bo bajja kulondera mu bitundu byabwe

translation.en: But, Bamwenda said, that Muntu stood for the presidency is enough proof of his commitment to FDC
translation.lug: Naye Bamwenda yagamba nti Muntu okwesimbawo ku bwa pulezidenti bukakafu obumala obulaga nti yeewaddeyo eri FDC

translation.en: Western Uganda is still known as an NRM stronghold
translation.lug: Buggwanjuba bwa Uganda wamanyiddwa nti NRM gy'esinga okuba n'obuwagizi

translation.en: How the FDC western wing is working to correct this perception is what many critical voices in the party will watch out for in the 2011 elections
translation.lug: Ekyo aba FDC ab'omu buggwanjuba bwa Uganda kye bakola okutereeza endowooza eyo abangi kye balindiridde okulaba mu kulonda okwa 2011

translation.en: What would happen if all the big guys in the party contested, who would Besigye campaign with? Because this would literally mean each one largely concentrates on their campaigns,” says a party official who asked to remain unnamed
translation.lug: Kiki ekyandibaddewo singa abanene bonna mu kibiina beesimbawo, ani Besigye gwe yandinoonyezza naye obululu? Kubanga ekyo kyanditegeezezza nti buli omu yeemalira ku kampeyini," bw'atyo bwe yagamba omukungu omu mu kibiina eyasalawo obuteeyatukiriza

translation.en: He says the West is now on fire and FDC is gaining more ground in Kabale and is standing better chances to take on NRM
translation.lug: Agamba nti ekitundu ky'e Buggwanjuba kati kikute omuliro era ekibiina kya FDC kyeyongedde okufuna amaanyi mu Kabale era kijja kusobola okwangaanga ekibiina kya NRM

translation.en: He said the top FDC western region hierarchy will contest for positions in next year’s elections and are determined to make their mark in the region
translation.lug: Yagamba nti abakungu ba FDC ab'oku ntikko mu buggwanjuba bajja kwesimbawo mu kulonda kw'omwaka ogujja era bamalirivu okuleka omukululo mu kitundu

translation.en: Last time it was Garuga Musinguzi who gave Mbabazi a run for his money
translation.lug: Ku mulundi ogwayita Garuga Musinguzi ye yaleetera Mbabazi okukimayo ssente ze

translation.en: However Muntu will be active in mobilising for FDC in the west
translation.lug: Kyokka Muntu ajja kukola nnyo okukunga abantu mu buggwanjuba

translation.en: When he was elected as the IPC presidential flag bearer Besigye promised to meet the nomination fees of every candidate and urged the cooperating parties not to leave any elective post uncontested
translation.lug: Besigye bwe yalondebwa okuba omukulembeze wa IPC yasuubiza nti ajja kusasulira buli eyeesimbyewo ssente ez'okwewandiisa era n'akubiriza ab'ebibiina ebirala abaali bakolagana naye obutaleka kifo kyonna nga temuli muntu akyesimbyemu

translation.en: In the 2006 elections the NRM took over 100 constituencies in the country unopposed for lack of opposition candidates
translation.lug: Mu kulonda kwa 2006 ekibiina kya NRM kyatwala ebifo ebisukka mu kikumi mu ggwanga nga tekivuganyiziddwa olw'okuba ab'ekibiina ekivuganya gavumenti tebaalinayo yeesimbyewo

translation.en: This time round the FDC and IPC contend that they will field candidates right from LC1 level to the top most elective office
translation.lug: Ku mulundi guno aba FDC ne IPC bagamba nti bajja kusimbawo abantu mu bifo byonna okuviira ddala ku LCI okutuukira ddala ku ntikko

translation.en: That is when the queen mother called Kayihura and Kasango was arrested
translation.lug: Awo Kwiini we yakubira Kayihura essimu Kasango n'akwatibwa

translation.en: “The CID was very professional and asked him to present documents and a statement from the complainant,” Kasango said
translation.lug: Kasango yagamba nti, awo CID yeeyisa mu ngeri ya kikugu nnyo era n'amusaba abalage ebiwandiiko ne sitatimenti okuva eri omuwaabi

translation.en: After being approached by many responsible persons and clients who were concerned that William Byaruhanga was talking excessively ill of him and promising to send him to jail over the case, he decided to ask the queen mother about it.
translation.lug: Bwe yatuukirirwa abantu bangi ab'obuvunaanyizibwa awamu n'abo b'akolera, beebuuza ensonga lwaki Byaruhanga yali amwogerako bubi ekisukkiridde era ng'agamba nti ajja kumutwala mu kkomera ku lw'omusango ogwo, yasalawo abibuuze Kwiini.

translation.en: Kasango said: “The Queen mother told me the lawyers had said to her, “we have given you bwino (a local slang for documentary evidence), now you should squeeze him
translation.lug: Kasango yagamba nti: "Kwiini yangaamba nti bannamateeka baali bamugambye, "tukuwadde bwiino" kati munyigirize.

translation.en: The Independent has also learnt that Byaruhanga has offered to discuss the matter with Kasango and offer an apology if it is true Kasango paid the queen mother
translation.lug: Olupapula lwa Independenti era lugamba nti lwali lukitegeddeko nti Byaruhanga yeewaddeyo ensonga eno okugyogerako ne Kasango era amwetondere bwe kiba ddala kituufu nti Kasango yasasula Kwiini

translation.en: When The Independent put this accusation to Kasango, he expressed surprise.
translation.lug: Independent bwe yategeeza Kasango omusango guno, Kasango yeewuunya nnyo

translation.en: In the interview with The Independent, Kasango insisted that he owed the queen mother no money at all but instead she owed him monies he had advanced to her prior to the payments by the government
translation.lug: Mu kukubaganya ebirowoozo ne Independenti Kasango yakalambira nti Kwiini talina ky'amubanja naye mu kifo ky'ekyo, ye y'abanja Kwiini ssente ze yali amuwadde nga gavumenti tennamusasula

translation.en: The Independent has confirmed with authenticated bank documents that Kasango paid Kemigisa monies which together with the agreed legal fees amount to Shs 4.3 billion
translation.lug: Independenti ekikakasiza ng'ekozesa ebiwandiiko Kasango kwe yasasulira Kemigisa sente nga zonna awamu ziri obuwumbi busatu mu obukadde bisatu

translation.en: What does this mean for constitutionalism and democracy in Uganda?
translation.lug: Kino kitegeeza ki ku nkola ey'amateeka  ne demokulasiya mu Uganda?

translation.en: The Constitutional Court is the court of first instance for all matters concerning interpretations of the constitution.
translation.lug: Kkooti ya ssemateka ye kkooti esookerwako ku nsonga zonna ezikwata ku kutaputa amateeka

translation.en: Jjuuko’s petition is just one of many petitions filed in the court to challenge the integrity of judicial decisions and legislation which contradict Uganda’s Constitution
translation.lug: Omusango gwa Jjuuko gwe gumu ku misango emingi egyawaabibwa mu kkooti okuwakanya obutuufu bw'okusalawo kw'omulamuzi okukontana ne ssemateeka wa Uganda.

translation.en: Jjuuko is not only fighting for Ugandans’ constitutional rights, but also the practicality of Uganda’s legislative and, by default, democratic process
translation.lug: Jjuuko takoma ku kulwanirira eddembe Bannayuganda lye balina mu mateeka, naye era alwanirira n'enkola ya demokulasiya

translation.en: The report also shows that despite an increase in the number of cases disposed Is the Judiciary delivering or delaying justice?
translation.lug: Alipoota era eraga nti wadde nga waliwo okweyongerayongera mu bungi bw'emisango egisaliddwa, ddala ekitongole ekiramuzi kikola omulimu gwakyo oba kirwisaawo obwenkanya?

translation.en: The Chief justice Joseph Odoki, marking his remarks during the New Law year function at High Court in 2008.
translation.lug: Ssabalamuzi Joseph Odoki nga yeetegereza ebigambo bye mu kieera ky'olukungaana olukwata ku mwaka gw'etteeka eppya mu kkooti enkulu mu 2008.

translation.en: When the Independent asked FDC if they would resort to the courts to deal with likely grievances against the upcoming elections, FDC spokesman Wafula Oguttu said they would not.
translation.lug: Independenti bwe yabuuza FDC obanga baliddukira mu kkooti olw'obutakkanya obusuubirwa okubaawo mu kulonda okujja, omwogezi wa FDC Wafula Oguttu yagamba nti tebajja kukikola

translation.en: He notes the FDC has tried many times to use the Constitutional Court to hear grievances over the outcomes and handling of elections but to no avail.
translation.lug: Yagamba nti aba FDC bagezezaako enfunda nnyingi okuddukira mu kkooti olw'ebyo ebizze bibaawo mu kulonda naye nga tewali kikolebwa

translation.en: He referred to the petition FDC filed in the Supreme Court disputing the results of the 2006 election
translation.lug: Yajuliza omusango FDC gwe yawaaba mu Kkooti ensukulumu ng'ewakanya ebyava mu kulonda kwa 20006

translation.en: Currently, the FDC continues to fight in the Constitutional Court to have the ‘substantial’ clause removed out of the Presidential Elections Act to prevent similar situations of 2006
translation.lug: Mu kiseera kino FDC ekyalwana olutalo mu kkooti ya ssemateeka babeeko etteeka lye bagyamu ku mateeka agafuga okulonda ba pulezidenti okusobola okwewala ebyo ebyali mu kulonda kwa 2006

translation.en: Prof. Onyango says solutions should include generating more autonomy between the financial and administrative elements of the judiciary, less interference from the government, and appointing new judges.
translation.lug: Omukenkufu Onyango agamba nti ebyo ebikolebwa okutereezaamu bisaanidde bizingiremu okuba n'obuyinza obumala ku bikwata ku ssente n'enzurukanya y'emirimu gy'ekitongole ekiramuzi, gavumenti obutabayingirira nnyo, n'okulonda abalamuzi abapya.

translation.en: With all these issues, is the judiciary delivering justice?
translation.lug: Okusinziira ku nsonga zino zonna, ekitongole ekiramuzi ddala kisala emisango mu bwenkanya?

translation.en: Onyango notes: “The increase in the number of petitions filed proves that there is a growing confidence in the court.
translation.lug: Onyango agamba nti: "Okweyongerayongera kw'emisango egiwaabibwa bukakafu obulaga nti abantu beeyongedde okwesiga kkooti

translation.en: Mukula Gladys is listed on the voter’s register for Central Ward polling station in Soroti Municipality as number 11515367 and 33398901
translation.lug: Mukula Gladys ali mu lukalala lw'abalonzi mu Centra Word mu munisipaali y'e Soroti era nga eno ye nnamba ye 11515367 ne 33398901

translation.en: In the same Soroti Municipality Central Ward, voter number 34594429 is Esabu Steven, born on June 10, 1985
translation.lug: Mu kitundu kye kimu Central Ward, omulonzi alina nnamba 34594429 ye Esabu Steven eyazaalibwa nga Jjuuni 10, 1985

translation.en: The EC says that the number of registered voters rose from 10.5 million voters in 2006 to 14.5 million following a registration process that ended in June this year
translation.lug: Akakiiko akakola ku by'okulonda kagamba nti omuwendo gw'abalonzi abeewandiisa gwalinya okuva ku balonzi obukadde kkumi n'ekitundu mu 2006 okutuuka ku balonzi obukadde kkumi na buna n'ekitundu oluvannyuma lw'okwewandiisa okwakomekkerezebwa mu Jjuuni omwaka oguwedde

translation.en: How then could the number of voters surged by 6.1 million in a period of over five years?
translation.lug: Kati olwo kisoboka kitya okuba nti omuwendo gw'abalonzi gwali obukadde mukaaga mu emitwalo kkumi mu bbanga erisukka mu myaka ettaano?

translation.en: Following the proposed Public Order Management Bill 2009 which the police are about to present to cabinet, the plight of Mugumya and others might become more complicated than before
translation.lug: Mugumya n'abala bayinza okweyongera okuba abazibu okusinga nga bwe babadde

translation.en: The Bill seeks that any public gathering comprising three or more people must get clearance from the Inspector General of Police (IGP) or any other officer representing the IGP
translation.lug: Ebbago ly'etteeka ligamba nti olukungaana lwonna olulumu abantu abasatu oba n'okusingawo lulina okufuna olukusa okuva ewa ssabadduumizi wa poliisi oba okuva eri omukulu yenna amukiikirira

translation.en: In July, members of the National Alliance for Free and Fair Elections (NAFFE), an opposition activist group, were violently dispersed when they attempted a demonstration demanding resignation of the Electoral Commission team, which they accuse of being partisan in favour of President Museveni, the appointing authority
translation.lug: Mu Jjuulaayi bamemba b'ekibiina National Alliance for Free and Fair Elections (NAFFE), ekisinde ekiri ku ludda oluvuganya gavumenti, baagumbululwa mu bukambwe bwe baagezaako okwekalakasa nga baagala abo abali ku kakiiko k'eby'okulonda okulekulira kubanga bakavunaana omusango ogw'okwenyigira mu by'okulonda n'ekiruubirirwa ekyokuyisaamu Museveni anti y'abalonda.

translation.en: Public rallies of the Democratic Party too have been forcibly dispersed by the police in the city suburbs and various parts in the central region such as Mukono and Masaka districts
translation.lug: Enkungaana za DP nazo zigumbuluddwa poliisi mu kibuga ne mu bitundu ebitali bimu mu Buganda gamba nga Mukono ne Masaka.

translation.en: I therefore find the powers given to the Inspector General of Police to prohibit the convening of an assembly or a procession an unjustified limitation to the enjoyment of a fundamental right
translation.lug: N'olwekyo nkiraba nti ssabaduumizi wa poliisi aweereddwa obuyinza bungi okusobola okugaana enkungaana oba okugaana abantu abatambula nga balaga obutali bumativu bwabwe n'okunyumirwa eddembe lyabwe.

translation.en: “In Uganda the problem is that the ruling party and the police look at the opposition political demonstrators as disturbers instead of stakeholders in the affairs of the state
translation.lug: Mu Ugnda ekizibu kiri nti ekibiina ekiri mu buyinza ne poliisi batunuulira abeekalakaasi okuva ku ludda oluvuganya ng'abantu abatawaanya abalala mu kifo ky'okubatwala nga bakozi bannaabwe ku nsonga ezikwata ku ggwanga.

translation.en: They think it is wrong for me to express my views through a demonstration that Mulago Hospital needs cancer drugs but it is right for a religious leader to demonstrate with the cross, because his demonstration does not question what the government is doing for the taxpayers,” says Mugumya
translation.lug: Balowooza nti kikyamu nze okwoleka endowooza yange nga nneekalakasa olw'okuba eddwaliro lya Mulago lyetaaga eddagala lya kookolo naye mbu kituufu omunnadiini okwekalakasa ng'akutte omusalaba kubanga okwekalakasa kwe tekukwata ku ekyo gavumenti ky'ekola ku sente z'omuwi w'omusolo," bw'atyo Mugumya bwe yagamba

translation.en: Livingstone Sewanyana, executive director of Foundation for Human Rights Initiative (FHRI), said the Bill poses serious challenges to Ugandans in enjoying their fundamental freedoms and human rights guaranteed by the 1995 Constitution
translation.lug: Livingstone Sewanyana, ssenkulu w'ekibiina ekirwanirira eddembe ly'obuntu yagamba nti Ebbaggo eryo lijja kulemesa Bannayuganda okunyumirwa eddembe lyabwe ery'obwebange eribaweebwa mu ssemateeka wa 1995

translation.en: About 30 people died in the riots and the kingdom’s radio, CBS, has since been switched off air for allegedly inciting the riots.
translation.lug: Abantu nga amakumi asatu baafiira mu kwekalakasa era ne laddiyo y'obwakabaka okuva olwo yaggyibwako olw'okugiranga okukunga abantu okwekalakasa.

translation.en: Kizza Besigye and other opposition politicians oppose the proposed Public Order Bill.
translation.lug: Kizza Besigye awamu ne bannabyabufuzi abalala abali ku ludda oluvuganya gavumenti bawakanya ebbaggo ly'etteeka erikugira abantu okukungaana

translation.en: Observers speculate that the Bill could be targeting to control Kabaka’s gatherings which usually carry political overtones whenever he tours the kingdom
translation.lug: Abeekennenya ebigenda mu maaso bagamba nti ekigendererwa ky'etteeka lino kulemesa enkungaana za Kabaka ezitera okubaamu eby'obufuzi

translation.en: He cited the closure of CBS, denying him access to some territories under his kingdom, arrest of his ministers in 2007 and dividing Buganda into chiefdoms
translation.lug: Yajuliza okuggalwawo kwa CBS, okumulemesa okugenda mu bitundu ebimu eby'obwakabaka, okusiba abamu ku baminisita be mu 2007, n'okwawulayawulamu Buganda

translation.en: The Kabaka’s remarks were interpreted to be a reference to September riots when he was blocked from going to Kayunga, a district in his kingdom
translation.lug: Ebyo Kabaka bye yayogera byatwalibwa okuba nti yali ayogera ku kwekalakasa okwaliwo mu Ssebutemba bwe yagaanibwa okugenda e Kayunga

translation.en: He said Buganda will not waver on demanding what rightly belongs to it
translation.lug: Yagamba nti Buganda tejja kulekera awo kusaba ebyayo

translation.en: Secondly, Buganda has been divided, and many of its properties haven’t been returned
translation.lug: Ekyokubiri, Buganda ekuttuddwakuttuddwamu era nga tennaba kuddizibwa bintu byayo

translation.en: Thirdly, it is very disappointing that there are places in Buganda where it is said the Kabaka of Buganda must seek permission before visiting his people there,” the Kabaka said in his speech
translation.lug: Ekyokusatu, waliwo ebifo ebimu mu Buganda gye kigambibwa nti Kabaka alina okusooka okufuna olukusa okusobola okugendayo okukyalira abantu be, bw'atyo Kabaka bwe yagamba mu kwogera kwe

translation.en: The government also says the Bill is to ensure public safety from constant terror threats following the July 11 bombings in Kampala
translation.lug: Gavumenti era egamba nti ebbago ly'etteeka lino ligendereddwamu okuwa abantu obukuumi okusinziira ku ebyo ebyaliwo nga Jjulaayi 11 bbomu lwe zaatulisibwa mu Kampala

translation.en: The Bill gives the IGP and the Minister of Internal Affairs wide discretionary and unjustifiable powers over the management of public meetings
translation.lug: Ebbaggo lino liwa ssabaddumizi wa poliise ne minisita w'ensonga ez'omunda obuyinza ku nkungaana ezirina okukubibwa

translation.en: ”Amnesty International has decried the Bill as a move  to stifle freedom of association and assembly in Uganda
translation.lug: Ekibiina ky'eddembe ly'obuntu ekiyitibwa Amnesty International kikukulumidde nnyo ebbaggo lino era kigamba nti lijja kumalako abantu eddembe ly'okukungaana mu Uganda

translation.en: On my way back to Kampala, I sat next to a man leaving the camp
translation.lug: Bwe nnali nzirayo e Kampala, nnatula okumpi n'omusajja eyali addayo mu nkambi

translation.en: She has to spend at least Shs 1.4 million a month for a dose of drugs when the subsidized drugs are not available at Mulago, which is almost always
translation.lug: Akozesa ssente ezisukka mu kakadde kamu mu emitwalo ana buli mwezi mu kugula eddagala eryo ery'essente entono bwe liba nga e Mulago teririyo

translation.en: He was responding to reports that ran in the Daily Monitor on Aug 15 that said 250 cancer patients had died for lack of cancer drugs at the cancer institute
translation.lug: Yali alina ky'ayogera ku ebyo ebyayogerwa mu mawulire ga Daily Monitor nga Agusito 15 nti abantu 250 abalwadde ba kookolo baali bafudde olw'okubulwa eddagala mu ddwaliro erijjanjaba ekirwadde kya kookolo

translation.en: “They look at your diagnostic and prescription slip and when they realize that you are from the cancer institute they just send you back without the drug,” says Nampera of the Mulago pharmacy
translation.lug: Batunuulira ebiwandiiko byo n'eddagala lye baakuwandiikira era bwe balaba nga ova mu ddwaliro erijjanjaba ekirwadde kya kookolo bakugamba oddeyo ekka nga tebakuwadde ddagala lyonna," bw'atyo Nampera bwe yagamba

translation.en: However, while Nampera and other patients at the cancer institute constantly complain about the cancer institute’s drug stock outs, the problem lies primarily with NMS, the body responsible for delivering the drugs
translation.lug: Kyokka, wadde nga Nampera ne balwadde banne abalala beemulugunya olw'ebbula ly'eddagala e Mulago, ekizibu okusingira ddala kiri ku NMS ekibiina ekirina obuvunaanyizibwa okuleeta eddagala

translation.en: According to NMS public relations officer Hamis Kaheru, the drug stock outs occur because cancer medicines are not easy to acquire because the supplier starts the manufacturing process only after the customer has ordered them
translation.lug: Okusinziira ku mwogezi w'ekibiina kino NMS Hamis Kaheru, agamba nti ebbula ly'eddagala libaawo kubanga eddagala erijjanjaba kookolo si lyangu kufuna kubanga abo abalituguza batandika okulikola nga tulisabye

translation.en: This statement, however, was contradicted by the owner of Ngapi pharmacy, which provides wholesale services to retail pharmacies in Wandegeya
translation.lug: Kyokka ebigambo bino byakontana n'ebyo ebyayogerwa abo ab'omu ddwaliro eritunda eddagala erya Ngapi e Wandegeya

translation.en: He explained that as a private individual, he has to send his orders of drugs to the National Drug Authority (NDA), which makes sure he is bringing legal drugs into the country
translation.lug: Yannyonnyola nti aweereza okusaba kwe eri National Drug Authority era ne kikakasa nti aleeta eddagala ettuufu mu ggwanga

translation.en: Cancer drugs still missing Despite government’s claims, patients still need to purchase their own medications.
translation.lug: Wadde nga gavumenti bw'etyo bwe yayogera, eddagala erijjanjaba kookolo terinnafunika, abalwadde beegulira eddagala lyabwe

translation.en: Before the July 11 twin terror attacks in Kampala, intelligence had been tracking and arresting ADF operatives in various parts of the country
translation.lug: Bbomu bwe zaali nga tezinnatulisibwa mu Kampala mu Jjulaayi nga 11, ab'eby'okwerinda baali banoonyereza era nga bakwata aba ADF mu bitundu ebitali bimu mu ggwanga

translation.en: He was once arrested in 1995 for the same offence and incarcerated in Luzira Prison up to 2006
translation.lug: Yakwatibwako ku nsonga y'emu era ne bamusibira mu kkomera ly'e Luzira okutuuka mu 2006

translation.en: He is a Musoga by tribe of the Muslim Salaaf sect born in 1967 in Nabitende trading centre, Nambale Sub County in Kigulu County, Iganga district to the late Muhammed Byekwaso and his wife Birabwa Nusura of the same address
translation.lug: Musoga ate nga Musiraamu ow'omu kiwayi kya Salaaf era yazaalibwa mu 1967 mu katawuni k'e Nabitende, mu ggombolola ly'e Nambale mu ssaza ly'e Kigulu mu disitulikiti y'e Iganga era bazadde be baali omugenzi Muhammed Byekwaso ne Birabwa Nusura nga nabo ba mu kitundu kye kimu

translation.en: He studied up to P4 in Kaliro Church of Uganda P/S in 1982
translation.lug: Yasoma n'akoma mu kibiina eky'okuna mu Kaliro Church of Uganda mu 1982

translation.en: He has 38 siblings and he is a businessman cam rebel coordinator with residences both in Iganga and Buvuma Islands
translation.lug: Alina batobe asatu mu munaana era ye musuubuzi era akwanaganya bya kiyeekera mu Iganga ne mu bizinga by'e Buvuma

translation.en: After school, he learnt carpentry in Iganga town council in 1982-1995 at Byekwaso Furniture Mart on Plot 02, Old Kaliro Road.
translation.lug: Bwe yamala essomero yayiga okubajja mu tawuni y'e Iganga okuva mu 1982 okutuuka 1995 mu bbajjiro lya Byekwaso eriri ku poloti nnamba bbiri, ku kkubo ekkadde eridda e Kaliro

translation.en: That while in Prison, he was indoctrinated by ADF activists in ‘b’ above and soon became one of their chief cadres.
translation.lug: Bwe yali mu kkomera yayigirizibwa ebyekiyeekera abo aba ADF era mangu ddala yaweebwa obukulu

translation.en: Among other tasks, he was assigned by Jamil Mukulu to distribute tapes laden with jihad ideology and he got 42 tapes from Kampala but due to security clampdown on him, he was not able to distribute them but passed them on to one Hatwib Jowali to distribute as he went on flight to the Buvuma Islands
translation.lug: Ku mirimu Jamil Mukulu gye yamuwa okukola mwe mwali okubunyisa obutambi obuliko ebikwata ku butujju era yaweebwa obutambi 42 okuva e Kampala naye olw'okuba ab'eby'okwerinda baali bamulinya kagere, teyasobola kubugaba naye n'abuwa Hatwib

translation.en: However, the last two came back and are now operating bodabodas in Iganga
translation.lug: Kyokka bombi abo baakomawo era kati bavuga bodaboda mu Iganga

translation.en: It said Tuskys has quietly acquired Half Price and Good Price supermarkets, which have outlets in Kitintale, Ntinda, Nakulabye and Shauri Yako in Kampala
translation.lug: Kigambibwa nti aba Tuskys balina amaduuka agatundu ebintu ebisaliddwako emiwendo n'ago agatunda obulungi ebintu mu Kitintale, Ntinda, Nakulabye ne Shauri Yako mu Kampala

translation.en: Tuskys becomes the third Kenyan supermarket chain to open shop in Uganda after Nakumatt and Uchumi
translation.lug: Aba Tuskys lye dduuka ery'okusatu erya Bannakenya okuggulwawo mu Uganda oluvannyuma lwa Nakumatt ne Uchumi

translation.en: The other big supermarkets in Uganda, Game and Shoprite are South African
translation.lug: Ssemaduuka endala mu Uganda mwe muli Game ne Shoprite okuva e South Africa

translation.en: In a move designed to transformation its Africa operations, Bharti Airtel Ltd has selected IBM to manage the computing technology and services that power its mobile communications network spanning 16 African countries, including Uganda
translation.lug: Okusinziira ku kigendererwa kye balina eky'okuleeta enkyukakyuka mu Africa, ekitongole ekiyitibwa Bharti Airtel kironze IBM okukola ku bya kompyuta ebijja okuyamba mu by'empuliziganya n'amasimu mu nsi 16 nga mw'otwalidde ne Uganda

translation.en: Bharti owns the telecommunication company Warid in Uganda
translation.lug: Bharti ye nnanyini kampuni y'masimu eya Warid mu Uganda

translation.en: BRAC Uganda Microfinance is the only finance institution in Uganda to be nominated for an award at the African Bankers 2010 Gala to be held October 8 in Washington DC, USA
translation.lug: Bbanka ya BRAC mu Uganda ye yokka eyalondebwa okuweebwa ekirabo mu bbanka zonna ez'omu Africa mu 2010 mu lukungaana olwaliwo nga Okitobba 8 mu Amerika

translation.en: In a letter to Energy Minister Hilary Onek seen by The Independent, President Yoweri Museveni expresses his rage at the audacity of Heritage, which invested a paltry US$150 million in the venture, not paying its tax.
translation.lug: Mu bbaluwa pulezidenti Museveni gye yawandiikira Hilary Onek minisita w'eby'obuggaga eby'omu ttaka, eyalabibwako The Independent, pulezidenti alaga obunyiivu bw'alina eri Heritage eyateeka ssente obukadde kikumi mu attaano eza ddoola mu buzineesi kyokka n'etasasula misolo

translation.en: Our mission is to develop and maintain a national roads network that is responsive tothe economic development needs ofUganda, to the safety of all road users, andto the environmental sustainability of the national roads corridors.
translation.lug: Tulina ekigendererwa eky'okuzimba n'okudaabiriza amakubo aganaasobozesa Uganda okukulaakulana mu by'enfuna, aganaaleeta obutebenkevu n'obukuumi eri abo bonna abagakozesa, era agatuukagana n'embeera y'obudde

translation.en: It is with such a notion that one must appreciate the support America has given to Uganda
translation.lug: Okusinziira ku ebyo byonna, tulina okusiima ennyo obuyambi America bw'ewa Uganda

translation.en: However, the twist of events and good heartedness of our American brothers and sisters again has seen ARVs given to Uganda
translation.lug: Okwongereza ku ebyo era olw'omutima omulungi ogwa baganda baffe ne bannyinaffe Abamerika, era batuwadde n'eddagala lya ARV

translation.en: By giving HIV/AIDS drugs to Uganda we are simply having an entrenchment of President Museveni in power by America through such support
translation.lug: Amerika okutuwa obuyambi bwa eddagala lya HIV/AIDS awamu n'obulala kiba kiyamba Museveni okwongera okunyikiza obuyinza bwe ku Bannayuganda

translation.en: The disease is now 25 years old in Uganda and it has also lost the direction of leadership it had
translation.lug: Ekirwadde ekyo kati kimaze emyaka 25 mu Uganda era kati kivudde ne ku mulamwa

translation.en: Face Technologies has never worked for or with the Electoral Commission of Uganda
translation.lug: Ebya Face Technology tebibangako bya muganyulo eri Akakiiko k'eby'okulonda mu Uganda

translation.en: Face Technologies has nothing to do with the ongoing work at the Electoral Commission currently or even historically
translation.lug: Ebya Face Technology tebirina kakwate konna n'ebyo ebikolebwa Akakiiko k'eby'okulonda mu kiseera kino era tekibangako kya muganyolo mu byafaayo

translation.en: It is on this basis that it was the best evaluated bidder for the National Population Data Bank and Identification System of Uganda through international competitive bidding the fact of belated suspension of that project not withstanding
translation.lug: Eno ye nsonga lwaki ye yawangula tenda ekwata ku kubala abantu mu ggwanga

translation.en: We acknowledge some of the key provisions in the Act are outdated and have to be amended to respond to changing conditions, circumstances and demands of NSSF contributors
translation.lug: Tukikkiriza nti ebimu ku bintu ebikulu ebiri mu tteeka eryo byava dda ku mulembe era birina okukolebwamu ennongosereza okusinziira ku mbeera eriwo n'ebyo abawagizi ba NSSF bye baagala

translation.en: Ugandans are begging for good roads and medicine, but Museveni and his NRM are abusing the public resources that would provide such social services
translation.lug: Bannayuganda bo basaba nguudo nnungi n'eddagala, naye Museveni n'ekibiina kye ekya NRM bakozesa bubi ensimbi z'omuwi w'omusolo ezandibadde zikola ku bintu ebyo

translation.en: He conned Col. Muammar Gaddafi that he was representing the Kabaka
translation.lug: Yafera Col. Muammar Gaddafi ng'amugamba nti yali akiikirira Kabaka

translation.en: But he continues with his con antics,” Makindye East MP, Mike Mabikke explaining why he twice campaigned and worked as one of the strategists for Kampala Mayor Ntenge Sebaggala
translation.lug: Naye akyagenda mu maaso n'obukoddyo bwe obw'okufera," Omubaka wa Makindye East Mike Mabike yannyonnyola ensonga lwaki emirundi ebiri yakuba kampeyi era n'akola ng'omuwi w'amagezi owa meeya w'e Kampala Ntege Sebaggala

translation.en: Michael Ezra has promised money to the Uganda Cranes should the national team qualify for the 2012 Africa Cup of Nations tournament in Equatorial Guinea and Gabon
translation.lug: Micheal Ezra asuubiza okuwa ssente ttimu y'omupiira ey'eggwanga singa bayitawo okuzannya mu mpaka za Africa mu 2012 ezinaabeera mu Equatoria Guinea ne Gabon

translation.en: When Museveni came to power in 1986, he condemned African leaders who fly to UN meetings in private jets when their poor people were suffering from jiggers at home
translation.lug: Museveni bwe yajja mu buyinza mu 1986 yanenya bakulembeze ba Africa abagenda mu nkungaana z'Ekibiina ky'Amawanga Amagatte nga bakozesa ennyonyi ezaabwe ku bwabwe kyokka ng'abantu baabwe babonaabona era nga balumya envunza

translation.en: Mayor Ntege Sebaggala, who has problems with English, last week declared his support for President Museveni in 2011 presidential elections and pledged he would put his behind on the campaign for the president
translation.lug: Meeya Ntege Sebaggala alina ekizibu mu kwogera Olungereza, wiiki ewedde yalangirira nti ajja kuwagira pulezidenti Museveni mu kulonda bapulezidenti okunaabwo mu 2011 era n'agamba nti ekikye ajja kukiteeka ebbali

translation.en: Elections for FDC flag bearer for Mbale district Woman parliamentary seat were scheduled for Sept 27, but were postponed until Sept 30 because grassroots structures to constitute electoral colleges in some of the places were not yet in place
translation.lug: Okulonda omubaka omukyala anaakwatira FDC bbendera mu disitulikiti y'e Mbale kwali kutegekeddwa okubaawo mu Ssebutemba nga 27 naye ne kwongezebwayo mu Ssebutemba nga 30 kubanga byonna ebyetaagisibwa kino okusobola okubaawo byali tebinaategekebwa

translation.en: However, in these districts, unlike in Mbale, winners have been announced and the petitioners are seeking a repeat of the primary elections
translation.lug: Kyokka mu disitulikiti zino obutafaananako Mbale, abawanguzi baalangirirwa era abo abataali bamativu baagala okulonda kuddibwemu

translation.en: Sources in Mbale told The Independent that the elections between Wokuri and Nagudi were marred with massive irregularities like vote buying and falsifying of results, bribery etc
translation.lug: Ensonda zaagamba Independent nti okulonda okwaliwo wakati wa Wokuri ne Nagudi kwalimu okubbira kungi era n'okubuzaabuza ebyo ebyava mu kulonda awamu n'ebirala bingi

translation.en: Sources in Mbale alleged that Nagudi’s group bribed Wokuri’s polling agents between Shs5000 and Shs10,000 per person
translation.lug: Ensonda okuva e Mbale zirumiriza nti abawagizi ba Nagudi baagulirira ba ajenti ba Wokuri nga babawa ssente eziri wakati w'enkumi ttaano n'omutwalo gumu

translation.en: According to the documents seen by The Independent Maguru was duly nominated by the NRM electoral commission, but it did not present his name to the delegates conference for election
translation.lug: Okusinziira ku kiwandiiko Independent kye yalabako, erinnya lya Maguru lyaweebwayo akakiiko k'eby'okulonda ak'ekibiina kya NRM naye erinnya lye teryayanjulwa mu lukungaana lw'abakiise okusobola okwenyigira mu kulonda.

translation.en: “The refusal or failure of the NRM Electoral Commission to present the plaintiff’s candidature to the National Conference at Namboole on September 2010 was a breach of the NRM constitution, the Political Parties Act and the constitution,” the petition reads in part
translation.lug: "Okugaana oba okulemererwa kw'akakiiko ka NRM akakola ku by'okulonda okuwaayo eri olukungaana olwali e Namboole mu Ssebutemba 2010 erinnya ly'oyo eyali asabye okwesimbawo, kyali kimenya ssemateeka w'ekibiina kya NRM, n'ago agafuga ebibiina by'obufuzi," bwe kityo ekiwandiiko bwe kisoma mu bufunze

translation.en: The ministry will also fund the purchase of science chemicals and reagents to be used in conducting the science practical examinations but this will depend on the number of students the school registered for the UCE exams, which begin on October 15 and end late November
translation.lug: Minisitule era ejja kuteeka ssente mu kugula ebintu ebyetaagisibwa mu kukola ebigezo bya sayaansi ebya siniya ey'okuna ebijja okutandika mu Okitobba nga 15 bikomekkerezebwe mu Noovemba, naye kino kijja kusinziira ku muwendo gw'abayizi abanaaba beewandiisizza okukola ebigezo ebyo

translation.en: Museveni lifts NAADS suspension with strict rules The National Agricultural Advisory Services received Shs120 billion from the government this financial year
translation.lug: Museveni agya envumbo ku NAADS naye n'assaawo amateeka amakakali. Ekitongole ky'eby'obulimi kiweebwa obuwumbi 120 mu mwaka guno ogw'eby'enfuna.

translation.en: The president said LC1s will act as spokespersons and inform all people aged 18 years and above about what they have received or what is available for NAADS activities
translation.lug: Pulezidenti yagamba nti aba LCI bajja kukola ng'aboogezi bategeeze abantu bonna okuva ku myaka kkumi na munaana ku bikwata ku ekyo kye bafunye oba ku ebyo ebiriwo okuva mu NAADS

translation.en: I brought out all the accusations against him by his critics and threw them at him with a candidness that even Andrew Mwenda Live at its best would never have done to Yoweri Museveni – the tolerant and liberal president of Uganda
translation.lug: Byonna ebimuvunaanwa na bimutegeeza ekintu ne Andrew Mwenda ky'atayinza kukola ku Yoweri Museveni, pulezidenti wa Uganda omusaasizi era afaayo

translation.en: In a letter to Energy Minister Hilary Onek seen by The Independent, President Yoweri Museveni expresses his rage at the audacity of Heritage, which invested a paltry US$150 million in the venture, not paying its tax
translation.lug: Mu bbaluwa pulezidenti Museveni gye yawandiikira Hilary Onek minisita w'eby'obuggaga eby'omu ttaka, eyalabibwako The Independent, pulezidenti alaga obunyiivu bw'alina eri Heritage eyateeka ssente obukadde kikumi mu attaano eza ddoola mu buzineesi kyokka ne bagaana okuwa omusolo

translation.en: Observers say that Tullow is in a very precarious situation in Uganda following the government's repossession of the block, which was part of what it bought from Heritage
translation.lug: Abeekeneenya ebigenda mu maaso bagamba nti Tullow eri mu mbeera nnungi nnyo mu Uganda oluvannyuma lwa gavumenti okwezza enzizzi Heritage ze yali eguze

translation.en: President Museveni was courted by companies from around the world; for a while, every week it seemed that executives from China, India, South Africa and elsewhere were touching down in Entebbe
translation.lug: Pulezidenti Museveni yakwanibwa zikampuni okuva mu nsi yonna; kirabika buli wiiki ennyonyi ezireeta abakungu okuva mu China, Buyindi, South Africa, n'awalala zibadde ziggwa ku kisaawe Entebbe

translation.en: Minister of State for Energy, Simon D'Ujanga, explains that according to Ugandan tax law, "if you go into a transaction over something that attracts tax, the URA can appoint you to collect tax
translation.lug: Minisita w'eby'obuggaga eby'omu ttaka, Simon D'Ujanga, annyonnyola nti okusinziira ku tteeka erikwata ku misolo mu Uganda, "singa okola buzineesi yonna ereeta emisolo, URA, ekitongole ekiwooza emisolo mu ggwanga kisobola okukuwa obuvunaanyizibwa bw'okusoolooza emisolo

translation.en: The most notable, in Uganda’s case, took place in the DRC border town of Beni where the Uganda People’s Defence Forces (UPDF) engaged in battles for years with the MayiMayi, a community based militia
translation.lug: Ekintu ekitasobola kwerabirwa ekikwata ku Uganga, kyaliwo ku nsalo ya DRC mu kabuga k'e Beni eggye lya Uganda gye lyalwanira n'erya MayiMayi okumala emyaka mingi

translation.en: In its response to the UN draft report, Uganda’s Foreign Minister Sam Kutesa penned an indignant letter to the United Nations High Commissioner for Human Rights on Sept 24
translation.lug: Mu kuddamu ebyo ebyali mu alipoota y'ekibiina ky'amawanga amagatte, minisita wa Uganda ow'ensonga z'ebweru Sam Kutesa yawandiika ebbaluwa enkakali eri Omubaka w'ekibiina ky'amawanga amagatte ekikola ku ddembe ly'obuntu, mu Sebutemba nga 24

translation.en: The draft report, says Kutesa, “is a compendium of rumors deeply flawed in methodology, sourcing and standards of proof…Its authors heavily relied on information supposedly provided by unspecified NGOs and individuals whose motives are suspect
translation.lug: Kuteesa yagamba nti alipoota eyo efumbekeddemu bulimba bwokka era nti eyagiwandiika yeesigama ku ebyo ebyamutegezebwa ekibiina ky'obwannakyewa oba omuntu atalina kigendererwa kirungi.

translation.en: In his final point, Kutesa argues, that the report is “silent” on the activities of the Allied Democratic Forces (ADF), National Army for the Liberation of Uganda (NALU) and the Democratic Forces for the Liberation of Rwanda (FDLR)
translation.lug: Okusinziira ku nsonga ye esembayo, Kutesa agamba nti alipoota eyo teyogera ku ebyo ebikolebwa ADF, NALU, ne FDLR,

translation.en: In North Kivu, the Ugandan rebels of the ADF/NALU attacked and looted several villages in Beni territory, abducting children, young girls and women whom they used as slaves, including sex slaves.
translation.lug: Mu mambuka ga Kivu, abayeekera abalwanyisa Uganda aba ADF/NALU baalumba era banyaga ebyalo ebiwerako mu Beni, era baawamba abaana, abawala, era n'abakazi be baakozesa ng'abadu nga mw'otwalidde n'okubeeyambisa mu bikolwa eby'ekikaba

translation.en: The mission, led by Freedom House, an organisation dedicated to fostering freedom of expression and media, stated its objective as “communicating concerns about the state of free expression in Uganda and ensure that it doesn’t deteriorate prior to the 2011 elections
translation.lug: Omulimu ogwakulemberwamu ekibiina ekiyitibwa Freedom House ekitakabanira wabeewo eddembe ly'okweyogerera n'emikuttu gy'empuliziganya, kyalambika ebiruubirirwa byakyo nga bikwata ku kwogera ku mbeera eri mu Uganda ku nsonga y'eddembe ly'okwogera era n'okukakasa nti teva ku mulamwa nga okulonda kwa 2011 tekunnatuuka.

translation.en: At the second attempt at City Hall, Joshua Kyalimpa retained the presidency amidst accusations supported by his predecessor Kateregga Musaazi that he had tampered with the association’s constitution and hatched a scheme for vote rigging
translation.lug: Mu kugezaako omulundi ogw'okubiri ku City Hall, Joshua Kyalimpa yaddamu okulondebwa nga pulezidenti wadde nga abo abaali bakulembeddwa oyo gwe yadda mu bigere Kateregga Musaazi baali bamuvunaana nti yattigattiga ssemateeka w'ekibiina era kino ne kireetawo okubba obululu

translation.en: UJA officials say they acquired a plot in Kyanja, but the place is located far off the city centre that the offices would be of no practical value to journalists
translation.lug: Abakungu ba UJA bagamba nti baafuna ettaka e Kyanja naye wala nnyo okuva mu kibuga era nti ofiisi tezijja kuba za muganyulo eri bannamawulire

translation.en: The journalist claimed that he is the most trusted by a powerful ruling party big shot, and that he is the one who asked for the shs 4 million that was given to journalists at Namboole for lunch
translation.lug: Munnamawulire yagamba nti waliwo omunene amwesiga ennyo okuva mu kibiina ekifuga era nti ye yasaba ssente obukadde buna ezaaweebwa bannamawulire e Namboole balyeemu eky'emisana.

translation.en: He attended Mugulu Integrated Primary School from 1990 1999 but sat for PLE at the neighbouring Mugulu Primary School from where he went to Greenland High School courtesy of his brother but never sat for UCE due to lack of fees
translation.lug: Yasomera Mugulu Integrated Primary School okuva 1990 okutuuka 1999 naye PLE yagituulira mu somero eririraanyeewo eriyitibwa Mugulu Primary School era eyo gye yava n'agenda mu Greenland High School naye okufaananako muganda we, teyatuula bigezo bya siniya ey'okuna olw'okubuwa ebisale by'esomero

translation.en: While at Greenland High School in Mbale, the subject was studying with one Mubarak (SNU) from Mbarara and left him a contact number of his brother, one Mustafa a butcher in Kizungu Zone in Mbarara town
translation.lug: Bwe yali mu Greenland High School e Mbale, yali asoma ne Mubarak (SNU) okuva e Mbarara era n'amuwa e nnamba y'essimu eya muganda we, Mustafa omutemi w'ennyama mu zoni eyitibwa Kizungu mu kibuga ky'e Mbarara

translation.en: Critics cite companies like MTN, UTL, Zain and Warid, whose bosses are non Ugandans
translation.lug: Abantu abamu boogera ku kampuni gamba nga MTN, UTL, Zain ne Warid, nti abazikulira si Bannayuganda

translation.en: The Luuka District NRM returning officer Waiswa Mutebi fled the charging mob before announcing the final results
translation.lug: Akulira eby'okulonda mu kibiina kya NRM mu disitulikiti y'e Luuka Waiswa Mutebi yadduka abantu abaali bataamye obugo bwe yali nga tannalangirira byava mu kulonda

translation.en: The Uganda AIDS Commission’s Country Progress Report released in March 2010 puts the number of women living with HIV at 631,195 out of the total of 1101,317 people carrying the virus by December 2008
translation.lug: Alipoota ekwata ku balwadde ba mukenenya eyafulumizibwa mu Maaki 2010 eraga nti abakazi abalina mukenenya bawera 631,195 obutafaananako abaalina ekirwadde kino mu 2008 abaali 1,101, 317

translation.en: Norbert Mao has taken the DP presidency, but Mabikke has since formed his own Social Democratic Party (SDP); Leander Komakech and Joseph Luzige are no longer heard of and Sebaggala has now joined NRM, his former adversary
translation.lug: Norbert Mao atutte obwa pulezidenti bw'ekibiina kya DP, naye okuva olwo, Mabikke yatandikawo ekikye ekiyitibwa Social Democratic Party (SDP); omukulembeze Komakech ne Joseph Luzige tebamanyiddwako mayitire era ne Sebaggala azze mu NRM,

translation.en: Mabikke, who had been in the same DP faction as Sebaggala says the Mayor joined the NRM almost immediately he started his second term at City Hall
translation.lug: Mabikke ne Sebaggala babadde mu kibiina kye kimu ekya DP era Mabikke agamba nti Meeya yayingira dda NRM bwe yali nga yakatandika ekisanja kye ekyokubiri ku City Hall

translation.en: Mabikke says Sebaggala’s defection is confirmed by Museveni’s attendance of his Political king or villain?
translation.lug: Mabikke agamba nti Sebaggala okwabulira ekibiina kyakakasibwa Museveni bwe yamukyalira

translation.en: Sebaggala told The Independent that it was hard for him to return to DP because of the endless squabbles in the party
translation.lug: Ssebaggala yagamba olupapula lwa Independent nti kyamuzibuwalira nnyo okuddayo mu DP olw'okuba ekibiina kirimu ennyombo ezitakoma

translation.en: Whereas the Board has been discussing proposals to amend the NSSF Act, it is inaccurate to say these have already been forwarded to the Minister of Finance, Planning and Economic Development
translation.lug: Wadde nga wabaddewo okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku nnongosereza erina okukolebwa ku mateeka agafuga ekitavu ky'abakozi, tekiba kituufu okugamba nti ebyo bimaze okuweerezebwa eri minisita w'eby'ensimbi, Okutegekera eggwanga n'eby'obusuubuzi

translation.en: The NSSF fully appreciates the need to review the Act and also introduce products that meet the members’ expectations
translation.lug: Ekitavu ky'abakozi kisiima nnyo obwetaavu obuliwo obw'okukola enoongosereza mu mateeka agakifuga era n'okuleetawo ebintu ebiganyula bamemba baakyo

translation.en: Andrew Mwenda, you have been a strong but undeclared advocate of good public services especially through your now trademark Kagame Vs Museveni series
translation.lug: Andrew Mwenda, obadde musajja wa maanyi nnyo era ng'olinga awagira wabeewo enkola ennungi eganyula abantu era kino okikoze okuyitira mu by'owandiika ebikwata ku Museveni ne Kagame

translation.en: Bududa people showed bravery and denounced the NRM
translation.lug: Abantu b'e Bududa baalaga obuvumu ne baabulira NRM

translation.en: Museveni has nothing to offer to people except to take away their independence and hope
translation.lug: Museveni talina ky'ayinza kuganyula bantu okuggya okubaggyako eddembe lyabwe n'esuubi

translation.en: The number of civil organisations that have come together under the Citizens Coalition for Electoral Democracy in Uganda  to monitor the 2011 presidential and parliamentary elections is five hundrend.
translation.lug: Ebibiina ebizze okutunuulira okulonda kwa 2011 nga biri wansi w'ekibiina mwe byegattira ekiyitibwa Citizens Coalition for Electoral Democray biri ebikkumi bitaano

translation.en: Just as President Museveni flew in his presidential jet to the UN summit in New York about a week ago, the media was awash with stories that jiggers had attacked families and caused deaths in villages in Busoga
translation.lug: Museveni bwe yakozesa ennyonyi ye ey'obwa pulezidenti n'agenda mu lukungaana lw'ekibiina ky'amawanga amagatte wiiki ewedde, emikuttu gy'eby'empuliziganya gyabuttikirwa ebigambo ebigamba nti envunza zirumbye amaka era ne zitta abantu mu byalo by'e Busoga

translation.en: The FDC headquarters suspended the declaration of the final results until a thorough investigation was carried out.
translation.lug: Ebitebbe ebikulu eby'ekibiina kya FDC byalekera awo okulangirira ebyava mu kulonda okutuusa ng'okunoonyereza kumaze okukolebwa

translation.en: Similar incidents have happened in Arua, Zombo, Maracha, Ngora and Kitgum districts over the women parliamentary seats
translation.lug: Ebintu bye bimu bibaddewo mu Arua, Zombo, Maracha, Ngora ne Kitgum ku bikwata ku kifo ky'omubaka omukazi owa munisipaali

translation.en: For example the initial information indicated that the electoral colleges in Arua were 78 yet the tallied results represented 89 electoral colleges
translation.lug: Ng'ekyokulabirako,ebyasooka okufunibwa biraga nti ebifo eby'okulonderamu byali 78 songa ate obululu obwabalibwa bwali bukiikirira ebifo 89 ebikubirwamu obululu

translation.en: The FDC has received petitions from the losers in these districts
translation.lug: Ekibiina kya FDC kifunye okwemmulugunya okuva mu bitundu ebyo

translation.en: In Mbale no winner has been declared by the party
translation.lug: Mu Mbale tewali n'omu y'abadde kulangirirwa

translation.en: Wokuri confirmed she had lodged a petition at the FDC headquarters in Kampala and she was waiting for a response from the electoral commission
translation.lug: Wokuri yagamba nti okwemmulugunya kwe yali akutute ku kitebe kya FDC  mu Kampala era nti yali alindirira akakiiko k'eby'okulonda kye kannagamba

translation.en: Upon perusal of the report, the FDC electoral commission will take a decision
translation.lug: Oluvannyuma lw'okwekennenya alipoota, akakiiko k'eby'okulonda mu kibiina kya FDC kajja kubaako bye kasalawo

translation.en: BY the time we went to press on October 5, the FDC flag bearer’s post for Mbale District woman MP was still vacant
translation.lug: We twafulumiriza bino mu Okitobba nga 5, ekifo ky'omubaka omukala anaakwatira ekibiina kya FDC bbendera mu Mbale kyali kikyali kyereere

translation.en: The Management and Staff of The Independent Publications congratulate His Excellence Yoweri Kaguta Museveni, and all the people of Uganda on this occasion when we celebrate 48 years of independence
translation.lug: Abakulu n'abakozi b'olupapula lwa The Independence bayozayoza Ow'Ekitiibwa Pulezidenti wa Uganda Yowere Kaguta Museveni n'abantu ba Uganda bonna olw'okutuuka ku mwaka guno ogwa 48 bukya eggwanga lino lifuna obwetwaze

translation.en: He is seeking court to stop Museveni’s nomination which he says was illegal
translation.lug: Ayagala kkooti eyimirize okusunsulwa kwa Museveni ye ky'agamba nti kyali bweru w'amateeka

translation.en: Maguru further contends that he had been He is also challenging the legitimacy of the NRM national conference at which Museveni was elected was not valid because many of the delegates had not been elected yet
translation.lug: Maguru era agamba nti y'abadde ow'okusunsulibwa era agamba nti n'olukungaana Museveni mwe yasunsulibwa telwali mu mateeka kubanga bangi ku bakiise tebaalondebwa

translation.en: He wants court to stop Museveni’s nomination as presidential candidate for 2011 until his petition has been heard and concluded
translation.lug: Ayagala kkooti eyimirize okusunsulwa kwa Museveni okwesimbawo mu kifo kya pulezidenti mu 2011 okutuusa ng'okwemmulugunya kwe kumaze okukolebwako

translation.en: He argues that if Museveni is nominated before the disposal of his petition, it will defeat the purpose of his going to court
translation.lug: Agamba nti singa Museveni atongozebwa ng'omusango gwe tegunnava mu ddiiro mu kkooti ajja kuba yagenderayo bwereere

translation.en: If the court allows the petition, it means that Museveni’s candidature, the NRM national conference and its activities at Namboole will be null and void
translation.lug: Singa kkooti ekkiriza omusango gwe, ekyo kijja kuba kitegeeza nti okwesimbawo kwa Museveni, ttabamiruka w'ekibiina kya NRM na byonna ebyakolebwa e Namboole bijja kuba bisazibwamu
