translation.en: The NRM will have to convene another national conference and conduct fresh elections for the presidential candidate
translation.lug: Ekibiina kya NRM kijja kuyita ttabamiruka omulala era n'okulondebwa kw'oyo anneesimbawo mu kifo kya pulezidenti kuddibwemu

translation.en: As a way of facilitating the smooth running of the exercise the Ministry of Education and Sports has offered to help schools partnering with government to implement the programme
translation.lug: Okusobola okuyambako enkola eno okutambula obulungi minisitule y'eby'enjigiriza n'emizannyo esazeewo okuyamba amasomero agalina enkolagana nayo okusobola okuddukanya obulungi enkola eyo

translation.en: According to the circular signed by the ministry’s permanent secretary, Francis Lubanga, each school will receive the same number of specimens regardless of the number of candidates it has registered for the exams
translation.lug: Okusinziira ku kiwandiiko ekyateekebwako omukono omuwandiisi ow'enkalakalira mu minisitule, Francis Lubanga, buli somero lijja kufuna omuwendo gw'ebikozesebwa gwe gumu ng'ogyeko omuwendo gw'abayizi abawandiisibwa okutuula ebigezo

translation.en: This is the second time government is paying for the current S.4 students benefiting from the USE programme
translation.lug: Guno gwe mulundi ogusoose gavumenti okusasulira abayizi ba siniya ey'okuna mu nteekateeka eno eya bonna basome

translation.en: The selection of model farmers will be done at the parish and subcounty level from where the names will be seconded to the districts,” Museveni said
translation.lug: Museveni yagamba nti okulonda omulimi onywedde mu banne akendo kujja kukolebwa ku muluka ne ku ggombolola era olwo amannya gatwalibwe ku disitulikiti

translation.en: He said conflicts and lack of communication about the programme and its implementation were some of the reasons NAADS had failed to reach all the intended beneficiaries
translation.lug: Yagamba nti ennyombo n'obutaba na mpuliziganya nnungi ku pulogulaamu eno n'engeri y'okugiddukanyaamu bye bimu ku ebyo ebyaviirako NAADS okulemererwa okutuukirira abo bonna abaalina okugiganyulwamu

translation.en: Museveni is angry that Heritage refused to contribute just 30 percent of its earnings to the nation's underdeveloped economy, despite a 966 percent profit on the sale
translation.lug: Museven munyiivu olw'okuba Heritage yagaana okuwaayo ebitundu asatu ku buli kikumi byokka ku nfuna yaayo eri eggwanga lino erikyakula obukuzi wadde nga bafuna amagoba ga bitundu 966 ku buli kikumu

translation.en: Some industry insiders believe that the Irish company will have to pay the outstanding taxes on behalf of former partner Heritage if it wants to continue operating in Uganda
translation.lug: Abamu bagamba nti kampuni eno ejja kusasula emisolo gya maanyi nnyo ku lwa bannaabwe aba Heritage bwe baba nga baagala okweyongera okukolera mu Uganda

translation.en: "Tullow is stretching Museveni's patience and soon he will kick them out," said another source close to the transaction
translation.lug: "Aba Tullow bazannyidde nnyo ku bugumiikiriza bwa Museveni era mu kiseera ekitali kya wala ajja kubagoba," waliwo omuntu eyayogera ebigambo ebyo era nng'alina ky'amanyi ku nsonga eno

translation.en: Italian giant Eni, whose deal to buy Heritage`s assets was all but signed when Tullow preempted it, remains keen to participate in the oil industry in Uganda, according to an industry insider
translation.lug: Kampuni ennene ennyo okuva mu Yitale eyitibwa Eni, eyamala edda okussaako omukono okugula eby'obuggaga bwa Heritage wadde nga yalemesebwa Tullow, ekyayagala nnyo okweyongera okwenyigira mu by'amafuta ga Uganda

translation.en: The Independent has learned that the company has written letters to companies including CNOOC, Total and Eni threatening to sue them if they show any interest in the Ugandan fields
translation.lug: Olupapula lwa Independent lukitegeddeko nti kampuni ewandiikidde makampuni amalala amabaluwa era nga mu go mwe muli CNOOC, Total ne Eni ng'ettiisattiisa nti ejja kugatwala mu mbuga z'amateeka singa geeyongera okiraga nti gaagala amafuta ga Uganda

translation.en: Instead, only US$128 million was paid to Uganda and the outstanding amount of $281 million deposited in a London escrow account.
translation.lug: Mu butuufu ssente ezaasasulwa Uganda ziri obukadde bwa ddoola kikkumi mu abiri mu munaana ate ezikyasigaddeyo ziri obukadde bwa ddoola 281 ezirina okuteekebwa mu bbanka e London

translation.en: President Museveni's hopes for first oil before the election may have failed along with an early production scheme, but a fat tax cheque would demonstrate to Ugandans that the government will not let all the profits of oil be leached out of the country by foreigners
translation.lug: Esuubi lya Museveni ery'amafuta okutandika okutundibwa ng'okulonda tekunnabaawo lirabika teryatuukirira, naye omusolo omunene ogusabibwa gulaga Bannayuganda nti gavumenti tejja kukkiriza magoba gonna agava mu mafuta okutwalibwa abantu b'ebweru

translation.en: Other senior members of government have also said publicly that Uganda is looking to Tullow to help collect tax from Heritage
translation.lug: Abakungu abalala nabo bagamba anti gavumenti eyagala Tullow okugiyamba okusoloza omusolo okuva ku kampuni ya Heritage

translation.en: The company made a mistake in buying from Heritage while the tax issue remained unresolved, according Tullow has operations across three exploration blocks in southwestern Uganda
translation.lug: Kampuni yakola ensobi okugula ku Heritage ng'ensonga y'emisolo tennaba kugonjolebwa, Tullow erina by'ekola ku nzizza za mirundi esatu eziri mu bukiikakkono bwa Uganda

translation.en: Museveni’s hopes for first oil before the election may have failed along with an early production scheme, but a fat tax cheque would demonstrate to Ugandans that the government will not let all the profits of oil be leached out of the country by foreigners to D'Ujanga
translation.lug: Esuubi lya Museveni ery'amafuta okutandika okutundibwa ng'okulonda tekunnabaawo lirabika teryatuukirira, naye omusolo omunene ogusabibwa gulaga Bannayuganda nti gavumenti tejja kukkiriza magoba gonna agava mu mafuta okutwalibwa abantu b'ebweru

translation.en: If forced to pay the Uganda government on Heritage's behalf, Tullow may be able to recover the money
translation.lug: Singa ewalirizibwa okusasula gavumenti ya Uganda ku lwa Heritage, Tullow eyinza okusobola okuggyayo ssente zaayo

translation.en: That would allow for the release of the money in the London escrow account to pay the Ugandan government
translation.lug: Ekyo kiba kijja kubasobozesa okufuna ssente okuva mu bbanka ya London okusasula gavumenti ya Uganda

translation.en: If the cost of getting Kingfisher back is the outstanding taxes, it is well worth it for Tullow to pay; Heritage's outstanding taxes amount to US$281 million, while the company expects production in Uganda to amount to 200,000 barrels of oil per day at its peak
translation.lug: Bwe kiba nga kyamuganyulo okukomyawo kampuni ya Kingfisher kijja kubasobozesa okusasula emisolo, kiba ky'amagezi Tullow okusasula; Emisolo Heritage gy'erina okusasula giwera obukadde bwa ddoola 281 ate nga kampuni esuubira okusima amafuta mu Uganda agawera ebipimo 200,000 buli lunaku

translation.en: Dickens Kamugisha, of the African Institute for Energy Governance, says he believes that Museveni's frustration with the Irish company dates back even further than that
translation.lug: Dickens Kamugisha, okuva mu African Insititute of Energy Governance alowooza nti Museveni eky'okunyiigira kampuni y'abazungu eno tekivudde kati

translation.en: The government has consistently refused Heritage`s offers of arbitration in London, maintaining that outsiders should not be making decisions about a Ugandan national resource
translation.lug: Emirundi mingi gavumenti egaanye okuteesaganya ne Heritage mu London ng'agamba nti abantu b'ebweru tebalina kutusalingawo ku bikwata ku by'obuggaga bwa Uganda

translation.en: Uganda`s Solicitor General has advised the government not to go to arbitration, suggesting he fears the government does not have a good case
translation.lug: Ssababalirizi wa Uganda awadde gavumenti amagezi obutakkiriza kuteesaganya mbu kubanga alina okutya nti gavumenti eyinza okummegebwa

translation.en: Perhaps his analysis of the PSAs has revealed another factor that weakens Uganda’s argument
translation.lug: Oboolyawo engeri gy'annyonnyolamu PSA etuyamba okutegeera ensonga endala ennafuya Uganda gy'erina

translation.en: As the wrangle gets bigger, drawing in Tullow and later maybe, oil majors from around the world, the one thing that is clear is that many people consider the reserves in Uganda worth fighting over
translation.lug: Obutakkanya buno nga bugenda bweyongera, nga buzingiramu Tullow era oboolyawo n'abanene abalala mu lwokaano lw'amafuta okwetooloola ensi yonna, ekintu kimu ekitegeerekeka obulungi abantu bangi batwala enzizzi za Uganda okuba nga zigwana okulwanira

translation.en: In trying to quell the MayiMayi, the UPDF, says the report, “instituted a reign of terror for several years with complete impunity
translation.lug: Alipoota egamba nti UPDF mu kugezaako okufufugaza aba MayiMayi "yassaawo enfuga ereetawo okutya okw'amaanyi okumala emyaka mingi nga tewali abakuba ku mukono

translation.en: ” The report alleges that the UPDF, “introduced a particularly cruel form of detention, putting the detainees in holes dug two or three metres deep into the ground, where they were forced to live exposed to bad weather, with no sanitation and on muddy ground
translation.lug: Alipoota era egamba nti UPDF "yassaawo okusibibwa okw'obukambwe, ng'abasibe bateekebwa mu binnya ebiweza mita bbiri oba ssatu wansi, nga bawaliribwa okusula omwo mu mbeera y'obudde embi ennyo era nga tebalina kifo gye beeyambira era nga basula mu ttosi

translation.en: Over and again, the UPDF is accused of potential war crimes not solely during the Second Congo War, but during the First Congo War between July 1996 and July 1998, and the transition period of January 2001 to June 2003
translation.lug: Emirundi n'emirundi UPDF evunaaniddwa okuzza emisango egyekuusa ku ntalo mu kiseera ky'olutalo lw'e Congo olwasooka ne mu lw'okubiri ezaaliwo mu 1996 ne 1998 era n'eggyo gye yazza mu Jjanwali 2001 okutuuka mu Jjuuni 2003

translation.en: He writes that the report accuses the UPDF of crimes in areas where it had not even been deployed
translation.lug: Yawandiika nti alipoota erumika UPDF okuzza emisango mu bitundu gy'etaali

translation.en: Although UPDF crimes are far more pronounced in the report, the report is hardly “silent” on these other guilty groups
translation.lug: Wadde ng'emisango gya UPDF gino girabika nga gya maanyi nnyo, naye alipoota eyogera ne ku bibiina ebirala

translation.en: Yet if individuals such as Minister Kutesa, outright deny and discredit the report, how can we expect other leaders to exercise the discipline and energy to react to it?
translation.lug: Kati bwe kiba nti abantu nga minisita Kuteesa yeegaana era n'afutyanka ebyo ebiri mu Alipoota, ddala twandisuubidde abakulembe abalala okwoleka empisa ennungi era n'okuba n'obuggumu okugikolerako?

translation.en: Thousands of Hema children allegedly recruited by the UPC underwent military training in the Mandro, Katoto and Bule camps
translation.lug: Enkumi n'enkumi z'abaana abagambibwa nti baawandiisibwa UPC baatendekebwa eby'ekijaasi mu nkambi ye Mandrok, Katoto ne Bule

translation.en: They probably did not have to meet UJA, after all many journalists believe it does not exist anymore
translation.lug: Oboolyawo kyali tekibeetaagisa kusisinkana UJA, gw'ate oba bannamawulire bangi balowooza nti tekikyaliwo
